 nārāyaṇaṃ namaskṛtya naraṃ caiva narottamam devīṃ sarasvatīṃ caiva tato jayam udīrayet dvaipāyanauṣṭhapuṭaniḥsṛtam aprameyaṃ puṇyaṃ pavitram atha pāpaharaṃ śivaṃ ca yo bhārataṃ samadhigacchati vācyamānaṃ kiṃ tasya puṣkarajalair abhiṣecanena yo gośataṃ kaṇanakaśṛṅgamayaṃ dadāti viprāya vedaviduṣe ca bahuśrutāya ekāṃ ca bhāratakathāṃ śṛṇuyāt samagrāṃ tulyaṃ phalaṃ bhavati tasya ca tasya ceti vyāsaṃ vasiṣṭhanaptāraṃ śakteḥ pautram akalmaṣam parāśarātmajaṃ vande śukatātaṃ taponidhim vyāsāya viṣṇurūpāya vyāsarūpāya viṣṇave namo vai brahmanidhaye vāsiṣṭhāya namo namaḥ namo dharmāya mahate namaḥ kṛṣṇāya vedhase brāhmaṇebhyo namaskṛtya dharmān vakṣyāmi śāśvatān namo bhagavate tasmai vyāsāyāmitatejase yasya prasādād vakṣyāmi nārāyaṇakathām imām vaiśaṃpāyana uvācaa kṛtodakās te suhṛdāṃ sarveṣāṃ pāṇḍunandanāḥc viduro dhṛtarāṣṭraś ca sarvāś ca bharatastriyaḥa tatra te sumahātmāno nyavasan kurunandanāḥc śaucaṃ nivartayiṣyanto māsam ekaṃ bahiḥ purāta kṛtodakaṃ tu rājānaṃ dharmātmānaṃ yudhiṣṭhiramc abhijagmur mahātmānaḥ siddhā brahmarṣisattamāḥa dvaipāyano nāradaś ca devalaś ca mahān ṛṣiḥc devasthānaś ca kaṇvaś ca teṣāṃ śiṣyāś ca sattamāḥa anye ca vedavidvāṃsaḥ kṛtaprajñā dvijātayaḥc gṛhasthāḥ snātakāḥ sarve dadṛśuḥ kurusattamama abhigamya mahātmānaḥ pūjitāś ca yathāvidhic āsaneṣu mahārheṣu viviśus te maharṣayaḥa pratigṛhya tataḥ pūjāṃ tatkālasadṛśīṃ tadāc paryupāsan yathānyāyaṃ parivārya yudhiṣṭhirama puṇye bhāgīrathītīre śokavyākulacetasamc āśvāsayanto rājānaṃ viprāḥ śatasahasraśaḥa nāradas tv abravīt kāle dharmātmānaṃ yudhiṣṭhiramc vicārya munibhiḥ sārdhaṃ tatkālasadṛśaṃ vacaḥa bhavato bāhuvīryeṇa prasādān mādhavasya cac jiteyam avaniḥ kṛtsnā dharmeṇa ca yudhiṣṭhiraa diṣṭyā muktāḥ stha saṃgrāmād asmāl lokabhayaṃkarātc kṣatradharmarataś cāpi kaccin modasi pāṇḍavaa kaccic ca nihatāmitraḥ prīṇāsi suhṛdo nṛpac kaccic chriyam imāṃ prāpya na tvāṃ śokaḥ prabādhate yudhiṣṭhira uvācaa vijiteyaṃ mahī kṛtsnā kṛṣṇabāhubalāśrayātc brāhmaṇānāṃ prasādena bhīmārjunabalena caa idaṃ tu me mahad duḥkhaṃ vartate hṛdi nityadāc kṛtvā jñātikṣayam imaṃ mahāntaṃ lobhakāritama saubhadraṃ draupadeyāṃś ca ghātayitvā priyān sutānc jayo yam ajayākāro bhagavan pratibhāti mea kiṃ nu vakṣyati vārṣṇeyī vadhūr me madhusūdanamc dvārakāvāsinī kṛṣṇam itaḥ pratigataṃ harima draupadī hataputreyaṃ kṛpaṇā hatabāndhavāc asmatpriyahite yuktā bhūyaḥ pīḍayatīva māma idam anyac ca bhagavan yat tvāṃ vakṣyāmi nāradac mantrasaṃvaraṇenāsmi kuntyā duḥkhena yojitaḥa yo sau nāgāyutabalo loke pratiratho raṇec siṃhakhelagatir dhīmān ghṛṇī dānto yatavrataḥa āśrayo dhārtarāṣṭrāṇāṃ mānī tīkṣṇaparākramaḥc amarṣī nityasaṃrambhī kṣeptāsmākaṃ raṇe raṇea śīghrāstraś citrayodhī ca kṛtī cādbhutavikramaḥc gūḍhotpannaḥ sutaḥ kuntyā bhrātāsmākaṃ ca sodaraḥa toyakarmaṇi yaṃ kuntī kathayām āsa sūryajamc putraṃ sarvaguṇopetam avakīrṇaṃ jale purād mañjūṣāyāṃ samādhāya gaṅgāsrotasy amajjayata yaṃ sūtaputraṃ loko yaṃ rādheyaṃ cāpy amanyatac sa jyeṣṭhaputraḥ kuntyā vai bhrātāsmākaṃ ca mātṛjaḥa ajānatā mayā saṃkhye rājyalubdhena ghātitaḥc tan me dahati gātrāṇi tūlarāśim ivānalaḥa na hi taṃ veda pārtho pi bhrātaraṃ śvetavāhanaḥc nāhaṃ na bhīmo na yamau sa tv asmān veda suvrataḥa gatā kila pṛthā tasya sakāśam iti naḥ śrutamc asmākaṃ śamakāmā vai tvaṃ ca putro mamety athaa pṛthāyā na kṛtaḥ kāmas tena cāpi mahātmanāc atipaścād idaṃ mātary avocad iti naḥ śrutama na hi śakṣyāmy ahaṃ tyaktuṃ nṛpaṃ duryodhanaṃ raṇec anāryaṃ ca nṛśaṃsaṃ ca kṛtaghnaṃ ca hi me bhaveta yudhiṣṭhireṇa saṃdhiṃ ca yadi kuryāṃ mate tavac bhīto raṇe śvetavāhād iti māṃ maṃsyate janaḥa so haṃ nirjitya samare vijayaṃ sahakeśavamc saṃdhāsye dharmaputreṇa paścād iti ca so bravīta tam avocat kila pṛthā punaḥ pṛthulavakṣasamc caturṇām abhayaṃ dehi kāmaṃ yudhyasva phalgunama so bravīn mātaraṃ dhīmān vepamānaḥ kṛtāñjaliḥc prāptān viṣahyāṃś caturo na haniṣyāmi te sutāna pañcaiva hi sutā mātar bhaviṣyanti hi te dhruvamc sakarṇā vā hate pārthe sārjunā vā hate mayia taṃ putragṛddhinī bhūyo mātā putram athābravītc bhrātṝṇāṃ svasti kurvīthā yeṣāṃ svasti cikīrṣasia tam evam uktvā tu pṛthā visṛjyopayayau gṛhānc so rjunena hato vīro bhrātā bhrātrā sahodaraḥa na caiva vivṛto mantraḥ pṛthāyās tasya vā munec atha śūro maheṣvāsaḥ pārthenāsau nipātitaḥa ahaṃ tv ajñāsiṣaṃ paścāt svasodaryaṃ dvijottamac pūrvajaṃ bhrātaraṃ karṇaṃ pṛthāyā vacanāt prabhoa tena me dūyate tīva hṛdayaṃ bhrātṛghātinaḥc karṇārjunasahāyo haṃ jayeyam api vāsavama sabhāyāṃ kliśyamānasya dhārtarāṣṭrair durātmabhiḥc sahasotpatitaḥ krodhaḥ karṇaṃ dṛṣṭvā praśāmyatia yadā hy asya giro rūkṣāḥ śṛṇomi kaṭukodayāḥc sabhāyāṃ gadato dyūte duryodhanahitaiṣiṇaḥa tadā naśyati me krodhaḥ pādau tasya nirīkṣya hac kuntyā hi sadṛśau pādau karṇasyeti matir mamaa sādṛśyahetum anvicchan pṛthāyās tava caiva hac kāraṇaṃ nādhigacchāmi kathaṃ cid api cintayana kathaṃ nu tasya saṃgrāme pṛthivī cakram agrasatc kathaṃ ca śapto bhrātā me tat tvaṃ vaktum ihārhasia śrotum icchāmi bhagavaṃs tvattaḥ sarvaṃ yathātathamc bhavān hi sarvavid vidvāṃl loke veda kṛtākṛtamd anāgate vartamāne trailokye nātra saṃśayaḥ vaiśaṃpāyana uvācaa sa evam uktas tu munir nārado vadatāṃ varaḥc kathayām āsa tat sarvaṃ yathā śaptaḥ sa sūtajaḥa evam etan mahābāho yathā vadasi bhāratac na karṇārjunayoḥ kiṃ cid aviṣahyaṃ bhaved raṇea guhyam etat tu devānāṃ kathayiṣyāmi te nṛpac tan nibodha mahārāja yathā vṛttam idaṃ purāa kṣatraṃ svargaṃ kathaṃ gacchec chastrapūtam iti prabhoc saṃgharṣajananas tasmāt kanyāgarbho vinirmitaḥa sa bālas tejasā yuktaḥ sūtaputratvam āgataḥc cakārāṅgirasāṃ śreṣṭhe dhanurvedaṃ gurau tavaa sa balaṃ bhīmasenasya phalgunasya ca lāghavamc buddhiṃ ca tava rājendra yamayor vinayaṃ tathāa sakhyaṃ ca vāsudevena bālye gāṇḍivadhanvanaḥc prajānām anurāgaṃ ca cintayāno vyadahyataa sa sakhyam agamad bālye rājñā duryodhanena vaic yuṣmābhir nityasaṃdviṣṭo daivāc cāpi svabhāvataḥa vidyādhikam athālakṣya dhanurvede dhanaṃjayamc droṇaṃ rahasy upāgamya karṇo vacanam abravīta brahmāstraṃ vettum icchāmi sarahasyanivartanamb aho citraṃ mahac citraṃ viparītam idaṃ jagatb yenāpatrapate sādhur asādhus tena tuṣyatic arjunena samo yuddhe bhaveyam iti me matiḥa samaḥ putreṣu ca snehaḥ śiṣyeṣu ca tava dhruvamc tvatprasādān na māṃ brūyur akṛtāstraṃ vicakṣaṇāḥa droṇas tathoktaḥ karṇena sāpekṣaḥ phalgunaṃ pratic daurātmyaṃ cāpi karṇasya viditvā tam uvāca haa brahmāstraṃ brāhmaṇo vidyād yathāvac caritavrataḥc kṣatriyo vā tapasvī yo nānyo vidyāt kathaṃ canaa ity ukto ṅgirasāṃ śreṣṭham āmantrya pratipūjya cac jagāma sahasā rāmaṃ mahendraṃ parvataṃ pratia sa tu rāmam upāgamya śirasābhipraṇamya cac brāhmaṇo bhārgavo smīti gauraveṇābhyagacchataa rāmas taṃ pratijagrāha pṛṣṭvā gotrādi sarvaśaḥc uṣyatāṃ svāgataṃ ceti prītimāṃś cābhavad bhṛśama tatra karṇasya vasato mahendre parvatottamec gandharvai rākṣasair yakṣair devaiś cāsīt samāgamaḥa sa tatreṣv astram akarod bhṛguśreṣṭhād yathāvidhic priyaś cābhavad atyarthaṃ devagandharvarakṣasāma sa kadā cit samudrānte vicarann āśramāntikec ekaḥ khaḍgadhanuṣpāṇiḥ paricakrāma sūtajaḥa so gnihotraprasaktasya kasya cid brahmavādinaḥc jaghānājñānataḥ pārtha homadhenuṃ yadṛcchayāa tad ajñānakṛtaṃ matvā brāhmaṇāya nyavedayatc karṇaḥ prasādayaṃś cainam idam ity abravīd vacaḥa abuddhipūrvaṃ bhagavan dhenur eṣā hatā tavac mayā tatra prasādaṃ me kuruṣveti punaḥ punaḥa taṃ sa vipro bravīt kruddho vācā nirbhartsayann ivac durācāra vadhārhas tvaṃ phalaṃ prāpnuhi durmatea yena vispardhase nityaṃ yadarthaṃ ghaṭase niśamc yudhyatas tena te pāpa bhūmiś cakraṃ grasiṣyatia tataś cakre mahīgraste mūrdhānaṃ te vicetasaḥc pātayiṣyati vikramya śatrur gaccha narādhamaa yatheyaṃ gaur hatā mūḍha pramattena tvayā mamac pramattasyaivam evānyaḥ śiras te pātayiṣyatia tataḥ prasādayām āsa punas taṃ dvijasattamamc gobhir dhanaiś ca ratnaiś ca sa cainaṃ punar abravīta nedaṃ madvyāhṛtaṃ kuryāt sarvaloko pi vai mṛṣāc gaccha vā tiṣṭha vā yad vā kāryaṃ te tat samācaraa ity ukto brāhmaṇenātha karṇo dainyād adhomukhaḥc rāmam abhyāgamad bhītas tad eva manasā smaran nārada uvācaa karṇasya bāhuvīryeṇa praśrayeṇa damena cac tutoṣa bhṛguśārdūlo guruśuśrūṣayā tathāa tasmai sa vidhivat kṛtsnaṃ brahmāstraṃ sanivartanamc provācākhilam avyagraṃ tapasvī sutapasvinea viditāstras tataḥ karṇo ramamāṇo śrame bhṛgoḥc cakāra vai dhanurvede yatnam adbhutavikramaḥa tataḥ kadā cid rāmas tu carann āśramam antikātc karṇena sahito dhīmān upavāsena karśitaḥa suṣvāpa jāmadagnyo vai visrambhotpannasauhṛdaḥc karṇasyotsaṅga ādhāya śiraḥ klāntamanā guruḥa atha kṛmiḥ śleṣmamayo māṃsaśoṇitabhojanaḥc dāruṇo dāruṇasparśaḥ karṇasyābhyāśam āgamata sa tasyorum athāsādya bibheda rudhirāśanaḥc na cainam aśakat kṣeptuṃ hantuṃ vāpi guror bhayāta saṃdaśyamāno pi tathā kṛmiṇā tena bhāratac guruprabodhaśaṅkī ca tam upaikṣata sūtajaḥa karṇas tu vedanāṃ dhairyād asahyāṃ vinigṛhya tāmc akampann avyathaṃś caiva dhārayām āsa bhārgavama yadā tu rudhireṇāṅge parispṛṣṭo bhṛgūdvahaḥc tadābudhyata tejasvī saṃtaptaś cedam abravīta aho smy aśucitāṃ prāptaḥ kim idaṃ kriyate tvayāc kathayasva bhayaṃ tyaktvā yāthātathyam idaṃ mamaa tasya karṇas tadācaṣṭa kṛmiṇā paribhakṣaṇamc dadarśa rāmas taṃ cāpi kṛmiṃ sūkarasaṃnibhama aṣṭapādaṃ tīkṣṇadaṃṣṭraṃ sūcībhir iva saṃvṛtamc romabhiḥ saṃniruddhāṅgam alarkaṃ nāma nāmataḥa sa dṛṣṭamātro rāmeṇa kṛmiḥ prāṇān avāsṛjatc tasminn evāsṛksaṃklinne tad adbhutam ivābhavata tato ntarikṣe dadṛśe viśvarūpaḥ karālavānc rākṣaso lohitagrīvaḥ kṛṣṇāṅgo meghavāhanaḥa sa rāmaṃ prāñjalir bhūtvā babhāṣe pūrṇamānasaḥc svasti te bhṛguśārdūla gamiṣyāmi yathāgatama mokṣito narakād asmi bhavatā munisattamac bhadraṃ ca te stu nandiś ca priyaṃ me bhavatā kṛtama tam uvāca mahābāhur jāmadagnyaḥ pratāpavānc kas tvaṃ kasmāc ca narakaṃ pratipanno bravīhi tata so bravīd aham āsaṃ prāg gṛtso nāma mahāsuraḥc purā devayuge tāta bhṛgos tulyavayā ivaa so haṃ bhṛgoḥ sudayitāṃ bhāryām apaharaṃ balātc maharṣer abhiśāpena kṛmibhūto pataṃ bhuvia abravīt tu sa māṃ krodhāt tava pūrvapitāmahaḥc mūtraśleṣmāśanaḥ pāpa nirayaṃ pratipatsyasea śāpasyānto bhaved brahmann ity evaṃ tam athābruvamc bhavitā bhārgave rāma iti mām abravīd bhṛguḥa so ham etāṃ gatiṃ prāpto yathā nakuśalaṃ tathāc tvayā sādho samāgamya vimuktaḥ pāpayonitaḥa evam uktvā namaskṛtya yayau rāmaṃ mahāsuraḥc rāmaḥ karṇaṃ tu sakrodham idaṃ vacanam abravīta atiduḥkham idaṃ mūḍha na jātu brāhmaṇaḥ sahetc kṣatriyasyaiva te dhairyaṃ kāmayā satyam ucyatāma tam uvāca tataḥ karṇaḥ śāpabhītaḥ prasādayanc brahmakṣatrāntare sūtaṃ jātaṃ māṃ viddhi bhārgavaa rādheyaḥ karṇa iti māṃ pravadanti janā bhuvic prasādaṃ kuru me brahmann astralubdhasya bhārgavaa pitā gurur na saṃdeho vedavidyāpradaḥ prabhuḥc ato bhārgava ity uktaṃ mayā gotraṃ tavāntikea tam uvāca bhṛguśreṣṭhaḥ saroṣaḥ prahasann ivac bhūmau nipatitaṃ dīnaṃ vepamānaṃ kṛtāñjalima yasmān mithyopacarito astralobhād iha tvayāc tasmād etad dhi te mūḍha brahmāstraṃ pratibhāsyatia anyatra vadhakālāt te sadṛśena sameyuṣaḥc abrāhmaṇe na hi brahma dhruvaṃ tiṣṭhet kadā canaa gacchedānīṃ na te sthānam anṛtasyeha vidyatec na tvayā sadṛśo yuddhe bhavitā kśatriyo bhuvia evam uktas tu rāmeṇa nyāyenopajagāma saḥc duryodhanam upāgamya kṛtāstro smīti cābravīt nārada uvācaa karṇas tu samavāpyaitad astraṃ bhārgavanandanātc duryodhanena sahito mumude bharatarṣabhaa tataḥ kadā cid rājānaḥ samājagmuḥ svayaṃvarec kaliṅgaviṣaye rājan rājñaś citrāṅgadasya caa śrīmadrājapuraṃ nāma nagaraṃ tatra bhāratac rājānaḥ śataśas tatra kanyārthaṃ samupāgamana śrutvā duryodhanas tatra sametān sarvapārthivānc rathena kāñcanāṅgena karṇena sahito yayaua tataḥ svayaṃvare tasmin saṃpravṛtte mahotsavec samāpetur nṛpatayaḥ kanyārthe nṛpasattamaa śiśupālo jarāsaṃdho bhīṣmako vakra eva cac kapotaromā nīlaś ca rukmī ca dṛḍhavikramaḥa sṛgālaś ca mahārāja strīrājyādhipatiś ca yaḥc aśokaḥ śatadhanvā ca bhojo vīraś ca nāmataḥa ete cānye ca bahavo dakṣiṇāṃ diśam āśritāḥc mlecchācāryāś ca rājānaḥ prācyodīcyāś ca bhārataa kāñcanāṅgadinaḥ sarve baddhajāmbūnadasrajaḥc sarve bhāsvaradehāś ca vyāghrā iva madotkaṭāḥa tataḥ samupaviṣṭeṣu teṣu rājasu bhāratac viveśa raṅgaṃ sā kanyā dhātrīvarṣadharānvitāa tataḥ saṃśrāvyamāṇeṣu rājñāṃ nāmasu bhāratac atyakrāmad dhārtarāṣṭraṃ sā kanyā varavarṇinīa duryodhanas tu kauravyo nāmarṣayata laṅghanamc pratyaṣedhac ca tāṃ kanyām asatkṛtya narādhipāna sa vīryamadamattatvād bhīṣmadroṇāv upāśritaḥc ratham āropya tāṃ kanyām ājuhāva narādhipāna tam anvayād rathī khaḍgī bhaddhagodhāṅgulitravānc karṇaḥ śastrabhṛtāṃ śreṣṭhaḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ puruṣarṣabhaa tato vimardaḥ sumahān rājñām āsīd yudhiṣṭhirac saṃnahyatāṃ tanutrāṇi rathān yojayatām apia te bhyadhāvanta saṃkruddhāḥ karṇaduryodhanāv ubhauc śaravarṣāṇi muñcanto meghāḥ parvatayor ivaa karṇas teṣām āpatatām ekaikena kṣureṇa hac dhanūṃṣi saśarāvāpāny apātayata bhūtalea tato vidhanuṣaḥ kāṃś cit kāṃś cid udyatakārmukānc kāṃś cid udvahato bāṇān rathaśaktigadās tathāa lāghavād ākulīkṛtya karṇaḥ praharatāṃ varaḥc hatasūtāṃś ca bhūyiṣṭhān avajigye narādhipāna te svayaṃ tvarayanto śvān yāhi yāhīti vādinaḥc vyapeyus te raṇaṃ hitvā rājāno bhagnamānasāḥa duryodhanas tu karṇena pālyamāno bhyayāt tadāc hṛṣṭaḥ kanyām upādāya nagaraṃ nāgasāhvayam nārada uvācaa āviṣkṛtabalaṃ karṇaṃ jñātvā rājā tu māgadhaḥc āhvayad dvairathenājau jarāsaṃdho mahīpatiḥa tayoḥ samabhavad yuddhaṃ divyāstraviduṣor dvayoḥc yudhi nānāpraharaṇair anyonyam abhivarṣatoḥa kṣīṇabāṇau vidhanuṣau bhagnakhaḍgau mahīṃ gatauc bāhubhiḥ samasajjetām ubhāv api balānvitaua bāhukaṇṭakayuddhena tasya karṇo tha yudhyataḥc bibheda saṃdhiṃ dehasya jarayā śleṣitasya haa sa vikāraṃ śarīrasya dṛṣṭvā nṛpatir ātmanaḥc prīto smīty abravīt karṇaṃ vairam utsṛjya bhārataa prītyā dadau sa karṇāya mālinīṃ nagarīm athac aṅgeṣu naraśārdūla sa rājāsīt sapatnajita pālayām āsa campāṃ tu karṇaḥ parabalārdanaḥc duryodhanasyānumate tavāpi viditaṃ tathāa evaṃ śastrapratāpena prathitaḥ so bhavat kṣitauc tvaddhitārthaṃ surendreṇa bhikṣito varmakuṇḍalea sa divye sahaje prādāt kuṇḍale paramārcitec sahajaṃ kavacaṃ caiva mohito devamāyayāa vimuktaḥ kuṇḍalābhyāṃ ca sahajena ca varmaṇāc nihato vijayenājau vāsudevasya paśyataḥa brāhmaṇasyābhiśāpena rāmasya ca mahātmanaḥc kuntyāś ca varadānena māyayā ca śatakratoḥa bhīṣmāvamānāt saṃkhyāyāṃ rathānām ardhakīrtanātc śalyāt tejovadhāc cāpi vāsudevanayena caa rudrasya devarājasya yamasya varuṇasya cac kuberadroṇayoś caiva kṛpasya ca mahātmanaḥa astrāṇi divyāny ādāya yudhi gāṇḍīvadhanvanāc hato vaikartanaḥ karṇo divākarasamadyutiḥa evaṃ śaptas tava bhrātā bahubhiś cāpi vañcitaḥc na śocyaḥ sa naravyāghro yuddhe hi nidhanaṃ gataḥ vaiśaṃpāyana uvācaa etāvad uktvā devarṣir virarāma sa nāradaḥc yudhiṣṭhiras tu rājarṣir dadhyau śokapariplutaḥa taṃ dīnamanasaṃ vīram adhovadanam āturamc niḥśvasantaṃ yathā nāgaṃ paryaśrunayanaṃ tathāa kuntī śokaparītāṅgī duḥkhopahatacetanāc abravīn madhurābhāṣā kāle vacanam arthavata yudhiṣṭhira mahābāho nainaṃ śocitum arhasic jahi śokaṃ mahāprājña śṛṇu cedaṃ vaco mamaa yatitaḥ sa mayā pūrvaṃ bhrātryaṃ jñāpayituṃ tavac bhāskareṇa ca devena pitrā dharmabhṛtāṃ varaa yad vācyaṃ hitakāmena suhṛdā bhūtim icchatāc tathā divākareṇoktaḥ svapnānte mama cāgrataḥa na cainam aśakad bhānur ahaṃ vā snehakāraṇaiḥc purā pratyanunetuṃ vā netuṃ vāpy ekatāṃ tvayāa tataḥ kālaparītaḥ sa vairasyoddhukṣaṇe rataḥc pratīpakārī yuṣmākam iti copekṣito mayāa ity ukto dharmarājas tu mātrā bāṣpākulekṣaṇaḥc uvāca vākyaṃ dharmātmā śokavyākulacetanaḥa bhavatyā gūḍhamantratvāt pīḍito smīty uvāca tāmc śaśāpa ca mahātejāḥ sarvalokeṣu ca striyaḥe na guhyaṃ dhārayiṣyantīty atiduḥkhasamanvitaḥa sa rājā putrapautrāṇāṃ saṃbandhisuhṛdāṃ tathāc smarann udvignahṛdayo babhūvāsvasthacetanaḥa tataḥ śokaparītātmā sadhūma iva pāvakaḥc nirvedam akarod dhīmān rājā saṃtāpapīḍitaḥ vaiśaṃpāyana uvācaa yudhiṣṭhiras tu dharmātmā śokavyākulacetanaḥc śuśoca duḥkhasaṃtaptaḥ smṛtvā karṇaṃ mahārathama āviṣṭo duḥkhaśokābhyāṃ niḥśvasaṃś ca punaḥ punaḥc dṛṣṭvārjunam uvācedaṃ vacanaṃ śokakarśitaḥa yad bhaikṣam ācariṣyāma vṛṣṇyandhakapure vayamc jñātīn niṣpuruṣān kṛtvā nemāṃ prāpsyāma durgatima amitrā naḥ samṛddhārthā vṛttārthāḥ kuravaḥ kilac ātmānam ātmanā hatvā kiṃ dharmaphalam āpnumaḥa dhig astu kṣātram ācāraṃ dhig astu balam aurasamc dhig astv amarṣaṃ yenemām āpadaṃ gamitā vayama sādhu kṣamā damaḥ śaucam avairodhyam amatsaraḥc ahiṃsā satyavacanaṃ nityāni vanacāriṇāma vayaṃ tu lobhān mohāc ca stambhaṃ mānaṃ ca saṃśritāḥc imām avasthām āpannā rājyaleśabubhukṣayāa trailokyasyāpi rājyena nāsmān kaś cit praharṣayetc bāndhavān nihatān dṛṣṭvā pṛthivyām āmiṣaiṣiṇaḥa te vayaṃ pṛthivīhetor avadhyān pṛthivīsamānc saṃparityajya jīvāmo hīnārthā hatabāndhavāḥa āmiṣe gṛdhyamānānām aśunāṃ naḥ śunām ivac āmiṣaṃ caiva no naṣṭam āmiṣasya ca bhojinaḥa na pṛthivyā sakalayā na suvarṇasya rāśibhiḥc na gavāśvena sarveṇa te tyājyā ya ime hatāḥa saṃyuktāḥ kāmamanyubhyāṃ krodhāmarṣasamanvitāḥc mṛtyuyānaṃ samāruhya gatā vaivasvatakṣayama bahu kalyāṇam icchanta īhante pitaraḥ sutānc tapasā brahmacaryeṇa vandanena titikṣayāa upavāsais tathejyābhir vratakautukamaṅgalaiḥc labhante mātaro garbhāṃs tān māsān daśa bibhratia yadi svasti prajāyante jātā jīvanti vā yadic saṃbhāvitā jātabalās te dadyur yadi naḥ sukhame iha cāmutra caiveti kṛpaṇāḥ phalahetukāḥa tāsām ayaṃ samārambho nivṛttaḥ kevalo phalaḥc yad āsāṃ nihatāḥ putrā yuvāno mṛṣṭakuṇḍalāḥa abhuktvā pārthivān bhogān ṛṇāny anavadāya cac pitṛbhyo devatābhyaś ca gatā vaivasvatakṣayama yadaiṣām aṅga pitarau jātau kāmamayāv ivac saṃjātabalarūpeṣu tadaiva nihatā nṛpāḥa saṃyuktāḥ kāmamanyubhyāṃ krodhaharṣāsamañjasāḥc na te janmaphalaṃ kiṃ cid bhoktāro jātu karhi cita pāñcālānāṃ kurūṇāṃ ca hatā eva hi ye hatāḥc te vayaṃ tv adhamāṃl lokān prapadyema svakarmabhiḥa vayam evāsya lokasya vināśe kāraṇaṃ smṛtāḥc dhṛtarāṣṭrasya putreṇa nikṛtyā pratyapatsmahia sadaiva nikṛtiprajño dveṣṭā māyopajīvanaḥc mithyāvṛttaḥ sa satatam asmāsv anapakāriṣua aṃśakāmā vayaṃ te ca na cāsmābhir na tair jitamc na tair bhukteyam avanir na nāryo gītavāditama nāmātyasamitau kathyaṃ na ca śrutavatāṃ śrutamc na ratnāni parārdhyāni na bhūr na draviṇāgamaḥd asmaddveṣeṇa saṃtaptaḥ sukhaṃ na smeha vindatia ṛddhim asmāsu tāṃ dṛṣṭvā vivarṇo hariṇaḥ kṛśaḥc dhṛtarāṣṭrasya nṛpateḥ saubalena niveditaḥa taṃ pitā putragṛddhitvād anumene naye sthitamc anavekṣyaiva pitaraṃ gāṅgeyaṃ viduraṃ tathāe asaṃśayaṃ dhṛtarāṣṭro yathaivāhaṃ tathā gataḥa aniyamyāśuciṃ lubdhaṃ putraṃ kāmavaśānugamc patito yaśaso dīptād ghātayitvā sahodarāna imau vṛddhau ca śokāgnau prakṣipya sa suyodhanaḥc asmatpradveṣasaṃyuktaḥ pāpabuddhiḥ sadaiva hia ko hi bandhuḥ kulīnaḥ saṃs tathā brūyāt suhṛjjanec yathāsāv uktavān kṣudro yuyutsur vṛṣṇisaṃnidhaua ātmano hi vayaṃ doṣād vinaṣṭāḥ śāśvatīḥ samāḥc pradahanto diśaḥ sarvās tejasā bhāskarā ivaa so smākaṃ vairapuruṣo durmantripragrahaṃ gataḥc duryodhanakṛte hy etat kulaṃ no vinipātitame avadhyānāṃ vadhaṃ kṛtvā loke prāptāḥ sma vācyatāma kulasyāsyāntakaraṇaṃ durmatiṃ pāpakāriṇamc rājā rāṣṭreśvaraṃ kṛtvā dhṛtarāṣṭro dya śocatia hatāḥ śūrāḥ kṛtaṃ pāpaṃ viṣayaḥ svo vināśitaḥc hatvā no vigato manyuḥ śoko māṃ rundhayaty ayama dhanaṃjaya kṛtaṃ pāpaṃ kalyāṇenopahanyateb khyāpanenānutāpena dānena tapasāpi vāb nivṛttyā tīrthagamanāc chrutismṛtijapena cac tyāgavāṃś ca punaḥ pāpaṃ nālaṃ kartum iti śrutiḥa tyāgavāñ janmamaraṇe nāpnotīti śrutir yadāc prāptavartmā kṛtamatir brahma saṃpadyate tadāa sa dhanaṃjaya nirdvaṃdvo munir jñānasamanvitaḥc vanam āmantrya vaḥ sarvān gamiṣyāmi paraṃtapaa na hi kṛtsnatamo dharmaḥ śakyaḥ prāptum iti śrutiḥc parigrahavatā tan me pratyakṣam arisūdanaa mayā nisṛṣṭaṃ pāpaṃ hi parigraham abhīpsatāc janmakṣayanimittaṃ ca śakyaṃ prāptum iti śrutiḥa sa parigraham utsṛjya kṛtsnaṃ rājyaṃ tathaiva cac gamiṣyāmi vinirmukto viśoko vijvaras tathāa praśādhi tvam imām urvīṃ kṣemāṃ nihatakaṇṭakāmc na mamārtho sti rājyena na bhogair vā kurūttamaa etāvad uktvā vacanaṃ dharmarājo yudhiṣṭhiraḥc vyupāramat tataḥ pārthaḥ kanīyān pratyabhāṣata vaiśaṃpāyana uvācaa athārjuna uvācedam adhikṣipta ivākṣamīc abhinītataraṃ vākyaṃ dṛḍhavādaparākramaḥa darśayann aindrir ātmānam ugram ugraparākramaḥc smayamāno mahātejāḥ sṛkkiṇī saṃlihan muhuḥa aho duḥkham aho kṛcchram aho vaiklavyam uttamamc yat kṛtvāmānuṣaṃ karma tyajethāḥ śriyam uttamāma śatrūn hatvā mahīṃ labdhvā svadharmeṇopapāditāmc hatāmitraḥ kathaṃ sarvaṃ tyajethā buddhilāghavāta klībasya hi kuto rājyaṃ dīrghasūtrasya vā punaḥc kimarthaṃ ca mahīpālān avadhīḥ krodhamūrchitaḥa yo hy ājijīviṣed bhaikṣyaṃ karmaṇā naiva kena citc samārambhān bubhūṣeta hatasvastir akiṃcanaḥe sarvalokeṣu vikhyāto na putrapaśusaṃhitaḥa kāpālīṃ nṛpa pāpiṣṭhāṃ vṛttim āsthāya jīvataḥc saṃtyajya rājyam ṛddhaṃ te loko yaṃ kiṃ vadiṣyatia sarvārambhān samutsṛjya hatasvastir akiṃcanaḥc kasmād āśaṃsase bhaikṣyaṃ cartuṃ prākṛtavat prabhoa asmin rājakule jāto jitvā kṛtsnāṃ vasuṃdharāmc dharmārthāv akhilau hitvā vanaṃ mauḍhyāt pratiṣṭhasea yadīmāni havīṃṣīha vimathiṣyanty asādhavaḥc bhavatā viprahīṇāni prāptaṃ tvām eva kilbiṣama ākiṃcanyam anāśāsyam iti vai nahuṣo bravītc kṛtyā nṛśaṃsā hy adhane dhig astv adhanatām ihaa aśvastanam ṛṣīṇāṃ hi vidyate veda tad bhavānc yaṃ tv imaṃ dharmam ity āhur dhanād eṣa pravartatea dharmaṃ saṃharate tasya dhanaṃ harati yasya yaḥc hriyamāṇe dhane rājan vayaṃ kasya kṣamemahia abhiśastavat prapaśyanti daridraṃ pārśvataḥ sthitamc dāridryaṃ pātakaṃ loke kas tac chaṃsitum arhatia patitaḥ śocyate rājan nirdhanaś cāpi śocyatec viśeṣaṃ nādhigacchāmi patitasyādhanasya caa prasidhyatia arthena hi vihīnasya puruṣasyālpamedhasaḥc vyucchidyante kriyāḥ sarvā grīṣme kusarito yathāa yasyārthās tasya mitrāṇi yasyārthās tasya bāndhavāḥc yasyārthāḥ sa pumāṃl loke yasyārthāḥ sa ca paṇḍitaḥa adhanenārthakāmena nārthaḥ śakyo vivitsatāc arthair arthā nibadhyante gajair iva mahāgajāḥa dharmaḥ kāmaś ca svargaś ca harṣaḥ krodhaḥ śrutaṃ damaḥc arthād etāni sarvāṇi pravartante narādhipaa dhanāt kulaṃ prabhavati dhanād dharmaḥ pravartatec nādhanasyāsty ayaṃ loko na paraḥ puruṣottamaa nādhano dharmakṛtyāni yathāvad anutiṣṭhatic dhanād dhi dharmaḥ sravati śailād girinadī yathāa yaḥ kṛśāśvaḥ kṛśagavaḥ kṛśabhṛtyaḥ kṛśātithiḥc sa vai rājan kṛśo nāma na śarīrakṛśaḥ kṛśaḥa avekṣasva yathānyāyaṃ paśya devāsuraṃ yathāc rājan kim anyaj jñātīnāṃ vadhād ṛdhyanti devatāḥa na ced avāptāni divi sthānāni sarvaśaḥb drohāt kim anyaj jñātīnāṃ gṛdhyante yena devatāḥc iti devā vyavasitā vedavādāś ca śāśvatāḥa adhīyante tapasyanti yajante yājayanti cac kṛtsnaṃ tad eva ca śreyo yad apy ādadate nyataḥa na paśyāmo napahṛtaṃ dhanaṃ kiṃ cit kva cid vayamc evam eva hi rājāno jayanti pṛthivīm imāma jitvā mamatvaṃ bruvate putrā iva pitur dhanec rājarṣayo jitasvargā dharmo hy eṣāṃ asmi kāritaḥa kuśalākuśalāny eke kṛtvā karmāṇi mānavāḥc kāryakāraṇasaṃśliṣṭaṃ svajanaṃ nāma bibhratia āyuṣo nte prahāyedaṃ kṣīṇaprāyaṃ kalevaramc pratigṛhṇāti tat pāpaṃ kartuḥ karmaphalaṃ hi tata evaṃ saṃstīrya ca rathair bhūmiṃ sasādibhir ariṃdamāḥa yajatāṃ vividhair yajñaiḥ samṛddhair āptadakṣiṇaiḥc vanavāsakṛtaṃ duḥkhaṃ bhaviṣyati sukhāya naḥa ity etān evam uktvā tvaṃ svayaṃ dharmabhṛtāṃ varac katham adya punar vīra vinihaṃsi manāṃsy utaa na klībo vasudhāṃ bhuṅkte na klībo dhanam aśnutec na klībasya gṛhe putrā matsyāḥ paṅka ivāsatea nādaṇḍaḥ kṣatriyo bhāti nādaṇḍo bhūtim aśnutec nādaṇḍasya prajā rājñaḥ sukham edhanti bhāratad sadevāsuragandharvair apsarobhir vibhūṣitamd rakṣobhir guhyakair nāgair manuṣyaiś ca vibhūṣitamd trivargeṇa ca saṃpūrṇaṃ trivargasyāgamena cad daṇḍenābhyāhṛtaṃ sarvaṃ jagad bhogāya kalpated svayaṃbhuvaṃ mahīpāla āgamaṃ śṛṇu śāśvatamd viprāṇāṃ viditaś cāyaṃ tava caiva viśāṃ pated arājake hi loke smin sarvato vidrute bhayātd rakṣārtham asya lokasya rājānam asṛjat prabhuḥd mahākāyaṃ mahāvīryaṃ pālane jagataḥ kṣamamd anilāgniyamārkāṇām indrasya varuṇasya cad candravitteśayoś caiva mātrā nirhṛtya śāśvatīḥd yasmād eṣāṃ surendrāṇāṃ saṃbhavaty aṃśato nṛpaḥd tasmād abhibhavaty eṣa sarvabhūtāni tejasād tapaty ādityavac caiva cakṣūṃṣi ca manāṃsi cad na cainaṃ bhuvi śaknoti kaś cid apy abhivīkṣitumd so gnir bhavati vāyuś ca so rkaḥ somaś ca dharmarāṭd sa kuberaḥ sa varuṇaḥ sa mahendraḥ pratāpavānd pitāmahasya devasya viṣṇoḥ śarvasya caiva hid ṛṣīṇāṃ caiva sarveṣāṃ tasmiṃs tejaḥ pratiṣṭhitamd bālo pi nāvamantavyo manuṣya iti bhūmipaḥd mahatī devatā hy eṣā nararūpeṇa tiṣṭhatid ekam eva dahaty agnir naraṃ durupasarpiṇamd kulaṃ dahati rājāgniḥ sapaśudravyasaṃcayamd dhṛtarāṣṭrakulaṃ dagdhaṃ krodhodbhūtena vahninād pratyakṣam etal lokasya saṃśayo na hi vidyated kulajo vṛttasaṃpanno dhārmikaś ca mahīpatiḥd prajānāṃ pālane yuktaḥ pūjyate daivatair apid kāryaṃ yo vekṣya śaktiṃ ca deśakālau ca tattvataḥd kurute dharmasiddhyarthaṃ vaiśvarūpyaṃ punaḥ punaḥd tasya prasāde padmā śrīr vijayaś ca parākramed mṛtyuś ca vasati krodhe sarvatejomayo hi saḥd taṃ yas tu dveṣṭi saṃmohāt sa vinaśyati mānavaḥd tasya hy āśu vināśāya rājāpi kurute manaḥd tasmād dharmaṃ yam iṣṭeṣu sa vyavasyati pārthivaḥd aniṣṭaṃ cāpy aniṣṭeṣu tad dharmaṃ na vicālayetd tasyārthe sarvabhūtānāṃ goptāraṃ dharmam ātmajamd brahmatejomayaṃ daṇḍam asṛjat pūrvam īśvaraḥd tasya sarvāṇi bhūtāni sthāvarāṇi carāṇi cad bhayād bhogāya kalpante dharmān na vicalanti cad deśakālau ca śaktiṃ ca kāryaṃ cāvekṣya tattvataḥd yathārhataḥ saṃpraṇayen nareṣv anyāyavartiṣud sa rājā puruṣo daṇḍaḥ sa netā śāsitā ca saḥd varṇānām āśramāṇāṃ ca dharmaprabhur athāvyayaḥd daṇḍaḥ śāsti prajāḥ sarvā daṇḍa evābhirakṣatid daṇḍaḥ supteṣu jāgarti daṇḍaṃ dharmaṃ vidur budhāḥd susamīkṣya dhṛto daṇḍaḥ sarvā rañjayati prajāḥd asamīkṣya praṇītas tu vināśayati sarvataḥd yadi na praṇayed rājā daṇḍaṃ daṇḍyeṣv atandritaḥd śūle matsyān ivādhakṣyan durbalān balavattarāḥd kāko dyāc ca puroḍāśaṃ śvā caivāvalihed dhaviḥd svāmitvaṃ na kva cic ca syāt prapadyetādharottaramd sarvo daṇḍajito loko durlabhas tu śucir naraḥd daṇḍasya hi bhayāt sarvaṃ jagad bhogāya kalpated devadānavagandharvā rakṣāṃsi patagoragāḥd te pi bhogāya kalpante daṇḍenaivābhipīḍitāḥd dūṣyeyuḥ sarvavarṇāś ca bhidyeran sarvasetavaḥd sarvalokaprakopaś ca bhaved daṇḍasya vibhramātd yatra śyāmo lohitākṣo daṇḍaś carati pāpahād prajās tatra na muhyanti netā cet sādhu paśyatid āhus tasya praṇetāraṃ rājānaṃ satyavādinamd samīkṣyakāriṇaṃ prājñaṃ dharmakāmārthakovidamd taṃ rājā praṇayan samyak svargāyābhipravartated kāmātmā viṣayī kṣudro daṇḍenaiva nihanyated daṇḍo hi sumahātejā durdharaś cākṛtātmabhiḥd dharmād vicalitaṃ hanti nṛpam eva sabāndhavamd tato durgaṃ ca rāṣṭraṃ ca lokaṃ ca sacarācaramd antarikṣagatāṃś caiva munīn devāṃś ca hiṃsatid so sahāyena mūḍhena lubdhenākṛtabuddhinād aśakyo nyāyato netuṃ viṣayāṃś caiva sevatād śucinā satyasaṃdhena nītiśāstrānusāriṇād daṇḍaḥ praṇetuṃ śakyo hi susahāyena dhīmatād svarāṣṭre nyāyavartī syād bhṛśaṃ daṇḍaś ca śatruṣud suhṛt svajihmaḥ snigdheṣu brāhmaṇeṣu kṣamānvitaḥd evaṃvṛttasya rājñas tu śiloñchenāpi jīvataḥd vistīryeta yaśo loke tailabindhur ivāmbhasid atas tu viparītasya nṛpater akṛtātmanaḥd saṃkṣipyeta yaśo loke ghṛtabindur ivāmbhasid devadevena rudreṇa brahmaṇā ca mahīpated viṣṇunā caiva devena śakreṇa ca mahātmanād lokapālaiś ca bhūtaiś ca pāṇḍavaiś ca mahātmabhiḥd dharmād vicalitā rājan dhārtarāṣṭrā nipātitāḥd adhārmikā durācārāḥ sasainyā vinipātitāḥd tān nihatya na doṣas te svalpo pi jagatīpated chalena māyayā vātha kṣatradharmeṇa vā nṛpaa mitratā sarvabhūteṣu dānam adhyayanaṃ tapaḥc brāhmaṇasyaiṣa dharmaḥ syān na rājño rājasattamaa asatāṃ pratiṣedhaś ca satāṃ ca paripālanamc eṣa rājñāṃ paro dharmaḥ samare cāpalāyanama yasmin kṣamā ca krodhaś ca dānādāne bhayābhayec nigrahānugrahau cobhau sa vai dharmavid ucyatea na śrutena na dānena na sāntvena na cejyayāc tvayeyaṃ pṛthivī labdhā notkocena tathāpy utaa yat tad balam amitrāṇāṃ tathā vīrasamudyatamc hastyaśvarathasaṃpannaṃ tribhir aṅgair mahattarama rakṣitaṃ droṇakarṇābhyām aśvatthāmnā kṛpeṇa cac tat tvayā nihataṃ vīra tasmād bhuṅkṣva vasuṃdharāma jambūdvīpo mahārāja nānājanapadāyutaḥc tvayā puruṣaśārdūla daṇḍena mṛditaḥ prabhoa jambūdvīpena sadṛśaḥ krauñcadvīpo narādhipac apareṇa mahāmeror daṇḍena mṛditas tvayāa krauñcadvīpena sadṛśaḥ śākadvīpo narādhipac pūrveṇa tu mahāmeror daṇḍena mṛditas tvayāa uttareṇa mahāmeroḥ śākadvīpena saṃmitaḥc bhadrāśvaḥ puruṣavyāghra daṇḍena mṛditas tvayāa dvīpāś ca sāntaradvīpā nānājanapadālayāḥc vigāhya sāgaraṃ vīra daṇḍena mṛditās tvayāa etāny apratimāni tvaṃ kṛtvā karmāṇi bhāratac na prīyase mahārāja pūjyamāno dvijātibhiḥa sa tvaṃ bhrātṝn imān dṛṣṭvā pratinandasva bhāratac ṛṣabhān iva saṃmattān gajendrān ūrjitān ivaa amarapratimāḥ sarve śatrusāhāḥ paraṃtapāḥc eko pi hi sukhāyaiṣāṃ kṣamaḥ syād iti me matiḥa kiṃ punaḥ puruṣavyāghrāḥ patayo me nararṣabhāḥc samastānīndriyāṇīva śarīrasya viceṣṭanea anṛtaṃ mābravīc chvaśrūḥ sarvajñā sarvadarśinīc yudhiṣṭhiras tvāṃ pāñcāli sukhe dhāsyaty anuttamea hatvā rājasahasrāṇi bahūny āśuparākramaḥc tad vyarthaṃ saṃprapaśyāmi mohāt tava janādhipaa yeṣām unmattako jyeṣṭhaḥ sarve tasyopacāriṇaḥc tavonmādena rājendra sonmādāḥ sarvapāṇḍavāḥa yadi hi syur anunmattā bhrātaras te janādhipac baddhvā tvāṃ nāstikaiḥ sārdhaṃ praśāseyur vasuṃdharāma kurute mūḍham evaṃ hi yaḥ śreyo nādhigacchatic dhūpair añjanayogaiś ca nasyakarmabhir eva cae bheṣajaiḥ sa cikitsyaḥ syād ya unmārgeṇa gacchatif unmattir apanetavyā tava rājan yadṛcchayāa sāhaṃ sarvādhamā loke strīṇāṃ bharatasattamac tathā vinikṛtāmitrair yāham icchāmi jīvitumd dhṛtarāṣṭrasutā rājan nityam utpathagāminaḥd tādṛśānāṃ vadhe doṣaṃ nāhaṃ paśyāmi karhi citd imāṃś cośanasā gītāñ ślokāñ śṛṇu narādhipad ātmahantārthahantā ca bandhuhantā viṣapradaḥd ātharvaṇena hantā ca yaś ca bhāryāṃ parāmṛśetd nirdoṣaṃ vadham eteṣāṃ ṣaṇṇām apy ātatāyināmd brahmā provāca bhagavān bhārgavāya mahātmaned brahmakṣatraviśāṃ rājan satpathe vartatām apid prasahyāgāram āgamya hantāraṃ garadaṃ tathād abhakṣyāpeyadātāram agnidaṃ ca niśātayetd mārga eṣa mahīpānāṃ gobrāhmaṇavadheṣu cad keśagrahe ca nārīṇām api yudhyet pitāmahamd brahmāṇaṃ devadeveśaṃ kiṃ punaḥ pāpakāriṇamd gobrāhmaṇārthe vyasane ca rājñāṃd rāṣṭropamarde svaśarīrahetoḥd strīṇāṃ ca vikruṣṭarutāni śrutvād vipro pi yudhyeta mahāprabhāvaḥd dharmād vicalitaṃ vipraṃ nihanyād ātatāyinamd tasyānyatra vadhaṃ vidvān manasāpi na cintayetd gobrāhmaṇavadhe vṛttaṃ mantratrāṇārtham eva cad na hanyāt kṣatriyo vipraṃ svakuṭumbasya cātyayed taskareṇa nṛśaṃsena dharmāt pracalitena cad kṣatrabandhuḥ paraṃ śaktyā yudhyed vipreṇa saṃyuged ātatāyinam āyāntam api vedāntagaṃ raṇed jighāṃsantaṃ jighāṃsīyān na tena bhrūṇahā bhavetd brāhmaṇaḥ kṣatriyo vaiśyaḥ śūdro vāpy antyajo tha vād na hanyād brāhmaṇaṃ śāntaṃ tṛṇenāpi kadā canad brāhmaṇāyāvaguryeta spṛṣṭe gurutaraṃ bhavetd varṣāṇāṃ triśataṃ pāpaḥ pratiṣṭhāṃ nādhigacchatid sahasraṃ tv eva varṣāṇi nihatya narake patetd tasmān naivāpaguryād dhi naiva śastraṃ nipātayetd śoṇitaṃ yāvataḥ pāṃsūn gṛhṇātīti hi dhāraṇād tāvatīḥ sa samāḥ pāpo narake parivartated tvagasthibhedaṃ viprasya yaḥ kuryāt kārayeta vād brahmahā sa tu vijñeyaḥ prāyaścittī narādhamaḥd śrotriyaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ hatvā tathātreyīṃ ca brāhmaṇīmd caturviṃśativarṣāṇi cared brahmahaṇo vratamd dviguṇā brahmahatyeyaṃ sarvaiḥ proktā manīṣibhiḥd prāyaścittam akurvāṇaṃ kṛtāṅkaṃ vipravāsayetd brāhmaṇaṃ kṣatriyaṃ vaiśyaṃ śūdraṃ vā ghātayen nṛpaḥd brahmaghnaṃ taskaraṃ caiva mā bhūdevaṃ cariṣyatid chittvā hastau ca pādau nāsikoṣṭhau ca bhūpatiḥd brahmaghnaṃ cottamaṃ pāpaṃ netroddhāreṇa yojayetd śūdrasyaiṣa smṛto daṇḍas tadvad rājanyavaiśyayoḥd prāyaścittam akurvāṇaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ tu pravāsayetd kṣatriyaṃ vaiśyaśūdrau vā śastreṇaiva tu ghātayetd brahmaghnān brāhmaṇān rājā kṛtāṅkān vipravāsayetd vikalendriyāṃs trivarṇāṃś ca caṇḍālaiḥ saha vāsayetd taiś ca yaḥ saṃpibet kaś cit sa piban brahmahā bhavetd pretānāṃ na ca deyāni piṇḍadānāni kena citd kṛṣṇavarṇā virūpā ca nirṇītā lambamūrdhajād dunoty adṛṣṭā kartāraṃ brahmahatyeti tāṃ viduḥd brahmaghnena pibantaś ca viprā deśāḥ purāṇi cad acirād eva pīḍyante durbhikṣavyādhitaskaraiḥd brāhmaṇaṃ pāpakarmāṇaṃ viprāṇām ātatāyinamd kṣatriyaṃ vaiśyaśūdrau ca netroddhāreṇa yojayetd durbalānāṃ balaṃ rājā balino ye ca sādhavaḥd balināṃ durbalānāṃ ca pāpānāṃ mṛtyur iṣyated sadoṣam api yo hanyād aśrāvya jagatīpateḥd durbalaṃ balavantaṃ vā sa parājayam arhatid rājājñāṃ prāḍvivākaṃ ca necched yaś cāpi niṣpatetd sākṣiṇaṃ sādhuvākyaṃ ca jitaṃ tam api nirdiśetd bandhanān niṣpated yaś ca pratibhūr na dadāti cad kulajaś ca dhanāḍhyaś ca sa parājayam arhatid rājājñayā samāhūto yo na gacchet sabhāṃ naraḥd balavantam upāśritya sāyudhaḥ sa parājitaḥd taṃ daṇḍena vinirjitya mahāsāhasikaṃ naramd viyuktadehasarvasvaṃ paralokaṃ visarjayetd mṛtasyāpi na deyāni piṇḍadānāni kena citd dattvā daṇḍaṃ prayaccheta madhyamaṃ pūrvasāhasamd kulastrīvyabhicāraṃ ca rāṣṭrasya ca vimardanamd brahmahatyāṃ ca cauryaṃ ca rājadrohaṃ ca pañcamamd mahānti pātakāny āhur ṛṣayaḥ pātakāni had yuddhād anyatra hiṃsāyāṃ surāpasya ca kīrtaned mahāntaṃ gurutalpe ca mitradrohe ca pātakamd na kathaṃ cid upekṣeta mahāsāhasikaṃ naramd sarvasvam apahṛtyāśu tataḥ prāṇair viyojayetd triṣu varṇeṣu yo daṇḍaḥ praṇīto brahmaṇā purād mahāsāhasikaṃ vipraṃ kṛtāṅkaṃ vipravāsayetd sāhasro vā bhaved daṇḍaḥ kāñcano dehaniṣkrayaḥd caturṇām eva varṇānām evam āhośanāḥ kaviḥd nārīṇāṃ bālavṛddhānāṃ goḥ pāte ca mahāmatiḥd pāpānāṃ durvinītānāṃ prāṇāntaṃ ca bṛhaspatiḥd daṇḍam āha mahābhāga sarveṣāṃ cātatāyināmd sarveṣāṃ pāpabuddhīnāṃ pāpaṃ karmeha kurvatāmd dhṛtarāṣṭrasya putrāṇāṃ daṇḍo nirdoṣa iṣyated saubalasya ca durbuddheḥ karṇasya ca durātmanaḥd paśyatāṃ caiva śūrāṇāṃ yāhaṃ dyūte sabhāṃ tadād rajasvalā samānītā bhavatāṃ paśyatāṃ nṛpad vāsasaikena saṃvītā bhavaddoṣeṇa bhūpated mā bhūd dharmavilopas te dhṛtarāṣṭrakulakṣayātd krodhāgninā tu dagdhaṃ ca sapaśudravyasaṃcayamd sāham evaṃvidhaṃ duḥkhaṃ saṃprāptā tava hetunād ādityasya prasādena na ca prāṇair viyojitād rakṣitā devadevena jagataḥ kālahetunād divākareṇa devena vivastrā na kṛtā tadāa eteṣāṃ yatamānānām utpadyante tu saṃpadaḥc tvaṃ tu sarvāṃ mahīṃ labdhvā kuruṣe svayam āpadama yathāstāṃ saṃmatau rājñāṃ pṛthivyāṃ rājasattamauc māndhātā cāmbarīṣaś ca tathā rājan virājasea praśādhi pṛthivīṃ devīṃ prajā dharmeṇa pālayanc saparvatavanadvīpāṃ mā rājan vimanā bhavaa yajasva vividhair yajñair juhvann agnīn prayaccha cac purāṇi bhogān vāsāṃsi dvijātibhyo nṛpottama vaiśaṃpāyana uvācaa yājñasenyā vacaḥ śrutvā punar evārjuno bravītc anumānya mahābāhuṃ jyeṣṭhaṃ bhrātaram īśvarama daṇḍaḥ śāsti prajāḥ sarvā daṇḍa evābhirakṣatic daṇḍaḥ supteṣu jāgarti daṇḍaṃ dharmaṃ vidur budhāḥa dharmaṃ saṃrakṣate daṇḍas tathaivārthaṃ narādhipac kāmaṃ saṃrakṣate daṇḍas trivargo daṇḍa ucyatea daṇḍena rakṣyate dhānyaṃ dhanaṃ daṇḍena rakṣyatec etad vidvann upādatsva svabhāvaṃ paśya laukikama rājadaṇḍabhayād eke pāpāḥ pāpaṃ na kurvatec yamadaṇḍabhayād eke paralokabhayād apia parasparabhayād eke pāpāḥ pāpaṃ na kurvatec evaṃ sāṃsiddhike loke sarvaṃ daṇḍe pratiṣṭhitama daṇḍasyaiva bhayād eke na khādanti parasparamc andhe tamasi majjeyur yadi daṇḍo na pālayeta yasmād adāntān damayaty aśiṣṭān daṇḍayaty apic damanād daṇḍanāc caiva tasmād daṇḍaṃ vidur budhāḥd paralokabhayād ete pāpāḥ pāpaṃ na kurvatea vāci daṇḍo brāhmaṇānāṃ kṣatriyāṇāṃ bhujārpaṇamc dānadaṇḍaḥ smṛto vaiśyo nirdaṇḍaḥ śūdra ucyatea asaṃmohāya martyānām arthasaṃrakṣaṇāya cac maryādā sthāpitā loke daṇḍasaṃjñā viśāṃ patea yatra śyāmo lohitākṣo daṇḍaś carati sūnṛtaḥc prajās tatra na muhyanti netā cet sādhu paśyatia brahmacārī gṛhasthaś ca vānaprastho tha bhikṣukaḥc daṇḍasyaiva bhayād ete manuṣyā vartmani sthitāḥa nābhīto yajate rājan nābhīto dātum icchatic nābhītaḥ puruṣaḥ kaś cit samaye sthātum icchatia nācchittvā paramarmāṇi nākṛtvā karma dāruṇamc nāhatvā matsyaghātīva prāpnoti mahatīṃ śriyama nāghnataḥ kīrtir astīha na vittaṃ na punaḥ prajāḥc indro vṛtravadhenaiva mahendraḥ samapadyatad māhendraṃ ca grahaṃ lebhe lokānāṃ ceśvaro bhavata ya eva devā hantāras tāṃl loko rcayate bhṛśamc hantā rudras tathā skandaḥ śakro gnir varuṇo yamaḥa hantā kālas tathā vāyur mṛtyur vaiśravaṇo raviḥc vasavo marutaḥ sādhyā viśvedevāś ca bhārataa etān devān namasyanti pratāpapraṇatā janāḥc na brahmāṇaṃ na dhātāraṃ na pūṣāṇaṃ kathaṃ canaa madhyasthān sarvabhūteṣu dāntāñ śamaparāyaṇānc yajante mānavāḥ ke cit praśāntāḥ sarvakarmasua na hi paśyāmi jīvantaṃ loke kaṃ cid ahiṃsayāc sattvaiḥ sattvāni jīvanti durbalair balavattarāḥa nakulo mūṣakān atti biḍālo nakulaṃ tathāc biḍālam atti śvā rājañ śvānaṃ vyālamṛgas tathāa tān atti puruṣaḥ sarvān paśya dharmo yathāgataḥc prāṇasyānnam idaṃ sarvaṃ jaṅgamaṃ sthāvaraṃ ca yata vidhānaṃ devavihitaṃ tatra vidvān na muhyatic yathā sṛṣṭo si rājendra tathā bhavitum arhasia vinītakrodhaharṣā hi mandā vanam upāśritāḥc vinā vadhaṃ na kurvanti tāpasāḥ prāṇayāpanama udake bahavaḥ prāṇāḥ pṛthivyāṃ ca phaleṣu cac na ca kaś cin na tān hanti kim anyat prāṇayāpanāta sūkṣmayonīni bhūtāni tarkagamyāni kāni citc pakṣmaṇo pi nipātena yeṣāṃ syāt skandhaparyayaḥa grāmān niṣkramya munayo vigatakrodhamatsarāḥc vane kuṭumbadharmāṇo dṛśyante parimohitāḥa bhūmiṃ bhittvauṣadhīś chittvā vṛkṣādīn aṇḍajān paśūnc manuṣyās tanvate yajñāṃs te svargaṃ prāpnuvanti caa daṇḍanītyāṃ praṇītāyāṃ sarve sidhyanty upakramāḥc kaunteya sarvabhūtānāṃ tatra me nāsti saṃśayaḥa daṇḍaś cen na bhavel loke vyanaśiṣyann imāḥ prajāḥc śūle matsyān ivāpakṣyan durbalān balavattarāḥa satyaṃ cedaṃ brahmaṇā pūrvam canac daṇḍaś cen na bhavel loke vibhajan sādhvasādhunīa ye pi saṃbhinnamaryādā nāstikā vedanindakāḥc te pi bhogāya kalpante daṇḍenopanipīḍitāḥa sarvo daṇḍajito loko durlabho hi śucir naraḥc daṇḍasya hi bhayād bhīto bhogāyeha prakalpatea cāturvarṇyāpramohāya sunītanayanāya cac daṇḍo vidhātrā vihito dharmārthāv abhirakṣituma yadi daṇḍān na bibhyeyur vayāṃsi śvāpadāni cac adyuḥ paśūn manuṣyāṃś ca yajñārthāni havīṃṣi caa na brahmacāry adhīyīta kalyāṇī gaur na duhyatec na kanyodvahanaṃ gacched yadi daṇḍo na pālayeta viśvalopaḥ pravarteta bhidyeran sarvasetavaḥc mamatvaṃ na prajānīyur yadi daṇḍo na pālayeta na saṃvatsarasatrāṇi tiṣṭheyur akutobhayāḥc vidhivad dakṣiṇāvanti yadi daṇḍo na pālayeta careyur nāśrame dharmaṃ yathoktaṃ vidhim āśritāḥc na vidyāṃ prāpnuyāt kaś cid yadi daṇḍo na sthitāḥ prajāḥ sarvā bhayaṃ daṇḍaṃ vidur budhāḥc daṇḍe svargo manuṣyāṇāṃ loko yaṃ ca pratiṣṭhitaḥa na tatra kūṭaṃ pāpaṃ vā vañcanā vāpi dṛṣyatec yatra daṇḍaḥ suvihitaś caraty arivināśanaḥa haviḥ śvā atiduḥkhāt tu vakṣyāmi tan nibodha janādhipaa bhavatas tu pramohena sarvaṃ saṃśayitaṃ kṛtamc viklavatvaṃ ca naḥ prāptam abalatvaṃ tathaiva caa kathaṃ hi rājā lokasya sarvaśāstraviśāradaḥc moham naraḥa yuddhadharmeṣu sarveṣu kriyāṇāṃ naipuṇeṣu cac na tvayā sadṛśaḥ kaś cit triṣu lokeṣu vidyated dhārmikaṃ dharmayuktaṃ ca niḥśeṣaṃ jñāyate mayāa dharmasūkṣmaṃ tu yad vākyaṃ tatra duṣprataraṃ tvayāc dhanaṃjaya na me buddhim abhiśaṅkitum arhasia yuddhaśāstravid eva tvaṃ na vṛddhāḥ sevitās tvayāc samāsavistaravidāṃ na teṣāṃ vetsi niścayama tapas tyāgo vidhir iti niścayas tāta dhīmatāmc paraṃ paraṃ jyāya eṣāṃ saiṣā naiḥśreyasī gatiḥa na tv etan manyase pārtha na jyāyo sti dhanād itic atra te vartayiṣyāmi yathā naitat pradhānataḥa tapaḥsvādhyāyaśīlā hi dṛśyante dhārmikā janāḥc ṛṣayas tapasā yuktā yeṣāṃ lokāḥ sanātanāḥa ajātaśmaśravo dhīrās tathānye vanavāsinaḥc anantā adhanā eva svādhyāyena divaṃ gatāḥa uttareṇa tu panthānam āryā viṣayanigrahātc abuddhijaṃ tamas tyaktvā lokāṃs tyāgavatāṃ gatāḥa dakṣiṇena tu panthānaṃ yaṃ bhāsvantaṃ prapaśyasic ete kriyāvatāṃ lokā ye śmaśānāni bhejirea anirdeśyā gatiḥ sā tu yāṃ prapaśyanti mokṣiṇaḥc tasmāt tyāgaḥ pradhāneṣṭaḥ sa tu duḥkhaḥ pravedituma anusṛtya tu śāstrāṇi kavayaḥ samavasthitāḥc apīha syād apīha syāt sārāsāradidṛkṣayāa vedavādān atikramya śāstrāṇy āraṇyakāni cac vipāṭya kadalīskandhaṃ sāraṃ dadṛśire na tea athaikāntavyudāsena śarīre pañcabhautikec icchādveṣasamāyuktam ātmānaṃ prāhur iṅgitaiḥa agrāhyaś cakṣuṣā so pi anirdeśyaṃ ca tad girāc karmahetupuraskāraṃ bhūteṣu parivartatea kalyāṇagocaraṃ kṛtvā manas tṛṣṇāṃ nigṛhya cac karmasaṃtatim utsṛjya syān nirālambanaḥ sukhīa asminn evaṃ sūkṣmagamye mārge sadbhir niṣevitec katham artham anarthāḍhyam arjuna tvaṃ praśaṃsasia pūrvaśāstravido hy evaṃ janāḥ paśyanti bhāratac kriyāsu niratā nityaṃ dāne yajñe ca karmaṇia bhavanti sudurāvartā hetumanto pi paṇḍitāḥc dṛḍhapūrvaśrutā mūḍhā naitad astīti vādinaḥa amṛtasyāvamantāro vaktāro janasaṃsadic caranti vasudhāṃ kṛtsnāṃ vāvadūkā bahuśrutāḥa yān vayaṃ nābhijānīmaḥ kas tāñ jñātum ihārhatic evaṃ prājñān sataś cāpi mahataḥ śāstravittamāna tapasā mahad āpnoti buddhyā vai vindate mahatc tyāgena sukham āpnoti sadā kaunteya dharmavit vaiśaṃpāyana uvācaa tasmin vākyāntare vaktā devasthāno mahātapāḥc abhinītataraṃ vākyam ity uvāca yudhiṣṭhirama yad vacaḥ phalgunenoktaṃ na jyāyo sti dhanād itic atra te vartayiṣyāmi tad ekāgramanāḥ śṛṇua ajātaśatro dharmeṇa kṛtsnā te vasudhā jitāc tāṃ jitvā na vṛthā rājaṃs tvaṃ parityaktum arhasia catuṣpadī hi niḥśreṇī karmaṇy eṣā pratiṣṭhitāc tāṃ krameṇa mahābāho yathāvaj jaya pārthivaa tasmāt pārtha mahāyajñair yajasva bahudakṣiṇaiḥc svādhyāyayajñā ṛṣayo jñānayajñās tathāparea karmaniṣṭhāṃs tu budhyethās taponiṣṭhāṃś ca bhāratac vaikhānasānāṃ rājendra vacanaṃ śrūyate yathāa īhate dhanahetor yas tasyānīhā garīyasīc bhūyān doṣaḥ pravardheta yas taṃ dhanam apāśrayeta kṛcchrāc ca dravyasaṃhāraṃ kurvanti dhanakāraṇātc dhanena tṛṣito buddhyā bhrūṇahatyāṃ na budhyatea anarhate yad dadāti na dadāti yad arhatec anarhārhāparijñānād dānadharmo pi duṣkaraḥa yajñāya sṛṣṭāni dhanāni dhātrāyaṣṭādiṣṭaḥ puruṣo rakṣitā cac tasmāt sarvaṃ yajña evopayojyaṃdhanaṃ tato nantara eva kāmaḥa yajñair indro vividhair annavadbhirdevān sarvān abhyayān mahaujāḥc tenendratvaṃ prāpya vibhrājate sautasmād yajñe sarvam evopayojyama mahādevaḥ sarvamedhe mahātmāhutvātmānaṃ devadevo vibhūtaḥc viśvāṃl lokān vyāpya viṣṭabhya kīrtyāvirocate dyutimān kṛttivāsāḥa āvikṣitaḥ pārthivo vai maruttaḥsvṛddhyā martyo yo jayad devarājamc yajñe yasya śrīḥ svayaṃ saṃniviṣṭāyasmin bhāṇḍaṃ kāñcanaṃ sarvam āsīta hariścandraḥ pārthivendraḥ śrutas teyajñair iṣṭvā puṇyakṛd vītaśokaḥc ṛddhyā śakraṃ yo jayan mānuṣaḥ saṃstasmād yajñe sarvam evopayojyam devasthāna uvācaa atraivodāharantīmam itihāsaṃ purātanamc indreṇa samaye pṛṣṭo yad uvāca bṛhaspatiḥa saṃtoṣo vai svargatamaḥ saṃtoṣaḥ paramaṃ sukhamc tuṣṭer na kiṃ cit parataḥ susamyak paritiṣṭhatia yadā saṃharate kāmān kūrmo ṅgānīva sarvaśaḥc tadātmajyotir ātmaiva svātmanaiva prasīdatia na bibheti yadā cāyaṃ yadā cāsmān na bibhyatic kāmadveṣau ca jayati tadātmānaṃ prapaśyatia yadāsau sarvabhūtānāṃ na krudhyati na duṣyatic karmaṇā manasā vācā brahma saṃpadyate tadāa evaṃ kaunteya bhūtāni taṃ taṃ dharmaṃ tathā tathāc tadā tadā prapaśyanti tasmād budhyasva bhārataa anye śamaṃ praśaṃsanti vyāyāmam apare tathāc naikaṃ na cāparaṃ ke cid ubhayaṃ ca tathāparea yajñam eke praśaṃsanti saṃnyāsam apare janāḥc dānam eke praśaṃsanti ke cid eva pratigrahame ke cit sarvaṃ parityajya tūṣṇīṃ dhyāyanta āsatea rājyam eke praśaṃsanti sarveṣāṃ paripālanamc hatvā bhittvā ca chittvā ca ke cid ekāntaśīlinaḥa etat sarvaṃ samālokya budhānām eṣa niścayaḥc adroheṇaiva bhūtānāṃ yo dharmaḥ sa satāṃ mataḥa adrohaḥ satyavacanaṃ saṃvibhāgo dhṛtiḥ kṣamāc prajanaḥ sveṣu dāreṣu mārdavaṃ hrīr acāpalama dhanaṃ dharmapradhāneṣṭaṃ manuḥ svāyaṃbhuvo bravītc tasmād evaṃ prayatnena kaunteya paripālayaa yo hi rājye sthitaḥ śaśvad vaśī tulyapriyāpriyaḥc kṣatriyo yajñaśiṣṭāśī rājaśāstrārthatattvavita asādhunigraharataḥ sādhūnāṃ pragrahe rataḥc dharme vartmani saṃsthāpya prajā varteta dharmavita putrasaṃkrāmitaśrīs tu vane vanyena vartayanc vidhinā śrāmaṇenaiva kuryāt kālam atandritaḥa ya evaṃ vartate rājā rājadharmaviniścitaḥc tasyāyaṃ ca paraś caiva lokaḥ syāt saphalo nṛpae nirvāṇaṃ tu suduṣpāraṃ bahuvighnaṃ ca me matama evaṃ dharmam anukrāntāḥ satyadānatapaḥparāḥc ānṛśaṃsyaguṇair yuktāḥ kāmakrodhavivarjitāḥa prajānāṃ pālane yuktā damam uttamam āsthitāḥc gobrāhmaṇārthaṃ yuddhena saṃprāptā gatim uttamāma evaṃ rudrāḥ savasavas tathādityāḥ paraṃtapac sādhyā rājarṣisaṃghāś ca dharmam etaṃ samāśritāḥe apramattās tataḥ svargaṃ prāptāḥ puṇyaiḥ svakarmabhiḥ vaiśaṃpāyana uvācaa tasmin vākyāntare vākyaṃ punar evārjuno bravītc viṣaṇṇamanasaṃ jyeṣṭham idaṃ bhrātaram īśvarama kṣatradharmeṇa dharmajña prāpya rājyam anuttamamc jitvā cārīn naraśreṣṭha tapyate kiṃ bhavān bhṛśama kṣatriyāṇāṃ mahārāja saṃgrāme nidhanaṃ smṛtamc viśiṣṭaṃ bahubhir yajñaiḥ kṣatradharmam anusmaraa brāhmaṇānāṃ tapas tyāgaḥ pretyadharmavidhiḥ smṛtaḥc kṣatriyāṇāṃ ca vihitaṃ saṃgrāme nidhanaṃ vibhoa kṣatradharmo mahāraudraḥ śastranitya iti smṛtaḥc vadhaś ca bharataśreṣṭha kāle śastreṇa saṃyugea brāhmaṇasyāpi ced rājan kṣatradharmeṇa tiṣṭhataḥc praśastaṃ jīvitaṃ loke kṣatraṃ hi brahmasaṃsthitama na tyāgo na punar yācñā na tapo manujeśvarac kṣatriyasya vidhīyante na parasvopajīvanama sa bhavān sarvadharmajñaḥ sarvātmā bharatarṣabhac rājā manīṣī nipuṇo loke dṛṣṭaparāvaraḥa tyaktvā saṃtāpajaṃ śokaṃ daṃśito bhava karmaṇic kṣatriyasya viśeṣeṇa hṛdayaṃ vajrasaṃhatama jitvārīn kṣatradharmeṇa prāpya rājyam akaṇṭakamc vijitātmā manuṣyendra yajñadānaparo bhavaa indro vai brahmaṇaḥ putraḥ karmaṇā kṣatriyo bhavatc jñātīnāṃ pāpavṛttīnāṃ jaghāna navatīr navaa tac cāsya karma pūjyaṃ hi praśasyaṃ ca viśāṃ patec tena cendratvam āpede devānām iti naḥ śrutama sa tvaṃ yajñair mahārāja yajasva bahudakṣiṇaiḥc yathaivendro manuṣyendra cirāya vigatajvaraḥa mā tvam evaṃgate kiṃ cit kṣatriyarṣabha śocithāḥc gatās te kṣatradharmeṇa śastrapūtāḥ parāṃ gatima bhavitavyaṃ tathā tac ca yad vṛttaṃ bharatarṣabhac diṣṭaṃ hi rājaśārdūla na śakyam ativartitum vaiśaṃpāyana uvācaa evam uktas tu kaunteyo guḍākeśena bhāratac novāca kiṃ cit kauravyas tato dvaipāyano bravīta bībhatsor vacanaṃ samyak satyam etad yudhiṣṭhirac śāstradṛṣṭaḥ paro dharmaḥ smṛto gārhasthya āśramaḥa svadharmaṃ cara dharmajña yathāśāstraṃ yathāvidhic na hi gārhasthyam utsṛjya tavāraṇyaṃ vidhīyatea gṛhasthaṃ hi sadā devāḥ pitara ṛṣayas tathāc bhṛtyāś caivopajīvanti tān bhajasva mahīpatea vayāṃsi paśavaś caiva bhūtāni ca mahīpatec gṛhasthair eva dhāryante tasmāj jyeṣṭhāśramo gṛhīa so yaṃ caturṇām eteṣām āśramāṇāṃ durācaraḥc taṃ carāvimanāḥ pārtha duścaraṃ durbalendriyaiḥa vedajñānaṃ ca te kṛtsnaṃ tapaś ca caritaṃ mahatc pitṛpaitāmahe rājye dhuram udvoḍhum arhasia tapo yajñas tathā vidyā bhaikṣam indriyanigrahaḥc dhyānam ekāntaśīlatvaṃ tuṣṭir dānaṃ ca śaktitaḥa brāhmaṇānāṃ mahārāja ceṣṭāḥ saṃsiddhikārikāḥc kṣatriyāṇāṃ ca vakṣyāmi tavāpi viditaṃ punaḥa yajño vidyā samutthānam asaṃtoṣaḥ śriyaṃ pratic daṇḍadhāraṇam atyugraṃ prajānāṃ paripālanama vedajñānaṃ tathā kṛtsnaṃ tapaḥ sucaritaṃ tathāc draviṇopārjanaṃ bhūri pātreṣu pratipādanama etāni rājñāṃ karmāṇi sukṛtāni viśāṃ patec imaṃ lokam amuṃ lokaṃ sādhayantīti naḥ śrutama teṣāṃ jyāyas tu kaunteya daṇḍadhāraṇam ucyatec balaṃ hi kṣatriye nityaṃ bale daṇḍaḥ samāhitaḥa etāś ceṣṭāḥ kṣatriyāṇāṃ rājan saṃsiddhikārikāḥc api gāthām imāṃ cāpi bṛhaspatir abhāṣataa bhūmir etau nigirati sarpo bilaśayān ivac rājānaṃ cāviroddhāraṃ brāhmaṇaṃ cāpravāsinama sudyumnaś cāpi rājarṣiḥ śrūyate daṇḍadhāraṇātc prāptavān paramāṃ siddhiṃ dakṣaḥ prācetaso yathā yudhiṣṭhira uvācaa bhagavan karmaṇā kena sudyumno vasudhādhipaḥc saṃsiddhiṃ paramāṃ prāptaḥ śrotum icchāmi taṃ nṛpam vyāsa uvācaa atrāpy udāharantīmam itihāsaṃ purātanamc śaṅkhaś ca likhitaś cāstāṃ bhrātarau saṃyatavrataua tayor āvasathāv āstāṃ ramaṇīyau pṛthak pṛthakc nityapuṣpaphalair vṛkṣair upetau bāhudām anua tataḥ kadā cil likhitaḥ śaṅkhasyāśramam āgamatc yadṛcchayāpi śaṅkho tha niṣkrānto bhavad āśramāta so bhigamyāśramaṃ bhrātuḥ śaṅkhasya likhitas tadāc phalāni śātayām āsa samyak pariṇatāny utaa tāny upādāya visrabdho bhakṣayām āsa sa dvijaḥc tasmiṃś ca bhakṣayaty eva śaṅkho py āśramam āgamata bhakṣayantaṃ tu taṃ dṛṣṭvā śaṅkho bhrātaram abravītc kutaḥ phalāny avāptāni hetunā kena khādasia so bravīd bhrātaraṃ jyeṣṭham upaspṛśyābhivādya cac ita eva gṛhītāni mayeti prahasann ivaa tam abravīt tadā śaṅkhas tīvrakopasamanvitaḥc steyaṃ tvayā kṛtam idaṃ phalāny ādadatā svayame gaccha rājānam āsādya svakarma prathayasva vaif likhito tha tadā gatvā bhrātur vākyena coditaḥf sudyumnaviṣayaṃ rājann uvācedaṃ suduḥkhitaḥa adattādānam evedaṃ kṛtaṃ pārthivasattamac stenaṃ māṃ tvaṃ viditvā ca svadharmam anupālayae śīghraṃ dhāraya caurasya mama daṇḍaṃ narādhipaa ity uktas tasya vacanāt sudyumnaṃ vasudhādhipamc abhyagacchan mahābāho likhitaḥ saṃśitavrataḥa sudyumnas tv antapālebhyaḥ śrutvā likhitam āgatamc abhyagacchat sahāmātyaḥ padbhyām eva nareśvaraḥa tam abravīt samāgatya sa rājā brahmavittamamc kim āgamanam ācakṣva bhagavan kṛtam eva tata evam uktaḥ sa viprarṣiḥ sudyumnam idam abravītc pratiśrauṣi kariṣyeti śrutvā tat kartum arhasia anisṛṣṭāni guruṇā phalāni puruṣarṣabhac bhakṣitāni mayā rājaṃs tatra māṃ śādhi māciram sudyumna uvācaa pramāṇaṃ cen mato rājā bhavato daṇḍadhāraṇec anujñāyām api tathā hetuḥ syād brāhmaṇarṣabhaa sa bhavān abhyanujñātaḥ śucikarmā mahāvrataḥc brūhi kāmān ato nyāṃs tvaṃ kariṣyāmi hi te vacaḥ vyāsa uvācaa chandyamāno pi brahmarṣiḥ pārthivena mahātmanāc nānyaṃ vai varayām āsa tasmād daṇḍād ṛte varama tataḥ sa pṛthivīpālo likhitasya mahātmanaḥc karau pracchedayām āsa dhṛtadaṇḍo jagāma saḥa sa gatvā bhrātaraṃ śaṅkham ārtarūpo bravīd idamc dhṛtadaṇḍasya durbhuddher bhagavan kṣantum arhasi śaṅkha uvācaa na kupye tava dharmajña na ca dūṣayase mamab sunirmalaṃ kulaṃ brahmann asmiñ jagati viśrutamc dharmas tu te vyatikrāntas tatas te niṣkṛtiḥ kṛtāa sa gatvā bāhudāṃ śīghraṃ tarpayasva yathāvidhic devān pitṝn ṛṣīṃś caiva mā cādharme manaḥ kṛthāḥd brahmahatyāṃ surāpānaṃ steyaṃ gurvaṅganāgamamd mahānti pātakāny āhuḥ saṃyogaṃ caiva taiḥ sahad na steyasadṛśaṃ brahman mahāpātakam asty utad jagaty asmin mahābhāga brahmahatyāsamaṃ hi tatd sarvapātakināṃ brahman daṇḍaḥ śārīra ucyated taskarasya viśeṣeṇa nānyo daṇḍo vidhīyated brāhmaṇaḥ kṣatriyo vāpi vaiśyaḥ śūdro tha vā dvijaḥd sarve kāmakṛte pāpe hantavyā na vicāraṇād rājabhir dhṛtadaṇḍā vai kṛtvā pāpāni mānavāḥd nirmalāḥ svargam āyānti santaḥ sukṛtino yathād uddhṛtaṃ naḥ kulaṃ brahman rājñā daṇḍe dhṛte tvayi vyāsa uvācaa tasya tad vacanaṃ śrutvā śaṅkhasya likhitas tadāc avagāhyāpagāṃ puṇyām udakārthaṃ pracakramea prādurāstāṃ tatas tasya karau jalajasaṃnibhauc tataḥ sa vismito bhrātur darśayām āsa tau karaua tatas tam abravīc chaṅkhas tapasedaṃ kṛtaṃ mayāc mā ca te tra viśaṅkā bhūd daivam eva vidhīyate likhita uvācaa kiṃ nu nāhaṃ tvayā pūtaḥ pūrvam eva mahādyutec yasya te tapaso vīryam īdṛśaṃ dvijasattama śaṅkha uvācaa evam etan mayā kāryaṃ nāhaṃ daṇḍadharas tavac sa ca pūto narapatis tvaṃ cāpi pitṛbhiḥ saha vyāsa uvācaa sa rājā pāṇḍavaśreṣṭha śreṣṭho vai tena karmaṇāc prāptavān paramāṃ siddhiṃ dakṣaḥ prācetaso yathāa eṣa dharmaḥ kṣatriyāṇāṃ prajānāṃ paripālanamc utpathe smin mahārāja mā ca śoke manaḥ kṛthāḥa bhrātur asya hitaṃ vākyaṃ śṛṇu dharmajñasattamac daṇḍa eva hi rājendra kṣatradharmo na muṇḍanam vaiśaṃpāyana uvācaa punar eva maharṣis taṃ kṛṣṇadvaipāyano bravītc ajātaśatruṃ kaunteyam idaṃ vacanam arthavata araṇye vasatāṃ tāta bhrātṝṇāṃ te tapasvināmc manorathā mahārāja ye tatrāsan yudhiṣṭhiraa tān ime bharataśreṣṭha prāpnuvantu mahārathāḥc praśādhi pṛthivīṃ pārtha yayātir iva nāhuṣaḥa araṇye duḥkhavasatir anubhūtā tapasvibhiḥc duḥkhasyānte naravyāghrāḥ sukhaṃ tv anubhavantv imea dharmam arthaṃ ca kāmaṃ ca bhrātṛbhiḥ saha bhāratac anubhūya tataḥ paścāt prasthātāsi viśāṃ patea atithīnāṃ ca pitṝṇāṃ devatānāṃ ca bhāratac ānṛṇyaṃ gaccha kaunteya tataḥ svargaṃ gamiṣyasia sarvamedhāśvamedhābhyāṃ yajasva kurunandanac tataḥ paścān mahārāja gamiṣyasi parāṃ gatima bhrātṝṃś ca sarvān kratubhiḥ saṃyojya bahudakṣiṇaiḥc saṃprāptaḥ kīrtim atulāṃ pāṇḍaveya bhaviṣyasia vidma te puruṣavyāghra vacanaṃ kurunandanac śṛṇu mac ca yathā kurvan dharmān na cyavate nyāyaśāstrāvalambinaḥb vedārthatattvavid rājaṃs tarkaśāstrabahuśrutaḥb mantre ca vyavahāre ca niyoktavyo vijānatāb tarkaśāstrakṛtā buddhir dharmaśāstrakṛtā ca yāb daṇḍanītikṛtā caiva trailokyam api sādhayetb niyojyā vedatattvajñā yajñakarmasu pārthivab vedajñā ye ca śāstrajñās te ca rājan subuddhayaḥb ānvīkṣikītrayīvārtādaṇḍanītiṣu pāragāḥb te tu sarvatra yoktavyās te ca buddheḥ parāṃ gatāḥc guṇayukte pi naikasmin viśvasyāc ca vicakṣaṇaḥa arakṣitā durvinīto mānī stabdho bhyasūyakaḥc enasā yujyate rājā durdānta iti cocyatea ye rakṣyamāṇā hīyante daivenopahate nṛpec taskaraiś cāpi hanyante yadā hy enaṃ vighūrṇantam apaśyaṃ pārthasāyakaiḥc kampamānaṃ yathā vajraiḥ prekṣamāṇaṃ śikhaṇḍinama jīrṇaṃ siṃham iva prāṃśuṃ narasiṃhaṃ pitāmahamc kīryamāṇaṃ śarais tīkṣṇair dṛṣṭvā me vyathitaṃ pratihanty asya śāsanaṃ viṣaye naraḥc sa bāhubhyāṃ vinigrāhyo lokayātrāvighātakaḥa pramāṇam apramāṇaṃ yaḥ kuryān mohavaśaṃ gataḥc bhṛtyo vā yadi vā putras tapasvī vāpi kaś canae pāpān sarvair upāyais śocasi pāṇḍavae rājā hi hanyād dadyāc ca prajā rakṣec ca dharmataḥ yudhiṣṭhira uvācaa na te bhiśaṅke vacanaṃ yad bravīṣi tapodhanac aparokṣo hi te dharmaḥ sarvadharmabhṛtāṃ varaa mayā hy avadhyā bahavo ghātitā rājyakāraṇātc tāny akāryāṇi me brahman dahanti ca tapanti ca vyāsa uvācaa īśvaro vā bhavet kartā puruṣo vāpi bhāratac haṭho vā vartate loke karmajaṃ vā phalaṃ smṛtama īśvareṇa niyuktā śubhapāpayoḥc na paraṃ vidyate tasmād evam anyac chubhaṃ kurua na hi kaś cit kva cid rājan diṣṭāt pratinivartatec daṇḍaśastrakṛtaṃ pāpaṃ puruṣe tan na vidyatea yadi vā manyase rājan haṭhe lokaṃ kaunteyābhakṣyabhakṣaṇamc prāyaścittavidhānena sarvam etena śudhyatia gurutalpaṃ hi gurvarthe na dūṣayati mānavamc uddālakaḥ śvetaketuṃ janayām āsa śiṣyataḥa steyaṃ kurvaṃs tu gurvartham āpatsu na
