kṣatriyān saṃghe tasmai krodhātmane namaḥd rāmo dāśarathir bhūtvā pulastyakulanandanamd jaghāna rāvaṇaṃ saṃkhye tasmai kṣatrātmane namaḥd yo halī musalī śrīmān nīlāmbaradharaḥ sthitaḥd rāmāya rauhiṇeyāya tasmai bhogātmane namaḥd śaṅkhine cakriṇe nityaṃ śārṅgiṇe pītavāsased vanamālādharāyaiva tasmai kṛṣṇātmane namaḥd vasudevasutaḥ śrīmān krīḍito nandagokuled kaṃsasya nidhanārthāya tasmai krīḍātmane namaḥd vasudevatvam āgamya yador vaṃśasamudbhavaḥd bhūbhāraharaṇaṃ cakre tasmai kṛṣṇātmane namaḥd sārathyam arjunasyājau kurvan gītāmṛtaṃ dadaud lokatrayopakārāya tasmai brahmātmane namaḥd dānavāṃs tu vaśe kṛtvā punar buddhatvam āgataḥd sargasya rakṣaṇārthāya tasmai śuddhātmane namaḥd haniṣyati kalau prāpte mlecchāṃs turagavāhanaḥd dharmasaṃsthāpako yas tu tasmai kalkyātmane namaḥd kṣatriyāṇāṃ sahasrāṇi prayutāny arbudāni cad yo vadhīd bhārate yuddhe tasmai krīḍātmane namaḥd tārānvaye kālanemiṃ hatvā dānavapuṃgavamd dadau rājyaṃ mahendrāya tasmai mukhyātmane namaḥd yaḥ sarvaprāṇināṃ dehe sākṣībhūto vyavasthitaḥd akṣarakṣaramāṇānāṃ tasmai sākṣyātmane namaḥd namo stu te mahādeva namas te bhaktavatsalad subrahmaṇya namas te stu prasīda parameśvarad avyaktavyaktarūpeṇa vyāptaṃ sarvaṃ tvayā vibhod nārāyaṇaṃ sahasrākṣaṃ sarvalokamaheśvaramd hiraṇyanābhaṃ yajñāṅgam amṛtaṃ viśvatomukhamd sarvadā sarvakāryeṣu nāsti teṣām amaṅgalamd yeṣāṃ hṛdistho deveśo maṅgalāyatanaṃ hariḥd maṅgalaṃ bhagavān viṣṇur maṅgalaṃ madhusūdanaḥd maṅgalaṃ puṇḍarīkākṣo maṅgalaṃ garuḍadhvajaḥa yaś cinoti satāṃ setum ṛtenāmṛtayonināc dharmārthavyavahārāṅgais tasmai satyātmane namaḥa yaṃ pṛthagdharmacaraṇāḥ pṛthagdharmaphalaiṣiṇaḥc pṛthagdharmaiḥ samarcanti tasmai dharmātmane namaḥd yataḥ sarve prasūyante hy anaṅgātmāṅgadehinaḥd unmādaḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ tasmai kāmātmane namaḥa yaṃ taṃ vyaktastham avyaktaṃ vicinvanti maharṣayaḥc kṣetre kṣetrajñam āsīnaṃ tasmai kṣetrātmane namaḥa yaṃ dṛgātmānam ātmasthaṃ vṛtaṃ ṣoḍaśabhir guṇaiḥc prāhuḥ saptadaśaṃ sāṃkhyās tasmai sāṃkhyātmane namaḥa yaṃ vinidrā jitaśvāsāḥ sattvasthāḥ saṃyatendriyāḥc jyotiḥ paśyanti yuñjānās tasmai yogātmane namaḥa apuṇyapuṇyoparame yaṃ punarbhavanirbhayāḥc śāntāḥ saṃnyāsino yānti tasmai mokṣātmane namaḥa yo sau yugasahasrānte pradīptārcir vibhāvasuḥc saṃbhakṣayati bhūtāni tasmai ghorātmane namaḥa saṃbhakṣya sarvabhūtāni kṛtvā caikārṇavaṃ jagatc bālaḥ svapiti yaś caikas tasmai māyātmane namaḥa sahasraśirase tasmai puruṣāyāmitātmanec catuḥsamudraparyāyayoganidrātmane namaḥa ajasya nābhāv adhyekaṃ yasmin viśvaṃ pratiṣṭhitamc puṣkaraṃ puṣkarākṣasya tasmai padmātmane namaḥa yasya keśeṣu jīmūtā nadyaḥ sarvāṅgasaṃdhiṣuc kukṣau samudrāś catvāras tasmai toyātmane namaḥd yasmāt sarvāḥ prasūyante sargapralayavikriyāḥd yasmiṃś caiva pralīyante tasmai hetvātmane namaḥd yo niṣaṇṇo bhaved rātrau divā bhavati viṣṭhitaḥd iṣṭāniṣṭasya ca draṣṭā tasmai draṣṭātmane namaḥd akuṇṭhaṃ sarvakāryeṣu dharmakāryārtham udyatamd vaikuṇṭhasya hi tad rūpaṃ tasmai kāryātmane namaḥd triḥsaptakṛtvo yaḥ kṣatraṃ dharmavyutkrāntagauravamd kruddho nijaghne samare tasmai krauryātmane namaḥd vibhajya paṃcadhātmānaṃ vāyur bhūtvā śarīragaḥd yaś ceṣṭayati bhūtāni tasmai vāyvātmane namaḥa yugeṣv āvartate yo ṃśair dinartvanayahāyanaiḥc sargapralayayoḥ kartā tasmai kālātmane namaḥa brahma vaktraṃ bhujau kṣatraṃ kṛtsnam ūrūdaraṃ viśaḥc pādau yasyāśritāḥ śūdrās tasmai varṇātmane namaḥa yasyāgnir āsyaṃ dyaur mūrdhā khaṃ nābhiś caraṇau kṣitiḥc sūryaś cakṣur diśaḥ śrotre tasmai lokātmane namaḥa viṣaye vartamānānāṃ yaṃ taṃ vaiśeṣikair guṇaiḥc prāhur viṣayagoptāraṃ tasmai goptrātmane namaḥa annapānendhanamayo rasaprāṇavivardhanaḥc yo dhārayati bhūtāni tasmai prāṇātmane namaḥd prāṇānāṃ dhāraṇārthāya yo nnaṃ bhuṅkte caturvidhamd antarbhūtaḥ pacaty agnis tasmai pākātmane namaḥd piṅgekṣaṇasaṭaṃ yasya rūpaṃ daṃṣṭrānakhāyudhamd dānavendrāntakaraṇaṃ tasmai dṛptātmane namaḥd rasātalagataḥ śrīmān ananto bhagavān vibhuḥd jagad dhārayate kṛtsnaṃ tasmai vīryātmane namaḥd viṣaye vartamānānāṃ śrotrādīnāṃ ca yaḥ prabhuḥd vedate sarvaviṣayāṃs tasmai citrātmane namaḥd yaṃ na devā na gandharvā na daityā na ca dānavāḥd tattvato hi vijānanti tasmai sūkṣmātmane namaḥd jvalanārkendutārāṇāṃ jyotiṣāṃ divyamūrtināmd yas tejayati tejāṃsi tasmai tejātmane namaḥa paraḥ kālāt paro yajñāt paraḥ sadasatoś ca yaḥc anādir ādir viśvasya tasmai viśvātmane namaḥd vaidyuto jāṭharaś caiva pāvakaḥ śucir eva cad dahanaḥ sarvabhakṣāṇāṃ tasmai vahnyātmane namaḥd sutale talamadhyastho hatvā tu madhukaiṭabhaud uddhṛtā yena vai vedās tasmai matsyātmane namaḥd sasāgaranagāṃ bibhratsaptadvīpāṃ vasuṃdharāmd yo dhārayati pṛṣṭhena tasmai kūrmātmane namaḥd ekārṇave mahīṃ magnāṃ vārāhaṃ rūpam āsthitaḥd uddadhāra mahīṃ yo sau tasmai kroḍātmane namaḥd nārasiṃhaṃ tataḥ kṛtvā yas trailokyabhayaṃkaramd hiraṇyakaśipuṃ jaghne tasmai siṃhātmane namaḥd vāmanaṃ rūpam āsthāya baliṃ saṃyamya māyayād ime krāntās trayo lokās tasmai krāntātmane namaḥd jamadagnisuto bhūtvā rāmaḥ paraśudhṛk prabhuḥd sahasrārjunahantā yas tasmā ugrātmane namaḥd rāmo dāśarathir bhūtvā paulastyakulanandanamd jaghāna rāvaṇaṃ saṃkhye tasmai kṣatrātmane namaḥd vasudevasutaḥ śrīmān vāsudevo jagatpatiḥd jahāra vasudhābhāraṃ tasmai kṛṣṇātmane namaḥd buddharūpaṃ samāsthāya sarvadharmaparāyaṇaḥd mohayan sarvabhūtāni tasmai mohātmane namaḥd haniṣyati kaler ante mlecchāṃs turagavāhanaḥd dharmasaṃsthāpanārthāya tasmai kālātmane namaḥd anādir ādir viśvasya tasmai viśvātmane namaḥa yo mohayati bhūtāni sneharāgānubandhanaiḥc sargasya rakṣaṇārthāya tasmai mohātmane namaḥd caitanyaṃ sarvato nityaṃ sarvaprāṇihṛdi sthitamd sarvātītataraṃ sūkṣmaṃ tasmai sūkṣmātmane namaḥa ātmajñānam idaṃ jñānaṃ jñātvā pañcasv avasthitamc yaṃ jñānino dhigacchanti tasmai jñānātmane namaḥd sāṃkhyair yogair viniścitya sādhyaiś ca paramarṣibhiḥd yasya na jñāyate tattvaṃ tasmai guhyātmane namaḥa aprameyaśarīrāya sarvato nantacakṣuṣec apāraparimeyāya tasmai cintyātmane namaḥa jaṭine daṇḍine nityaṃ lambodaraśarīriṇec kamaṇḍaluniṣaṅgāya tasmai brahmātmane namaḥd yo jāto vasudevena devakyāṃ yadunandanaḥd śaṅkhacakragadāpāṇir vāsudevātmane namaḥa śūline tridaśeśāya tryambakāya mahātmanec bhasmadigdhordhvaliṅgāya tasmai rudrātmane namaḥd śiraḥkapālamālāya vyāghracarmanivāsined bhasmadigdhaśarīrāya tasmai rudrātmane namaḥd candrārdhakṛtaśīrṣāya vyālayajñopavītined pinākaśūlahastāya tasmā ugrātmane namaḥa pañcabhūtātmabhūtāya bhūtādinidhanātmanec akrodhadrohamohāya tasmai śāntātmane namaḥa yasmin sarvaṃ yataḥ sarvaṃ yaḥ sarvaṃ sarvataś ca yaḥc yaś ca sarvamayo nityaṃ tasmai sarvātmane namaḥa viśvakarman namas te stu viśvātman viśvasaṃbhavac apavargo si bhūtānāṃ pañcānāṃ parataḥ sthitaḥa namas te triṣu lokeṣu namas te paratastriṣuc namas te dikṣu sarvāsu tvaṃ hi sarvaparāyaṇama namas te bhagavan viṣṇo lokānāṃ prabhavāpyayac tvaṃ hi kartā hṛṣīkeśa saṃhartā cāparājitaḥa tena paśyāmi te divyān bhāvān hi triṣu vartmasuc tac ca paśyāmi tattvena yat te rūpaṃ sanātanama divaṃ te śirasā vyāptaṃ padbhyāṃ devī vasuṃdharāc vikrameṇa trayo lokāḥ puruṣo si sanātanaḥd diśo bhujā raviś cakṣur vīryaṃ śukraprajāpatīd sapta mārgā niruddhās te vāyor amitatejasaḥd avyaktaṃ vyaktarūpeṇa vyāptaṃ sarvaṃ tvayā vibhod vyaktāvyaktasvarūpeṇa vyāptaṃ sarvaṃ tvayā vibhod avyaktaṃ brahmaṇo rūpaṃ vyaktam etac carācarama atasīpuṣpasaṃkāśaṃ pītavāsasam acyutamb vapuṃṣy anumimītas te meghasyeva savidyutaḥb namo narakasaṃtrāsarakṣāmaṇḍalakāriṇeb saṃsāranimnagāvartatarakāṣṭhāya viṣṇaveb namo brahmaṇyadevāya gobrāhmaṇahitāya cab jagaddhitāya kṛṣṇāya govindāya namo namaḥb prāṇakāntārapātheyaṃ saṃsāracchedabheṣajamb duḥkhaśokaparitrāṇaṃ harir ity akṣaradvayamb eko pi kṛṣṇasya kṛtaḥ praṇāmob daśāśvamedhāvabhṛthena tulyaḥb daśāśvamedhī punar eti janmab kṛṣṇapraṇāmī na punarbhavāyab kṛṣṇavratāḥ kṛṣṇam anusmarantob rātrau ca kṛṣṇaṃ punar utthitā yeb te kṛṣṇadehāḥ praviśanti kṛṣṇamb ājyaṃ yathā mantrahutaṃ hutāśeb nārāyaṇaṃ sahasrākṣaṃ sarvalokanamaskṛtamb hiraṇyanābhaṃ yajñāṅgam amṛtaṃ viśvatomukhamc ye namasyanti govindaṃ na teṣāṃ vidyate bhayama yathā viṣṇumayaṃ satyaṃ yathā viṣṇumayaṃ haviḥc yathā viṣṇumayaṃ sarvaṃ pāpmā me naśyatāṃ tathād tasya yajñavarāhasya viṣṇor amitatejasaḥd praṇāmaṃ ye pi kurvanti teṣām api namo namaḥa tvāṃ prapannāya bhaktāya gatim iṣṭāṃ jigīṣavec yac chreyaḥ puṇḍarīkākṣa tad dhyāyasva surottamaa iti vidyātapoyonir ayonir viṣṇur īḍitaḥc vāgyajñenārcito devaḥ prīyatāṃ me janārdanaḥd nārāyaṇaparaṃ brahma nārāyaṇaparaṃ tapaḥd nārāyaṇaparaṃ cedaṃ sarvaṃ nārāyaṇātmakama etāvad uktvā vacanaṃ bhīṣmas tadgatamānasaḥc nama ity eva kṛṣṇāya praṇāmam akarot tadāa abhigamya tu yogena bhaktiṃ bhīṣmasya mādhavaḥc traikālyadarśanaṃ jñānaṃ divyaṃ dātuṃ yayau hariḥd anādinidhanaṃ viṣṇuṃ sarvalokamaheśvaramd lokādhyakṣaṃ stuvan nityaṃ sarvapāpaiḥ pramucyated stavarājaḥ samāpto yaṃ viṣṇor adbhutakarmaṇaḥd gāṅgeyena purā gītaḥ mahāpātakanāśanaḥa tasminn uparate śabde tatas te brahmavādinaḥc bhīṣmaṃ vāgbhir bāṣpakaṇṭhās tam ānarcur mahāmatima te stuvantaś ca viprāgryāḥ keśavaṃ puruṣottamamc bhīṣmaṃ ca śanakaiḥ sarve praśaśaṃsuḥ punaḥ punaḥa viditvā bhaktiyogaṃ tu bhīṣmasya puruṣottamaḥc sahasotthāya saṃhṛṣṭo yānam evānvapadyataa keśavaḥ sātyakiś caiva rathenaikena jagmatuḥc apareṇa mahātmānau yudhiṣṭhiradhanaṃjayaua bhīmaseno yamau cobhau ratham ekaṃ samāsthitauc kṛpo yuyutsuḥ sūtaś ca saṃjayaś cāparaṃ rathama te rathair nagarākāraiḥ prayātāḥ puruṣarṣabhāḥc nemighoṣeṇa mahatā kampayanto vasuṃdharāma tato giraḥ puruṣavaras tavānvitādvijeritāḥ pathi sumanāḥ sa śuśruvec kṛtāñjaliṃ praṇatam athāparaṃ janaṃsa keśihā muditamanābhyanandatad iti smaran paṭhati ca śārṅgadhanvanaḥd śṛṇoti vā yadukulanandanastavamd sa cakrabhṛtpratihatasarvakilbiṣod janārdanaṃ praviśati dehasaṃkṣayed yaṃ yoginaḥ prāṇaviyogakāled yatnena citte viniveśayantid sa taṃ purastād dharim īkṣamāṇaḥd prāṇāñ jahau prāptaphalo hi bhīṣmaḥd stavarājaḥ samāpto yaṃ viṣṇor adbhutakarmaṇaḥd gāṅgeyena purā gīto mahāpātakanāśanaḥd idaṃ naraḥ stavarājaṃ mumukṣuḥd paṭhañ śuciḥ kaluṣitakalmaṣāpahamd vyatītya lokān mahataḥ samāgatānd padaṃ saṃgacchaty amṛtaṃ mahātmanaḥ vaiśaṃpāyana uvācaa tataḥ sa ca hṛṣīkeśaḥ sa ca rājā yudhiṣṭhiraḥc kṛpādayaś ca te sarve catvāraḥ pāṇḍavāś ca haa rathais te nagarākāraiḥ patākādhvajaśobhitaiḥc yayur āśu kurukṣetraṃ vājibhiḥ śīghragāmibhiḥa te vatīrya kurukṣetraṃ keśamajjāsthisaṃkulamc dehanyāsaḥ kṛto yatra kṣatriyais tair mahātmabhiḥa gajāśvadehāsthicayaiḥ parvatair iva saṃcitamc naraśīrṣakapālaiś ca śaṅkhair iva samācitama citāsahasrair nicitaṃ varmaśastrasamākulamc āpānabhūmiṃ kālasya tadā bhuktojjhitām ivaa bhūtasaṃghānucaritaṃ rakṣogaṇaniṣevitamc paśyantas te kurukṣetraṃ yayur āśu mahārathāḥa gacchann eva mahābāhuḥ sarvayādavanandanaḥc yudhiṣṭhirāya provāca jāmadagnyasya vikramama amī rāmahradāḥ pañca dṛśyante pārtha dūrataḥc yeṣu saṃtarpayām āsa pūrvān kṣatriyaśoṇitaiḥa triḥsaptakṛtvo vasudhāṃ kṛtvā niḥkṣatriyāṃ prabhuḥc ihedānīṃ tato rāmaḥ karmaṇo virarāma ha yudhiṣṭhira uvācaa triḥsaptakṛtvaḥ pṛthivī kṛtā niḥkṣatriyā tadāc rāmeṇeti yad āttha tvam atra me saṃśayo mahāna kṣatrabījaṃ yadā dagdhaṃ rāmeṇa yadupuṃgavac kathaṃ bhūyaḥ samutpattiḥ kṣatrasyāmitavikramaa mahātmanā bhagavatā rāmeṇa yadupuṃgavac katham utsāditaṃ kṣatraṃ kathaṃ vṛddhiṃ punar gatama mahābhāratayuddhe hi koṭiśaḥ kṣatriyā hatāḥc tathābhūc ca mahī kīrṇā kṣatriyair vadatāṃ varad kimarthaṃ bhārgaveṇedaṃ kṣatram utsāditaṃ purād rāmeṇa yaduśārdūla kurukṣetre mahātmanāa evaṃ me chindhi vārṣṇeya saṃśayaṃ tārkṣyaketanac āgamo hi paraḥ kṛṣṇa tvatto no vāsavānuja vaiśaṃpāyana uvācaa tato vrajann eva gadāgrajaḥ prabhuḥśaśaṃsa tasmai nikhilena tattvataḥc yudhiṣṭhirāyāpratimaujase tadāyathābhavat kṣatriyasaṃkulā mahī vāsudeva uvācaa śṛṇu kaunteya rāmasya mayā yāvat pariśrutamc maharṣīṇāṃ kathayatāṃ kāraṇaṃ tasya janma caa yathā ca jāmadagnyena koṭiśaḥ kṣatriyā hatāḥc udbhūtā rājavaṃśeṣu ye bhūyo bhārate hatāḥa jahnor ajahnus tanayo ballavas tasya cātmajaḥc kuśiko nāma dharmajñas tasya putro mahīpatiḥa ugraṃ tapaḥ samātiṣṭhat sahasrākṣasamo bhuvic putraṃ labheyam ajitaṃ trilokeśvaram ity utaa tam ugratapasaṃ dṛṣṭvā sahasrākṣaḥ puraṃdaraḥc samarthaḥ putrajanane svayam evaitya bhārataa putratvam agamad rājaṃs tasya lokeśvareśvaraḥc gādhir nāmābhavat putraḥ kauśikaḥ pākaśāsanaḥa tasya kanyābhavad rājan nāmnā satyavatī prabhoc tāṃ gādhiḥ kaviputrāya sorcīkāya dadau prabhuḥa tataḥ prītas tu kaunteya bhārgavaḥ kurunandanac putrārthe śrapayām āsa caruṃ gādhes tathaiva caa āhūya cāha tāṃ bhāryām ṛcīko bhārgavas tadāc upayojyaś carur ayaṃ tvayā mātrāpy ayaṃ tavaa tasyā janiṣyate putro dīptimān kṣatriyarṣabhaḥc ajayyaḥ kṣatriyair loke kṣatriyarṣabhasūdanaḥa tavāpi putraṃ kalyāṇi dhṛtimantaṃ taponvitamc śamātmakaṃ dvijaśreṣṭhaṃ carur eṣa vidhāsyatia ity evam uktvā tāṃ bhāryām ṛcīko bhṛgunandanaḥc tapasy abhirato dhīmāñ jagāmāraṇyam eva haa etasminn eva kāle tu tīrthayātrāparo nṛpaḥc gādhiḥ sadāraḥ saṃprāpta ṛcīkasyāśramaṃ pratia carudvayaṃ gṛhītvā tu rājan satyavatī tadāc bhartur vākyād athāvyagrā mātre hṛṣṭā nyavedayata mātā tu tasyāḥ kaunteya duhitre svaṃ caruṃ dadauc tasyāś carum athājñātam ātmasaṃsthaṃ cakāra haa atha satyavatī garbhaṃ kṣatriyāntakaraṃ tadāc dhārayām āsa dīptena vapuṣā ghoradarśanama tām ṛcīkas tadā dṛṣṭvā dhyānayogena vai tataḥc abravīd rājaśārdūla svāṃ bhāryāṃ varavarṇinīma mātrāsi vyaṃsitā bhadre caruvyatyāsahetunāc janiṣyate hi te putraḥ krūrakarmā mahābalaḥa janiṣyate hi te bhrātā brahmabhūtas tapodhanaḥc viśvaṃ hi brahma tapasā mayā tatra samarpitamd kṣatravīryaṃ ca sakalaṃ tava mātre samarpitamd viparyayeṇa te bhadre naitad evaṃ bhaviṣyatid mātus te brāhmaṇo bhūyāt tava ca kṣatriyaḥ sutaḥa saivam uktā mahābhāgā bhartrā satyavatī tadāc papāta śirasā tasmai vepantī cābravīd idama nārho si bhagavann adya vaktum evaṃvidhaṃ vacaḥc brāhmaṇāpasadaṃ putraṃ prāpsyasīti mahāmune ṛcīka uvācaa naiṣa saṃkalpitaḥ kāmo mayā bhadre tathā tvayic ugrakarmā bhavet putraś carur mātā ca kāraṇam satyavaty uvācaa icchaṃl lokān api mune sṛjethāḥ kiṃ punar mamac śamātmakam ṛjuṃ putraṃ labheyaṃ japatāṃ vara ṛcīka uvācaa noktapūrvaṃ mayā bhadre svaireṣv apy anṛtaṃ vacaḥc kim utāgniṃ samādhāya mantravac carusādhaned dṛṣṭam etat purā bhadre jñātaṃ ca tapasā mayād brahmabhūtaṃ hi sakalaṃ pitus tava kulaṃ bhavet satyavaty uvācaa kāmam evaṃ bhavet pautro mameha tava caiva hac śamātmakam ṛjuṃ putraṃ labheyaṃ japatāṃ vara ṛcīka uvācaa putre nāsti viśeṣo me pautre vā varavarṇinic yathā tvayoktaṃ tu vacas tathā bhadre bhaviṣyati vāsudeva uvācaa tataḥ satyavatī putraṃ janayām āsa bhārgavamc tapasy abhirataṃ śāntaṃ jamadagniṃ śamātmakamd so pi putraṃ hy ajanayaj jāmadagnyaṃ sudāruṇama viśvāmitraṃ ca dāyādaṃ gādhiḥ kuśikanandanaḥc prāpa brahmarṣisamitaṃ viśvena brahmaṇā yutama ārcīko janayām āsa jamadagniḥ sudāruṇama   jamadagniṃ taponidhima so pi putraṃ hy ajanayadc sarvavidyāntagaṃ śreṣṭhaṃ dhanurvede ca pāragame rāmaṃ kṣatriyahantāraṃ pradīptam iva pāvakamf toṣayitvā mahādevaṃ parvate gandhamādanef astrāṇi varayām āsa paraśuṃ cātitejasamf sa tenākuṇṭhadhāreṇa jvalitānalavarcasāf kuṭhāreṇāprameyeṇa lokeṣv apratimo bhavata etasminn eva kāle tu kṛtavīryātmajo balīc arjuno nāma tejasvī kṣatriyo haihayānvayaḥd dattātreyaprasādena rājā bāhusahasravānd cakravartī mahātejā viprāṇām āśvamedhikea dadāha pṛthivīṃ sarvāṃ saptadvīpāṃ sapattanāmc svabāhvastrabalenājau dharmeṇa parameṇa caa tṛṣitena sa kauravya bhikṣitaś citrabhānunāc sahasrabāhur vikrāntaḥ prādād bhikṣām athāgnayea grāmān purāṇi ghoṣāṃś ca pattanāni ca vīryavānc jajvāla tasya bāṇais tu citrabhānur didhakṣayāa sa tasya puruṣendrasya prabhāvena mahātapāḥc dadāha kārtavīryasya śailān atha vanāni caa sa śūnyam āśramāraṇyaṃ varuṇasyātmajasya tatc dadāha pavaneneddhaś citrabhānuḥ sahaihayaḥa āpavas taṃ tato roṣāc chaśāpārjunam acyutac dagdhe śrame mahārāja kārtavīryeṇa vīryavāna tvayā na varjitaṃ mohād yasmād vanam idaṃ mamac dagdhaṃ tasmād raṇe rāmo bāhūṃs te chetsyate rjunaa arjunas tu mahārāja balī nityaṃ śamātmakaḥc brahmaṇyaś ca śaraṇyaś ca dātā śūraś ca bhāratad nācintayat tadā śāpaṃ tena dattaṃ mahātmanāa tasya putrāḥ subalinaḥ śāpenāsan pitur vadhec nimittam avaliptā vai nṛśaṃsāś caiva nityadāa jamadagnidhenvās te vatsam āninyur bharatarṣabhac ajñātaṃ kārtavīryasya haihayendrasya dhīmataḥd tannimittam abhūd yuddhaṃ jāmadagner mahātmanaḥa tato rjunasya bāhūṃs tu chittvā vai pauruṣānvitaḥc taṃ ruvantaṃ tato vatsaṃ jāmadagnyaḥ svam āśramame pratyānayata rājendra teṣām antaḥpurāt prabhuḥa arjunasya sutās te tu saṃbhūyābuddhayas tadāc gatvāśramam asaṃbuddhaṃ jamadagner mahātmanaḥa apātayanta bhallāgraiḥ śiraḥ kāyān narādhipac samitkuśārthaṃ rāmasya nirgatasya mahātmanaḥd pratyakṣaṃ rāmamātuś ca tathaivāśramavāsināmd śrutvā rāmas tam arthaṃ ca kruddhaḥ kālānalopamaḥd dhanurvede dvitīyo hi divyāstraiḥ samalaṃkṛtaḥd candrabimbārdhasaṃkāśaṃ paraśuṃ gṛhya bhārgavaḥa tataḥ pitṛvadhāmarṣād rāmaḥ paramamanyumānc niḥkṣatriyāṃ pratiśrutya mahīṃ śastram agṛhṇataa tataḥ sa bhṛguśārdūlaḥ kārtavīryasya vīryavānc vikramya nijaghānāśu putrān pautrāṃś ca sarvaśaḥa sa haihayasahasrāṇi hatvā paramamanyumānc cakāra bhārgavo rājan mahīṃ śoṇitakardamāma sa tathā sumahātejāḥ kṛtvā niḥkṣatriyāṃ mahīmc kṛpayā parayāviṣṭo vanam eva jagāma haa tato varṣasahasreṣu samatīteṣu keṣu citc kṣobhaṃ saṃprāptavāṃs tīvraṃ prakṛtyā kopanaḥ prabhuḥa viśvāmitrasya pautras tu raibhyaputro mahātapāḥc parāvasur mahārāja kṣiptvāha janasaṃsadia ye te yayātipatane yajñe santaḥ samāgatāḥc pratardanaprabhṛtayo rāma kiṃ kṣatriyā na tea mithyāpratijño rāma tvaṃ katthase janasaṃsadic bhayāt kṣatriyavīrāṇāṃ parvataṃ samupāśritaḥa sa punaḥ kṣatriyaśataiḥ pṛthivīm anusaṃtatāmc parāvasos tadā śrutvā śastraṃ jagrāha bhārgavaḥa tato ye kṣatriyā rājañ śataśas tena jīvitāḥc te vivṛddhā mahāvīryāḥ pṛthivīpatayo bhavana sa punas tāñ jaghānāśu bālān api narādhipac garbhasthais tu mahī vyāptā punar evābhavat tadāa jātaṃ jātaṃ sa garbhaṃ tu punar eva jaghāna hac arakṣaṃś ca sutān kāṃś cit tadā kṣatriyayoṣitaḥa triḥsaptakṛtvaḥ pṛthivīṃ kṛtvā niḥkṣatriyāṃ prabhuḥc dakṣiṇām aśvamedhānte kaśyapāyādadat tataḥa kṣatriyāṇāṃ tu śeṣārthaṃ kareṇoddiśya kaśyapaḥc srukpragrahavatā rājañ śrīmān vākyam athābravīta gaccha pāraṃ samudrasya dakṣiṇasya mahāmunec na te madviṣaye rāma vastavyam iha karhi citd pṛthivī dakṣiṇā dattā vājimedhe mama tvayād punar asyāḥ pṛthivyā hi dattvā dātum anīśvaraḥa tataḥ śūrpārakaṃ deśaṃ sāgaras tasya nirmamec saṃtrāsāj jāmadagnyasya so parāntaṃ mahītalama kaśyapas tu mahārāja pratigṛhya mahīm imāmc kṛtvā brāhmaṇasaṃsthāṃ vai praviveśa mahāvanama tataḥ śūdrāś ca vaiśyāś ca yathāsvairapracāriṇaḥc avartanta dvijāgryāṇāṃ dāreṣu bharatarṣabhaa arājake jīvaloke durbalā balavattaraiḥc bādhyante na ca vitteṣu prabhutvam iha kasya citd brāhmaṇā madyapāḥ ke cin mūrkhāḥ paṇḍitamāninaḥd brāhmaṇāḥ kṣatriyā vaiśyāḥ śūdrāś cotpathagāminaḥd parasparaṃ samāśritya ghātayanty apathi sthitāḥd svadharmaṃ brāhmaṇās tyaktvā pāṣaṇḍāṃś ca samāśritāḥd caurikānṛtamāyāś ca sarve caiva prakurvated svadharmasthān dvijān hatvā tathāśramanivāsinaḥd vaiśyāḥ satpathasaṃsthāś ca śūdrā ye caiva dhārmikāḥd tān sarvān ghātayanti sma durācārāḥ sunirbhayāḥd yajñādhyayanaśīlāṃś ca āśramasthāṃs tapasvinaḥd gopālavṛddhanārīṇāṃ nāśaṃ kurvanti cāpared ānvīkṣakī trayī vārtā na ca nītiḥ pravartated vrātyatāṃ samanuprāptā bahavo hi dvijātayaḥd adharottarāpacāreṇa mlecchabhūtāś ca sarvaśaḥa tataḥ kālena pṛthivī praviveśa rasātalama   pīḍyamānā durātmabhiḥa viparyayeṇa tenāśuc arakṣyamāṇā vidhivat kṣatriyair dharmarakṣibhiḥd tāṃ dṛṣṭvā dravatīṃ tatra saṃbhrāntaḥ sa mahāmanāḥa ūruṇā dhārayām āsa kaśyapaḥ pṛthivīṃ tataḥc nimajjantīṃ tadā rājaṃs tenorvīti mahī smṛtāa rakṣiṇaś ca samuddiśya prāyācat pṛthivī tadāc prasādya kaśyapaṃ devī kṣatriyān bāhuśālinaḥa santi brahman mayā guptā nṛṣu kṣatriyapuṃgavāḥc haihayānāṃ kule jātās te saṃrakṣantu māṃ munea asti pauravadāyādo viḍūrathasutaḥ prabhoc ṛkṣaiḥ saṃvardhito vipra ṛkṣavaty eva parvatea tathānukampamānena yajvanāthāmitaujasāc parāśareṇa dāyādaḥ saudāsasyābhirakṣitaḥa sarvakarmāṇi kurute tasyarṣeḥ śūdravad dhi saḥc sarvakarmety abhikhyātaḥ sa māṃ rakṣatu pārthivaḥa śibeḥ putro mahātejā gopatir nāma nāmataḥc vane saṃrakṣito gobhiḥ so bhirakṣatu māṃ munea pratardanasya putras tu vatso nāma mahāyaśāḥc vatsaiḥ saṃvardhito goṣṭhe sa māṃ rakṣatu pārthivaḥa dadhivāhanapautras tu putro divirathasya hac aṅgaḥ sa gautamenāpi gaṅgākūle bhirakṣitaḥa bṛhadratho mahābāhur bhuvi bhūtipuraskṛtaḥc golāṅgūlair mahābhāgo gṛdhrakūṭe bhirakṣitaḥa maruttasyānvavāye tu kṣatriyās turvasos trayaḥc marutpatisamā vīrye samudreṇābhirakṣitāḥa ete kṣatriyadāyādās tatra tatra pariśrutāḥb vyokārahemakārādijātiṃ nityam apāśritāḥc samyaṅ mām abhirakṣantu tataḥ sthāsyāmi niścalāa eteṣāṃ pitaraś caiva tathaiva ca pitāmahāḥc madarthaṃ nihatā yuddhe rāmeṇākliṣṭakarmaṇāa teṣām apacitiś caiva mayā kāryā na saṃśayaḥc na hy ahaṃ kāmaye nityam avikrāntena rakṣaṇamd vartamānena varteyaṃ tat kṣipraṃ saṃvidhīyatāma tataḥ pṛthivyā nirdiṣṭāṃs tān samānīya kaśyapaḥc abhyaṣiñcan mahīpālān kṣatriyān vīryasaṃmatāna teṣāṃ putrāś ca pautrāś ca yeṣāṃ vaṃśāḥ pratiṣṭhitāḥc evam etat purā vṛttaṃ yan māṃ pṛcchasi pāṇḍava vaiśaṃpāyana uvācaa evaṃ bruvann eva yadupravīroyudhiṣṭhiraṃ dharmabhṛtāṃ variṣṭhamc rathena tenāśu yayau yathārkoviśan prabhābhir bhagavāṃs trilokam vaiśaṃpāyana uvācaa tato rāmasya tat karma śrutvā rājā yudhiṣṭhiraḥc vismayaṃ paramaṃ gatvā pratyuvāca janārdanama aho rāmasya vārṣṇeya śakrasyeva mahātmanaḥc vikramo yena vasudhā krodhān niḥkṣatriyā kṛtāa gobhiḥ samudreṇa tathā golāṅgūlarkṣavānaraiḥc guptā rāmabhayodvignāḥ kṣatriyāṇāṃ kulodvahāḥa aho dhanyo hi loko yaṃ sabhāgyāś ca narā bhuvic yatra karmedṛśaṃ dharmyaṃ dvijena kṛtam acyutaa tathā yāntau tadā tāta tāv acyutayudhiṣṭhirauc jagmatur yatra gāṅgeyaḥ śaratalpagataḥ prabhuḥa tatas te dadṛśur bhīṣmaṃ śaraprastaraśāyinamc svaraśmijālasaṃvītaṃ sāyaṃsūryam ivānalama upāsyamānaṃ munibhir devair iva śatakratumc deśe paramadharmiṣṭhe nadīmoghavatīm anua dūrād eva tam ālokya kṛṣṇo rājā ca dharmarāṭc catvāraḥ pāṇḍavāś caiva te ca śāradvatādayaḥa avaskandyātha vāhebhyaḥ saṃyamya pracalaṃ manaḥc ekīkṛtyendriyagrāmam upatasthur mahāmunīna abhivādya ca govindaḥ sātyakis te ca kauravāḥc vyāsādīṃs tān ṛṣīn paścād gāṅgeyam upatasthirea tapovṛddhiṃ tataḥ pṛṣṭvā gāṅgeyaṃ yadukauravāḥc parivārya tataḥ sarve niṣeduḥ puruṣarṣabhāḥa tato niśamya gāṅgeyaṃ śāmyamānam ivānalamc kiṃ cid dīnamanā bhīṣmam iti hovāca keśavaḥa kaccij jñānāni te rājan prasannāni yathā purāc kaccid avyākulā caiva buddhis te vadatāṃ varaa śarābhighātaduḥkhāt te kaccid gātraṃ na dūyatec mānasād api duḥkhād dhi śārīraṃ balavattarama varadānāt pituḥ kāmaṃ chandamṛtyur asi prabhoc śaṃtanor dharmaśīlasya na tv etac chamakāraṇama susūkṣmo pīha dehe vai śalyo janayate rujamc kiṃ punaḥ śarasaṃghātaiś citasya tava bhārataa kāmaṃ naitat tavākhyeyaṃ prāṇināṃ prabhavāpyayauc bhavān hy upadiśec chreyo devānām api bhārataa yad dhi bhūtaṃ bhaviṣyac ca bhavac ca puruṣarṣabhac sarvaṃ taj jñānavṛddhasya tava pāṇāv ivāhitama saṃsāraś caiva bhūtānāṃ dharmasya ca phalodayaḥc viditas te mahāprājña tvaṃ hi brahmamayo nidhiḥa tvāṃ hi rājye sthitaṃ sphīte samagrāṅgam arogiṇamc strīsahasraiḥ parivṛtaṃ paśyāmīhordhvaretasama ṛte śāṃtanavād bhīṣmāt triṣu lokeṣu pārthivac satyasaṃdhān mahāvīryāc chūrād dharmaikatatparāta mṛtyum āvārya tarasā śaraprastaraśāyinaḥc nisargaprabhavaṃ kiṃ cin na ca tātānuśuśrumaa satye tapasi dāne ca yajñādhikaraṇe tathāc dhanurvede ca vede ca nityaṃ caivānvavekṣaṇea anṛśaṃsaṃ śuciṃ dāntaṃ sarvabhūtahite ratamc mahārathaṃ tvatsadṛśaṃ na kaṃ cid anuśuśrumaa tvaṃ hi devān sagandharvān sasurāsurarākṣasānc śakta ekarathenaiva vijetuṃ nātra saṃśayaḥa tvaṃ hi bhīṣma mahābāho vasūnāṃ vāsavopamaḥc nityaṃ vipraiḥ samākhyāto navamo navamo guṇaiḥa ahaṃ hi tvābhijānāmi yas tvaṃ puruṣasattamac tridaśeṣv api vikhyātaḥ svaśaktyā sumahābalaḥa manuṣyeṣu manuṣyendra na dṛṣṭo na ca me śrutaḥc bhavato yo guṇais tulyaḥ pṛthivyāṃ puruṣaḥ kva cita tvaṃ hi sarvair guṇai rājan devān apy atiricyasec tapasā hi bhavāñ śaktaḥ sraṣṭuṃ lokāṃś carācarānd kiṃ punaś cātmano lokān uttamān uttamair guṇaiḥa tad asya tapyamānasya jñātīnāṃ saṃkṣayeṇa vaic jyeṣṭhasya pāṇḍuputrasya śokaṃ bhīṣma vyapānudaa ye hi dharmāḥ samākhyātāś cāturvarṇyasya bhāratac cāturāśramyasaṃsṛṣṭās te sarve viditās tavaa cāturvedye ca ye proktāś cāturhotre ca bhāratac sāṃkhye yoge ca niyatā ye ca dharmāḥ sanātanāḥa cāturvarṇyena yaś caiko dharmo na sma virudhyatec sevyamānaḥ sa caivādyo gāṅgeya viditas tavad pratilomaprasūtānāṃ mlecchānāṃ caiva yaḥ smṛtaḥd deśajātikulānāṃ ca jānīṣe dharmalakṣaṇamd vedokto yaś ca śiṣṭoktaḥ sa caiva viditas tavad pravṛttaś ca nivṛttaś ca sa cāpi viditas tavaa itihāsapurāṇaṃ ca kārtsnyena viditaṃ tavac dharmaśāstraṃ ca sakalaṃ nityaṃ manasi te sthitama ye ca ke cana loke sminn arthāḥ saṃśayakārakāḥc teṣāṃ chettā nāsti loke tvad anyaḥ puruṣarṣabhaa sa pāṇḍaveyasya manaḥsamutthitaṃnarendra śokaṃ vyapakarṣa medhayāc bhavadvidhā hy uttamabuddhivistarāvimuhyamānasya janasya śāntaye vaiśaṃpāyana uvācaa śrutvā tu vacanaṃ bhīṣmo vāsudevasya dhīmataḥc kiṃ cid unnāmya vadanaṃ prāñjalir vākyam abravīta namas te bhagavan viṣṇo lokānāṃ nidhanodbhavac tvaṃ hi kartā hṛṣīkeśa saṃhartā cāparājitaḥa viśvakarman namas te stu viśvātman viśvasaṃbhavac apavargo si bhūtānāṃ pañcānāṃ parataḥ sthitaḥa namas te triṣu lokeṣu namas te paratas triṣuc yogeśvara namas te stu tvaṃ hi sarvaparāyaṇama matsaṃśritaṃ yad āttha tvaṃ vacaḥ puruṣasattamac tena paśyāmi te divyān bhāvān hi triṣu vartmasua tac ca paśyāmi tattvena yat te rūpaṃ sanātanamc sapta mārgā niruddhās te vāyor amitatejasaḥa divaṃ te śirasā vyāptaṃ padbhyāṃ devī vasuṃdharāc diśo bhujau raviś cakṣur vīrye śakraḥ pratiṣṭhitaḥa atasīpuṣpasaṃkāśaṃ pītavāsasam acyutamc vapur hy anumimīmas te meghasyeva savidyutaḥa tvatprapannāya bhaktāya gatim iṣṭāṃ jigīṣavec yac chreyaḥ puṇḍarīkākṣa tad dhyāyasva surottama vāsudeva uvācaa yataḥ khalu parā bhaktir mayi te puruṣarṣabhac tato vapur mayā divyaṃ tava rājan pradarśitama na hy abhaktāya rājendra bhaktāyānṛjave na cac darśayāmy aham ātmānaṃ na cādāntāya bhārataa bhavāṃs tu mama bhaktaś ca nityaṃ cārjavam āsthitaḥc dame tapasi satye ca dāne ca nirataḥ śuciḥa arhas tvaṃ bhīṣma māṃ draṣṭuṃ tapasā svena pārthivac tava hy upasthitā lokā yebhyo nāvartate punaḥa pañcāśataṃ ṣaṭ ca kurupravīraśeṣaṃ dinānāṃ tava jīvitasyac tataḥ śubhaiḥ karmaphalodayais tvaṃsameṣyase bhīṣma vimucya dehama ete hi devā vasavo vimānānyāsthāya sarve jvalitāgnikalpāḥc antarhitās tvāṃ pratipālayantikāṣṭhāṃ prapadyantam udak pataṃgama vyāvṛttamātre bhagavaty udīcīṃsūrye diśaṃ kālavaśāt prapannec gantāsi lokān puruṣapravīranāvartate yān upalabhya vidvāna amuṃ ca lokaṃ tvayi bhīṣma yātejñānāni naṅkṣyanty akhilena vīrac ataḥ sma sarve tvayi saṃnikarṣaṃsamāgatā dharmavivecanāyaa tajjñātiśokopahataśrutāyasatyābhisaṃdhāya yudhiṣṭhirāyac prabrūhi dharmārthasamādhiyuktamarthyaṃ vaco syāpanudāsya śokam vaiśaṃpāyana uvācaa tataḥ kṛṣṇasya tad vākyaṃ dharmārthasahitaṃ hitamc śrutvā śāṃtanavo bhīṣmaḥ pratyuvāca kṛtāñjaliḥa lokanātha mahābāho śiva nārāyaṇācyutac tava vākyam abhiśrutya harṣeṇāsmi pariplutaḥa kiṃ cāham abhidhāsyāmi vākpate tava saṃnidhauc yadā vācogataṃ sarvaṃ tava vāci samāhitama yad dhi kiṃ cit kṛtaṃ loke kartavyaṃ kriyate ca yatc tvattas tan niḥsṛtaṃ deva lokā buddhimayā hi tea kathayed devalokaṃ yo devarājasamīpataḥc dharmakāmārthaśāstrāṇāṃ so rthān brūyāt tavāgrataḥa śarābhighātād vyathitaṃ mano me madhusūdanac gātrāṇi cāvasīdanti na ca buddhiḥ prasīdatia na ca me pratibhā kā cid asti kiṃ cit prabhāṣitumc pīḍyamānasya govinda viṣānalasamaiḥ śaraiḥa balaṃ medhāḥ prajarati prāṇāḥ saṃtvarayanti cac marmāṇi paritapyante bhrāntaṃ cetas tathaiva caa daurbalyāt sajjate vāṅ me sa kathaṃ vaktum utsahec sādhu me tvaṃ prasīdasva dāśārhakulanandanaa tat kṣamasva mahābāho na brūyāṃ kiṃ cid acyutac tvatsaṃnidhau ca sīdeta vācaspatir api bruvana na diśaḥ saṃprajānāmi nākāśaṃ na ca medinīmc kevalaṃ tava vīryeṇa tiṣṭhāmi madhusūdanaa svayam eva prabho tasmād dharmarājasya yad dhitamc tad bravīhy āśu sarveṣām āgamānāṃ tvam āgamaḥa kathaṃ tvayi sthite loke śāśvate lokakartaric prabrūyān madvidhaḥ kaś cid gurau śiṣya iva sthite vāsudeva uvācaa upapannam idaṃ vākyaṃ kauravāṇāṃ dhuraṃdharec mahāvīrye mahāsattve sthite sarvārthadarśinia yac ca mām āttha gāṅgeya bāṇaghātarujaṃ pratic gṛhāṇātra varaṃ bhīṣma matprasādakṛtaṃ vibhoa na te glānir na te mūrchā na dāho na ca te rujāc prabhaviṣyanti gāṅgeya kṣutpipāse na cāpy utaa jñānāni ca samagrāṇi pratibhāsyanti te naghac na ca te kva cid āsaktir buddheḥ prādurbhaviṣyatia sattvasthaṃ ca mano nityaṃ tava bhīṣma bhaviṣyatic rajas tamobhyāṃ rahitaṃ ghanair mukta ivoḍurāṭa yad yac ca dharmasaṃyuktam arthayuktam athāpi vāc cintayiṣyasi tatrāgryā buddhis tava bhaviṣyatia imaṃ ca rājaśārdūla bhūtagrāmaṃ caturvidhamc cakṣur divyaṃ samāśritya drakṣyasy amitavikramaa caturvidhaṃ prajājālaṃ saṃyukto jñānacakṣuṣāc bhīṣma drakṣyasi tattvena jale mīna ivāmale vaiśaṃpāyana uvācaa tatas te vyāsasahitāḥ sarva eva maharṣayaḥc ṛgyajuḥsāmasaṃyuktair vacobhiḥ kṛṣṇam arcayana tataḥ sarvārtavaṃ divyaṃ puṣpavarṣaṃ nabhastalātc papāta yatra vārṣṇeyaḥ sagāṅgeyaḥ sapāṇḍavaḥa vāditrāṇi ca divyāni jaguś cāpsarasāṃ gaṇāḥc na cāhitam aniṣṭaṃ vā kiṃ cit tatra vyadṛśyataa vavau śivaḥ sukho vāyuḥ sarvagandhavahaḥ śuciḥc śāntāyāṃ diśi śāntāś ca prāvadan mṛgapakṣiṇaḥa tato muhūrtād bhagavān sahasrāṃśur divākaraḥc dahan vanam ivaikānte pratīcyāṃ pratyadṛśyataa tato maharṣayaḥ sarve samutthāya janārdanamc bhīṣmam āmantrayāṃ cakrū rājānaṃ ca yudhiṣṭhirama tataḥ praṇāmam akarot keśavaḥ pāṇḍavas tathāc sātyakiḥ saṃjayaś caiva sa ca śāradvataḥ kṛpaḥa tatas te dharmaniratāḥ samyak tair abhipūjitāḥc śvaḥ sameṣyāma ity uktvā yatheṣṭaṃ tvaritā yayuḥa tathaivāmantrya gāṅgeyaṃ keśavas te ca pāṇḍavāḥc pradakṣiṇam upāvṛtya rathān āruruhuḥ śubhāna tato rathaiḥ kāñcanadantakūbarairmahīdharābhaiḥ samadaiś ca dantibhiḥc hayaiḥ suparṇair iva cāśugāmibhiḥpadātibhiś cāttaśarāsanādibhiḥa yayau rathānāṃ purato hi sā camūstathaiva paścād atimātrasāriṇīc puraś ca paścāc ca yathā mahānadīpurarkṣavantaṃ girim etya narmadāa tataḥ purastād bhagavān niśākaraḥsamutthitas tām abhiharṣayaṃś camūmc divākarāpītarasās tathauṣadhīḥpunaḥ svakenaiva guṇena yojayana tataḥ puraṃ surapurasaṃnibhadyutipraviśya te yaduvṛṣapāṇḍavās tadāc yathocitān bhavanavarān samāviśañśramānvitā mṛgapatayo guhā iva vaiśaṃpāyana uvācaa tataḥ praviśya bhavanaṃ prasupto madhusūdanaḥc yāmamātrāvaśeṣāyāṃ yāminyāṃ pratyabudhyataa sa dhyānapatham āśritya sarvajñānāni mādhavaḥc avalokya tataḥ paścād dadhyau brahma sanātanama tataḥ śrutipurāṇajñāḥ śikṣitā raktakaṇṭhinaḥc astuvan viśvakarmāṇaṃ vāsudevaṃ prajāpatima paṭhanti pāṇisvanikās tathā gāyanti gāyanāḥc śaṅkhānakamṛdaṅgāṃś ca pravādyanta sahasraśaḥa vīṇāpaṇavaveṇūnāṃ svanaś cātimanoramaḥc prahāsa iva vistīrṇaḥ śuśruve tasya veśmanaḥa tathā yudhiṣṭhirasyāpi rājño maṅgalasaṃhitāḥc uccerur madhurā vāco gītavāditrasaṃhitāḥa tata utthāya dāśārhaḥ snātaḥ prāñjalir acyutaḥc japtvā guhyaṃ mahābāhur agnīn āśritya tasthivāna tataḥ sahasraṃ viprāṇāṃ caturvedavidāṃ tathāc gavāṃ sahasreṇaikaikaṃ vācayām āsa mādhavaḥa maṅgalālambhanaṃ kṛtvā ātmānam avalokya cac ādarśe vimale kṛṣṇas tataḥ sātyakim abravīta gaccha śaineya jānīhi gatvā rājaniveśanamc api sajjo mahātejā bhīṣmaṃ draṣṭuṃ yuthiṣṭhiraḥa tataḥ kṛṣṇasya vacanāt sātyakis tvarito yayauc upagamya ca rājānaṃ yudhiṣṭhiram uvāca haa yukto rathavaro rājan vāsudevasya dhīmataḥc samīpam āpageyasya prayāsyati janārdanaḥa bhavatpratīkṣaḥ kṛṣṇo sau dharmarāja mahādyutec yad atrānantaraṃ kṛtyaṃ tad bhavān kartum arhatid evam uktaḥ pratyuvāca dharmarājo yudhiṣṭhiraḥ yudhiṣṭhira uvācaa yujyatāṃ me rathavaraḥ phalgunāpratimadyutec na sainikaiś ca yātavyaṃ yāsyāmo vayam eva hia na ca pīḍayitavyo me bhīṣmo dharmabhṛtāṃ varaḥc ataḥ puraḥsarāś cāpi nivartantu dhanaṃjayaa adyaprabhṛti gāṅgeyaḥ paraṃ guhyaṃ pravakṣyatic tato necchāmi kaunteya pṛthagjanasamāgamam vaiśaṃpāyana uvācaa tad vākyam ākarṇya tathā kuntīputro dhanaṃjayaḥc yuktaṃ rathavaraṃ tasmā ācacakṣe nararṣabhaa tato yudhiṣṭhiro rājā yamau bhīmārjunāv apic bhūtānīva samastāni yayuḥ kṛṣṇaniveśanama āgacchatsv atha kṛṣṇo pi pāṇḍaveṣu mahātmasuc śaineyasahito dhīmān ratham evānvapadyataa rathasthāḥ saṃvidaṃ kṛtvā sukhāṃ pṛṣṭvā ca śarvarīmc meghaghoṣai rathavaraiḥ prayayus te mahārathāḥa meghapuṣpaṃ balāhaṃ ca sainyaṃ sugrīvam eva cac dārukaś codayām āsa vāsudevasya vājinaḥa te hayā vāsudevasya dārukeṇa pracoditāḥc gāṃ khurāgrais tathā rājaṃl likhantaḥ prayayus tadāa te grasanta ivākāśaṃ vegavanto mahābalāḥc kṣetraṃ dharmasya kṛtsnasya kurukṣetram avātarana tato yayur yatra bhīṣmaḥ śaratalpagataḥ prabhuḥc āste brahmarṣibhiḥ sārdhaṃ brahmā devagaṇair yathāa tato vatīrya govindo rathāt sa ca yudhiṣṭhiraḥc bhīmo gāṇḍīvadhanvā ca yamau sātyakir eva cae ṛṣīn abhyarcayām āsuḥ karān udyamya dakṣiṇāna sa taiḥ parivṛto rājā nakṣatrair iva candramāḥc abhyājagāma gāṅgeyaṃ brahmāṇam iva vāsavaḥa śaratalpe śayānaṃ tam ādityaṃ patitaṃ yathāc dadarśa sa mahābāhur bhayād āgatasādhvasaḥ janamejaya uvācaa dharmātmani mahāsattve satyasaṃdhe jitātmanic devavrate mahābhāge śaratalpagate cyutea śayāne vīraśayane bhīṣme śaṃtanunandanec gāṅgeye puruṣavyāghre pāṇḍavaiḥ paryupasthitea kāḥ kathāḥ samavartanta tasmin vīrasamāgamec hateṣu sarvasainyeṣu tan me śaṃsa mahāmune vaiśaṃpāyana uvācaa śaratalpagate bhīṣme kauravāṇāṃ dhuraṃdharec ājagmur ṛṣayaḥ siddhā nāradapramukhā nṛpaa hataśiṣṭāś ca rājāno yudhiṣṭhirapurogamāḥc dhṛtarāṣṭraś ca kṛṣṇaś ca bhīmārjunayamās tathāa te bhigamya mahātmāno bharatānāṃ pitāmahamc anvaśocanta gāṅgeyam ādityaṃ patitaṃ yathāa muhūrtam iva ca dhyātvā nārado devadarśanaḥc uvāca pāṇḍavān sarvān hataśiṣṭāṃś ca pārthivāna prāptakālaṃ ca ācakṣe bhīṣmo yam anuyujyatāmc astam eti hi gāṅgeyo bhānumān iva bhārataa ayaṃ prāṇān utsisṛkṣus taṃ sarve bhyetya pṛcchatac kṛtsnān hi vividhān dharmāṃś cāturvarṇyasya vetty ayama eṣa vṛddhaḥ purā lokān saṃprāpnoti tanutyajāmc taṃ śīghram anuyuñjadhvaṃ saṃśayān manasi sthitāna evam uktā nāradena bhīṣmam īyur narādhipāḥc praṣṭuṃ cāśaknuvantas te vīkṣāṃ cakruḥ parasparama athovāca hṛṣīkeśaṃ pāṇḍuputro yudhiṣṭhiraḥc nānyas tvad devakīputra śaktaḥ praṣṭuṃ pitāmahama pravyāhāraya durdharṣa tvam agre madhusūdanac tvaṃ hi nas tāta sarveṣāṃ sarvadharmavid uttamaḥa evam uktaḥ pāṇḍavena bhagavān keśavas tadāc abhigamya durādharṣaṃ pravyāhārayad acyutaḥ vāsudeva uvācaa kaccit sukhena rajanī vyuṣṭā te rājasattamac vispaṣṭalakṣaṇā buddhiḥ kaccic copasthitā tavaa kaccij jñānāni sarvāṇi pratibhānti ca te naghac na glāyate ca hṛdayaṃ na ca te vyākulaṃ manaḥ bhīṣma uvācaa dāho mohaḥ śramaś caiva klamo glānis tathā rujāc tava prasādād govinda sadyo vyapagatānaghaa yac ca bhūtaṃ bhaviṣyac ca bhavac ca paramadyutec tat sarvam anupaśyāmi pāṇau phalam ivāhitama vedoktāś caiva ye dharmā vedāntanihitāś ca yec tān sarvān saṃprapaśyāmi varadānāt tavācyutaa śiṣṭaiś ca dharmo yaḥ proktaḥ sa ca me hṛdi vartatec deśajātikulānāṃ ca dharmajño smi janārdanaa caturṣv āśramadharmeṣu yo rthaḥ sa ca hṛdi sthitaḥc rājadharmāṃś ca sakalān avagacchāmi keśavad sarvadharmeṣu yo hy arthaḥ sa ca me hṛdi saṃsthitaḥa yatra yatra ca vaktavyaṃ tad vakṣyāmi janārdanac tava prasādād dhi śubhā mano me buddhir āviśata yuveva cāsmi saṃvṛttas tvadanudhyānabṛṃhitaḥc vaktuṃ śreyaḥ samartho smi tvatprasādāj janārdanaa svayaṃ kimarthaṃ tu bhavāñ śreyo na prāha pāṇḍavamc kiṃ te vivakṣitaṃ cātra tad āśu vada mādhava vāsudeva uvācaa yaśasaḥ śreyasaś caiva mūlaṃ māṃ viddhi kauravac mattaḥ sarve bhinirvṛttā bhāvāḥ sadasadātmakāḥa śītāṃśuś candra ity ukte ko loke vismayiṣyatic tathaiva yaśasā pūrṇe mayi ko vismayiṣyatia ādheyaṃ tu mayā bhūyo yaśas tava mahādyutec tato me vipulā buddhis tvayi bhīṣma samāhitāa yāvad dhi pṛthivīpāla pṛthivī sthāsyate dhruvāc tāvat tavākṣayā kīrtir lokān anu cariṣyatia yac ca tvaṃ vakṣyase bhīṣma pāṇḍavāyānupṛcchatec vedapravādā iva te sthāsyanti vasudhātalea yaś caitena pramāṇena yokṣyaty ātmānam ātmanāc sa phalaṃ sarvapuṇyānāṃ pretya cānubhaviṣyatia etasmāt kāraṇād bhīṣma matir divyā mayā hi tec dattā yaśo vipratheta kathaṃ bhūyas taveti haa yāvad dhi prathate loke puruṣasya yaśo bhuvic tāvat tasyākṣayaṃ sthānaṃ bhavatīti viniścitama rājāno hataśiṣṭās tvāṃ rājann abhita āsatec dharmān anuyuyukṣantas tebhyaḥ prabrūhi bhārataa bhavān hi vayasā vṛddhaḥ śrutācārasamanvitaḥc kuśalo rājadharmāṇāṃ pūrveṣām aparāś ca yea janmaprabhṛti te kaś cid vṛjinaṃ na dadarśa hac jñātāram anudharmāṇāṃ tvāṃ viduḥ sarvapārthivāḥa tebhyaḥ piteva putrebhyo rājan brūhi paraṃ nayamc ṛṣayaś ca hi devāś ca tvayā nityam upāsitāḥa tasmād vaktavyam eveha tvayā paśyāmy aśeṣataḥc dharmāñ śuśrūṣamāṇebhyaḥ pṛṣṭena ca satā punaḥa vaktavyaṃ viduṣā ceti dharmam āhur manīṣiṇaḥc apratibruvataḥ kaṣṭo doṣo hi bhavati prabhoa tasmāt putraiś ca pautraiś ca dharmān pṛṣṭaḥ sanātanānc vidvāñ jijñāsamānais tvaṃ prabrūhi bharatarṣabha vaiśaṃpāyana uvācaa athābravīn mahātejā vākyaṃ kauravanandanaḥc hanta dharmān pravakṣyāmi dṛḍhe vāṅmanasī mamae tava prasādād govinda bhūtātmā hy asi śāśvataḥa yudhiṣṭhiras tu māṃ rājā dharmān samanupṛcchatuc evaṃ prīto bhaviṣyāmi dharmān vakṣyāmi cānaghaa yasmin rājarṣabhe jāte dharmātmani mahātmanic ahṛṣyann ṛṣayaḥ sarve sa māṃ pṛcchatu pāṇḍavaḥa sarveṣāṃ dīptayaśasāṃ kurūṇāṃ dharmacāriṇāmc yasya nāsti samaḥ kaś cit sa māṃ pṛcchatu pāṇḍavaḥa dhṛtir damo brahmacaryaṃ kṣamā dharmaś ca nityadāc yasminn ojaś ca tejaś ca sa māṃ pṛcchatu pāṇḍavaḥa satyaṃ dānaṃ tapaḥ śaucaṃ śāntir dākṣyam asaṃbhramaḥc yasminn etāni sarvāṇi sa māṃ pṛcchatu pāṇḍavaḥa yo na kāmān na saṃrambhān na bhayān nārthakāraṇātc kuryād adharmaṃ dharmātmā sa māṃ pṛcchatu pāṇḍavaḥa saṃbandhino tithīn bhṛtyān saṃśritopāśritāṃś ca yaḥc saṃmānayati satkṛtya sa māṃ pṛcchatu pāṇḍavaḥa satyanityaḥ kṣamānityo jñānanityo tithipriyaḥc yo dadāti satāṃ nityaṃ sa māṃ pṛcchatu pāṇḍavaḥa ijyādhyayananityaś ca dharme ca nirataḥ sadāc śāntaḥ śrutarahasyaś ca sa māṃ pṛcchatu pāṇḍavaḥ vāsudeva uvācaa lajjayā parayopeto dharmātmā sa yudhiṣṭhiraḥc abhiśāpabhayād bhīto bhavantaṃ nopasarpatia lokasya kadanaṃ kṛtvā lokanātho viśāṃ patec abhiśāpabhayād bhīto bhavantaṃ nopasarpatia pūjyān mānyāṃś ca bhaktāṃś ca gurūn saṃbandhibāndhavānc arghyārhān iṣubhir hatvā bhavantaṃ nopasarpati bhīṣma uvācaa brāhmaṇānāṃ yathā dharmo dānam adhyayanaṃ tapaḥc kṣatriyāṇāṃ tathā kṛṣṇa samare dehapātanama pitṝn pitāmahān putrān gurūn saṃbandhibāndhavānc mithyāpravṛttān yaḥ saṃkhye nihanyād dharma eva saḥa samayatyāgino lubdhān gurūn api ca keśavac nihanti samare pāpān kṣatriyo yaḥ sa dharmavitd yo lobhān na samīkṣeta dharmasetuṃ sanātanamd nihanti yas taṃ samare kṣatriyo vai sa dharmavitd lohitodāṃ keśatṛṇāṃ gajaśailāṃ dhvajadrumāmd mahīṃ karoti yuddheṣu kṣatriyo yaḥ sa dharmavita āhūtena raṇe nityaṃ yoddhavyaṃ kṣatrabandhunāc dharmyaṃ svargyaṃ ca lokyaṃ ca yuddhaṃ hi manur abravīt vaiśaṃpāyana uvācaa evam uktas tu bhīṣmeṇa dharmarājo yudhiṣṭhiraḥc vinītavad upāgamya tasthau saṃdarśane grataḥa athāsya pādau jagrāha bhīṣmaś cābhinananda tamc mūrdhni cainam upāghrāya niṣīdety abravīt tadāa tam uvācātha gāṅgeya ṛṣabhaḥ sarvadhanvināmc pṛccha māṃ tāta visrabdhaṃ mā bhais tvaṃ kurusattama vaiśaṃpāyana uvācaa praṇipatya hṛṣīkeśam abhivādya pitāmahamc anumānya gurūn sarvān paryapṛcchad yudhiṣṭhiraḥa rājyaṃ vai paramo dharma iti dharmavido viduḥc mahāntam etaṃ bhāraṃ ca manye tad brūhi pārthivaa rājadharmān viśeṣeṇa kathayasva pitāmahac sarvasya jīvalokasya rājadharmāḥ parāyaṇama trivargo tra samāsakto rājadharmeṣu kauravac mokṣadharmaś ca vispaṣṭaḥ sakalo tra samāhitaḥa yathā hi raśmayo śvasya dviradasyāṅkuśo yathāc narendradharmo lokasya tathā pragrahaṇaṃ smṛtama atra vai saṃpramūḍhe tu dharme rājarṣisevitec lokasya saṃsthā na bhavet sarvaṃ ca vyākulaṃ bhaveta udayan hi yathā sūryo nāśayaty āsuraṃ tamaḥc rājadharmās tathālokyām ākṣipanty aśubhāṃ gatima tad agre rājadharmāṇām arthatattvaṃ pitāmahac prabrūhi bharataśreṣṭha tvaṃ hi buddhimatāṃ varaḥa āgamaś ca paras tvattaḥ sarveṣāṃ naḥ paraṃtapac bhavantaṃ hi paraṃ buddhau vāsudevo bhimanyate bhīṣma uvācaa namo dharmāya mahate namaḥ kṛṣṇāya vedhasec brāhmaṇebhyo namaskṛtya dharmān vakṣyāmi śāśvatāna śṛṇu kārtsnyena mattas tvaṃ rājadharmān yudhiṣṭhirac nirucyamānān niyato yac cānyad abhivāñchasia ādāv eva kuruśreṣṭha rājñā rañjanakāmyayāc devatānāṃ dvijānāṃ ca vartitavyaṃ yathāvidhia daivatāny arcayitvā hi brāhmaṇāṃś ca kurūdvahac ānṛṇyaṃ yāti dharmasya lokena ca sa mānyatea utthāne ca sadā putra prayatethā yudhiṣṭhirac na hy utthānam ṛte daivaṃ rājñām arthaprasiddhayea sādhāraṇaṃ dvayaṃ hy etad daivam utthānam eva cac pauruṣaṃ hi paraṃ manye daivaṃ niścityam ucyatea vipanne ca samārambhe saṃtāpaṃ mā sma vai kṛthāḥc ghaṭate vinayas tāta rājñām eṣa nayaḥ paraḥa na hi satyād ṛte kiṃ cid rājñāṃ vai siddhikāraṇamc satye hi rājā nirataḥ pretya ceha ca nandatia ṛṣīṇām api rājendra satyam eva paraṃ dhanamc tathā rājñaḥ paraṃ satyān nānyad viśvāsakāraṇama guṇavāñ śīlavān dānto mṛdur dharmyo jitendriyaḥc sudarśaḥ sthūlalakṣyaś ca na bhraśyeta sadā śriyaḥa ārjavaṃ sarvakāryeṣu śrayethāḥ kurunandanab ārjavena samāyuktā modante ṛṣayo divic punar nayavicāreṇa trayīsaṃvaraṇena caa mṛdur hi rājā satataṃ laṅghyo bhavati sarvaśaḥc tīkṣṇāc codvijate lokas tasmād ubhayam ācaraa adaṇḍyāś caiva te nityaṃ viprāḥ syur dadatāṃ varac bhūtam etat paraṃ loke brāhmaṇā nāma bhārataa manunā cāpi rājendra gītau ślokau mahātmanāc dharmeṣu sveṣu kauravya hṛdi tau kartum arhasia adbhyo gnir brahmataḥ kṣatram aśmano loham utthitamc teṣāṃ sarvatragaṃ tejaḥ svāsu yoniṣu śāmyatia ayo hanti yadāśmānam agniś cāpo bhipadyatec brahma ca kṣatriyo dveṣṭi tadā sīdanti te trayaḥa etaj jñātvā mahārāja namasyā eva te dvijāḥc bhaumaṃ brahma dvijaśreṣṭhā dhārayanti śamānvitāḥa evaṃ caiva naravyāghra lokatantravighātakāḥc nigrāhyā eva satataṃ bāhubhyāṃ ye syur īdṛśāḥa ślokau cośanasā gītau purā tāta maharṣiṇāc tau nibodha mahāprājña tvam ekāgramanā nṛpaa udyamya śastram āyāntam api vedāntagaṃ raṇec nigṛhṇīyāt svadharmeṇa dharmāpekṣī nareśvaraḥa vinaśyamānaṃ dharmaṃ hi yo rakṣati sa dharmavitc na tena bhrūṇahā sa syān manyus taṃ manum ṛcchatia evaṃ caiva naraśreṣṭha rakṣyā eva dvijātayaḥc svaparāddhān api hi tān viṣayānte samutsṛjeta abhiśastam api hy eṣāṃ kṛpāyīta viśāṃ patec brahmaghne gurutalpe ca bhrūṇahatye tathaiva caa rājadviṣṭe ca viprasya viṣayānte visarjanamb vapanaṃ draviṇādānaṃ svapuryāś ca visarjanamc vidhīyate na śārīraṃ bhayam eṣāṃ kadā canaa dayitāś ca narās te syur nityaṃ puruṣasattamac na kośaḥ paramo hy anyo rājñāṃ puruṣasaṃcayāta durgeṣu ca mahārāja ṣaṭsu ye śāstraniścitāḥc sarveṣu teṣu manyante naradurgaṃ sudustarama tasmān nityaṃ dayā kāryā cāturvarṇye vipaścitāc dharmātmā satyavāk caiva rājā rañjayati prajāḥa na ca kṣāntena te bhāvyaṃ nityaṃ puruṣasattamac adharmyo hi mṛdū rājā kṣamāvān iva kuñjaraḥa bārhaspatye ca śāstre vai ślokā viniyatāḥ purāc asminn arthe mahārāja tan me nigadataḥ śṛṇua kṣamamāṇaṃ nṛpaṃ nityaṃ nīcaḥ paribhavej janaḥc hastiyantā gajasyeva śira evārurukṣatia tasmān naiva mṛdur nityaṃ tīkṣṇo vāpi bhaven nṛpaḥc vasante rka iva śrīmān na śīto na ca gharmadaḥa pratyakṣeṇānumānena tathaupamyopadeśataḥc parīkṣyās te mahārāja sve pare caiva sarvadāa vyasanāni ca sarvāṇi tyajethā bhūridakṣiṇac na caiva na prayuñjīta saṅgaṃ tu parivarjayeta nityaṃ hi vyasanī loke paribhūto bhavaty utac udvejayati lokaṃ cāpy atidveṣī mahīpatiḥa bhavitavyaṃ sadā rājñā garbhiṇīsahadharmiṇāc kāraṇaṃ ca mahārāja śṛṇu yenedam iṣyatea yathā hi garbhiṇī hitvā svaṃ priyaṃ manaso nugamc garbhasya hitam ādhatte tathā rājñāpy asaṃśayama vartitavyaṃ kuruśreṣṭha nityaṃ dharmānuvartināc svaṃ priyaṃ samabhityajya yad yal lokahitaṃ bhaveta na saṃtyājyaṃ ca te dhairyaṃ kadā cid api pāṇḍavac dhīrasya spaṣṭadaṇḍasya na hy ājñā pratihanyatea parihāsaś ca bhṛtyais te na nityaṃ vadatāṃ varac kartavyo rājaśārdūla doṣam atra hi me śṛṇua avamanyanti bhartāraṃ saṃharṣād upajīvinaḥc sve sthāne na ca tiṣṭhanti laṅghayanti hi tad vacaḥa preṣyamāṇā vikalpante guhyaṃ cāpy anuyuñjatec ayācyaṃ caiva yācante bhojyāny āhārayanti caa krudhyanti paridīpyanti bhūmim adhyāsate sya cac utkocair vañcanābhiś ca kāryāṇy anuvihanti caa jarjaraṃ cāsya viṣayaṃ kurvanti pratirūpakaiḥc strīr akṣibhiś ca sajjante tulyaveṣā bhavanti caa vātaṃ ca ṣṭhīvanaṃ caiva kurvate cāsya saṃnidhauc nirlajjā naraśārdūla vyāharanti ca tadvacaḥa hayaṃ vā dantinaṃ vāpi rathaṃ nṛpatisaṃmatamc adhirohanty anādṛtya harṣule pārthive mṛdaua idaṃ te duṣkaraṃ rājann idaṃ te durviceṣṭitamc ity evaṃ suhṛdo nāma bruvanti pariṣadgatāḥa kruddhe cāsmin hasanty eva na ca hṛṣyanti pūjitāḥc saṃgharṣaśīlāś ca sadā bhavanty anyonyakāraṇāta visraṃsayanti mantraṃ ca vivṛṇvanti ca duṣkṛtamc līlayā caiva kurvanti sāvajñās tasya śāsaname alaṃkaraṇabhojyaṃ ca tathā snānānulepanama helamānā naravyāghra svasthās tasyopaśṛṇvatec nindanti svān adhīkārān saṃtyajanti ca bhārataa na vṛttyā parituṣyanti rājadeyaṃ haranti cac krīḍituṃ tena cecchanti sasūtreṇeva pakṣiṇāe asmatpraṇeyo rājeti loke caiva vadanty utaa ete caivāpare caiva doṣāḥ prādurbhavanty utac nṛpatau mārdavopete harṣule ca yudhiṣṭhira bhīṣma uvācaa nityodyuktena vai rājñā bhavitavyaṃ yudhiṣṭhirac praśāmyate ca rājā hi nārīvodyamavarjitaḥa bhagavān uśanā cāha ślokam atra viśāṃ patec tam ihaikamanā rājan gadatas tvaṃ nibodha mea dvāv etau grasate bhūmiḥ sarpo bilaśayān ivac rājānaṃ cāviroddhāraṃ brāhmaṇaṃ cāpravāsinama tad etan naraśārdūla hṛdi tvaṃ kartum arhasic saṃdheyān api saṃdhatsva virodhyāṃś ca virodhayad svāmyamātyasuhṛtkośarāṣṭradurgabalāni caa saptāṅge yaś ca te rājye vaiparītyaṃ samācaretc gurur vā yadi vā mitraṃ pratihantavya eva saḥa maruttena hi rājñāyaṃ gītaḥ ślokaḥ purātanaḥc rājyādhikāre rājendra bṛhaspatimataḥ purāa guror apy avaliptasya kāryākāryam ajānataḥc utpathapratipannasya parityāgo vidhīyatea bāhoḥ putreṇa rājñā ca sagareṇeha dhīmatāc asamañjāḥ suto jyeṣṭhas tyaktaḥ paurahitaiṣiṇāa asamañjāḥ sarayvāṃ prāk paurāṇāṃ bālakān nṛpac nyamajjayad ataḥ pitrā nirbhartsya sa vivāsitaḥa ṛṣiṇoddālakenāpi śvetaketur mahātapāḥc mithyā viprān upacaran saṃtyakto dayitaḥ sutaḥa lokarañjanam evātra rājñāṃ dharmaḥ sanātanaḥc satyasya rakṣaṇaṃ caiva vyavahārasya cārjavama na hiṃsyāt paravittāni deyaṃ kāle ca dāpayetc vikrāntaḥ satyavāk kṣānto nṛpo na calate pathaḥa guptamantro jitakrodho śāstrārthagataniścayaḥc dharme cārthe ca kāme ca mokṣe ca satataṃ rataḥa trayyā saṃvṛtarandhraś ca rājā bhavitum arhatic vṛjinasya narendrāṇāṃ nānyat saṃvaraṇāt parama cāturvarṇyasya dharmāś ca rakṣitavyā mahīkṣitāc dharmasaṃkararakṣā hi rājñāṃ dharmaḥ sanātanaḥa na viśvasec ca nṛpatir na cātyarthaṃ na viśvasetc ṣāḍguṇyaguṇadoṣāṃś ca nityaṃ buddhyāvalokayeta dviṭchidradarśī nṛpatir nityam eva praśasyatec trivargaviditārthaś ca yuktacāropadhiś ca yaḥa kośasyopārjanaratir yamavaiśravaṇopamaḥc vettā ca daśavargasya sthānavṛddhikṣayātmanaḥa abhṛtānāṃ bhaved bhartā bhṛtānāṃ cānvavekṣakaḥc nṛpatiḥ sumukhaś ca syāt smitapūrvābhibhāṣitāa upāsitā ca vṛddhānāṃ jitatandrīr alolupaḥc satāṃ vṛtte sthitamatiḥ santo hy ācāradarśinaḥa na cādadīta vittāni satāṃ hastāt kadā canac asadbhyas tu samādadyāt sadbhyaḥ saṃpratipādayeta svayaṃ prahartādātā ca vaśyātmā vaśyasādhanaḥc kāle dātā ca bhoktā ca śuddhācāras tathaiva caa śūrān bhaktān asaṃhāryān kule jātān arogiṇaḥc śiṣṭāñ śiṣṭābhisaṃbandhān mānino nāvamāninaḥa vidyāvido lokavidaḥ paralokānvavekṣakānc dharmeṣu niratān sādhūn acalān acalān ivaa sahāyān satataṃ kuryād rājā bhūtipuraskṛtaḥc tais tulyaś ca bhaved bhogaiś chatramātrājñayādhikaḥa pratyakṣā ca parokṣā ca vṛttiś cāsya bhavet sadāc evaṃ kṛtvā narendro hi na khedam iha vindatia sarvātiśaṅkī nṛpatir yaś ca sarvaharo bhavetc sa kṣipram anṛjur lubdhaḥ svajanenaiva bādhyatea śucis tu pṛthivīpālo lokacittagrahe rataḥc na pataty aribhir grastaḥ patitaś cāvatiṣṭhatea akrodhano thāvyasanī mṛdudaṇḍo jitendriyaḥc rājā bhavati bhūtānāṃ viśvāsyo himavān ivaa prājño nyāyaguṇopetaḥ pararandhreṣu tatparaḥc sudarśaḥ sarvavarṇānāṃ nayāpanayavit tathāa kṣiprakārī jitakrodhaḥ suprasādo mahāmanāḥc arogaprakṛtir yuktaḥ kriyāvān avikatthanaḥa ārabdhāny eva kāryāṇi na paryavasitāni cac yasya rājñaḥ pradṛśyante sa rājā rājasattamaḥa putrā iva pitur gehe viṣaye yasya mānavāḥc nirbhayā vicariṣyanti sa rājā rājasattamaḥa agūḍhavibhavā yasya paurā rāṣṭranivāsinaḥc nayāpanayavettāraḥ sa rājā rājasattamaḥa svakarmaniratā yasya janā viṣayavāsinaḥc asaṃghātaratā dāntāḥ pālyamānā yathāvidhia vaśyā neyā vinītāś ca na ca saṃgharṣaśīlinaḥc viṣaye dānarucayo narā yasya sa pārthivaḥa na yasya kūṭakapaṭaṃ na māyā na ca matsaraḥc viṣaye bhūmipālasya tasya dharmaḥ sanātanaḥa yaḥ satkaroti jñānāni neyaḥ paurahite rataḥc satāṃ dharmānugas tyāgī sa rājā rājyam arhatia yasya cāraś ca mantraś ca nityaṃ caiva kṛtākṛtec na jñāyate hi ripubhiḥ sa rājā rājyam arhatia ślokaś cāyaṃ purā gīto bhārgaveṇa mahātmanāc ākhyāte rāmacarite nṛpatiṃ prati bhārataa rājānaṃ prathamaṃ vindet tato bhāryāṃ tato dhanamc rājany asati lokasya kuto bhāryā kuto dhanama tad rājan rājasiṃhānāṃ nānyo dharmaḥ sanātanaḥc ṛte rakṣāṃ suvispaṣṭāṃ rakṣā lokasya dhāraṇama prācetasena manunā ślokau cemāv udāhṛtauc rājadharmeṣu rājendra tāv ihaikamanāḥ śṛṇua ṣaḍ etān puruṣo jahyād bhinnāṃ nāvam ivārṇavec apravaktāram ācāryam anadhīyānam ṛtvijama arakṣitāraṃ rājānaṃ bhāryāṃ cāpriyavādinīmc grāmakāmaṃ ca gopālaṃ vanakāmaṃ ca nāpitam śrīvaiśaṃpāyanaḥ etāvad uktvā bhūyo pi bhīṣmaḥ kurupitāmahaḥ uvāca vacanaṃ dhīmān sarvataḥ sārasaṃgraham bhīṣma uvācaa etat te rājadharmāṇāṃ navanītaṃ yudhiṣṭhirac bṛhaspatir hi bhagavān nānyaṃ dharmaṃ praśaṃsatia viśālākṣaś ca bhagavān kāvyaś caiva mahātapāḥc sahasrākṣo mahendraś ca tathā prācetaso manuḥa bharadvājaś ca bhagavāṃs tathā gauraśirā muniḥc rājaśāstrapraṇetāro brahmaṇyā brahmavādinaḥa rakṣām eva praśaṃsanti dharmaṃ dharmabhṛtāṃ varac rājñāṃ rājīvatāmrākṣa sādhanaṃ cātra vai śṛṇua cāraś ca praṇidhiś caiva kāle dānam amatsaraḥc yuktyādānaṃ na cādānam ayogena yudhiṣṭhiraa satāṃ saṃgrahaṇaṃ śauryaṃ dākṣyaṃ satyaṃ prajāhitamc anārjavair ārjavaiś ca śatrupakṣasya bhedanama sādhūnām aparityāgaḥ kulīnānāṃ ca dhāraṇamc nicayaś ca niceyānāṃ sevā buddhimatām apia balānāṃ harṣaṇaṃ nityaṃ prajānām anvavekṣaṇamc kāryeṣv akhedaḥ kośasya tathaiva ca vivardhanama puraguptir aviśvāsaḥ paurasaṃghātabhedanamc ketanānāṃ ca jīrṇānām avekṣā caiva sīdatāma dvividhasya ca daṇḍasya prayogaḥ kālacoditaḥc arimadhyasthamitrāṇāṃ yathāvac cānvavekṣaṇama upajāpaś ca bhṛtyānām ātmanaḥ paradarśanātc aviśvāsaḥ svayaṃ caiva parasyāśvāsanaṃ tathāa nītidharmānusaraṇaṃ nityam utthānam eva cac ripūṇām anavajñānaṃ nityaṃ cānāryavarjanama utthānaṃ hi narendrāṇāṃ bṛhaspatir abhāṣatac rājadharmasya yan mūlaṃ ślokāṃś cātra nibodha mea utthānenāmṛtaṃ labdham utthānenāsurā hatāḥc utthānena mahendreṇa śraiṣṭhyaṃ prāptaṃ divīha caa utthānadhīraḥ puruṣo vāgdhīrān adhitiṣṭhatic utthānadhīraṃ vāgdhīrā ramayanta upāsatea utthānahīno rājā hi buddhimān api nityaśaḥc dharṣaṇīyo ripūṇāṃ syād bhujaṃga iva nirviṣaḥa na ca śatrur avajñeyo durbalo pi balīyasāc alpo pi hi dahaty agnir viṣam alpaṃ hinasti caa ekāśvenāpi saṃbhūtaḥ śatrur durgasamāśritaḥc taṃ taṃ tāpayate deśam api rājñaḥ samṛddhinaḥa rājño rahasyaṃ yad vākyaṃ jayārthaṃ lokasaṃgrahaḥc hṛdi yac cāsya jihmaṃ syāt kāraṇārthaṃ ca yad bhaveta yac cāsya kāryaṃ vṛjinam ārjavenaiva dhāryatec dambhanārthāya lokasya dharmiṣṭhām ācaret kriyāma rājyaṃ hi sumahat tantraṃ durdhāryam akṛtātmabhiḥc na śakyaṃ mṛdunā voḍhum āghātasthānam uttamama rājyaṃ sarvāmiṣaṃ nityam ārjaveneha dhāryatec tasmān miśreṇa satataṃ vartitavyaṃ yudhiṣṭhiraa yady apy asya vipattiḥ syād rakṣamāṇasya vai prajāḥc so py asya vipulo dharma evaṃvṛttā hi bhūmipāḥa eṣa te rājadharmāṇāṃ leśaḥ samanuvarṇitaḥc bhūyas te yatra saṃdehas tad brūhi vadatāṃ vara vaiśaṃpāyana uvācaa tato vyāsaś ca bhagavān devasthāno śmanā sahac vāsudevaḥ kṛpaś caiva sātyakiḥ saṃjayas tathāa sādhu sādhv iti saṃhṛṣṭāḥ puṣyamāṇair ivānanaiḥc astuvaṃs te naravyāghraṃ bhīṣmaṃ dharmabhṛtāṃ varama tato dīnamanā bhīṣmam uvāca kurusattamaḥc netrābhyām aśrupūrṇābhyāṃ pādau tasya śanaiḥ spṛśana śva idānīṃ svasaṃdehaṃ prakṣyāmi tvaṃ pitāmahac upaiti savitāpy astaṃ rasam āpīya pārthivama tato dvijātīn abhivādya keśavaḥkṛpaś ca te caiva yudhiṣṭhirādayaḥc pradakṣiṇīkṛtya mahānadīsutaṃtato rathān āruruhur mudā yutāḥa dṛṣadvatīṃ cāpy avagāhya suvratāḥkṛtodakāryāḥ kṛtajapyamaṅgalāḥc upāsya saṃdhyāṃ vidhivat paraṃtapāstataḥ puraṃ te viviśur gajāhvayam vaiśaṃpāyana uvācaa tataḥ kālyaṃ samutthāya kṛtapaurvāhṇikakriyāḥc yayus te nagarākārai rathaiḥ pāṇḍavayādavāḥa prapadya ca kurukṣetraṃ bhīṣmam āsādya cānaghamc sukhāṃ ca rajanīṃ pṛṣṭvā gāṅgeyaṃ rathināṃ varama vyāsādīn abhivādyarṣīn sarvais taiś cābhinanditāḥc niṣedur abhito bhīṣmaṃ parivārya samantataḥa tato rājā mahātejā dharmarājo yudhiṣṭhiraḥc abravīt prāñjalir bhīṣmaṃ pratipūjyābhivādya caa ya eṣa rājārājeti śabdaś carati bhāratac katham eṣa samutpannas tan me brūhi pitāmahaa tulyapāṇiśirogrīvas tulyabuddhīndriyātmakaḥc tulyaduḥkhasukhātmā ca tulyapṛṣṭhabhujodaraḥa tulyaśukrāsthimajjaś ca tulyamāṃsāsṛg eva cac niḥśvāsocchvāsatulyaś ca tulyaprāṇaśarīravāna samānajanmamaraṇaḥ samaḥ sarvaguṇair nṛṇāmc viśiṣṭabuddhīñ śūrāṃś ca katham eko dhitiṣṭhatia katham eko mahīṃ kṛtsnāṃ vīraśūrāryasaṃkulāmc rakṣaty api ca loko sya prasādam abhivāñchatia ekasya ca prasādena kṛtsno lokaḥ prasīdatic vyākulenākulaḥ sarvo bhavatīti viniścayaḥa etad icchāmy ahaṃ sarvaṃ tattvena bharatarṣabhac śrotuṃ tan me yathātattvaṃ prabrūhi vadatāṃ varaa naitat kāraṇam alpaṃ hi bhaviṣyati viśāṃ patec yad ekasmiñ jagat sarvaṃ devavad yāti saṃnatim bhīṣma uvācaa niyatas tvaṃ naraśreṣṭha śṛṇu sarvam aśeṣataḥc yathā rājyaṃ samutpannam ādau kṛtayuge bhavata naiva rājyaṃ na rājāsīn na daṇḍo na ca dāṇḍikaḥc dharmeṇaiva prajāḥ sarvā rakṣanti ca parasparama pālayānās tathānyonyaṃ narā dharmeṇa bhāratac khedaṃ paramam ājagmus tatas tān moha āviśata te mohavaśam āpannā mānavā manujarṣabhac pratipattivimohāc ca dharmas teṣām anīnaśata naṣṭāyāṃ pratipattau tu mohavaśyā narās tadāc lobhasya vaśam āpannāḥ sarve bhāratasattamaa aprāptasyābhimarśaṃ tu kurvanto manujās tataḥc kāmo nāmāparas tatra samapadyata vai prabhoa tāṃs tu kāmavaśaṃ prāptān rāgo nāma samaspṛśatc raktāś ca nābhyajānanta kāryākāryaṃ yudhiṣṭhiraa agamyāgamanaṃ caiva vācyāvācyaṃ tathaiva cac bhakṣyābhakṣyaṃ ca rājendra doṣādoṣaṃ ca dṛṣṭāntavacane sthitāḥa sādhyā devā vasavaś cāśvinau carudrāś ca viśve marutāṃ gaṇāś cac sṛṣṭāḥ purā ādidevena devākṣātre dharme vartayante ca siddhāḥa atra te vartayiṣyāmi dharmam arthaviniścayamc nirmaryāde vartamāne dānavaikāyane kṛtee babhūva rājā rājendra māndhātā nāma vīryavāna purā vasumatīpālo yajñaṃ cakre didṛkṣayāc anādimadhyanidhanaṃ devaṃ nārāyaṇaṃ pratia sa rājā rājaśārdūla māndhātā parameṣṭhinaḥc jagrāha śirasā pādau yajñe viṣṇor mahātmanaḥa darśayām āsa taṃ viṣṇū rūpam āsthāya vāsavamc sa pārthivair vṛtaḥ sadbhir arcayām āsa taṃ prabhuma tasya pārthivasaṃghasya tasya caiva mahātmanaḥc saṃvādo yaṃ mahān āsīd viṣṇuṃ prati mahādyute indra uvācaa kim iṣyate dharmabhṛtāṃ variṣṭhayad draṣṭukāmo si tam aprameyamc anantamāyāmitasattvavīryaṃnārāyaṇaṃ hy ādidevaṃ purāṇama nāsau devo viśvarūpo mayāpiśakyo draṣṭuṃ brahmaṇā vāpi sākṣātc ye nye kāmās tava rājan hṛdisthādāsyāmi tāṃs tvaṃ hi martyeṣu rājāa satye sthito dharmaparo jitendriyaḥśūro dṛḍhaṃ prītirataḥ surāṇāmc buddhyā bhaktyā cottamaśraddhayā catatas te haṃ dadmi varaṃ yatheṣṭam māndhātovācaa asaṃśayaṃ bhagavann ādidevaṃdrakṣyāmy ahaṃ śirasāhaṃ prasādyac tyaktvā bhogān dharmakāmo hy araṇyamicche gantuṃ satpathaṃ lokajuṣṭama kṣātrād dharmād vipulād aprameyāllokāḥ prāptāḥ sthāpitaṃ svaṃ yaśaś cac dharmo yo sāv ādidevāt pravṛttolokajyeṣṭhas taṃ na jānāmi kartum indra uvācaa asainiko dharmaparaś carethāḥparāṃ gatiṃ lapsyase cāpramattaḥc kṣātro dharmo hy ādidevāt pravṛttaḥpaścād anye śeṣabhūtāś ca dharmāḥa śeṣāḥ sṛṣṭā hy antavanto hy anantāḥsuprasthānāḥ kṣatradharmāviśiṣṭāḥc asmin dharme sarvadharmāḥ praviṣṭāstasmād dharmaṃ śreṣṭham imaṃ vadantia karmaṇā vai purā devā ṛṣayaś cāmitaujasaḥc trātāḥ sarve pramathyārīn kṣatradharmeṇa viṣṇunāa yadi hy asau bhagavān nāhaniṣyadripūn sarvān vasumān aprameyaḥc na brāhmaṇā na ca lokādikartāna saddharmā nādidharmā bhaveyuḥa imām urvīṃ na jayed vikrameṇadevaśreṣṭho sau purā ced ameyaḥc cāturvarṇyaṃ cāturāśramyadharmāḥsarve na syur brahmaṇo vai vināśāta dṛṣṭā dharmāḥ śatadhā śāśvatenakṣātreṇa dharmeṇa punaḥ pravṛttāḥc yuge yuge hy ādidharmāḥ pravṛttālokajyeṣṭhaṃ kṣatradharmaṃ vadantia ātmatyāgaḥ sarvabhūtānukampālokajñānaṃ mokṣaṇaṃ pālanaṃ cac viṣaṇṇānāṃ mokṣaṇaṃ pīḍitānāṃkṣātre dharme vidyate pārthivānāma nirmaryādāḥ kāmamanyupravṛttābhītā rājño nādhigacchanti pāpamc śiṣṭāś cānye sarvadharmopapannāḥsādhvācārāḥ sādhu dharmaṃ carantia putravat paripālyāni liṅgadharmeṇa pārthivaiḥc loke bhūtāni sarvāṇi vicaranti na saṃśayaḥa sarvadharmaparaṃ kṣatraṃ lokajyeṣṭhaṃ sanātanamc śaśvad akṣaraparyantam akṣaraṃ sarvatomukham indra uvācaa evaṃvīryaḥ sarvadharmopapannaḥkṣātraḥ śreṣṭhaḥ sarvadharmeṣu dharmaḥc pālyo yuṣmābhir lokasiṃhair udārairviparyaye syād abhāvaḥ prajānāma bhuvaḥ saṃskāraṃ rājasaṃskārayogamabhaikṣacaryāṃ pālanaṃ ca prajānāmc vidyād rājā sarvabhūtānukampāṃdehatyāgaṃ cāhave dharmam agryama tyāgaṃ śreṣṭhaṃ munayo vai vadantisarvaśreṣṭho yaḥ śarīraṃ tyajetac nityaṃ tyaktaṃ rājadharmeṣu sarvaṃpratyakṣaṃ te bhūmipālāḥ sadaitea bahuśrutyā guruśuśrūṣayā vāparasya vā saṃhananād vadantic nityaṃ dharmaṃ kṣatriyo brahmacārīcared eko hy āśramaṃ dharmakāmaḥa sāmānyārthe vyavahāre pravṛttepriyāpriye varjayann eva yatnātc cāturvarṇyasthāpanāt pālanāc catais tair yogair niyamair aurasaiś caa sarvodyogair āśramaṃ dharmam āhuḥkṣātraṃ jyeṣṭhaṃ sarvadharmopapannamc svaṃ svaṃ dharmaṃ ye na caranti varṇāstāṃs tān dharmān ayathāvad vadantia nirmaryāde nityam arthe vinaṣṭānāhus tān vai paśubhūtān manuṣyānc yathā nītiṃ gamayaty arthalobhācchreyāṃs tasmād āśramaḥ kṣatradharmaḥa traividyānāṃ yā gatir brāhmaṇānāṃyaś caivokto thāśramo brāhmaṇānāmc etat karma brāhmaṇasyāhur agryamanyat kurvañ śūdravac chastravadhyaḥa cāturāśramyadharmāś ca vedadharmāś ca pārthivac brāhmaṇenānugantavyā nānyo vidyāt kathaṃ canaa anyathā vartamānasya na sā vṛttiḥ prakalpyatec karmaṇā vyajyate dharmo yathaiva śvā tathaiva saḥa yo vikarmasthito vipro na sa sanmānam arhatic karmasv anupayuñjānam aviśvāsyaṃ hi taṃ viduḥa ete dharmāḥ sarvavarṇāś ca vīrairutkraṣṭavyāḥ kṣatriyair eṣa dharmaḥc tasmāj jyeṣṭhā rājadharmā na cānyevīryajyeṣṭhā vīradharmā matā me māndhātovācaa yavanāḥ kirātā gāndhārāś cīnāḥ śabarabarbarāḥb bāhlīkāś ca turuṣkāś ca pāñcālāś ca tathā smṛtāḥc śakās tuṣārāḥ kahvāś ca pahlavāś cāndhramadrakāḥa oḍrāḥ pulindā ramaṭhāḥ kācā mlecchāś ca sarvaśaḥc brahmakṣatraprasūtāś ca vaiśyāḥ śūdrāś ca mānavāḥa kathaṃ dharmaṃ careyus te sarve viṣayavāsinaḥc madvidhaiś ca kathaṃ sthāpyāḥ sarve te dasyujīvinaḥa etad icchāmy ahaṃ śrotuṃ bhagavaṃs tad bravīhi mec tvaṃ bandhubhūto hy asmākaṃ kṣatriyāṇāṃ sureśvara indra uvācaa mātāpitror hi kartavyā śuśrūṣā sarvadasyubhiḥc ācāryaguruśuśrūṣā tathaivāśramavāsināma bhūmipālānāṃ ca śuśrūṣā kartavyā sarvadasyubhiḥc vedadharmakriyāś caiva teṣāṃ dharmo vidhīyatea pitṛyajñās tathā kūpāḥ prapāś ca śayanāni cac dānāni ca yathākālaṃ dvijeṣu dadyur eva tea ahiṃsā satyam akrodho vṛttidāyānupālanamc bharaṇaṃ putradārāṇāṃ śaucam adroha eva caa dakṣiṇā sarvayajñānāṃ dātavyā bhūtim icchatāc pākayajñā mahārhāś ca kartavyāḥ sarvadasyubhiḥa etāny evaṃprakārāṇi vihitāni purānaghac sarvalokasya karmāṇi kartavyānīha pārthiva māndhātovācaa dṛśyante mānavā loke sarvavarṇeṣu dasyavaḥc liṅgāntare vartamānā āśrameṣu caturṣv api indra uvācaa vinaṣṭāyāṃ daṇḍanītau rājadharme nirākṛtec saṃpramuhyanti bhūtāni rājadaurātmyato nṛpaa asaṃkhyātā bhaviṣyanti bhikṣavo liṅginas tathāc āśramāṇāṃ vikalpāś ca nivṛtte smin kṛte yugea aśṛṇvānāḥ purāṇānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ pravarā gatīḥc utpathaṃ pratipatsyante kāmamanyusamīritāḥa yadā nivartyate pāpo daṇḍanītyā mahātmabhiḥc tadā dharmo na calate sadbhūtaḥ śāśvataḥ paraḥa paralokaguruṃ caiva rājānaṃ yo vamanyatec na tasya dattaṃ na hutaṃ na śrāddhaṃ phalati kva cita mānuṣāṇām adhipatiṃ devabhūtaṃ sanātanamc devāś ca bahu manyante dharmakāmaṃ nareśvarama prajāpatir hi bhagavān yaḥ sarvam asṛjaj jagatc sa pravṛttinivṛttyarthaṃ dharmāṇāṃ kṣatram icchatia pravṛttasya hi dharmasya buddhyā yaḥ smarate gatimc sa me mānyaś ca pūjyaś ca tatra kṣatraṃ pratiṣṭhitam bhīṣma uvācaa evam uktvā sa bhagavān marudgaṇavṛtaḥ prabhuḥc jagāma bhavanaṃ viṣṇur akṣaraṃ paramaṃ padama evaṃ pravartite dharme purā sucarite naghac kaḥ kṣatram avamanyeta cetanāvān bahuśrutaḥa anyāyena pravṛttāni nivṛttāni tathaiva cac antarā vilayaṃ yānti yathā pathi vicakṣuṣaḥa ādau pravartite cakre tathaivādiparāyaṇec vartasva puruṣavyāghra saṃvijānāmi te nagha yudhiṣṭhira uvācaa śrutā me kathitāḥ pūrvaiś catvāro mānavāśramāḥc vyākhyānam eṣām ācakṣva pṛcchato me pitāmaha bhīṣma uvācaa viditāḥ sarva eveha dharmās tava yudhiṣṭhirac yathā mama mahābāho viditāḥ sādhusaṃmatāḥa yat tu liṅgāntaragataṃ pṛcchase māṃ yudhiṣṭhirac dharmaṃ dharmabhṛtāṃ śreṣṭha tan nibodha narādhipaa sarvāṇy etāni kaunteya vidyante manujarṣabhac sādhvācārapravṛttānāṃ cāturāśramyakarmaṇāma akāmadveṣayuktasya daṇḍanītyā yudhiṣṭhirac samekṣiṇaś ca bhūteṣu bhaikṣāśramapadaṃ bhaveta vetty ādānavisargaṃ yo nigrahānugrahau tathāc yathoktavṛtter vīrasya kṣemāśramapadaṃ bhavetd arhān pūjayato nityaṃ saṃvibhāgena pāṇḍavad sarvatas tasya kaunteya bhaikṣyāśramapadaṃ bhaveta jñātisaṃbandhimitrāṇi vyāpannāni yudhiṣṭhirac samabhyuddharamāṇasya dīkṣāśramapadaṃ bhavetd lokamukhyeṣu satkāraṃ liṅgimukhyeṣu cāsakṛtd kurvatas tasya kaunteya vanyāśramapadaṃ bhaveta āhnikaṃ bhūtayajñāṃś ca pitṛyajñāṃś ca mānuṣānc kurvataḥ pārtha vipulān vanyāśramapadaṃ bhavetd saṃvibhāgena bhūtānām atithīnāṃ tathārcanātd devayajñaiś ca rājendra vanyāśramapadaṃ bhavetd mardanaṃ pararāṣṭrāṇāṃ śiṣṭārthaṃ satyavikramad kurvataḥ puruṣavyāghra vanyāśramapadaṃ bhaveta pālanāt sarvabhūtānāṃ svarāṣṭraparipālanātc dīkṣā bahuvidhā rājño vanyāśramapadaṃ bhaveta vedādhyayananityatvaṃ kṣamāthācāryapūjanamc tathopādhyāyaśuśrūṣā brahmāśramapadaṃ bhavetd āhnikaṃ japamānasya devān pūjayataḥ sadād dharmeṇa puruṣavyāghra dharmāśramapadaṃ bhavetd mṛtyur vā rakṣaṇaṃ veti yasya rājño viniścayaḥd prāṇadyūte tatas tasya brahmāśramapadaṃ bhaveta ajihmam aśaṭhaṃ mārgaṃ sevamānasya bhāratac sarvadā sarvabhūteṣu brahmāśramapadaṃ bhaveta vānaprastheṣu vipreṣu traividyeṣu ca bhāratac prayacchato rthān vipulān vanyāśramapadaṃ bhaveta sarvabhūteṣv anukrośaṃ kurvatas tasya bhāratac ānṛśaṃsyapravṛttasya sarvāvasthaṃ padaṃ bhaveta bālavṛddheṣu kauravya sarvāvasthaṃ yudhiṣṭhirac anukrośaṃ vidadhataḥ sarvāvasthaṃ padaṃ bhaveta balātkṛteṣu bhūteṣu paritrāṇaṃ kurūdvahac śaraṇāgateṣu kauravya kurvan gārhasthyam āvaseta carācarāṇāṃ bhūtānāṃ rakṣām api ca sarvaśaḥc yathārhapūjāṃ ca sadā kurvan gārhasthyam āvaseta jyeṣṭhānujyeṣṭhapatnīnāṃ bhrātṝṇāṃ putranaptṛṇāmc nigrahānugrahau pārtha gārhasthyam iti tat tapaḥa sādhūnām arcanīyānāṃ prajāsu viditātmanāmc pālanaṃ puruṣavyāghra gṛhāśramapadaṃ bhaveta āśramasthāni sarvāṇi yas tu veśmani bhāratac ādadīteha bhojyena tad gārhasthyaṃ yudhiṣṭhiraa yaḥ sthitaḥ puruṣo dharme dhātrā sṛṣṭe yathārthavatc āśramāṇāṃ sa sarveṣāṃ phalaṃ prāpnoty anuttamama yasmin na naśyanti guṇāḥ kaunteya puruṣe sadāc āśramasthaṃ tam apy āhur naraśreṣṭhaṃ yudhiṣṭhiraa sthānamānaṃ vayomānaṃ kulamānaṃ tathaiva cac kurvan vasati sarveṣu hy āśrameṣu yudhiṣṭhiraa deśadharmāṃś ca kaunteya kuladharmāṃs tathaiva cac pālayan puruṣavyāghra rājā sarvāśramī bhaveta kāle vibhūtiṃ bhūtānām upahārāṃs tathaiva cac arhayan puruṣavyāghra sādhūnām āśrame vaseta daśadharmagataś cāpi yo dharmaṃ pratyavekṣatec sarvalokasya kaunteya rājā bhavati so śramīa ye dharmakuśalā loke dharmaṃ kurvanti sādhavaḥc pālitā yasya viṣaye pādo ṃśas tasya bhūpateḥa dharmārāmān dharmaparān ye na rakṣanti mānavānc pārthivāḥ puruṣavyāghra teṣāṃ pāpaṃ haranti tea ye ca rakṣāsahāyāḥ syuḥ pārthivānāṃ yudhiṣṭhirac te caivāṃśaharāḥ sarve dharme parakṛte naghaa sarvāśramapade hy āhur gārhasthyaṃ dīptanirṇayamc pāvanaṃ puruṣavyāghra yaṃ vayaṃ paryupāsmahea ātmopamas tu bhūteṣu yo vai bhavati mānavaḥc nyastadaṇḍo jitakrodhaḥ sa pretya labhate sukhama dharmotthitā sattvavīryā dharmasetuvaṭākarāc tyāgavātādhvagā śīghrā naus tvā saṃtārayiṣyatia yadā nivṛttaḥ sarvasmāt kāmo yo sya hṛdi sthitaḥc tadā bhavati sattvasthas tato brahma samaśnutea suprasannas tu bhāvena yogena ca narādhipac dharmaṃ puruṣaśārdūla prāpsyase pālane rataḥa vedādhyayanaśīlānāṃ viprāṇāṃ sādhukarmaṇāmc pālane yatnam ātiṣṭha sarvalokasya cānaghaa vane carati yo dharmam āśrameṣu ca bhāratac rakṣayā tac chataguṇaṃ dharmaṃ prāpnoti pārthivaḥa eṣa te vividho dharmaḥ pāṇḍavaśreṣṭha kīrtitaḥc anutiṣṭha tvam enaṃ vai pūrvair dṛṣṭaṃ sanātanama cāturāśramyam ekāgraḥ cāturvarṇyaṃ ca pāṇḍavac dharmaṃ puruṣaśārdūla prāpsyase pālane rataḥ yudhiṣṭhira uvācaa cāturāśramya ukto tra cāturvarṇyas tathaiva cac rāṣṭrasya yat kṛtyatamaṃ tan me brūhi pitāmaha bhīṣma uvācaa rāṣṭrasyaitat kṛtyatamaṃ rājña evābhiṣecanamc anindram abalaṃ rāṣṭraṃ dasyavo bhibhavanti caa arājakeṣu rāṣṭreṣu dharmo na vyavatiṣṭhatec parasparaṃ ca khādanti sarvathā dhig arājakama indram enaṃ pravṛṇute yad rājānam iti śrutiḥc yathaivendras tathā rājā saṃpūjyo bhūtim icchatāa nārājakeṣu rāṣṭreṣu vastavyam iti vaidikamc nārājakeṣu rāṣṭreṣu havyam agnir vahaty apia atha ced abhivarteta rājyārthī balavattaraḥc arājakāni rāṣṭrāṇi hatarājāni vā punaḥa pratyudgamyābhipūjyaḥ syād etad atra sumantritamc na hi pāpāt pāpataram asti kiṃ cid arājakāta sa cet samanupaśyeta samagraṃ kuśalaṃ bhavetc balavān hi prakupitaḥ kuryān niḥśeṣatām apid yo durbalo na namati sa mahatkleśabhāg bhaveta bhūyāṃsaṃ labhate kleśaṃ yā gaur bhavati durduhāc suduhā yā tu bhavati naiva tāṃ kleśayanty utaa yad ataptaṃ praṇamati na tat saṃtāpayanty utac yac ca svayaṃ nataṃ dāru na tat saṃnāmayanty apia etayopamayā dhīraḥ saṃnameta balīyasec indrāya sa praṇamate namate yo balīyasea tasmād rājaiva kartavyaḥ satataṃ bhūtim icchatāc na dhanārtho na dārārthas teṣāṃ yeṣām arājakama prīyate hi haran pāpaḥ paravittam arājakec yadāsya uddharanty anye tadā rājānam icchatia pāpā api tadā kṣemaṃ na labhante kadā canac ekasya hi dvau harato dvayoś ca bahavo parea adāsaḥ kriyate dāso hriyante ca balāt striyaḥa   vivayomānaṃ tathaiva ca sicc etasmāt kāraṇād devāḥ prajāpālān pracakrirea rājā cen na bhavel loke pṛthivyāṃ daṇḍadhārakaḥc śūle matsyān ivāpakṣyan durbalān balavattarāḥa arājakāḥ prajāḥ pūrvaṃ vineśur iti naḥ śrutamc parasparaṃ bhakṣayanto matsyā iva jale kṛśāna tāḥ sametya tataś cakruḥ samayān iti naḥ śrutamc vākkrūro daṇḍapuruṣo yaś ca syāt pāradārikaḥe yaś ca na svam athādadyāt tyājyā nas tādṛśā itia viśvāsanārthaṃ varṇānāṃ sarveṣām aviśeṣataḥc tās tathā samayaṃ kṛtvā samaye nāvatasthirea sahitās tās tadā jagmur asukhārtāḥ pitāmahamc anīśvarā vinaśyāmo bhagavann īśvaraṃ diśaa yaṃ pūjayema saṃbhūya yaś ca naḥ paripālayetc tābhyo manuṃ vyādideśa manur nābhinananda tāḥ manur uvācaa bibhemi karmaṇaḥ krūrād rājyaṃ hi bhṛśaduṣkaramc viśeṣato manuṣyeṣu mithyāvṛttiṣu nityadā bhīṣma uvācaa tam abruvan prajā mā bhaiḥ karmaṇaino gamiṣyatic paśūnām adhipañcāśad dhiraṇyasya tathaiva cae dhānyasya daśamaṃ bhāgaṃ dāsyāmaḥ kośavardhanamf kanyāṃ śulke cārurūpāṃ vivāheṣūdyatāsu caa mukhyena śastrapatreṇa ye manuṣyāḥ pradhānataḥc bhavantaṃ te nuyāsyanti mahendram iva devatāḥa sa tvaṃ jātabalo rājan duṣpradharṣaḥ pratāpavānc sukhe dhāsyasi naḥ sarvān kubera iva nairṛtāna yaṃ ca dharmaṃ cariṣyanti prajā rājñā surakṣitāḥc caturthaṃ tasya dharmasya tvatsaṃsthaṃ no bhaviṣyatia tena dharmeṇa mahatā sukhalabdhena bhāvitaḥc pāhy asmān sarvato rājan devān iva śatakratuḥa vijayāyāśu niryāhi pratapan raśmimān ivac mānaṃ vidhama śatrūṇāṃ dharmo jayatu naḥ sadāa sa niryayau mahātejā balena mahatā vṛtaḥc mahābhijanasaṃpannas tejasā prajvalann ivaa tasya tāṃ mahimāṃ dṛṣṭvā mahendrasyeva devatāḥc apatatrasire kurunandanac etat saptātmakaṃ rājyaṃ paripālyaṃ prayatnataḥa ṣāḍguṇyaṃ ca trivargaṃ ca trivargam aparaṃ tathāc yo vetti puruṣavyāghra sa bhunakti mahīm imāma ṣāḍguṇyam iti yat proktaṃ tan nibodha yudhiṣṭhirac saṃdhāyāsanam ity eva yātrāsaṃdhānam eva caa vigṛhyāsanam ity eva yātrāṃ saṃparigṛhya cac dvaidhībhāvas tathānyeṣāṃ saṃśrayo tha parasya caa trivargaś cāpi yaḥ proktas tam ihaikamanāḥ śṛṇua   tan nibodha yudhiṣṭhiraa vadiṣyāmi mahābāhoc kṣayaḥ sthānaṃ ca vṛddhiś ca trivargam aparaṃ tathād dharmaś cārthaś ca kāmaś ca trivargo vai sanātanaḥd mantraś caiva prabhāvaś ca utsāhaś caiva tāntrikaḥd śaktitrayaṃ samākhyātaṃ trivargasya ca tatparamd kāryaṃ ca kāraṇaṃ caiva kartā ca parikīrtitaḥd etat parataraṃ vidyāt trivargād api bhāratad sarveṣāṃ ca kṣaye rājan yas trivargaḥ sanātanaḥd sattvaṃ rajas tamaś caiva trivargaḥ kāraṇaṃ smṛtamd tenātyantavimuktaś ca muktaḥ puruṣa ucyated kāryasya sarvathā nāśo mokṣa ity abhidhīyated tena mokṣaparaś caiva devadevaḥ pitāmahaḥd tuṣṭyarthasya trivargasya rakṣām āha narādhipad jagato laukikī yātrā yatra nityaṃ pratiṣṭhitāa dharmaś cārthaś ca kāmaś ca sevitavyo tha kālataḥb sevā dharmasya kartavyā satataṃ bhūtitatparaiḥb puruṣair naraśārdūla tanmūlāḥ sarvathā kriyāḥc dharmeṇa hi mahīpālaś ciraṃ pālayate mahīmd yaḥ kaś cid dhārmiko rājā sa vipanno pi bhūpatiḥd arthakāmavihīno pi ciraṃ pālayate mahīma asminn arthe ca yau ślokau gītāv aṅgirasā svayamc yādavīputra bhadraṃ te śrotum arhasi tāv apia kṛtvā sarvāṇi kāryāṇi samyak saṃpālya medinīmc pālayitvā tathā paurān paratra sukham edhatea kiṃ tasya tapasā rājñaḥ kiṃ ca tasyādhvarair apic apālitāḥ prajā yasya sarvā dharmavinākṛtāḥd ślokāś cośanasā gītās tān nibodha yudhiṣṭhirad daṇḍanīteś ca yan mūlaṃ trivargasya ca bhūpated bhārgavāṅgirasaṃ karma ṣoḍaśāṅgaṃ ca yad balamd viṣaṃ māyāś ca daivaṃ ca pauruṣaṃ cārthasiddhayed prāgudakpravaṇaṃ durgaṃ samāsādya mahīpatiḥd trivargatrayasaṃpūrṇam upādāya tam udvahetd ṣaṭ pañca ca vinirjitya daśa cāṣṭau ca bhūpatiḥd trivargair daśabhir yuktaḥ surair api na jīyated na buddhiṃ parigṛhṇīta strīṇāṃ mūrkhajanasya cad daivopahatabuddhīnāṃ ye ca vedair vivarjitāḥd na teṣāṃ śṛṇuyād rājā buddhis teṣāṃ parāṅmukhīd strīpradhānāni mahābhāgyaṃ daṇḍanītyāḥ siddhaiḥ śabdaiḥ sahetukaiḥc śṛṇu me śaṃsato rājan yathāvad iha bhārataa daṇḍanītiḥ svadharmebhyaś cāturvarṇyaṃ niyacchatic prayuktā svāminā samyag adharmebhyaś ca yacchatia cāturvarṇye svadharmasthe maryādānām asaṃkarec daṇḍanītikṛte kṣeme prajānām akutobhayea some prayatnaṃ kurvanti trayo varṇā yathāvidhic tasmād devamanuṣyāṇāṃ sukhaṃ viddhi samāhitama kālo vā kāraṇaṃ rājño rājā vā kālakāraṇamc iti te saṃśayo mā bhūd rājā kālasya kāraṇama daṇḍanītyā yadā rājā samyak kārtsnyena vartatec tadā kṛtayugaṃ nāma kālaḥ śreṣṭhaḥ pravartatea bhavet kṛtayuge dharmo nādharmo vidyate kva citc sarveṣām eva varṇānāṃ nādharme ramate manaḥa yogakṣemāḥ pravartante prajānāṃ nātra saṃśayaḥc vaidikāni ca karmāṇi bhavanty aviguṇāny utaa ṛtavaś ca sukhāḥ sarve bhavanty uta nirāmayāḥc prasīdanti narāṇāṃ ca svaravarṇamanāṃsi caa vyādhayo na bhavanty atra nālpāyur dṛśyate naraḥc vidhavā na bhavanty atra nṛśaṃso nābhijāyatea akṛṣṭapacyā pṛthivī bhavanty oṣadhayas tathāc tvakpatraphalamūlāni vīryavanti bhavanti caa nādharmo vidyate tatra dharma eva tu kevalaḥc iti kārtayugān etān guṇān viddhi yudhiṣṭhiraa daṇḍanītyā yadā rājā trīn aṃśān anuvartatec caturtham aṃśam utsṛjya tadā tretā pravartatea aśubhasya caturthāṃśas trīn aṃśān anuvartatec kṛṣṭapacyaiva pṛthivī bhavanty oṣadhayas tathāa ardhaṃ tyaktvā yadā rājā nītyardham anuvartatec tatas tu dvāparaṃ nāma sa kālaḥ saṃpravartatea aśubhasya tadā ardhaṃ dvāv aṃśāv anuvartatec kṛṣṭapacyaiva pṛthivī bhavaty alpaphalā tathāa daṇḍanītiṃ parityajya yadā kārtsnyena bhūmipaḥc prajāḥ kliśnāty ayogena praviśyati tadā kaliḥa kalāv adharmo bhūyiṣṭhaṃ dharmo bhavati tu kva citc sarveṣām eva varṇānāṃ svadharmāc cyavate manaḥa śūdrā bhaikṣeṇa jīvanti brāhmaṇāḥ paricaryayāc yogakṣemasya nāśaś ca vartate varṇasaṃkaraḥa vaidikāni ca karmāṇi bhavanti viguṇāny utac ṛtavo nasukhāḥ sarve bhavanty āmayinas tathāa hrasanti ca manuṣyāṇāṃ svaravarṇamanāṃsy utac vyādhayaś ca bhavanty atra mriyante cāgatāyuṣaḥa vidhavāś ca bhavanty atra nṛśaṃsā jāyate prajāc kva cid varṣati parjanyaḥ kva cit sasyaṃ prarohatia rasāḥ sarve kṣayaṃ yānti yadā necchati bhūmipaḥc prajāḥ saṃrakṣituṃ samyag daṇḍanītisamāhitaḥa rājā kṛtayugasraṣṭā tretāyā dvāparasya cac yugasya ca caturthasya rājā bhavati kāraṇama kṛtasya karaṇād rājā svargam atyantam aśnutec tretāyāḥ karaṇād rājā svargaṃ nātyantam aśnutea pravartanād dvāparasya yathābhāgam upāśnutec kaleḥ pravartanād rājā pāpam atyantam aśnutea tato vasati duṣkarmā narake śāśvatīḥ samāḥc prajānāṃ kalmaṣe magno kīrtiṃ pāpaṃ ca vindatid daṇḍanītiṃ puraskṛtya yadā rājā praśāstid yogakṣemāḥ pravartante prajānāṃ nātra saṃśayaḥa daṇḍanītiṃ puraskṛtya vijānan kṣatriyaḥ sadāb paripālyāḥ prajāḥ samyag iha pretya ca kāmadāḥc anavāptaṃ ca lipseta labdhaṃ ca paripālayetd bharatarṣabhac eṣa eva paro dharmo yad rājā daṇḍanītimāna tasmāt kauravya dharmeṇa prajāḥ pālaya nītimānc evaṃvṛttaḥ prajā rakṣan svargaṃ jetāsi durjayam yudhiṣṭhira uvācaa kena vṛttena vṛttajña vartamāno mahīpatiḥc sukhenārthān sukhodarkān iha ca pretya cāpnuyāt bhīṣma uvācaa iyaṃ guṇānāṃ ṣaṭtriṃśat ṣaṭtriṃśad guṇasaṃyutāc yān guṇāṃs tu guṇopetaḥ kurvan guṇam avāpnuyāta cared dharmān akaṭuko yudhiṣṭhira uvācaa kathaṃ rājā prajā rakṣan nādhibandhena yujyatec dharme ca nāparādhnoti tan me brūhi pitāmaha bhīṣma uvācaa samāsenaiva te tāta dharmān vakṣyāmi niścitānc vistareṇa hi dharmāṇāṃ na jātv antam avāpnuyāta dharmaniṣṭhāñ śrutavato vedavratasamāhitānc arcitān vāsayethās tvaṃ gṛhe guṇavato dvijāna pratyutthāyopasaṃgṛhya caraṇāv abhivādya cac atha sarvāṇi kurvīthāḥ kāryāṇi sapurohitaḥa dharmakāryāṇi nirvartya maṅgalāni prayujya cac brāhmaṇān vācayethās tvam arthasiddhijayāśiṣaḥa ārjavena ca saṃpanno dhṛtyā buddhyā ca bhāratac arthārthaṃ parigṛhṇīyāt kāmakrodhau ca varjayeta kāmakrodhau puraskṛtya yo rthaṃ rājānutiṣṭhatic na sa dharmaṃ na cāpy arthaṃ parigṛhṇāti bāliśaḥa mā sma lubdhāṃś ca mūrkhāṃś ca kāme cārtheṣu yūyujaḥc alubdhān buddhisaṃpannān sarvakarmasu yojayeta mūrkho hy adhikṛto rtheṣu kāryāṇām aviśāradaḥc prajāḥ kliśnāty ayogena kāmadveṣasamanvitaḥa baliṣaṣṭhena śulkena daṇḍenāthāparādhināmc śāstranītena lipsethā vetanena dhanāgamama dāpayitvā karaṃ dharmyaṃ rāṣṭraṃ nityaṃ yathāvidhic aśeṣān kalpayed rājā yogakṣemān atandritaḥa gopāyitāraṃ dātāraṃ dharmanityam atandritamc akāmadveṣasaṃyuktam anurajyanti mānavāḥa mā smādharmeṇa lābhena lipsethās tvaṃ dhanāgamamc dharmārthāv adhruvau tasya yo paśāstraparo bhaveta apaśāstraparo rājā saṃcayān nādhigacchatic asthāne cāsya tad vittaṃ sarvam eva vinaśyatia arthamūlo pahiṃsāṃ ca kurute svayam ātmanaḥc karair aśāstradṛṣṭair hi mohāt saṃpīḍayan prajāḥa ūdhaś chindyād dhi yo dhenvāḥ kṣīrārthī na labhet payaḥb yo hi pakvaṃ drumaṃ chidya labhate na punaḥ phalamc evaṃ rāṣṭram ayogena pīḍitaṃ na vivardhated yavasodakam ādāya sāntvena vinayena caa yo hi dogdhrīm upāste tu sa nityaṃ labhate payaḥc evaṃ rāṣṭram upāyena bhuñjāno labhate phalama atha rāṣṭram upāyena bhujyamānaṃ surakṣitamc janayaty atulāṃ nityaṃ kośavṛddhiṃ yudhiṣṭhiraa dogdhi dhānyaṃ hiraṇyaṃ ca prajā rājñi surakṣitāc nityaṃ svebhyaḥ parebhyaś ca tṛptā mātā yathā payaḥa mālākāropamo rājan bhava māṅgārikopamaḥc tathā yuktaś ciraṃ rāṣṭraṃ bhoktuṃ śakyasi pālayana paracakrābhiyānena yadi te syād dhanakṣayaḥc atha sāmnaiva lipsethā dhanam abrāhmaṇeṣu yata mā sma te brāhmaṇaṃ dṛṣṭvā dhanasthaṃ pracalen manaḥc antyāyām apy avasthāyāṃ kim u sphītasya bhārataa dhanāni tebhyo dadyās tvaṃ yathāśakti yathārhataḥc sāntvayan parirakṣaṃś ca svargam āpsyasi durjayama evaṃ dharmeṇa vṛttena prajās tvaṃ paripālayanc svantaṃ puṇyaṃ yaśovantaṃ prāpsyase kurunandanaa dharmeṇa vyavahāreṇa prajāḥ pālaya pāṇḍavac yudhiṣṭhira tathā yukto nādhibandhena yokṣyasea eṣa eva paro dharmo yad rājā rakṣate prajāḥc bhūtānāṃ hi yathā dharme rakṣaṇaṃ ca parā dayād iha loke sukhaṃ prāpya paratra ca mahītaled evaṃ tebhyaḥ paracceto sicbrāhmaṇebhyo yathāvidhid sattvena paribhogāya svargaṃ jeṣyasi durjayama tasmād evaṃ paraṃ dharmaṃ manyante dharmakovidāḥc yad rājā rakṣaṇe yukto bhūteṣu kurute dayāma yad ahnā kurute pāpam arakṣan bhayataḥ prajāḥc rājā varṣasahasreṇa tasyāntam adhigacchatia yad ahnā kurute puṇyaṃ prajā dharmeṇa pālayanc daśa varṣasahasrāṇi tasya bhuṅkte phalaṃ divid yadā na kurute dharmaṃ rājā bhūtāni pālayand prajāpuṇyaṃ caturbhāgaṃ tadā na prāpnuyān nṛpaḥa sviṣṭiḥ svadhītiḥ sutapā lokāñ jayati yāvataḥc kṣaṇena tān avāpnoti prajā dharmeṇa pālayana evaṃ dharmaṃ prayatnena kaunteya paripālayanc iha puṇyaphalaṃ labdhvā nādhibandhena yokṣyasea svargaloke ca mahatīṃ śriyaṃ prāpsyasi pāṇḍavac asaṃbhavaś ca dharmāṇām īdṛśānām arājasue tasmād rājaiva nānyo sti yo mahat phalam āpnuyāta sa rājyam ṛddhimat prāpya dharmeṇa paripālayanc indraṃ tarpaya somena kāmaiś ca suhṛdo janān bhīṣma uvācaa ya eva tu sato rakṣed asataś ca nibarhayetc sa eva rājñā kartavyo rājan rājapurohitaḥd yudhiṣṭhira uvācad kīdṛśo brāhmaṇo rājñāṃ kāryākāryavicāraṇed kṣamaḥ kartuṃ samartho vā tan me brūhi pitāmahaa atrāpy udāharantīmam itihāsaṃ purātanamc purūravasa ailasya saṃvādaṃ mātariśvanaḥ aila uvācaa kutaḥ svid brāhmaṇo jāto varṇāś cāpi kutas trayaḥc kasmāc ca bhavati śreyān etad vāyo vicakṣva me vāyur uvācaa brahmaṇo mukhataḥ sṛṣṭo brāhmaṇo rājasattamac bāhubhyāṃ kṣatriyaḥ sṛṣṭa ūrubhyāṃ vaiśya ucyatea varṇānāṃ paricaryārthaṃ trayāṇāṃ puruṣarṣabhac varṇaś caturthaḥ paścāt tu padbhyāṃ śūdro vinirmitaḥa brāhmaṇo jātamātras tu pṛthivīm anvajāyatac īśvaraḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ dharmakośasya guptayed sarvasvaṃ brāhmaṇasyedaṃ yat kiṃ cid iha dṛśyated dharmayuktaṃ praśastaṃ ca jagaty asmin nṛpātmajaa tataḥ pṛthivyā goptāraṃ kṣatriyaṃ daṇḍadhāriṇamc dvitīyaṃ varṇam akarot prajānām anuguptayea vaiśyas tu dhanadhānyena trīn varṇān bibhṛyād imānc śūdro hy enān paricared iti brahmānuśāsanam aila uvācaa
