śreṣṭhaś ca vai dvijaḥa patyabhāve yathā strī hi devaraṃ kurute patimc ānantaryāt tathā kṣatraṃ pṛthivī kurute patima eṣa te prathamaḥ kalpa āpady anyo bhaved ataḥc yadi svarge paraṃ sthānaṃ dharmataḥ parimārgasia yaḥ kaś cid vijayed bhūmiṃ brāhmaṇāya nivedayetc śrutavṛttopapannāya dharmajñāya tapasvinea svadharmaparitṛptāya yo na vittaparo bhavetc yo rājānaṃ nayed buddhyā sarvataḥ paripūrṇayāa brāhmaṇo hi kule jātaḥ kṛtaprajño vinītavākc śreyo nayati rājānaṃ bruvaṃś citrāṃ sarasvatīma rājā carati yaṃ dharmaṃ brāhmaṇena nidarśitamc śuśrūṣur anahaṃvādī kṣatradharmavrate sthitaḥa tāvatā sa kṛtaprajñaś ciraṃ yaśasi tiṣṭhatic tasya dharmasya sarvasya bhāgī rājapurohitaḥa evam eva prajāḥ sarvā rājānam abhisaṃśritāḥb brāhmaṇaṃ ca suvidvāṃsaṃ rājaśāstravipaścitamc samyagvṛttāḥ svadharmasthā na kutaś cid bhayānvitāḥa rāṣṭre caranti yaṃ dharmaṃ rājñā sādhv abhirakṣitāḥc caturthaṃ tasya dharmasya rājā bhāgaṃ sa vindatia devā manuṣyāḥ pitaro gandharvoragarākṣasāḥc yajñam evopajīvanti nāsti ceṣṭam arājakea ito dattena jīvanti devatāḥ pitaras tathāc rājany evāsya dharmasya yogakṣemaḥ pratiṣṭhitaḥa chāyāyām apsu vāyau ca sukham uṣṇe dhigacchatic agnau vāsasi sūrye ca sukhaṃ śīte dhigacchatia śabde sparśe rase rūpe gandhe ca ramate manaḥc teṣu bhogeṣu sarveṣu nabhīto labhate sukhama abhayasyaiva yo dātā tasyaiva sumahat phalamc na hi prāṇasamaṃ dānaṃ triṣu lokeṣu vidyatea indro rājā yamo rājā dharmo rājā tathaiva cac rājā bibharti rūpāṇi rājñā sarvam idaṃ dhṛtam yudhiṣṭhira uvāca rājñā purohitaḥ kāryaḥ kīdṛśo varṇato bhavet bhīṣma uvāca purodhā yādṛśaḥ kāryaḥ kathayasva pitāmaha gauro vā lohito vāpi śyāmo vā nīrujaḥ sukhī akrodhano nacapalaḥ sarvataś ca jitendriyaḥ bhīṣma uvācaa rājñā purohitaḥ kāryo bhaved vidvān bahuśrutaḥc ubhau samīkṣya dharmārthāv aprameyāv anantarama dharmātmā dharmavid yeṣāṃ rājñāṃ rājan purohitaḥb teṣām arthaś ca kāmaś ca dharmaś ceti viniścayaḥb ślokāṃś cośanasā gītāṃs tān nibodha yudhiṣṭhiraḥb ucchiṣṭaḥ sa bhaved rājā yasya nāsti purohitaḥb rakṣasām asurāṇāṃ ca piśācoragapakṣiṇāmb śatrūṇāṃ ca bhaved vadhyo yasya nāsti purohitaḥb brahmatvaṃ sarvayajñeṣu kurvītātharvaṇo dvijaḥb rājñaś cātharvavedena sarvakarmāṇi kārayetb brūyād garhyāṇi satataṃ mahotpātāny aghāni cab iṣṭamaṅgalayuktāni tathāntaḥpurakāṇi cab gītanṛttādhikāreṣu saṃmateṣu mahīpateḥb kartavyaṃ karaṇīyāni vaiśvadevabalī tathāb pakṣasaṃdhiṣu kurvīta mahāśāntiṃ purohitaḥb raudrahomasahasraṃ ca svasya rājñaḥ priyaṃ hitamb rājñaḥ pāpamalāḥ sapta yān ṛcchati purohitaḥb amātyāś ca kukarmāṇo mantriṇaś cāpy upekṣakāḥb cauryam avyavahāraṃ ca vyavahāropasevināmb adaṇḍyadaṇḍanaṃ caiva daṇḍyānāṃ cāpy adaṇḍanamb hiṃsā cānyatra saṃgrāmād yajñāc ca mala ucyateb kubhṛtyais tu prajānāśaḥ saptamas tu mahāmalaḥb raudrair homair mahāśāntyā ghṛtakambalakarmaṇāb bhṛgvaṅgiro vidhijño vai purodhā nirṇuden malānb etān hitvā divaṃ yāti rājā sapta mahāmalānb sāmātyaḥ sapurodhāś ca prajānāṃ pālane rataḥb etasminn eva kauravya paurohitye mahāmateb ślokān āha surendrasya gurur devo bṛhaspatiḥb tān nibodha mahābhāga mahīpālahitāñ śubhānb ṛgvede sāmavede ca yajurvede ca vājināmb na nirdiṣṭāni karmāṇi triṣu sthāneṣu bhūbhṛtāmb śāntikaṃ pauṣṭikaṃ caiva aniṣṭānāṃ ca śātanamb śaptās te yājñavalkyena yajñānāṃ hitam īhatāb brahmiṣṭhānāṃ variṣṭhena brahmaṇaḥ saṃmate vibhoḥb bahvṛcaṃ sāmagaṃ caiva vājinaṃ ca vivarjayetb bahvṛco rāṣṭranāśāya rājanāśāya sāmagaḥb adhvaryur balanāśāya prokto vājasaneyakaḥb abrāhmaṇeṣu varṇeṣu mantrān vājasaneyakānb śāntike pauṣṭike caiva nityaṃ karmaṇi varjayetb brāhmaṇasya mahīpasya sarvathā na virodhinaḥb vedāś catvāra ity ete brāhmaṇā ye ca tad viduḥb paurohitye pramāṇaṃ tu brāhmaṇaś ca mahīpateb jātyā na kṣatriyaḥ proktaḥ kṣatatrāṇaṃ karoti yaḥb cāturvarṇyabahiṣṭho pi sa eva kṣatriyaḥ smṛtaḥb bhārgavāṅgirasair mantrais teṣāṃ karma vidhīyateb vaitānaṃ karma yac caiva gṛhyakarma ca yat smṛtamb dvijātīnāṃ trayāṇāṃ tu sarvakarma vidhīyateb rājadharmapravṛttānāṃ hitārthaṃ trīṇi kārayetb śāntikaṃ pauṣṭikaṃ caiva tathābhicaraṇaṃ ca yatb agniṣṭomamukhair yajñair dūṣitā bhūpakarmabhiḥb na samyak phalam icchanti ye yajanti dvijātayaḥb paurohityaṃ hi kurvāṇā nāśaṃ yāsyanti bhūbhṛtāmb yajñakarmāṇi kurvāṇā ṛtvijas tu virodhinaḥb brahmakṣatraviśaḥ sarve paurohitye vivarjitāḥb tadabhāve ca pārakyaṃ nirdiṣṭaṃ rājakarmasub ṛṣiṇā yājñavalkyena tat tathā na tad anyathāb bhārgavāṅgirasāṃ vede kṛtavidyaḥ ṣaḍaṅgavitb yajñakarmavidhijñaś ca vidhijñaḥ pauṣṭikeṣu cab aṣṭādaśavikalpānāṃ vidhijñaḥ śāntikarmaṇāmb sarvarogavihīnaś ca saṃyataḥ saṃyatendriyaḥb śvitrakuṣṭhakṣayakṣīṇair grahāpasmāradūṣitaiḥb aśastair vātaduṣṭaiś ca dūrasthaiḥ saṃvaden nṛpaḥb rogiṇaṃ tv ṛtvijaṃ caiva varjayec ca purohitamb na cānyasya kṛtaṃ yena paurohityaṃ kadā canab yasya yājyo mṛtaś caiva bhraṣṭaḥ pravrajito tha vāb yuddhe parājitaś caiva sarvāṃs tān varjayen nṛpaḥb nakṣatrasyānukūlyena yaḥ saṃjāto nareśvaraḥb rājaśāstravinītaś ca śreyān rājñaḥ purohitaḥb adhanyānāṃ nimittānām utpātānām athārthavitb śatrupakṣakṣayajñaś ca śreyān rājñaḥ purohitaḥb vājinaṃ tadabhāve ca carakādhvaryavān athab bahvṛcaṃ sāmagaṃ caiva nītiśāstrakṛtaśramānb kṛtino tharvaṇe vede sthāpayet tu purohitānb hiṃsāliṅgā hi nirdiṣṭā mantrā vaitānikair dvijaiḥb na tān uccārayet prājñaḥ kṣātradharmavirodhinaḥb prajāguṇaḥ purodhāś ca purohitaguṇāḥ prajāḥc rājā caivaṃ guṇo yeṣāṃ kuśalaṃ teṣu sarvaśaḥa ubhau prajā vardhayato devān pūrvān parān pitṝnc yau sameyāsthitau dharme śraddheyau sutapasvinaua parasparasya suhṛdau saṃmatau samacetasauc brahmakṣatrasya saṃmānāt prajāḥ sukham avāpnuyuḥa vimānanāt tayor eva prajā naśyeyur eva hac brahmakṣatraṃ hi sarveṣāṃ dharmāṇāṃ mūlam ucyatea atrāpy udāharantīmam itihāsaṃ purātanamc ailakaśyapasaṃvādaṃ taṃ nibodha yudhiṣṭhira aila uvācaa yadā hi brahma prajahāti kṣatraṃkṣatraṃ yadā vā prajahāti brahmac anvag balaṃ katame smin bhajantetathābalyaṃ katame smin viyanti kaśyapa uvācaa vyṛddhaṃ rāṣṭraṃ bhavati kṣatriyasyabrahma kṣatraṃ yatra virudhyate hac anvag balaṃ dasyavas tad bhajantebalyaṃ tathā tatra viyanti santaḥa naiṣām ukṣā vardhate nota usrāna gargaro mathyate no yajantec naiṣāṃ putrā vedam adhīyate cayadā brahma kṣatriyāḥ saṃtyajantia naiṣām ukṣā vardhate jātu gehenādhīyate saprajā no yajantec apadhvastā dasyubhūtā bhavantiye brāhmaṇāḥ kṣatriyān saṃtyajantia etau hi nityasaṃyuktāv itaretaradhāraṇec kṣatraṃ hi brahmaṇo yonir yoniḥ kṣatrasya ca dvijāḥa ubhāv etau nityam abhiprapannausaṃprāpatur mahatīṃ śrīpratiṣṭhāmc tayoḥ saṃdhir bhidyate cet purāṇastataḥ sarvaṃ bhavati hi saṃpramūḍhama nātra plavaṃ labhate pāragāmīmahāgādhe naur iva saṃpraṇunnāc cāturvarṇyaṃ bhavati ca saṃpramūḍhaṃtataḥ prajāḥ kṣayasaṃsthā bhavantia brahmavṛkṣo rakṣyamāṇo madhu hema ca varṣatic arakṣyamāṇaḥ satatam aśru pāpaṃ ca varṣatia abrahmacārī caraṇād apetoyadā brahmā brahmaṇi trāṇam icchetc āścaryaśo varṣati tatra devastatrābhīkṣṇaṃ duḥsahāś cāviśantia striyaṃ hatvā brāhmaṇaṃ vāpi pāpaḥsabhāyāṃ yatra labhate nuvādamc rājñaḥ sakāśe na bibheti cāpitato bhayaṃ jāyate kṣatriyasyaa pāpaiḥ pāpe kriyamāṇe tivelaṃtato rudro jāyate deva eṣaḥc pāpaiḥ pāpāḥ saṃjanayanti rudraṃtataḥ sarvān sādhvasādhūn hinasti aila uvācaa kuto rudraḥ kīdṛśo vāpi rudraḥsattvaiḥ sattvaṃ dṛśyate vadhyamānamc etad vidvan kaśyapa me pracakṣvayato rudro jāyate deva eṣaḥ kaśyapa uvācaa ātmā rudro hṛdaye mānavānāṃsvaṃ svaṃ dehaṃ paradehaṃ ca hantic vātotpātaiḥ sadṛśaṃ rudram āhurdāvair jīmūtaiḥ sadṛśaṃ rūpam asya aila uvācaa na vai vātaṃ parivṛnoti kaś cinna jīmūto varṣati naiva dāvaḥc tathāyukto dṛśyate mānaveṣukāmadveṣād badhyate mucyate ca kaśyapa uvācaa yathaikagehe jātavedāḥ pradīptaḥkṛtsnaṃ grāmaṃ pradahet sa tvarāvānc vimohanaṃ kurute deva eṣatataḥ sarvaṃ spṛśyate puṇyapāpaiḥ aila uvācaa yadi daṇḍaḥ spṛśate puṇyabhājaṃpāpaiḥ pāpe kriyamāṇe viśeṣātc kasya hetoḥ sukṛtaṃ nāma kuryādduṣkṛtaṃ vā kasya hetor na kuryāt kaśyapa uvācaa asaṃtyāgāt pāpakṛtām apāpāṃstulyo daṇḍaḥ spṛśate miśrabhāvātc śuṣkeṇārdraṃ dahyate miśrabhāvānna miśraḥ syāt pāpakṛdbhiḥ kathaṃ cit aila uvācaa sādhvasādhūn dhārayatīha bhūmiḥsādhvasādhūṃs tāpayatīha sūryaḥc sādhvasādhūn vātayatīha vāyurāpas tathā sādhvasādhūn vahanti kaśyapa uvācaa evam asmin vartate loka evanāmutraivaṃ vartate rājaputrac pretyaitayor antaravān viśeṣoyo vai puṇyaṃ carate yaś ca pāpama puṇyasya loko madhumān ghṛtārcirhiraṇyajyotir amṛtasya nābhiḥc tatra pretya modate brahmacārīna tatra mṛtyur na jarā nota duḥkhama pāpasya loko nirayo prakāśonityaṃ duḥkhaḥ śokabhūyiṣṭha evac tatrātmānaṃ śocate pāpakarmābahvīḥ samāḥ prapatann apratiṣṭhaḥa mitho bhedād brāhmaṇakṣatriyāṇāṃprajā duḥkhaṃ duḥsahaṃ cāviśantic evaṃ jñātvā kārya eveha vidvānpurohito naikavidyo nṛpeṇaa taṃ caivānvabhiṣicyeta tathā dharmo vidhīyatec agryo hi brāhmaṇaḥ proktaḥ sarvasyaiveha dharmataḥa pūrvaṃ hi brāhmaṇāḥ sṛṣṭā iti dharmavido viduḥc jyeṣṭhenābhijanenāsya prāptaṃ sarvaṃ yad uttarama tasmān mānyaś ca pūjyaś ca brāhmaṇaḥ prasṛtāgrabhukc sarvaṃ śreṣṭhaṃ variṣṭhaṃ ca nivedyaṃ tasya dharmataḥa avaśyam etat kartavyaṃ rājñā balavatāpi hic brahma vardhayati kṣatraṃ kṣatrato brahma vardhated evaṃ rājñā viśeṣeṇa pūjyā vai brāhmaṇāḥ sadād rājñaḥ sarvasya cānyasya svāmī rājapurohitaḥ bhīṣma uvācaa yogakṣemo hi rāṣṭrasya rājanyāyatta ucyatec yogakṣemaś ca rājño pi samāyattaḥ purohited yudhiṣṭhira uvācad brahmakṣatrasya sāmarthyaṃ kathitaṃ te pitāmahad purohitaprabhāvaś ca lakṣaṇaṃ ca purodhasaḥd idānīṃ śrotum icchāmi brahmakṣatravinirṇayamd brahmakṣatraṃ hi sarvasya kāraṇaṃ jagataḥ paramd yogakṣemo hi rāṣṭrasya tābhyām āyatta eva hia yatādṛṣṭaṃ bhayaṃ brahma prajānāṃ śamayaty utac dṛṣṭaṃ ca rājā bāhubhyāṃ tad rāṣṭraṃ sukham edhatea atrāpy udāharantīmam itihāsaṃ purātanamc mucukundasya saṃvādaṃ rājño vaiśravaṇasya caa mucukundo vijityemāṃ pṛthivīṃ pṛthivīpatiḥc jijñāsamānaḥ svabalam abhyayād alakādhipama tato vaiśravaṇo rājā rakṣāṃsi samavāsṛjatc te balāny avamṛdnantaḥ prācaraṃs tasya nairṛtāḥa sa hanyamāne sainye sve mucukundo narādhipaḥc garhayām āsa vidvāṃsaṃ purohitam ariṃdamaḥa tata ugraṃ tapas taptvā vasiṣṭho brahmavittamaḥc rakṣāṃsy apāvadhīt tatra panthānaṃ cāpy avindataa tato vaiśravaṇo rājā mucukundam adarśayatc vadhyamāneṣu sainyeṣu vacanaṃ cedam abravīta tvatto hi balinaḥ pūrve rājānaḥ sapurohitāḥc na caivaṃ samavartaṃs te yathā tvam iha vartasea te khalv api kṛtāstrāś ca balavantaś ca bhūmipāḥc āgamya paryupāsante mām īśaṃ sukhaduḥkhayoḥa yady asti bāhuvīryaṃ te tad darśayitum arhasic kiṃ brāhmaṇabalena tvam atimātraṃ pravartasea mucukundas tataḥ kruddhaḥ pratyuvāca dhaneśvaramc nyāyapūrvam asaṃrabdham asaṃbhrāntam idaṃ vacaḥa brahmakṣatram idaṃ sṛṣṭam ekayoni svayaṃbhuvāc pṛthag balavidhānaṃ ca tal lokaṃ parirakṣatia tapomantrabalaṃ nityaṃ brāhmaṇeṣu pratiṣṭhitamc astrabāhubalaṃ nityaṃ kṣatriyeṣu pratiṣṭhitama tābhyāṃ saṃbhūya kartavyaṃ prajānāṃ paripālanamc tathā ca māṃ pravartantaṃ garhayasy alakādhipaa tato bravīd vaiśravaṇo rājānaṃ sapurohitamc nāhaṃ rājyam anirdiṣṭaṃ kasmai cid vidadhāmy utaa nācchinde cāpi nirdiṣṭam iti jānīhi pārthivac praśādhi pṛthivīṃ vīra maddattām akhilām imāmd evam uktaḥ pratyuvāca mucukundo mahīpatiḥ mucukunda uvācaa nāhaṃ rājyaṃ bhavaddattaṃ bhoktum icchāmi pārthivac bāhuvīryārjitaṃ rājyam aśnīyām iti kāmaye bhīṣma uvācaa tato vaiśravaṇo rājā vismayaṃ paramaṃ yayauc kṣatradharme sthitaṃ dṛṣṭvā mucukundam asaṃbhramama tato rājā mucukundaḥ so nvaśāsad vasuṃdharāmc bāhuvīryārjitāṃ samyak kṣatradharmam anuvrataḥa evaṃ yo brahmavid rājā brahmapūrvaṃ pravartatec jayaty avijitām urvīṃ yaśaś ca mahad aśnutea nityodako brāhmaṇaḥ syān nityaśastraś ca kṣatriyaḥc tayor hi sarvam āyattaṃ yat kiṃ cij jagatīgatamd yaśaś ca tejaś ca mahīṃ ca kṛtsnāṃd prāpnoti rājan vipulāṃ ca kīrtimd pradhānadharmaṃ nṛpate niyacchad tathā ca dharmasya caturtham aṃśam yudhiṣṭhira uvācaa yayā vṛttyā mahīpālo vivardhayati mānavānc puṇyāṃś ca lokāñ jayati tan me brūhi pitāmaha bhīṣma uvācaa dānaśīlo bhaved rājā yajñaśīlaś ca bhāratac upavāsatapaḥśīlaḥ prajānāṃ pālane rataḥa sarvāś caiva prajā nityaṃ rājā dharmeṇa pālayetc utthānenāpramādena pūjayec caiva dhārmikāna rājñā hi pūjito dharmas tataḥ sarvatra pūjyatec yad yad ācarate rājā tat prajānāṃ hi rocatea nityam udyatadaṇḍaś ca bhaven mṛtyur ivāriṣuc caturthabhāk tasya prajā dharmeṇa pālayana yad rāṣṭre kuśalaṃ kiṃ cid rājño rakṣayataḥ prajāḥc caturthaṃ tasya pāpasya rājā bhārata vindatia apy āhuḥ sarvam eveti bhūyo rdham iti niścayaḥc karmaṇaḥ pṛthivīpāla nṛśaṃso nṛtavāg apie tādṛśāt kilbiṣād rājā śṛṇu yena pramucyatea pratyāhartum aśakyaṃ syād dhanaṃ corair hṛtaṃ yadic svakośāt tat pradeyaṃ syād aśaktenopajīvatāa sarvavarṇaiḥ sadā rakṣyaṃ brahmasvaṃ brāhmaṇās tathāc na stheyaṃ viṣaye teṣu yo pakuryād dvijātiṣua brahmasve rakṣyamāṇe hi sarvaṃ bhavati rakṣitamc teṣāṃ prasāde nirvṛtte kṛtakṛtyo bhaven nṛpaḥa parjanyam iva bhūtāni mahādrumam iva dvijāḥc narās tam upajīvanti nṛpaṃ sarvārthasādhakama na hi kāmātmanā rājñā satataṃ śaṭhabuddhināc nṛśaṃsenātilubdhena śakyāḥ pālayituṃ prajāḥ yudhiṣṭhira uvācaa nāhaṃ rājyasukhānveṣī rājyam icchāmy api kṣaṇamc dharmārthaṃ rocaye rājyaṃ dharmaś cātra na vidyatea tad alaṃ mama rājyena yatra dharmo na vidyatec vanam eva gamiṣyāmi tasmād dharmacikīrṣayāa tatra medhyeṣv araṇyeṣu nyastadaṇḍo jitendriyaḥc dharmam ārādhayiṣyāmi munir mūlaphalāśanaḥ bhīṣma uvācaa vedāhaṃ tava yā buddhir ānṛśaṃsyaguṇaiva sāc na ca śuddhānṛśaṃsyena śakyaṃ mahad upāsituma api tu tvā mṛduṃ dāntam atyāryam atidhārmikamc klībaṃ dharmaghṛṇāyuktaṃ na loko bahu manyatea rājadharmān avekṣasva pitṛpaitāmahocitānc naitad rājñām atho vṛttaṃ yathā tvaṃ sthātum icchasia na hi vaiklavyasaṃsṛṣṭam ānṛśaṃsyam ihāsthitaḥc prajāpālanasaṃbhūtaṃ prāptā dharmaphalaṃ hy asia na hy etām āśiṣaṃ pāṇḍur na ca kunty anvayācatab vicitravīryo dharmātmā citravīryo na pārthivaḥb śaṃtanuś ca mahīpālaḥ sarvakṣatrasya pūjitaḥc na caitāṃ prājñatāṃ tāta yayā carasi medhayāa śauryaṃ balaṃ ca sattvaṃ ca pitā tava sadābravītc māhātmyaṃ balam audāryaṃ tava kunty anvayācataa nityaṃ svāhā svadhā nityam ubhe mānuṣadaivatec putreṣv āśāsate nityaṃ pitaro daivatāni caa dānam adhyayanaṃ yajñaḥ prajānāṃ paripālanamc dharmam etam adharmaṃ vā janmanaivābhyajāyithāḥa kāle dhuri niyuktānāṃ vahatāṃ bhāra āhitec sīdatām api kaunteya na kīrtir avasīdatia samantato viniyato vahaty askhalito hi yaḥc nirdoṣakarmavacanāt siddhiḥ karmaṇa eva sāa naikāntavinipātena vicacāreha kaś canac dharmī gṛhī vā rājā vā brahmacāry atha vā punaḥa alpaṃ tu sādhubhūyiṣṭhaṃ yat karmodāram eva tatc kṛtam evākṛtāc chreyo na pāpīyo sty akarmaṇaḥa yadā kulīno dharmajñaḥ prāpnoty aiśvaryam uttamamc yogakṣemas tadā rājan kuśalāyaiva kalpatea dānenānyaṃ balenānyam anyaṃ sūnṛtayā girāc sarvataḥ parigṛhṇīyād rājyaṃ prāpyeha dhārmikaḥa yaṃ hi vaidyāḥ kule jātā avṛttibhayapīḍitāḥc prāpya tṛptāḥ pratiṣṭhanti dharmaḥ ko bhyadhikas tataḥ yudhiṣṭhira uvācaa kiṃ nv ataḥ paramaṃ svargyaṃ kā nv ataḥ prītir uttamāc kiṃ nv ataḥ paramaiśvaryaṃ brūhi me yadi manyase bhīṣma uvācaa yasmin pratiṣṭhitāḥ samyak kṣemaṃ vindanti tatkṣaṇamc sa svargajittamo smākaṃ satyam etad bravīmi tea tvam eva prītimāṃs tasmāt kurūṇāṃ kurusattamac bhava rājā jaya svargaṃ sato rakṣāsato jahia anu tvā tāta jīvantu suhṛdaḥ sādhubhiḥ sahac parjanyam iva bhūtāni svādudrumam ivāṇḍajāḥa dhṛṣṭaṃ śūraṃ prahartāram anṛśaṃsaṃ jitendriyamc vatsalaṃ saṃvibhaktāram anu jīvantu tvāṃ janāḥ yudhiṣṭhira uvācaa svakarmaṇy apare yuktās tathaivānye vikarmaṇic teṣāṃ viśeṣam ācakṣva brāhmaṇānāṃ pitāmaha bhīṣma uvācaa vidyālakṣaṇasaṃpannāḥ sarvatrāmnāyadarśinaḥc ete brahmasamā rājan brāhmaṇāḥ parikīrtitāḥa ṛtvigācāryasaṃpannāḥ sveṣu karmasv avasthitāḥc ete devasamā rājan brāhmaṇānāṃ bhavanty utaa ṛtvik purohito mantrī dūto thārthānuśāsakaḥc ete kṣatrasamā rājan brāhmaṇānāṃ bhavanty utad gojāvimahiṣāṇāṃ ca vaḍavānāṃ ca poṣakāḥd vṛttyartham abhipadyante tān vaiśyān saṃpracakṣated aiśvaryakāmā ye cāpi sāmiṣārthāś ca bhāratad nigrahānugraharatāṃs tān dvijān kṣatriyān viduḥa aśvārohā gajārohā rathino tha padātayaḥc ete vaiśyasamā rājan brāhmaṇānāṃ bhavanty utad mlecchadeśās tu ye ke cit pāpair adhyuṣitā naraiḥd gatvā tu brāhmaṇas tāṃś ca caṇḍālaḥ pretya ceha cad vrātyān mlecchāṃś ca śūdrāṃś ca yājayitvā dvijādhamaḥd akīrtim iha saṃprāpya narakaṃ pratipadyated mahāvṛndasamudrābhyāṃ paryāyeṇaikaviṃśatimd brāhmaṇo ṛgyajuḥsāmnāṃ mūḍhaḥ kṛtvā tu viplavamd kalpam ekaṃ kṛmiḥ so tha nānāviṣṭhāsu jāyated vrātye mlecche tathā śūdre taskare patite śucaud kudeśe ca surāpe ca brahmaghne vṛṣalīpataud anadhītiṣu sarvatra bhuñjāne yatra tatra vād bālastrīvṛddhahantuś ca mātāpitror guros tathād mitradruhi kṛtaghne ca goghne caiva kathaṃ canad putraghātini śatrau ca na mantrān yojayed dvijaḥd sa teṣāṃ viplavaḥ prokto mantravidbhiḥ sanātanaiḥd yadi vipro videśasthas tīrthayātrāṃ gato tha vād yadi bhītaḥ prapanno vā kudeśaṃ śaucavarjitamd susaṃyataḥ śucir bhūtvā mantrān uccārayed dvijaḥd ārtaś coccārayen mantram ārtatrāṇaparo tha vād hīneṣv api prayuñjāno nāsau viplāvakaḥ smṛtaḥd krūrakarmā sukarmā vā karmabhir vañcito tha vād tattvavittarate pāpaṃ śīlavān saṃyatendriyaḥa janmakarmavihīnā ye kadaryā brahmabandhavaḥc ete śūdrasamā rājan brāhmaṇānāṃ bhavanty utaa aśrotriyāḥ sarva eva sarve cānāhitāgnayaḥc tān sarvān dhārmiko rājā baliṃ viṣṭiṃ ca kārayeta āhvāyakā devalakā nakṣatragrāmayājakāḥc ete brāhmaṇacaṇḍālā mahāpathikapañcamāḥa etebhyo balim ādadyād dhīnakośo mahīpatiḥc ṛte brahmasamebhyaś ca devakalpebhya eva caa abrāhmaṇānāṃ vittasya svāmī rājeti vaidikamc brāhmaṇānāṃ ca ye ke cid vikarmasthā bhavanty utad prāg uktāṃś cāpy anuktāṃś ca sarvāṃs tān dāpayet karāna vikarmasthās tu nopekṣyā jātu rājñā kathaṃ canac niyamyāḥ saṃvibhajyāś ca dharmānugrahakāmyayāa yasya sma viṣaye rājñaḥ steno bhavati vai dvijaḥc rājña evāparādhaṃ taṃ manyante tadvido janāḥa avṛttyā yo bhavet steno vedavit snātakas tathāc rājan sa rājñā bhartavya iti dharmavido viduḥa sa cen no parivarteta kṛtavṛttiḥ paraṃtapac tato nirvāsanīyaḥ syāt tasmād deśāt sabāndhavaḥd yajñaḥ śrutam apaiśunyam ahiṃsātithipūjanamd damaḥ satyaṃ tapo dānam etad brāhmaṇalakṣaṇam yudhiṣṭhira uvācaa keṣāṃ rājā prabhavati vittasya bharatarṣabhac kayā ca vṛttyā varteta tan me brūhi pitāmaha bhīṣma uvācaa abrāhmaṇānāṃ vittasya svāmī rājeti vaidikamc brāhmaṇānāṃ ca ye ke cid vikarmasthā bhavanty utaa vikarmasthāś ca nopekṣyā viprā rājñā kathaṃ canac iti rājñāṃ purāvṛttam abhijalpanti sādhavaḥa yasya sma viṣaye rājñaḥ steno bhavati vai dvijaḥc rājña evāparādhaṃ taṃ manyante kilbiṣaṃ nṛpaa abhiśastam ivātmānaṃ manyante tena karmaṇāc tasmād rājarṣayaḥ sarve brāhmaṇān anvapālayana atrāpy udāharantīmam itihāsaṃ purātanamc gītaṃ kekayarājena hriyamāṇena rakṣasāa kekayānām adhipatiṃ rakṣo jagrāha dāruṇamc svādhyāyenānvitaṃ rājann araṇye saṃśitavratam rājovācaa na me steno janapade na kadaryo na madyapaḥc nānāhitāgnir nāyajvā māmakāntaram āviśaḥa na ca me brāhmaṇo vidvān nāvratī nāpy asomapaḥc nānāhitāgnir viṣaye māmakāntaram āviśaḥa nānāptadakṣiṇair yajñair yajante viṣaye mamac adhīte nāvratī kaś cin māmakāntaram āviśaḥa adhīyate dhyāpayanti yajante yājayanti cac dadati pratigṛhṇanti ṣaṭsu karmasv avasthitāḥa pūjitāḥ saṃvibhaktāś ca mṛdavaḥ satyavādinaḥc brāhmaṇā me svakarmasthā māmakāntaram āviśaḥa na yācante prayacchanti satyadharmaviśāradāḥc nādhyāpayanty adhīyante yajante na ca yājakāḥa brāhmaṇān parirakṣanti saṃgrāmeṣv apalāyinaḥc kṣatriyā me svakarmasthā māmakāntaram āviśaḥa kṛṣigorakṣavāṇijyam upajīvanty amāyayāc apramattāḥ kriyāvantaḥ suvratāḥ satyavādinaḥa saṃvibhāgaṃ damaṃ śaucaṃ sauhṛdaṃ ca vyapāśritāḥc mama vaiśyāḥ svakarmasthā māmakāntaram āviśaḥa trīn varṇān anutiṣṭhanti yathāvad anasūyakāḥc mama śūdrāḥ svakarmasthā māmakāntaram āviśaḥa kṛpaṇānāthavṛddhānāṃ durbalāturayoṣitāmc saṃvibhaktāsmi sarveṣāṃ māmakāntaram āviśaḥa kuladeśādidharmāṇāṃ prathitānāṃ yathāvidhic avyucchettāsmi sarveṣāṃ māmakāntaram āviśaḥa tapasvino me viṣaye pūjitāḥ paripālitāḥc saṃvibhaktāś ca satkṛtya māmakāntaram āviśaḥa nāsaṃvibhajya bhoktāsmi na viśāmi parastriyamc svatantro jātu na krīḍe māmakāntaram āviśaḥa nābrahmacārī bhikṣāvān bhikṣur vābrahmacārikaḥc anṛtvijaṃ hutaṃ nāsti māmakāntaram āviśaḥd kṛtaṃ rājyaṃ mayā sarvaṃ rājyasthenāpi kāryavatd nāhaṃ vyutkrāmitaḥ satyān māmakāntaram ābibhaḥa nāvajānāmy ahaṃ vṛddhān na vaidyān na tapasvinaḥc rāṣṭre svapati jāgarmi māmakāntaram āviśaḥd śuklakarmāsmi sarvatra na durgatibhayaṃ mamad dharmacārī gṛhasthaś ca māmakāntaram ābibhaḥa vedādhyayanasaṃpannas tapasvī sarvadharmavitc svāmī sarvasya rājyasya śrīmān mama purohitaḥa dānena divyān abhivāñchāmi lokānsatyenātho brāhmaṇānāṃ ca guptyāc śuśrūṣayā cāpi gurūn upaimina me bhayaṃ vidyate rākṣasebhyaḥa na me rāṣṭre vidhavā brahmabandhurna brāhmaṇaḥ kṛpaṇo nota coraḥc na pārajāyī na ca pāpakarmāna me bhayaṃ vidyate rākṣasebhyaḥa na me śastrair anirbhinnam aṅge dvyaṅgulam antaramc dharmārthaṃ yudhyamānasya māmakāntaram āviśaḥa gobrāhmaṇe ca yajñe ca nityaṃ svastyayanaṃ mamac āśāsate janā rāṣṭre māmakāntaram āviśaḥ rākṣasa uvāca nārīṇāṃ vyabhicārāc ca anyāyāc ca mahīkṣitām viprāṇāṃ karmadoṣāc ca prajānāṃ jāyate bhayam avṛṣṭir mārako rogaḥ satataṃ kṣudbhayāni ca vigrahaś ca sadā tasmin deśe bhavati dāruṇaḥ yakṣarakṣaḥpiśācebhyo nāsurebhyaḥ kathaṃ cana bhayam utpadyate tatra yatra viprāḥ susaṃyatāḥ gandharvāpsarasaḥsiddhāḥ pannagāś ca sarīsṛpāḥ mānavān na jighāṃsanti yatra nāryaḥ pativratāḥ brāhmaṇāḥ kṣatriyā vaiśyā yatra śūdrāś ca dhārmikāḥ nānāvṛṣṭibhayaṃ tatra na durbhikṣaṃ na vibhramaḥ dhārmiko yatra bhūpālo na tatrāsti parābhavaḥ utpātā na ca dṛśyante na divyā na ca mānuṣāḥa yasmāt sarvāsv avasthāsu dharmam evānvavekṣasec tasmāt prāpnuhi kaikeya gṛhān svasti vrajāmy ahama yeṣāṃ gobrāhmaṇā rakṣyāḥ prajā rakṣyāś ca kekayac na rakṣobhyo bhayaṃ teṣāṃ kuta eva tu mānuṣāta yeṣāṃ purogamā viprā yeṣāṃ brahmabalaṃ balamc priyātithyās tathā dārās te vai svargajito narāḥ bhīṣma uvācaa tasmād dvijātīn rakṣeta te hi rakṣanti rakṣitāḥc āśīr eṣāṃ bhaved rājñāṃ rāṣṭraṃ samyak pravardhatea tasmād rājñā viśeṣeṇa vikarmasthā dvijātayaḥc niyamyāḥ saṃvibhajyāś ca prajānugrahakāraṇāta ya evaṃ vartate rājā paurajānapadeṣv ihac anubhūyeha bhadrāṇi prāpnotīndrasalokatām yudhiṣṭhira uvācaa vyākhyātā kṣatradharmeṇa vṛttir āpatsu bhāratac kathaṃ cid vaiśyadharmeṇa jīved vā brāhmaṇo na vā bhīṣma uvācaa aśaktaḥ kṣatradharmeṇa vaiśyadharmeṇa vartayetc kṛṣigorakṣam āsthāya vyasane vṛttisaṃkṣaye yudhiṣṭhira uvācaa kāni paṇyāni vikrīṇan svargalokān na hīyatec brāhmaṇo vaiśyadharmeṇa vartayan bharatarṣabha bhīṣma uvācaa surā lavaṇam ity eva tilān kesariṇaḥ paśūnc ṛṣabhān madhu māṃsaṃ ca kṛtānnaṃ ca yudhiṣṭhiraa sarvāsv avasthāsv etāni brāhmaṇaḥ parivarjayetc eteṣāṃ vikrayāt tāta brāhmaṇo narakaṃ vrajeta ajo gnir varuṇo meṣaḥ sūryo śvaḥ pṛthivī virāṭc dhenur yajñaś ca somaś ca na vikreyāḥ kathaṃ canaa pakvenāmasya nimayaṃ na praśaṃsanti sādhavaḥc nimayet pakvam āmena bhojanārthāya bhārataa vayaṃ siddham aśiṣyāmo bhavān sādhayatām idamc evaṃ samīkṣya nimayan nādharmo sti kadā canaa atra te vartayiṣyāmi yathā dharmaḥ purātanaḥc vyavahārapravṛttānāṃ tan nibodha yudhiṣṭhiraa bhavate haṃ dadānīdaṃ bhavān etat prayacchatuc rucite vartate dharmo na balāt saṃpravartatea ity evaṃ saṃpravartanta vyavahārāḥ purātanāḥc ṛṣīṇām itareṣāṃ ca sādhu cedam asaṃśayam yudhiṣṭhira uvācaa atha tāta yadā sarvāḥ śastram ādadate prajāḥc vyutkrāmanti svadharmebhyaḥ kṣatrasya kṣīyate balama rājā trātā na loke syāt kiṃ tadā syāt parāyaṇamc etan me saṃśayaṃ brūhi vistareṇa pitāmaha bhīṣma uvācaa dānena tapasā yajñair adroheṇa damena cac brāhmaṇapramukhā varṇāḥ kṣemam iccheyur ātmanaḥa teṣāṃ ye vedabalinas ta utthāya samantataḥc rājño balaṃ vardhayeyur mahendrasyeva devatāḥa rājño hi kṣīyamāṇasya brahmaivāhuḥ parāyaṇamc tasmād brahmabalenaiva samuttheyaṃ vijānatāa yadā tu vijayī rājā kṣemaṃ rāṣṭre bhisaṃdadhetc tadā varṇā yathādharmam āviśeyuḥ svakarmasua unmaryāde pravṛtte tu dasyubhiḥ saṃkare kṛtec sarve varṇā na duṣyeyuḥ śastravanto yudhiṣṭhira yudhiṣṭhira uvācaa atha cet sarvataḥ kṣatraṃ praduṣyed brāhmaṇān pratic kas tasya brāhmaṇas trātā ko dharmaḥ kiṃ parāyaṇam bhīṣma uvācaa tapasā brahmacaryeṇa śastreṇa ca balena cac amāyayā māyayā ca niyantavyaṃ tadā bhaveta kṣatrasyābhipravṛddhasya brāhmaṇeṣu viśeṣataḥc brahmaiva saṃniyantṛ syāt kṣatraṃ hi brahmasaṃbhavama adbhyo gnir brahmataḥ kṣatram aśmano loham utthitamc teṣāṃ sarvatragaṃ tejaḥ svāsu yoniṣu śāmyatia yadā chinatty ayo śmānam agniś cāpo bhipadyatec kṣatraṃ ca brāhmaṇaṃ dveṣṭi tadā śāmyanti te trayaḥa tasmād brahmaṇi śāmyanti kṣatriyāṇāṃ yudhiṣṭhirac samudīrṇāny ajeyāni tejāṃsi ca balāni caa brahmavīrye mṛdūbhūte kṣatravīrye ca durbalec duṣṭeṣu sarvavarṇeṣu brāhmaṇān prati sarvaśaḥa ye tatra yuddhaṃ kurvanti tyaktvā jīvitam ātmanaḥb brāhmaṇān parirakṣanti teṣāṃ lokā bhavanti kec brāhmaṇān parirakṣanto dharmam ātmānam eva caa manasvino manyumantaḥ puṇyalokā bhavanti tec brāhmaṇārthaṃ hi sarveṣāṃ śastragrahaṇam iṣyatea ati sviṣṭasvadhītānāṃ lokān ati tapasvināmc anāśakāgnyor viśatāṃ śūrā yānti parāṃ gatime evam evātmanas tyāgān nānyaṃ dharmaṃ vidur janāḥa tebhyo namaś ca bhadraṃ ca ye śarīrāṇi juhvatic brahmadviṣo niyacchantas teṣāṃ no stu salokatāe brahmalokajitaḥ svargyān vīrāṃs tān manur abravīta yathāśvamedhāvabhṛthe snātāḥ pūtā bhavanty utac duṣkṛtaḥ sukṛtaś caiva tathā śastrahatā raṇea bhavaty adharmo dharmo hi dharmādharmāv ubhāv apic kāraṇād deśakālasya deśakālaḥ sa tādṛśaḥa maitrāḥ nibarhayetc sa eva rājā kartavyas tena sarvam idaṃ dhṛtam yudhiṣṭhira uvācaa kvasamutthāḥ kathaṃśīlā ṛtvijaḥ syuḥ pitāmahac kathaṃvidhāś ca rājendra tad brūhi vadatāṃ vara bhīṣma uvācaa pratikarma purācāra ṛtvijāṃ sma vidhīyatec ādau chandāṃsi vijñāya dvijānāṃ śrutam eva caa ye tv ekaratayo nityaṃ dhīrā nāpriyavādinaḥc parasparasya suhṛdaḥ saṃmatāḥ samadarśinaḥa yeṣv ānṛśaṃsyaṃ satyaṃ cāpy ahiṃsā tapa ārjavamc adroho nābhimānaś ca hrīs titikṣā damaḥ śamaḥd etair eva guṇair yuktāḥ kāryās te ṛtvijaḥ prabhod yasminn etāni dṛśyante sa purohita ucyatea hrīmān satyadhṛtir dānto bhūtānām avihiṃsakaḥc akāmadveṣasaṃyuktas tribhiḥ śuklaiḥ samanvitaḥa ahiṃsako jñānatṛptaḥ sa brahmāsanam arhatic ete mahartvijas tāta sarve mānyā yathātatham yudhiṣṭhira uvācaa yad idaṃ vedavacanaṃ dakṣiṇāsu vidhīyatec idaṃ deyam idaṃ deyaṃ na kva cid vyavatiṣṭhatea nedaṃ prati dhanaṃ śāstram āpaddharmam aśāstrataḥc ājñā śāstrasya ghoreyaṃ na śaktiṃ samavekṣatea śraddhām ārabhya yaṣṭavyam ity eṣā vaidikī śrutiḥc mithyopetasya yajñasya kim u śraddhā kariṣyati bhīṣma uvācaa na vedānāṃ paribhavān na śāṭhyena na māyayāc kaś cin mahad avāpnoti mā te bhūd buddhir īdṛśīa yajñāṅgaṃ dakṣiṇās tāta vedānāṃ śrutiḥc taṃ ca vikretum icchanti na vṛthā vṛttir iṣyatee tena krītena dharmeṇa tato yajñaḥ pratāyatea ity evaṃ dharmataḥ khyātam ṛṣibhir dharmavādibhiḥc pumān yajñaś ca somaś ca nyāyavṛtto yathā tapaḥ pravakṣyāmi vidvaṃs tad api me śṛṇua ahiṃsā satyavacanam ānṛśaṃsyaṃ damo ghṛṇāc etat tapo vidur dhīrā na śarīrasya śoṣaṇama aprāmāṇyaṃ ca vedānāṃ śāstrāṇāṃ cātilaṅghanamc avyavasthā ca sarvatra saṃśayaḥa na hi teṣām ahaṃ drugdhas tat teṣāṃ doṣavad gatamc arer hi durhatād bheyaṃ bhagnapṛṣṭhād ivoragāt rājovācaa bhūyasā paribarheṇa satkāreṇa ca bhūyasāc pūjito brāhmaṇaśreṣṭha bhūyo vasa gṛhe mamaa ye tvāṃ brāhmaṇa necchanti na te vatsyanti me gṛhec bhavataiva hi taj jñeyaṃ yad idānīm anantarama yathā syād duṣkṛto daṇḍo yathā ca sukṛtaṃ kṛtamc tathā samīkṣya bhagavañ śreyase viniyuṅkṣva mām munir uvācaa adarśayann imaṃ doṣam ekaikaṃ durbalaṃ kuruc tataḥ kāraṇam ājñāya puruṣaṃ puruṣaṃ jahia ekadoṣā hi bahavo mṛdnīyur api kaṇṭakānb arthe sarvaṃ jagad baddham arthena ca nibadhyateb arthe darpo manuṣyāṇāṃ tasmād arthaṃ virocayab ekenaikasya doṣeṇa tad viruddhaṃ pracodayab sa tasya doṣān udbhāvya tasyārthaṃ grāhayiṣyatib sāmapūrvaṃ ca keṣāṃ cid bhedena ca parasparamb vairaṃ kāraya bhūpāla paścād daṇḍaṃ prayojayab bilvena ca yathā bilvam ākāraṃ chādya buddhimānb aśuddhaṃ sacivaṃ rājann aśuddhenaiva nāśayac mantrabhedabhayād rājaṃs tasmād etad bravīmi tea vayaṃ tu brāhmaṇā nāma mṛdudaṇḍāḥ kṛpālavaḥc svasti cecchāmi bhavataḥ pareṣāṃ ca yathātmanaḥa rājann ātmānam ācakṣe saṃbandhī bhavato hy ahamc muniḥ kālakavṛkṣīya ity evam abhisaṃjñitaḥa pituḥ sakhā ca bhavataḥ saṃmataḥ satyasaṃgaraḥc vyāpanne bhavato rājye rājan pitari saṃsthitea sarvakāmān parityajya tapas taptaṃ tadā mayāc snehāt tvāṃ prabravīmy etan mā bhūyo vibhramed itia ubhe dṛṣṭvā duḥkhasukhe rājyaṃ prāpya yadṛcchayāc rājyenāmātyasaṃsthena kathaṃ rājan pramādyasi bhīṣma uvācaa tato rājakule nāndī saṃjajñe bhūyasī punaḥc purohitakule caiva saṃprāpte brāhmaṇarṣabhea ekacchatrāṃ mahīṃ kṛtvā kausalyāya yaśasvinec muniḥ kālakavṛkṣīya īje kratubhir uttamaiḥa hitaṃ tad vacanaṃ śrutvā kausalyo nvaśiṣan mahīmc tathā ca kṛtavān rājā yathoktaṃ tena bhārata bhīṣma uvācaa hrīniṣedhāḥ sadā santaḥ satyārjavasamanvitāḥc śaktāḥ kathayituṃ samyak te tava syuḥ sabhāsadaḥd yudhiṣṭhira uvācad sabhāsadaḥ sahāyāś ca suhṛdaś ca viśāṃ pated paricchadās tathāmātyāḥ kīdṛśāḥ syuḥ pitāmahaa atyāḍhyāṃś cātiśūrāṃś ca brāhmaṇāṃś ca bahuśrutānc susaṃtuṣṭāṃś ca kaunteya mahotsāhāṃś ca karmasua etān sahāyāṃl lipsethāḥ sarvāsv āpatsu bhāratac kulīnaḥ pūjito nityaṃ na hi śaktiṃ nigūhatia prasannaṃ hy aprasannaṃ vā pīḍitaṃ hṛtam eva vāc āvartayati bhūyiṣṭhaṃ tad eko hy anupālitaḥa kulīnā deśajāḥ prājñā rūpavanto bahuśrutāḥc pragalbhāś cānuraktāś ca te tava syuḥ paricchadāḥa dauṣkuleyāś ca lubdhāś ca nṛśaṃsā nirapatrapāḥc te tvāṃ tāta niṣeveyur yāvad ārdrakapāṇayaḥa arthamānārghyasatkārair bhogair uccāvacaiḥ priyānc yān arthabhājo manyethās te te syuḥ sukhabhāginaḥa abhinnavṛttā vidvāṃsaḥ sadvṛttāś caritavratāḥc na tvāṃ nityārthino jahyur akṣudrāḥ satyavādinaḥa anāryā ye na jānanti samayaṃ mandacetasaḥb paricchadās tathāmātyā nedṛśāḥ syuḥ kathaṃ canac tebhyaḥ pratijugupsethā jānīyāḥ samayacyutāna naikam icched gaṇaṃ hitvā syāc ced anyataragrahaḥc yas tv eko bahubhiḥ śreyān kāmaṃ tena gaṇaṃ tyajeta śreyaso lakṣaṇaṃ hy etad vikramo yasya dṛśyatec kīrtipradhāno yaś ca syāt samaye yaś ca tiṣṭhatia samarthān pūjayed yaś ca nāspardhyaiḥ spardhate ca yaḥc na ca kāmād bhayāt krodhāl lobhād vā dharmam utsṛjeta amānī satyavāk śakto jitātmā mānyamānitāc sa te mantrasahāyaḥ syāt sarvāvasthaṃ parīkṣitaḥa kulīnaḥ satyasaṃpannas titikṣur dakṣa ātmavānc śūraḥ kṛtajñaḥ satyaś ca śreyasaḥ pārtha lakṣaṇama tasyaivaṃ vartamānasya puruṣasya vijānataḥc amitrāḥ saṃprasīdanti tato mitrībhavanty apia ata ūrdhvam amātyānāṃ parīkṣeta guṇāguṇānc saṃyatātmā kṛtaprajño bhūtikāmaś ca bhūmipaḥa saṃbaddhāḥ puruṣair āptair abhijātaiḥ svadeśajaiḥc ahāryair avyabhīcāraiḥ sarvataḥ suparīkṣitaiḥa yodhāḥ srauvās tathā maulās tathaivānye py avaskṛtāḥc kartavyā bhūtikāmena puruṣeṇa bubhūṣatāa yeṣāṃ vainayikī buddhiḥ prakṛtā caiva śobhanāc tejo dhairyaṃ kṣamā śaucam anurāga sthitir dhṛtiḥa parīkṣitaguṇān nityaṃ prauḍhabhāvān dhuraṃdharānc pañcopadhāvyatītāṃś ca kuryād rājārthakāriṇaḥa paryāptavacanān vīrān pratipattiviśāradānc kulīnān satyasaṃpannān iṅgitajñān aniṣṭhurāna deśakālavidhānajñān bhartṛkāryahitaiṣiṇaḥc nityam artheṣu sarveṣu rājā kurvīta mantriṇaḥa hīnatejā hy asaṃhṛṣṭo naiva jātu vyavasyatic avaśyaṃ janayaty eva sarvakarmasu saṃśayāna evam alpaśruto mantrī kalyāṇābhijano py utac dharmārthakāmayukto pi nālaṃ mantraṃ parīkṣituma tathaivānabhijāto pi kāmam astu bahuśrutaḥc anāyaka ivācakṣur muhyaty ūhyeṣu karmasua yo vā hy asthirasaṃkalpo buddhimān āgatāgamaḥc upāyajño pi nālaṃ sa karma yāpayituṃ cirama kevalāt punar ācārāt karmaṇo nopapadyatec parimarśo viśeṣāṇām aśrutasyeha durmateḥa mantriṇy ananurakte tu viśvāso na hi vidyatec tasmād ananuraktāya naiva mantraṃ prakāśayeta vyathayed dhi sa rājānaṃ mantribhiḥ sahito nṛjuḥc mārutopahatacchidraiḥ praviśyāgnir iva drumama saṃkrudhyaty ekadā svāmī sthānāc caivāpakarṣatic vācā kṣipati saṃrabdhas tataḥ paścāt prasīdatia tāni tāny anuraktena śakyāny anutitikṣitumc mantriṇāṃ ca bhavet krodho visphūrjitam ivāśaneḥa yas tu saṃharate tāni bhartuḥ priyacikīrṣayāc samānasukhaduḥkhaṃ taṃ pṛcched artheṣu mānavama anṛjus tv anurakto pi saṃpannaś cetarair guṇaiḥc rājñaḥ prajñānayukto pi na mantraṃ śrotum arhatia yo mitraiḥ saha saṃbaddho na paurān bahu manyatec sa suhṛt tādṛśo rājño na mantraṃ śrotum arhatia avidvān aśuciḥ stabdhaḥ śatrusevī vikatthanaḥc sa suhṛt krodhano lubdho na mantraṃ śrotum arhatia āgantuś cānurakto pi kāmam astu bahuśrutaḥc satkṛtaḥ saṃvibhakto vā na mantraṃ śrotum arhatid vidharmato viprakṛtaḥ pitā yasyābhavat purād satkṛtaḥ sthāpitaḥ so pi na mantraṃ śrotum arhatia yas tv alpenāpi kāryeṇa sakṛd ākṣārito bhavetc punar anyair guṇair yukto na mantraṃ śrotum arhatia kṛtaprajñaś ca medhāvī budho jānapadaḥ śuciḥc sarvakarmasu yaḥ śuddhaḥ sa mantraṃ śrotum arhatia jñānavijñānasaṃpannaḥ prakṛtijñaḥ parātmanoḥc suhṛd ātmasamo rājñaḥ sa mantraṃ śrotum arhatia satyavāk śīlasaṃpanno gambhīraḥ satrapo mṛduḥc pitṛpaitāmaho yaḥ syāt sa mantraṃ śrotum arhatia saṃtuṣṭaḥ saṃmataḥ satyaḥ śauṭīro dveṣyapāpakaḥc mantravit kālavic chūraḥ sa mantraṃ śrotum arhatia sarvalokaṃ samaṃ śaktaḥ sāntvena kurute vaśec tasmai mantraḥ prayoktavyo daṇḍam ādhitsatā nṛpaa paurajānapadā yasmin viśvāsaṃ dharmato gatāḥc yoddhā nayavipaścic ca sa mantraṃ śrotum arhatia tasmāt sarvair guṇair etair upapannāḥ supūjitāḥc mantriṇaḥ prakṛtijñāḥ syus tryavarā mahad īpsavaḥa svāsu prakṛtiṣu chidraṃ lakṣayeran parasya cac mantriṇo mantramūlaṃ hi rājño rāṣṭraṃ vivardhatea nāsya chidraṃ paraḥ paśyec chidreṣu param anviyātc gūhet kūrma ivāṅgāni rakṣed vivaram ātmanaḥa mantragrāhā hi rājyasya mantriṇo ye manīṣiṇaḥc mantrasaṃhanano rājā mantrāṅgānītaro janaḥa rājyaṃ praṇidhimūlaṃ hi mantrasāraṃ pracakṣatec svāminaṃ tv anuvartanti vṛttyartham iha mantriṇaḥa sa vinīya madakrodhau mānam īrṣyāṃ ca nirvṛtaḥc nityaṃ pañcopadhātītair mantrayet saha mantribhiḥa teṣāṃ parihṛtya mantraṃsaṃmantrayet kāryam ahīnakālam bhīṣma uvācaa atrāpy udāharantīmam itihāsaṃ purātanamc bṛhaspateś ca saṃvādaṃ śakrasya ca yudhiṣṭhira śakra uvācaa kiṃ svid ekapadaṃ brahman puruṣaḥ samyag ācaranc pramāṇaṃ sarvabhūtānāṃ yaśaś caivāpnuyān mahat bṛhaspatir uvācaa sāntvam ekapadaṃ śakra puruṣaḥ samyag ācaranc pramāṇaṃ sarvabhūtānāṃ yaśaś caivāpnuyān mahata etad ekapadaṃ śakra sarvalokasukhāvahamc ācaran sarvabhūteṣu priyo bhavati sarvadāa yo hi nābhāṣate kiṃ cit satataṃ bhrukuṭīmukhaḥc dveṣyo bhavati bhūtānāṃ sa sāntvam iha nācarana yas tu pūrvam abhiprekṣya pūrvam sarvalokam imaṃ śakra sāntvena kurute vaśea tasmāt sāntvaṃ prakartavyaṃ daṇḍam ādhitsatām ihac phalaṃ ca janayaty evaṃ na cāsyodvijate janaḥa sukṛtasya hi sāntvasya ślakṣṇasya madhurasya cac samyag āsevyamānasya tulyaṃ jātu na vidyate bhīṣma uvācaa ity uktaḥ kṛtavān sarvaṃ tathā śakraḥ purodhasāc tathā tvam api kaunteya samyag etat samācara yudhiṣṭhira uvācaa kathaṃ svid iha rājendra pālayan pārthivaḥ prajāḥc prati dharmaṃ viśeṣeṇa kīrtim āpnoti śāśvatīm bhīṣma uvācaa vyavahāreṇa śuddhena prajāpālanatatparaḥc prāpya dharmaṃ ca kīrtiṃ ca lokāv āpnoty ubhau śuciḥ yudhiṣṭhira uvācaa kīdṛśaṃ vyavahāraṃ tu kaiś ca vyavaharen nṛpaḥc etat pṛṣṭo mahāprājña yathāvad vaktum arhasia ye caite pūrvakathitā guṇās te puruṣaṃ pratic naikasmin puruṣe hy ete vidyanta iti me matiḥ bhīṣma uvācaa evam etan mahāprājña yathā vadasi buddhimānc durlabhaḥ puruṣaḥ kaś cid ebhir guṇaguṇair yutaḥa kiṃ tu saṃkṣepataḥ śīlaṃ prayatne neha durlabhamc vakṣyāmi tu yathāmātyān yādṛśāṃś ca kariṣyasia caturo brāhmaṇān vaidyān pragalbhān sāttvikāñ śucīnb kṣatriyān daśa vāṣṭau vā balinaḥ śastrapāṇayaḥb vaiśyān vittena saṃpannān ekaviṃśatisaṃkhyayāc trīṃś ca śūdrān vinītāṃś ca śucīn karmaṇi pūrvakea aṣṭābhiś ca guṇair yuktaṃ sūtaṃ paurāṇikaṃ caretc pañcāśadvarṣavayasaṃ pragalbham anasūyakama matismṛtisamāyuktaṃ vinītaṃ samadarśanamc kārye vivadamānānāṃ śaktam artheṣv alolupama vivarjitānāṃ vyasanaiḥ sughoraiḥ saptabhir bhṛśamc aṣṭānāṃ mantriṇāṃ madhye mantraṃ rājopadhārayeta tataḥ saṃpreṣayed rāṣṭre rāṣṭrāyātha ca darśayetc anena vyavahāreṇa draṣṭavyās te prajāḥ sadāa na cāpi gūḍhaṃ kāryaṃ te grāhyaṃ kāryopaghātakamc kārye khalu vipanne tvāṃ so dharmas tāṃś ca pīḍayeta vidravec caiva rāṣṭraṃ te śyenāt pakṣigaṇā ivac parisravec ca satataṃ naur viśīrṇeva sāgarea prajāḥ pālayato samyag adharmeṇeha bhūpateḥc hārdaṃ bhayaṃ saṃbhavati svargaś cāsya virudhyatea atha yo dharmataḥ pāti rājāmātyo tha vātmajaḥc dharmāsane niyuktaḥ san dharmamūlaṃ nararṣabhad svargaṃ yāti mahīpālo niyuktaiḥ sacivaiḥ sahaa kāryeṣv adhikṛtāḥ samyag akurvanto nṛpānugāḥc ātmānaṃ purataḥ kṛtvā yānty adhaḥ sahapārthivāḥa balātkṛtānāṃ balibhiḥ kṛpaṇaṃ bahu jalpatāmc nātho vai bhūmipo nityam anāthānāṃ nṛṇāṃ nṛpaḥc yo hanyāt pitaras tasya bhrūṇahatyām avāpnuyuḥa kulīnaḥ śīlasaṃpanno vāgmī dakṣaḥ priyaṃvadaḥc yathoktavādī smṛtimān dūtaḥ syāt saptabhir guṇaiḥa etair eva guṇair yuktaḥ pratīhāro sya rakṣitāc tathā vidhātavyam anuṣṭheyaṃ ca yatnataḥa ṣaḍvidhaṃ durgam āsthāya purāṇy atha niveśayetc sarvasaṃpatpradhānaṃ yad bāhulyaṃ vāpi saṃbhaveta dhanvadurgaṃ mahīdurgaṃ giridurgaṃ tathaiva cac manuṣyadurgam abdurgaṃ vanadurgaṃ ca tāni ṣaṭa yat puraṃ durgasaṃpannaṃ dhānyāyudhasamanvitamc dṛḍhaprākāraparikhaṃ hastyaśvarathasaṃkulama vidvāṃsaḥ śilpino yatra nicayāś ca susaṃcitāḥc dhārmikaś ca dhānyam āyudhāni śarāṃs tathāc carma snāyu tathā vetraṃ muñjabalbajadhanvanāna āśayāś codapānāś ca prabhūtasalilā varāḥc niroddhavyāḥ sadā rājñā kṣīriṇaś ca mahīruhāḥa satkṛtāś ca prayatnena ācāryartvikpurohitāḥc maheṣvāsāḥ sthapatayaḥ sāṃvatsaracikitsakāḥa prājñā medhāvino dāntā dakṣāḥ śūrā bahuśrutāḥc kulīnāḥ sattvasaṃpannā yuktāḥ sarveṣu karmasua pūjayed dhārmikān rājā nigṛhṇīyād adhārmikānc niyuñjyāc ca prayatnena sarvavarṇān svakarmasua bāhyam ābhyantaraṃ caiva paurajānapadaṃ janamc cāraiḥ suviditaṃ kṛtvā tataḥ karma prayojayeta cārān mantraṃ ca kośaṃ ca mantraṃ caiva viśeṣataḥc anutiṣṭhet svayaṃ rājā sarvaṃ hy atra pratiṣṭhitama udāsīnārimitrāṇāṃ sarvam eva cikīrṣitamc pure janapade caiva jñātavyaṃ cāracakṣuṣāa tatas tathā vidhātavyaṃ sarvam evāpramādataḥc bhaktān pujayatā nityaṃ dviṣataś ca nigṛhṇatāa yaṣṭavyaṃ kratubhir nityaṃ dātavyaṃ cāpy apīḍayāc prajānāṃ rakṣaṇaṃ kāryaṃ na kāryaṃ karma garhitama kṛpaṇānāthavṛddhānāṃ vidhavānāṃ ca yoṣitāmc yogakṣemaṃ ca vṛttiṃ ca nityam eva prakalpayeta āśrameṣu yathākālaṃ celabhājanabhojanamc sadaivopahared rājā satkṛtyānavamanya caa ātmānaṃ sarvakāryāṇi tāpase rājyam eva cac nivedayet prayatnena tiṣṭhet prahvaś ca sarvadāa sarvārthatyāginaṃ rājā kule jātaṃ bahuśrutamc pūjayet tādṛśaṃ dṛṣṭvā śayanāsanabhojanaiḥa tasmin kurvīta viśvāsaṃ rājā kasyāṃ cid āpadic tāpaseṣu hi viśvāsam api kurvanti dasyavaḥa tasmin nidhīn ādadhīta prajñāṃ paryādadīta cac na cāpy abhīkṣṇaṃ seveta bhṛśaṃ vā pratipūjayeta anyaḥ kāryaḥ svarāṣṭreṣu pararāṣṭreṣu cāparaḥc aṭavīṣv aparaḥ kāryaḥ sāmantanagareṣu caa teṣu satkārasaṃskārān saṃvibhāgāṃś ca kārayetc pararāṣṭrāṭavīstheṣu yathā svaviṣaye tathāa te kasyāṃ cid avasthāyāṃ śaraṇaṃ śaraṇārthinec rājñe dadyur yathākāmaṃ tāpasāḥ saṃśitavratāḥa eṣa te lakṣaṇoddeśaḥ saṃkṣepeṇa prakīrtitaḥc yādṛśaṃ nagaraṃ rājā svayam āvastum arhati yudhiṣṭhira uvācaa rāṣṭraguptiṃ ca me rājan rāṣṭrasyaiva ca saṃgrahamc samyag jijñāsamānāya prabrūhi bharatarṣabha bhīṣma uvācaa rāṣṭraguptiṃ ca te samyag rāṣṭrasyaiva ca saṃgrahamc hanta sarvaṃ pravakṣyāmi tattvam ekamanāḥ śṛṇua grāmasyādhipatiḥ kāryo daśagrāmyas tathāparaḥc dviguṇāyāḥ śatasyaivaṃ sahasrasya ca kārayeta grāme yān grāmadoṣāṃś ca grāmikaḥ paripālayetc tān brūyād daśapāyāsau sa tu viṃśatipāya vaid tān ācakṣīta daśine daśako viṃśine punaḥa so pi viṃśatyadhipatir vṛttaṃ jānapade janec grāmāṇāṃ śatapālāya sarvam eva nivedayeta yāni grāmīṇabhojyāni grāmikas tāny upāśnuyātc daśapas tena bhartavyas tenāpi dviguṇādhipaḥd daśinena vibhaktavyo daśinā viṃśatis tathāa grāmaṃ grāmaśatādhyakṣo bhoktum arhati satkṛtaḥc mahāntaṃ bharataśreṣṭha susphītajanasaṃkulame tatra hy anekam āyattaṃ rājño bhavati bhārataa śākhānagaram arhas tu sahasrapatir uttamamc dhānyahairaṇyabhogena bhoktuṃ rāṣṭriya udyataḥa tathā yad grāmakṛtyaṃ syād grāmikṛtyaṃ ca te svayamc dharmajñaḥ sacivaḥ kaś cit tat prapaśyed atandritaḥa nagare nagare ca syād ekaḥ sarvārthacintakaḥc uccaiḥsthāne ghorarūpo nakṣatrāṇām iva grahaḥe bhavet sa tān parikrāmet sarvān eva sadā svayamf teṣāṃ vṛttaṃ pariṇayet kaś cid rāṣṭreṣu taccaraḥf jighāṃsavaḥ pāpakāmāḥ parasvādāyinaḥ śaṭhāḥf rakṣābhyadhikṛtā nāma tebhyo rakṣed imāḥ prajāḥa vikrayaṃ krayam adhvānaṃ bhaktaṃ ca saparivyayamc yogakṣemaṃ ca saṃprekṣya vaṇijaḥ kārayet karāna utpattiṃ dānavṛttiṃ ca śilpaṃ saṃprekṣya cāsakṛtc śilpapratikarān eva śilpinaḥ prati kārayeta uccāvacakarā nyāyyāḥ pūrvarājñāṃ yudhiṣṭhirac yathā yathā na hīyeraṃs tathā kuryān mahīpatiḥa phalaṃ karma ca saṃprekṣya tataḥ sarvaṃ prakalpayetc phalaṃ karma ca nirhetu na kaś cit saṃpravartayeta yathā rājā ca kartā ca syātāṃ karmaṇi bhāginauc samavekṣya tathā rājñā praṇeyāḥ satataṃ karāḥa nocchindyād ātmano mūlaṃ pareṣāṃ vāpi tṛṣṇayāc īhādvārāṇi saṃrudhya rājā saṃprītidarśanaḥa pradviṣanti parikhyātaṃ rājānam atikhādinamc pradviṣṭasya kutaḥ śreyaḥ saṃpriyo labhate priyama vatsaupamyena dogdhavyaṃ rāṣṭram akṣīṇabuddhināc bhṛto vatso jātabalaḥ pīḍāṃ sahati bhārataa na karma kurute vatso bhṛśaṃ dugdho yudhiṣṭhirac rāṣṭram apy atidugdhaṃ hi na karma kurute mahata yo rāṣṭram anugṛhṇāti parigṛhya svayaṃ nṛpaḥc saṃjātam upajīvan sa labhate sumahat phalama āpadarthaṃ hi nicayān rājāna iha cinvatec rāṣṭraṃ ca kośabhūtaṃ syāt kośo veśmagatas tathāa paurajānapadān sarvān saṃśritopāśritāṃs tathāc yathāśakty anukampeta sarvān abhyantarān apia bāhyaṃ janaṃ bhedayitvā bhoktavyo madhyamaḥ sukhamc evaṃ na saṃprakupyante janāḥ sukhitaduḥkhitāḥa prāg eva tu karādānam anubhāṣya punaḥ punaḥc saṃnipatya svaviṣaye bhayaṃ rāṣṭre pradarśayeta iyam āpat samutpannā paracakrabhayaṃ mahatc api nāntāya kalpeta veṇor iva phalāgamaḥa arayo me samutthāya bahubhir dasyubhiḥ sahac idam ātmavadhāyaiva rāṣṭram icchanti bādhituma asyām āpadi ghorāyāṃ saṃprāpte dāruṇe bhayec paritrāṇāya bhavatāṃ prārthayiṣye dhanāni vaḥa pratidāsye ca bhavatāṃ sarvaṃ cāhaṃ bhayakṣayec nārayaḥ pratidāsyanti yad dhareyur balād itaḥa kalatram āditaḥ kṛtvā naśyet svaṃ svayam eva hic api cet putradārārtham arthasaṃcaya iṣyatea nandāmi vaḥ prabhāvena putrāṇām iva codayec yathāśakty anugṛhṇāmi rāṣṭrasyāpīḍayā ca vaḥa āpatsv eva ca voḍhavyaṃ bhavadbhiḥ sadgavair ivac na vaḥ priyataraṃ kāryaṃ dhanaṃ kasyāṃ cid āpadia iti vācā madhurayā ślakṣṇayā sopacārayāc svaraśmīn abhyavasṛjed yugam ādāya kālavita pracāraṃ bhṛtyabharaṇaṃ vyayaṃ gogrāmato bhayamc yogakṣemaṃ ca saṃprekṣya gominaḥ kārayet karāna upekṣitā hi naśyeyur gomino raṇyavāsinaḥc tasmāt teṣu viśeṣeṇa mṛdupūrvaṃ samācareta sāntvanaṃ rakṣaṇaṃ dānam avasthā cāpy abhīkṣṇaśaḥc gomināṃ pārtha kartavyaṃ saṃvibhāgāḥ priyāṇi caa ajasram upayoktavyaṃ phalaṃ gomiṣu sarvataḥc prabhāvayati rāṣṭraṃ ca vyavahāraṃ kṛṣiṃ tathāa tasmād gomiṣu yatnena prītiṃ kuryād vicakṣaṇaḥc dayāvān apramattaś ca karān saṃpraṇayan mṛdūna sarvatra kṣemacaraṇaṃ sulabhaṃ tāta gomibhiḥc na hy ataḥ sadṛśaṃ kiṃ cid dhanam asti yudhiṣṭhira yudhiṣṭhira uvācaa yadā rājā samartho pi kośārthī syān mahāmatec kathaṃ pravarteta tadā tan me brūhi pitāmaha bhīṣma uvācaa yathādeśaṃ yathākālam api caiva yathābalamc anuśiṣyāt prajā rājā dharmārthī taddhite rataḥa yathā tāsāṃ ca manyeta śreya ātmana eva cac tathā dharmyāṇi sarvāṇi rājā rāṣṭre pravartayeta madhudohaṃ duhed rāṣṭraṃ bhramarān na vipātayetc vatsāpekṣī duhec caiva stanāṃś ca na vikuṭṭayeta jalaukāvat pibed rāṣṭraṃ mṛdunaiva narādhipac vyāghrīva ca haret putram adaṣṭvā mā pated itid yathā śalyakavān ākhuḥ padaṃ dhūnayate sadād atīkṣṇenābhyupāyena tathā rāṣṭraṃ samāpibeta alpenālpena deyena vardhamānaṃ pradāpayetc tato bhūyas tato bhūyaḥ kāmaṃ vṛddhiṃ samācareta damayann iva damyānāṃ śaśvad bhāraṃ pravardhayetc mṛdupūrvaṃ prayatnena pāśān abhyavahārayeta sakṛt pāśāvakīrṇās te na bhaviṣyanti durdamāḥc ucitenaiva bhoktavyās te bhaviṣyanti yatnataḥa tasmāt sarvasamārambho durlabhaḥ puruṣavrajaḥc yathāmukhyān sāntvayitvā bhoktavya itaro janaḥa tatas tān bhedayitvātha parasparavivakṣitānc bhuñjīta sāntvayitvaiva yathāsukham ayatnataḥa na cāsthāne na cākāle karān ebhyo nupātayetc ānupūrvyeṇa sāntvena yathākālaṃ yathāvidhia upāyān prabravīmy etān na me māyā vivakṣitāc anupāyena damayan prakopayati vājinaḥa pānāgārāṇi veśāś ca veśaprāpaṇikās tathāc kuśīlavāḥ sakitavā ye cānye ke cid īdṛśāḥa niyamyāḥ sarva evaite ye rāṣṭrasyopaghātakāḥc ete rāṣṭre hi tiṣṭhanto bādhante bhadrikāḥ prajāḥa na kena cid yācitavyaḥ kaś cit kiṃ cid anāpadic iti vyavasthā bhūtānāṃ purastān manunā kṛtāa sarve tathā na jīveyur na kuryuḥ karma ced ihac sarva eva trayo lokā na bhaveyur asaṃśayama prabhur niyamane rājā ya etān na niyacchatic bhuṅkte sa tasya pāpasya caturbhāgam iti śrutiḥd bhoktā tasya tu pāpasya sukṛtasya yathā tathād niyantavyā sadā rājñā pāpā ye syur narādhipad kṛtapāpas tv asau rājā ya etān na niyacchatie tathā kṛtasya dharmasya caturbhāgam upāśnutea sthānāny etāni saṃgamya prasaṅge bhūtināśanaḥc kāmaprasaktaḥ puruṣaḥ kim akāryaṃ vivarjayetd madyamāṃsaparasvāni tathā dārā dhanāni cad āhared rāgavaśagas tathā śāstraṃ pradarśayeta āpady eva tu yāceran yeṣāṃ nāsti parigrahaḥc dātavyaṃ dharmatas tebhyas tv anukrośād dayārthināa mā te rāṣṭre yācanakā mā te bhūyuś ca dasyavaḥc iṣṭādātāra evaite naite bhūtasya bhāvakāḥa ye bhūtāny anugṛhṇanti vardhayanti ca ye prajāḥc te te rāṣṭre pravartantāṃ mā bhūtānām abhāvakāḥa daṇḍyās te ca mahārāja dhanādānaprayojanāḥc prayogaṃ kārayeyus tān yathā balikarāṃs tathāa kṛṣigorakṣyavāṇijyaṃ yac cānyat kiṃ cid īdṛśamc puruṣaiḥ kārayet karma bahubhiḥ saha karmibhiḥa naraś cet kṛṣigorakṣyaṃ vāṇijyaṃ cāpy anuṣṭhitaḥc saṃśayaṃ labhate kiṃ cit tena rājā vigarhyatea dhaninaḥ pūjayen nityaṃ yānācchādanabhojanaiḥc vaktavyāś cānugṛhṇīdhvaṃ pūjāḥ saha mayeti haa aṅgam etan mahad rājñāṃ dhanino nāma bhāratac kakudaṃ sarvabhūtānāṃ dhanastho nātra saṃśayaḥa prājñaḥ śūro dhanasthaś ca svām dhārmika eva cac tapasvī satyavādī ca buddhimāṃś cābhirakṣatia tasmād eteṣu sarveṣu prītimān bhava pārthivac satyam ārjavam akrodham ānṛśaṃsyaṃ ca pālayaa evaṃ daṇḍaṃ ca kośaṃ ca mitraṃ bhūmiṃ ca lapsyasec satyārjavaparo rājan mitrakośasamanvitaḥ bhīṣma uvācaa vanaspatīn bhakṣyaphalān na chindyur viṣaye tavac brāhmaṇānāṃ mūlaphalaṃ dharmyam āhur manīṣiṇaḥa brāhmaṇebhyo tiriktaṃ ca bhuñjīrann itare janāḥc na brāhmaṇoparodhena hared anyaḥ kathaṃ canaa vipraś cet tyāgam ātiṣṭhed ākhyāyāvṛttikarśitaḥc parikalpyāsya vṛttiḥ syāt sadārasya narādhipaa sa cen nopanivarteta vācyo brāhmaṇasaṃsadic kasminn idānīṃ maryādām ayaṃ lokaḥ kariṣyatia asaṃśayaṃ nivarteta na ced vakṣyaty ataḥ paramc pūrvaṃ parokṣaṃ kartavyam etat kaunteya śāsanama āhur etaj janā brahman na caitac chraddadhāmy ahamc nimantryaś ca bhaved bhogair avṛttyā cet tadācareta kṛṣigorakṣyavāṇijyaṃ lokānām iha jīvanamc ūrdhvaṃ caiva trayī vidyā sā bhūtān bhāvayaty utaa tasyāṃ prayatamānāyāṃ ye syus tatparipanthinaḥc dasyavas tadvadhāyeha brahmā kṣatram athāsṛjata śatrūñ jahi prajā rakṣa yajasva kratubhir nṛpac yudhyasva samare vīro bhūtvā kauravanandanaa saṃrakṣyān pālayed rājā yaḥ sa rājāryakṛttamaḥc ye ke cit tān na rakṣanti tair artho nāsti kaś canaa sadaiva rājñā boddhavyaṃ sarvalokād yudhiṣṭhirac tasmād dhetor hi bhuñjīta manuṣyān eva mānavaḥa antarebhyaḥ parān rakṣan parebhyaḥ punar antarānc parān parebhyaḥ svān svebhyaḥ sarvān pālaya nityadāa ātmānaṃ sarvato rakṣan rājā rakṣeta medinīmc ātmamūlam idaṃ sarvam āhur hi viduṣo janāḥa kiṃ chidraṃ ko nuṣaṅgo me kiṃ vāsty avinipātitamc kuto mām āsraved doṣa iti nityaṃ vicintayetd atītadivase vṛttaṃ praśaṃsanti na vā punaḥa guptaiś cārair anumataiḥ pṛthivīm anucārayetc sunītaṃ yadi me vṛttaṃ praśaṃsanti na vā punaḥe kaccid rocej janapade kaccid rāṣṭre ca me yaśaḥa dharmajñānāṃ dhṛtimatāṃ saṃgrāmeṣv apalāyināmc rāṣṭraṃ ca ye nujīvanti ye ca rājño nujīvinaḥa amātyānāṃ ca sarveṣāṃ madhyasthānāṃ ca sarvaśaḥc ye ca tvābhipraśaṃseyur nindeyur atha vā punaḥe sarvān supariṇītāṃs tān kārayeta yudhiṣṭhiraa ekāntena hi sarveṣāṃ na śakyaṃ tāta rocitumc mitrāmitram atho madhyaṃ sarvabhūteṣu bhārataa tulyabāhubalānāṃ ca guṇair api niṣevināmc kathaṃ syād adhikaḥ kaś cit sa tu bhuñjīta mānavāna ye carā hy acarān adyur adaṃṣṭrān daṃṣṭriṇas tathāc āśīviṣā iva kruddhā bhujagā bhujagān ivaa etebhyaś cāpramattaḥ syāt sadā yatto yudhiṣṭhirac bhāruṇḍasadṛśā hy ete nipatanti pramādyataḥa kaccit te vaṇijo rāṣṭre nodvijante karārditāḥc krīṇanto bahu vālpena kāntārakṛtaniśramāḥa kaccit kṛṣikarā rāṣṭraṃ na jahaty atipīḍitāḥc ye vahanti dhuraṃ rājñāṃ saṃbharantītarān apia ito dattena jīvanti devāḥ pitṛgaṇās tathāc manuṣyoragarakṣāṃsi vayāṃsi paśavas tathāa eṣā te rāṣṭravṛttiś ca rāṣṭraguptiś ca bhāratac etam evārtham āśritya bhūyo vakṣyāmi pāṇḍava bhīṣma uvācaa yān aṅgirāḥ kṣatradharmān utathyo brahmavittamaḥc māndhātre yauvanāśvāya prītimān abhyabhāṣataa sa yathānuśaśāsainam utathyo brahmavittamaḥc tat te sarvaṃ pravakṣyāmi nikhilena yudhiṣṭhira utathya uvācaa dharmāya rājā bhavati na kāmakaraṇāya tuc māndhātar evaṃ jānīhi rājā lokasya rakṣitāa rājā carati vai dharmaṃ devatvāyaiva gacchatic na ced dharmaṃ sa carati narakāyaiva gacchatia dharme tiṣṭhanti bhūtāni dharmo rājani tiṣṭhatic taṃ rājā sādhu yaḥ śāsti sa rājā pṛthivīpatiḥa rājā paramadharmātmā lakṣmīvān pāpa ucyatec devāś ca garhāṃ gacchanti dharmo nāstīti cocyatea adharme vartamānānām arthasiddhiḥ pradṛśyatec tad eva maṅgalaṃ sarvaṃ lokaḥ samanuvartatea ucchidyate dharmavṛttam adharmo vartate mahānc bhayam āhur divārātraṃ yadā pāpo na vāryated mamedam iti nedaṃ ca sādhūnāṃ tāta dharmataḥd naiva vyavasthā bhavati yadā pāpo na vāryated naiva bhāryā na paśavo na kṣetraṃ na niveśanamd saṃdṛśyeta manuṣyāṇāṃ yadā pāpabalaṃ bhavetd devāḥ pūjāṃ na jānanti na svadhāṃ pitaras tathād na pūjyante hy atithayo yadā pāpo na vāryatea na vedān anuvartanti vratavanto dvijātayaḥc na yajñāṃs tanvate viprā yadā pāpo na vāryatea vadhyānām iva sarveṣāṃ mano bhavati vihvalamc manuṣyāṇāṃ mahārāja yadā pāpo na vāryatea ubhau lokāv abhiprekṣya rājānam ṛṣayaḥ svayamc asṛjan sumahad bhūtam ayaṃ dharmo bhaviṣyatia yasmin dharmo virājeta taṃ rājānaṃ pracakṣatec yasmin vilīyate dharmas taṃ devā vṛṣalaṃ viduḥa vṛṣo hi bhagavān dharmo yas tasya kurute hy alamc vṛṣalaṃ taṃ vidur devās tasmād dharmaṃ na lopayeta dharme vardhati vardhanti sarvabhūtāni sarvadāc tasmin hrasati hīyante tasmād dharmaṃ pravardhayeta dhanāt sravati dharmo hi dhāraṇād veti niścayaḥc akāryāṇāṃ manuṣyendra sa sīmāntakaraḥ smṛtaḥa prabhavārthaṃ hi bhūtānāṃ dharmaḥ sṛṣṭaḥ svayaṃbhuvāc tasmāt pravardhayed dharmaṃ prajānugrahakāraṇāta tasmād dhi rājaśārdūla dharmaḥ śreṣṭha iti smṛtaḥc sa rājā yaḥ prajāḥ śāsti sādhukṛt puruṣarṣabhaḥa kāmakrodhāv anādṛtya dharmam evānupālayetc dharmaḥ śreyaskaratamo rājñāṃ bharatasattamaa dharmasya brāhmaṇā yonis tasmāt tān pūjayet sadāc brāhmaṇānāṃ ca māndhātaḥ kāmān kuryād amatsarīa teṣāṃ hy akāmakaraṇād rājñaḥ saṃjāyate bhayamc mitrāṇi ca na vardhante tathāmitrībhavanty apid śatravo hy api mitrāṇi tadā mitraṃ bhavanty apia brāhmaṇān vai tadāsūyād yadā vairocano baliḥc athāsmāc chrīr apākrāmad yāsminn āsīt pratāpinīa tatas tasmād apakramya sāgacchat pākaśāsanamc atha so nvatapat paścāc chriyaṃ dṛṣṭvā puraṃdarea etat phalam asūyāyā abhimānasya cābhibhoc tasmād budhyasva māndhātar mā tvā jahyāt pratāpinīa darpo nāma śriyaḥ putro jajñe dharmād iti śrutiḥc tena devāsurā rājan nītāḥ subahuśo vaśama rājarṣayaś ca bahavas tasmād budhyasva pārthivac rājā bhavati taṃ jitvā dāsas tena parājitaḥa sa yathā darpasahitam adharmaṃ nānusevasec tathā vartasva māndhātaś ciraṃ cet sthātum icchasia mattāt pramattāt pogaṇḍād unmattāc ca viśeṣataḥc tadabhyāsād upāvartād ahitānāṃ ca sevanāta nigṛhītād amātyāc ca strībhyaś caiva viśeṣataḥc parvatād viṣamād durgād dhastino śvāt sarīsṛpāta etebhyo nityayattaḥ syān naktaṃcaryāṃ ca varjayetc atyāyaṃ cātimānaṃ ca dambhaṃ krodhaṃ ca varjayeta avijñātāsu ca strīṣu klībāsu svairiṇīṣu cac parabhāryāsu kanyāsu nācaren maithunaṃ nṛpaḥa kuleṣu pāparakṣāṃsi jāyante varṇasaṃkarātc apumāṃso ṅgahīnāś ca sthūlajihvā vicetasaḥa ete cānye ca jāyante yadā rājā pramādyatic tasmād rājñā viśeṣeṇa vartitavyaṃ prajāhitea kṣatriyasya pramattasya doṣaḥ saṃjāyate mahānc adharmāḥ saṃpravartante prajāsaṃkarakārakāḥa aśīte vidyate śītaṃ śīte śītaṃ na vidyatec avṛṣṭir ativṛṣṭiś ca vyādhiś cāviśati prajāḥa nakṣatrāṇy upatiṣṭhanti grahā ghorās tathāparec utpātāś cātra dṛśyante bahavo rājanāśanāḥa arakṣitātmā yo rājā prajāś cāpi na rakṣatic prajāś ca tasya kṣīyante tāś ca so nu vinaśyatia dvāv ādadāte hy ekasya dvayoś ca bahavo parec kumāryaḥ saṃpralupyante tadāhur nṛpadūṣaṇama mamaitad iti naikasya manuṣyeṣv avatiṣṭhatec tyaktvā dharmaṃ yadā rājā pramādam anutiṣṭhati utathya uvācaa kālavarṣī ca parjanyo dharmacārī ca pārthivaḥc saṃpad yadaiṣā bhavati sā bibharti sukhaṃ prajāḥa yo na jānāti nirhantuṃ vastrāṇāṃ rajako malamc raktāni vā śodhayituṃ yathā nāsti tathaiva saḥa evam eva dvijendrāṇāṃ kṣatriyāṇāṃ viśām apic śūdrāś caturṇāṃ varṇānāṃ nānākarmasv avasthitāḥa karma śūdre kṛṣir vaiśye daṇḍanītiś ca rājanic brahmacaryaṃ tapo mantrāḥ satyaṃ cāpi dvijātiṣua teṣāṃ yaḥ kṣatriyo veda vastrāṇām iva śodhanamc śīladoṣān vinirhantuṃ sa pitā sa prajāpatiḥa kṛtaṃ tretā dvāparaś ca kaliś ca bharatarṣabhac rājavṛttāni sarvāṇi rājaiva yugam ucyatea cāturvarṇyaṃ tathā vedāś cāturāśramyam eva cac sarvaṃ pramuhyate hy etad yadā rājā pramādyatid agnitretā trayī vidyā yajñāś ca sahadakṣiṇāḥd sarva eva pramādyanti yadā rājā pramādyatia rājaiva kartā bhūtānāṃ rājaiva ca vināśakaḥc dharmātmā yaḥ sa kartā syād adharmātmā vināśakaḥa rājño bhāryāś ca putrāś ca bāndhavāḥ suhṛdas tathāc sametya sarve śocanti yadā rājā pramādyatia hastino śvāś ca gāvaś cāpy uṣṭrāśvataragardabhāḥc adharmavṛtte nṛpatau sarve sīdanti pārthivaa durbalārthaṃ balaṃ sṛṣṭaṃ dhātrā māndhātar ucyatec abalaṃ tan mahad bhūtaṃ yasmin sarvaṃ pratiṣṭhitama yac ca bhūtaṃ sa bhajate bhūtā ye ca tadanvayāḥc adharmasthe hi nṛpatau sarve sīdanti pārthivaa durbalasya hi yac cakṣur muner āśīviṣasya cac aviṣahyatamaṃ manye mā sma durbalam āsadaḥa durbalāṃs tāta budhyethā nityam evāvimānitānc mā tvāṃ durbalacakṣūṃṣi pradaheyuḥ sabāndhavama na hi durbaladagdhasya kule kiṃ cit prarohatic āmūlaṃ nirdahaty eva mā sma durbalam āsadaḥa abalaṃ vai balāc chreyo yac cātibalavad balamc balasyābaladagdhasya na kiṃ cid avaśiṣyatea vimānito hatotkruṣṭas trātāraṃ cen na vindatic amānuṣakṛtas tatra daṇḍo hanti narādhipama mā sma tāta bale stheyā bādhiṣṭhā māpi durbalamc mā tvā durbalacakṣūṃṣi dhakṣyanty agnir ivāśrayama yāni mithyābhiśastānāṃ patanty aśrūṇi rodatāmc tāni putrān paśūn ghnanti teṣāṃ mithyābhiśāsatāma yadi nātmani putreṣu na cet pautreṣu naptṛṣuc na hi pāpaṃ kṛtaṃ karma sadyaḥ phalati gaur ivaa yatrābalo vadhyamānas trātāraṃ nādhigacchatic mahān daivakṛtas tatra daṇḍaḥ patati dāruṇaḥa yuktā yadā jānapadā bhikṣante brāhmaṇā ivac abhīkṣṇaṃ bhikṣudoṣeṇa rājānaṃ ghnanti tādṛśāḥa rājño yadā janapade bahavo rājapūruṣāḥc anayenopavartante tad rājñaḥ kilbiṣaṃ mahata yadā yuktā nayanty arthān kāmād arthavaśena vāc kṛpaṇaṃ yācamānānāṃ tad rājño vaiśasaṃ mahata mahāvṛkṣo jāyate vardhate cataṃ caiva bhūtāni samāśrayantic yadā vṛkṣaś chidyate dahyate vātadāśrayā aniketā bhavantia yadā rāṣṭre dharmam agryaṃ carantisaṃskāraṃ vā rājaguṇaṃ bruvāṇāḥc tair evādharmaś carito dharmamohāttūrṇaṃ jahyāt sukṛtaṃ duṣkṛtaṃ caa yatra pāpā jñāyamānāś carantisatāṃ kalir vindati tatra rājñaḥc yadā rājā śāsti narān naśiṣyānna tad rājyaṃ vardhate bhūmipālaa yaś cāmātyaṃ mānayitvā yathārhaṃmantre ca yuddhe ca nṛpo niyuñjyātc pravardhate tasya rāṣṭraṃ nṛpasyabhuṅkte mahīṃ cāpy akhilāṃ cirāyaa atrāpi sukṛtaṃ karma vācaṃ caiva subhāṣitāmc samīkṣya pūjayan rājā dharmaṃ prāpnoty anuttamama saṃvibhajya yadā bhuṅkte na cānyān avamanyatec nihanti balinaṃ dṛptaṃ sa rājño dharma ucyatea trāyate hi yadā sarvaṃ vācā kāyena karmaṇāc putrasyāpi na mṛṣyec ca sa rājño dharma ucyated saṃvibhajya yadā bhuṅkte nṛpatir durbalān narānd tadā bhavanti balinaḥ sa rājño dharma ucyated yadā rakṣati rāṣṭrāṇi yadā dasyūn apohatid yadā jayati saṃgrāme sa rājño dharma ucyated pāpam ācarato yatra karmaṇā vyāhṛtena vād priyasyāpi na mṛṣyeta sa rājño dharma ucyatea yadā śāraṇikān rājā putravat parirakṣatic bhinatti na ca maryādāṃ sa rājño dharma ucyatea yadāptadakṣiṇair yajñair yajate śraddhayānvitaḥc kāmadveṣāv anādṛtya sa rājño dharma ucyatea kṛpaṇānāthavṛddhānāṃ yadāśru vyapamārṣṭi vaic harṣaṃ saṃjanayan nṝṇāṃ sa rājño dharma ucyatea vivardhayati mitrāṇi tathārīṃś cāpakarṣatic saṃpūjayati sādhūṃś ca sa rājño dharma ucyatea satyaṃ pālayati prāptyā nityaṃ bhūmiṃ prayacchatic pūjayaty atithīn bhṛtyān sa rājño dharma ucyatea nigrahānugrahau cobhau yatra syātāṃ pratiṣṭhitauc asmiṃl loke pare caiva rājā tat prāpnute phalama yamo rājā dhārmikāṇāṃ māndhātaḥ parameśvaraḥc saṃyacchan bhavati prāṇān nasaṃyacchaṃs tu pāpakaḥa ṛtvikpurohitācāryān satkṛtyānavamanya cac yadā samyak pragṛhṇāti sa rājño dharma ucyatea yamo yacchati bhūtāni sarvāṇy evāviśeṣataḥc tasya rājñānukartavyaṃ yantavyā vidhivat prajāḥa sahasrākṣeṇa rājā hi sarva evopamīyatec sa paśyati hi yaṃ dharmaṃ sa dharmaḥ puruṣarṣabhaa apramādena śikṣethāḥ kṣamāṃ buddhiṃ dhṛtiṃ matimc bhūtānāṃ sattvajijñāsāṃ sādhv asādhu ca sarvadāa saṃgrahaḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ dānaṃ ca madhurā ca vākc paurajānapadāś caiva goptavyāḥ svā yathā prajāḥa na jātv adakṣo nṛpatiḥ prajāḥ śaknoti rakṣitumc bhāro hi sumahāṃs tāta rājyaṃ nāma suduṣkarama tad daṇḍavin nṛpaḥ prājñaḥ śūraḥ śaknoti rakṣitumc na hi śakyam adaṇḍena klībenābuddhināpi vāa abhirūpaiḥ kule jātair dakṣair bhaktair bahuśrutaiḥc sarvā buddhīḥ parīkṣethās tāpasāśramiṇām apia tatas tvaṃ sarvabhūtānāṃ dharmaṃ vetsyasi vai paramc svadeśe paradeśe vā na te dharmo vinaśyatia dharmaś cārthaś ca kāmaś ca dharma evottaro bhavetc asmiṃl loke pare caiva dharmavit sukham edhatea tyajanti dārān prāṇāṃś ca manuṣyāḥ pratipūjitāḥc saṃgrahaś caiva bhūtānāṃ dānaṃ ca madhurā ca vāka apramādaś ca śaucaṃ ca tāta bhūtikaraṃ mahatc etebhyaś caiva māndhātaḥ satataṃ mā pramādithāḥa apramatto bhaved rājā chidradarśī parātmanoḥc nāsya chidraṃ paraḥ paśyec chidreṣu param anviyāta etad vṛttaṃ vāsavasya yamasya varuṇasya cac rājarṣīṇāṃ ca sarveṣāṃ tat tvam apy anupālayaa tat kuruṣva mahārāja vṛttaṃ rājarṣisevitamc ātiṣṭha divyaṃ panthānam ahnāya bharatarṣabhaa dharmavṛttaṃ hi rājānaṃ pretya ceha ca bhāratac devarṣipitṛgandharvāḥ kīrtayanty amitaujasaḥ bhīṣma uvācaa sa evam ukto māndhātā tenotathyena bhāratac kṛtavān aviśaṅkas tad ekaḥ prāpa ca medinīma bhavān api tathā samyaṅ māndhāteva mahīpatiḥc dharmaṃ kṛtvā mahīṃ rakṣan svarge sthānam avāpsyasi yudhiṣṭhira uvācaa kathaṃ dharme sthātum icchan rājā varteta dhārmikaḥc pṛcchāmi tvā kuruśreṣṭha tan me brūhi pitāmaha bhīṣma uvācaa atrāpy udāharantīmam itihāsaṃ purātanamc gītaṃ dṛṣṭārthatattvena vāmadevena dhīmatāa rājā vasumanā nāma kausalyo balavāñ śuciḥc maharṣiṃ paripapraccha vāmadevaṃ yaśasvinama dharmārthasahitaṃ vākyaṃ bhagavann anuśādhi māmc yena vṛttena vai tiṣṭhan na cyaveyaṃ svadharmataḥa tam abravīd vāmadevas tapasvī japatāṃ varaḥc hemavarṇam upāsīnaṃ yayātim iva nāhuṣama dharmam evānuvartasva na dharmād vidyate paramc dharme sthitā hi rājāno jayanti pṛthivīm imāma arthasiddheḥ paraṃ dharmaṃ manyate yo mahīpatiḥc ṛtāṃ ca kurute buddhiṃ sa dharmeṇa virocatea adharmadarśī yo rājā balād eva pravartatec kṣipram evāpayāto smād ubhau prathamamadhyamaua asatpāpiṣṭhasacivo vadhyo lokasya dharmahāc sahaiva parivāreṇa kṣipram evāvasīdatia arthānām ananuṣṭhātā kāmacārī vikatthanaḥc api sarvāṃ mahīṃ labdhvā kṣipram eva vinaśyatia athādadānaḥ kalyāṇam anasūyur jitendriyaḥc vardhate matimān rājā srotobhir iva sāgaraḥa na pūrṇo smīti manyeta dharmataḥ kāmato rthataḥc buddhito mitrataś cāpi satataṃ vasudhādhipaḥa eteṣv eva hi sarveṣu lokayātrā pratiṣṭhitāc etāni śṛṇvaṃl labhate yaśaḥ kīrtiṃ śriyaḥ prajāḥa evaṃ yo dharmasaṃrambhī dharmārthaparicintakaḥc arthān samīkṣyārabhate sa dhruvaṃ mahad aśnutea adātā hy anatisneho daṇḍenāvartayan prajāḥc sāhasaprakṛtī rājā kṣipram eva vinaśyatia atha pāpaṃ kṛtaṃ buddhyā na ca paśyaty abuddhimānc akīrtyāpi samāyukto mṛto narakam aśnutea atha mānayitur dātuḥ śuklasya rasavedinaḥc vyasanaṃ svam ivotpannaṃ vijighāṃsanti mānavāḥa yasya nāsti gurur dharme na cānyān anupṛcchatic sukhatantro rthalābheṣu na ciraṃ mahad aśnutea gurupradhāno dharmeṣu svayam arthānvavekṣitāc dharmapradhāno lokeṣu suciraṃ mahad aśnute vāmadeva uvācaa yatrādharmaṃ praṇayate durbale balavattaraḥc tāṃ vṛttim upajīvanti ye bhavanti tadanvayāḥa rājānam anuvartante taṃ pāpābhipravartakamc avinītamanuṣyaṃ tat kṣipraṃ rāṣṭraṃ vinaśyatia yad vṛttim upajīvanti prakṛtisthasya mānavāḥc tad eva viṣamasthasya svajano pi na mṛṣyatea sāhasaprakṛtir yatra kurute kiṃ cid ulbaṇamc aśāstralakṣaṇo rājā kṣipram eva vinaśyatia yo tyantācaritāṃ vṛttiṃ kṣatriyo nānuvartatec jitānām ajitānāṃ ca kṣatradharmād apaiti saḥa dviṣantaṃ kṛtakarmāṇaṃ gṛhītvā nṛpatī raṇec yo na mānayate dveṣāt kṣatradharmād apaiti saḥa śaktaḥ syāt sumukho rājā kuryāt kāruṇyam āpadic priyo bhavati bhūtānāṃ na ca vibhraśyate śriyaḥa apriyaṃ yasya kurvīta bhūyas tasya priyaṃ caretc nacireṇa priyaḥ sa syād yo priyaḥ priyam ācareta mṛṣāvādaṃ pariharet kuryāt priyam ayācitaḥb śreyaso lakṣaṇaṃ caitad vikramo yatra dṛśyateb kīrtipradhāno yaś ca syāt samaye yaś ca tiṣṭhatib samarthān pūjayed yaś ca na spardheta ca yaś ca taiḥc na ca kāmān na saṃrambhān na dveṣād dharmam utsṛjetd amāyayaiva varteta na ca satyaṃ tyajed budhaḥd damaṃ dharmaṃ ca śīlaṃ ca kṣatradharmaṃ prajāhitama nāpatrapeta praśneṣu nābhibhavyāṃ giraṃ sṛjetc na tvareta na cāsūyet tathā saṃgṛhyate paraḥa priye nātibhṛśaṃ hṛṣyed apriye na ca saṃjvaretc na muhyed arthakṛcchreṣu prajāhitam anusmarana yaḥ priyaṃ kurute nityaṃ guṇato vasudhādhipaḥc tasya karmāṇi sidhyanti na ca saṃtyajyate śriyāa nivṛttaṃ pratikūlebhyo vartamānam anupriyec bhaktaṃ bhajeta nṛpatis tad vai vṛttaṃ satām ihaa aprakīrṇendriyaṃ prājñam atyantānugataṃ śucimc śaktaṃ caivānuraktaṃ ca yuñjyān mahati karmaṇia evam eva guṇair yukto yo na rajyati bhūmipamc bhartur artheṣv asūyantaṃ na taṃ yuñjīta karmaṇia mūḍham aindriyakaṃ lubdham anāryacaritaṃ śaṭhamc anatītopadhaṃ hiṃsraṃ durbuddhim abahuśrutama tyaktopāttaṃ madyarataṃ dyūtastrīmṛgayāparamc kārye mahati yo yuñjyād dhīyate sa nṛpaḥ śriyaḥa rakṣitātmā tu yo rājā rakṣyān yaś cānurakṣatic prajāś ca tasya vardhante dhruvaṃ ca mahad aśnutea ye ke cid bhūmipatayas tān sarvān anvavekṣayetc suhṛdbhir anabhikhyātais tena rājā na riṣyatea apakṛtya balasthasya dūrastho smīti nāśvasetc śyenānucaritair hy ete nipatanti pramādyataḥa dṛḍhamūlas tv aduṣṭātmā viditvā balam ātmanaḥc abalān abhiyuñjīta na tu ye balavattarāḥa vikrameṇa mahīṃ labdhvā prajā dharmeṇa pālayanc āhave nidhanaṃ kuryād rājā dharmaparāyaṇaḥa maraṇāntam idaṃ sarvaṃ neha kiṃ cid anāmayamc tasmād dharme sthito rājā prajā dharmeṇa pālayeta rakṣādhikaraṇaṃ yuddhaṃ tathā dharmānuśāsanamc mantracintyaṃ sukhaṃ kāle pañcabhir vardhate mahīa etāni yasya guptāni sa rājā rājasattamac satataṃ vartamāno tra rājā bhuṅkte mahīm imāma naitāny ekena śakyāni sātatyenānvavekṣitumc eteṣv āptān pratiṣṭhāpya rājā bhuṅkte mahīṃ cirama dātāraṃ saṃvibhaktāraṃ mārdavopagataṃ śucimc asaṃtyaktamanuṣyaṃ ca taṃ janāḥ kurvate priyama yas tu niḥśreyasaṃ jñātvā jñānaṃ tat pratipadyatec ātmano matam utsṛjya taṃ loko nuvidhīyatea yo rthakāmasya vacanaṃ prātikūlyān na mṛṣyatec śṛṇoti pratikūlāni vimanā nacirād ivaa agrāmyacaritāṃ buddhim atyantaṃ yo na budhyatec jitānām ajitānāṃ ca kṣatradharmād apaiti saḥa mukhyān amātyān yo hitvā nihīnān kurute priyānc sa vai vyasanam āsādya gādham ārto na vindatia yaḥ kalyāṇaguṇāñ jñātīn dveṣān naivābhimanyatec adṛḍhātmā dṛḍhakrodho nāsyārtho ramate ntikea atha yo guṇasaṃpannān hṛdayasyāpriyān apic priyeṇa kurute vaśyāṃś ciraṃ yaśasi tiṣṭhatia nākāle praṇayed arthān nāpriye jātu saṃjvaretc priye nātibhṛśaṃ hṛṣyed yujyetārogyakarmaṇia ke mānuraktā rājānaḥ ke bhayāt samupāśritāḥc madhyasthadoṣāḥ ke caiṣām iti nityaṃ vicintayeta na jātu balavān bhūtvā durbale viśvaset kva citc bhāruṇḍasadṛśā hy ete nipatanti pramādyataḥa api sarvair guṇair yuktaṃ bhartāraṃ priyavādinamc abhidruhyati pāpātmā tasmād dhi vibhiṣej janāta etāṃ rājopaniṣadaṃ yayātiḥ smāha nāhuṣaḥc manuṣyavijaye yukto hanti śatrūn anuttamān vāmadeva uvācaa ayuddhenaiva vijayaṃ vardhayed vasudhādhipaḥc jaghanyam āhur vijayaṃ yo yuddhena narādhipaa na cāpy alabdhaṃ lipseta mūle nātidṛḍhe satic na hi durbalamūlasya rājño lābho vidhīyatea yasya sphīto janapadaḥ saṃpannaḥ priyarājakaḥc saṃtuṣṭapuṣṭasacivo dṛḍhamūlaḥ sa pārthivaḥa yasya yodhāḥ susaṃtuṣṭāḥ sāntvitāḥ sūpadhāsthitāḥc alpenāpi sa daṇḍena mahīṃ jayati bhūmipaḥd daṇḍo hi balavān yatra tatra sāma prayujyated pradānaṃ sāmapūrvaṃ ca bhedamūlaṃ praśasyated trayāṇāṃ viphalaṃ karma yadā paśyeta bhūmipaḥd randhraṃ jñātvā tato daṇḍaṃ prayuñjītāvicārayand abhibhūto yadā śatruḥ śatrubhir balavattaraiḥd upekṣā tatra kartavyā vadhyatāṃ balināṃ balamd durbalo hi mahīpālo yadā bhavati bhāratad upekṣā tatra kartavyā caturṇām avirodhinīd upāyaḥ pañcamaḥ so pi sarveṣāṃ balavattaraḥd bhārgaveṇa ca gītānāṃ ślokānāṃ kausalādhipad vijñāya tattvaṃ tattvajña tattvatas tat kariṣyasid yadi rakṣaḥ piśācena hanyate yatra kutra citd upekṣā tatra kartavyā vadhyatāṃ balināṃ baliḥd durbalo hi mahīpālaḥ śatrūṇāṃ śatrum uddharetd pādalagnaṃ karasthena kaṇṭakenaiva kaṇṭakamd śaṭhānāṃ sacivānāṃ ca mlecchānāṃ ca mahīpated eṣa ukta upāyānām upekṣā balavattamād aśmanā nāśayel lohaṃ lohenāśmānam eva cad bilvānīvāparair bilvair mlecchān mlecchaiḥ prasādayetd dāsānāṃ ca pradṛptānām etad eveha kārayetd caṇḍālamlecchajātīnāṃ daṇḍena ca nivāraṇamd śaṭhānāṃ durvinītaiś ca pūrvam uktaṃ samācaretd anyāḥ śaṭhāś ca sacivās tathā kubrāhmaṇādayaḥd upāyaiḥ pañcabhiḥ sādhyāś caturvargavirodhinaḥa paurajānapadā yasya svanuraktāḥ supūjitāḥb rāṣṭrakarmakarā hy ete rāṣṭrasya ca virodhinaḥb durvinītā vinītāś ca sarve sādhyāḥ prayatnataḥb caṇḍālamlecchajātyāś ca pāṣaṇḍāś ca vikarmiṇaḥb balinaś cāśramāś caiva tathā gāyakanartakāḥc sadhanā dhānyavantaś ca dṛḍhamūlaḥ sa pārthivaḥd yasya rāṣṭre vasanty ete dhānyopacayakāriṇaḥd āyavṛddhau sahāyāś ca dṛḍhamūlaḥ sa pārthivaḥa prabhāvakālāv adhikau yadā manyeta cātmanaḥc tadā lipseta medhāvī parabhūmiṃ dhanāny utaa bhogeṣv adayamānasya bhūteṣu ca dayāvataḥc vardhate tvaramāṇasya viṣayo rakṣitātmanaḥa takṣaty ātmānam evaiṣa vanaṃ paraśunā yathāc yaḥ samyag vartamāneṣu sveṣu mithyā pravartatea na vai dviṣantaḥ kṣīyante rājño nityam api ghnataḥc krodhaṃ niyantuṃ yo veda tasya dveṣṭā na vidyatea yad āryajanavidviṣṭaṃ karma tan nācared budhaḥc yat kalyāṇam abhidhyāyet tatrātmānaṃ niyojayeta nainam anye vajānanti nātmanā paritapyatec kṛtyaśeṣeṇa yo rājā sukhāny anububhūṣatia idaṃvṛttaṃ manuṣyeṣu vartate yo mahīpatiḥc ubhau lokau vinirjitya vijaye saṃpratiṣṭhate bhīṣma uvācaa ity ukto vāmadevena sarvaṃ tat kṛtavān nṛpaḥc tathā kurvaṃs tvam apy etau lokau jetā na saṃśayaḥ yudhiṣṭhira uvācaa atha yo vijigīṣeta kṣatriyaḥ kṣatriyaṃ yudhic kas tasya dharmyo vijaya etat pṛṣṭo bravīhi me bhīṣma uvācaa sasahāyo sahāyo vā rāṣṭram āgamya bhūmipaḥc brūyād ahaṃ vo rājeti rakṣiṣyāmi ca vaḥ sadāa mama dharmyaṃ baliṃ datta kiṃ vā māṃ pratipatsyathac te cet tam āgataṃ tatra vṛṇuyuḥ kuśalaṃ bhavetd brūyād yuddhaṃ kariṣyāmaḥ śṛṇu naḥ kuśalaṃ bhaveta te ced akṣatriyāḥ santo virudhyeyuḥ kathaṃ canac sarvopāyair niyantavyā vikarmasthā narādhipaa aśaktaṃ kṣatriyaṃ matvā śastraṃ gṛhṇāty athāparaḥc trāṇāyāpy asamarthaṃ taṃ manyamānam atīva ca yudhiṣṭhira uvācaa atha yaḥ kṣatriyo rājā kṣatriyaṃ pratyupāvrajetc kathaṃ sa pratiyoddhavyas tan me brūhi pitāmaha bhīṣma uvācaa nāsaṃnaddho nākavaco yoddhavyaḥ kṣatriyo raṇec eka ekena vācyaś ca visṛjasva kṣipāmi caa sa cet saṃnaddha āgacchet saṃnaddhavyaṃ tato bhavetc sa cet sasainya āgacchet sasainyas tam athāhvayeta sa cen nikṛtyā yudhyeta nikṛtyā taṃ prayodhayetc atha ced dharmato yudhyed dharmeṇaiva nivārayeta nāśvena rathinaṃ yāyād udiyād rathinaṃ rathīc vyasane na prahartavyaṃ na bhītāya jitāya caa neṣur lipto na karṇī syād asatām etad āyudhamc jayārtham eva yoddhavyaṃ na krudhyed ajighāṃsataḥd nāsty ekasya gajo yuddhe gajaś caikasya vidyated na padātir gajaṃ yudhyen na gajena padātinamd hastinā yodhayen nāgaṃ kadā cic chikṣito hayaḥd divyāstrabalasaṃpannaḥ kāmaṃ yudhyeta sarvadād nāge bhūmau same caiva rathenāśvena vā punaḥd rāmarāvaṇayor yuddhe harayo vai padātayaḥd lakṣmaṇaś ca mahābhāgas tathā rājan vibhīṣaṇaḥd rāvaṇasyāntakāle ca rathenaindreṇa rāghavaḥd nijaghāna durācāraṃ rāvaṇaṃ pāpakāriṇamd divyāstrabalasaṃpanne sarvam etad vidhīyated devāsureṣu yuddheṣu dṛṣṭam etat purātanaiḥa sādhūnāṃ tu mithobhedāt sādhuś ced vyasanī bhavetc savraṇo nābhihantavyo nānapatyaḥ kathaṃ canaa bhagnaśastro vipannāśvaś chinnajyo hatavāhanaḥc cikitsyaḥ syāt svaviṣaye prāpyo vā svagṛhān bhavete nirvraṇo pi ca moktavya eṣa dharmaḥ sanātanaḥa tasmād dharmeṇa yoddhavyaṃ manuḥ svāyaṃbhuvo bravītc satsu nityaṃ satāṃ dharmas tam āsthāya na nāśayeta yo vai jayaty adharmeṇa kṣatriyo vardhamānakaḥc ātmānam ātmanā hanti pāpo nikṛtijīvanaḥa karma caitad asādhūnām asādhuṃ sādhunā jayetc dharmeṇa nidhanaṃ śreyo na jayaḥ pāpakarmaṇāa nādharmaś carito rājan sadyaḥ phalati gaur ivac mūlāny asya praśākhāś ca dahan samanugacchatia pāpena karmaṇā vittaṃ labdhvā pāpaḥ prahṛṣyatic sa vardhamānaḥ steyena pāpaḥ pāpe prasajjatia na dharmo stīti manvānaḥ śucīn avahasann ivac aśraddadhānabhāvāc ca vināśam upagacchatia sa baddho vāruṇaiḥ pāśair amartya iva manyatec mahādṛtir ivādhmātaḥ svakṛtena vivardhatea tataḥ samūlo hriyate nadīkūlād iva drumaḥc athainam abhinindanti bhinnaṃ kumbham ivāśmanie tasmād dharmeṇa vijayaṃ kāmaṃ lipseta bhūmipaḥ bhīṣma uvācaa nādharmeṇa mahīṃ jetuṃ lipseta jagatīpatiḥc adharmavijayaṃ labdhvā ko numanyeta bhūmipaḥa adharmayukto vijayo hy adhruvo svargya eva cac sādayaty eṣa rājānaṃ mahīṃ ca bharatarṣabhaa viśīrṇakavacaṃ caiva tavāsmīti ca vādinamc kṛtāñjaliṃ nyastaśastraṃ gṛhītvā na vihiṃsayeta balenāvajito yaś ca na taṃ yudhyeta bhūmipaḥc saṃvatsaraṃ vipraṇayet tasmāj jātaḥ punar bhaveta nārvāk saṃvatsarāt kanyā spraṣṭavyā vikramāhṛtāc evam eva dhanaṃ sarvaṃ yac cānyat sahasāhṛtama na tu vandhyaṃ dhanaṃ tiṣṭhet pibeyur brāhmaṇāḥ payaḥc yuñjīran vāpy anaḍuhaḥ kṣantavyaṃ vā tadā bhaveta rājñā rājaiva yoddhavyas tathā dharmo vidhīyatec nānyo rājānam abhyased arājanyaḥ kathaṃ canaa anīkayoḥ saṃhatayor yadīyād brāhmaṇo ntarāc śāntim icchann ubhayato na yoddhavyaṃ tadā bhavete maryādāṃ śāśvatīṃ bhindyād brāhmaṇaṃ yo bhilaṅghayeta atha cel laṅghayed enāṃ maryādāṃ kṣatriyabruvaḥc apraśasyas tad ūrdhvaṃ syād anādeyaś ca saṃsadia yā tu dharmavilopena maryādābhedanena cac tāṃ vṛttiṃ nānuvarteta vijigīṣur mahīpatiḥe dharmalabdhād dhi vijayāt ko lābho bhyadhiko bhaveta sahasā nāmya bhūtāni kṣipram eva prasādayetc sāntvena bhogadānena sa rājñāṃ paramo nayaḥa bhujyamānā hy ayogena svarāṣṭrād abhitāpitāḥc amitrān paryupāsīran vyasanaughapratīkṣiṇaḥa amitropagrahaṃ cāsya te kuryuḥ kṣipram āpadic saṃduṣṭāḥ sarvato rājan rājavyasanakāṅkṣiṇaḥa nāmitro vinikartavyo nāticchedyaḥ kathaṃ canac jīvitaṃ hy apy aticchinnaḥ saṃtyajaty ekadā naraḥa alpenāpi hi saṃyuktas tuṣyaty evāparādhikaḥc śuddhaṃ jīvitam evāpi tādṛśo bahu manyatea yasya sphīto janapadaḥ saṃpannaḥ priyarājakaḥc saṃtuṣṭabhṛtyasacivo dṛḍhamūlaḥ sa pārthivaḥa ṛtvikpurohitācāryā ye cānye śrutasaṃmatāḥc pūjārhāḥ pūjitā yasya sa vai lokajid ucyatea etenaiva ca vṛttena mahīṃ prāpa surottamaḥc anv eva caindraṃ vijayaṃ vyajigīṣanta pārthivāḥa bhūmivarjaṃ puraṃ rājā jitvā rājānam āhavec amṛtāś cauṣadhīḥ śaśvad ājahāra pratardanaḥa agnihotrāṇy agniśeṣaṃ havir bhājanam eva cac ājahāra divodāsas tato viprakṛto bhavata sarājakāni rāṣṭrāṇi nābhāgo dakṣiṇāṃ dadauc anyatra śrotriyasvāc ca tāpasasvāc ca bhārataa uccāvacāni vṛttāni dharmajñānāṃ yudhiṣṭhirac āsan rājñāṃ purāṇānāṃ sarvaṃ tan mama rocatea sarvavidyātirekād vā jayam icchen mahīpatiḥc na māyayā na dambhena ya icched bhūtim ātmanaḥ yudhiṣṭhira uvācaa kṣatradharmān na pāpīyān dharmo sti bharatarṣabhac abhiyāne ca yuddhe ca rājā hanti mahājanama atha sma karmaṇā yena lokāñ jayati pārthivaḥc vidvañ jijñāsamānāya prabrūhi bharatarṣabha bhīṣma uvācaa nigraheṇa ca pāpānāṃ sādhūnāṃ pragraheṇa cac yajñair dānaiś ca rājāno bhavanti śucayo malāḥa uparundhanti rājāno bhūtāni vijayārthinaḥc ta eva vijayaṃ prāpya vardhayanti punaḥ prajāḥa apavidhyanti pāpāni dānayajñatapobalaiḥc anugraheṇa bhūtānāṃ puṇyam eṣāṃ pravardhatea yathaiva kṣetranirdātā nirdan vai kṣetram ekadāc hinasti kakṣaṃ dhānyaṃ ca na ca dhānyaṃ vinaśyatia evaṃ śastrāṇi muñcanto ghnanti vadhyān athaikadāc tasyaiṣā niṣkṛtiḥ kṛtsnā bhūtānāṃ bhāvanaṃ punaḥa yo bhūtāni dhanajyānād vadhāt kleśāc ca rakṣatic dasyubhyaḥ prāṇadānāt sa dhanadaḥ sukhado virāṭa sa sarvayajñair ījāno rājāthābhayadakṣiṇaiḥc anubhūyeha bhadrāṇi prāpnotīndrasalokatāma brāhmaṇārthe samutpanne yo bhiniḥsṛtya yudhyatec ātmānaṃ yūpam ucchritya sa yajño nantadakṣiṇaḥa abhīto vikirañ śatrūn pratigṛhṇañ śarāṃs tathāc na tasmāt tridaśāḥ śreyo bhuvi paśyanti kiṃ canaa tasya yāvanti śastrāṇi tvacaṃ bhindanti saṃyugec tāvataḥ so śnute lokān sarvakāmaduho kṣayāna na tasya rudhiraṃ gātrād āvedhebhyaḥ pravartatec sa ha tenaiva raktena sarvapāpaiḥ pramucyatea yāni duḥkhāni sahate vraṇānām abhitāpanec na tato sti tapo bhūya iti dharmavido viduḥa pṛṣṭhato bhīravaḥ saṃkhye vartante dhamapūruṣāḥc śūrāc charaṇam icchantaḥ parjanyād iva jīvanama yadi śūras tathā kṣeme pratirakṣet tathā bhayec pratirūpaṃ janāḥ kuryur na ca tad vartate tathāa yadi te kṛtam ājñāya namaskuryuḥ sadaiva tamc yuktaṃ nyāyyaṃ ca kuryus te na ca tad vartate tathāa puruṣāṇāṃ samānānāṃ dṛśyate mahad antaramc saṃgrāme nīkavelāyām utkruṣṭe bhipatatsu caa pataty abhimukhaḥ śūraḥ parān bhīruḥ palāyatec āsthāyāsvargyam adhvānaṃ sahāyān viṣame tyajana mā sma tāṃs tādṛśāṃs tāta janiṣṭhāḥ puruṣādhamānc ye sahāyān raṇe hitvā svastimanto gṛhān yayuḥa asvasti tebhyaḥ kurvanti devā indrapurogamāḥc tyāgena yaḥ sahāyānāṃ svān prāṇāṃs trātum icchatia taṃ hanyuḥ kāṣṭhaloṣṭair vā daheyur vā kaṭāgnināc paśuvan mārayeyur vā kṣatriyā ye syur īdṛśāḥa adharmaḥ kṣatriyasyaiṣa yac chayyāmaraṇaṃ bhavetc visṛjañ śleṣmapittāni kṛpaṇaṃ paridevayana avikṣatena dehena pralayaṃ yo dhigacchatic kṣatriyo nāsya tat karma praśaṃsanti purāvidaḥa na gṛhe maraṇaṃ tāta kṣatriyāṇāṃ praśasyatec śauṭīrāṇām aśauṭīram adharmyaṃ kṛpaṇaṃ ca tata idaṃ duḥkham aho kaṣṭaṃ pāpīya iti niṣṭananc pratidhvastamukhaḥ pūtir amātyān bahu śocayana arogāṇāṃ spṛhayate muhur mṛtyum apīcchatic vīro dṛpto bhimānī ca nedṛśaṃ mṛtyum arhatia raṇeṣu kadanaṃ kṛtvā jñātibhiḥ parivāritaḥc tīkṣṇaiḥ śastraiḥ suvikliṣṭaḥ kṣatriyo mṛtyum arhatia śūro hi satyamanyubhyām āviṣṭo yudhyate bhṛśamc kṛtyamānāni gātrāṇi parair naivāvabudhyatea sa saṃkhye nidhanaṃ prāpya praśastaṃ lokapūjitamc svadharmaṃ vipulaṃ prāpya śakrasyaiti salokatāma sarvo yodhaḥ paraṃ tyaktum āviṣṭas tyaktajīvitaḥc prāpnotīndrasya sālokyaṃ śūraḥ pṛṣṭham adarśayand yatra yatra hataḥ śūraḥ śatrubhiḥ parivāritaḥd akṣayāṃl labhate lokān yadi dainyaṃ na sevate yudhiṣṭhira uvācaa ke lokā yudhyamānānāṃ śūrāṇām anivartināmc bhavanti nidhanaṃ prāpya tan me brūhi pitāmaha bhīṣma uvācaa atrāpy udāharantīmam itihāsaṃ purātanamc ambarīṣasya saṃvādam indrasya ca yudhiṣṭhiraa ambarīṣo hi nābhāgaḥ svargaṃ gatvā sudurlabhamc dadarśa suralokasthaṃ śakreṇa sacivaṃ sahaa sarvatejomayaṃ divyaṃ vimānavaram āsthitamc upary upari gacchantaṃ svaṃ vai senāpatiṃ prabhuma sa dṛṣṭvopari gacchantaṃ senāpatim udāradhīḥb śūrasthānam anuprāptaṃ sudevaṃ nāma nāmataḥc ṛddhiṃ dṛṣṭvā sudevasya vismitaḥ prāha vāsavama sāgarāntāṃ mahīṃ kṛtsnām anuśiṣya yathāvidhic cāturvarṇye yathāśāstraṃ pravṛtto dharmakāmyayāa brahmacaryeṇa ghoreṇa ācāryakulasevayāc vedān adhītya dharmeṇa rājaśāstraṃ ca kevalama atithīn annapānena pitṝṃś ca svadhayā tathāc ṛṣīn svādhyāyadīkṣābhir devān yajñair anuttamaiḥa kṣatradharme sthito bhūtvā yathāśāstraṃ yathāvidhic udīkṣamāṇaḥ pṛtanāṃ jayāmi yudhi vāsavad tena puṇyavipākena prāpto haṃ tava saṃnidhima devarāja sudevo yaṃ mama senāpatiḥ purāc āsīd yodhaḥ praśāntātmā so yaṃ kasmād atīva māmd vimānaṃ sūryasaṃkāśam āsthito modate divid śakra uvācad aiśvaryam īdṛśaṃ prāptaḥ sarvadevaiḥ sudurlabhamd yad anena kṛtaṃ karma pratyakṣaṃ te mahīpated purā pālayataḥ samyak pṛthivīṃ dharmato nṛpad śatravo nirjitāḥ sarve ye tavāhitakāriṇaḥd saṃdhamo vidhamaś caiva sudhamaś ca mahābalaḥd rākṣasā durjayā loke trayas te yuddhadurmadāḥd putrās te śataśṛṅgasya rākṣasasya mahīpateḥd atha tasmiñ śubhe kāle tava yajñaṃ vitanvataḥd aśvamedhaṃ mahāyāgaṃ devānāṃ hitakāmyayād tasya te khalu vighnārtham āgatā rākṣasās trayaḥd koṭīśataparīvārāṃ rākṣasānāṃ mahācamūmd parigṛhya tataḥ sarvāḥ prajā bandīkṛtās tavad vihvalāś ca prajāḥ sarvāḥ sarve ca tava sainikāḥd nirākṛtas tvayā cāsīt sudevaḥ sainyanāyakaḥd tatrāmātyavacaḥ śrutvā nirastaḥ sarvakarmasud śrutvā teṣāṃ vaco bhūyaḥ sopadhaṃ vasudhādhipad sarvasainyasamāyuktaḥ sudevaḥ preritas tvayād rākṣasānāṃ vadhārthāya durjayānāṃ narādhipad nājitvā rākṣasīṃ senāṃ punarāgamanaṃ tavad bandīmokṣam akṛtvā ca na cāgamanam iṣyated sudevas tad vacaḥ śrutvā prasthānam akaron nṛpad saṃprāptaś ca sa taṃ deśaṃ yatra bandīkṛtāḥ prajāḥd paśyati sma mahāghorāṃ rākṣasānāṃ mahācamūmd dṛṣṭvā saṃcintayām āsa sudevo vāhinīpatiḥd neyaṃ śakyā camūr jetum api sendraiḥ surāsuraiḥd nāmbarīṣaḥ kalām ekām eṣāṃ kṣapayituṃ kṣamaḥd divyāstrabalabhūyiṣṭhaḥ kim ahaṃ punar īdṛśaḥd tataḥ senāṃ punaḥ sarvāṃ preṣayām āsa pārthivad yatra tvaṃ sahitaḥ sarvair mantribhiḥ sopadhair nṛpad tato rudraṃ mahādevaṃ prapanno jagataḥ patimd śmaśānanilayaṃ devaṃ tuṣṭāva vṛṣabhadhvajamd stutvā śastraṃ samādāya svaśiraś chettum udyataḥd kāruṇyād devadevena gṛhītas tasya dakṣiṇaḥd sa pāṇiḥ saha śastreṇa dṛṣṭvā cedam uvāca had kim idaṃ bāhuyuddhe tv ayaṃ hataḥd vidhamaṃ prāpya bhūpāla vidhamaś ca nipātitaḥa nānena kratubhir mukhyair iṣṭaṃ naiva dvijātayaḥc tarpitā vidhivac chakra so yaṃ kasmād atīva mām indra uvācaa etasya vitatas tāta sudevasya babhūva hac saṃgrāmayajñaḥ sumahān yaś cānyo yudhyate naraḥa saṃnaddho dīkṣitaḥ sarvo yodhaḥ prāpya camūmukhamc yuddhayajñādhikārastho bhavatīti viniścayaḥ ambarīṣa uvācaa kāni yajñe nadī syāt samabhiplutāc keśamāṃsāsthisaṃkīrṇā sa gacchet paramāṃ gatima yas tu senāpatiṃ hatvā tadyānam adhirohatic sa viṣṇuvikramakrāmī bṛhaspatisamaḥ kratuḥa nāyakaṃ vā pramāṇaṃ vā yo vā syāt tatra pūjitaḥc jīvagrāhaṃ nigṛhṇāti tasya lokā yathā mamaa āhave nihataṃ śūraṃ na śoceta kadā canac aśocyo hi hataḥ śūraḥ svargaloke mahīyatea na hy annaṃ nodakaṃ tasya na snānaṃ nāpy aśaucakamc hatasya kartum icchanti tasya lokāñ śṛṇuṣva mea varāpsaraḥsahasrāṇi śūram āyodhane hatamc tvaramāṇā hi dhāvanti mama bhartā bhaved itia etat tapaś ca puṇyaṃ ca dharmaś caiva sanātanaḥc catvāraś cāśramās tasya naikamāyaṃ ca śambarama vipracittiṃ ca daiteyaṃ danoḥ putrāṃś ca sarvaśaḥc prahrādaṃ ca nihatyājau tato devādhipo bhavam bhīṣma uvācaa ity etac chakravacanaṃ niśamya pratigṛhya cac yodhānām ātmanaḥ siddhim ambarīṣo bhipannavān bhīṣma uvācaa atrāpy udāharantīmam itihāsaṃ purātanamc pratardano maithilaś ca saṃgrāmaṃ yatra cakratuḥa yajñopavītī saṃgrāme janako maithilo yathāc yodhān uddharṣayām āsa sarvakāmaduho kṣayāḥa ime palāyamānānāṃ narakāḥ pratyupasthitāḥc akīrtiḥ śāśvatī caiva patitavyam anantarama tān dṛṣṭvārīn vijayato bhūtvā saṃtyāgabuddhayaḥc narakasyāpratiṣṭhasya mā bhūta jaitryā vā yāni rūpāṇi bhavanti puruṣarṣabhac pṛtanāyāḥ praśastāni tāni vakṣyāmi sarvaśaḥa daivaṃ pūrvaṃ vikurute mānuṣe kālacoditec tad vidvāṃso nupaśyanti jñānadīrgheṇa cakṣuṣāa prāyaścittavidhiṃ
