tathaivendradhanūṃṣi cac anuplavante meghāś ca tathādityasya raśmayaḥa gomāyavaś cānulomā vaḍā gṛdhrāś ca sarvaśaḥc ācareyur yadā senāṃ tadā siddhir anuttamāa prasannabhāḥ pāvaka ūrdhvaraśmiḥpradakṣiṇāvartaśikho vidhūmaḥc puṇyā gandhāś cāhutīnāṃ pravāntijayasyaitad bhāvino rūpam āhuḥa gambhīraśabdāś ca mahāsvanāś caśaṅkhāś ca bheryaś ca nadanti yatrac yuyutsavaś cāpratīpā bhavantijayasyaitad bhāvino rūpam āhuḥa iṣṭā mṛgāḥ pṛṣṭhato vāmataś casaṃprasthitānāṃ ca gamiṣyatāṃ cac jighāṃsatāṃ dakṣiṇāḥ siddhim āhurye tv agratas te pratiṣedhayantia maṅgalyaśabdāḥ śakunā vadantihaṃsāḥ krauñcāḥ śatapatrāś ca cāṣāḥc hṛṣṭā yodhāḥ sattvavanto bhavantijayasyaitad bhāvino rūpam āhuḥa śastraiḥ patraiḥ kavacaiḥ ketubhiś casubhānubhir mukhavarṇaiś ca yūnāmb tathā gajair vājibhir heṣamāṇaiḥc bhrājiṣmatī duṣpratiprekṣaṇīyāyeṣāṃ camūs te bhibhavanti śatrūna śuśrūṣavaś cānabhimāninaś caparasparaṃ sauhṛdam āsthitāś cac yeṣāṃ yodhāḥ śaucam anuṣṭhitāś cajayasyaitad bhāvino rūpam āhuḥa śabdāḥ sparśās tathā gandhā vicaranti manaḥpriyāḥc dhairyaṃ cāviśate yodhān vijayasya mukhaṃ tu tata iṣṭo vāmaḥ praviṣṭasya dakṣiṇaḥ pravivikṣataḥc paścāt saṃsādhayaty arthaṃ purastāt pratiṣedhatia saṃbhṛtya mahatīṃ senāṃ caturaṅgāṃ yudhiṣṭhirac sāmnaivāvartane pūrvaṃ prayatethās tatho yudhia jaghanya eṣa vijayo yad yuddhaṃ nāma bhāratac yādṛcchiko yudhi jayo daivo veti vicāraṇama apām iva mahāvegas trastā mṛgagaṇā ivac durnivāryatamā caiva prabhagnā mahatī camūḥa bhagnā ity eva bhajyante vidvāṃso pi nakāraṇamc udārasārā mahatī rurusaṃghopamā camūḥa parasparajñāḥ saṃhṛṣṭās tyaktaprāṇāḥ suniścitāḥc api pañcāśatiḥ śūrā mṛdnanti paravāhinīma atha vā pañca ṣaṭ sapta sahitāḥ kṛtaniścayāḥc kulīnāḥ pūjitāḥ samyag vijayantīha śātravāna saṃnipāto na gantavyaḥ śakye sati kathaṃ canac sāntvabhedapradānānāṃ yuddham uttaram ucyatea saṃsarpaṇād dhi senāyā bhayaṃ bhīrūn prabādhatec vajrād iva prajvalitād iyaṃ kva nu patiṣyatia abhiprayātāṃ samitiṃ jñātvā ye pratiyānty athac teṣāṃ spandanti gātrāṇi yodhānāṃ viṣayasya caa viṣayo vyathate rājan sarvaḥ sasthāṇujaṅgamaḥc śastrapratāpataptānāṃ majjā sīdati dehināma teṣāṃ sāntvaṃ krūramiśraṃ praṇetavyaṃ punaḥ punaḥc saṃpīḍyamānā hi pare yogam āyānti sarvaśaḥa antarāṇāṃ ca bhedārthaṃ cārān abhyavacārayetc yaś ca tasmāt paro rājā tena saṃdhiḥ praśasyatea na hi tasyānyathā pīḍā śakyā kartuṃ tathāvidhāc yathā sārdham amitreṇa sarvataḥ pratibādhanama kṣamā vai sādhumāyā hi na hi sādhv akṣamā sadāc kṣamāyāś cākṣamāyāś ca viddhi pārtha prayojanama vijitya kṣamamāṇasya yaśo rājño bhivardhatec mahāparādhā hy apy asmin viśvasanti hi śatravaḥa manyate karśayitvā tu kṣamā sādhv iti śambaraḥc asaṃtaptaṃ tu yad dāru pratyeti prakṛtiṃ punaḥa naitat praśaṃsanty ācāryā na ca sādhu nidarśanamc akleśenāvināśena niyantavyāḥ svaputravata dveṣyo bhavati bhūtānām ugro rājā yudhiṣṭhirac mṛdum apy avamanyante tasmād ubhayabhāg bhaveta prahariṣyan priyaṃ brūyāt praharann api bhāratac prahṛtya ca kṛpāyeta śocann iva rudann ivaa na me priyaṃ yat sa hataḥ saṃprāhaivaṃ puro vacaḥc na cakartha ca me vākyam ucyamānaḥ punaḥ punaḥa aho jīvitam ākāṅkṣe nedṛśo vadham arhatic sudurlabhāḥ supuruṣāḥ saṃgrāmeṣv apalāyinaḥa kṛtaṃ mamāpriyaṃ tena yenāyaṃ nihato mṛdhec iti vācā vadan hantṝn pūjayeta rahogataḥa hantṝṇāṃ cāhatānāṃ ca yat kuryur aparādhinaḥc krośed bāhuṃ pragṛhyāpi cikīrṣañ janasaṃgrahama evaṃ sarvāsv avasthāsu sāntvapūrvaṃ samācaranc priyo bhavati bhūtānāṃ dharmajño vītabhīr nṛpaḥa viśvāsaṃ cātra gacchanti sarvabhūtāni bhāratac viśvastaḥ śakyate bhoktuṃ yathākāmam upasthitaḥa tasmād viśvāsayed rājā sarvabhūtāny amāyayāc sarvataḥ parirakṣec ca yo mahīṃ bhoktum icchati yudhiṣṭhira uvācaa kathaṃ mṛdau kathaṃ tīkṣṇe mahāpakṣe ca pārthivac arau varteta nṛpatis tan me brūhi pitāmaha bhīṣma uvācaa atrāpy udāharantīmam itihāsaṃ purātanamc bṛhaspateś ca saṃvādam indrasya ca yudhiṣṭhiraa bṛhaspatiṃ devapatir abhivādya kṛtāñjaliḥc upasaṃgamya papraccha vāsavaḥ paravīrahāa ahiteṣu kathaṃ brahman vartayeyam atandritaḥc asamucchidya caivenān niyaccheyam upāyataḥa senayor vyatiṣaṅgeṇa jayaḥ sādhāraṇo bhavetc kiṃ kurvāṇaṃ na māṃ jahyāj jvalitā śrīḥ pratāpinīa tato dharmārthakāmānāṃ kuśalaḥ pratibhānavānc rājadharmavidhānajñaḥ pratyuvāca puraṃdarama na jātu kalahenecchen niyantum apakāriṇaḥc bālasaṃsevitaṃ hy etad yad amarṣo yad akṣamāe na śatrur vivṛtaḥ kāryo vadham asyābhikāṅkṣatāa krodhaṃ balam amarṣaṃ ca niyamyātmajam ātmanic amitram upaseveta viśvastavad aviśvasana priyam eva vaden nityaṃ nāpriyaṃ kiṃ cid ācaretc viramec chuṣkavairebhyaḥ kaṇṭhāyāsaṃ ca varjayeta yathā vaitaṃsiko yukto dvijānāṃ sadṛśasvanaḥc tān dvijān kurute vaśyāṃs tathā yukto mahīpatiḥe vaśaṃ copanayec chatrūn nihanyāc ca puraṃdaraa na nityaṃ paribhūyārīn sukhaṃ svapiti vāsavac jāgarty eva ca duṣṭātmā saṃkare gnir ivotthitaḥa na saṃnipātaḥ kartavyaḥ sāmānye vijaye satic viśvāsyaivopasaṃnyāsyo vaśe kṛtvā ripuḥ prabhod vaśe kuryān na śamayet tīkṣṇān karkaśapīḍanaiḥd sa yathā neṣyate rājñas tīkṣṇopakaraṇakṣayaḥd hetāv īrṣuḥ phalenerṣuḥ syāc chakra vyavasāyavitd doṣeṇa guṇarūpeṇa dviṣato yo jayet sadāa saṃpradhārya sahāmātyair mantravidbhir mahātmabhiḥc upekṣamāṇo vajñāte hṛdayenāparājitaḥa athāsya praharet kāle kiṃ cid vicalite padec daṇḍaṃ ca dūṣayed asya puruṣair āptakāribhiḥa ādimadhyāvasānajñaḥ pracchannaṃ ca vicārayetc balāni dūṣayed asya jānaṃś caiva pramāṇataḥa bhedenopapradānena saṃsṛjann auṣadhais tathāc na tv eva celasaṃsargaṃ racayed aribhiḥ sahaa dīrghakālam api kṣāntvā vihanyād eva śātravānc kālākāṅkṣī yāmayec ca yathā visrambham āpnuyuḥc   upāsīta śacīpatec tathā priyaṃ ca vaktavyaṃa na sadyo rīn vinirhanyād dṛṣṭasya vijayo jvaraḥc na yaḥ śalyaṃ ghaṭṭayati navaṃ ca kurute vraṇama prāpte ca praharet kāle na sa saṃvartate punaḥc hantukāmasya devendra puruṣasya ripuṃ pratia yaḥ kālo hi vyatikrāmet puruṣaṃ kālakāṅkṣiṇamc durlabhaḥ sa punaḥ kālaḥ kāladharmacikīrṣuṇāa aurjasthyaṃ vijayed evaṃ saṃgṛhṇan sādhusaṃmatānc kālena sādhayen nityaṃ nāprāpte bhinipīḍayeta vihāya kāmaṃ krodhaṃ ca tathāhaṃkāram eva cac yukto vivaram anvicched ahitānāṃ puraṃdaraa mārdavaṃ daṇḍa ālasyaṃ pramādaś ca surottamac māyāś ca vividhāḥ śakra sādhayanty avicakṣaṇama nihatyaitāni catvāri māyāṃ pratividhāya cac tataḥ śaknoti śatrūṇāṃ prahartum avicārayana yadaivaikena śakyeta guhyaṃ kartuṃ tadācaretc yacchanti sacivā guhyaṃ mitho vidrāvayanty apia aśakyam iti kṛtvā vā tato nyaiḥ saṃvidaṃ caretc brahmadaṇḍam adṛṣṭeṣu dṛṣṭeṣu caturaṅgiṇīma bhedaṃ ca prathamaṃ yuñjyāt tūṣṇīṃdaṇḍaṃ tathaiva cac kāle prayojayed rājā tasmiṃs tasmiṃs tadā tadāa praṇipātaṃ ca gaccheta kāle śatror balīyasaḥc yukto sya vadham anvicched apramattaḥ pramādyataḥa praṇipātena dānena vācā madhurayā bruvanc amitram upaseveta na tu jātu viśaṅkayeta sthānāni śaṅkitānāṃ ca nityam eva vivarjayetc na ca teṣv āśvased drugdhvā jāgratīha nirākṛtāḥa na hy ato duṣkaraṃ karma kiṃ cid asti surottamac yathā vividhavṛttānām aiśvaryam amarādhipaa tathā vividhaśīlānām api saṃbhava ucyatec yateta yogam āsthāya mitrāmitrān avārayana mṛdum apy avamanyante tīkṣṇād udvijate janaḥc mātīkṣṇo māmṛdur bhūs tvaṃ tīkṣṇo bhava mṛdur bhavaa yathā vapre vegavati sarvataḥsaṃplutodakec nityaṃ vivaraṇād bādhas tathā rājyaṃ pramādyataḥa na banūn abhiyuñjīta yaugapadyena śātravānc sāmnā dānena bhedena daṇḍena ca puraṃdaraa ekaikam eṣāṃ niṣpiṃṣañ śiṣṭeṣu nipuṇaṃ caretc na ca śakto pi medhāvī sarvān evārabhen nṛpaḥa yadā syān mahatī senā hayanāgarathākulāc padātiyantrabahulā svanuraktā ṣaḍaṅginīa yadā bahuvidhāṃ vṛddhiṃ manyate pratilomataḥc tadā vivṛtya prahared dasyūnām avicārayana na sāma daṇḍopaniṣat praśasyatena mārdavaṃ śatruṣu yātrikaṃ sadāc na sasyaghāto na ca saṃkarakriyāna cāpi bhūyaḥ prakṛter vicāraṇāa māyāvibhedānupasarjanānipāpaṃ tathaiva spaśasaṃprayogātc āptair manuṣyair upacārayetapureṣu rāṣṭreṣu ca saṃprayuktaḥa purāṇi caiṣām anusṛtya bhūmipāḥpureṣu bhogān nikhilān ihājayanc pureṣu nītiṃ vihitāṃ yathāvidhiprayojayanto balavṛtrasūdanaa pradāya gūḍhāni vasūni nāmapracchidya bhogān avadhāya ca svānc duṣṭāḥ svadoṣair iti kīrtayitvāpureṣu rāṣṭreṣu ca yojayantia tathaiva cānyai ratiśāstravedibhiḥsvalaṃkṛtaiḥ śāstravidhānadṛṣṭibhiḥc suśikṣitair bhāṣyakathāviśāradaiḥpareṣu kṛtyān upadhārayasva indra uvācaa kāni liṅgāni duṣṭasya bhavanti dvijasattamac kathaṃ duṣṭaṃ vijānīyād etat pṛṣṭo bravīhi me bṛhaspatir uvācaa parokṣam aguṇān āha sadguṇān abhyasūyatic parair vā kīrtyamāneṣu tūṣṇīm āste parāṅmukhaḥa tūṣṇīṃbhāve pi hi jñānaṃ na ced bhavati kāraṇamc viśvāsam oṣṭhasaṃdaṃśaṃ śirasaś ca prakampanama karoty abhīkṣṇaṃ saṃsṛṣṭam asaṃsṛṣṭaś ca bhāṣatec adṛṣṭito vikurute dṛṣṭvā vā nābhibhāṣatea pṛthag etya samaśnāti nedam adya yathāvidhic āsane śayane yāne bhāvā lakṣyā viśeṣataḥa ārtir ārte priye prītir etāvan mitralakṣaṇamc viparītaṃ tu boddhavyam arilakṣaṇam eva tata etāny evaṃ yathoktāni budhyethās tridaśādhipac puruṣāṇāṃ praduṣṭānāṃ svabhāvo balavattaraḥa iti duṣṭasya vijñānam uktaṃ te surasattamac niśāmya śāstratattvārthaṃ yathāvad amareśvara bhīṣma uvācaa sa tad vacaḥ śatrunibarhaṇe ratastathā cakārāvitathaṃ bṛhaspateḥc cacāra kāle vijayāya cārihāvaśaṃ ca śatrūn anayat puraṃdaraḥ yudhiṣṭhira uvācaa dhārmiko rthān asaṃprāpya rājāmātyaiḥ prabādhitaḥc cyutaḥ kośāc ca daṇḍāc ca sukham icchan kathaṃ caret bhīṣma uvācaa atrāyaṃ kṣemadarśīyam itihāso nugīyatec tat te haṃ saṃpravakṣyāmi tan nibodha yudhiṣṭhiraa kṣemadarśaṃ nṛpasutaṃ yatra kṣīṇabalaṃ purāc muniḥ kālakavṛkṣīya ājagāmeti naḥ śrutame taṃ papracchopasaṃgṛhya kṛcchrām āpadam āsthitaḥa artheṣu bhāgī puruṣa īhamānaḥ punaḥ punaḥc alabdhvā madvidho rājyaṃ brahman kiṃ kartum arhatia anyatra maraṇāt steyād anyatra parasaṃśrayātc kṣudrād anyatra cācārāt tan mamācakṣva sattamaa vyādhinā cābhipannasya mānasenetareṇa vāc bahuśrutaḥ kṛtaprajñas tvadvidhaḥ śaraṇaṃ bhaveta nirvidya hi naraḥ kāmān niyamya sukham edhatec tyaktvā prītiṃ ca śokaṃ ca labdhvāprītimayaṃ vasua sukham arthāśrayaṃ yeṣām anuśocāmi tān ahamc mama hy arthāḥ subahavo naṣṭāḥ svapna ivāgatāḥa duṣkaraṃ bata kurvanti mahato rthāṃs tyajanti yec vayaṃ tv enān parityaktum asato pi na śaknumaḥa imām avasthāṃ saṃprāptaṃ dīnam ārtaṃ śriyaś cyutamc yad anyat sukham astīha tad brahmann anuśādhi māma kausalyenaivam uktas tu rājaputreṇa dhīmatāc muniḥ kālakavṛkṣīyaḥ pratyuvāca mahādyutiḥa purastād eva te buddhir iyaṃ kāryā vijānataḥc anityaṃ sarvam evedam ahaṃ ca mama cāsti yata yat kiṃ cin manyase stīti sarvaṃ nāstīti viddhi tatc evaṃ na vyathate prājñaḥ kṛcchrām apy āpadaṃ gataḥa yad dhi bhūtaṃ bhaviṣyac ca dhruvaṃ tan na bhaviṣyatic evaṃ viditavedyas tvam adharmebhyaḥ pramokṣyasea yac ca pūrve samāhāre yac ca pūrvatare parec sarvaṃ tan nāsti tac caiva taj jñātvā ko nusaṃjvareta bhūtvā ca na bhavaty etad abhūtvā ca bhavaty apic śoke na hy asti sāmarthyaṃ śokaṃ kuryāt kathaṃ naraḥa kva nu te dya pitā rājan kva nu te dya pitāmahaḥc na tvaṃ paśyasi tān adya na tvā paśyanti te pi caa ātmano dhruvatāṃ paśyaṃs tāṃs tvaṃ kim anuśocasic buddhyā caivānubudhyasva dhruvaṃ hi na bhaviṣyasia ahaṃ ca tvaṃ ca nṛpate śatravaḥ suhṛdaś ca tec avaśyaṃ na bhaviṣyāmaḥ sarvaṃ ca na bhaviṣyatia ye tu viṃśativarṣā vai triṃśadvarṣāś ca mānavāḥc arvāg eva hi te sarve mariṣyanti śaracchatāta api cen mahato vittād vipramucyeta pūruṣaḥc naitan mameti tan matvā kurvīta priyam ātmanaḥa anāgataṃ yan na mameti vidyādatikrāntaṃ yan na mameti vidyātc diṣṭaṃ balīya iti manyamānāste paṇḍitās tat satāṃ sthānam āhuḥa anāḍhyāś cāpi jīvanti rājyaṃ cāpy anuśāsatec buddhipauruṣasaṃpannās tvayā tulyādhikā janāḥa na ca tvam iva śocanti tasmāt tvam api mā śucaḥc kiṃ nu tvaṃ tair na vai śreyāṃs tulyo vā buddhipauruṣaiḥ rājaputra uvācaa yādṛcchikaṃ mamāsīt tad rājyam ity eva cintayec hriyate sarvam evedaṃ kālena mahatā dvijaa tasyaivaṃ hriyamāṇasya srotaseva tapodhanac phalam etat prapaśyāmi yathālabdhena vartaye munir uvācaa anāgatam atītaṃ ca yathā tathyaviniścayātc nānuśocasi kausalya sarvārtheṣu tathā bhavaa avāpyān kāmayasvārthān nānavāpyān kadā canac pratyutpannān anubhavan mā śucas tvam anāgatāna yathā labdhopapannārthas tathā kausalya raṃsyasec kaccic chuddhasvabhāvena śriyā hīno na śocasia purastād bhūtapūrvatvād dhīnabhāgyo hi durmatiḥc dhātāraṃ garhate nityaṃ labdhārthāṃś ca na mṛṣyatea anarhān api caivānyān manyate śrīmato janānc etasmāt kāraṇād etad duḥkhaṃ bhūyo nuvartatea īrṣyāticchedasaṃpannā rājan puruṣamāninaḥc kaccit tvaṃ na tathā prājña matsarī kosalādhipaa sahasva śriyam anyeṣāṃ yady api tvayi nāsti sāc anyatrāpi satīṃ lakṣmīṃ kuśalā bhuñjate janāḥe abhiviṣyandate śrīr hi saty api dviṣato janāta śriyaṃ ca putrapautraṃ ca manuṣyā dharmacāriṇaḥc tyāgadharmavido vīrāḥ svayam eva tyajanty utad tyaktaṃ svāyaṃbhuve vaṃśe śubhena bharatena cad nānāratnasamākīrṇaṃ rājyaṃ sphītam iti śrutiḥd tathānyair bhūmipālaiś ca tyaktaṃ rājyaṃ mahodayamd tyaktvā rājyāni te sarve vane vanyaphalāśinaḥd gatāś ca tapasaḥ pāraṃ duḥkhasyāntaṃ ca bhūmipāḥa bahu saṃkasukaṃ dṛṣṭvā vivitsāsādhanena cac tathānye saṃtyajanty enaṃ matvā paramadurlabhama tvaṃ punaḥ prājñarūpaḥ san kṛpaṇaṃ paritapyasec akāmyān kāmayāno rthān parācīnān upadrutāna tāṃ buddhim upajijñāsus tvam evainān parityajac anarthāṃś cārtharūpeṇa arthāṃś cānartharūpataḥa arthāyaiva hi keṣāṃ cid dhananāśo bhavaty utac anantyaṃ taṃ sukhaṃ matvā śriyam anyaḥ parīkṣatea ramamāṇaḥ śriyā kaś cin nānyac chreyo bhimanyatec tathā tasyehamānasya samārambho vinaśyatia kṛcchrāl labdham abhipretaṃ yadā kausalya naśyatic tadā nirvidyate so rthāt paribhagnakramo naraḥd anityāṃ tāṃ śriyaṃ matvā śriyaṃ vā kaḥ parīpsatia dharmam eke bhipadyante kalyāṇābhijanā narāḥc paratra sukham icchanto nirvidyeyuś ca laukikāta jīvitaṃ saṃtyajanty eke dhanalobhaparā narāḥc na jīvitārthaṃ manyante puruṣā hi dhanād ṛtea paśya teṣāṃ kṛpaṇatāṃ paśya teṣām abuddhitāmc adhruve jīvite mohād arthatṛṣṇām upāśritāḥa saṃcaye ca vināśānte maraṇānte ca jīvitec saṃyoge viprayogānte ko nu vipraṇayen manaḥa dhanaṃ vā puruṣaṃ rājan puruṣo vā punar dhanamc avaśyaṃ prajahāty etat tad vidvān ko nusaṃjvaretd anyatropanatā hy āpat puruṣaṃ toṣayaty utad tena śāntiṃ na labhate nāham eveti kāraṇāta anyeṣām api naśyanti suhṛdaś ca dhanāni cac paśya buddhyā manuṣyāṇāṃ rājann āpadam ātmanaḥe niyaccha yaccha saṃyaccha indriyāṇi mano girama pratiṣiddhān avāpyeṣu durlabheṣv ahiteṣu cac pratikṛṣṭeṣu bhāveṣu vyatikṛṣṭeṣv asaṃbhavee prajñānatṛpto vikrāntas tvadvidho nānuśocatia alpam icchann acapalo mṛdur dāntaḥ susaṃśitaḥc brahmacaryopapannaś ca tvadvidho naiva muhyatia na tv eva jālmīṃ kāpālīṃ vṛttim eṣitum arhasic nṛśaṃsavṛttiṃ pāpiṣṭhāṃ duḥkhāṃ kāpuruṣocitāma api mūlaphalājīvo ramasvaiko mahāvanec vāgyataḥ saṃgṛhītātmā sarvabhūtadayānvitaḥa sadṛśaṃ paṇḍitasyaitad īṣādantena dantināc yad eko ramate raṇye yac cāpy alpena tuṣyatia mahāhradaḥ saṃkṣubhita ātmanaiva prasīdatib itthaṃ naro py ātmanaiva kṛtaprajñaḥ prasīdatic etad evaṃgatasyāhaṃ sukhaṃ paśyāmi kevalama asaṃbhave śriyo rājan hīnasya sacivādibhiḥc daive pratiniviṣṭe ca kiṃ śreyo manyate bhavān munir uvācaa atha cet pauruṣaṃ kiṃ cit kṣatriyātmani paśyasic bravīmi hanta te nītiṃ rājyasya pratipattayea tāṃ cec chakṣyasy anuṣṭhātuṃ karma caiva kariṣyasic śṛṇu sarvam aśeṣeṇa yat tvāṃ vakṣyāmi tattvataḥa ācariṣyasi cet karma mahato rthān avāpsyasic rājyaṃ rājyasya mantraṃ vā mahatīṃ vā punaḥ śriyame yady etad rocate rājan punar brūhi bravīmi te rājaputra uvācaa bravītu bhagavān nītim upapanno smy ahaṃ prabhoc amogham idam adyāstu tvayā saha samāgatam munir uvācaa hitvā stambhaṃ ca mānaṃ ca krodhaharṣau bhayaṃ tathāc praty amitraṃ niṣevasva praṇipatya kṛtāñjaliḥa tam uttamena śaucena karmaṇā cābhirādhayac dātum arhati te vṛttiṃ vaidehaḥ satyasaṃgaraḥa pramāṇaṃ sarvabhūteṣu pragrahaṃ ca gamiṣyasic tataḥ sahāyān sotsāhāṃl lapsyase vyasanāñ śucīna vartamānaḥ svaśāstre vai saṃyatātmā jitendriyaḥc abhyuddharati cātmānaṃ prasādayati ca prajāḥa tenaiva tvaṃ dhṛtimatā śrīmatā cābhisatkṛtaḥc pramāṇaṃ sarvabhūteṣu gatvā pragrahaṇaṃ mahata tataḥ suhṛdbalaṃ labdhvā mantrayitvā sumantritamc antarair bhedayitvārīn bilvaṃ bilvena śātayae parair vā saṃvidaṃ kṛtvā balam apy asya ghātayaa alabhyā ye śubhā bhāvāḥ striyaś cācchādanāni cac śayyāsanāni yānāni mahārhāṇi gṛhāṇi caa pakṣiṇo mṛgajātāni rasā gandhāḥ phalāni cac teṣv eva sajjayethās tvaṃ yathā naśyet svayaṃ paraḥa yady eva pratiṣeddhavyo yady upekṣaṇam arhatib sadaiva rājaśārdūla viduṣā hitam icchatāc na jātu vivṛtaḥ kāryaḥ śatrur vinayam icchatāa vasasva paramāmitraviṣaye prājñasaṃmatec bhajasva śvetakākīyair mitrādhamam anarthakaiḥa ārambhāṃś cāsya mahato duṣkarāṃs tvaṃ prayojayac nadībandhavirodhāṃś ca balavadbhir virudhyatāma udyānāni mahārhāṇi śayanāny āsanāni cac pratibhogasukhenaiva kośam asya virecayaa yajñadānapraśaṃsāsmai brāhmaṇeṣv anuvarṇyatāmc te tvatpriyaṃ kariṣyanti taṃ ceṣyanti vṛkā ivaa asaṃśayaṃ puṇyaśīlaḥ prāpnoti paramāṃ gatimc triviṣṭape puṇyatamaṃ sthānaṃ prāpnoti pārthivaḥe kośakṣaye tv amitrāṇāṃ vaśaṃ kausalya gacchatia ubhayatra prasaktasya dharme cādharma eva cac balārthamūlaṃ vyucchidyet tena nandanti śatravaḥa nindyāsya mānuṣaṃ karma daivam asyopavarṇayac asaṃśayaṃ daivaparaḥ kṣipram eva vinaśyatia yājayainaṃ viśvajitā sarvasvena viyujyatāmc tato gacchatv asiddhārthaḥ pīḍyamāno mahājanama tyāgadharmavidaṃ muṇḍaṃ kaṃ cid asyopavarṇayac api tyāgaṃ bubhūṣeta kaccid gacched anāmayama siddhenauṣadhayogena sarvaśatruvināśināc nāgān aśvān manuṣyāṃś ca kṛtakair upaghātayaa ete cānye ca bahavo dambhayogāḥ suniścitāḥc śakyā viṣahatā kartuṃ naklībena nṛpātmaja rājaputra uvācaa na nikṛtyā na dambhena brahmann icchāmi jīvitumc nādharmayuktān iccheyam arthān sumahato py ahama purastād eva bhagavan mayaitad apavarjitamc yena māṃ nābhiśaṅketa yad vā kṛtsnaṃ hitaṃ bhaveta ānṛśaṃsyena dharmeṇa loke hy asmiñ jijīviṣuḥc nāham etad alaṃ kartuṃ naitan mayy upapadyate munir uvācaa upapannas tvam etena yathā kṣatriya bhāṣasec prakṛtyā hy upapanno si buddhyā cādbhutadarśanaa ubhayor eva vām arthe yatiṣye tava tasya cac saṃśleṣaṃ vā kariṣyāmi śāśvataṃ hy anapāyinama tvādṛśaṃ hi kule jātam anṛśaṃsaṃ bahuśrutamc amātyaṃ ko na kurvīta rājyapraṇayakovidama yas tvaṃ pravrajito rājyād vyasanaṃ cottamaṃ gataḥc ānṛśaṃsyena vṛttena kṣatriyecchasi jīvituma āgantā madgṛhaṃ tāta vaidehaḥ satyasaṃgaraḥc yathāhaṃ taṃ niyokṣyāmi tat kariṣyaty asaṃśayam bhīṣma uvācaa tata āhūya vaidehaṃ munir vacanam abravītc ayaṃ rājakule jāto viditābhyantaro mamaa ādarśa iva śuddhātmā śāradaś candramā ivac nāsmin paśyāmi vṛjinaṃ sarvato me parīkṣitaḥa tena te saṃdhir evāstu viśvasāsmin yathā mayic na rājyam anamātyena śakyaṃ śāstum amitrahana amātyaḥ śūra eva syād buddhisaṃpanna eva cac tābhyāṃ caiva bhayaṃ rājñaḥ paśya rājyasya yojaname dharmātmanāṃ kva cil loke nānyāsti gatir īdṛśīa kṛtātmā rājaputro yaṃ satāṃ mārgam anuṣṭhitaḥc susaṃgṛhītas tv evaiṣa tvayā dharmapurogamaḥe saṃsevyamānaḥ śatrūṃs te gṛhṇīyān mahato gaṇāna yady ayaṃ pratiyudhyet tvāṃ svakarma kṣatriyasya tatc jigīṣamāṇas tvāṃ yuddhe pitṛpaitāmahe padea tvaṃ cāpi pratiyudhyethā vijigīṣuvrate sthitaḥc ayuddhvaiva niyogān me vaśe vaideha te sthitaḥa sa tvaṃ dharmam avekṣasva tyaktvādharmam asāṃpratamc na hi kāmān na ca drohāt svadharmaṃ hātum arhasia naiva nityaṃ jayas tāta naiva nityaṃ parājayaḥc tasmād bhojayitavyaś ca bhoktavyaś ca paro janaḥa ātmany eva hi saṃdṛśyāv ubhau jayaparājayauc niḥśeṣakāriṇāṃ tāta niḥśeṣakaraṇād bhayama ity uktaḥ pratyuvācedaṃ vacanaṃ brāhmaṇarṣabhamc abhipūjyābhisatkṛtya pūjārham anumānya caa yathā brūyān mahāprājño yathā brūyād bahuśrutaḥc śreyaskāmo yathā brūyād ubhayor yat kṣamaṃ bhaveta tathā vacanam ukto smi kariṣyāmi ca tat tathāc etad dhi paramaṃ śreyo na me trāsti vicāraṇāa tataḥ kauśalyam āhūya vaideho vākyam abravītc dharmato nītitaś caiva balena ca jito mayāa so haṃ tvayā tv ātmaguṇair jitaḥ pārthivasattamac ātmānam anavajñāya jitavad vartatāṃ bhavāna nāvamanye ca te buddhiṃ nāvamanye ca pauruṣamc nāvamanye jayāmīti jitavad vartatāṃ bhavāna yathāvat pūjito rājan gṛhaṃ gantāsi me gṛhātc tataḥ saṃpūjya tau vipraṃ viśvastau jagmatur gṛhāna vaidehas tv atha kausalyaṃ praveśya gṛham añjasāc pādyārghyamadhuparkais taṃ pūjārhaṃ pratyapūjayata dadau duhitaraṃ cāsmai ratnāni vividhāni cac eṣa rājñāṃ paro dharmaḥ sahyau jayaparājayau yudhiṣṭhira uvācaa brāhmaṇakṣatriyaviśāṃ śūdrāṇāṃ ca paraṃtapac dharmo vṛttaṃ ca vṛttiś ca vṛttyupāyaphalāni caa rājñāṃ vṛttaṃ ca kośaś ca kośasaṃjananaṃ mahatc amātyaguṇavṛddhiś ca prakṛtīnāṃ ca vardhanama ṣāḍguṇyaguṇakalpaś ca senānītis tathaiva cac duṣṭasya ca parijñānam aduṣṭasya ca lakṣaṇama samahīnādhikānāṃ ca yathāval lakṣaṇoccayaḥc madhyamasya ca tuṣṭyarthaṃ yathā stheyaṃ vivardhatāa kṣīṇasaṃgrahavṛttiś ca yathāvat saṃprakīrtitāc laghunādeśarūpeṇa granthayogena bhārataa vijigīṣos tathāvṛttam uktaṃ caiva tathaiva tec gaṇānāṃ vṛttim icchāmi śrotuṃ matimatāṃ varaa yathā gaṇāḥ pravardhante na bhidyante ca bhāratac arīn hi vijigīṣante suhṛdaḥ prāpnuvanti caa bhedamūlo vināśo hi gaṇānām upalabhyatec mantrasaṃvaraṇaṃ duḥkhaṃ bahūnām iti me matiḥa etad icchāmy ahaṃ śrotuṃ nikhilena paraṃtapac yathā ca te na bhidyeraṃs tac ca me brūhi pārthiva bhīṣma uvācaa gaṇānāṃ ca kulānāṃ ca rājñāṃ ca bharatarṣabhac vairasaṃdīpanāv etau lobhāmarṣau janādhipaa lobham eko hi vṛṇute tato marṣam anantaramc tau kṣayavyayasaṃyuktāv anyonyajanitāśrayaua cāramantrabalādānaiḥ sāmadānavibhedanaiḥc kṣayavyayabhayopāyaiḥ karśayantītaretarama tatra dānena bhidyante gaṇāḥ saṃghātavṛttayaḥc bhinnā vimanasaḥ sarve gacchanty arivaśaṃ bhayāta bhedād gaṇā vinaśyanti bhinnāḥ sūpajapāḥ paraiḥc tasmāt saṃghātayogeṣu prayateran gaṇāḥ sadāa arthā hy evādhigamyante saṃghātabalapauruṣātc bāhyāś ca maitrīṃ kurvanti teṣu saṃghātavṛttiṣua jñānavṛddhān praśaṃsantaḥ śuśrūṣantaḥ parasparamc vinivṛttābhisaṃdhānāḥ sukham edhanti sarvaśaḥa dharmiṣṭhān vyavahārāṃś ca sthāpayantaś ca śāstrataḥc yathāvat saṃpravartanto vivardhante gaṇottamāḥa putrān bhrātṝn nigṛhṇanto vinaye ca sadā ratāḥc vinītāṃś ca pragṛhṇanto vivardhante gaṇottamāḥa cāramantravidhāneṣu kośasaṃnicayeṣu cac nityayuktā mahābāho vardhante sarvato gaṇāḥa prājñāñ śūrān maheṣvāsān karmasu sthirapauruṣānc mānayantaḥ sadā yuktā vivardhante gaṇā nṛpaa dravyavantaś ca śūrāś ca śastrajñāḥ śāstrapāragāḥc kṛcchrāsv āpatsu saṃmūḍhān gaṇān uttārayanti tea krodho bhedo bhayo daṇḍaḥ karśanaṃ nigraho vadhaḥc nayanty arivaśaṃ sadyo gaṇān bharatasattamaa tasmān mānayitavyās te gaṇamukhyāḥ pradhānataḥc lokayātrā samāyattā bhūyasī teṣu pārthivaa mantraguptiḥ pradhāneṣu cāraś cāmitrakarśanac na gaṇāḥ kṛtsnaśo mantraṃ śrotum arhanti bhārataa gaṇamukhyais tu saṃbhūya kāryaṃ gaṇahitaṃ mithaḥc pṛthag gaṇasya bhinnasya vimatasya tato nyathāe arthāḥ pratyavasīdanti tathānarthā bhavanti caa teṣām anyonyabhinnānāṃ svaśaktim anutiṣṭhatāmc nigrahaḥ paṇḍitaiḥ kāryaḥ kṣipram eva pradhānataḥa kuleṣu kalahā jātāḥ kulavṛddhair upekṣitāḥc gotrasya rājan kurvanti gaṇasaṃbhedakārikāma ābhyantaraṃ bhayaṃ rakṣyaṃ surakṣyaṃ bāhyato bhayamc abhyantarād bhayaṃ jātaṃ sadyo mūlaṃ nikṛntatia akasmāt krodhalobhād vā mohād vāpi svabhāvajātc anyonyaṃ nābhibhāṣante tat parābhavalakṣaṇama jātyā ca sadṛśāḥ sarve kulena sadṛśās tathāc na tu śauryeṇa buddhyā vā rūpadravyeṇa vā punaḥa bhedāc caiva pramādāc ca nāmyante ripubhir gaṇāḥc tasmāt saṃghātam evāhur gaṇānāṃ śaraṇaṃ mahat yudhiṣṭhira uvācaa mahān ayaṃ dharmapatho bahuśākhaś ca bhāratac kiṃ svid eveha dharmāṇām anuṣṭheyatamaṃ matama kiṃ kāryaṃ sarvadharmāṇāṃ garīyo bhavato matamc yathāyaṃ puruṣo dharmam iha ca pretya cāpnuyāt bhīṣma uvācaa mātāpitror gurūṇāṃ ca pūjā bahumatā mamac atra yukto naro lokān yaśaś ca mahad aśnutea yad ete hy abhijānīyuḥ karma tāta supūjitāḥc dharmyaṃ dharmaviruddhaṃ vā tat kartavyaṃ yudhiṣṭhiraa na tair anabhyanujñāto dharmam anyaṃ prakalpayetc yam ete bhyanujānīyuḥ sa dharma iti niścayaḥa eta eva trayo lokā eta evāśramās trayaḥc eta eva trayo vedā eta eva trayo gnayaḥa pitā hy agnir gārhapatyo mātāgnir dakṣiṇaḥ smṛtaḥc gurur āhavanīyas tu sāgnitretā garīyasīa triṣv apramādyann eteṣu trīṃl lokān avajeṣyasic pitṛvṛttyā tv imaṃ lokaṃ mātṛvṛttyā tathāparame brahmalokaṃ guror vṛttyā nityam eva cariṣyasia samyag eteṣu vartasva triṣu lokeṣu bhāratac yaśaḥ prāpsyasi bhadraṃ te dharmaṃ ca sumahāphalama naitān atiśayej jātu nātyaśnīyān na dūṣayetc nityaṃ paricarec caiva tad vai sukṛtam uttamame kīrtiṃ puṇyaṃ yaśo lokān prāpsyase ca janādhipaa sarve tasyādṛtā lokā yasyaite traya ādṛtāḥc anādṛtās tu yasyaite sarvās tasyāphalāḥ kriyāḥa naivāyaṃ na paro lokas tasya caiva paraṃtapac amānitā nityam eva yasyaite guravas trayaḥa na cāsmin na pare loke yaśas tasya prakāśatec na cānyad api kalyāṇaṃ pāratraṃ samudāhṛtama tebhya eva tu tat sarvaṃ kṛtyayā visṛjāmy ahamc tad āsīn me śataguṇaṃ sahasraguṇam eva cae tasmān me saṃprakāśante trayo lokā yudhiṣṭhiraa daśaiva tu sadācāryaḥ śrotriyān atiricyatec daśācāryān upādhyāya upādhyāyān pitā daśaa pitṝn daśa tu mātaikā sarvāṃ vā pṛthivīm apic gurutvenābhibhavati nāsti mātṛsamo guruḥe gurur garīyān pitṛto mātṛtaś ceti me matiḥa ubhau hi mātāpitarau janmani vyupayujyataḥc śarīram etau sṛjataḥ pitā mātā ca bhāratae ācāryaśiṣṭā yā jātiḥ sā divyā sājarāmarāa avadhyā hi sadā mātā pitā cāpy apakāriṇauc na saṃduṣyati tat kṛtvā na ca te dūṣayanti tame dharmāya yatamānānāṃ vidur devāḥ saharṣibhiḥa ya āvṛṇoty avitathena karṇāvṛtaṃ bruvann amṛtaṃ saṃprayacchanc taṃ vai manye pitaraṃ mātaraṃ catasmai na druhyet kṛtam asya jānana vidyāṃ śrutvā ye guruṃ nādriyantepratyāsannaṃ manasā karmaṇā vāb teṣāṃ pāpaṃ bhrūṇahatyāviśiṣṭaṃb na cāsya tad brahmaphalaṃ dadātic yathaiva te gurubhir bhāvanīyāstathā teṣāṃ guravo py arcanīyāḥa tasmāt pūjayitavyāś ca saṃvibhajyāś ca yatnataḥc guravo rcayitavyāś ca purāṇaṃ dharmam icchatāa yena prītāś ca pitaras tena prītaḥ pitāmahaḥc prīṇāti mātaraṃ yena pṛthivī tena pūjitāa yena prīṇāty upādhyāyaṃ tena syād brahma pūjitamc mātṛtaḥ pitṛtaś caiva tasmāt pūjyatamo guruḥe ṛṣayaś ca hi devāś ca prīyante pitṛbhiḥ sahaf pūjyamāneṣu guruṣu tasmāt pūjyatamo guruḥa na kena cana vṛttena hy avajñeyo gurur bhavetc na ca mātā na ca pitā tādṛśo yādṛśo guruḥa na te vamānam arhanti na ca te dūṣayanti tamc gurūṇām eva satkāraṃ vidur devāḥ saharṣibhiḥa upādhyāyaṃ pitaraṃ mātaraṃ caye bhidruhyanti manasā karmaṇā vāc teṣāṃ pāpaṃ bhrūṇahatyāviśiṣṭaṃtasmān nānyaḥ pāpakṛd asti loked bhṛto vṛddho yo na bibharti putraḥd svayonijaḥ pitaraṃ mātaraṃ cad tad vai pāpaṃ bhrūṇahatyāviśiṣṭaṃd tasmān nānyaḥ pāpakṛd asti lokea mitradruhaḥ kṛtaghnasya strīghnasya piśunasya cac caturṇāṃ vayam eteṣāṃ niṣkṛtiṃ nānuśuśrumaḥa etat sarvam atideśena sṛṣṭaṃyat kartavyaṃ puruṣeṇeha lokec etac chreyo nānyad asmād viśiṣṭaṃsarvān dharmān anusṛtyaitad uktam yudhiṣṭhira uvācaa kathaṃ dharme sthātum icchan naro varteta bhāratac vidvañ jijñāsamānāya prabrūhi bharatarṣabhaa satyaṃ caivānṛtaṃ cobhe lokān āvṛtya tiṣṭhataḥc tayoḥ kim ācared rājan puruṣo dharmaniścitaḥa kiṃ svit satyaṃ kim anṛtaṃ kiṃ svid dharmyaṃ sanātanamc kasmin kāle vadet satyaṃ kasmin kāle nṛtaṃ vadet bhīṣma uvācaa satyasya vacanaṃ sādhu na satyād vidyate paramc yad bhūloke sudurjñātaṃ tat te vakṣyāmi bhārataa bhavet satyaṃ na vaktavyaṃ vaktavyam anṛtaṃ bhavetc yatrānṛtaṃ bhavet satyaṃ satyaṃ vāpy anṛtaṃ bhaveta tādṛśe muhyate bālo yatra satyam aniṣṭhitamc satyānṛte viniścitya tato bhavati dharmavita apy anāryo kṛtaprajñaḥ puruṣo pi sudāruṇaḥc sumahat prāpnuyāt puṇyaṃ balāko ndhavadhād ivaa kim āścaryaṃ ca yan mūḍho dharmakāmo py adharmavitc sumahat prāpnuyāt pāpaṃ gaṅgāyām iva kauśikaḥa tādṛśo yam anupraśno yatra dharmaḥ sudurvacaḥc duṣkaraḥ pratisaṃkhyātuṃ tarkeṇātra vyavasyatia prabhāvārthāya bhūtānāṃ dharmapravacanaṃ kṛtamc yat syād ahiṃsāsaṃyuktaṃ sa dharma iti niścayaḥd ahiṃsārthāya bhūtānāṃ dharmapravacanaṃ kṛtamd yat syād ahiṃsāsaṃyuktaṃ sa dharma iti niścayaḥd ahiṃsā satyam akrodhas tapo dānaṃ damo matiḥd anasūyāpy amātsaryam anīrṣyā śīlam eva cad eṣa dharmaḥ kuruśreṣṭha kathitaḥ parameṣṭhinād brahmaṇā devadevena ayaṃ caiva sanātanaḥd asmin dharme sthito rājan naro bhadrāṇi paśyatid śrauto vadhātmako dharma ahiṃsā paramārthikaḥa dhāraṇād dharma ity āhur dharmeṇa vidhṛtāḥ prajāḥc yat syād dhāraṇasaṃyuktaṃ sa dharma iti niścayaḥd hitaṃ syād yatra bhūtānāṃ patitānāṃ susaṃkaṭea śrutidharma iti hy eke nety āhur apare janāḥc na tu tat pratyasūyāmo na hi sarvaṃ vidhīyatea ye nyāyena jihīrṣanto dhanam icchanti karhi citc tebhyas tan na tad ākhyeyaṃ sa dharma iti niścayaḥa akūjanena cen mokṣo nātra kūjet kathaṃ canac avaśyaṃ kūjitavyaṃ vā śaṅkeran vāpy akūjanātd ye nye cāpy anṛtaṃ kuryuḥ kuryād eva vicāraṇama śreyas tatrānṛtaṃ vaktuṃ satyād iti vicāritamb akṣayebhyo vadhaṃ rājan kuryād evāvicārayanb abuddhānuśaye doṣaṃ śreyas tatrānṛtaṃ bhavetb na stenaiḥ saha saṃbandhān mucyate śapathād apib śreyas tatrānṛtaṃ vaktuṃ satyād iti hi dhāraṇāc yaḥ pāpaiḥ saha saṃbandhān mucyate śapathād itia na ca tebhyo dhanaṃ deyaṃ śakye sati kathaṃ canac pāpebhyo hi dhanaṃ dattaṃ dātāram api pīḍayeta svaśarīroparodhena varam ādātum icchataḥc satyasaṃpratipattyarthaṃ ye brūyuḥ sākṣiṇaḥ kva cite anuktvā tatra tad vācyaṃ sarve te nṛtavādinaḥa prāṇātyaye vivāhe ca vaktavyam anṛtaṃ bhavetc arthasya rakṣaṇārthāya pareṣāṃ dharmakāraṇāte pareṣāṃ dharmam ākāṅkṣan nīcaḥ syād dharmabhikṣukaḥa pratiśrutya tu dātavyaṃ śvaḥkāryas tu balātkṛtaḥc yaḥ kaś cid dharmasamayāt pracyuto dharmam āsthitaḥd dambhenaiva sa hantavyas taṃ panthānaṃ samāśritaḥd cyutaḥ sadaiva dharmebhyo mānavaṃ dharmam āsthitaḥa śaṭhaḥ svadharmam utsṛjya tam icched upajīvitumc sarvopāyair nihantavyaḥ pāpo nikṛtijīvanaḥa dhanam ity eva pāpānāṃ sarveṣām iha niścayaḥc ye viṣahyā hy asaṃbhojyā nikṛtyā patanaṃ gatāḥa cyutā devamanuṣyebhyo yathā pretās tathaiva teb niryajñās tapasā hīnā mā sma taiḥ saha saṃgamaḥc dhanādānād duḥkhataraṃ jīvitād viprayojanama ayaṃ vo rocatāṃ dharma iti vācyaḥ prayatnataḥc na kaś cid asti pāpānāṃ dharma ity eṣa niścayaḥa tathāgataṃ ca yo hanyān nāsau pāpena lipyatec svakarmaṇā hataṃ hanti hata eva sa hanyatee teṣu yaḥ samayaṃ kaś cit kurvīta hatabuddhiṣua yathā kākaś ca gṛdhraś ca tathaivopadhijīvinaḥc ūrdhvaṃ dehavimokṣānte bhavanty etāsu yoniṣua yasmin yathā vartate yo manuṣyastasmiṃs tathā vartitavyaṃ sa dharmaḥc māyācāro māyayā vartitavyaḥsādhvācāraḥ sādhunā pratyudeyaḥ yudhiṣṭhira uvācaa kliśyamāneṣu bhūteṣu tais tair bhāvais tatas tataḥc durgāṇy atitared yena tan me brūhi pitāmaha bhīṣma uvācaa āśrameṣu yathokteṣu yathoktaṃ ye dvijātayaḥc vartante saṃyatātmāno durgāṇy atitaranti tea ye dambhān na japanti sma yeṣāṃ vṛttiś ca saṃvṛtāc viṣayāṃś ca nigṛhṇanti durgāṇy atitaranti ted pratyāhur nocyamānā ye na hiṃsanti ca hiṃsitāḥd prayacchanti na yācante durgāṇy atitaranti tea vāsayanty atithīn nityaṃ nityaṃ ye cānasūyakāḥc nityaṃ svādhyāyaśīlāś ca durgāṇy atitaranti tea mātāpitroś ca ye vṛttiṃ vartante dharmakovidāḥc varjayanti divāsvapnaṃ durgāṇy atitaranti tea sveṣu dāreṣu vartante nyāyavṛtteṣv ṛtāv ṛtauc agnihotraparāḥ santo durgāṇy atitaranti tea ye na lobhān nayanty arthān rājāno rajasāvṛtāḥc viṣayān parirakṣanto durgāṇy atitaranti tea āhaveṣu ca ye śūrās tyaktvā maraṇajaṃ bhayamc dharmeṇa jayam icchanto durgāṇy atitaranti tea ye pāpāni na kurvanti karmaṇā manasā girāc nikṣiptadaṇḍā bhūteṣu durgāṇy atitaranti tea ye vadantīha satyāni prāṇatyāge py upasthitec pramāṇabhūtā bhūtānāṃ durgāṇy atitaranti tea anadhyāyeṣu ye viprāḥ svādhyāyaṃ naiva kurvatec taponityāḥ sutapaso durgāṇy atitaranti tea karmāṇy akuhakārthāni yeṣāṃ vācaś ca sūnṛtāḥc yeṣām arthāś ca sādhvarthā durgāṇy atitaranti tea ye tapaś ca tapasyanti kaumārabrahmacāriṇaḥc vidyāvedavratasnātā durgāṇy atitaranti tea ye ca saṃśāntarajasaḥ saṃśāntatamasaś ca yec satye sthitā mahātmāno durgāṇy atitaranti tea yeṣāṃ na kaś cit trasati trasanti na ca kasya citc yeṣām ātmasamo loko durgāṇy atitaranti tea paraśriyā na tapyante ye santaḥ puruṣarṣabhāḥc grāmyād annān nivṛttāś ca durgāṇy atitaranti tea sarvān devān namasyanti sarvān dharmāṃś ca śṛṇvatec ye śraddadhānā dāntāś ca durgāṇy atitaranti tea ye na mānitam icchanti mānayanti ca ye paramc mānyamānā na manyante durgāṇy atitaranti tea ye śrāddhāni ca kurvanti tithyāṃ tithyāṃ prajārthinaḥc suviśuddhena manasā durgāṇy atitaranti tea ye krodhaṃ naiva kurvanti kruddhān saṃśamayanti cac na ca kupyanti bhṛtyebhyo durgāṇy atitaranti tea madhu māṃsaṃ ca ye nityaṃ varjayantīha mānavāḥc janmaprabhṛti madyaṃ ca durgāṇy atitaranti tea yātrārthaṃ bhojanaṃ yeṣāṃ saṃtānārthaṃ ca maithunamc vāk satyavacanārthāya durgāṇy atitaranti tea īśvaraṃ sarvabhūtānāṃ jagataḥ prabhavāpyayamc bhaktā nārāyaṇaṃ ye ca durgāṇy atitaranti tea ya eṣa raktapadmākṣaḥ pītavāsā mahābhujaḥc suhṛd bhrātā ca mitraṃ ca saṃbandhī ca tavācyutaḥa ya imān sakalāṃl lokāṃś carmavat pariveṣṭayetc icchan prabhur acintyātmā govindaḥ puruṣottamaḥa sthitaḥ priyahite jiṣṇoḥ sa eṣa puruṣarṣabhac rājaṃs tava ca durdharṣo vaikuṇṭhaḥ puruṣottamaḥa ya enaṃ saṃśrayantīha bhaktyā nārāyaṇaṃ harimc te tarantīha durgāṇi na me trāsti vicāraṇād asminn arpitakarmāṇaḥ sarvabhāvena bhāratad kṛṣṇe kamalapatrākṣe durgāṇy atitaranti ted lokarakṣārtham utpannam adityāṃ kaśyapātmajamd devam indraṃ namasyanti durgāṇy atitaranti ted brahmāṇaṃ lokakartāraṃ ye namasyanti satpatimd yaṣṭavyaṃ kratubhir devaṃ durgāṇy atitaranti ted yaṃ viṣṇur indraḥ śaṃbhuś ca brahmā lokapitāmahaḥd stuvanti vividhaiḥ stotrair devadevaṃ maheśvaramd tam arcayanti ye śaśvad durgāṇy atitaranti tea durgātitaraṇaṃ ye ca paṭhanti śrāvayanti cac pāṭhayanti ca viprebhyo durgāṇy atitaranti tea iti kṛtyasamuddeśaḥ kīrtitas te mayānaghac saṃtared yena durgāṇi paratreha ca mānavaḥ yudhiṣṭhira uvācaa asaumyāḥ saumyarūpeṇa saumyāś cāsaumyadarśinaḥc īdṛśān puruṣāṃs tāta kathaṃ vidyāmahe vayam bhīṣma uvācaa atrāpy udāharantīmam itihāsaṃ purātanamc vyāghragomāyusaṃvādaṃ taṃ nibodha yudhiṣṭhiraa purikāyāṃ puri purā śrīmatyāṃ pauriko nṛpaḥc parahiṃsāruciḥ krūro babhūva puruṣādhamaḥa sa tv āyuṣi parikṣīṇe jagāmānīpsitāṃ gatimc gomāyutvaṃ ca saṃprāpto dūṣitaḥ pūrvakarmaṇāa saṃsmṛtya pūrvajātiṃ sa nirvedaṃ paramaṃ gataḥc na bhakṣayati māṃsāni parair upahṛtāny apia ahiṃsraḥ sarvabhūteṣu satyavāk sudṛḍhavrataḥc cakāra ca yathākāmam āhāraṃ patitaiḥ phalaiḥd parṇāhāraḥ kadā cic ca niyamavratavān apid kadā cid udakenāpi vartayann anuyantritaḥa śmaśāne tasya cāvāso gomāyoḥ saṃmato bhavatc janmabhūmyanurodhāc ca nānyad vāsam arocayata tasya śaucam amṛṣyantaḥ sarve te sahajātayaḥc cālayanti sma tāṃ buddhiṃ vacanaiḥ praśrayottaraiḥa vasan pitṛvane raudre śaucaṃ lapsitum icchasic iyaṃ vipratipattis te yadā tvaṃ piśitāśanaḥa tatsamo vā bhavāsmābhir bhakṣyān dāsyāmahe vayamc bhuṅkṣva śaucaṃ parityajya yad dhi bhuktaṃ tad asti tea iti teṣāṃ vacaḥ śrutvā pratyuvāca samāhitaḥc madhuraiḥ praśritair vākyair hetumadbhir aniṣṭhuraiḥa apramāṇaṃ prasūtir me śīlataḥ kriyate kulamc prārthayiṣye tu tat karma yena vistīryate yaśaḥa śmaśāne yadi vāso me samādhir me niśāmyatāmc ātmā phalati karmāṇi nāśramo dharmalakṣaṇama āśrame yo dvijaṃ hanyād gāṃ vā dadyād anāśramec kiṃ nu tat pātakaṃ na syāt tad vā dattaṃ vṛthā bhaveta bhavantaḥ sarvalobhena kevalaṃ bhakṣaṇe ratāḥc anubandhe tu ye doṣās tān na paśyanti mohitāḥa apratyayakṛtāṃ garhyām arthāpanayadūṣitāmc iha cāmutra cāniṣṭāṃ tasmād vṛttiṃ na rocayea taṃ śuciṃ paṇḍitaṃ matvā śārdūlaḥ khyātavikramaḥc kṛtvātmasadṛśāṃ pūjāṃ sācivye vardhayat svayama saumya vijñātarūpas tvaṃ gaccha yātrāṃ mayā sahac vriyantām īpsitā bhogāḥ parihāryāś ca puṣkalāḥa tīkṣṇā vayam iti khyātā bhavato jñāpayāmahec mṛdupūrvaṃ ghātinas te śreyaś cādhigamiṣyatia atha saṃpūjya tad vākyaṃ mṛgendrasya mahātmanaḥc gomāyuḥ praśritaṃ vākyaṃ babhāṣe kiṃ cid ānataḥa sadṛśaṃ mṛgarājaitat tava vākyaṃ madantarec yat sahāyān mṛgayase dharmārthakuśalāñ śucīna na śakyam anamātyena mahattvam anuśāsitumc duṣṭāmātyena vā vīra śarīraparipanthināa sahāyān anuraktāṃs tu yatetānupasaṃhitānc parasparam asaṃghuṣṭān vijigīṣūn alolupāna tān atītopadhān prājñān hite yuktān manasvinaḥc pūjayethā mahābhāgān yathācāryān yathā pitṝna na tv evaṃ mama saṃtoṣād rocate nyan mṛgādhipac na kāmaye sukhān bhogān aiśvaryaṃ vā tvadāśrayama na yokṣyati hi me śīlaṃ tava bhṛtyaiḥ purātanaiḥc te tvāṃ vibhedayiṣyanti duḥkhaśīlā madantarea saṃśrayaḥ ślāghanīyas tvam anyeṣām api bhāsvatāmc kṛtātmā sumahābhāgaḥ pāpakeṣv apy adāruṇaḥa dīrghadarśī mahotsāhaḥ sthūlalakṣyo mahābalaḥc kṛtī cāmoghakartāsi bhāvyaiś ca samalaṃkṛtaḥa kiṃ tu svenāsmi saṃtuṣṭo duḥkhā vṛttir anuṣṭhitāc sevāyāś cāpi nābhijñaḥ svacchandena vanecaraḥa rājopakrośadoṣāś ca sarve saṃśrayavāsināmc vanacaryā ca niḥsaṅgā nirbhayā niravagrahāa nṛpeṇāhūyamānasya yat tiṣṭhati bhayaṃ hṛdic na tat tiṣṭhati tuṣṭānāṃ vane mūlaphalāśināma pānīyaṃ vā nirāyāsaṃ svādv annaṃ vā bhayottaramc vicārya khalu paśyāmi tat sukhaṃ yatra nirvṛtiḥa aparādhair na tāvanto bhṛtyāḥ śiṣṭā narādhipaiḥc upaghātair yathā bhṛtyā dūṣitā nidhanaṃ gatāḥa yadi tv etan mayā kāryaṃ mṛgendro yadi manyatec samayaṃ kṛtam icchāmi vartitavyaṃ yathā mayia madīyā mānanīyās te śrotavyaṃ ca hitaṃ vacaḥc kalpitā yā ca te vṛttiḥ sā bhavet tava susthirāa na mantrayeyam anyais te sacivaiḥ saha karhi citc nītimantaḥ parīpsanto vṛthā brūyuḥ pare mayia eka ekena saṃgamya raho brūyāṃ hitaṃ tavac na ca te jñātikāryeṣu praṣṭavyo haṃ hitāhitea mayā saṃmantrya paścāc ca na hiṃsyāḥ sacivās tvayāc madīyānāṃ ca kupito mā tvaṃ daṇḍaṃ nipātayeḥa evam astv iti tenāsau mṛgendreṇābhipūjitaḥc prāptavān matisācivyaṃ gomāyur vyāghrayonitaḥa taṃ tathā satkṛtaṃ dṛṣṭvā yujyamānaṃ ca karmaṇic prādviṣan kṛtasaṃghātāḥ pūrvabhṛtyā muhur muhuḥa mitrabuddhyā ca gomāyuṃ sāntvayitvā praveśya cac doṣeṣu samatāṃ netum aicchann aśubhabuddhayaḥa anyathā hy ucitāḥ pūrvaṃ paradravyāpahāriṇaḥc aśaktāḥ kiṃ cid ādātuṃ dravyaṃ gomāyuyantritāḥa vyutthānaṃ cātra kāṅkṣadbhiḥ kathābhiḥ pravilobhyatec dhanena mahatā caiva buddhir asya vilobhyatea na cāpi sa mahāprājñas tasmād dhairyāc cacāla hac athāsya samayaṃ kṛtvā vināśāya sthitāḥ parea īpsitaṃ ca mṛgendrasya māṃsaṃ yat tatra saṃskṛtamc apanīya svayaṃ tad dhi tair nyastaṃ tasya veśmania yadarthaṃ cāpy apahṛtaṃ yena yac caiva mantritamc tasya tad viditaṃ sarvaṃ kāraṇārthaṃ ca marṣitama samayo yaṃ kṛtas tena sācivyam upagacchatāc nopaghātas tvayā grāhyo rājan maitrīm ihecchatād iti tasya ca mantrasya sthityarthaṃ tad upekṣitamd bhīṣma uvācad kṣudhitasya mṛgendrasya bhoktum abhyutthitasya caa bhojane copahartavye tan māṃsaṃ na sma dṛśyatec mṛgarājena cājñaptaṃ mṛgyatāṃ cora ity utaa kṛtakaiś cāpi tan māṃsaṃ mṛgendrāyopavarṇitamc sacivenopanītaṃ te viduṣā prājñamānināa saroṣas tv atha śārdūlaḥ śrutvā gomāyucāpalamc babhūvāmarṣito rājā vadhaṃ cāsyābhyarocayata chidraṃ tu tasya tad dṛṣṭvā procus te pūrvamantriṇaḥc sarveṣām eva so smākaṃ vṛttibhaṅgeṣu vartated niścityaivaṃ tatas tasya te tat karmāṇy avarṇayana idaṃ cāsyedṛśaṃ karma vāllabhyena tu rakṣyatec śrutaś ca svāminā pūrvaṃ yādṛśo naiṣa tādṛśaḥa vāṅmātreṇaiva dharmiṣṭhaḥ svabhāvena tu dāruṇaḥc dharmacchadmā hy ayaṃ pāpo vṛthācāraparigrahaḥe kāryārthaṃ bhojanārtheṣu vrateṣu kṛtavāñ śramamf yadi vipratyayo hy eṣa tad idaṃ darśayāma tef tanmāṃsaṃ caiva gomāyos tatkṣaṇāt tais tu ḍaukitama māṃsāpanayanaṃ jñātvā vyāghras teṣāṃ tu tad vacaḥc ājñāpayām āsa tadā gomāyur vadhyatām itia śārdūlavacanaṃ śrutvā śārdūlajananī tataḥc mṛgarājaṃ hitair vākyaiḥ saṃbodhayitum āgamata putra naitat tvayā grāhyaṃ kapaṭārambhasaṃvṛtamc karmasaṃgharṣajair doṣair duṣyaty aśucibhiḥ śuciḥa nocchritaṃ sahate kaś cit prakriyā vairakārikāc śucer api hi yuktasya doṣa eva nipātyated muner api vanasthasya svāni karmāṇi kurvataḥd utpadyante trayaḥ pakṣā mitrodāsīnaśatravaḥa lubdhānāṃ śucayo dveṣyāḥ kātarāṇāṃ tarasvinaḥc mūrkhāṇāṃ paṇḍitā dveṣyā daridrāṇāṃ mahādhanāḥe adhārmikāṇāṃ dharmiṣṭhā virūpāṇāṃ surūpakāḥa bahavaḥ paṇḍitā lubdhāḥ sarve māyopajīvinaḥc kuryur doṣam adoṣasya bṛhaspatimater apia śūnyāt tac ca gṛhān māṃsaṃ yad adyāpahṛtaṃ tavac necchate dīyamānaṃ ca sādhu tāvad vimṛśyatāma asatyāḥ satyasaṃkāśāḥ satyāś cāsatyadarśinaḥc dṛśyante vividhā bhāvās teṣu yuktaṃ parīkṣaṇama talavad dṛśyate vyoma khadyoto havyavāḍ ivac na caivāsti talaṃ vyomni na khadyote hutāśanaḥa tasmāt pratyakṣadṛṣṭo pi yuktam arthaḥ parīkṣitumc parīkṣya jñāpayan hy arthān na paścāt paritapyatea na duṣkaram idaṃ putra yat prabhur ghātayet paramc ślāghanīyā ca varyā ca loke prabhavatāṃ kṣamāa sthāpito yaṃ putra tvayā sāmanteṣv adhi viśrutaḥc duḥkhenāsādyate pātraṃ dhāryatām eṣa te suhṛta dūṣitaṃ paradoṣair hi gṛhṇīte yo nyathā śucimc svayaṃ saṃdūṣitāmātyaḥ kṣipram eva vinaśyatia tasmād athārisaṃghātād gomāyoḥ kaś cid āgataḥc dharmātmā tena cākhyātaṃ yathaitat kapaṭaṃ kṛtama tato vijñātacāritraḥ satkṛtya sa vimokṣitaḥc pariṣvaktaś ca sasnehaṃ mṛgendreṇa punaḥ punaḥa anujñāpya mṛgendraṃ tu gomāyur nītiśāstravitc tenāmarṣeṇa saṃtaptaḥ prāyam āsitum aicchataa śārdūlas tatra gomāyuṃ snehāt prasrutalocanaḥc avārayat sa dharmiṣṭhaṃ pūjayā pratipūjayana taṃ sa gomāyur ālokya snehād āgatasaṃbhramamc babhāṣe praṇato vākyaṃ bāṣpagadgadayā girāa pūjito haṃ tvayā pūrvaṃ paścāc caiva vimānitaḥc pareṣām āspadaṃ nīto vastuṃ nārhāmy ahaṃ tvayia svasaṃtuṣṭāś cyutāḥ sthānān mānāt pratyavaropitāḥc svayaṃ copahṛtā bhṛtyā ye cāpy upahṛtāḥ paraiḥa parikṣīṇāś ca lubdhāś ca krūrāḥ kārābhitāpitāḥc hṛtasvā mānino ye ca tyaktopāttā mahepsavaḥa saṃtāpitāś ca ye ke cid vyasanaughapratīkṣiṇaḥc antarhitāḥ sopahitāḥ sarve te parasādhanāḥa avamānena yuktasya sthāpitasya ca me punaḥc kathaṃ yāsyasi viśvāsam aham eṣyāmi vā punaḥa samartha iti saṃgṛhya sthāpayitvā parīkṣya cac kṛtaṃ ca samayaṃ bhittvā tvayāham avamānitaḥa prathamaṃ yaḥ samākhyātaḥ śīlavān iti saṃsadic na vācyaṃ tasya vaiguṇyaṃ pratijñāṃ parirakṣatāa evaṃ cāvamatasyeha viśvāsaṃ kiṃ prayāsyasic tvayi caiva hy aviśvāse mamodvego bhaviṣyatia śaṅkitas tvam ahaṃ bhītaḥ pare chidrānudarśinaḥc asnigdhāś caiva dustoṣāḥ karma caitad bahucchalamd pūrvasaṃmānatā yatra paścāc caiva vimānanād na taṃ dhīrāḥ praśaṃsanti saṃmānitavimānitama duḥkhena śleṣyate bhinnaṃ śliṣṭaṃ duḥkhena bhidyatec bhinnaśliṣṭā tu yā prītir na sā snehena vartatea kaś cid eva hi bhītas tu dṛśyate na parātmanoḥc kāryāpekṣā hi vartante bhāvāḥ snigdhās tu durlabhāḥa suduḥkhaṃ puruṣajñānaṃ cittaṃ hy eṣāṃ calācalamc samartho vāpy aśakto vā śateṣv eko dhigamyatea akasmāt prakriyā nṝṇām akasmāc cāpakarṣaṇamc śubhāśubhe mahattvaṃ ca prakartuṃ buddhilāghavāta evaṃ bahuvidhaṃ sāntvam uktvā dharmārthahetumatc prasādayitvā rājānaṃ gomāyur vanam abhyagāta agṛhyānunayaṃ tasya mṛgendrasya sa buddhimānc gomāyuḥ prāyam āsīnas tyaktvā dehaṃ divaṃ yayau yudhiṣṭhira uvācaa kiṃ pārthivena kartavyaṃ kiṃ ca kṛtvā sukhī bhavetc tan mamācakṣva tattvena sarvaṃ dharmabhṛtāṃ vara bhīṣma uvācaa hanta te haṃ pravakṣyāmi śṛṇu kāryaikaniścayamc yathā rājñeha kartavyaṃ yac ca kṛtvā sukhī bhaveta na tv evaṃ vartitavyaṃ sma yathedam anuśuśrumaḥc uṣṭrasya sumahad vṛttaṃ tan nibodha yudhiṣṭhiraa jātismaro mahān uṣṭraḥ prājāpatyayugodbhavaḥc tapaḥ sumahad ātiṣṭhad araṇye saṃśitavrataḥa tapasas tasya cānte vai prītimān abhavat prabhuḥc vareṇa chandayām āsa tataś cainaṃ pitāmahaḥ uṣṭra uvācaa bhagavaṃs tvatprasādān me dīrghā grīvā bhaved iyamc yojanānāṃ śataṃ sāgraṃ yā gacchec carituṃ vibho bhīṣma uvācaa evam astv iti coktaḥ sa varadena mahātmanāc pratilabhya varaṃ śreṣṭhaṃ yayāv uṣṭraḥ svakaṃ vanama sa cakāra tad ālasyaṃ varadānāt sa durmatiḥc na caicchac carituṃ gantuṃ durātmā kālamohitaḥa sa kadā cit prasāryaivaṃ tāṃ grīvāṃ śatayojanāmc cacārāśrāntahṛdayo vātaś cāgāt tato mahāna sa guhāyāṃ śirogrīvaṃ nidhāya paśur ātmanaḥc āstātha varṣam abhyāgāt sumahat plāvayaj jagata atha śītaparītāṅgo jambukaḥ kṣucchramānvitaḥc sadāras tāṃ guhām āśu praviveśa jalārditaḥa sa dṛṣṭvā māṃsajīvī tu subhṛśaṃ kṣucchramānvitaḥc abhakṣayat tato grīvām uṣṭrasya bharatarṣabhaa yadā tv abudhyatātmānaṃ bhakṣyamāṇaṃ sa vai paśuḥc tadā saṃkocane yatnam akarod bhṛśaduḥkhitaḥa yāvad ūrdhvam adhaś caiva grīvāṃ saṃkṣipate paśuḥc tāvat tena sadāreṇa jambukena sa bhakṣitaḥa sa hatvā bhakṣayitvā ca jambukoṣṭraṃ tatas tadāc vigate vātavarṣe ca niścakrāma guhāmukhāta evaṃ durbuddhinā prāptam uṣṭreṇa nidhanaṃ tadāc ālasyasya kramāt paśya mahad doṣam upāgatama tvam apy etaṃ vidhiṃ tyaktvā yogena niyatendriyaḥc vartasva buddhimūlaṃ hi vijayaṃ manur abravīta buddhiśreṣṭhāni karmāṇi bāhumadhyāni bhāratac tāni jaṅghājaghanyāni bhārapratyavarāṇi caa rājyaṃ tiṣṭhati dakṣasya saṃgṛhītendriyasya cac guptamantraśrutavataḥ susahāyasya cānaghad asahāyavato hy arthā na tiṣṭhanti kadā canaa parīkṣyakāriṇo rthāś ca tiṣṭhantīha yudhiṣṭhirac sahāyayuktena mahī kṛtsnā śakyā praśāsituma idaṃ hi sadbhiḥ kathitaṃ vidhijñaiḥpurā mahendrapratimaprabhāvac mayāpi coktaṃ tava śāstradṛṣṭyātvam atra yuktaḥ pracarasva rājan yudhiṣṭhira uvācaa rājā rājyam anuprāpya durbalo bharatarṣabhac amitrasyātivṛddhasya kathaṃ tiṣṭhed asādhanaḥ bhīṣma uvācaa atrāpy udāharantīmam itihāsaṃ purātanamc saritāṃ caiva saṃvādaṃ sāgarasya ca bhārataa surārinilayaḥ śaśvat sāgaraḥ saritāṃ patiḥc papraccha saritaḥ sarvāḥ saṃśayaṃ jātam ātmanaḥa samūlaśākhān paśyāmi nihatāṃś chāyino drumānc yuṣmābhir iha pūrṇābhir anyāṃs tatra na vetasama akāyaś cālpasāraś ca vetasaḥ kūlajaś ca vaḥc avajñāya naśakyo vā kiṃ cid vā tena vaḥ kṛtama tad ahaṃ śrotum icchāmi sarvāsām eva vo matamc yathā kūlāni cemāni bhittvā nānīyate vaśama tataḥ prāha nadī gaṅgā vākyam uttaram arthavatc hetumad grāhakaṃ caiva sāgaraṃ saritāṃ patima tiṣṭhanty ete yathāsthānaṃ nagā hy ekaniketanāḥc tatas tyajanti tat sthānaṃ prātilomyād acetasaḥa vetaso vegam āyāntaṃ dṛṣṭvā namati netaraḥc sa ca vege bhyatikrānte sthānam āsādya tiṣṭhatia kālajñaḥ samayajñaś ca sadā vaśyaś ca nodrumaḥc anulomas tathāstabdhas tena nābhyeti vetasaḥa mārutodakavegena ye namanty unnamanti cac oṣadhyaḥ pādapā gulmā na te yānti parābhavama yo hi śatror vivṛddhasya prabhor vadhavināśanec pūrvaṃ na sahate vegaṃ kṣipram eva sa naśyatia sārāsāraṃ balaṃ vīryam ātmano dviṣataś ca yaḥc jānan vicarati prājño na sa yāti parābhavama evam eva yadā vidvān manyetātibalaṃ ripumc saṃśrayed vaitasīṃ vṛttim evaṃ prajñānalakṣaṇam yudhiṣṭhira uvācaa vidvān mūrkhapragalbhena mṛdus tīkṣṇena bhāratac ākruśyamānaḥ sadasi kathaṃ kuryād ariṃdama bhīṣma uvācaa śrūyatāṃ pṛthivīpāla yathaiṣo rtho nugīyatec sadā sucetāḥ sahate narasyehālpacetasaḥa aruṣyan kruśyamānasya sukṛtaṃ nāma vindatic duṣkṛtaṃ cātmano marṣī ruṣyaty evāpamārṣṭi vaia ṭiṭṭibhaṃ tam upekṣeta vāśamānam ivāturamc lokavidveṣam āpanno niṣphalaṃ pratipadyatea iti sa ślāghate nityaṃ tena pāpena karmaṇāc idam ukto mayā kaś cit saṃmato janasaṃsadie sa tatra vrīḍitaḥ śuṣko mṛtakalpo vatiṣṭhatia ślāghann aślāghanīyena karmaṇā nirapatrapaḥc upekṣitavyo dāntena tādṛśaḥ puruṣādhamaḥa yad yad brūyād alpamatis tat tad asya sahet sadāc prākṛto hi praśaṃsan vā nindan vā kiṃ kariṣyatie vane kāka ivābuddhir vāśamāno nirarthakama yadi vāgbhiḥ prayogaḥ syāt prayoge pāpakarmaṇaḥc vāg evārtho bhavet tasya na hy evārtho jighāṃsataḥa niṣekaṃ viparītaṃ sa ācaṣṭe vṛttaceṣṭayāc mayūra iva kaupīnaṃ nṛtyan saṃdarśayann ivaa yasyāvācyaṃ na loke sti nākāryaṃ vāpi kiṃ canac vācaṃ tena na saṃdadhyāc chuciḥ saṃkliṣṭakarmaṇāa pratyakṣaṃ guṇavādī yaḥ parokṣaṃ tu vinindakaḥc sa mānavaḥ śvaval loke naṣṭalokaparāyaṇaḥa tādṛg janaśatasyāpi yad dadāti juhoti cac parokṣeṇāpavādena tan nāśayati sa kṣaṇāta tasmāt prājño naraḥ sadyas tādṛśaṃ pāpacetasamc varjayet sādhubhir varjyaṃ sārameyāmiṣaṃ yathāa parivādaṃ bruvāṇo hi durātmā vai mahātmanec prakāśayati doṣān svān sarpaḥ phaṇam ivocchritama taṃ svakarmāṇi kurvāṇaṃ pratikartuṃ ya icchatic bhasmakūṭa ivābuddhiḥ kharo rajasi majjatia manuṣyaśālāvṛkam apraśāntaṃjanāpavāde satataṃ niviṣṭamc mātaṅgam unmattam ivonnadantaṃtyajeta taṃ śvānam ivātiraudrama adhīrajuṣṭe pathi vartamānaṃdamād apetaṃ vinayāc ca pāpamc arivrataṃ nityam abhūtikāmaṃdhig astu taṃ pāpamatiṃ manuṣyama pratyucyamānas tu hi bhūya ebhirniśāmya mā bhūs tvam athārtarūpaḥc uccasya nīcena hi saṃprayogaṃvigarhayanti sthirabuddhayo yea kruddho daśārdhena hi tāḍayed vāsa pāṃsubhir vāpakiret tuṣair vāc vivṛtya dantāṃś ca vibhīṣayed vāsiddhaṃ hi mūrkhe kupite nṛśaṃsea vigarhaṇāṃ paramadurātmanā kṛtāṃsaheta yaḥ saṃsadi durjanān naraḥc paṭhed idaṃ cāpi nidarśanaṃ sadāna vāṅmayaṃ sa labhati kiṃ cid apriyam yudhiṣṭhira uvācaa pitāmaha mahāprājña saṃśayo me mahān ayamc sa cchettavyas tvayā rājan bhavān kulakaro hi naḥa puruṣāṇām ayaṃ tāta durvṛttānāṃ durātmanāmc kathito vākyasaṃcāras tato vijñāpayāmi tea yad dhitaṃ rājyatantrasya kulasya ca sukhodayamc āyatyāṃ ca tadātve ca kṣemavṛddhikaraṃ ca yata putrapautrābhirāmaṃ ca rāṣṭravṛddhikaraṃ ca yatc annapāne śarīre ca hitaṃ yat tad bravīhi mea abhiṣikto hi yo rājā rājyastho mitrasaṃvṛtaḥc asuhṛt samupeto vā sa kathaṃ rañjayet prajāḥa yo hy asatpragraharatiḥ sneharāgabalātkṛtaḥc indriyāṇām anīśatvād asajjanabubhūṣakaḥa tasya bhṛtyā viguṇatāṃ yānti sarve kulodgatāḥc na ca bhṛtyaphalair arthaiḥ sa rājā saṃprayujyatea etān me saṃśayasthasya rājadharmān sudurlabhānc bṛhaspatisamo buddhyā bhavāñ śaṃsitum arhatia śaṃsitā puruṣavyāghra tvaṃ naḥ kulahite rataḥc kṣattā caiva paṭuprajño yo naḥ śaṃsati sarvadāa tvattaḥ kulahitaṃ vākyaṃ śrutvā rājyahitodayamc amṛtasyāvyayasyeva tṛptaḥ svapsyāmy ahaṃ sukhama kīdṛṣāḥ saṃnikarṣasthā bhṛtyāḥ syur vā guṇānvitāḥc kīdṛśaiḥ kiṃkulīnair vā saha yātrā vidhīyatea na hy eko bhṛtyarahito rājā bhavati rakṣitāc rājyaṃ cedaṃ janaḥ sarvas tat kulīno bhiśaṃsatia na hi praśāstuṃ rājyaṃ hi śakyam ekena bhāratac asahāyavatā tāta naivārthāḥ ke cid apy utae labdhuṃ labdhvā cāpi sadā rakṣituṃ bharatarṣabha bhīṣma uvācaa yasya bhṛtyajanaḥ sarvo jñānavijñānakovidaḥc hitaiṣī kulajaḥ snigdhaḥ sa rājyaphalam aśnutea mantriṇo yasya kulajā asaṃhāryāḥ sahoṣitāḥc nṛpater matidāḥ santi saṃbandhajñānakovidāḥa anāgatavidhātāraḥ kālajñānaviśāradāḥc atikrāntam aśocantaḥ sa rājyaphalam aśnutea samaduḥkhasukhā yasya sahāyāḥ satyakāriṇaḥc arthacintāparā yasya sa rājyaphalam aśnutea yasya nārto janapadaḥ saṃnikarṣagataḥ sadāc akṣudraḥ satpathālambī sa rājyaphalabhāg bhaveta kośākṣapaṭalaṃ yasya kośavṛddhikarair janaiḥc āptais tuṣṭaiś ca satataṃ dhāryate sa nṛpottamaḥa koṣṭhāgāram asaṃhāryair āptaiḥ saṃcayatatparaiḥc pātrabhūtair alubdhaiś ca pālyamānaṃ guṇībhaveta vyavahāraś ca nagare yasya karmaphalodayaḥc dṛśyate śaṅkhalikhitaḥ sa dharmaphalabhāg bhaveta saṃgṛhītamanuṣyaś ca yo rājā rājadharmavitc ṣaḍvargaṃ pratigṛhṇan sa dharmāt phalam upāśnute yudhiṣṭhira uvāca na santi kulajā yatra sahāyāḥ pārthivasya tu akulīnāś ca kartavyā na vā bharatasattama bhīṣma uvācaa atrāpy udāharantīmam itihāsaṃ purātanamc nidarśanakaraṃ loke sajjanācaritaṃ sadāa asyaivārthasya sadṛśaṃ yac chrutaṃ me tapovanec jāmadagnyasya rāmasya yad uktam ṛṣisattamaiḥa vane mahati kasmiṃś cid amanuṣyaniṣevitec ṛṣir mūlaphalāhāro niyato niyatendriyaḥa dīkṣādamaparaḥ śāntaḥ svādhyāyaparamaḥ śuciḥc upavāsaviśuddhātmā satataṃ satpathe sthitaḥa tasya saṃdṛśya sadbhāvam upaviṣṭasya dhīmataḥc sarvasattvāḥ samīpasthā bhavanti vanacāriṇaḥa siṃhavyāghrāḥ saśarabhā mattāś caiva mahāgajāḥc dvīpinaḥ khaḍgabhallūkā ye cānye bhīmadarśanāḥa te sukhapraśnadāḥ sarve bhavanti kṣatajāśanāḥc tasyarṣeḥ śiṣyavac caiva nyagbhūtāḥ priyakāriṇaḥa dattvā ca te sukhapraśnaṃ sarve yānti yathāgatamc grāmyas tv ekaḥ paśus tatra nājahāc chvā mahāmunima bhakto nuraktaḥ satatam upavāsakṛśo balaḥc phalamūlotkarāhāraḥ śāntaḥ śiṣṭākṛtir yathāa tasyarṣer upaviṣṭasya pādamūle mahāmuneḥc manuṣyavad gato bhāvaḥ snehabaddho bhavad bhṛśama tato bhyayān mahāvīryo dvīpī kṣatajabhojanaḥc śvārtham atyantasaṃduṣṭaḥ krūraḥ kāla ivāntakaḥa lelihyamānas tṛṣitaḥ pucchāsphoṭanatatparaḥc vyāditāsyaḥ kṣudhābhagnaḥ prārthayānas tadāmiṣama taṃ dṛṣṭvā krūram āyāntaṃ jīvitārthī narādhipac provāca śvā muniṃ tatra yat tac chṛṇu mahāmatea śvaśatrur bhagavann atra dvīpī māṃ hantum icchatic tvatprasādād bhayaṃ na syāt tasmān mama mahāmuned tathā kuru mahābāho sarvajñas tvaṃ na saṃśayaḥd sa munis tasya vijñāya bhāvajño bhayakāraṇamd rutajñaḥ sarvasattvānāṃ tam aiśvaryasamanvitaḥ munir uvācaa na bhayaṃ dvīpinaḥ kāryaṃ mṛtyutas te kathaṃ canac eṣa śvarūparahito dvīpī bhavasi putraka bhīṣma uvācaa tataḥ śvā dvīpitāṃ nīto jāmbūnadanibhākṛtiḥc citrāṅgo visphuran hṛṣṭo vane vasati nirbhayaḥd taṃ dṛṣṭvā sa punar dvīpī ātmanaḥ sadṛśaṃ śubhamd aviruddhas tatas tasya kṣaṇena samapadyataa tato bhyayān mahāraudro vyāditāsyaḥ kṣudhānvitaḥc dvīpinaṃ lelihad vaktro vyāghro rudhiralālasaḥa vyāghraṃ dṛṣṭvā kṣudhābhagnaṃ daṃṣṭriṇaṃ vanagocaramc dvīpī jīvitarakṣārtham ṛṣiṃ śaraṇam eyivāna tataḥ saṃvāsajaṃ sneham ṛṣiṇā kurvatā sadāc sa dvīpī vyāghratāṃ nīto ripubhir balavattaraḥe tato dṛṣṭvā sa śārdūlo nābhyahaṃs taṃ viśāṃ patea sa tu śvā vyāghratāṃ prāpya balavān piśitāśanaḥc na mūlaphalabhogeṣu spṛhām apy akarot tadāa yathā mṛgapatir nityaṃ prakāṅkṣati vanaukasaḥc tathaiva sa mahārāja vyāghraḥ samabhavat tadāa vyāghras tūṭajamūlasthas tṛptaḥ supto hatair mṛgaiḥc nāgaś cāgāt tam uddeśaṃ matto megha ivotthitaḥa prabhinnakaraṭaḥ prāṃśuḥ padmī vitatamastakaḥc suviṣāṇo mahākāyo meghagambhīranisvanaḥa taṃ dṛṣṭvā kuñjaraṃ mattam āyāntaṃ madagarvitamc vyāghro hastibhayāt trastas tam ṛṣiṃ śaraṇaṃ yayaua tato nayat kuñjaratāṃ taṃ vyāghram ṛṣisattamaḥc mahāmeghopamaṃ dṛṣṭvā taṃ sa bhīto bhavad gajaḥa tataḥ kamalaṣaṇḍāni śallakīgahanāni cac vyacarat sa mudā yuktaḥ padmareṇuvibhūṣitaḥa kadā cid ramamāṇasya hastinaḥ sumukhaṃ tadāc ṛṣes tasyoṭajasthasya kālo gacchan niśāniśama athājagāma taṃ deśaṃ kesarī kesarāruṇaḥc girikandarajo bhīmaḥ siṃho nāgakulāntakaḥa taṃ dṛṣṭvā siṃham āyāntaṃ nāgaḥ siṃhabhayākulaḥc ṛṣiṃ śaraṇam āpede vepamāno bhayāturaḥa tataḥ sa siṃhatāṃ nīto nāgendro muninā tadāc vanyaṃ nāgaṇayat siṃhaṃ tulyajātisamanvayāta dṛṣṭvā ca so naśat siṃho vanyo bhīsannavāgbalaḥc sa cāśrame vasat siṃhas tasminn eva vane sukhīa na tv anye kṣudrapaśavas tapovananivāsinaḥc vyadṛśyanta bhayatrastā jīvitākāṅkṣiṇaḥ sadāa kadā cit kālayogena parabhayāturaḥd ṛṣiṃ śaraṇam āpede vepamānaḥ kṛtāñjaliḥa taṃ muniḥ śarabhaṃ cakre balotkaṭam ariṃdamac tataḥ sa śarabho vanyo muneḥ śarabham agrataḥe dṛṣṭvā balinam atyugraṃ drutaṃ saṃprādravad kāruṇyaṃ tu samāśritaḥd na dadāti balaṃ tuṣṭaḥ sattvasyānyasya kasya citd tāvad enam ahaṃ vipraṃ vadhiṣyāmi ca śīghrataḥd sthātuṃ mayā śakyam iha munighātān na saṃśayaḥa tatas tena tapaḥśaktyā vidito haretakālajñātā pārthivānāṃ variṣṭhaḥa haret kīrtiṃ dharmam asyoparundhyādarthe dīrghaṃ vīryam asyopahanyātc ripur dveṣṭā durbalo vā balī vātasmāc chatrau naiva heḍed yatātmāa kṣayaṃ śatroḥ saṃcayaṃ pālanaṃ cāpyubhau cārthau sahitau dharmakāmauc ataś cānyan matimān saṃdadhītatasmād rājā buddhimantaṃ śrayetaa buddhir dīptā balavantaṃ hinastibalaṃ buddhyā vardhate pālyamānamc śatrur buddhyā sīdate vardhamānobuddheḥ paścāt karma yat tat praśastama sarvān kāmān kāmayāno hi dhīraḥsattvenālpenāplute hīnadehaḥc yathātmānaṃ prārthayate rthamānaiḥśreyaḥpātraṃ pūrayate hy analpama tasmād rājā pragṛhītaḥ pareṣumūlaṃ lakṣmyāḥ sarvato bhyādadītac dīrghaṃ kālam api saṃpīḍyamānovidyutsaṃpātam iva mānorjitaḥ syāta vidyā tapo vā vipulaṃ dhanaṃ vāsarvam etad vyavasāyena śakyamc brahma yattaṃ nivasati dehavatsutasmād vidyād vyavasāyaṃ prabhūtama yatrāsate matimanto manasvinaḥśakro viṣṇur yatra sarasvatī cac vasanti bhūtāni ca yatra nityaṃtasmād vidvān nāvamanyeta dehama lubdhaṃ hanyāt saṃpradānena nityaṃlubdhas tṛptiṃ paravittasya naitic sarvo lubdhaḥ karmaguṇopabhogeyo rthair hīno dharmakāmau jahātia dhanaṃ bhojyaṃ putradāraṃ samṛddhiṃsarvo lubdhaḥ prārthayate pareṣāmc lubdhe doṣāḥ saṃbhavantīha sarvetasmād rājā na pragṛhṇīta lubdhāna saṃdarśane satpuruṣaṃ jaghanyam api codayetc ārambhān dviṣatāṃ prājñaḥ sarvān arthāṃs tu sūdayeta dharmānviteṣu vijñāto mantrī guptaś ca pāṇḍavac āpto rājan kulīnaś ca paryāpto rājyasaṃgrahea vidhipravṛttān naradevadharmānuktān samāsena nibodha buddhyāc imān vidadhyād vyanusṛtya yo vairājā mahīṃ pālayituṃ sa śaktaḥa anītijaṃ yady avidhānajaṃ sukhaṃhaṭhapraṇītaṃ vividhaṃ pradṛśyatec na vidyate tasya gatir mahīpaterna vidyate rāṣṭrajam uttamaṃ sukhama dhanair viśiṣṭān matiśīlapūjitānguṇopapannān yudhi dṛṣṭavikramānc guṇeṣu dṛṣṭān acirād ihātmavānsato bhisaṃdhāya nihanti śātravāna paśyed upāyān vividhaiḥ kriyāpathairna cānupāyena matiṃ niveśayetc śriyaṃ viśiṣṭāṃ vipulaṃ yaśo dhanaṃna doṣadarśī puruṣaḥ samaśnutea prītipravṛttau vinivartane tathāsuhṛtsu vijñāya nivṛtya cobhayoḥc yad eva mitraṃ gurubhāram āvahettad eva susnigdham udāhared budhaḥa etān mayoktāṃs tava rājadharmānnṛṇāṃ ca guptau matim ādadhatsvac avāpsyase puṇyaphalaṃ sukhenasarvo hi lokottamadharmamūlaḥ yudhiṣṭhira uvācaa ayaṃ pitāmahenokto rājadharmaḥ sanātanaḥc īśvaraś ca mahādaṇḍo daṇḍe sarvaṃ pratiṣṭhitama devatānām ṛṣīṇāṃ ca pitṝṇāṃ ca mahātmanāmc yakṣarakṣaḥpiśācānāṃ martyānāṃ ca viśeṣataḥa sarveṣāṃ prāṇināṃ loke tiryakṣv api nivāsināmc sarvavyāpī mahātejā daṇḍaḥ śreyān iti prabhoa ity etad uktaṃ bhavatā sarvaṃ daṇḍyaṃ carācaramc dṛśyate lokam āsaktaṃ sasurāsuramānuṣama etad icchāmy ahaṃ jñātuṃ tattvena bharatarṣabhac ko daṇḍaḥ kīdṛśo daṇḍaḥ kiṃrūpaḥ kiṃparāyaṇaḥa kimātmakaḥ kathaṃbhūtaḥ katimūrtiḥ kathaṃprabhuḥc jāgarti sa kathaṃ daṇḍaḥ prajāsv avahitātmakaḥa kaś ca pūrvāparam idaṃ jāgarti paripālayanc kaś ca vijñāyate pūrvaṃ ko paro daṇḍasaṃjñitaḥe kiṃsaṃsthaś ca bhaved daṇḍaḥ kā cāsya gatir iṣyate bhīṣma uvācaa śṛṇu kauravya yo daṇḍo vyavahāryo yathā ca saḥc yasmin hi sarvam āyattaṃ sa daṇḍa iha kevalaḥa dharmasyākhyā mahārāja vyavahāra itīṣyatec tasya lopaḥ kathaṃ na syāl lokeṣv avahitātmanaḥe ity arthaṃ vyavahārasya vyavahāratvam iṣyatea api caitat purā rājan manunā proktam āditaḥc supraṇītena daṇḍena priyāpriyasamātmanāe prajā rakṣati yaḥ samyag dharma eva sa kevalaḥa athoktam etad vacanaṃ prāg eva manunā purāc janma coktaṃ vasiṣṭhena brahmaṇo vacanaṃ mahata prāg idaṃ vacanaṃ proktam ataḥ prāgvacanaṃ viduḥc vyavahārasya cākhyānād vyavahāra ihocyatea daṇḍāt trivargaḥ satataṃ supraṇītāt pravartatec daivaṃ hi paramo daṇḍo rūpato gnir ivocchikhaḥa nīlotpaladalaśyāmaś caturdaṃṣṭraś caturbhujaḥc aṣṭapān naikanayanaḥ śaṅkukarṇordhvaromavāna jaṭī dvijihvas tāmrāsyo mṛgarājatanucchadaḥc etad rūpaṃ bibharty ugraṃ daṇḍo nityaṃ durāvaraḥa asir gadā dhanuḥ śaktis triśūlaṃ mudgaraḥ śaraḥc musalaṃ paraśuś cakraṃ prāso daṇḍarṣṭitomarāḥa sarvapraharaṇīyāni santi yānīha kāni citc daṇḍa eva hi sarvātmā loke carati mūrtimāna bhindaṃś chindan rujan kṛntan dārayan pāṭayaṃs tathāc ghātayann abhidhāvaṃś ca daṇḍa eva caraty utaa asir viśasano dharmas tīkṣṇavartmā durāsadaḥc śrīgarbho vijayaḥ śāstā vyavahāraḥ prajāgaraḥa śāstraṃ brāhmaṇamantraś ca śāstā prāgvacanaṃ gataḥc dharmapālo kṣaro devaḥ satyago nityago grahaḥa asaṅgo rudratanayo manujyeṣṭhaḥ śivaṃkaraḥc nāmāny etāni daṇḍasya kīrtitāni yudhiṣṭhiraa daṇḍo hi bhagavān viṣṇur yajño nārāyaṇaḥ prabhuḥc śaśvad rūpaṃ mahad bibhran mahāpuruṣa ucyatea yathoktā brahmakanyeti lakṣmīr nītiḥ sarasvatīc daṇḍanītir jagaddhātrī daṇḍo hi bahuvigrahaḥa arthānarthau sukhaṃ duḥkhaṃ dharmādharmau balābalec daurbhāgyaṃ bhāgadheyaṃ ca puṇyāpuṇye guṇāguṇaua kāmākāmāv ṛtur māsaḥ śarvarī divasaḥ kṣaṇaḥc aprasādaḥ prasādaś ca harṣaḥ krodhaḥ śamo damaḥa daivaṃ puruṣakāraś ca mokṣāmokṣau bhayābhayec hiṃsāhiṃse tapo yajñaḥ saṃyamo tha viṣāviṣama antaś cādiś ca madhyaṃ ca kṛtyānāṃ ca prapañcanamc madaḥ pramādo darpaś ca dambho dhairyaṃ nayānayaua aśaktiḥ śaktir ity eva mānastambhau vyayāvyayauc vinayaś ca visargaś ca kālākālau ca bhārataa anṛtaṃ jñājñatā satyaṃ śraddhāśraddhe tathaiva cac klībatā vyavasāyaś ca lābhālābhau jayājayaua tīkṣṇatā mṛdutā mṛtyur āgamānāgamau tathāc virāddhiś caiva rāddhiś ca kāryākārye balābalea asūyā cānasūyā ca dharmādharmau tathaiva cac apatrapānapatrape hrīś ca saṃpad vipac ca haa tejaḥ karmaṇi pāṇḍityaṃ vākśaktis tattvabuddhitāc evaṃ daṇḍasya kauravya loke smin bahurūpatāa na syād yadīha daṇḍo vai pramatheyuḥ parasparamc bhayād daṇḍasya cānyonyaṃ ghnanti naiva yudhiṣṭhiraa daṇḍena rakṣyamāṇā hi rājann aharahaḥ prajāḥc rājānaṃ vardhayantīha tasmād daṇḍaḥ parāyaṇama vyavasthāpayati kṣipram imaṃ lokaṃ nareśvarac satye vyavasthito dharmo brāhmaṇeṣv avatiṣṭhatea dharmayuktā dvijāḥ śreṣṭhā vedayuktā bhavanti cac babhūva yajño vedebhyo yajñaḥ prīṇāti devatāḥa prītāś ca devatā nityam indre paridadaty utac annaṃ dadāti śakraś cāpy anugṛhṇann imāḥ prajāḥa prāṇāś ca sarvabhūtānāṃ nityam anne pratiṣṭhitāḥc tasmāt prajāḥ pratiṣṭhante daṇḍo jāgarti tāsu caa evaṃprayojanaś caiva daṇḍaḥ kṣatriyatāṃ gataḥc rakṣan prajāḥ prajāgarti nityaṃ suvihito kṣaraḥa īśvaraḥ puruṣaḥ prāṇaḥ sattvaṃ vittaṃ prajāpatiḥc bhūtātmā jīva ity eva nāmabhiḥ procyate ṣṭabhiḥa adadad daṇḍa evāsmai dhruvam aiśvaryam eva cac bale nayaś ca saṃyuktaḥ sadā pañcavidhātmakaḥa kulabāhudhanāmātyāḥ prajñā coktā balāni cac āhāryaṃ cāṣṭakair dravyair balam anyad yudhiṣṭhiraa hastino śvā rathāḥ pattir nāvo viṣṭis tathaiva cac daiśikāś cārakāś caiva tad aṣṭāṅgaṃ balaṃ smṛtama aṣṭāṅgasya tu yuktasya hastino hastiyāyinaḥc aśvārohāḥ padātāś ca mantriṇo rasadāś ca yea bhikṣukāḥ prāḍvivākāś ca mauhūrtā daivacintakāḥc kośo mitrāṇi dhānyaṃ ca sarvopakaraṇāni caa saptaprakṛti cāṣṭāṅgaṃ śarīram iha yad viduḥc rājyasya daṇḍa evāṅgaṃ daṇḍaḥ prabhava eva caa īśvareṇa prayatnena dhāraṇe kṣatriyasya hic daṇḍo dattaḥ samānātmā daṇḍo hīdaṃ sanātaname rājñāṃ pūjyatamo nānyo yathādharmapradarśanaḥa brahmaṇā lokarakṣārthaṃ svadharmasthāpanāya cac bhartṛpratyaya utpanno vyavahāras tathāparaḥe tasmād yaḥ sahito dṛṣṭo bhartṛpratyayalakṣaṇaḥa vyavahāras tu vedātmā vedapratyaya ucyatec maulaś ca naraśārdūla śāstroktaś ca tathāparaḥa ukto yaś cāpi daṇḍo sau bhartṛpratyayalakṣaṇaḥc jñeyo na sa narendrastho daṇḍapratyaya eva caa daṇḍapratyayadṛṣṭo pi vyavahārātmakaḥ smṛtaḥc vyavahāraḥ smṛto yaś ca sa vedaviṣayātmakaḥa yaś ca vedaprasūtātmā sa dharmo guṇadarśakaḥc dharmapratyaya utpanno yathādharmaḥ kṛtātmabhiḥa vyavahāraḥ prajāgoptā brahmadiṣṭo yudhiṣṭhirac trīn dhārayati lokān vai satyātmā bhūtivardhanaḥa yaś ca daṇḍaḥ sa dṛṣṭo no vyavahāraḥ sanātanaḥc vyavahāraś ca yo dṛṣṭaḥ sa dharma iti naḥ śrutaḥe yaś ca vedaḥ sa vai dharmo yaś ca dharmaḥ sa satpathaḥa brahmā prajāpatiḥ pūrvaṃ babhūvātha pitāmahaḥc lokānāṃ sa hi sarveṣāṃ sasurāsurarakṣasāme samanuṣyoragavatāṃ kartā caiva sa bhūtakṛta tato no vyavahāro yaṃ bhartṛpratyayalakṣaṇaḥc tasmād idam avocāma vyavahāranidarśanama mātā pitā ca bhrātā ca bhāryā cātha purohitaḥc nādaṇḍyo vidyate rājñāṃ yaḥ svadharme na tiṣṭhati bhīṣma uvācaa atrāpy udāharantīmam itihāsaṃ purātanamc aṅgeṣu rājā dyutimān vasuhoma iti śrutaḥa sa rājā dharmanityaḥ san saha patnyā mahātapāḥc muñjapṛṣṭhaṃ jagāmātha devarṣigaṇapūjitama tatra śṛṅge himavato merau kanakaparvatec yatra muñjavaṭe rāmo jaṭāharaṇam ādiśata tadāprabhṛti rājendra ṛṣibhiḥ saṃśitavrataiḥc muñjapṛṣṭha iti proktaḥ sa deśo rudrasevitaḥa sa tatra bahubhir yuktaḥ sadā śrutimayair guṇaiḥc brāhmaṇānām anumato devarṣisadṛśo bhavata taṃ kadā cid adīnātmā sakhā śakrasya mānitaḥc abhyāgacchan mahīpālo māndhātā śatrukarśanaḥa so bhisṛtya tu māndhātā vasuhomaṃ narādhipamc dṛṣṭvā prakṛṣṭaṃ tapasā vinayenābhyatiṣṭhataa vasuhomo pi rājño vai gām arghyaṃ ca nyavedayatc aṣṭāṅgasya ca rājyasya papraccha kuśalaṃ tadāa sadbhir ācaritaṃ pūrvaṃ yathāvad anuyāyinamc apṛcchad vasuhomas taṃ rājan kiṃ karavāṇi tea so bravīt paramaprīto māndhātā rājasattamamc vasuhomaṃ mahāprājñam āsīnaṃ kurunandanaa bṛhaspater mataṃ rājann adhītaṃ sakalaṃ tvayāc tathaivauśanasaṃ śāstraṃ vijñātaṃ te narādhipaa tad ahaṃ śrotum icchāmi daṇḍa utpadyate kathamc kiṃ vāpi pūrvaṃ jāgarti kiṃ vā paramam ucyatea kathaṃ kṣatriyasaṃsthaś ca daṇḍaḥ saṃpraty avasthitaḥc brūhi me sumahāprājña dadāmy ācāryavetanam vasuhoma uvācaa śṛṇu rājan yathā daṇḍaḥ saṃbhūto lokasaṃgrahaḥc prajāvinayarakṣārthaṃ dharmasyātmā sanātanaḥa brahmā yiyakṣur bhagavān sarvalokapitāmahaḥc ṛtvijaṃ nātmanā tulyaṃ dadarśeti hi naḥ śrutama sa garbhaṃ śirasā devo varṣapūgān adhārayatc pūrṇe varṣasahasre tu sa garbhaḥ kṣuvato patata sa kṣupo nāma saṃbhūtaḥ prajāpatir ariṃdamac ṛtvig āsīt tadā rājan yajñe tasya mahātmanaḥa tasmin pravṛtte satre tu brahmaṇaḥ pārthivarṣabhac hṛṣṭarūpapracāratvād daṇḍaḥ so ntarhito bhavata tasminn antarhite cātha prajānāṃ saṃkaro bhavatc naiva kāryaṃ na cākāryaṃ bhojyābhojyaṃ na vidyatea peyāpeyaṃ kutaḥ siddhir hiṃsanti ca parasparamc gamyāgamyaṃ tadā nāsīt parasvaṃ svaṃ ca vai samama parasparaṃ vilumpante sārameyā ivāmiṣamc abalaṃ balino jaghnur nirmaryādam avartataa tataḥ pitāmaho viṣṇuṃ bhagavantaṃ sanātanamc saṃpūjya varadaṃ devaṃ mahādevam athābravīta atra sādhv anukampāṃ vai kartum arhasi kevalamb ayaṃ viṣṇuḥ sakhā tubhyaṃ dharmasya parirakṣaṇeb tvaṃ hi sarvavidhānajñaḥ sattvānāṃ tvaṃ gatiḥ parāc saṃkaro na bhaved atra yathā vai tad vidhīyatāma tataḥ sa bhagavān dhyātvā ciraṃ śūlajaṭādharaḥb devadevo mahādevaḥ kāraṇaṃ jagataḥ paramb brahmaviṣṇvindrasahitaḥ sarvaiś ca sa surāsuraiḥb lokasaṃdhāraṇārthaṃ ca lokasaṃkaranāśanamc ātmānam ātmanā daṇḍam asṛjad devasattamaḥa tasmāc ca dharmacaraṇāṃ nītiṃ devīṃ sarasvatīmc asṛjad daṇḍanītiḥ sā triṣu lokeṣu viśrutād yayāsau nīyate daṇḍaḥ satataṃ pāpakāriṣud daṇḍasya nayanāt sā hi daṇḍanītir ihocyated bhūyaḥ sa bhagavān dhyātvā ciraṃ śūladharaḥ prabhuḥd asṛjat sarvaśāstrāṇi mahādevo maheśvaraḥd daṇḍanīteḥ prayogārthaṃ pramāṇāni ca sarvaśaḥd vidyāś catasraḥ kūṭasthās tāsāṃ bhedavikalpanāḥd aṅgāni vedāś catvāro mīmāṃsā nyāyavistaraḥd purāṇaṃ dharmaśāstraṃ ca vidyā hy etāś caturdaśad āyurvedo dhanurvedo gāndharvaś ceti te trayaḥd arthaśāstraṃ caturthaṃ tu vidyā hy aṣṭādaśaiva tud daśa cāṣṭau ca vikhyātā etā dharmasya saṃhitāḥd etāsām eva vidyānāṃ vyāsam āha maheśvaraḥd śatāni trīṇi śāstrāṇām āha tantrāṇi saptatimd vyāsa eva tu vidyānāṃ mahādevena kīrtitaḥd tantraṃ pāśupataṃ nāma pāñcarātraṃ ca viśrutamd yogaśāstraṃ ca sāṃkhyaṃ ca tantraṃ lokāyataṃ tathād tantraṃ brahmatulā nāma tarkavidyā divaukasāmd sukhaduḥkhārthajijñāsā kārakaṃ ceti viśrutamd tarkavidyās tathā cāṣṭau sa cokto nyāyavistaraḥd daśa cāṣṭau ca vijñeyāḥ paurāṇā yajñasaṃhitāḥd purāṇāś ca praṇītāś ca tāvad eva hi saṃhitāḥd dharmaśāstrāṇi tadvac ca ekārthānīti nānyathād ekārthāni purāṇāni vedāś caikārthasaṃhitāḥd nānārthāni ca sarvāṇi tarkaśāstrāṇi śaṃkaraḥd provāca bhagavān devaḥ kālajñānāni yāni cad catuḥṣaṣṭipramāṇāni āyurvedaṃ ca sottaramd aṣṭādaśa vikalpāntāṃ daṇḍanītiṃ ca śāśvatīmd gāndharvam itihāsaṃ ca nānāvistaram uktavānd ity etāḥ śaṃkaraproktā vidyāḥ śabdārthasaṃyutāḥd punar bhedasahasraṃ ca tāsām eva tu vistaraḥd ṛṣibhir devagandharvaiḥ savikalpaḥ savistaraḥd śaśvad abhyasyate loke veda eva ca sarvaśaḥd vidyāś catasraḥ saṃkṣiptā vedavādāś ca te smṛtāḥd etāsāṃ pārago yaś ca sa cokto vedapāragaḥd vedānāṃ pārago rudro viṣṇur indro bṛhaspatiḥd śukraḥ svāyaṃbhuvaś caiva manuḥ paramadharmavitd brahmā ca paramo devaḥ sadā sarvaiḥ surāsuraiḥd śarvasyānugrahāc caiva vyāso vai vedapāragaḥd ahaṃ śāṃtanavo bhīṣmaḥ prasādān mādhavasya cad śaṃkarasya prasādāc ca brahmaṇaś ca kurūdvahad vedapāraga ity ukto yājñavalkyaś ca sarvaśaḥd kalpe kalpe mahābhāgair ṛṣibhis tattvadarśibhiḥd ṛṣiputrair ṛṣīkaiś ca bhidyante miśrakair apid śivena brahmaṇā caiva viṣṇunā ca vikalpitaḥd ādikalpe punaś caiva bhidyante sādhubhiḥ punaḥd idānīm api vidvadbhir bhidyante ca vikalpakaiḥd pūrvajanmānusāreṇa bahudheyaṃ sarasvatīa bhūyaḥ sa bhagavān dhyātvā ciraṃ śūlavarāyudhaḥc tasya tasya nikāyasya cakāraikaikam īśarama devānām īśvaraṃ cakre devaṃ daśaśatekṣaṇamc yamaṃ vaivasvataṃ cāpi pitṝṇām akarot patima dhanānāṃ rakṣasāṃ cāpi kuberam api ceśvaramc parvatānāṃ patiṃ meruṃ saritāṃ ca mahodadhima apāṃ rājye surāṇāṃ ca vidadhe varuṇaṃ prabhumc mṛtyuṃ prāṇeśvaram atho tejasāṃ ca hutāśanama rudrāṇām api ceśānaṃ goptāraṃ vidadhe prabhuḥc mahātmānaṃ mahādevaṃ viśālākṣaṃ sanātanamd daśa caikaṃ ca ye rudrās tasyaite mūrtisaṃbhavāḥd nānārūpadharo devaḥ sa eva bhagavāñ śivaḥa vasiṣṭham īśaṃ viprāṇāṃ vasūnāṃ jātavedasamc tejasāṃ bhāskaraṃ cakre nakṣatrāṇāṃ niśākarama vīrudhām aṃśumantaṃ ca bhūtānāṃ ca prabhuṃ varamc kumāraṃ dvādaśabhujaṃ skandaṃ rājānam ādiśata kālaṃ sarveśam akarot saṃhāravinayātmakamc mṛtyoś caturvibhāgasya duḥkhasya ca sukhasya caa īśvaraḥ sarvadehas tu rājarājo dhanādhipaḥc sarveṣām eva rudrāṇāṃ śūlapāṇir iti śrutiḥd īśvaraś cetanaḥ kartā puruṣaḥ kāraṇaṃ śivaḥd viṣṇur brahmā śaśī sūryaḥ śakro devāś ca sānvayāḥd jñānātmakaḥ śivo hy eva eteṣām api kāraṇamd sṛjate grasate caiva tamobhūtam idaṃ yathād aprajñātaṃ jagat sarvaṃ tadā hy eko maheśvaraḥa tam ekaṃ brahmaṇaḥ putram anujātaṃ kṣupaṃ dadauc prajānām adhipaṃ śreṣṭhaṃ sarvadharmabhṛtām apia mahādevas tatas tasmin vṛtte yajñe yathāvidhic daṇḍaṃ dharmasya goptāraṃ viṣṇave satkṛtaṃ dadaua viṣṇur aṅgirase prādād aṅgirā munisattamaḥc prādād indramarīcibhyāṃ marīcir bhṛgave dadaua bhṛgur dadāv ṛṣibhyas tu taṃ daṇḍaṃ dharmasaṃhitamc ṛṣayo lokapālebhyo lokapālāḥ kṣupāya caa kṣupas tu manave prādād ādityatanayāya cac putrebhyaḥ śrāddhadevas tu sūkṣmadharmārthakāraṇāte taṃ dadau sūryaputras tu manur vai rakṣaṇātmakama vibhajya daṇḍaḥ kartavyo dharmeṇa na yadṛcchayāc durvācā nigraho bandho hiraṇyaṃ bāhyataḥkriyāa vyaṅgatvaṃ ca śarīrasya vadho vā nālpakāraṇātc śarīrapīḍās tās tās tu dehatyāgo vivāsanama ānupūrvyā ca daṇḍo sau prajā jāgarti pālayanc indro jāgarti bhagavān indrād agnir vibhāvasuḥa agner jāgarti varuṇo varuṇāc ca prajāpatiḥc prajāpates tato dharmo jāgarti vinayātmakaḥa dharmāc ca brahmaṇaḥ putro vyavasāyaḥ sanātanaḥc vyavasāyāt tatas tejo jāgarti paripālayana oṣadhyas tejasas tasmād oṣadhibhyaś ca parvatāḥc parvatebhyaś ca jāgarti raso rasaguṇāt tathāa jāgarti nirṛtir devī jyotīṃṣi nirṛter apic vedāḥ pratiṣṭhā jyotirbhyas tato hayaśirāḥ prabhuḥa brahmā pitāmahas tasmāj jāgarti prabhur avyayaḥc pitāmahān mahādevo jāgarti bhagavāñ śivaḥa viśvedevāḥ śivāc cāpi viśvebhyaś ca tatharṣayaḥc ṛṣibhyo bhagavān somaḥ somād devāḥ sanātanāḥa devebhyo brāhmaṇā loke jāgratīty upadhārayac brāhmaṇebhyaś ca rājanyā lokān rakṣanti dharmataḥe sthāvaraṃ jaṅgamaṃ caiva kṣatriyebhyaḥ sanātanama prajā jāgrati loke smin daṇḍo jāgarti tāsu cac sarvasaṃkṣepako daṇḍaḥ pitāmahasamaḥ prabhuḥa jāgarti kālaḥ pūrvaṃ ca madhye cānte ca bhāratac īśvaraḥ sarvalokasya mahādevaḥ prajāpatiḥa devadevaḥ śivaḥ śarvo jāgarti satataṃ prabhuḥc kapardī śaṃkaro rudro bhavaḥ sthāṇur umāpatiḥa ity eṣa daṇḍo vikhyāta ādau madhye tathāvarec bhūmipālo yathānyāyaṃ vartetānena dharmavit bhīṣma uvācaa itīdaṃ vasuhomasya śṛṇuyād yo mataṃ naraḥc śrutvā ca samyag varteta sa kāmān āpnuyān nṛpaḥa iti te sarvam ākhyātaṃ yo daṇḍo manujarṣabhac niyantā sarvalokasya dharmākrāntasya bhāratad vasuhomāc chrutaṃ rājñā māndhātrā bhūbhṛtā purād mayāpi kathitaṃ puṇyam ākhyānaṃ prathitaṃ tathā yudhiṣṭhira uvācaa tāta dharmārthakāmānāṃ śrotum icchāmi niścayamc lokayātrā hi kārtsnyena triṣv eteṣu pratiṣṭhitāa dharmārthakāmāḥ kiṃmūlās trayāṇāṃ prabhavaś ca kaḥc anyonyaṃ cānuṣajjante vartante ca pṛthak pṛthak bhīṣma uvācaa yadā te syuḥ sumanaso lokasaṃsthārthaniścayec kālaprabhavasaṃsthāsu sajjante ca trayas tadāa dharmamūlas tu deho rthaḥ kāmo rthaphalam ucyatec saṃkalpamūlās te sarve saṃkalpo viṣayātmakaḥa viṣayāś caiva kārtsnyena sarva āhārasiddhayec mūlam etat trivargasya nivṛttir mokṣa ucyatea dharmaḥ śarīrasaṃguptir dharmārthaṃ cārtha iṣyatec kāmo ratiphalaś cātra sarve caite rajasvalāḥa saṃnikṛṣṭāṃś cared enān na cainān manasā tyajetc vimuktas tamasā sarvān dharmādīn kāmanaiṣṭhikāna śreṣṭhabuddhis trivargasya yad ayaṃ prāpnuyāt kṣaṇātb karmaṇā buddhipūrveṇa bhavaty artho na vā punaḥb arthārtham anyad bhavati viparītam athāparamb anarthārtham avāpyārtham anyatrādyopakārakamc buddhyā budhyed ihārthe na tad ahnā tu nikṛṣṭayāa apadhyānamalo dharmo malo rthasya nigūhanamc saṃpramodamalaḥ kāmo bhūyaḥ svaguṇavartitaḥa atrāpy udāharantīmam itihāsaṃ purātanamc kāmandasya ca saṃvādam aṅgāriṣṭhasya cobhayoḥa kāmandam ṛṣim āsīnam abhivādya narādhipaḥc aṅgāriṣṭho tha papraccha kṛtvā samayaparyayama yaḥ pāpaṃ kurute rājā kāmamohabalātkṛtaḥc pratyāsannasya tasyarṣe kiṃ syāt pāpapraṇāśanama adharmo dharma iti ha yo jñānād ācared ihac taṃ cāpi prathitaṃ loke kathaṃ rājā nivartayet kāmanda uvācaa yo dharmārthau samutsṛjya kāmam evānuvartatec sa dharmārthaparityāgāt prajñānāśam ihārchatia prajñāpraṇāśako mohas tathā dharmārthanāśakaḥc tasmān nāstikatā caiva durācāraś ca jāyatea durācārān yadā rājā praduṣṭān na niyacchatic tasmād udvijate lokaḥ sarpād veśmagatād ivaa taṃ prajā nānuvartante brāhmaṇā na ca sādhavaḥc tataḥ saṃkṣayam āpnoti tathā vadhyatvam eti caa apadhvastas tv avamato duḥkhaṃ jīvati jīvitamc jīvec ca yad apadhvastas tac chuddhaṃ maraṇaṃ bhaveta atraitad āhur ācāryāḥ pāpasya ca nibarhaṇamc sevitavyā trayī vidyā satkāro brāhmaṇeṣu caa mahāmanā bhaved dharme vivahec ca mahākulec brāhmaṇāṃś cāpi seveta kṣamāyuktān manasvinaḥa japed udakaśīlaḥ syāt sumukho nānyad āsthitaḥc dharmānvitān saṃpraviśed bahiḥ kṛtvaiva duṣkṛtīna prasādayen madhuraya vācāpy atha ca karmaṇāc ity asmīti vaden nityaṃ pareṣāṃ kīrtayan guṇāna apāpo hy evam ācāraḥ kṣipraṃ bahumato bhavetc pāpāny api ca kṛcchrāṇi śamayen nātra saṃśayaḥa guravo pi paraṃ dharmaṃ yad brūyus tat tathā kuruc gurūṇāṃ hi prasādād dhi śreyaḥ param avāpsyasi yudhiṣṭhira uvācaa ime janā naraśreṣṭha praśaṃsanti sadā bhuvic dharmasya śīlam evādau tato me saṃśayo mahāna yadi tac chakyam asmābhir jñātuṃ dharmabhṛtāṃ varac śrotum icchāmi tat sarvaṃ yathaitad upalabhyatea kathaṃ nu prāpyate śīlaṃ śrotum icchāmi bhāratac kiṃlakṣaṇaṃ ca tat proktaṃ brūhi me vadatāṃ vara bhīṣma uvācaa purā duryodhaneneha dhṛtarāṣṭrāya mānadac ākhyātaṃ tapyamānena śriyaṃ dṛṣṭvā tathāgatāma indraprasthe mahārāja tava sabhrātṛkasya hac sabhāyāṃ cāvahasanaṃ tat sarvaṃ śṛṇu bhārataa bhavatas tāṃ sabhāṃ dṛṣṭvā samṛddhiṃ cāpy anuttamāmc duryodhanas tadāsīnaḥ sarvaṃ pitre nyavedayata śrutvā ca dhṛtarāṣṭro pi duryodhanavacas tadāc abravīt karṇasahitaṃ duryodhanam idaṃ vacaḥa kimarthaṃ tapyase putra śrotum icchāmi tattvataḥc śrutvā tvām anuneṣyāmi yadi samyag bhaviṣyasia yathā tvaṃ mahad aiśvaryaṃ prāptaḥ parapuraṃjayac kiṃkarā bhrātaraḥ sarve mitrāḥ saṃbandhinas tathāa ācchādayasi prāvārān aśnāsi piśitodanamc ājāneyā vahanti tvāṃ kasmāc chocasi putraka duryodhana uvācaa daśa tāni sahasrāṇi snātakānāṃ mahātmanāmc bhuñjate rukmapātrīṣu yudhiṣṭhiraniveśanea dṛṣṭvā ca tāṃ sabhāṃ divyāṃ divyapuṣpaphalānvitāmc aśvāṃs tittirakalmāṣān ratnāni vividhāni caa dṛṣṭvā tāṃ pāṇḍaveyānām ṛddhim indropamāṃ śubhāmc amitrāṇāṃ sumahatīm anuśocāmi mānada dhṛtarāṣṭra uvācaa yadīcchasi śriyaṃ tāta yādṛśīṃ tāṃ yudhiṣṭhirec viśiṣṭāṃ vā naravyāghra śīlavān bhava putrakaa śīlena hi trayo lokāḥ śakyā jetuṃ na saṃśayaḥc na hi kiṃ cid asādhyaṃ vai loke śīlavatāṃ bhaveta ekarātreṇa māndhātā tryaheṇa janamejayaḥc saptarātreṇa nābhāgaḥ pṛthivīṃ pratipedivāna ete hi pārthivāḥ sarve śīlavanto damānvitāḥc atas teṣāṃ guṇakrītā vasudhā svayam āgamatd duryodhana uvācad kathaṃ tat prāpyate śīlaṃ śrotum icchāmi bhāratad yena śīlena saṃprāptāḥ kṣipram ete vasuṃdharāma atrāpy udāharantīmam itihāsaṃ purātanamc nāradena purā proktaṃ śīlam āśritya bhārataa prahrādena hṛtaṃ rājyaṃ mahendrasya mahātmanaḥc śīlam āśritya daityena trailokyaṃ ca vaśīkṛtama tato bṛhaspatiṃ śakraḥ prāñjaliḥ samupasthitaḥc uvāca ca mahāprājñaḥ śreya icchāmi vedituma tato bṛhaspatis tasmai jñānaṃ naiḥśreyasaṃ paramc kathayām āsa bhagavān devendrāya kurūdvahaa etāvac chreya ity eva bṛhaspatir abhāṣatac indras tu bhūyaḥ papraccha kva viśeṣo bhaved iti bṛhaspatir uvācaa viśeṣo sti mahāṃs tāta bhārgavasya mahātmanaḥc tatrāgamaya bhadraṃ te bhūya eva puraṃdara dhṛtarāṣṭra uvācaa ātmanas tu tataḥ śreyo bhārgavāt sumahāyaśāḥc jñānam āgamayat prītyā punaḥ sa paramadyutiḥa tenāpi samanujñāto bhārgaveṇa mahātmanāc śreyo stīti punar bhūyaḥ śukram āha śatakratuḥa bhārgavas tv āha dharmajñaḥ prahrādasya mahātmanaḥc jñānam asti viśeṣeṇa tato hṛṣṭaś ca so bhavata sa tato brāhmaṇo bhūtvā prahrādaṃ pākaśāsanaḥc sṛtvā provāca medhāvī śreya icchāmi vedituma prahrādas tv abravīd vipraṃ kṣaṇo nāsti dvijarṣabhac trailokyarājye saktasya tato nopadiśāmi tea brāhmaṇas tv abravīd vākyaṃ kasmin kāle kṣaṇo bhavetc tatopadiṣṭam icchāmi yad yat kāryāntaraṃ bhaveta tataḥ prīto bhavad rājā prahrādo brahmavādinec tathety uktvā śubhe kāle jñānatattvaṃ dadau tadāa brāhmaṇo pi yathānyāyaṃ guruvṛttim anuttamāmc cakāra sarvabhāvena yadvat sa manasecchatia pṛṣṭaś ca tena bahuśaḥ prāptaṃ katham ariṃdamac trailokyarājyaṃ dharmajña kāraṇaṃ tad bravīhi med prahlādo pi mahārāja brāhmaṇaṃ vākyam abravīt prahrāda uvācaa nāsūyāmi dvijaśreṣṭha rājāsmīti kadā canac kavyāni vadatāṃ tāta saṃyacchāmi vahāmi caa te visrabdhāḥ prabhāṣante saṃyacchanti ca māṃ sadāc te mā kavyapade saktaṃ śuśrūṣum anasūyakama dharmātmānaṃ jitakrodhaṃ saṃyataṃ saṃyatendriyamc samācinvanti śāstāraḥ kṣaudraṃ madhv iva makṣikāḥa so haṃ vāgagrapiṣṭānāṃ rasānām avalehitāc svajātyān adhitiṣṭhāmi nakṣatrāṇīva candramāḥa etat pṛthivyām amṛtam etac cakṣur anuttamamc yad brāhmaṇamukhe kavyam etac chrutvā pravartate dhṛtarāṣṭra uvācaa etāvac chreya ity āha prahrādo brahmavādinamc śuśrūṣitas tena tadā daityendro vākyam abravīta yathāvad guruvṛttyā te prīto smi dvijasattamac varaṃ vṛṇīṣva bhadraṃ te pradātāsmi na saṃśayaḥa kṛtam ity eva daityendram uvāca sa ca vai dvijaḥc prahrādas tv abravīt prīto gṛhyatāṃ vara ity uta brāhmaṇa uvācaa yadi rājan prasannas tvaṃ mama cecchasi ced dhitamc bhavataḥ śīlam icchāmi prāptum eṣa varo mama dhṛtarāṣṭra uvācaa tataḥ prītaś ca daityendro bhayaṃ cāsyābhavan mahatc vare pradiṣṭe vipreṇa nālpatejāyam ity utaa evam astv iti taṃ prāha prahrādo vismitas tadāc upākṛtya tu viprāya varaṃ duḥkhānvito bhavata datte vare gate vipre cintāsīn mahatī tataḥc prahrādasya mahārāja niścayaṃ na ca jagmivāna tasya cintayatas tāta chāyābhūtaṃ mahādyutec tejo vigrahavat tāta śarīram ajahāt tadāa tam apṛcchan mahākāyaṃ prahrādaḥ ko bhavān itic pratyāha nanu śīlo smi tyakto gacchāmy ahaṃ tvayāa tasmin dvijavare rājan vatsyāmy aham aninditamc yo sau śiṣyatvam āgamya tvayi nityaṃ samāhitaḥe ity uktvāntarhitaṃ tad vai śakraṃ cānvaviśat prabhoa tasmiṃs tejasi yāte tu tādṛgrūpas tato paraḥc śarīrān niḥsṛtas tasya ko bhavān iti cābravīta dharmaṃ prahrāda māṃ viddhi yatrāsau dvijasattamaḥc tatra yāsyāmi daityendra yataḥ śīlaṃ tato hy ahama tato paro mahārāja prajvalann iva tejasāc śarīrān niḥsṛtas tasya prahrādasya mahātmanaḥa ko bhavān iti pṛṣṭaś ca tam āha sa mahādyutiḥc satyam asmy asurendrāgrya yāsye haṃ dharmam anv ihaa tasminn anugate dharmaṃ puruṣe puruṣo paraḥc niścakrāma tatas tasmāt pṛṣṭaś cāha mahātmanāe vṛttaṃ prahrāda māṃ viddhi yataḥ satyaṃ tato hy ahama tasmin gate mahāśvetaḥ śarīrāt tasya niryayauc pṛṣṭaś cāha balaṃ viddhi yato vṛttam ahaṃ tataḥe ity uktvā ca yayau tatra yato vṛttaṃ narādhipaa tataḥ prabhāmayī devī śarīrāt tasya niryayauc tām apṛcchat sa daityendraḥ sā śrīr ity evam abravīta uṣitāsmi sukhaṃ vīra tvayi satyaparākramec tvayā tyaktā gamiṣyāmi balaṃ yatra tato hy ahama tato bhayaṃ prādurāsīt prahrādasya mahātmanaḥc apṛcchata ca tāṃ bhūyaḥ kva yāsi kamalālayea tvaṃ hi satyavratā devī lokasya parameśvarīc kaś cāsau brāhmaṇaśreṣṭhas tattvam icchāmi veditum śrīr uvācaa sa śakro brahmacārī ca yas tvayā copaśikṣitaḥc trailokye te yad aiśvaryaṃ tat tenāpahṛtaṃ prabhoa śīlena hi tvayā lokāḥ sarve dharmajña nirjitāḥc tad vijñāya mahendreṇa tava śīlaṃ hṛtaṃ prabhoa dharmaḥ satyaṃ tathā vṛttaṃ balaṃ caiva tathā hy ahamc śīlamūlā mahāprājña sadā nāsty atra saṃśayaḥ bhīṣma uvācaa evam uktvā gatā tu śrīs te ca sarve yudhiṣṭhirac duryodhanas tu pitaraṃ bhūya evābravīd idama śīlasya tattvam icchāmi vettuṃ kauravanandanac prāpyate ca yathā śīlaṃ tam upāyaṃ vadasva me dhṛtarāṣṭra uvācaa sopāyaṃ pūrvam uddiṣṭaṃ prahrādena mahātmanāc saṃkṣepatas tu śīlasya śṛṇu prāptiṃ narādhipaa adrohaḥ sarvabhūteṣu karmaṇā manasā girāc anugrahaś ca dānaṃ ca śīlam etat praśasyatea yad anyeṣāṃ hitaṃ na syād ātmanaḥ karma pauruṣamc apatrapeta vā yena na tat kuryāt kathaṃ canaa tat tu karma tathā kuryād yena ślāgheta saṃsadic etac chīlaṃ samāsena kathitaṃ kurusattamaa yady apy aśīlā nṛpate prāpnuvanti kva cic chriyamc na bhuñjate ciraṃ tāta samūlāś ca patanti tea etad viditvā tattvena śīlavān bhava putrakac yadīcchasi śriyaṃ tāta suviśiṣṭāṃ yudhiṣṭhirātd jitā sabhā śāstravatā samāsāmasyā gomatā jitād adhvā jito yānavatā sarvaṃ śīlavatā jitamd adhikāṃ vāpi rājendra tatas tvaṃ śīlavān bhava bhīṣma uvācaa etat kathitavān putre dhṛtarāṣṭro narādhipac etat kuruṣva kaunteya tataḥ prāpsyasi tat phalam yudhiṣṭhira uvācaa śīlaṃ pradhānaṃ puruṣe kathitaṃ te pitāmahac katham āśā samutpannā yā ca sā tad vadasva mea saṃśayo me mahān eṣa samutpannaḥ pitāmahac chettā ca tasya nānyo sti tvattaḥ parapuraṃjayaa pitāmahāśā mahatī mamāsīd dhi suyodhanec prāpte yuddhe tu yad yuktaṃ tat kartāyam iti prabhoa sarvasyāśā sumahatī puruṣasyopajāyatec tasyāṃ vihanyamānāyāṃ duḥkho mṛtyur asaṃśayama so haṃ hatāśo durbuddhiḥ kṛtas tena durātmanāc dhārtarāṣṭreṇa rājendra paśya mandātmatāṃ mamaa āśāṃ mahattarāṃ manye parvatād api sadrumātc ākāśād api vā rājann aprameyaiva vā punaḥa eṣā caiva kuruśreṣṭha durvicintyā sudurlabhāc durlabhatvāc ca paśyāmi kim anyad durlabhaṃ tataḥ bhīṣma uvācaa atra te vartayiṣyāmi yudhiṣṭhira nibodha tatc itihāsaṃ sumitrasya nirvṛttam ṛṣabhasya caa sumitro nāma rājarṣir haihayo mṛgayāṃ gataḥc sasāra sa mṛgaṃ viddhvā bāṇena nataparvaṇāa sa mṛgo bāṇam ādāya yayāv amitavikramaḥc sa ca rājā balī tūrṇaṃ sasāra mṛgam antikāta tato nimnaṃ sthalaṃ caiva sa mṛgo dravad āśugaḥc muhūrtam eva rājendra samena sa pathāgamata tataḥ sa rājā tāruṇyād aurasena balena cac
