svakāryārthaṃ bāndhavās tasya dhiṣṭhitāḥ gṛdhra uvācaa ayaṃ pretasamākīrṇo yakṣarākṣasasevitaḥc dāruṇaḥ kānanoddeśaḥ kauśikair abhināditaḥa bhīmaḥ sughoraś ca tathā nīlameghasamaprabhaḥc asmiñ śavaṃ parityajya pretakāryāṇy upāsataa bhānur yāvan na yāty astaṃ yāvac ca vimalā diśaḥc tāvad enaṃ parityajya pretakāryāṇy upāsataa nadanti paruṣaṃ śyenāḥ śivāḥ krośanti dāruṇāḥc mṛgendrāḥ pratinandanti ravir astaṃ ca gacchatia citādhūmena nīlena saṃrajyante ca pādapāḥc śmaśāne ca nirāhārāḥ pratinandanti dehinaḥa sarve vikrāntavīryāś ca asmin deśe sudāruṇāḥc yuṣmān pradharṣayiṣyanti vikṛtā māṃsabhojanāḥa dūrāc cāyaṃ vanoddeśo bhayam atra bhaviṣyatic tyajyatāṃ kāṣṭhabhūto yaṃ mṛṣyatāṃ jāmbukaṃ vacaḥa yadi jambukavākyāni niṣphalāny anṛtāni cac śroṣyatha bhraṣṭavijñānās tataḥ sarve vinaṅkṣyatha jambuka uvācaa sthīyatāṃ neha bhetavyaṃ yāvat tapati bhāskaraḥc tāvad asmin sutasnehād anirvedena vartatadA taskarāṇāṃ virāṭānāṃ nṛpāṇāṃ caiva mānuṣāḥdA bhayaṃ nāsmin vanoddeśe tathaiva hatabuddhināma svairaṃ rudata visrabdhāḥ svairaṃ snehena paśyatab dāruṇe smin vanoddeśe bhayaṃ vo na bhaviṣyatib ayaṃ saumyo vanoddeśaḥ pitṝṇāṃ nidhanākaraḥc sthīyatāṃ yāvad ādityaḥ kiṃ vaḥ kravyādabhāṣitaiḥa yadi gṛdhrasya vākyāni tīvrāṇi rabhasāni cac gṛhṇīta mohitātmānaḥ suto vo na bhaviṣyati bhīṣma uvācaa gṛdhro nastamite tv āha gate stam iti jambukaḥc mṛtasya taṃ parijanam ūcatus tau kṣudhānvitaua svakāryadakṣiṇau rājan gṛdhro jambuka eva cac kṣutpipāsāpariśrāntau śāstram ālambya jalpataḥa tayor vijñānaviduṣor dvayor jambukapatriṇoḥc vākyair amṛtakalpair hi prātiṣṭhanta vrajanti caa śokadainyasamāviṣṭā rudantas tasthire tadāc svakāryakuśalābhyāṃ te saṃbhrāmyante ha naipuṇāta tathā tayor vivadator vijñānaviduṣor dvayoḥc bāndhavānāṃ sthitānāṃ ca upātiṣṭhata śaṃkaraḥd devyā praṇodito devaḥ kāruṇyārdrīkṛtekṣaṇaḥa tatas tān āha manujān varado smīti śūlabhṛtc te pratyūcur idaṃ vākyaṃ duḥkhitāḥ praṇatāḥ sthitāḥa ekaputravihīnānāṃ sarveṣāṃ jīvitārthināmc putrasya no jīvadānāj jīvitaṃ dātum arhasia evam uktaḥ sa bhagavān vāripūrṇena pāṇināc jīvaṃ tasmai kumārāya prādād varṣaśatāya vaia tathā gomāyugṛdhrābhyām adadat kṣudvināśanamc varaṃ pinākī bhagavān sarvabhūtahite rataḥa tataḥ praṇamya taṃ devaṃ śreyoharṣasamanvitāḥc kṛtakṛtyāḥ sukhaṃ hṛṣṭāḥ prātiṣṭhanta tadā vibhoa anirvedena dīrgheṇa niścayena dhruveṇa cac devadevaprasādāc ca kṣipraṃ phalam avāpyatea paśya devasya saṃyogaṃ bāndhavānāṃ ca niścayamc kṛpaṇānāṃ hi rudatāṃ kṛtam aśrupramārjanama paśya cālpena kālena niścayānveṣaṇena cac prasādaṃ śaṃkarāt prāpya duḥkhitāḥ sukham āpnuvana te vismitāḥ prahṛṣṭāś ca putrasaṃjīvanāt punaḥc babhūvur bharataśreṣṭha prasādāc chaṃkarasya vaia tatas te tvaritā rājañ śrutvā śokam aghodbhavamc viviśuḥ putram ādāya nagaraṃ hṛṣṭamānasāḥe eṣā buddhiḥ samastānāṃ cāturvarṇye nidarśitāa dharmārthamokṣasaṃyuktam itihāsam imaṃ śubhamc śrutvā manuṣyaḥ satatam iha pretya ca modate yudhiṣṭhira uvāca balinaḥ pratyamitrasya nityam āsannavartinaḥ upakārāpakārābhyāṃ samarthasyodyatasya ca mohād vikatthanāmātrair asāro lpabalo laghuḥ vāgbhir apratirūpābhir abhidruhya pitāmaha ātmano balam āsthāya kathaṃ varteta mānavaḥ āgacchato tikruddhasya tasyoddharaṇakāmyayā bhīṣma uvācaa atrāpy udāharantīmam itihāsaṃ purātanamc saṃvādaṃ bharataśreṣṭha śalmaleḥ pavanasya caa himavantaṃ samāsādya mahān āsīd vanaspatiḥc varṣapūgābhisaṃvṛddhaḥ śākhāskandhapalāśavāna tatra sma mattā mātaṅgā dharmārtāḥ śramakarśitāḥb yā varāhamṛgaśārdūlapatatrigaṇasaṃkulāḥc viśramanti mahābāho tathānyā mṛgajātayaḥa nalvamātraparīṇāho ghanacchāyo vanaspatiḥc śukaśārikasaṃghuṣṭaḥ phalavān puṣpavān apid taṃ kadā cin munir dṛṣṭvā nārado vismito bravītd dhanyas tvam eka evāsi śālmale vāyuvallabhaḥa sārthikā vaṇijaś cāpi tāpasāś ca vanaukasaḥc vasanti vāsān mārgasthāḥ suramye tarusattamea tasyā tā vipulāḥ śākhā dṛṣṭvā skandhāṃś ca sarvataḥc abhigamyābravīd enaṃ nārado bharatarṣabhaa aho nu ramaṇīyas tvam aho cāsi manoramaḥc prīyāmahe tvayā nityaṃ tarupravara śalmalea sadaiva śakunās tāta mṛgāś cādhas tathā gajāḥc vasanti tava saṃhṛṣṭā manoharatarās tathāa tava śākhā mahāśākha skandhaṃ ca vipulaṃ tathāc na vai prabhagnān paśyāmi mārutena kathaṃ canad sarvāvāsasya sadbhāvāt sauhṛdāc cābhirakṣatia kiṃ nu te mārutas tāta prītimān atha vā suhṛtc tvāṃ rakṣati sadā yena vane smin pavano dhruvama vivān hi pavanaḥ sthānād vṛkṣān uccāvacān apic parvatānāṃ ca śikharāṇy ācālayati vegavāna śoṣayaty eva pātālaṃ vivān gandhavahaḥ śuciḥc hradāṃś ca saritaś caiva sāgarāṃś ca tathaiva haa tvāṃ saṃrakṣeta pavanaḥ sakhitvena na saṃśayaḥc tasmād bahalaśākho si parṇavān puṣpavān apia idaṃ ca ramaṇīyaṃ te pratibhāti vanaspatec yad ime vihagās tāta ramante muditās tvayia eṣāṃ pṛthak samastānāṃ śrūyate madhuraḥ svaraḥc puṣpasaṃmodane kāle vāśatāṃ sumanoharama tatheme muditā nāgāḥ svayūthakulaśobhinaḥc gharmārtās tvāṃ samāsādya sukhaṃ vindanti śalmalea tathaiva mṛgajātībhir anyābhir upaśobhasec tathā sārthādhivāsaiś ca śobhase meruvad drumaa brāhmaṇaiś ca tapaḥsiddhais tāpasaiḥ śramaṇair apic triviṣṭapasamaṃ manye tavāyatanam eva haa bandhutvād atha vā sakhyāc chalmale nātra saṃśayaḥc pālayaty eva satataṃ bhīmaḥ sarvatrago nilaḥa nyagbhāvaṃ paramaṃ vāyoḥ śalmale tvam upāgataḥc tavāham asmīti sadā yena rakṣati mārutaḥa na taṃ paśyāmy ahaṃ vṛkṣaṃ parvataṃ vāpi taṃ dṛḍhamc yo na vāyubalād bhagnaḥ pṛthivyām iti me matiḥa tvaṃ punaḥ kāraṇair nūnaṃ śalmale rakṣyase sadāc vāyunā saparīvāras tena tiṣṭhasy asaṃśayam śalmalir uvācaa na me vāyuḥ sakhā brahman na bandhur na ca me suhṛtc parameṣṭhī tathā naiva yena rakṣati mānilaḥa mama tejobalaṃ vāyor bhīmam api hi nāradac kalām aṣṭādaśīṃ prāṇair na me prāpnoti mārutaḥa āgacchan paramo vāyur mayā viṣṭambhito balātc rujan drumān parvatāṃś ca yac cānyad api kiṃ canaa sa mayā bahuśo bhagnaḥ prabhañjan vai prabhañjanaḥc tasmān na bibhye devarṣe kruddhād api samīraṇāt nārada uvācaa śalmale viparītaṃ te darśanaṃ nātra saṃśayaḥc na hi vāyor balenāsti bhūtaṃ tulyabalaṃ kva cita indro yamo vaiśravaṇo varuṇaś ca jaleśvaraḥc na te pi tulyā marutaḥ kiṃ punas tvaṃ vanaspatea yad dhi kiṃ cid iha prāṇi śalmale ceṣṭate bhuvic sarvatra bhagavān vāyuś ceṣṭāprāṇakaraḥ prabhuḥa eṣa ceṣṭayate samyak prāṇinaḥ samyag āyataḥc asamyag āyato bhūyaś ceṣṭate vikṛto nṛṣua sa tvam evaṃvidhaṃ vāyuṃ sarvasattvabhṛtāṃ varamc na pūjayasi pūjyaṃ taṃ kim anyad buddhilāghavāta asāraś cāsi durbuddhe kevalaṃ bahu bhāṣasec krodhādibhir avacchanno mithyā vadasi śalmalea mama roṣaḥ samutpannas tvayy evaṃ saṃprabhāṣatic bravīmy eṣa svayaṃ vāyos tava durbhāṣitaṃ bahua candanaiḥ spandanaiḥ śālaiḥ saralair devadārubhiḥc vetasair bandhanaiś cāpi ye cānye balavattarāḥa taiś cāpi naivaṃ durbuddhe kṣipto vāyuḥ kṛtātmabhiḥc te hi jānanti vāyoś ca balam ātmana eva caa tasmāt te vai namasyanti śvasanaṃ drumasattamāḥc tvaṃ tu mohān na jānīṣe vāyor balam anantakamd eṣa tasmād gamiṣyāmi sakāśaṃ mātariśvanaḥ bhīṣma uvācaa evam uktvā tu rājendra śalmaliṃ brahmavittamaḥc nāradaḥ pavane sarvaṃ śalmaler vākyam abravīta himavatpṛṣṭhajaḥ kaś cic chalmaliḥ parivāravānc bṛhanmūlo bṛhacchākhaḥ sa tvāṃ vāyo vamanyatea bahūny ākṣepayuktāni tvām āha vacanāni saḥc na yuktāni mayā vāyo tāni vaktuṃ tvayi prabhoa jānāmi tvām ahaṃ vāyo sarvaprāṇabhṛtāṃ varamc variṣṭhaṃ ca gariṣṭhaṃ ca krodhe vaivasvataṃ yathāa evaṃ tu vacanaṃ śrutvā nāradasya samīraṇaḥc śalmaliṃ tam upāgamya kruddho vacanam abravīta śalmale nārade yat tat tvayoktaṃ madvigarhaṇamc ahaṃ vāyuḥ prabhāvaṃ te darśayāmy ātmano balama nāhaṃ tvā nābhijānāmi viditaś cāsi me drumac pitāmahaḥ prajāsarge tvayi viśrāntavān prabhuḥa tasya viśramaṇād eva prasādo yaḥ kṛtas tavac rakṣyase tena durbuddhe nātmavīryād drumādhamaa yan mā tvam avajānīṣe yathānyaṃ prākṛtaṃ tathāc darśayāmy eṣa ātmānaṃ yathā mām avabhotsyasea evam uktas tataḥ prāha śalmaliḥ prahasann ivac pavana tvaṃ vane kruddho darśayātmānam ātmanāa mayi vai tyajyatāṃ krodhaḥ kiṃ me kruddhaḥ kariṣyasic na te bibhemi pavana yady api tvaṃ svayaṃprabhuḥd balādhiko haṃ tvattaś ca na bhīḥ kāryā mayā tavad ye tu buddhyā hi balinas te bhavanti balīyasaḥd prāṇamātrabalā ye vai naiva te balino matāḥa ity evam uktaḥ pavanaḥ śva ity evābravīd vacaḥc darśayiṣyāmi te tejas tato rātrir upāgamata atha niścitya manasā śalmalir vātakāritamc paśyamānas tadātmānam asamaṃ mātariśvanaḥa nārade yan mayā proktaṃ pavanaṃ prati tan mṛṣāc asamartho hy ahaṃ vāyor balena balavān hi saḥa māruto balavān nityaṃ yathainaṃ nārado bravītc ahaṃ hi durbalo nyebhyo vṛkṣebhyo nātra saṃśayaḥa kiṃ tu buddhyā samo nāsti mama kaś cid vanaspatiḥc tad ahaṃ buddhim āsthāya bhayaṃ mokṣye samīraṇāta yadi tāṃ buddhim āsthāya careyuḥ parṇino vanec ariṣṭāḥ syuḥ sadā kruddhāt pavanān nātra saṃśayaḥa te tra bālā na jānanti yathā nainān samīraṇaḥc samīrayeta saṃkruddho yathā jānāmy ahaṃ tathāa tato niścitya manasā śalmaliḥ kṣubhitas tadāc śākhāḥ skandhān praśākhāś ca svayam eva vyaśātayata sa parityajya śākhāś ca patrāṇi kusumāni cac prabhāte vāyum āyāntaṃ pratyaikṣata vanaspatiḥa tataḥ kruddhaḥ śvasan vāyuḥ pātayan vai mahādrumānc ājagāmātha taṃ deśaṃ sthito yatra sa śalmaliḥa taṃ hīnaparṇaṃ patitāgraśākhaṃviśīrṇapuṣpaṃ prasamīkṣya vāyuḥc uvāca vākyaṃ smayamāna enaṃmudā yutaṃ śalmaliṃ rugṇaśākhama aham apy evam eva tvāṃ kurvāṇaḥ śalmale ruṣāc ātmanā yat kṛtaṃ kṛtsnaṃ śākhānām apakarṣaṇama hīnapuṣpāgraśākhas tvaṃ śīrṇāṅkurapalāśavānc ātmadurmantriteneha madvīryavaśago bhavaḥa etac chrutvā vaco vāyoḥ śalmalir vrīḍitas tadāc atapyata vacaḥ smṛtvā nārado yat tadābravīta evaṃ yo rājaśārdūla durbalaḥ san balīyasāc vairam āsajjate bālas tapyate śalmalir yathāa tasmād vairaṃ na kurvīta durbalo balavattaraiḥc śoced dhi vairaṃ kurvāṇo yathā vai śalmalis tathāa na hi vairaṃ mahātmāno vivṛṇvanty apakāriṣuc śanaiḥ śanair mahārāja darśayanti sma te balama vairaṃ na kurvīta naro durbuddhir buddhijīvināc buddhir buddhimato yāti tūleṣv iva hutāśanaḥa na hi buddhyā samaṃ kiṃ cid vidyate puruṣe nṛpac tathā balena rājendra na samo stīti cintayeta tasmāt kṣameta bālāya jaḍāya badhirāya cac balādhikāya rājendra tad dṛṣṭaṃ tvayi śatruhana akṣauhiṇyo daśaikā ca sapta caiva mahādyutec balena na samā rājann arjunasya mahātmanaḥa hatās tāś caiva bhagnāś ca pāṇḍavena yaśasvināc caratā balam āsthāya pākaśāsaninā mṛdhea uktās te rājadharmāś ca āpaddharmāś ca bhāratac vistareṇa mahārāja kiṃ bhūyaḥ prabravīmi te yudhiṣṭhira uvācaa pāpasya yad adhiṣṭhānaṃ yataḥ pāpaṃ pravartatec etad icchāmy ahaṃ jñātuṃ tattvena bharatarṣabha bhīṣma uvācaa pāpasya yad adhiṣṭhānaṃ tac chṛṇuṣva narādhipac eko lobho mahāgrāho lobhāt pāpaṃ pravartatea ataḥ pāpam adharmaś ca tathā duḥkham anuttamamc nikṛtyā mūlam etad dhi yena pāpakṛto janāḥa lobhāt krodhaḥ prabhavati lobhāt kāmaḥ pravartatec lobhān mohaś ca māyā ca mānastambhaḥ parāsutāa akṣamā hrīparityāgaḥ śrīnāśo dharmasaṃkṣayaḥc abhidhyāprajñatā caiva sarvaṃ lobhāt pravartatea anyāyaś cāvitarkaś ca vikarmasu ca yāḥ kriyāḥc kūṭavidyādayaś caiva rūpaiśvaryamadas tathāa sarvabhūteṣv aviśvāsaḥ sarvabhūteṣv anārjavamc sarvabhūteṣv abhidrohaḥ sarvabhūteṣv ayuktatāe haraṇaṃ paravittānāṃ paradārābhimarśanama vāgvego mānaso vego nindāvegas tathaiva cac upasthodarayor vego mṛtyuvegaś ca dāruṇaḥa īrṣyāvegaś ca balavān mithyāvegaś ca dustyajaḥc rasavegaś ca durvāraḥ śrotravegaś ca duḥsahaḥa kutsā vikatthā mātsaryaṃ pāpaṃ duṣkarakāritāc sāhasānāṃ ca sarveṣām akāryāṇāṃ kriyās tathāa jātau bālye tha kaumāre yauvane cāpi mānavaḥc na saṃtyajaty ātmakarma yan na jīryati jīryataḥa yo na pūrayituṃ śakyo lobhaḥ prāptyā kurūdvahac nityaṃ gambhīratoyābhir āpagābhir ivodadhiḥe na prahṛṣyati lābhair yo yaś ca kāmair na tṛpyatia yo na devair na gandharvair nāsurair na mahoragaiḥc jñāyate nṛpa tattvena sarvair bhūtagaṇais tathāe sa lobhaḥ saha mohena vijetavyo jitātmanāa dambho drohaś ca nindā ca paiśunyaṃ matsaras tathāc bhavanty etāni kauravya lubdhānām akṛtātmanāma sumahānty api śāstrāṇi dhārayanti bahuśrutāḥc chettāraḥ saṃśayānāṃ ca kliśyantīhālpabuddhayaḥa dveṣakrodhaprasaktāś ca śiṣṭācārabahiṣkṛtāḥc antaḥkṣurā vāṅmadhurāḥ kūpāś channās tṛṇair ivae dharmavaitaṃsikāḥ kṣudrā muṣṇanti dhvajino jagata kurvate ca bahūn mārgāṃs tāṃs tān hetubalāśritāḥc sarvaṃ mārgaṃ vilumpanti lobhājñāneṣu niṣṭhitāḥa dharmasyāhriyamāṇasya lobhagrastair durātmabhiḥc yā yā vikriyate saṃsthā tataḥ sābhiprapadyatea darpaḥ krodho madaḥ svapno harṣaḥ śoko timānitāc tata eva hi kauravya dṛśyante lubdhabuddhiṣue etān aśiṣṭān budhyasva nityaṃ lobhasamanvitāna śiṣṭāṃs tu paripṛcchethā yān vakṣyāmi śucivratānc yeṣu vṛttibhayaṃ nāsti paralokabhayaṃ na caa nāmiṣeṣu prasaṅgo sti na priyeṣv apriyeṣu cac śiṣṭācāraḥ priyo yeṣu damo yeṣu pratiṣṭhitaḥa sukhaṃ duḥkhaṃ paraṃ yeṣāṃ satyaṃ yeṣāṃ parāyaṇamc dātāro na gṛhītāro dayāvantas tathaiva caa pitṛdevātitheyāś ca nityodyuktās tathaiva cac sarvopakāriṇo dhīrāḥ sarvadharmānupālakāḥa sarvabhūtahitāś caiva sarvadeyāś ca bhāratac na te cālayituṃ śakyā dharmavyāpārapāragāḥa na teṣāṃ bhidyate vṛttaṃ yat purā sādhubhiḥ kṛtamc na trāsino na capalā na raudrāḥ satpathe sthitāḥa te sevyāḥ sādhubhir nityaṃ yeṣv ahiṃsā pratiṣṭhitāc kāmakrodhavyapetā ye nirmamā nirahaṃkṛtāḥe suvratāḥ sthiramaryādās tān upāssva ca pṛccha caa na gavārthaṃ yaśorthaṃ vā dharmas teṣāṃ yudhiṣṭhirac avaśyakārya ity eva śarīrasya kriyās tathāa na bhayaṃ krodhacāpalyaṃ na śokas teṣu vidyatec na dharmadhvajinaś caiva na guhyaṃ kiṃ cid āsthitāḥa yeṣv alobhas tathāmoho ye ca satyārjave ratāḥc teṣu kaunteya rajyethā yeṣv atandrīkṛtaṃ manaḥa ye na hṛṣyanti lābheṣu nālābheṣu vyathanti cac nirmamā nirahaṃkārāḥ sattvasthāḥ samadarśinaḥa lābhālābhau sukhaduḥkhe ca tātapriyāpriye maraṇaṃ jīvitaṃ cac samāni yeṣāṃ sthiravikramāṇāṃbuddhātmanāṃ sattvam avasthitānāma sukhapriyais tān sumahāpratāpānyatto pramattaś ca samarthayethāḥc daivāt sarve guṇavanto bhavantiśubhāśubhā vākpralāpā yathaiva yudhiṣṭhira uvācaa anarthānām adhiṣṭhānam ukto lobhaḥ pitāmahac ajñānam api vai tāta śrotum icchāmi tattvataḥ bhīṣma uvācaa karoti pāpaṃ yo jñānān nātmano vetti ca kṣamamc pradveṣṭi sādhuvṛttāṃś ca sa lokasyaiti vācyatāma ajñānān nirayaṃ yāti tathājñānena durgatimc ajñānāt kleśam āpnoti tathāpatsu nimajjati yudhiṣṭhira uvācaa ajñānasya pravṛttiṃ ca sthānaṃ vṛddhiṃ kṣayodayauc mūlaṃ yogaṃ gatiṃ kālaṃ kāraṇaṃ hetum eva caa śrotum icchāmi tattvena yathāvad iha pārthivac ajñānaprabhavaṃ hīdaṃ yad duḥkham upalabhyate bhīṣma uvācaa rāgo dveṣas tathā moho harṣaḥ śoko bhimānitāc kāmaḥ krodhaś ca darpaś ca tandrīr ālasyam eva caa icchā dveṣas tathā tāpaḥ paravṛddhyupatāpitāc ajñānam etan nirdiṣṭaṃ pāpānāṃ caiva yāḥ kriyāḥa etayā yā pravṛttiś ca vṛddhyādīn yāṃś ca pṛcchasic vistareṇa mahābāho śṛṇu tac ca viśāṃ patea ubhāv etau samaphalau samadoṣau ca bhāratac ajñānaṃ cātilobhaś cāpy ekaṃ jānīhi pārthivaa lobhaprabhavam ajñānaṃ vṛddhaṃ bhūyaḥ pravardhatec sthāne sthānaṃ kṣaye kṣaiṇyam upaiti vividhāṃ gatima mūlaṃ lobhasya mahataḥ kālātmagatir eva cac chinne cchinne tathā lobhe kāraṇaṃ kāla eva hia tasyājñānāt tu lobho hi lobhād ajñānam eva cac sarve doṣās tathā lobhāt tasmāl lobhaṃ vivarjayeta janako yuvanāśvaś ca vṛṣādarbhiḥ prasenajitc lobhakṣayād divaṃ prāptās tathaivānye janādhipāḥa pratyakṣaṃ tu kuruśreṣṭha tyaja lobham ihātmanāc tyaktvā lobhaṃ sukhaṃ loke pretya cānucariṣyasi yudhiṣṭhira uvācaa svādhyāyakṛtayatnasya brāhmaṇasya pitāmahac dharmakāmasya dharmātman kiṃ nu śreya ihocyatea bahudhādarśane loke śreyo yad iha manyasec asmiṃl loke pare caiva tan me brūhi pitāmahaa mahān ayaṃ dharmapatho bahuśākhaś ca bhāratac kiṃ svid eveha dharmāṇām anuṣṭheyatamaṃ matama dharmasya mahato rājan bahuśākhasya tattvataḥc yan mūlaṃ paramaṃ tāta tat sarvaṃ brūhy atandritaḥ bhīṣma uvācaa hanta te kathayiṣyāmi yena śreyaḥ prapatsyasec pītvāmṛtam iva prājño jñānatṛpto bhaviṣyasia dharmasya vidhayo naike te te proktā maharṣibhiḥc svaṃ svaṃ vijñānam āśritya damas teṣāṃ parāyaṇama damaṃ niḥśreyasaṃ prāhur vṛddhā niścayadarśinaḥc brāhmaṇasya viśeṣeṇa damo dharmaḥ sanātanaḥa nādāntasya kriyāsiddhir yathāvad upalabhyatec damo dānaṃ tathā yajñān adhītaṃ cātivartatea damas tejo vardhayati pavitraṃ ca damaḥ paramc vipāpmā tejasā yuktaḥ puruṣo vindate mahata damena sadṛśaṃ dharmaṃ nānyaṃ lokeṣu śuśrumac damo hi paramo loke praśastaḥ sarvadharmiṇāma pretya cāpi manuṣyendra paramaṃ vindate sukhamc damena hi samāyukto mahāntaṃ dharmam aśnutea sukhaṃ dāntaḥ prasvapiti sukhaṃ ca pratibudhyatec sukhaṃ paryeti lokāṃś ca manaś cāsya prasīdatia adāntaḥ puruṣaḥ kleśam abhīkṣṇaṃ pratipadyatec anarthāṃś ca bahūn anyān prasṛjaty ātmadoṣajāna āśrameṣu caturṣv āhur damam evottamaṃ vratamc tasya liṅgāni vakṣyāmi yeṣāṃ samudayo damaḥa kṣamā dhṛtir ahiṃsā ca samatā satyam ārjavamc indriyāvajayo dākṣyaṃ mārdavaṃ hrīr acāpalama akārpaṇyam asaṃrambhaḥ saṃtoṣaḥ priyavāditāc avivitsānasūyā cāpy eṣāṃ samudayo damaḥa gurupūjā ca kauravya dayā bhūteṣv apaiśunamc janavādo mṛṣāvādaḥ stutinindāvivarjanama kāmaḥ krodhaś ca lobhaś ca darpaḥ stambho vikatthanamc moha īrṣyāvamānaś cety etad dānto na sevatea anindito hy akāmātmāthālpeccho thānasūyakaḥc samudrakalpaḥ sa naro na kadā cana pūryatea ahaṃ tvayi mama tvaṃ ca mayi te teṣu cāpy ahamc pūrvasaṃbandhisaṃyogān naitad dānto niṣevatea sarvā grāmyās tathāraṇyā yāś ca loke pravṛttayaḥc nindāṃ caiva praśaṃsāṃ ca yo nāśrayati mucyatea maitro tha śīlasaṃpannaḥ susahāyaparaś ca yaḥc muktaś ca vividhaiḥ saṅgais tasya pretya mahat phalama suvṛttaḥ śīlasaṃpannaḥ prasannātmātmavid budhaḥc prāpyeha loke satkāraṃ sugatiṃ pratipadyatea karma yac chubham eveha sadbhir ācaritaṃ ca yatc tad eva jñānayuktasya muner dharmo na hīyatea niṣkramya vanam āsthāya jñānayukto jitendriyaḥc kālākāṅkṣī carann evaṃ brahmabhūyāya kalpatea abhayaṃ yasya bhūtebhyo bhūtānām abhayaṃ yataḥc tasya dehād vimuktasya bhayaṃ nāsti kutaś canaa avācinoti karmāṇi na ca saṃpracinoti hac samaḥ sarveṣu bhūteṣu maitrāyaṇagatiś careta śakunīnām ivākāśe jale vāricarasya vāc yathā gatir na dṛśyeta tathā tasya na saṃśayaḥa gṛhān utsṛjya yo rājan mokṣam evābhipadyatec lokās tejomayās tasya kalpante śāśvatīḥ samāḥa saṃnyasya sarvakarmāṇi saṃnyasya vidhivat tapaḥc saṃnyasya vividhā vidyāḥ sarvaṃ saṃnyasya caiva haa kāmeṣu cāpy anāvṛttaḥ prasannātmātmavic chuciḥc prāpyeha loke satkāraṃ svargaṃ samabhipadyatea yac ca paitāmahaṃ sthānaṃ brahmarāśisamudbhavamc guhāyāṃ pihitaṃ nityaṃ tad damenābhipadyatea jñānārāmasya buddhasya sarvabhūtāvirodhinaḥc nāvṛttibhayam astīha paraloke bhayaṃ kutaḥa eka eva dame doṣo dvitīyo nopapadyatec yad enaṃ kṣamayā yuktam aśaktaṃ manyate janaḥa etasya tu mahāprājña doṣasya sumahān guṇaḥc kṣamāyāṃ vipulā lokāḥ sulabhā hi sahiṣṇunāa dāntasya kim araṇyena tathādāntasya bhāratac yatraiva hi vased dāntas tad araṇyaṃ sa āśramaḥ vaiśaṃpāyana uvācaa etad bhīṣmasya vacanaṃ śrutvā rājā yudhiṣṭhiraḥc amṛteneva saṃtṛptaḥ prahṛṣṭaḥ samapadyataa punaś ca paripapraccha bhīṣmaṃ dharmabhṛtāṃ varamc tapaḥ prati sa covāca tasmai sarvaṃ kurūdvaha bhīṣma uvācaa sarvam etat tapomūlaṃ kavayaḥ paricakṣatec na hy ataptatapā mūḍhaḥ kriyāphalam avāpyatea prajāpatir idaṃ sarvaṃ tapasaivāsṛjat prabhuḥc tathaiva vedān ṛṣayas tapasā pratipedirea tapaso hy ānupūrvyeṇa phalamūlānilāśanāḥc trīṃl lokāṃs tapasā siddhāḥ paśyanti susamāhitāḥa auṣadhāny agadādīni tisro vidyāś ca saṃskṛtāḥc tapasaiva hi sidhyanti tapomūlaṃ hi sādhanama yad durāpaṃ durāmnāyaṃ durādharṣaṃ durutsahamc sarvaṃ tat tapasā śakyaṃ tapo hi duratikramama surāpo saṃmatādāyī bhrūṇahā gurutalpagaḥc tapasaiva sutaptena naraḥ pāpād vimucyatea tapaso bahurūpasya tais tair dvāraiḥ pravartataḥc nivṛttyā vartamānasya tapo nānaśanāt parama ahiṃsā satyavacanaṃ dānam indriyanigrahaḥc etebhyo hi mahārāja tapo nānaśanāt parama na duṣkarataraṃ dānān nātimātaram āśramaḥc traividyebhyaḥ paraṃ nāsti saṃnyāsaḥ paramaṃ tapaḥa indriyāṇīha rakṣanti dhanadhānyābhiguptayec tasmād arthe ca dharme ca tapo nānaśanāt parama ṛṣayaḥ pitaro devā manuṣyā mṛgasattamāḥc yāni cānyāni bhūtāni sthāvarāṇi carāṇi cad sthāvarāṇi ca bhūtāni carāṇy anyāni yāni caa tapaḥparāyaṇāḥ sarve sidhyanti tapasā ca tec ity evaṃ tapasā devā mahattvaṃ cāpy avāpnuvana imānīṣṭavibhāgāni phalāni tapasā sadāc tapasā śakyate prāptuṃ devatvam api niścayāt yudhiṣṭhira uvācaa satyaṃ dharme praśaṃsanti viprarṣipitṛdevatāḥc satyam icchāmy ahaṃ śrotuṃ tan me brūhi pitāmahaa satyaṃ kiṃlakṣaṇaṃ rājan kathaṃ vā tad avāpyatec satyaṃ prāpya bhavet kiṃ ca kathaṃ caiva tad ucyate bhīṣma uvācaa cāturvarṇyasya dharmāṇāṃ saṃkaro na praśasyatec avikāritamaṃ satyaṃ sarvavarṇeṣu bhāratad tasmāc chreṣṭhatamaṃ satyaṃ sarvavarṇeṣu bhārataa satyaṃ satsu sadā dharmaḥ satyaṃ dharmaḥ sanātanaḥc satyam eva namasyeta satyaṃ hi paramā gatiḥa satyaṃ dharmas tapo yogaḥ satyaṃ brahma sanātanamc satyaṃ yajñaḥ paraḥ proktaḥ satye sarvaṃ pratiṣṭhitama ācārān iha satyasya yathāvad anupūrvaśaḥc lakṣaṇaṃ ca pravakṣyāmi satyasyeha yathākramama prāpyate hi yathā satyaṃ tac ca śrotuṃ tvam arhasic satyaṃ trayodaśavidhaṃ sarvalokeṣu bhārataa satyaṃ ca samatā caiva damaś caiva na saṃśayaḥc amātsaryaṃ kṣamā caiva hrīs titikṣānasūyatāa tyāgo dhyānam athāryatvaṃ dhṛtiś ca satataṃ sthirāc ahiṃsā caiva rājendra satyākārās trayodaśaa satyaṃ nāmāvyayaṃ nityam avikāri tathaiva cac sarvadharmāviruddhaṃ ca yogenaitad avāpyatea ātmanīṣṭe tathāniṣṭe ripau ca samatā tathāc icchādveṣakṣayaṃ prāpya kāmakrodhakṣayaṃ tathāa damo nānyaspṛhā nityaṃ dhairyaṃ gāmbhīryam eva cac abhayaṃ krodhaśamanaṃ jñānenaitad avāpyatea amātsaryaṃ budhāḥ prāhur dānaṃ dharme ca saṃyamamc avasthitena nityaṃ ca satyenāmatsarī bhaveta akṣamāyāḥ kṣamāyāś ca priyāṇīhāpriyāṇi cac kṣamate sarvataḥ sādhuḥ sādhv āpnoti ca satyavāna kalyāṇaṃ kurute gāḍhaṃ hrīmān na ślāghate kva citc praśāntavāṅmanā nityaṃ hrīs tu dharmād avāpyatea dharmārthahetoḥ kṣamate titikṣā kṣāntir ucyatec lokasaṃgrahaṇārthaṃ tu sā tu dhairyeṇa labhyated anasūyā tu gāmbhīryaṃ dānenaitad avāpyatea tyāgaḥ snehasya yas tyāgo viṣayāṇāṃ tathaiva cac rāgadveṣaprahīṇasya tyāgo bhavati nānyathād dhyānaṃ cāśāṭhyam ity uktaṃ maunenaitad avāpyatea āryatā nāma bhūtānāṃ yaḥ karoti prayatnataḥc śubhaṃ karma nirākāro vītarāgatvam eva caa dhṛtir nāma sukhe duḥkhe yathā nāpnoti vikriyāmc tāṃ bhajeta sadā prājño ya icched bhūtim ātmanaḥa sarvathā kṣamiṇā bhāvyaṃ tathā satyapareṇa cac vītaharṣabhayakrodho dhṛtim āpnoti paṇḍitaḥa adrohaḥ sarvabhūteṣu karmaṇā manasā girāc anugrahaś ca dānaṃ ca satāṃ dharmaḥ sanātanaḥa ete trayodaśākārāḥ pṛthak satyaikalakṣaṇāḥc bhajante satyam eveha bṛṃhayanti ca bhārataa nāntaḥ śakyo guṇānāṃ hi vaktuṃ satyasya bhāratac ataḥ satyaṃ praśaṃsanti viprāḥ sapitṛdevatāḥa nāsti satyāt paro dharmo nānṛtāt pātakaṃ paramc sthitir hi satyaṃ dharmasya tasmāt satyaṃ na lopayeta upaiti satyād dānaṃ hi tathā yajñāḥ sadakṣiṇāḥc vratāgnihotraṃ vedāś ca ye cānye dharmaniścayāḥa aśvamedhasahasraṃ ca satyaṃ ca tulayā dhṛtamc aśvamedhasahasrād dhi satyam evātiricyate yudhiṣṭhira uvācaa yataḥ prabhavati krodhaḥ kāmaś ca bharatarṣabhac śokamohau vivitsā ca parāsutvaṃ tathā madaḥa lobho mātsaryam īrṣyā ca kutsāsūyā kṛpā tathāc etat sarvaṃ mahāprājña yāthātathyena me vada bhīṣma uvācaa trayodaśaite tibalāḥ śatravaḥ prāṇināṃ smṛtāḥb śatravaḥ prāṇināṃ sarve smṛtās te tu trayodaśac upāsate mahārāja samastāḥ puruṣān ihad prāṇināṃ lobhayuktānām ete vai śatravaḥ smṛtāḥa ete pramattaṃ puruṣam apramattā nudanti hic vṛkā iva vilumpanti dṛṣṭvaiva puruṣetarāna ebhyaḥ pravartate duḥkham ebhyaḥ pāpaṃ pravartatec iti martyo vijānīyāt satataṃ bharatarṣabhaa eteṣām udayaṃ sthānaṃ kṣayaṃ ca puruṣottamac hanta te vartayiṣyāmi tan me nigadataḥ śṛṇuc   krodhasyotpattim āditaḥc yathātattvaṃ kṣitipatea lobhāt krodhaḥ prabhavati paradoṣair udīryatec kṣamayā tiṣṭhate rājañ śrīmāṃś ca vinivartatea saṃkalpāj jāyate kāmaḥ sevyamāno vivardhateb yadā prājño viramate tadā sadyaḥ praṇaśyatib parāsūyā krodhalobhāv antarā pratimucyateb dayayā sarvabhūtānāṃ nirvedād vinivartatec avadyadarśanād vyeti tattvajñānāc ca dhīmatāma viruddhāni hi śāstrāṇi paśyantīhālpabuddhayaḥc vivitsā jāyate tatra tattvajñānān nivartatea prīteḥ śokaḥ prabhavati viyogāt tasya dehinaḥc yadā nirarthakaṃ vetti tadā sadyaḥ praṇaśyatid ajñānaprabhavo mohaḥ pāpābhyāsāt pravartated yadā prājñeṣu ramate tadā sadyaḥ praṇaśyatia parāsutā krodhalobhād abhyāsāc ca pravartatec dayayā sarvabhūtānāṃ nirvedāt sā nivartatea sattvatyāgāt tu mātsaryam ahitāni ca sevatec etat tu kṣīyate tāta sādhūnām upasevanāta kulāj jñānāt tathaiśvaryān mado bhavati dehināmc ebhir eva tu vijñātair madaḥ sadyaḥ praṇaśyatia īrṣyā kāmāt prabhavati saṃgharṣāc caiva bhāratac itareṣāṃ tu martyānāṃ prajñayā sā praṇaśyatia vibhramāl lokabāhyānāṃ dveṣyair vākyair asaṃgataiḥc kutsā saṃjāyate rājann upekṣābhiḥ praśāmyatia pratikartum aśakyāya balasthāyāpakāriṇec asūyā jāyate tīvrā kāruṇyād vinivartatea kṛpaṇān satataṃ dṛṣṭvā tataḥ saṃjāyate kṛpāb ajñānaprabhavo lobho bhūtānāṃ dṛśyate sadāb asthiratvaṃ ca bhogānāṃ dṛṣṭvā jñātvā nivartatec dharmaniṣṭhāṃ yadā vetti tadā śāmyati sā kṛpāa etāny eva jitāny āhuḥ praśamāc ca trayodaśac ete hi dhārtarāṣṭrāṇāṃ sarve doṣās trayodaśae tvayā sarvātmanā nityaṃ vijitā jeṣyase ca tān yudhiṣṭhira uvācaa ānṛśaṃsyaṃ vijānāmi darśanena satāṃ sadāc nṛśaṃsān na vijānāmi teṣāṃ karma ca bhārataa kaṇṭakān kūpam agniṃ ca varjayanti yathā narāḥc tathā nṛśaṃsakarmāṇaṃ varjayanti narā narama nṛśaṃso hy adhamo nityaṃ pretya ceha ca bhāratac tasmād bravīhi kauravya tasya dharmaviniścayam bhīṣma uvācaa spṛhāsyāntarhitā caiva viditārthā ca karmaṇāc ākroṣṭā kruśyate caiva bandhitā badhyate ca yaḥa dattānukīrtir viṣamaḥ kṣudro naikṛtikaḥ śaṭhaḥc asaṃbhogī ca mānī ca tathā saṅgī vikatthanaḥa sarvātiśaṅkī paruṣo bāliśaḥ kṛpaṇas tathāc vargapraśaṃsī satatam āśramadveṣasaṃkarīa hiṃsāvihārī satatam aviśeṣaguṇāguṇaḥc bahvalīko manasvī ca lubdho tyarthaṃ nṛśaṃsakṛta dharmaśīlaṃ guṇopetaṃ pāpa ity avagacchatic ātmaśīlānumānena na viśvasiti kasya cita pareṣāṃ yatra doṣaḥ syāt tad guhyaṃ saṃprakāśayetc samāneṣv eva doṣeṣu vṛttyartham upaghātayeta tathopakāriṇaṃ caiva manyate vañcitaṃ paramc dattvāpi ca dhanaṃ kāle saṃtapaty upakāriṇea bhakṣyaṃ bhojyam atho lehyaṃ yac cānyat sādhu bhojanamc prekṣamāṇeṣu yo śnīyān nṛśaṃsa iti taṃ viduḥa brāhmaṇebhyaḥ pradāyāgraṃ yaḥ suhṛdbhiḥ sahāśnutec sa pretya labhate svargam iha cānantyam aśnutea eṣa te bharataśreṣṭha nṛśaṃsaḥ parikīrtitaḥc sadā vivarjanīyo vai puruṣeṇa bubhūṣatā bhīṣma uvācaa kṛtārtho yakṣyamāṇaś ca sarvavedāntagaś ca yaḥc ācāryapitṛbhāryārthaṃ svādhyāyārtham athāpi vāa ete vai sādhavo dṛṣṭā brāhmaṇā dharmabhikṣavaḥc asvebhyo deyam etebhyo dānaṃ vidyāviśeṣataḥa anyatra dakṣiṇā yā tu deyā bharatasattamac anyebhyo hi bahirvedyāṃ nākṛtānnaṃ vidhīyatea sarvaratnāni rājā ca yathārhaṃ pratipādayetc brāhmaṇāś caiva yajñāś ca sahānnāḥ sahadakṣiṇāḥd anyonyaspardhino rājan yajante guṇataḥ sadāa yasya traivārṣikaṃ bhaktaṃ paryāptaṃ bhṛtyavṛttayec adhikaṃ vāpi vidyeta sa somaṃ pātum arhatia yajñaś cet pratividdhaḥ syād aṅgenaikena yajvanaḥc brāhmaṇasya viśeṣeṇa dhārmike sati rājania yo vaiśyaḥ syād bahupaśur hīnakratur asomapaḥc kuṭumbāt tasya tad dravyaṃ yajñārthaṃ pārthivo hareta āhared veśmataḥ kiṃ cit kāmaṃ śūdrasya dravyataḥc na hi veśmani śūdrasya kaś cid asti parigrahaḥa yo nāhitāgniḥ śatagur ayajvā ca sahasraguḥc tayor api kuṭumbābhyām āhared avicārayana adātṛbhyo haren nityaṃ vyākhyāpya nṛpatiḥ prabhoc tathā hy ācarato dharmo nṛpateḥ syād athākhilaḥa tathaiva saptame bhakte bhaktāni ṣaḍ anaśnatāc aśvastanavidhānena hartavyaṃ hīnakarmaṇaḥe khalāt kṣetrāt tathāgārād yato vāpy upapadyatea ākhyātavyaṃ nṛpasyaitat pṛcchato pṛcchato pi vāc na tasmai dhārayed daṇḍaṃ rājā dharmeṇa dharmavita kṣatriyasya hi bāliśyād brāhmaṇaḥ kliśyate kṣudhāc śrutaśīle samājñāya vṛttim asya prakalpayete athainaṃ parirakṣeta pitā putram ivaurasama iṣṭiṃ vaiśvānarīṃ nityaṃ nirvaped abdaparyayec avikalpaḥ purādharmo dharmavādais tu kevalama viśvais tu devaiḥ sādhyaiś ca brāhmaṇaiś ca maharṣibhiḥc āpatsu maraṇād bhītair liṅgapratinidhiḥ kṛtaḥa prabhuḥ prathamakalpasya yo nukalpena vartatec na sāṃparāyikaṃ tasya durmater vidyate phalama na brāhmaṇān vedayeta kaś cid rājani mānavaḥc avīryo vedanād vidyāt suvīryo vīryavattarama tasmād rājñā sadā tejo duḥsahaṃ brahmavādināmc mantā śāstā vidhātā ca brāhmaṇo deva ucyatee tasmin nākuśalaṃ brūyān na śuktām īrayed girama kṣatriyo bāhuvīryeṇa taraty āpadam ātmanaḥc dhanena vaiśyaḥ śūdraś ca mantrair homaiś ca vai dvijaḥa na vai kanyā na yuvatir nāmantro na ca bāliśaḥc pariveṣṭāgnihotrasya bhaven nāsaṃskṛtas tathāe narake nipatanty ete juhvānāḥ sa ca yasya tatf tasmād vaitānakuśalo hotā syād vedapāragaḥa prājāpatyam adattvāśvam agnyādheyasya dakṣiṇāmc anāhitāgnir iti sa procyate dharmadarśibhiḥa puṇyāny anyāni kurvīta śraddadhāno jitendriyaḥc anāptadakṣiṇair yajñair na yajeta kathaṃ canaa prajāḥ paśūṃś ca svargaṃ ca hanti yajño hy adakṣiṇaḥc indriyāṇi yaśaḥ kīrtim āyuś cāsyopakṛntatia udakyā hy āsate ye ca ye ca ke cid anagnayaḥc kulaṃ cāśrotriyaṃ yeṣāṃ sarve te śūdradharmiṇaḥa udapānodake grāme brāhmaṇo vṛṣalīpatiḥc daṇḍo mahārāja strīṇāṃ bhartṛvyatikramec saṃvatsarābhiśastasya duṣṭasya dviguṇo bhaveta dve tasya trīṇi varṣāṇi catvāri sahasevinaḥc kucaraḥ pañca varṣāṇi cared bhaikṣaṃ munivrataḥa parivittiḥ parivettā yayā ca parividyatec pāṇigrāhaś ca dharmeṇa sarve te patitāḥ smṛtāḥa careyuḥ sarva evaite vīrahā yad vrataṃ caretc cāndrāyaṇaṃ caren māsaṃ kṛcchraṃ vā pāpaśuddhayea parivettā prayaccheta parivittāya tāṃ snuṣāmc jyeṣṭhena tv abhyanujñāto yavīyān pratyanantarame enaso mokṣam āpnoti sā ca tau caiva dharmataḥa amānuṣīṣu govarjam anāvṛṣṭir na duṣyatic adhiṣṭhātāram attāraṃ paśūnāṃ puruṣaṃ viduḥa paridhāyordhvavālaṃ tu pātram ādāya mṛnmayamc caret sapta gṛhān bhaikṣaṃ svakarma parikīrtayana tatraiva labdhabhojī syād dvādaśāhāt sa śudhyatic caret saṃvatsaraṃ cāpi tad vrataṃ yan nirākṛtia bhavet tu mānuṣeṣv evaṃ prāyaścittam anuttamamc dānaṃ vādānasakteṣu sarvam eva prakalpayete anāstikeṣu gomātraṃ prāṇam ekaṃ pracakṣatea śvavarāhamanuṣyāṇāṃ kukkuṭasya kharasya cac māṃsaṃ mūtrapurīṣaṃ ca prāśya saṃskāram arhatia brāhmaṇasya surāpasya gandham āghrāya somapaḥc apas tryahaṃ pibed uṣṇās tryaham uṣṇaṃ payaḥ pibete tryaham uṣṇaṃ ghṛtaṃ pītvā vāyubhakṣo bhavet tryahama evam etat samuddiṣṭaṃ prāyaścittaṃ sanātanamc brāhmaṇasya viśeṣeṇa tattvajñānena jāyate vaiśaṃpāyana uvācaa kathāntaram athāsādya khaḍgayuddhaviśāradaḥc nakulaḥ śaratalpastham idam āha pitāmahama dhanuḥ praharaṇaṃ śreṣṭham iti vādaḥ pitāmahac matas tu mama dharmajña khaḍga eva susaṃśitaḥa viśīrṇe kārmuke rājan prakṣīṇeṣu ca vājiṣuc khaḍgena śakyate yuddhe sādhv ātmā parirakṣituma śarāsanadharāṃś caiva gadāśaktidharāṃs tathāc ekaḥ khaḍgadharo vīraḥ samarthaḥ pratibādhituma atra me saṃśayaś caiva kautūhalam atīva cac kiṃ svit praharaṇaṃ śreṣṭhaṃ sarvayuddheṣu pārthivaa kathaṃ cotpāditaḥ khaḍgaḥ kasyārthāya ca kena vāc pūrvācāryaṃ ca khaḍgasya prabrūhi prapitāmahaa tasya tad vacanaṃ śrutvā mādrīputrasya dhīmataḥc sarvakauśalasaṃyuktaṃ sūkṣmacitrārthavac chubhama tatas tasyottaraṃ vākyaṃ svaravarṇopapāditamc śikṣānyāyopasaṃpannaṃ droṇaśiṣyāya pṛcchatea uvāca sarvadharmajño dhanurvedasya pāragaḥc śaratalpagato bhīṣmo nakulāya mahātmanea tattvaṃ śṛṇuṣva mādreya yad etat paripṛcchasic prabodhito smi bhavatā dhātumān iva parvataḥa salilaikārṇavaṃ tāta purā sarvam abhūd idamc niṣprakampam anākāśam anirdeśyamahītalama tamaḥsaṃvṛtam asparśam atigambhīradarśanamc niḥśabdaṃ cāprameyaṃ ca tatra jajñe pitāmahaḥd avyakteva guṇātīte karmavyāpāravarjited prādurbabhūva jalajaṃ tato jajñe pitāmahaḥa so sṛjad vāyum agniṃ ca bhāskaraṃ cāpi vīryavānc ākāśam asṛjac cordhvam adho bhūmiṃ ca nairṛtima nabhaḥ sacandratāraṃ ca nakṣatrāṇi grahāṃs tathāc saṃvatsarān ahorātrān ṛtūn atha lavān kṣaṇāna tataḥ śarīraṃ lokasthaṃ sthāpayitvā pitāmahaḥc janayām āsa bhagavān putrān uttamatejasaḥa marīcim ṛṣim atriṃ ca pulastyaṃ pulahaṃ kratumc vasiṣṭhāṅgirasau cobhau rudraṃ ca prabhum īśvarama prācetasas tathā dakṣaḥ kanyāḥ ṣaṣṭim ajījanatc tā vai brahmarṣayaḥ sarvāḥ prajārthaṃ pratipedirea tābhyo viśvāni bhūtāni devāḥ pitṛgaṇās tathāc gandharvāpsarasaś caiva rakṣāṃsi vividhāni caa patatrimṛgamīnāś ca plavaṃgāś ca mahoragāḥc nānākṛtibalāś cānye jalakṣitivicāriṇaḥa audbhidāḥ svedajāś caiva aṇḍajāś ca jarāyujāḥc jajñe tāta tathā sarvaṃ jagat sthāvarajaṅgamama bhūtasargam imaṃ kṛtvā sarvalokapitāmahaḥc śāśvataṃ vedapaṭhitaṃ dharmaṃ ca yuyuje punaḥa tasmin dharme sthitā devāḥ sahācāryapurohitāḥc ādityā vasavo rudrāḥ sasādhyā marudaśvinaḥa bhṛgvatryaṅgirasaḥ siddhāḥ kāśyapaś ca tapodhanaḥc vasiṣṭhagautamāgastyās tathā nāradaparvataua ṛṣayo vālakhilyāś ca prabhāsāḥ sikatās tathāc ghṛtācāḥ somavāyavyā vaikhānasamarīcipāḥa akṛṣṭāś caiva haṃsāś ca ṛṣayo thāgniyonijāḥc vānaprasthāḥ pṛśnayaś ca sthitā brahmānuśāsanea dānavendrās tv atikramya tat pitāmahaśāsanamc dharmasyāpacayaṃ cakruḥ krodhalobhasamanvitāḥa hiraṇyakaśipuś caiva hiraṇyākṣo virocanaḥc śambaro vipracittiś ca prahrādo namucir baliḥa ete cānye ca bahavaḥ sagaṇā daityadānavāḥc dharmasetum atikramya remire dharmaniścayāḥa sarve sma tulyajātīyā yathā devās tathā vayamc ity evaṃ hetum āsthāya spardhamānāḥ surarṣibhiḥa na priyaṃ nāpy anukrośaṃ cakrur bhūteṣu bhāratac trīn upāyān atikramya daṇḍena rurudhuḥ prajāḥe na jagmuḥ saṃvidaṃ taiś ca darpād asurasattamāḥa atha vai bhagavān brahmā brahmarṣibhir upasthitaḥc tadā himavataḥ pṛṣṭhe suramye padmatārakea śatayojanavistāre maṇimuktācayācitec tasmin girivare putra puṣpitadrumakānanee tasthau sa vibudhaśreṣṭho brahmā lokārthasiddhayea tato varṣasahasrānte vitānam akarot prabhuḥc vidhinā kalpadṛṣṭena yathoktenopapāditama ṛṣibhir yajñapaṭubhir yathāvat karmakartṛbhiḥc marudbhiḥ parisaṃstīrṇaṃ dīpyamānaiś ca pāvakaiḥa kāñcanair yajñabhāṇḍaiś ca bhrājiṣṇubhir alaṃkṛtamc vṛtaṃ devagaṇaiś caiva prababhau yajñamaṇḍalama tathā brahmarṣibhiś caiva sadasyair upaśobhitamc tatra ghoratamaṃ vṛttam ṛṣīṇāṃ me pariśrutama candramā vimalaṃ vyoma yathābhyuditatārakamc vidāryāgniṃ tathā bhūtam utthitaṃ śrūyate tataḥa nīlotpalasavarṇābhaṃ tīkṣṇadaṃṣṭraṃ kṛśodaramc prāṃśu durdarśanaṃ caivāpy atitejas tathaiva caa tasminn utpatamāne ca pracacāla vasuṃdharāc tatrormikalilāvartaś cukṣubhe ca mahārṇavaḥa petur ulkā mahotpātāḥ śākhāś ca mumucur drumāḥc aprasannā diśaḥ sarvāḥ pavanaś cāśivo vavaue muhur muhuś ca bhūtāni prāvyathanta bhayāt tathāa tataḥ sutumulaṃ dṛṣṭvā tad adbhutam upasthitamc maharṣisuragandharvān uvācedaṃ pitāmahaḥa mayaitac cintitaṃ bhūtam asir nāmaiṣa vīryavānc rakṣaṇārthāya lokasya vadhāya ca suradviṣāma tatas tad rūpam utsṛjya babhau nistriṃśa eva saḥc vimalas tīkṣṇadhāraś ca kālāntaka ivodyataḥa tatas taṃ śitikaṇṭhāya rudrāyarṣabhaketavec brahmā dadāv asiṃ dīptam adharmaprativāraṇama tataḥ sa bhagavān rudro brahmarṣigaṇasaṃstutaḥc pragṛhyāsim ameyātmā rūpam anyac cakāra haa caturbāhuḥ spṛśan mūrdhnā bhūsthito pi nabhastalamc ūrdhvadṛṣṭir mahāliṅgo mukhāj jvālāḥ samutsṛjane vikurvan bahudhā varṇān nīlapāṇḍuralohitāna bibhrat kṛṣṇājinaṃ vāso hemapravaratārakamc netraṃ caikaṃ lalāṭena bhāskarapratimaṃ mahate śuśubhāte ca vimale dve netre kṛṣṇapiṅgalea tato devo mahādevaḥ śūlapāṇir bhagākṣihāc saṃpragṛhya tu nistriṃśaṃ kālārkānalasaṃnibhama trikūṭaṃ carma codyamya savidyutam ivāmbudamc cacāra vividhān mārgān mahābalaparākramaḥe vidhunvann asim ākāśe dānavāntacikīrṣayāa tasya nādaṃ vinadato mahāhāsaṃ ca muñcataḥc babhau pratibhayaṃ rūpaṃ tadā rudrasya bhārataa tad rūpadhāriṇaṃ rudraṃ raudrakarma cikīrṣavaḥc niśamya dānavāḥ sarve hṛṣṭāḥ samabhidudruvuḥa aśmabhiś cāpy avarṣanta pradīptaiś ca tatholmukaiḥc ghoraiḥ praharaṇaiś cānyaiḥ śitadhārair ayomukhaiḥa tatas tad dānavānīkaṃ saṃpraṇetāram acyutamc rudrakhaḍgabaloddhūtaṃ pracacāla mumoha caa citraṃ śīghrataratvāc ca carantam asidhāriṇamc tam ekam asurāḥ sarve sahasram iti menirea chindan bhindan rujan kṛntan dārayan pramathann apic acarad daityasaṃgheṣu rudro gnir iva kakṣagaḥa asivegaprarugṇās te chinnabāhūruvakṣasaḥc saṃprakṛttottamāṅgāś ca petur urvyāṃ mahāsurāḥa apare dānavā bhagnā rudraghātāvapīḍitāḥc anyonyam abhinardanto diśaḥ saṃpratipedirea bhūmiṃ ke cit praviviśuḥ parvatān apare tathāc apare jagmur ākāśam apare mbhaḥ samāviśana tasmin mahati saṃvṛtte samare bhṛśadāruṇec babhau bhūmiḥ pratibhayā tadā rudhirakardamāa dānavānāṃ śarīraiś ca mahadbhiḥ śoṇitokṣitaiḥc samākīrṇā mahābāho śailair iva sakiṃśukaiḥa rudhireṇa pariklinnā prababhau vasudhā tadāc raktārdravasanā śyāmā nārīva madavihvalāa sa rudro dānavān hatvā kṛtvā dharmottaraṃ jagatc raudraṃ rūpaṃ vihāyāśu cakre rūpaṃ śivaṃ śivaḥa tato maharṣayaḥ sarve sarve devagaṇās tathāc jayenādbhutakalpena devadevam athārcayana tataḥ sa bhagavān rudro dānavakṣatajokṣitamc asiṃ dharmasya goptāraṃ dadau satkṛtya viṣṇavea viṣṇur marīcaye prādān marīcir bhagavāṃś ca tamc maharṣibhyo dadau khaḍgam ṛṣayo vāsavāya tua mahendro lokapālebhyo lokapālās tu putrakac manave sūryaputrāya daduḥ khaḍgaṃ suvistarama ūcuś cainaṃ tathaivādyaṃ mānuṣāṇāṃ tvam īśvaraḥc asinā dharmagarbheṇa pālayasva prajā itia dharmasetum atikrāntāḥ sūkṣmasthūlārthakāraṇātc vibhajya daṇḍaṃ rakṣyāḥ syur dharmato na yadṛcchayāa durvācā nigraho daṇḍo hiraṇyabahulas tathāc vyaṅganaṃ ca śarīrasya vadho vānalpakāraṇāta aser etāni rūpāṇi durvācādīni nirdiśetc aser eva pramāṇāni parimāṇavyatikramāta adhisṛjyātha putraṃ svaṃ prajānām adhipaṃ tataḥc manuḥ prajānāṃ rakṣārthaṃ kṣupāya pradadāv asima kṣupāj jagrāha cekṣvākur ikṣvākoś ca purūravāḥc āyuś ca tasmāl lebhe taṃ nahuṣaś ca tato bhuvia yayātir nahuṣāc cāpi pūrus tasmāc ca labdhavānc āmūrtarayasas tasmāt tato bhūmiśayo nṛpaḥc   gayāya pratyapādayatc gayāc ca labdhavān rājāa bharataś cāpi dauḥṣantir lebhe bhūmiśayād asimc tasmāc ca lebhe dharmajño rājann aiḍabiḍas tathāa tataś caiḍabiḍāl lebhe dhundhumāro janeśvaraḥc dhundhumārāc ca kāmbojo mucukundas tato labhata mucukundān maruttaś ca maruttād api raivataḥc raivatād yuvanāśvaś ca yuvanāśvāt tato raghuḥa ikṣvākuvaṃśajas tasmād dhariṇāśvaḥ pratāpavānc hariṇāśvād asiṃ lebhe śunakaḥ śunakād apia uśīnaro vai dharmātmā tasmād bhojāḥ sayādavāḥc yadubhyaś ca śibir lebhe śibeś cāpi pratardanaḥa pratardanād aṣṭakaś ca ruśadaśvo ṣṭakād apic ruśadaśvād bharadvājo droṇas tasmāt kṛpas tataḥe tatas tvaṃ bhrātṛbhiḥ sārdhaṃ paramāsim avāptavāna kṛttikāś cāsya nakṣatram aser agniś ca daivatamc rohiṇyo gotram asyātha rudraś ca gurur uttamaḥa aser aṣṭau ca nāmāni rahasyāni nibodha mec pāṇḍaveya sadā yāni kīrtayaṃl labhate jayama asir viśasanaḥ khaḍgas tīkṣṇavartmā durāsadaḥc śrīgarbho vijayaś caiva dharmapālas tathaiva caa agryaḥ praharaṇānāṃ ca khaḍgo mādravatīsutac maheśvarapraṇītaś ca purāṇe niścayaṃ gataḥd etāni caiva nāmāni purāṇe niścitāni vaia pṛthus tūtpādayām āsa dhanur ādyam ariṃdamab teneyaṃ pṛthivī dugdhā sasyāni subahūny apib dharmeṇa ca yathā pūrvaṃc teneyaṃ pṛthivī pūrvaṃ vainyena parirakṣitāa tad etad ārṣaṃ mādreya pramāṇaṃ kartum arhasic aseś ca pūjā kartavyā sadā yuddhaviśāradaiḥa ity eṣa prathamaḥ kalpo vyākhyātas te suvistaraḥc aser utpattisaṃsargo yathāvad bharatarṣabhaa sarvathaitad iha śrutvā khaḍgasādhanam uttamamc labhate puruṣaḥ kīrtiṃ pretya cānantyam aśnute vaiśaṃpāyana uvācaa ity uktavati bhīṣme tu tūṣṇīṃbhūte yudhiṣṭhiraḥc papracchāvasaraṃ gatvā bhrātṝn vidurapañcamāna dharme cārthe ca kāme ca lokavṛttiḥ samāhitāc teṣāṃ garīyān katamo madhyamaḥ ko laghuś ca kaḥa kasmiṃś cātmā niyantavyas trivargavijayāya vaic saṃtuṣṭā naiṣṭhikaṃ vākyaṃ yathāvad vaktum arhathaa tato rthagatitattvajñaḥ prathamaṃ pratibhānavānc jagāda viduro vākyaṃ dharmaśāstram anusmarana bāhuśrutyaṃ tapas tyāgaḥ śraddhā yajñakriyā kṣamāc bhāvaśuddhir dayā satyaṃ saṃyamaś cātmasaṃpadaḥa etad evābhipadyasva mā te bhūc calitaṃ manaḥc etan mūlau hi dharmārthāv etad ekapadaṃ hitama dharmeṇaivarṣayas tīrṇā dharme lokāḥ pratiṣṭhitāḥc dharmeṇa devā divigā dharme cārthaḥ samāhitaḥa dharmo rājan guṇaśreṣṭho madhyamo hy artha ucyatec kāmo yavīyān iti ca pravadanti manīṣiṇaḥe tasmād dharmapradhānena bhavitavyaṃ yatātmanāf tathā ca sarvabhūteṣu vartitavyaṃ yathātmania samāptavacane tasminn arthaśāstraviśāradaḥc pārtho vākyārthatattvajño jagau vākyam atandritaḥa karmabhūmir iyaṃ rājann iha vārttā praśasyatec kṛṣivāṇijyagorakṣyaṃ śilpāni vividhāni caa artha ity eva sarveṣāṃ karmaṇām avyatikramaḥc na ṛte rthena vartete dharmakāmāv iti śrutiḥa vijayī hy arthavān dharmam ārādhayitum uttamamc kāmaṃ ca carituṃ śakto duṣprāpam akṛtātmabhiḥa arthasyāvayavāv etau dharmakāmāv iti śrutiḥc arthasiddhyā hi nirvṛttāv ubhāv etau bhaviṣyataḥa udbhūtārthaṃ hi puruṣaṃ viśiṣṭatarayonayaḥc brahmāṇam iva bhūtāni satataṃ paryupāsatea jaṭājinadharā dāntāḥ paṅkadigdhā jitendriyāḥc muṇḍā nistantavaś cāpi vasanty arthārthinaḥ pṛthaka kāṣāyavasanāś cānye śmaśrulā hrīsusaṃvṛtāḥc vidvāṃsaś caiva śāntāś ca muktāḥ sarvaparigrahaiḥd arthārthinaḥ santi nityaṃ paritapyanti karmabhiḥa arthārthinaḥ santi ke cid apare svargakāṅkṣiṇaḥc kulapratyāgamāś caike svaṃ svaṃ mārgam anuṣṭhitāḥa āstikā nāstikāś caiva niyatāḥ saṃyame parec aprajñānaṃ tamobhūtaṃ prajñānaṃ tu prakāśatāa bhṛtyān bhogair dviṣo daṇḍair yo yojayati so rthavānc etan matimatāṃ śreṣṭha mataṃ mama yathātathame anayos tu nibodha tvaṃ vacanaṃ vākyakaṇṭhayoḥa tato dharmārthakuśalau mādrīputrāv anantaramc nakulaḥ sahadevaś ca vākyaṃ jagadatuḥ parama āsīnaś ca śayānaś ca vicarann api ca sthitaḥc arthayogaṃ dṛḍhaṃ kuryād yogair uccāvacair apia asmiṃs tu vai susaṃvṛtte durlabhe paramapriyec iha kāmān avāpnoti pratyakṣaṃ nātra saṃśayaḥa yo rtho dharmeṇa saṃyukto dharmo yaś cārthasaṃyutaḥc madhv ivāmṛtasaṃyuktaṃ tasmād etau matāv ihaa anarthasya na kāmo sti tathārtho dharmiṇaḥ kutaḥc tasmād udvijate loko dharmārthād yo bahiṣkṛtaḥa tasmād dharmapradhānena sādhyo rthaḥ saṃyatātmanāc viśvasteṣu ca bhūteṣu kalpate sarva eva hia dharmaṃ samācaret pūrvaṃ tathārthaṃ dharmasaṃyutamc tataḥ kāmaṃ caret paścāt siddhārthasya hi tat phalama virematus tu tad vākyam uktvā tāv aśvinoḥ sutauc bhīmasenas tadā vākyam idaṃ vaktuṃ pracakramea nākāmaḥ kāmayaty arthaṃ nākāmo dharmam icchatic nākāmaḥ kāmayāno sti tasmāt kāmo viśiṣyatea kāmena yuktā ṛṣayas tapasy eva samāhitāḥc palāśaphalamūlāśā vāyubhakṣāḥ susaṃyatāḥa vedopavādeṣv apare yuktāḥ svādhyāyapāragāḥc śrāddhayajñakriyāyāṃ ca tathā dānapratigrahea vaṇijaḥ karṣakā gopāḥ kāravaḥ śilpinas tathāc daivakarmakṛtaś caiva yuktāḥ kāmena karmasua samudraṃ cāviśanty anye narāḥ kāmena saṃyutāḥc kāmo hi vividhākāraḥ sarvaṃ kāmena saṃtatama nāsti nāsīn nābhaviṣyad bhūtaṃ kāmātmakāt paramc etat sāraṃ mahārāja dharmārthāv atra saṃśritaua navanītaṃ yathā dadhnas tathā kāmo rthadharmataḥc śreyas tailaṃ ca piṇyākād dhṛtaṃ śreya udaśvitaḥa śreyaḥ puṣpaphalaṃ kāṣṭhāt kāmo dharmārthayor varaḥc puṣpato madhv iva rasaḥ kāmāt saṃjāyate sukhamd kāmo dharmārthayor yoniḥ kāmaś cātha tadātmakaḥd nākāmato brāhmaṇāḥ svannam arthānd nākāmato dadati brāhmaṇebhyaḥd nākāmato vividhā lokaceṣṭād tasmāt kāmaḥ prāk trivargasya dṛṣṭaḥa sucāruveṣābhir alaṃkṛtābhirmadotkaṭābhiḥ priyavādinībhiḥc ramasva yoṣābhir upetya kāmaṃkāmo hi rājaṃs tarasābhipātīa buddhir mamaiṣā pariṣat sthitasyamā bhūd vicāras tava dharmaputrac syāt saṃhitaṃ sadbhir aphalgusāraṃsametya vākyaṃ param ānṛśaṃsyama dharmārthakāmāḥ samam eva sevyāyas tv ekasevī sa naro jaghanyaḥb trayos tu nityaṃ tv aviśeṣito hic dvayos tu dakṣaṃ pravadanti madhyaṃsa uttamo yo niratas trivarged vibhajya kālaṃ parisevyamānaḥa prājñaḥ suhṛc candanasāraliptovicitramālyābharaṇair upetaḥc tato vacaḥ saṃgrahavigraheṇaproktvā yavīyān virarāma bhīmaḥa tato muhūrtād atha dharmarājovākyāni teṣām anucintya samyakc uvāca vācāvitathaṃ smayan vaibahuśruto dharmabhṛtāṃ variṣṭhaḥa niḥsaṃśayaṃ niścitadharmaśāstrāḥsarve bhavanto viditapramāṇāḥc vijñātukāmasya mameha vākyamuktaṃ yad vai naiṣṭhikaṃ tac chrutaṃ mee iha tv avaśyaṃ gadato mamāpivākyaṃ nibodhadhvam ananyabhāvāḥa yo vai na pāpe nirato na puṇyenārthe na dharme manujo na kāmec vimuktadoṣaḥ samaloṣṭakāñcanaḥsa mucyate duḥkhasukhārthasiddheḥa bhūtāni jātīmaraṇānvitānijarāvikāraiś ca samanvitānic bhūyaś ca tais taiḥ pratibodhitānimokṣaṃ praśaṃsanti na taṃ ca vidmaḥa snehe nabaddhasya na santi tānītyevaṃ svayaṃbhūr bhagavān uvācac budhāś ca nirvāṇaparā vadantitasmān na kuryāt priyam apriyaṃ caa etat pradhānaṃ na tu kāmakāroyathā niyukto smi tathā carāmic bhūtāni sarvāṇi vidhir niyuṅktevidhir balīyān iti vitta sarvea na karmaṇāpnoty anavāpyam arthaṃyad bhāvi sarvaṃ bhavatīti vittac trivargahīno pi hi vindate rthaṃtasmād idaṃ lokahitāya guhyamd uktaṃ hi karmaiva phalasya hetuḥa tatas tad agryaṃ vacanaṃ manonugaṃsamastam ājñāya tato tihetumatc tadā praṇeduś ca jaharṣire ca tekurupravīrāya ca cakrur añjalīna sucāruvarṇākṣaraśabdabhūṣitāṃmanonugāṃ nirdhutavākyakaṇṭakāmc niśamya tāṃ pārthiva pārthabhāṣitāṃgiraṃ narendrāḥ praśaśaṃsur eva ted sa cāpi tān dharmasuto mahāmanāsd tadā pratītān praśaśaṃsa vīryavāne punaś ca papraccha saridvarāsutaṃtataḥ paraṃ dharmam ahīnasattvaḥe dharmārthakāmeṣu viniścayajñamf yudhiṣṭhiraḥ kauravavaṃśagoptā yudhiṣṭhira uvācaa pitāmaha mahāprājña kurūṇāṃ kīrtivardhanac praśnaṃ kaṃ cit pravakṣyāmi tan me vyākhyātum arhasia kīdṛśā mānavāḥ saumyāḥ kaiḥ prītiḥ paramā bhavetc āyatyāṃ ca tadātve ca ke kṣamās tān vadasva mea na hi tatra dhanaṃ sphītaṃ na ca saṃbandhibāndhavāḥc tiṣṭhanti yatra suhṛdas tiṣṭhantīti matir mamaa durlabho hi suhṛc chrotā durlabhaś ca hitaḥ suhṛtc etad dharmabhṛtāṃ śreṣṭha sarvaṃ vyākhyātum arhasi bhīṣma uvācaa saṃdheyān puruṣān rājann asaṃdheyāṃś ca tattvataḥc vadato me nibodha tvaṃ nikhilena yudhiṣṭhiraa lubdhaḥ krūras tyaktadharmā nikṛtaḥ śaṭha eva cac kṣudraḥ pāpasamācāraḥ sarvaśaṅkī tathālasaḥa dīrghasūtro nṛjuḥ kaṣṭo gurudārapradharṣakaḥc vyasane yaḥ parityāgī durātmā nirapatrapaḥa sarvataḥ pāpadarśī ca nāstiko vedanindakaḥc saṃprakīrṇendriyo loke yaḥ kāmanirataś careta asatyo lokavidviṣṭaḥ samaye cānavasthitaḥc piśuno thākṛtaprajño matsarī pāpaniścayaḥa duḥśīlo thākṛtātmā ca nṛśaṃsaḥ kitavas tathāc mitrair arthakṛtī nityam icchaty arthaparaś ca yaḥa vahataś ca yathāśakti yo na tuṣyati mandadhīḥc amitram iva yo bhuṅkte sadā mitraṃ nararṣabhaa asthānakrodhano yaś ca akasmāc ca virajyatec suhṛdaś caiva kalyāṇān āśu tyajati kilbiṣīa alpe py apakṛte mūḍhas tathājñānāt kṛte pi cac kāryopasevī mitreṣu mitradveṣī narādhipaa śatrur mitramukho yaś ca jihmaprekṣī vilobhanaḥc na rajyati ca kalyāṇe yas tyajet tādṛśaṃ narama pānapo dveṣaṇaḥ krūro nirghṛṇaḥ paruṣas tathāc paropatāpī mitradhruk tathā prāṇivadhe rataḥa kṛtaghnaś cādhamo loke na saṃdheyaḥ kathaṃ canac chidrānveṣī na saṃdheyaḥ saṃdheyān api me śṛṇua kulīnā vākyasaṃpannā jñānavijñānakovidāḥc mitrajñāś ca kṛtajñāś ca sarvajñāḥ śokavarjitāḥa mādhuryaguṇasaṃpannāḥ satyasaṃdhā jitendriyāḥc vyāyāmaśīlāḥ satataṃ bhṛtaputrāḥ kulodgatāḥa rūpavanto cintayām āsa rātrau tasya samīpataḥa sa bhuktavān suviśrānto gautamo cintayat tadāc hāṭakasyābhirūpasya bhāro yaṃ sumahān mayāe gṛhīto lobhamohād vai dūraṃ ca gamanaṃ mamaa na cāsti pathi bhoktavyaṃ māṃsarāśiḥ sthito mamac imaṃ hatvā gṛhītvā ca yāsye haṃ samabhidrutam bhīṣma uvācaa atha tatra mahārciṣmān analo vātasārathiḥc tasyāvidūre rakṣārthaṃ khagendreṇa kṛto bhavata sa cāpi pārśve suṣvāpa viśvasto bakarāṭ tadāc kṛtaghnas tu sa duṣṭātmā taṃ jighāṃsur ajāgarata tato lātena dīptena viśvastaṃ nijaghāna tamc nihatya ca mudā yuktaḥ so nubandhaṃ na dṛṣṭavāna sa taṃ vipakṣaromāṇaṃ kṛtvāgnāv apacat tadāb pakvānnaṃ bhakṣayitvā ca kṛtaghnaḥ pāpapūruṣaḥb jagāma tvarayā rājan svagṛhaṃ kṛtakṛtyavatc taṃ gṛhītvā suvarṇaṃ ca yayau drutataraṃ dvijaḥd tato dākṣāyaṇīputraṃ nāgataṃ taṃ tu bhāratad virūpākṣaś cintayan vai hṛdayena vidūyatāa tato nyasmin gate cāhni virūpākṣo bravīt sutamc na prekṣe rājadharmāṇam adya putra khagottamama sa pūrvasaṃdhyāṃ brahmāṇaṃ vandituṃ yāti sarvadāb aparāṃ caiva māṃ draṣṭum āyāti sa vihaṃgarāṭc māṃ cādṛṣṭvā kadā cit sa na gacchati gṛhān khagaḥa ubhe dvirātraṃ saṃdhye vai nābhyagāt sa mamālayamc tasmān na śudhyate bhāvo mama sa jñāyatāṃ suhṛta svādhyāyena viyukto hi brahmavarcasavarjitaḥc taṃ gatas tatra me śaṅkā hanyāt taṃ sa dvijādhamaḥa durācāras tu durbuddhir iṅgitair lakṣito mayāc niṣkriyo dāruṇākāraḥ kṛṣṇo dasyur ivādhamaḥa gautamaḥ kaṅkālaṃ rājadharmaṇaḥa sa rudann agamat putro rākṣasendrasya dhīmataḥc tvaramāṇaḥ paraṃ śaktyā gautamagrahaṇāya vaia tato vidūre jagṛhur gautamaṃ rākṣasās tadāc rājadharmaśarīraṃ ca pakṣāsthicaraṇojjhitama tam ādāyātha rakṣāṃsi drutaṃ meruvrajaṃ yayuḥc rājñaś ca darśayām āsuḥ śarīraṃ rājadharmaṇaḥe kṛtaghnaṃ puruṣaṃ taṃ ca gautamaṃ pāpacetasama ruroda rājā taṃ dṛṣṭvā sāmātyaḥ sapurohitaḥc ārtanādaś ca sumahān abhūt tasya niveśanea sastrīkumāraṃ ca puraṃ babhūvāsvasthamānasamc athābravīn nṛpaḥ putraṃ pāpo yaṃ vadhyatām itia asya māṃsair ime sarve viharantu yatheṣṭataḥc pāpācāraḥ pāpakarmā pāpātmā pāpaniścayaḥe hantavyo yaṃ mama matir bhavadbhir iti rākṣasāḥa ity uktā rākṣasendreṇa rākṣasā ghoravikramāḥc naicchanta taṃ bhakṣayituṃ pāpakarmāyam ity utaa dasyūnāṃ dīyatām eṣa sādhv adya puruṣādhamaḥc ity ūcus taṃ mahārāja rākṣasendraṃ niśācarāḥa śirobhiś ca gatā bhūmim ūcū rakṣogaṇādhipamc na dātum arhasi tvaṃ no bhakṣaṇāyāsya kilbiṣama evam astv iti tān āha rākṣasendro niśācarānc dasyūnāṃ dīyatām eṣa kṛtaghno dyaiva rākṣasāḥa ity ukte tasya te dāsāḥ śūlamudgarapāṇayaḥc chittvā taṃ khaṇḍaśaḥ pāpaṃ dasyubhyaḥ pradadus tadāa dasyavaś cāpi naicchanta tam attuṃ pāpakāriṇamc kravyādā api rājendra kṛtaghnaṃ nopabhuñjatea brahmaghne ca surāpe ca core bhagnavrate tathāc niṣkṛtir vihitā rājan kṛtaghne nāsti niṣkṛtiḥa mitradrohī nṛśaṃsaś ca kṛtaghnaś ca narādhamaḥc kravyādaiḥ kṛmibhiś cānyair na bhujyante hi tādṛśāḥd nyagrodhe rājadharmāṇam apaśyan nihataṃ tataḥd ruditvā bahu tat tad vai vilapya ca sa rākṣasaḥd gato roṣasamāviṣṭo gautamagrahaṇāya vaid gṛhīto gautamaḥ pāpo rakṣobhiḥ krodhamūrchitaiḥd rājadharmaśarīrasya kaṅkālaṃ cāpy atho dhṛtamd merupṛṣṭhe ca nagaraṃ yātudhānās tato gatāḥd krodharaktekṣaṇā ghorā gautamasya vadhe dhṛtāḥd pārthivasyāgrato nyastaḥ kaṅkālo rājadharmaṇaḥd taṃ dṛṣṭvā vimanā rājā sāmātyaḥ sagaṇo bhavatd ārtanādo mahān āsīd gṛhe tasya mahātmanaḥd strīsaṃghasya tadā rājan nihate kāśyapātmajed rākṣasā ūcuḥd rājā caivābravīt putraṃ pāpo yaṃ vadhyatām itid asya māṃsaṃ vayaṃ sarve khādiṣyāmaḥ samāgatāḥd pāpakṛt pāpakarmā ca pāpātmā pāpam āsthitaḥd virūpākṣa uvācad hantavya eva pāpātmā kṛtaghno nātra saṃśayaḥd kṛtaghnaṃ pāpakarmāṇaṃ na bhakṣayitum utsahed dāsebhyo dīyatām eṣa mitradhruk puruṣādhamaḥd bhīṣma uvācad dāsāḥ sarve samāhūtā yātudhānās tathāpared necchanti sma kṛtaghnaṃ taṃ khādituṃ puruṣottamad śirobhiś ca gatā bhūmiṃ mahārāja tato balātd mā nārthaṃ jātanirbandhaṃ kilbiṣaṃ dātum arhasid yātudhānā nṛpeṇoktāḥ pāpakarmā viśasyatāmd bhakṣyatāṃ tyajyatāṃ vāyaṃ darśanān me panīyatāmd tatas te ruṣitā dāsāḥ śūlapaṭṭasapāṇayaḥd khaṇḍaśo vikṛtaṃ hatvā kravyādbhyo hy adadus tadād kravyādās tv api rājendra necchanti piśitāśanāḥd mṛtān api hi kravyādāḥ kṛtaghnān nopabhuñjated brahmasvaharaṇe core brahmaghne gurutalpaged niṣkṛtir vihitā sadbhiḥ kṛtaghne nāsti niṣkṛtiḥd mitradruhaṃ kṛtaghnaṃ ca nṛśaṃsaṃ ca narādhamamd kravyādāḥ krimayaś caiva nopabhuñjanti vai sadā bhīṣma uvācaa tataś citāṃ bakapateḥ kārayām āsa rākṣasaḥc ratnair gandhaiś ca bahubhir vastraiś ca samalaṃkṛtāma tatra prajvālya nṛpate bakarājaṃ pratāpavānc pretakāryāṇi vidhivad rākṣasendraś cakāra haa saṃjīvitas tena bakarājas tadānaghac utpatya ca sameyāya virūpākṣaṃ bakādhipaḥa tato bhyayād devarājo virūpākṣapuraṃ tadāc prāha cedaṃ virūpākṣaṃ diṣṭyāyaṃ jīvatīty utaa śrāvayām āsa cendras taṃ virūpākṣaṃ purātanamc yathā śāpaḥ purā datto brahmaṇā rājadharmaṇaḥa yadā bakapatī rājan brahmāṇaṃ nopasarpatic tato roṣād idaṃ prāha bakendrāya pitāmahaḥa yasmān mūḍho mama sado nāgato sau bakādhamaḥc tasmād vadhaṃ sa duṣṭātmā nacirāt samavāpsyatia tadāyaṃ tasya vacanān nihato gautamena vaic tenaivāmṛtasiktaś ca punaḥ saṃjīvito bakaḥa rājadharmā tataḥ prāha praṇipatya puraṃdaramc yadi guṇānvitaḥc sarvān kāmāñ jugupseta saṅgān kurvīta pṛṣṭhataḥe vṛtta eṣa hṛdi prauḍho mṛtyur eṣa manomayaḥf krodho nāma śarīrastho dehināṃ procyate budhaiḥa yadā saṃharate kāmān kūrmo ṅgānīva sarvaśaḥc tadātmajyotir ātmā ca ātmany eva prasīdatia kiṃ cid eva mamatvena yadā bhavati kalpitamc tad eva paritāpārthaṃ sarvaṃ saṃpadyate tadāa na bibheti yadā cāyaṃ yadā cāsmān na bibhyatic yadā necchati na dveṣṭi brahma saṃpadyate tadāa ubhe satyānṛte tyaktvā śokānandau bhayābhayec priyāpriye parityajya praśāntātmā bhaviṣyasia yadā na kurute dhīraḥ sarvabhūteṣu pāpakamc karmaṇā manasā vācā brahma saṃpadyate tadāa yā dustyajā durmatibhir yā na jīryati jīryataḥc yo sau prāṇāntiko rogas tāṃ tṛṣṇāṃ tyajataḥ sukhama atra piṅgalayā gītā gāthāḥ śrūyanti pārthivac yathā sā kṛcchrakāle pi lebhe dharmaṃ sanātanama saṃkete piṅgalā veśyā kāntenāsīd vinākṛtāc atha kṛcchragatā śāntāṃ buddhim āsthāpayat tadā piṅgalovācaa unmattāham anunmattaṃ kāntam anvavasaṃ ciramc antike ramaṇaṃ santaṃ nainam adhyagamaṃ purāa ekasthūṇaṃ navadvāram apidhāsyāmy agārakamc kā hi kāntam ihāyāntam ayaṃ kānteti maṃsyatea akāmāḥ kāmarūpeṇa dhūrtā narakarūpiṇaḥc na punar vañcayiṣyanti pratibuddhāsmi jāgṛmia anartho pi bhavaty artho daivāt pūrvakṛtena vāc saṃbuddhāhaṃ nirākārā nāham adyājitendriyāa sukhaṃ nirāśaḥ svapiti nairāśyaṃ paramaṃ sukhamc āśām anāśāṃ kṛtvā hi sukhaṃ svapiti piṅgalā bhīṣma uvācaa etaiś cānyaiś ca viprasya hetumadbhiḥ prabhāṣitaiḥc paryavasthāpito rājā senajin mumude sukham yudhiṣṭhira uvācaa atikrāmati kāle smin sarvabhūtakṣayāvahec kiṃ śreyaḥ pratipadyeta tan me brūhi pitāmaha bhīṣma uvācaa atrāpy udāharantīmam itihāsaṃ purātanamc pituḥ putreṇa saṃvādaṃ tan nibodha yudhiṣṭhiraa dvijāteḥ kasya cit pārtha svādhyāyaniratasya vaic babhūva putro medhāvī medhāvī nāma nāmataḥa so bravīt pitaraṃ putraḥ svādhyāyakaraṇe ratamc mokṣadharmārthakuśalo lokatattvavicakṣaṇaḥa dhīraḥ kiṃ svit tāta kuryāt prajānankṣipraṃ hy āyur bhraśyate mānavānāmc pitas tad ācakṣva yathārthayogaṃmamānupūrvyā yena dharmaṃ careyam pitovācaa vedān adhītya brahmacaryeṇa putraputrān icchet pāvanārthaṃ pitṝṇāmc agnīn ādhāya vidhivac ceṣṭayajñovanaṃ praviśyātha munir bubhūṣet putra uvācaa evam abhyāhate loke samantāt parivāritec amoghāsu patantīṣu kiṃ dhīra iva bhāṣase pitovācaa katham abhyāhato lokaḥ kena vā parivāritaḥc amoghāḥ kāḥ patantīha kiṃ nu bhīṣayasīva mām putra uvācaa mṛtyunābhyāhato loko jarayā parivāritaḥc ahorātrāḥ patanty ete nanu kasmān na budhyased amoghā rātrayaś cāpi nityam āyānti yānti caa yadāham etaj jānāmi na mṛtyus tiṣṭhatīti hac so haṃ kathaṃ pratīkṣiṣye jālenāpihitaś carana rātryāṃ rātryāṃ vyatītāyām āyur alpataraṃ yadāc gādhodake matsya iva sukhaṃ vindeta kas tadād yām eva rātriṃ prathamāṃ garbho bhajati mātaramd tām eva rātriṃ prasthāti maraṇāya nivartakaḥd yasyāṃ rātryāṃ vyatītāyāṃ na kiṃ cic chubham ācarete tad eva vandhyaṃ divasam iti vidyād vicakṣaṇaḥa anavāpteṣu kāmeṣu mṛtyur abhyeti mānavamc śaṣpāṇīva vicinvantam anyatragatamānasame vṛkīvoraṇam āsādya mṛtyur ādāya gacchatia adyaiva kuru yac chreyo mā tvā kālo tyagād ayamc akṛteṣv eva kāryeṣu mṛtyur vai saṃprakarṣatia śvaḥkāryam adya kurvīta pūrvāhṇe cāparāhṇikamc na hi pratīkṣate mṛtyuḥ kṛtaṃ vāsya na vā kṛtamd niyato dehināṃ mṛtyur animittaṃ hi jīvitame ko hi jānāti kasyādya mṛtyusenā nivekṣyatef na mṛtyur āmantrayate hartukāmo jagatprabhuḥf abuddha evākramate mīnān mīnagraho yathāa yuvaiva dharmaśīlaḥ syād animittaṃ hi jīvitamc kṛte dharme bhavet kīrtir iha pretya ca vai sukhama mohena hi samāviṣṭaḥ putradārārtham udyataḥc kṛtvā kāryam akāryaṃ vā puṣṭim eṣāṃ prayacchatia taṃ putrapaśusaṃmattaṃ vyāsaktamanasaṃ naramc suptaṃ vyāghraṃ mahaugho vā mṛtyur ādāya gacchatia saṃcinvānakam evaikaṃ kāmānām avitṛptakamc vyāghraḥ paśum ivādāya mṛtyur ādāya gacchatia idaṃ kṛtam idaṃ kāryam idam anyat kṛtākṛtamc evam īhāsukhāsaktaṃ kṛtāntaḥ kurute vaśea kṛtānāṃ phalam aprāptaṃ karmaṇāṃ phalasaṅginamc kṣetrāpaṇagṛhāsaktaṃ mṛtyur ādāya gacchatid durbalaṃ balavantaṃ ca śūraṃ bhīruṃ jaḍaṃ kavimd aprāptasarvakāmārthaṃ mṛtyur ādāya gacchatid idaṃ me syād idaṃ me syād ity evaṃmanaso narānd anavāpteṣu kāmeṣu kṛtāntaḥ kurute vaśea mṛtyur jarā ca vyādhiś ca duḥkhaṃ cānekakāraṇamc anuṣaktaṃ yadā dehe kiṃ svastha iva tiṣṭhasia jātam evāntako ntāya jarā cānveti dehinamc anuṣaktā dvayenaite bhāvāḥ sthāvarajaṅgamāḥa mṛtyor vā gṛham evaitad yā grāme vasato ratiḥc devānām eṣa vai goṣṭho yad araṇyam iti śrutiḥa nibandhanī rajjur eṣā yā grāme vasato ratiḥc chittvaināṃ sukṛto yānti naināṃ chindanti duṣkṛtaḥa na hiṃsayati yaḥ prāṇān manovākkāyahetubhiḥc jīvitārthāpanayanaiḥ karmabhir na sa badhyatea na mṛtyusenām āyāntīṃ jātu kaś cit prabādhatec ṛte satyam asaṃtyājyaṃ satye hy amṛtam āśritama tasmāt satyavratācāraḥ satyayogaparāyaṇaḥc satyārāmaḥ samo dāntaḥ satyenaivāntakaṃ jayeta amṛtaṃ caiva mṛtyuś ca dvayaṃ dehe pratiṣṭhitamc mṛtyum āpadyate mohāt satyenāpadyate mṛtama so haṃ hy ahiṃsraḥ satyārthī kāmakrodhabahiṣkṛtaḥc samaduḥkhasukhaḥ kṣemī mṛtyuṃ hāsyāmy amartyavata śāntiyajñarato dānto brahmayajñe sthito muniḥc vāṅmanaḥkarmayajñaś ca bhaviṣyāmy udagāyanea paśuyajñaiḥ kathaṃ hiṃsrair mādṛśo yaṣṭum arhatic antavadbhir uta prājñaḥ kṣatrayajñaiḥ piśācavata yasya vāṅmanasī syātāṃ samyak praṇihite sadāc tapas tyāgaś ca yogaś ca sa vai sarvam avāpnuyāta nāsti vidyāsamaṃ cakṣur nāsti vidyāsamaṃ balamc nāsti rāgasamaṃ duḥkhaṃ nāsti tyāgasamaṃ sukhama ātmany evātmanā jāta ātmaniṣṭho prajo pi vāc ātmany eva bhaviṣyāmi na māṃ tārayati prajāa naitādṛśaṃ brāhmaṇasyāsti vittaṃyathaikatā samatā satyatā cac śīle sthitir daṇḍanidhānam ārjavaṃtatas tataś coparamaḥ kriyābhyaḥa kiṃ te dhanair bāndhavair vāpi kiṃ tekiṃ te dārair brāhmaṇa yo mariṣyasic ātmānam anviccha guhāṃ praviṣṭaṃpitāmahas te kva gataḥ pitā ca bhīṣma uvācaa putrasyaitad vacaḥ śrutvā tathākārṣīt pitā nṛpac tathā tvam api vartasva satyadharmaparāyaṇaḥ yudhiṣṭhira uvācaa dhanino vādhanā ye ca vartayanti svatantriṇaḥc sukhaduḥkhāgamas teṣāṃ kaḥ kathaṃ vā pitāmaha bhīṣma uvācaa atrāpy udāharantīmam itihāsaṃ purātanamc śamyākena vimuktena gītaṃ śāntigatena haa abravīn māṃ purā kaś cid brāhmaṇas tyāgam āsthitaḥc kliśyamānaḥ kudāreṇa kucailena bubhukṣayāa utpannam iha loke vai janmaprabhṛti mānavamc vividhāny upavartante duḥkhāni ca sukhāni caa tayor ekatare mārge yady enam abhisaṃnayetc na sukhaṃ prāpya saṃhṛṣyen na duḥkhaṃ prāpya saṃjvareta na vai carasi yac chreya ātmano vā yad īhasec akāmātmāpi hi sadā dhuram udyamya caiva hia akiṃcanaḥ paripatan sukham āsvādayiṣyasic akiṃcanaḥ sukhaṃ śete samuttiṣṭhati caiva hia ākiṃcanyaṃ sukhaṃ loke pathyaṃ śivam anāmayamc anamitram atho hy etad durlabhaṃ sulabhaṃ satāma akiṃcanasya śuddhasya upapannasya sarvaśaḥc avekṣamāṇas trīṃl lokān na tulyam upalakṣayea ākiṃcanyaṃ ca rājyaṃ ca tulayā samatolayamc atyaricyata dāridryaṃ rājyād api guṇādhikama ākiṃcanye ca rājye ca viśeṣaḥ sumahān ayamc nityodvigno hi dhanavān mṛtyor āsyagato yathāa naivāsyāgnir na cādityo na mṛtyur na ca dasyavaḥc prabhavanti dhanajyāninirmuktasya nirāśiṣaḥa taṃ vai sadā kāmacaram anupastīrṇaśāyinamc bāhūpadhānaṃ śāmyantaṃ praśaṃsanti divaukasaḥa dhanavān krodhalobhābhyām āviṣṭo naṣṭacetanaḥc tiryagīkṣaḥ śuṣkamukhaḥ pāpako bhrukuṭīmukhaḥa nirdaśaṃś cādharoṣṭhaṃ ca kruddho dāruṇabhāṣitāc kas tam icchet paridraṣṭuṃ dātum icchati cen mahīma śriyā hy abhīkṣṇaṃ saṃvāso mohayaty avicakṣaṇamc sā tasya cittaṃ harati śāradābhram ivānilaḥa athainaṃ rūpamānaś ca dhanamānaś ca vindatic abhijāto smi siddho smi nāsmi kevalamānuṣaḥe ity ebhiḥ kāraṇais tasya tribhiś cittaṃ prasicyatea sa prasiktamanā bhogān visṛjya pitṛsaṃcitānc parikṣīṇaḥ parasvānām ādānaṃ sādhu manyatea tam atikrāntamaryādam ādadānaṃ tatas tataḥc pratiṣedhanti rājāno lubdhā mṛgam iveṣubhiḥa evam etāni duḥkhāni tāni tānīha mānavamc vividhāny upavartante gātrasaṃsparśajāni caa teṣāṃ paramaduḥkhānāṃ buddhyā bhaiṣajyam ācaretc lokadharmaṃ samājñāya dhruvāṇām adhruvaiḥ sahaa nātyaktvā sukham āpnoti nātyaktvā vindate paramc nātyaktvā cābhayaḥ śete tyaktvā sarvaṃ sukhī bhavaa ity etad dhāstinapure brāhmaṇenopavarṇitamc śamyākena purā mahyaṃ tasmāt tyāgaḥ paro mataḥ yudhiṣṭhira uvācaa īhamānaḥ samārambhān yadi nāsādayed dhanamc dhanatṛṣṇābhibhūtaś ca kiṃ kurvan sukham āpnuyāt bhīṣma uvācaa sarvasāmyam anāyāsaḥ satyavākyaṃ ca bhāratac nirvedaś cāvivitsā ca yasya syāt sa sukhī naraḥa etāny eva padāny āhuḥ pañca vṛddhāḥ praśāntayec eṣa svargaś ca dharmaś ca sukhaṃ cānuttamaṃ satāma atrāpy udāharantīmam itihāsaṃ purātanamc nirvedān maṅkinā gītaṃ tan nibodha yudhiṣṭhiraa īhamāno dhanaṃ maṅkir bhagnehaś ca punaḥ punaḥc kena cid dhanaśeṣeṇa krītavān damyagoyugama susaṃbaddhau tu tau damyau damanāyābhiniḥsṛtauc āsīnam uṣṭraṃ madhyena sahasaivābhyadhāvatāma tayoḥ saṃprāptayor uṣṭraḥ skandhadeśam amarṣaṇaḥc utthāyotkṣipya tau damyau prasasāra mahājavaḥa hriyamāṇau tu tau damyau tenoṣṭreṇa pramāthināc mriyamāṇau ca saṃprekṣya maṅkis tatrābravīd idama na caivāvihitaṃ śakyaṃ dakṣeṇāpīhituṃ dhanamc yuktena śraddhayā samyag īhāṃ samanutiṣṭhatāa kṛtasya pūrvaṃ cānarthair yuktasyāpy anutiṣṭhataḥc imaṃ paśyata saṃgatyā mama daivam upaplavama udyamyodyamya me damyau viṣameṇeva gacchatic utkṣipya kākatālīyam unmātheneva jambukaḥd utpathenaiva dhāvantam utpathenaiva dhāvataḥa maṇī voṣṭrasya lambete priyau vatsatarau mamac śuddhaṃ hi daivam evedam ato naivāsti pauruṣama yadi vāpy upapadyeta pauruṣaṃ nāma karhi citc anviṣyamāṇaṃ tad api daivam evāvatiṣṭhatea tasmān nirveda eveha gantavyaḥ sukham īpsatāc sukhaṃ svapiti nirviṇṇo nirāśaś cārthasādhanea aho samyak śukenoktaṃ sarvataḥ parimucyatāc pratiṣṭhatā mahāraṇyaṃ janakasya niveśanāta yaḥ kāmān prāpnuyāt sarvān yaś cainān kevalāṃs tyajetc prāpaṇāt sarvakāmānāṃ parityāgo viśiṣyatea nāntaṃ sarvavivitsānāṃ gatapūrvo sti kaś canac śarīre jīvite caiva tṛṣṇā mandasya vardhatea nivartasva vivitsābhyaḥ śāmya nirvidya māmakac asakṛc cāsi nikṛto na ca nirvidyase tanoa yadi nāhaṃ vināśyas te yady evaṃ ramase mayāc mā māṃ yojaya lobhena vṛthā tvaṃ vittakāmukaa saṃcitaṃ saṃcitaṃ dravyaṃ naṣṭaṃ tava punaḥ punaḥc kadā vimokṣyase mūḍha dhanehāṃ dhanakāmukad paripanthika sarvasya śreyasaḥ pāpasaṃśrayaa aho nu mama bāliśyaṃ yo haṃ krīḍanakas tavab kleśair nānāvidhair nityaṃ saṃyojayasi nirghṛṇac kiṃ naiva jātu puruṣaḥ pareṣāṃ preṣyatām iyāta na pūrve nāpare jātu kāmānām antam āpnuvanc tyaktvā sarvasamārambhān pratibuddho smi jāgṛmia nūnaṃ te hṛdayaṃ kāma vajrasāramayaṃ dṛdhamc yad anarthaśatāviṣṭaṃ śatadhā na vidīryatea tyajāmi kāma tvāṃ caiva yac ca kiṃ cit priyaṃ tavac tavāhaṃ sukham anvicchann ātmany upalabhe sukhama kāma jānāmi te mūlaṃ saṃkalpāt kila jāyasec na tvāṃ saṃkalpayiṣyāmi samūlo na bhaviṣyasia īhā dhanasya na sukhā labdhvā cintā ca bhūyasīc labdhanāśo yathā mṛtyur labdhaṃ bhavati vā na vāa paretya yo na labhate tato duḥkhataraṃ nu kimc na ca tuṣyati labdhena bhūya eva ca mārgatia anutarṣula evārthaḥ svādu gāṅgam ivodakamc madvilāpanam etat tu pratibuddho smi saṃtyajaa ya imaṃ māmakaṃ dehaṃ bhūtagrāmaḥ samāśritaḥc sa yātv ito yathākāmaṃ vasatāṃ vā yathāsukhama na yuṣmāsv iha me prītiḥ kāmalobhānusāriṣuc tasmād utsṛjya sarvān vaḥ satyam evāśrayāmy ahama sarvabhūtāny ahaṃ dehe paśyan manasi cātmanaḥc yoge buddhiṃ śrute sattvaṃ mano brahmaṇi dhārayana vihariṣyāmy anāsaktaḥ sukhī lokān nirāmayaḥc yathā mā tvaṃ punar naivaṃ duḥkheṣu praṇidhāsyasia tvayā hi me praṇunnasya gatir anyā na vidyatec tṛṣṇāśokaśramāṇāṃ hi tvaṃ kāma prabhavaḥ sadāa dhananāśo dhikaṃ duḥkhaṃ manye sarvamahattaramc jñātayo hy avamanyante mitrāṇi ca dhanacyutama avajñānasahasrais tu doṣāḥ kaṣṭatarādhanec dhane sukhakalā yā ca sāpi duḥkhair vidhīyatea dhanam asyeti puruṣaṃ purā nighnanti dasyavaḥc kliśyanti vividhair daṇḍair nityam udvejayanti caa mandalolupatā duḥkham iti buddhaṃ cirān mayāc yad yad ālambase kāma tat tad evānurudhyasea atattvajño si bālaś ca dustoṣo pūraṇo nalaḥc naiva tvaṃ vettha sulabhaṃ naiva tvaṃ vettha durlabhama pātālam iva duṣpūro māṃ duḥkhair yoktum icchasic nāham adya samāveṣṭuṃ śakyaḥ kāma punas tvayāa nirvedam aham āsādya dravyanāśād yadṛcchayāc nirvṛtiṃ paramāṃ prāpya nādya kāmān vicintayea atikleśān sahāmīha nāhaṃ budhyāmy abuddhimānc nikṛto dhananāśena śaye sarvāṅgavijvaraḥa parityajāmi kāma tvāṃ hitvā sarvamanogatīḥc na tvaṃ mayā punaḥ kāma nasyoteneva raṃsyasea kṣamiṣye kṣamamāṇānāṃ na hiṃsiṣye ca hiṃsitaḥc dveṣyamuktaḥ priyaṃ vakṣyāmy anādṛtya tad apriyama tṛptaḥ svasthendriyo nityaṃ yathālabdhena vartayanc na sakāmaṃ kariṣyāmi tvām ahaṃ śatrum ātmanaḥa nirvedaṃ nirvṛtiṃ tṛptiṃ śāntiṃ satyaṃ damaṃ kṣamāmc sarvabhūtadayāṃ caiva viddhi māṃ śaraṇāgatama tasmāt kāmaś ca lobhaś ca tṛṣṇā kārpaṇyam eva cac tyajantu māṃ pratiṣṭhantaṃ sattvastho hy asmi sāṃpratama prahāya kāmaṃ lobhaṃ ca krodhaṃ pāruṣyam eva cac nādya lobhavaśaṃ prāpto duḥkhaṃ prāpsyāmy anātmavāna yad yat tyajati kāmānāṃ tat sukhasyābhipūryatec kāmasya vaśago nityaṃ duḥkham eva prapadyatea kāmān vyudasya dhunute yat kiṃ cit puruṣo rajaḥc kāmakrodhodbhavaṃ duḥkham ahrīr aratir eva caa eṣa brahmapraviṣṭo haṃ grīṣme śītam iva hradamc śāmyāmi parinirvāmi sukham āse ca kevalama yac ca kāmasukhaṃ loke yac ca divyaṃ mahat sukhamc tṛṣṇākṣayasukhasyaite nārhataḥ ṣoḍaśīṃ kalāma ātmanā saptamaṃ kāmaṃ hatvā śatrum kathaṃ varṇavibhaktayaḥc śaucāśaucaṃ kathaṃ teṣāṃ dharmādharmāv atho kathama kīdṛśo jīvatāṃ jīvaḥ kva vā gacchanti ye mṛtāḥc paralokam imaṃ cāpi sarvaṃ śaṃsatu no bhavāna evaṃ sa bhagavān pṛṣṭo bharadvājena saṃśayamc maharṣir brahmasaṃkāśaḥ sarvaṃ tasmai tato bravītd bhṛgur uvācad nārāyaṇābhidhānasya kūṭasthasyākṣarātmanaḥd avyaktasyāprameyasya prakṛtoparatasya cad evaṃbhūtaḥ sa vai devaḥ puruṣaṃ cāsṛjad dvidhād bhṛgur uvācad nārāyaṇo jaganmūrtir antarātmā sanātanaḥd kūṭastho kṣara avyakto nirlepo vyāpakaḥ prabhuḥd prakṛteḥ parato nityam indriyair apy agocaraḥd sa sisṛkṣuḥ sahasrāṃśād asṛjat puruṣaṃ prabhuḥa mānaso nāma vikhyātaḥ śrutapūrvo maharṣibhiḥc anādinidhano devas tathābhedyo jarāmaraḥa avyakta iti vikhyātaḥ śāśvato thākṣaro vyayaḥc yataḥ sṛṣṭāni bhūtāni jāyante ca mriyanti caa so sṛjat prathamaṃ devo mahāntaṃ nāma nāmataḥb mahān sasarjāhaṃkāraṃ sa cāpi bhagavān athac ākāśam iti vikhyātaṃ sarvabhūtadharaḥ prabhuḥa ākāśād abhavad vāri salilād agnimārutauc agnimārutasaṃyogāt tataḥ samabhavan mahīa tatas tejomayaṃ divyaṃ padmaṃ sṛṣṭaṃ svayaṃbhuvāc tasmāt padmāt samabhavad brahmā vedamayo nidhiḥa ahaṃkāra iti khyātaḥ sarvabhūtātmabhūtakṛtc brahmā vai sumahātejā ya ete pañca dhātavaḥa śailās tasyāsthisaṃjñās tu medo māṃsaṃ ca medinīc samudrās tasya rudhiram ākāśam udaraṃ tathāa pavanaś caiva niḥśvāsas tejo gnir nimnagāḥ sirāḥc agnīṣomau tu candrārkau nayane tasya viśrutea nabhaś cordhvaṃ śiras tasya kṣitiḥ pādau diśo bhujauc durvijñeyo hy anantatvāt siddhair api na saṃśayaḥa sa eva bhagavān viṣṇur ananta iti viśrutaḥc sarvabhūtātmabhūtastho durvijñeyo kṛtātmabhiḥa ahaṃkārasya yaḥ sraṣṭā sarvabhūtabhavāya vaic yataḥ samabhavad viśvaṃ pṛṣṭo haṃ yad iha tvayā bharadvāja uvācaa gaganasya diśāṃ caiva bhūtalasyānilasya cac kāny atra parimāṇāni saṃśayaṃ chindhi me rthataḥ bhṛgur uvācaa anantam etad ākāśaṃ siddhacāraṇasevitamc ramyaṃ nānāśrayākīrṇaṃ yasyānto nādhigamyatea ūrdhvaṃ gater adhastāt tu candrādityau na dṛśyataḥc tatra devāḥ svayaṃ dīptā bhāsvarāś cāgnivarcasaḥa te cāpy antaṃ na paśyanti nabhasaḥ prathitaujasaḥc durgamatvād anantatvād iti me viddhi mānadaa upariṣṭopariṣṭāt tu prajvaladbhiḥ svayaṃprabhaiḥc niruddham etad ākāśam aprameyaṃ surair apia pṛthivyante samudrās tu samudrānte tamaḥ smṛtamc tamaso nte jalaṃ prāhur jalasyānte gnir eva caa rasātalānte salilaṃ jalānte pannagādhipaḥc tadante punar ākāśam ākāśānte punar jalama evam antaṃ bhagavataḥ pramāṇaṃ salilasya cac agnimārutatoyebhyo durjñeyaṃ daivatair apia agnimārutatoyānāṃ varṇāḥ kṣititalasya cac ākāśasadṛśā hy ete bhidyante tattvadarśanāta paṭhanti caiva munayaḥ śāstreṣu vividheṣu cac trailokye sāgare caiva pramāṇaṃ vihitaṃ yathāe adṛśyāya tv agamyāya kaḥ pramāṇam udāhareta siddhānāṃ devatānāṃ ca yadā parimitā gatiḥc tadā gauṇam anantasya nāmānanteti viśrutame nāmadheyānurūpasya mānasasya mahātmanaḥa yadā tu divyaṃ tadrūpaṃ hrasate vardhate punaḥc ko nyas tad vedituṃ śakto yo pi syāt tadvidho paraḥa tataḥ puṣkarataḥ sṛṣṭaḥ sarvajño mūrtimān prabhuḥc brahmā dharmamayaḥ pūrvaḥ prajāpatir anuttamaḥ bharadvāja uvācaa puṣkarād yadi saṃbhūto jyeṣṭhaṃ bhavati puṣkaramc brahmāṇaṃ pūrvajaṃ cāha bhavān saṃdeha eva me bhṛgur uvācaa mānasasyeha yā mūrtir brahmatvaṃ samupāgatāc tasyāsanavidhānārthaṃ pṛthivī padmam ucyatea karṇikā tasya padmasya merur gaganam ucchritaḥc tasya madhye sthito lokān sṛjate jagataḥ prabhuḥ bharadvāja uvācaa prajāvisargaṃ vividhaṃ kathaṃ sa sṛjate prabhuḥc merumadhye sthito brahmā tad brūhi dvijasattamad merumadhye sthito brahmā kathaṃ sa sasṛje prajāḥd etan me sarvam ācakṣva yāthātathyena pṛcchataḥ bhṛgur uvācaa prajāvisargaṃ vividhaṃ mānaso manasāsṛjatc saṃdhukṣaṇārthaṃ bhūtānāṃ sṛṣṭaṃ prathamato jalama yat prāṇāḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ vardhante yena ca prajāḥc parityaktāś ca naśyanti tenedaṃ sarvam āvṛtama pṛthivī parvatā meghā mūrtimantaś ca ye parec sarvaṃ tad vāruṇaṃ jñeyam āpas tastambhire punaḥ bharadvāja uvācaa kathaṃ salilam utpannaṃ kathaṃ caivāgnimārutauc kathaṃ ca medinī sṛṣṭety atra me saṃśayo mahān bhṛgur uvācaa brahmakalpe purā brahman brahmarṣīṇāṃ samāgamec lokasaṃbhavasaṃdehaḥ samutpanno mahātmanāma te tiṣṭhan dhyānam ālambya maunam āsthāya niścalāḥc tyaktāhārāḥ pavanapā divyaṃ varṣaśataṃ dvijāḥa teṣāṃ dharmamayī vāṇī sarveṣāṃ śrotram āgamatc divyā sarasvatī tatra saṃbabhūva nabhastalāta purā stimitaniḥśabdam ākāśam acalopamamc naṣṭacandrārkapavanaṃ prasuptam iva saṃbabhaua tataḥ salilam utpannaṃ tamasīvāparaṃ tamaḥc tasmāc ca salilotpīḍād udatiṣṭhata mārutaḥa yathā bhājanam acchidraṃ niḥśabdam iva lakṣyatec tac cāmbhasā pūryamāṇaṃ saśabdaṃ kurute nilaḥa tathā salilasaṃruddhe nabhaso nte nirantarec bhittvārṇavatalaṃ vāyuḥ samutpatati ghoṣavāna sa eṣa carate vāyur arṇavotpīḍasaṃbhavaḥc ākāśasthānam āsādya praśāntiṃ nādhigacchatia tasmin vāyvambusaṃgharṣe dīptatejā mahābalaḥc prādurbhavaty ūrdhvaśikhaḥ kṛtvā vitimiraṃ nabhaḥa agniḥ pavanasaṃyuktaḥ khāt samutpatate jalamc so gnir mārutasaṃyogād ghanatvam upapadyatea tasyākāśe nipatitaḥ snehas tiṣṭhati yo paraḥc sa saṃghātatvam āpanno bhūmitvam upagacchatia rasānāṃ sarvagandhānāṃ snehānāṃ prāṇināṃ tathāc bhūmir yonir iha jñeyā yasyāṃ sarvaṃ prasūyate bharadvāja uvācaa ete te dhātavaḥ pañca brahmā yān asṛjat purāc āvṛtā yair ime lokā mahābhūtābhisaṃjñitaiḥa yad āsṛjat sahasrāṇi bhūtānāṃ sa mahāmatiḥc pañcānām eva bhūtatvaṃ kathaṃ samupapadyate bhṛgur uvācaa amitānāṃ mahāśabdo yānti bhūtāni saṃbhavamc tatas teṣāṃ mahābhūtaśabdo yam upapadyatea ceṣṭā vayūḥ kham ākāśam ūṣmāgniḥ salilaṃ dravaḥc pṛthivī cātra saṃghātaḥ śarīraṃ pāñcabhautikama ity etaiḥ pañcabhir bhūtair yuktaṃ sthāvarajaṅgamamc śrotraṃ ghrāṇaṃ rasaḥ sparśo dṛṣṭiś cendriyasaṃjñitāḥ bharadvāja uvācaa pañcabhir yadi bhūtais tu yuktāḥ sthāvarajaṅgamāḥc sthāvarāṇāṃ na dṛśyante śarīre pañca dhātavaḥa anūṣmaṇām aceṣṭānāṃ ghanānāṃ caiva tattvataḥc vṛkṣāṇāṃ nopalabhyante śarīre pañca dhātavaḥa na śṛṇvanti na paśyanti na gandharasavedinaḥc na ca sparśaṃ vijānanti te kathaṃ pāñcabhautikāḥa adravatvād anagnitvād abhaumatvād avāyutaḥc ākāśasyāprameyatvād vṛkṣāṇāṃ nāsti bhautikam bhṛgur uvācaa ghanānām api vṛkṣāṇām ākāśo sti na saṃśayaḥc teṣāṃ puṣpaphale vyaktir nityaṃ samupalabhyatea ūṣmato glānaparṇānāṃ tvak phalaṃ puṣpam eva cac mlāyate caiva śīte na sparśas tenātra vidyatea vāyvagnyaśaniniṣpeṣaiḥ phalapuṣpaṃ viśīryatec śrotreṇa gṛhyate śabdas tasmāc chṛṇvanti pādapāḥa vallī veṣṭayate vṛkṣaṃ sarvataś caiva gacchatic na hy adṛṣṭeś ca mārgo sti tasmāt paśyanti pādapāḥa puṇyāpuṇyais tathā gandhair dhūpaiś ca vividhair apic arogāḥ puṣpitāḥ santi tasmāj jighranti pādapāḥa pādaiḥ salilapānaṃ ca vyādhīnām api darśanamc vyādhipratikriyatvāc ca vidyate rasanaṃ drumea vaktreṇotpalanālena yathordhvaṃ jalam ādadetc tathā pavanasaṃyuktaḥ pādaiḥ pibati pādapaḥa grahaṇāt sukhaduḥkhasya chinnasya ca virohaṇātc jīvaṃ paśyāmi vṛkṣāṇām acaitanyaṃ na vidyatea tena taj jalam ādattaṃ jarayaty agnimārutauc āhārapariṇāmāc ca sneho vṛddhiś ca jāyatea jaṅgamānāṃ ca sarveṣāṃ śarīre pañca dhātavaḥc pratyekaśaḥ prabhidyante yaiḥ śarīraṃ viceṣṭatea tvak ca māṃsaṃ tathāsthīni majjā snāyu ca pañcamamc ity etad iha saṃkhyātaṃ śarīre pṛthivīmayama tejo gniś ca tathā krodhaś cakṣur ūṣmā tathaiva cac agnir jarayate cāpi pañcāgneyāḥ śarīriṇaḥa śrotraṃ ghrāṇam athāsyaṃ ca hṛdayaṃ koṣṭham eva cac ākāśāt prāṇinām ete śarīre pañca dhātavaḥa śleṣmā pittam atha svedo vasā śoṇitam eva cac ity āpaḥ pañcadhā dehe bhavanti prāṇināṃ sadāa prāṇāt praṇīyate prāṇī vyānād vyāyacchate tathāc gacchaty apāno vāk caiva samāno hṛdy avasthitaḥa udānād ucchvasiti ca pratibhedāc ca bhāṣatec ity ete vāyavaḥ pañca ceṣṭayantīha dehinama bhūmer gandhaguṇān vetti rasaṃ cādbhyaḥ śarīravānc jyotiḥ paśyati cakṣurbhyāṃ sparśaṃ vetti ca vāyunād gandhaḥ sparśo raso rūpaṃ śabdaś cātra guṇāḥ smṛtāḥd śabdaṃ śṛṇoti ca tathā ākāśāt tu śarīravānd śabdaḥ sparśaś ca rūpaṃ ca raso gandhaś ca bhūguṇaḥa tasya gandhasya vakṣyāmi vistarābhihitān guṇānc iṣṭaś cāniṣṭagandhaś ca madhuraḥ kaṭur eva caa nirhārī saṃhataḥ snigdho rūkṣo viśada eva cac evaṃ navavidho jñeyaḥ pārthivo gandhavistaraḥa śabdaḥ sparśaś ca rūpaṃ ca rasaś cāpāṃ guṇāḥ smṛtāḥc rasajñānaṃ tu vakṣyāmi tan me nigadataḥ śṛṇua raso bahuvidhaḥ proktaḥ sūribhiḥ prathitātmabhiḥc madhuro lavaṇas tiktaḥ kaṣāyo mlaḥ kaṭus tathāe eṣa ṣaḍvidhavistāro raso vārimayaḥ smṛtaḥa śabdaḥ sparśaś ca rūpaṃ ca triguṇaṃ jyotir ucyatec jyotiḥ paśyati rūpāṇi rūpaṃ ca bahudhā smṛtama hrasvo dīrghas tathā sthūlaś caturasro ṇu vṛttavānc śuklaḥ kṛṣṇas tathā rakto nīlaḥ pīto ruṇas tathāe evaṃ dvādaśavistāro jyotīrūpaguṇaḥ smṛtaḥa śabdasparśau tu vijñeyau dviguṇo vāyur ucyatec vāyavyas tu guṇaḥ sparśaḥ sparśaś ca bahudhā smṛtaḥa kaṭhinaś cikkaṇaḥ ślakṣṇaḥ picchalo mṛdudāruṇaḥc uṣṇaḥ śītaḥ sukho duḥkhaḥ snigdho viśada eva cad tathā kharo mṛduḥ ślakṣṇo laghur gurutaro pi cae evaṃ dvādaśavistāro vāyavyo guṇa ucyatea tatraikaguṇam ākāśaṃ śabda ity eva tat smṛtamc tasya śabdasya vakṣyāmi vistaraṃ vividhātmakamd śānto ghoraś ca mūḍhaś ca tān asaṃgharṣajas tathāa ṣaḍja ṛṣabhagāndhārau madhyamaḥ pañcamas tathāc dhaivataś cāpi vijñeyas tathā cāpi niṣādakaḥa eṣa saptavidhaḥ prokto guṇa ākāśalakṣaṇaḥc traisvaryeṇa tu sarvatra sthito pi paṭahādiṣud mṛdaṅgabherīśaṅkhānāṃ stanayitno rathasya cad yaḥ kaś cic chrūyate śabdaḥ prāṇino prāṇino pi vād eteṣām eva sarveṣāṃ viṣaye saṃprakīrtitaḥd evaṃ bahuvidhākāraḥ śabda ākāśasaṃbhavaḥa ākāśajaṃ śabdam āhur ebhir vāyuguṇaiḥ sahac avyāhataiś cetayate na vetti viṣamāgataiḥa āpyāyante ca te nityaṃ dhātavas tais tu dhātubhiḥc āpo gnir mārutaś caiva nityaṃ jāgrati dehiṣud mūlam ete śarīrasya vyāpya prāṇān iha sthitāḥ bharadvāja uvācaa pārthivaṃ dhātum āśritya śārīro gniḥ kathaṃ bhavetc avakāśaviśeṣeṇa kathaṃ vartayate nilaḥ bhṛgur uvācaa vāyor gatim ahaṃ brahman kīrtayiṣyāmi te naghac prāṇinām anilo dehān yathā ceṣṭayate balīa śrito mūrdhānam agnis tu śarīraṃ paripālayanc prāṇo mūrdhani cāgnau ca vartamāno viceṣṭatea sa jantuḥ sarvabhūtātmā puruṣaḥ sa sanātanaḥc mano buddhir ahaṃkāro bhūtāni viṣayāś ca saḥa evaṃ tv iha sa sarvatra prāṇena paripālyatec pṛṣṭhataś ca samānena svāṃ svāṃ gatim upāśritaḥa vastimūlaṃ gudaṃ caiva pāvakaṃ ca samāśritaḥc vahan mūtraṃ purīṣaṃ cāpy apānaḥ parivartatea prayatne karmaṇi bale ya ekas triṣu vartatec udāna iti taṃ prāhur adhyātmaviduṣo janāḥa saṃdhiṣv api ca sarveṣu saṃniviṣṭas tathānilaḥc śarīreṣu manuṣyāṇāṃ vyāna ity upadiśyatea dhātuṣv agnis tu vitataḥ samānena samīritaḥc rasān dhātūṃś ca doṣāṃś ca vartayann avatiṣṭhatia apānaprāṇayor madhye prāṇāpānasamāhitaḥc samanvitaḥ svadhiṣṭhānaḥ samyak pacati pāvakaḥa āsyaṃ hi pāyusaṃyuktam ante syād gudasaṃjñitamc srotas tasmāt prajāyante sarvasrotāṃsi dehināma prāṇānāṃ saṃnipātāc ca saṃnipātaḥ prajāyatec ūṣmā cāgnir iti jñeyo yo nnaṃ pacati dehināma agnivegavahaḥ prāṇo gudānte pratihanyatec sa ūrdhvam āgamya punaḥ samutkṣipati pāvakama pakvāśayas tv adho nābher ūrdhvam āmāśayaḥ sthitaḥc nābhimadhye śarīrasya sarve prāṇāḥ samāhitāḥa prasṛtā hṛdayāt sarve tiryag ūrdhvam adhas tathāc vahanty annarasān nāḍyo daśa prāṇapracoditāḥa eṣa mārgo tha yogānāṃ yena gacchanti tat padamc jitaklamāsanā dhīrā mūrdhany ātmānam ādadhuḥa evaṃ sarveṣu vihitaḥ prāṇāpāneṣu dehināmc tasmin sthito nityam agniḥ sthālyām iva samāhitaḥ bharadvāja uvācaa yadi prāṇāyate vāyur vāyur eva viceṣṭatec śvasity ābhāṣate caiva tasmāj jīvo nirarthakaḥa yady ūṣmabhāva āgneyo vahninā pacyate yadic agnir jarayate caiva tasmāj jīvo nirarthakaḥa jantoḥ pramīyamāṇasya jīvo naivopalabhyatec vāyur eva jahāty enam ūṣmabhāvaś ca naśyatia yadi vātopamo jīvaḥ saṃśleṣo yadi vāyunāc vāyumaṇḍalavad dṛśyo gacchet saha marudgaṇaiḥa śleṣo yadi ca vātena yadi tasmāt praṇaśyatic mahārṇavavimuktatvād anyat salilabhājanama kūpe vā salilaṃ dadyāt pradīpaṃ vā hutāśanec prakṣiptaṃ naśyati kṣipraṃ yathā naśyaty asau tathād tan naśyaty ubhayaṃ tadvaj jīvo vātānalātmakaḥa pañcasādhāraṇe hy asmiñ śarīre jīvitaṃ kutaḥc yeṣām anyataratyāgāc caturṇāṃ nāsti saṃgrahaḥa naśyanty āpo hy anāhārād vāyur ucchvāsanigrahātc naśyate koṣṭhabhedāt kham agnir naśyaty abhojanāta vyādhivraṇaparikleśair medinī caiva śīryatec pīḍite nyatare hy eṣāṃ saṃghāto yāti pañcadhāa tasmin pañcatvam āpanne jīvaḥ kim anudhāvatic kiṃ vedayati vā jīvaḥ kiṃ śṛṇoti bravīti vāa eṣā gauḥ paralokasthaṃ tārayiṣyati mām itic yo dattvā mriyate jantuḥ sā gauḥ kaṃ tārayiṣyatia gauś ca pratigrahītā ca dātā caiva samaṃ yadāc ihaiva vilayaṃ yānti kutas teṣāṃ samāgamaḥa vihagair upayuktasya śailāgrāt patitasya vāc agninā copayuktasya kutaḥ saṃjīvanaṃ punaḥa chinnasya yadi vṛkṣasya na mūlaṃ pratirohatic bījāny asya pravartante mṛtaḥ kva punar eṣyatia bījamātraṃ purā sṛṣṭaṃ yad etat parivartatec mṛtā mṛtāḥ praṇaśyanti bījād bījaṃ pravartate bhṛgur uvācaa na praṇāśo sti jīvānāṃ dattasya ca kṛtasya cac yāti dehāntaraṃ prāṇī śarīraṃ tu viśīryatea na śarīrāśrito jīvas tasmin naṣṭe praṇaśyatic yathā samitsu dagdhāsu na praṇaśyati pāvakaḥ bharadvāja uvācaa agner yathā tathā tasya yadi nāśo na vidyatec indhanasyopayogānte sa cāgnir nopalabhyatea naśyatīty eva jānāmi śāntam agnim anindhanamc gatir yasya pramāṇaṃ vā saṃsthānaṃ vā na dṛśyate bhṛgur uvāca jīvasya cendhanāgneś ca sadā nāśo na vidyatea samidhām upayogānte sann evāgnir na dṛśyatec ākāśānugatatvād dhi durgrahaḥ sa nirāśrayaḥa tathā śarīrasaṃtyāge jīvo hy ākāśavat sthitaḥc na gṛhyate susūkṣmatvād yathā jyotir na saṃśayaḥa prāṇān dhārayate hy agniḥ sa jīva upadhāryatāmc vāyusaṃdhāraṇo hy agnir naśyaty ucchvāsanigrahāta tasmin naṣṭe śarīrāgnau śarīraṃ tad acetanamc patitaṃ yāti bhūmitvam ayanaṃ tasya hi kṣitiḥa jaṅgamānāṃ hi sarveṣāṃ sthāvarāṇāṃ tathaiva cac ākāśaṃ pavano bhyeti jyotis tam anugacchatie tatra trayāṇām ekatvaṃ dvayaṃ bhūmau pratiṣṭhitama yatra khaṃ tatra pavanas tatrāgnir yatra mārutaḥc amūrtayas te vijñeyā āpo mūrtās tathā kṣitiḥ bharadvāja uvācaa yady agnimārutau bhūmiḥ kham āpaś ca śarīriṣuc jīvaḥ kiṃlakṣaṇas tatrety etad ācakṣva me naghaa pañcātmake pañcaratau pañcavijñānasaṃyutec śarīre prāṇināṃ jīvaṃ jñātum icchāmi yādṛśama māṃsaśoṇitasaṃghāte medaḥsnāyvasthisaṃcayec bhidyamāne śarīre tu jīvo naivopalabhyatea yady ajīvaṃ śarīraṃ tu pañcabhūtasamanvitamc śārīre mānase duḥkhe kas tāṃ vedayate rujama śṛṇoti kathitaṃ jīvaḥ karṇābhyāṃ na śṛṇoti tatc maharṣe manasi vyagre tasmāj jīvo nirarthakaḥa sarvaṃ paśyati yad dṛśyaṃ manoyuktena cakṣuṣāc manasi ātmānaṃ taṃ vijānīhi sarvalokahitātmakamc tasmin yaḥ saṃśrito dehe hy abbindur iva puṣkarea kṣetrajñaṃ taṃ vijānīhi nityaṃ lokahitātmakamc tamo rajaś ca sattvaṃ ca viddhi jīvaguṇān imānd jīvam āhur mṛta ity abuddhāḥc jīvas tu dehāntaritaḥ prayātidaśārdhataivāsya śarīrabhedaḥa evaṃ sarveṣu bhūteṣu gūḍhaś carati saṃvṛtaḥc dṛśyate tv agryayā buddhyā sūkṣmayā tattvadarśibhiḥa taṃ
