anindhanaṃ jyotir iva praśāntaṃsa brahmalokaṃ śrayate dvijātiḥ bharadvāja uvācaa asmāl lokāt paro lokaḥ śrūyate nopalabhyatec tam ahaṃ jñātum icchāmi tad bhavān vaktum arhati bhṛgur uvācaa uttare himavatpārśve puṇye sarvaguṇānvitec puṇyaḥ kṣemyaś ca kāmyaś ca sa varo loka ucyatea tatra hy apāpakarmāṇaḥ śucayo tyantanirmalāḥc lobhamohaparityaktā mānavā nirupadravāḥa sa svargasadṛśo deśas tatra hy uktāḥ śubhā guṇāḥc kāle mṛtyuḥ prabhavati spṛśanti vyādhayo na caa na lobhaḥ paradāreṣu svadāranirato janaḥc na cānyonyavadhas tatra dravyeṣu na ca vismayaḥe parokṣadharmo naivāsti saṃdeho nāpi jāyatea kṛtasya tu phalaṃ tatra pratyakṣam upalabhyatec śayyāyānāsanopetāḥ prāsādabhavanāśrayāḥe sarvakāmair vṛtāḥ ke cid dhemābharaṇabhūṣitāḥa prāṇadhāraṇamātraṃ tu keṣāṃ cid upapadyatec śrameṇa mahatā ke cit kurvanti prāṇadhāraṇama iha dharmaparāḥ ke cit ke cin naikṛtikā narāḥc sukhitā duḥkhitāḥ ke cin nirdhanā dhanino parea iha śramo bhayaṃ mohaḥ kṣudhā tīvrā ca jāyatec lobhaś cārthakṛto nṝṇāṃ yena muhyanti paṇḍitāḥa iha cintā bahuvidhā dharmādharmasya karmaṇaḥc yas tad vedobhayaṃ prājñaḥ pāpmanā na sa lipyatea sopadhaṃ nikṛtiḥ steyaṃ parivādo bhyasūyatāc paropaghāto hiṃsā ca paiśunyam anṛtaṃ tathāa etān āsevate yas tu tapas tasya prahīyatec yas tv etān nācared vidvāṃs tapas tasyābhivardhatea karmabhūmir iyaṃ loka iha kṛtvā śubhāśubhamc śubhaiḥ śubham avāpnoti kṛtvāśubham ato nyathāa iha prajāpatiḥ pūrvaṃ devāḥ sarṣigaṇās tathāc iṣṭveṣṭatapasaḥ pūtā brahmalokam upāśritāḥa uttaraḥ pṛthivībhāgaḥ sarvapuṇyatamaḥ śubhaḥc ihatyās tatra jāyante ye vai puṇyakṛto janāḥa asatkarmāṇi kurvantas tiryagyoniṣu cāparec kṣīṇāyuṣas tathaivānye naśyanti pṛthivītalea anyonyabhakṣaṇe saktā lobhamohasamanvitāḥc ihaiva parivartante na te yānty uttarāṃ diśama ye gurūn upasevante niyatā brahmacāriṇaḥc panthānaṃ sarvalokānāṃ te jānanti manīṣiṇaḥa ity ukto yaṃ mayā dharmaḥ saṃkṣepād brahmanirmitaḥc dharmādharmau hi lokasya yo vai vetti sa buddhimān bhīṣma uvācaa ity ukto bhṛguṇā rājan bharadvājaḥ pratāpavānc bhṛguṃ paramadharmātmā vismitaḥ pratyapūjayata eṣa te prabhavo rājañ jagataḥ saṃprakīrtitaḥc nikhilena mahāprājña kiṃ bhūyaḥ śrotum icchasi yudhiṣṭhira uvācaa ācārasya vidhiṃ tāta procyamānaṃ tvayānaghac śrotum icchāmi dharmajña sarvajño hy asi me mataḥ bhīṣma uvācaa durācārā durviceṣṭā duṣprajñāḥ priyasāhasāḥc asanto hy abhivikhyātāḥ santaś cācāralakṣaṇāḥa purīṣaṃ yadi vā mūtraṃ ye na kurvanti mānavāḥc rājamārge gavāṃ madhye dhānyamadhye ca te śubhāḥd agnyāgāre tathā tīre ye na kurvanti te śubhāḥa śaucam āvaśyakaṃ kṛtvā devatānāṃ ca tarpaṇamc dharmam āhur manuṣyāṇām upaspṛśya nadīṃ tareta sūryaṃ sadopatiṣṭheta na svapyād bhāskarodayec sāyaṃ prātar japan saṃdhyāṃ tiṣṭhet pūrvāṃ tathāparāma pañcārdro bhojanaṃ kuryāt prāṅmukho maunam āsthitaḥc na ninded annabhakṣyāṃś ca svādv asvādu ca bhakṣayeta nārdrapāṇiḥ samuttiṣṭhen nārdrapādaḥ svapen niśic devarṣināradaproktam etad ācāralakṣaṇama śucikāmam anaḍvāhaṃ devagoṣṭhaṃ catuṣpathamc brāhmaṇaṃ dhārmikaṃ caiva nityaṃ kuryāt pradakṣiṇama atithīnāṃ ca sarveṣāṃ preṣyāṇāṃ svajanasya cac sāmānyaṃ bhojanaṃ bhṛtyaiḥ puruṣasya praśasyatea sāyaṃ prātar manuṣyāṇām aśanaṃ devanirmitamc nāntarā bhojanaṃ dṛṣṭam upavāsī tathā bhaveta homakāle tathā juhvann ṛtukāle tathā vrajanc ananyastrījanaḥ prājño brahmacārī tathā bhaveta amṛtaṃ brāhmaṇocchiṣṭaṃ jananyā hṛdayaṃ kṛtamc upāsīta janaḥ satyaṃ satyaṃ santa upāsated loṣṭhamardī tṛṇacchedī nakhakhādī tu yo naraḥd nityocchiṣṭaḥ śaṅkuśuko nehāyur vindate mahata yajuṣā saṃskṛtaṃ māṃsaṃ nivṛtto māṃsabhakṣaṇātc na bhakṣayed vṛthāmāṃsaṃ pṛṣṭhamāṃsaṃ ca varjayeta svadeśe paradeśe vā atithiṃ nopavāsayetc kāmyaṃ karmaphalaṃ labdhvā gurūṇām upapādayeta gurubhya āsanaṃ deyaṃ kartavyaṃ cābhivādanamc gurūn abhyarcya yujyante āyuṣā yaśasā śriyāa nekṣetādityam udyantaṃ na ca nagnāṃ parastriyamc maithunaṃ samaye dharmyaṃ guhyaṃ caiva samācareta tīrthānāṃ hṛdayaṃ tīrthaṃ śucīnāṃ hṛdayaṃ śuciḥc sarvam āryakṛtaṃ śaucaṃ vālasaṃsparśanāni caa darśane darśane nityaṃ sukhapraśnam udāharetc sāyaṃ prātaś ca viprāṇāṃ pradiṣṭam abhivādanama devagoṣṭhe gavāṃ madhye brāhmaṇānāṃ kriyāpathec svādhyāye bhojane caiva dakṣiṇaṃ pāṇim uddharetd sāyaṃprātaś ca viprāṇāṃ pūjanaṃ ca yathāvidhia paṇyānāṃ śobhanaṃ paṇyaṃ kṛṣīṇāṃ bādyate kṛṣiḥc bahukāraṃ ca sasyānāṃ vāhye vāhyaṃ tathā gavāma saṃpannaṃ bhojane nityaṃ pānīye tarpaṇaṃ tathāc suśṛtaṃ pāyase brūyād yavāgvāṃ kṛsare tathāa śmaśrukarmaṇi saṃprāpte kṣute snāne tha bhojanec vyādhitānāṃ ca sarveṣām āyuṣyam abhinandanama pratyādityaṃ na meheta na paśyed ātmanaḥ śakṛtc sutastriyā ca śayanaṃ sahabhojyaṃ ca varjayeta tvaṃkāraṃ nāmadheyaṃ ca jyeṣṭhānāṃ parivarjayetc avarāṇāṃ samānānām ubhayeṣāṃ na duṣyatia hṛdayaṃ pāpavṛttānāṃ pāpam ākhyāti vaikṛtamc jñānapūrvaṃ vinaśyanti gūhamānā mahājanea jñānapūrvaṃ kṛtaṃ pāpaṃ chādayanty abahuśrutāḥc nainaṃ manuṣyāḥ paśyanti paśyanti tridivaukasaḥa pāpena hi kṛtaṃ pāpaṃ pāpam evānuvartateb dharmeṇāpihito dharmo dharmam evānuvartatec dhārmikeṇa kṛto dharmaḥ kartāram anuvartated pāpaṃ kṛtaṃ na sphurate yathāghaird vipācyamānaṃ punar eti kartuḥa pāpaṃ kṛtaṃ na smaratīha mūḍhovivartamānasya tad eti kartuḥc rāhur yathā candram upaiti cāpitathābudhaṃ pāpam upaiti karmaa āśayā saṃcitaṃ dravyaṃ yat kāle neha bhujyatec tad budhā na praśaṃsanti maraṇaṃ na pratīkṣatea mānasaṃ sarvabhūtānāṃ dharmam āhur manīṣiṇaḥc tasmāt sarveṣu bhūteṣu manasā śivam ācareta eka eva cared dharmaṃ nāsti dharme sahāyatāc kevalaṃ vidhim āsādya sahāyaḥ kiṃ kariṣyatia devā yonir manuṣyāṇāṃ devānām amṛtaṃ divic pretyabhāve sukhaṃ dharmāc chaśvat tair upabhujyate yudhiṣṭhira uvācaa adhyātmaṃ nāma yad idaṃ puruṣasyeha cintyatec yad adhyātmaṃ yataś caitat tan me brūhi pitāmahad kutaḥ sṛṣṭam idaṃ viśvaṃ jagat sthāvarajaṅgamamd pralaye ca kam abhyeti tan me vaktum ihārhasi bhīṣma uvācaa adhyātmam iti māṃ pārtha yad etad anupṛcchasic tad vyākhyāsyāmi te tāta śreyaskarataraṃ sukhamd sṛṣṭipralayasaṃyuktam ācāryaiḥ paridarśitama yaj jñātvā puruṣo loke prītiṃ saukhyaṃ ca vindatic phalalābhaś ca sadyaḥ syāt sarvabhūtahitaṃ ca tatd ātmānam amalaṃ rājann āvṛtyaivaṃ vyavasthitamd tasmin prakāśate nityaṃ tamaḥ somo yathaiva tatd tad vidvān naṣṭapāpmaiṣa brahmabhūyāya kalpated aṇḍāvaraṇabhūtānāṃ paryantaṃ hi yathā tamaḥa pṛthivī vāyur ākāśam āpo jyotiś ca pañcamamc mahābhūtāni bhūtānāṃ sarveṣāṃ prabhavāpyayaua tataḥ sṛṣṭāni tatraiva tāni yānti punaḥ punaḥc mahābhūtāni bhūteṣu sāgarasyormayo yathāa prasārya ca yathāṅgāni kūrmaḥ saṃharate punaḥc tadvad bhūtāni bhūtātmā sṛṣṭvā saṃharate punaḥd sa teṣāṃ guṇasaṃghātaḥ śarīre bharatarṣabhad satataṃ pravilīyante guṇās te prabhavanti cad yad vinā naiva śṛṇute na paśyati na dīpyated yad adhīnaṃ yatas tasmād adhyātmam iti kathyated jñānaṃ tad ekarūpākhyaṃ nānāprajñānvitaṃ tadād na te vācānurūpaṃ syād yayāthā rārasavivarjitamd ākāśāt khalu yājyeṣu bhavanti sumahāguṇāḥd iti tanmayam evaitat sarvaṃ sthāvarajaṅgamamd pralaye ca tam abhyeti tasmād utsṛjyate punaḥd mahābhūteṣu bhūtātmā sṛṣṭvā saṃharate punaḥa mahābhūtāni pañcaiva sarvabhūteṣu bhūtakṛtc akarot teṣu vaiṣamyaṃ tat tu jīvo nu paśyatia śabdaḥ śrotraṃ tathā khāni trayam ākāśayonijamc vāyos tvaksparśaceṣṭāś ca vāg ity etac catuṣṭayama rūpaṃ cakṣus tathā paktis trividhaṃ teja ucyatec rasaḥ kledaś ca jihvā ca trayo jalaguṇāḥ smṛtāḥa ghreyaṃ ghrāṇaṃ śarīraṃ ca te tu bhūmiguṇās trayaḥc mahābhūtāni pañcaiva ṣaṣṭhaṃ tu mana ucyatea indriyāṇi manaś caiva vijñānāny asya bhāratac saptamī buddhir ity āhuḥ kṣetrajñaḥ punar aṣṭamaḥa cakṣur ālokanāyaiva saṃśayaṃ kurute manaḥc buddhir adhyavasāyāya kṣetrajñaḥ sākṣivat sthitaḥd cicchaktyādhiṣṭhitā buddhiś cetanety abhiviśrutād cetanānantaro jīvas tad āvetti ca lakṣyated notsṛjan visṛjaṃś caiva śarīraṃ dṛśyate yadād tasmiṃś cetopalabdhiḥ syāt tamo vācchādayaty utaa ūrdhvaṃ pādatalābhyāṃ yad arvāg ūrdhvaṃ ca paśyatic etena sarvam evedaṃ viddhy abhivyāptam antarama puruṣe cendriyāṇīha veditavyāni kṛtsnaśaḥc tamo rajaś ca sattvaṃ ca viddhi bhāvāṃs tadāśrayāna etāṃ buddhvā naro buddhyā bhūtānām āgatiṃ gatimc samavekṣya śanaiś caiva labhate śamam uttamama guṇān nenīyate buddhir buddhir evendriyāṇy apic manaḥṣaṣṭhāni sarvāṇi buddhyabhāve kuto guṇāḥd yena saṃkalpayaty arthaṃ kiṃ cid bhavati tanmanaḥa iti tanmayam evaitat sarvaṃ sthāvarajaṅgamamc pralīyate codbhavati tasmān nirdiśyate tathāa yena paśyati tac cakṣuḥ śṛṇoti śrotram ucyatec jighrati ghrāṇam ity āhū rasaṃ jānāti jihvayāa tvacā spṛśati ca sparśān buddhir vikriyate sakṛtc yena saṃkalpayaty arthaṃ kiṃ cid bhavati tan manaḥa adhiṣṭhānāni buddher hi pṛthag arthāni pañcadhāc pañcendriyāṇi yāny āhus tāny adṛśyo dhitiṣṭhatia puruṣādhiṣṭhitā buddhis triṣu bhāveṣu vartatec kadā cil labhate prītiṃ kadā cid anuśocatia na sukhena na duḥkhena kadā cid api vartatec evaṃ narāṇāṃ manasi triṣu bhāveṣv avasthitāa seyaṃ bhāvātmikā bhāvāṃs trīn etān nātivartatec saritāṃ sāgaro bhartā mahāvelām ivormimāna atibhāvagatā buddhir bhāve manasi vartatec pravartamānaṃ hi rajas tadbhāvam anuvartatea indriyāṇi hi sarvāṇi pradarśayati sā sadāc prītiḥ sattvaṃ rajaḥ śokas tamo mohaś ca te trayaḥa ye ye ca bhāvā loke smin sarveṣv eteṣu te triṣub sattvaṃ buddhis tamobhāvaḥ prītiyogāt pravartatec iti buddhigatiḥ sarvā vyākhyātā tava bhārataa indriyāṇi ca sarvāṇi vijetavyāni dhīmatāc sattvaṃ rajas tamaś caiva prāṇināṃ saṃśritāḥ sadāa trividhā vedanā caiva sarvasattveṣu dṛśyatec sāttvikī rājasī caiva tāmasī ceti bhārataa sukhasparśaḥ sattvaguṇo duḥkhasparśo rajoguṇaḥc tamoguṇena saṃyuktau bhavato vyāvahārikaua tatra yat prītisaṃyuktaṃ kāye manasi vā bhavetc vartate sāttviko bhāva ity avekṣeta tat tadāa atha yad duḥkhasaṃyuktam atuṣṭikaram ātmanaḥc pravṛttaṃ raja ity eva tann asaṃrabhya cintayeta atha yan mohasaṃyuktam avyaktam iva yad bhavetc apratarkyam avijñeyaṃ tamas tad upadhārayeta praharṣaḥ prītir ānandaḥ sukhaṃ saṃśāntacittatāc kathaṃ cid abhivartanta ity ete sāttvikā guṇāḥa atuṣṭiḥ paritāpaś ca śoko lobhas tathākṣamāc liṅgāni rajasas tāni dṛśyante hetvahetubhiḥa abhimānas tathā mohaḥ pramādaḥ svapnatandritāc kathaṃ cid abhivartante vividhās tāmasā guṇāḥa dūragaṃ bahudhāgāmi prārthanāsaṃśayātmakamc manaḥ suniyataṃ yasya sa sukhī pretya ceha caa sattvakṣetrajñayor etad antaraṃ paśya sūkṣmayoḥc sṛjate tu guṇān eka eko na sṛjate guṇāna maśakodumbarau cāpi saṃprayuktau yathā sadāc anyonyam anyau ca yathā saṃprayogas tathā tayoḥa pṛthagbhūtau prakṛtyā tau saṃprayuktau ca sarvadāc yathā matsyo jalaṃ caiva saṃprayuktau tathaiva taua na guṇā vidur ātmānaṃ sa guṇān vetti sarvaśaḥc paridraṣṭā guṇānāṃ ca saṃsraṣṭā manyate sadāa indriyais tu pradīpārthaṃ kurute buddhisaptamaiḥc nirviceṣṭair ajānadbhiḥ paramātmā pradīpavata sṛjate hi guṇān sattvaṃ kṣetrajñaḥ paripaśyatic saṃprayogas tayor eṣa sattvakṣetrajñayor dhruvaḥa āśrayo nāsti sattvasya kṣetrajñasya ca kaś canac sattvaṃ manaḥ saṃsṛjati na guṇān vai kadā canaa raśmīṃs teṣāṃ sa manasā yadā samyaṅ niyacchatic tadā prakāśate syātmā ghaṭe dīpo jvalann ivaa tyaktvā yaḥ prākṛtaṃ karma nityam ātmaratir muniḥc sarvabhūtātmabhūtaḥ syāt sa gacchet paramāṃ gatima yathā vāricaraḥ pakṣī lipyamāno na lipyatec evam eva kṛtaprajño bhūteṣu parivartatea evaṃsvabhāvam evaitat svabuddhyā viharen naraḥc aśocann aprahṛṣyaṃś ca cared vigatamatsaraḥa svabhāvasiddhyā saṃsiddhān sa nityaṃ sṛjate guṇānc ūrṇanābhir yathā sraṣṭā vijñeyās tantuvad guṇāḥa pradhvastā na nivartante nivṛttir nopalabhyatec pratyakṣeṇa parokṣaṃ tad anumānena sidhyatia evam eke vyavasyanti nivṛttir iti cāparec ubhayaṃ saṃpradhāryaitad adhyavasyed yathāmatia itīmaṃ hṛdayagranthiṃ buddhibhedamayaṃ dṛḍhamc vimucya sukham āsīta na śocec chinnasaṃśayaḥa malināḥ prāpnuyuḥ śuddhiṃ yathā pūrṇāṃ nadīṃ narāḥc avagāhya suvidvaṃso viddhi jñānam idaṃ tathāa mahānadīṃ hi pārajñas tapyate na taran yathāb na tu tapyati tattvajñaḥ phale jñāte taraty utac evaṃ ye vidur adhyātmaṃ kaivalyaṃ jñānam uttamama etāṃ buddhvā naraḥ sarvāṃ bhūtānām āgatiṃ gatimc avekṣya ca śanair buddhyā labhate śaṃ paraṃ tataḥa trivargo yasya viditaḥ prāgjyotiḥ sa vimucyatec anviṣya manasā yuktas tattvadarśī nirutsukaḥa na cātmā śakyate draṣṭum indriyeṣu vibhāgaśaḥc tatra tatra visṛṣṭeṣu durjayeṣv akṛtātmabhiḥa etad buddhvā bhaved buddhaḥ kim anyad buddhalakṣaṇamb pratigṛhya ca nihnoti hy anyathā ca pradṛśyateb na sarpati ca yaṃ prāhuḥ sarvatra pratihanyateb dhūmena cāprasanno gnir yathārkaṃ na pravartayetb dhiṣṇyādhipe prasanne tu sthitim etāṃ nirīkṣateb atidūrāc ca sūkṣmatvāt prasthānaṃ na prakāśateb prapadya tac chrutāhvāni cinmayaṃ svīkṛtaṃ vināc vijñāya tad dhi manyante kṛtakṛtyā manīṣiṇaḥa na bhavati viduṣāṃ tato bhayaṃyad aviduṣāṃ sumahad bhayaṃ bhavetc na hi gatir adhikāsti kasya citsati hi guṇe pravadanty atulyatāma yat karoty anabhisaṃdhipūrvakaṃtac ca nirṇudati yat purā kṛtamc nāpriyaṃ tad ubhayaṃ kutaḥ priyaṃtasya taj janayatīha kurvataḥd lokam āturam asūyate janasd tasya taj janayatīha sarvataḥa loka āturajanān virāviṇastat tad eva bahu paśya śocataḥc tatra paśya kuśalān aśocatoye vidus tad ubhayaṃ padaṃ sadā bhīṣma uvācaa hanta vakṣyāmi te pārtha dhyānayogaṃ caturvidhamc yaṃ jñātvā śāśvatīṃ siddhiṃ gacchanti paramarṣayaḥa yathā svanuṣṭhitaṃ dhyānaṃ tathā kurvanti yoginaḥc maharṣayo jñānatṛptā nirvāṇagatamānasāḥa nāvartante punaḥ pārtha muktāḥ saṃsāradoṣataḥc janmadoṣaparikṣīṇāḥ svabhāve paryavasthitāḥa nirdvaṃdvā nityasattvasthā vimuktā nityam āśritāḥc asaṅgīny avivādīni manaḥśāntikarāṇi caa tatra svādhyāyasaṃśliṣṭam ekāgraṃ dhārayen manaḥc piṇḍīkṛtyendriyagrāmam āsīnaḥ kāṣṭhavan muniḥa śabdaṃ na vindec chrotreṇa sparśaṃ tvacā na vedayetc rūpaṃ na cakṣuṣā vidyāj jihvayā na rasāṃs tathāa ghreyāṇy api ca sarvāṇi jahyād dhyānena yogavitc pañcavargapramāthīni necchec caitāni vīryavāna tato manasi saṃsajya pañcavargaṃ vicakṣaṇaḥc samādadhyān mano bhrāntam indriyaiḥ saha pañcabhiḥa visaṃcāri nirālambaṃ pañcadvāraṃ calācalamc pūrve dhyānapathe dhīraḥ samādadhyān mano ntarama indriyāṇi manaś caiva yadā piṇḍīkaroty ayamc eṣa dhyānapathaḥ pūrvo mayā samanuvarṇitaḥa tasya tat pūrvasaṃruddhaṃ manaḥṣaṣṭham anantaramc sphuriṣyati samudbhrāntaṃ vidyud ambudhare yathāa jalabindur yathā lolaḥ parṇasthaḥ sarvataś calaḥc evam evāsya tac cittaṃ bhavati dhyānavartmania samāhitaṃ kṣaṇaṃ kiṃ cid dhyānavartmani tiṣṭhatic punar vāyupathaṃ bhrāntaṃ mano bhavati vāyuvata anirvedo gatakleśo gatatandrīr amatsaraḥc samādadhyāt punaś ceto dhyānena dhyānayogavita vicāraś ca vitarkaś ca vivekaś copajāyatec muneḥ samādadhānasya prathamaṃ dhyānam āditaḥa manasā kliśyamānas tu samādhānaṃ ca kārayetc na nirvedaṃ munir gacchet kuryād evātmano hitama pāṃsubhasmakarīṣāṇāṃ yathā vai rāśayaś citāḥc sahasā vāriṇā siktā na yānti paribhāvanāma kiṃ cit snigdhaṃ yathā ca syāc chuṣkacūrṇam abhāvitamc kramaśas tu śanair gacchet sarvaṃ tat paribhāvanama evam evendriyagrāmaṃ śanaiḥ saṃparibhāvayetc saṃharet kramaśaś caiva sa samyak praśamiṣyatia svayam eva manaś caiva pañcavargaś ca bhāratac pūrvaṃ dhyānapathaṃ prāpya nityayogena śāmyatia na tat puruṣakāreṇa na ca daivena kena citc sukham eṣyati tat tasya yad evaṃ saṃyatātmanaḥa sukhena tena saṃyukto raṃsyate dhyānakarmaṇic gacchanti yogino hy evaṃ nirvāṇaṃ tan nirāmayam yudhiṣṭhira uvācaa cāturāśramyam uktaṃ te rājadharmās tathaiva cac nānāśrayāś ca bahava itihāsāḥ pṛthagvidhāḥa śrutās tvattaḥ kathāś caiva dharmayuktā mahāmatec saṃdeho sti tu kaś cin me tad bhavān vaktum arhatia jāpakānāṃ phalāvāptiṃ śrotum icchāmi bhāratac kiṃ phalaṃ japatām uktaṃ kva vā tiṣṭhanti jāpakāḥa japasya ca vidhiṃ kṛtsnaṃ vaktum arhasi me naghac jāpakā iti kiṃ caitat sāṃkhyayogakriyāvidhiḥa kiṃ yajñavidhir evaiṣa kim etaj japyam ucyatec etan me sarvam ācakṣva sarvajño hy asi me mataḥ bhīṣma uvācaa atrāpy udāharantīmam itihāsaṃ purātanamc yamasya yat purā vṛttaṃ kālasya brāhmaṇasya cad sāṃkhyayogau tu yāv uktau munibhir mokṣadarśibhiḥd ikṣvākoś caiva mṛtyoś ca vivādo dharmakāraṇāta saṃnyāsa eva vedānte vartate japanaṃ pratic vedavādābhinirvṛttā śāntir brahmaṇy avasthitaue mārgau tāv apy ubhāv etau saṃśritau na ca saṃśritaua yathā saṃśrūyate rājan kāraṇaṃ cātra vakṣyateb krameṇa caiṣa vihito japayajñavidhir nṛpab sālambanam iti jñeyaṃ japayajñātmakaṃ śubhamc manaḥsamādhir atrāpi tathendriyajayaḥ smṛtaḥa satyam agniparīcāro viviktānāṃ ca sevanamc dhyānaṃ tapo damaḥ kṣāntir anasūyā mitāśanama viṣayapratisaṃhāro mitajalpas tathā śamaḥc eṣa pravṛttako dharmo nivṛttakam atho śṛṇua yathā nivartate karma japato brahmacāriṇaḥb na japo na ca vai dhyānaṃ necchā na dveṣaharṣaṇaub yujyate nṛpaśārdūla susaṃvedyaṃ hi tat kilab japam āvartayan nityaṃ japan vai brahmacārikamb tadarthabuddhyā saṃyāti manasā jāpakaḥ paramb yathā saṃśrūyate jāpo yena vai jāpako bhavetb saṃhitāpraṇavenaiva sāvitrī ca parā matāb yad anyad ucitaṃ śuddhaṃ vedasmṛty upapāditamc etat sarvam aśeṣeṇa yathoktaṃ parivarjayete trividhaṃ mārgam āsādya vyaktāvyaktam anāśrayama kuśoccayaniṣaṇṇaḥ san kuśahastaḥ kuśaiḥ śikhīc cīraiḥ parivṛtas tasmin madhye channaḥ kuśais tathāa viṣayebhyo namaskuryād viṣayān na ca bhāvayetc sāmyam utpādya manaso manasy eva mano dadhata tad dhiyā dhyāyati brahma japan vai saṃhitāṃ hitāmc saṃnyasyaty atha vā tāṃ vai samādhau paryavasthitaḥa dhyānam utpādayaty atra saṃhitābalasaṃśrayātc śuddhātmā tapasā dānto nivṛttadveṣakāmavānd athābhimatamantreṇa praṇavādyaṃ japet kṛtīd yasminn evābhipatitaṃ manas tatra niveśayetd samādhau sa hi mantre tu saṃhitāṃ vā yathāvidhia arāgamoho nirdvaṃdvo na śocati na sajjatec na kartākaraṇīyānāṃ na kāryāṇām iti sthitiḥa na cāhaṃkārayogena manaḥ prasthāpayet kva citc na cātmagrahaṇe yukto nāvamānī na cākriyaḥa dhyānakriyāparo yukto dhyānavān dhyānaniścayaḥc dhyāne samādhim utpādya tad api tyajati kramāta sa vai tasyām avasthāyāṃ sarvatyāgakṛtaḥ sukhīc nirīhas tyajati prāṇān brāhmīṃ saṃśrayate tanumd nirālambo bhavet smṛtvā maraṇāya samādhimānd sarvāṃl lokān samākramya kramāt prāpnoti vai parama atha vā necchate tatra brahmakāyaniṣevaṇamc utkrāmati ca mārgastho naiva kva cana jāyatea ātmabuddhiṃ samāsthāya śāntībhūto nirāmayaḥc amṛtaṃ virajaḥśuddham ātmānaṃ pratipadyate yudhiṣṭhira uvācaa gatīnām uttamā prāptiḥ kathitā jāpakeṣv ihac ekaivaiṣā gatis teṣām uta yānty aparām api bhīṣma uvācaa śṛṇuṣvāvahito rājañ jāpakānāṃ gatiṃ vibhoc yathā gacchanti nirayam anekaṃ puruṣarṣabhaa yathoktam etat pūrvaṃ yo nānutiṣṭhati jāpakaḥc ekadeśakriyaś cātra nirayaṃ sa nigacchatia avajñānena kurute na tuṣyati na śocatic īdṛśo jāpako yāti nirayaṃ nātra saṃśayaḥa ahaṃkārakṛtaś caiva sarve nirayagāminaḥc parāvamānī puruṣo bhavitā nirayopagaḥa abhidhyāpūrvakaṃ japyaṃ kurute yaś ca mohitaḥc yatrābhidhyāṃ sa kurute taṃ vai nirayam ṛcchatia athaiśvaryapravṛttaḥ sañ jāpakas tatra rajyatec sa eva nirayas tasya nāsau tasmāt pramucyatea rāgeṇa jāpako japyaṃ kurute tatra mohitaḥc yatrāsya rāgaḥ patati tatra tatropajāyatea durbuddhir akṛtaprajñaś cale manasi tiṣṭhatic calām eva gatiṃ yāti nirayaṃ vādhigacchatia akṛtaprajñako bālo mohaṃ gacchati jāpakaḥc sa mohān nirayaṃ yāti tatra gatvānuśocatia dṛḍhagrāhī karomīti japyaṃ japati jāpakaḥc na saṃpūrṇo na vā yukto nirayaṃ so dhigacchati yudhiṣṭhira uvācaa animittaṃ paraṃ yat tad avyaktaṃ brahmaṇi sthitamc sadbhūto jāpakaḥ kasmāt sa śarīram athāviśet bhīṣma uvācaa duṣprajñānena nirayā bahavaḥ samudāhṛtāḥc praśastaṃ jāpakatvaṃ ca doṣāś caite tadātmakāḥ yudhiṣṭhira uvācaa kīdṛśo jāpako yāti nirayaṃ varṇayasva mec kautūhalaṃ hi me jātaṃ tad bhavān vaktum arhati bhīṣma uvācaa dharmasyāṃśaḥ prasūto si dharmiṣṭho si svabhāvataḥc dharmamūlāśrayaṃ vākyaṃ śṛṇuṣvāvahito naghaa amūni yāni sthānāni devānāṃ paramātmanāmc nānāsaṃsthānavarṇāni nānārūpaphalāni caa divyāni kāmacārīṇi vimānāni sabhās tathāc ākrīḍā vividhā rājan padminyaś cāmalodakāḥa caturṇāṃ lokapālānāṃ śukrasyātha bṛhaspateḥc marutāṃ viśvadevānāṃ sādhyānām aśvinor apia rudrādityavasūnāṃ ca tathānyeṣāṃ divaukasāmc ete vai nirayās tāta sthānasya paramātmanaḥa abhayaṃ cānimittaṃ ca na ca kleśabhayāvṛtamc dvābhyāṃ muktaṃ tribhir muktam aṣṭābhis tribhir eva caa caturlakṣaṇavarjaṃ tu catuṣkāraṇavarjitamc apraharṣam anānandam aśokaṃ vigataklamama kālaḥ saṃpacyate tatra na kālas tatra vai prabhuḥc sa kālasya prabhū rājan svargasyāpi tatheśvaraḥd etad vai brahmaṇaḥ sthānaṃ jāpakasya mahātmanaḥd tatrasthaṃ paramātmānaṃ dhyāyan vai susamāhitaḥd hiraṇyagarbhasāyujyaṃ prāpnuyād vā nṛpottamaa ātmakevalatāṃ prāptas tatra gatvā na śocatic īdṛśaṃ paramaṃ sthānaṃ nirayās te ca tādṛśāḥa ete te nirayāḥ proktāḥ sarva eva yathātathamc tasya sthānavarasyeha sarve nirayasaṃjñitāḥ yudhiṣṭhira uvācaa kālamṛtyuyamānāṃ ca brāhmaṇasya ca sattamac vivādo vyāhṛtaḥ pūrvaṃ tad bhavān vaktum arhati bhīṣma uvācaa atrāpy udāharantīmam itihāsaṃ purātanamc ikṣvākoḥ sūryaputrasya yad vṛttaṃ brāhmaṇasya caa kālasya mṛtyoś ca tathā yad vṛttaṃ tan nibodha mec yathā sa teṣāṃ saṃvādo yasmin sthāne pi cābhavatd yenaiva kāraṇenātra dharmavādasamanvitaḥa brāhmaṇo jāpakaḥ kaś cid dharmavṛtto mahāyaśāḥc ṣaḍaṅgavin mahāprājñaḥ paippalādiḥ sa kauśikaḥa tasyāparokṣaṃ vijñānaṃ ṣaḍaṅgeṣu tathaiva cac vedeṣu caiva niṣṇāto himavatpādasaṃśrayaḥa so ntyaṃ brāhmaṃ tapas tepe saṃhitāṃ saṃyato japanc tasya varṣasahasraṃ tu niyamena tathā gatama sa devyā darśitaḥ sākṣāt prītāsmīti tadā kilac japyam āvartayaṃs tūṣṇīṃ na ca tāṃ kiṃ cid abravīta tasyānukampayā devī prītā samabhavat tadāc vedamātā tatas tasya taj japyaṃ samapūjayatd caturbhir akṣarair yuktā somapāne kṣarāṣṭakād jagadbījasamāyuktā caturviṃśākṣarātmikāa samāptajapyas tūtthāya śirasā pādayos tathāc papāta devyā dharmātmā vacanaṃ cedam abravīta diṣṭyā devi prasannā tvaṃ darśanaṃ cāgatā mamac yadi vāpi prasannāsi japye me ramatāṃ manaḥ sāvitry uvācaa kiṃ prārthayasi viprarṣe kiṃ ceṣṭaṃ karavāṇi tec prabrūhi japatāṃ śreṣṭha sarvaṃ tat te bhaviṣyati bhīṣma uvācaa ity uktaḥ sa tadā devyā vipraḥ provāca dharmavitc japyaṃ prati mameccheyaṃ vardhatv iti punaḥ punaḥa manasaś ca samādhir me vardhetāhar ahaḥ śubhec tat tatheti tato devī madhuraṃ pratyabhāṣataa idaṃ caivāparaṃ prāha devī tatpriyakāmyayāc nirayaṃ naiva yātāsi yatra yātā dvijarṣabhāḥa yāsyasi brahmaṇaḥ sthānam animittam aninditamc sādhaye bhavitā caitad yat tvayāham ihārthitāa niyato japa caikāgro dharmas tvāṃ samupaiṣyatic kālo mṛtyur yamaś caiva samāyāsyanti te ntikame bhavitā ca vivādo tra tava teṣāṃ ca dharmataḥa evam uktvā bhagavatī jagāma bhavanaṃ svakamc brāhmaṇo pi japann āste divyaṃ varṣaśataṃ tadād sadā dānto jitakrodhaḥ satyasaṃdho nasūyakaḥa samāpte niyame tasminn atha viprasya dhīmataḥc sākṣāt prītas tadā dharmo darśayām āsa taṃ dvijam dharma uvācaa dvijāte paśya māṃ dharmam ahaṃ tvāṃ draṣṭum āgataḥc japyasya ca phalaṃ yat te saṃprāptaṃ tac ca me śṛṇua jitā lokās tvayā sarve ye divyā ye ca mānuṣāḥc devānāṃ nirayān sādho sarvān utkramya yāsyasia prāṇatyāgaṃ kuru mune gaccha lokān yathepsitānc tyaktvātmanaḥ śarīraṃ ca tato lokān avāpsyasi brāhmaṇa uvācaa kṛtaṃ lokair hi me dharma gaccha ca tvaṃ yathāsukhamc bahuduḥkhasukhaṃ dehaṃ notsṛjeyam ahaṃ vibhod acalaṃ te manaḥ kṛtvā tyaja dehaṃ mahāmated anena kiṃ te saṃyogaḥ kathaṃ mohaṃ gamiṣyasi dharma uvācaa avaśyaṃ bhoḥ śarīraṃ te tyaktavyaṃ munipuṃgavac svarga ārohyatāṃ vipra kiṃ vā te rocate nagha brāhmaṇa uvācaa na rocaye svargavāsaṃ vinā dehād ahaṃ vibhoc gaccha dharma na me śraddhā svargaṃ gantuṃ vinātmanā dharma uvācaa alaṃ dehe manaḥ kṛtvā tyaktvā dehaṃ sukhī bhavac gaccha lokān arajaso yatra gatvā na śocasi brāhmaṇa uvācaa rame japan mahābhāga kṛtaṃ lokaiḥ sanātanaiḥc saśarīreṇa gantavyo mayā svargo na vā vibhod evaṃ te kāryasaṃprītir vartate munisattama dharma uvācaa yadi tvaṃ necchasi tyaktuṃ śarīraṃ paśya vai dvijac eṣa kālas tathā mṛtyur yamaś ca tvām upāgatāḥ bhīṣma uvācaa atha vaivasvataḥ kālo mṛtyuś ca tritayaṃ vibhoc brāhmaṇaṃ taṃ mahābhāgam upāgamyedam abruvana tapaso sya sutaptasya tathā sucaritasya cac phalaprāptis tava śreṣṭhā yamo haṃ tvām upabruvea yathāvad asya japyasya phalaṃ prāptas tvam uttamamc kālas te svargam āroḍhuṃ kālo haṃ tvām upāgataḥa mṛtyuṃ mā viddhi dharmajña rūpiṇaṃ svayam āgatamc kālena coditaṃ vipra tvām ito netum adya vai brāhmaṇa uvācaa svāgataṃ sūryaputrāya kālāya ca mahātmanec mṛtyave cātha dharmāya kiṃ kāryaṃ karavāṇi vaḥ bhīṣma uvācaa arghyaṃ pādyaṃ ca dattvā sa tebhyas tatra samāgamec abravīt paramaprītaḥ svaśaktyā kiṃ karomi vaḥd svakāryanirbharā yūyaṃ paropadravahetavaḥd bhavanto lokasāmānyāḥ kimarthaṃ brūta sattamāḥd dharma uvācad vayam apy evam avyagrair dhātur ājñāpuraḥsaraiḥd bhīṣma uvācad coditā dhāvamānā vai karmabhāgam anuvratāḥa tasminn evātha kāle tu tīrthayātrām upāgataḥc ikṣvākur agamat tatra sametā yatra te vibhoa sarvān eva tu rājarṣiḥ saṃpūjyābhipraṇamya cac kuśalapraśnam akarot sarveṣāṃ rājasattamaḥa tasmai so thāsanaṃ dattvā pādyam arghyaṃ tathaiva cac abravīd brāhmaṇo vākyaṃ kṛtvā kuśalasaṃvidama svāgataṃ te mahārāja brūhi yad yad ihecchasic svaśaktyā kiṃ karomīha tad bhavān prabravītu me rājovācaa rājāhaṃ brāhmaṇaś ca tvaṃ yadi ṣaṭkarmasaṃsthitaḥc dadāmi vasu kiṃ cit te prārthitaṃ tad vadasva me brāhmaṇa uvācaa dvividhā brāhmaṇā rājan dharmaś ca dvividhaḥ smṛtaḥc pravṛttaś ca nivṛttaś ca nivṛtto smi pratigrahāta tebhyaḥ prayaccha dānāni ye pravṛttā narādhipac ahaṃ na pratigṛhṇāmi kim iṣṭaṃ kiṃ dadāni tee brūhi tvaṃ nṛpatiśreṣṭha tapasā sādhayāmi kim rājovācaa kṣatriyo haṃ na jānāmi dehīti vacanaṃ kva citc prayaccha yuddham ity evaṃ vādinaḥ smo dvijottama brāhmaṇa uvācaa tuṣyasi tvaṃ svadharmeṇa tathā tuṣṭā vayaṃ nṛpac anyonyasyottaraṃ nāsti yad iṣṭaṃ tat samācara rājovācaa svaśaktyāhaṃ dadānīti tvayā pūrvaṃ prabhāṣitamc yāce tvāṃ dīyatāṃ mahyaṃ japyasyāsya phalaṃ dvija brāhmaṇa uvācaa yuddhaṃ mama sadā vāṇī yācatīti vikatthasec na ca yuddhaṃ mayā sārdhaṃ kimarthaṃ yācase punaḥ rājovācaa vāgvajrā brāhmaṇāḥ proktāḥ kṣatriyā bāhujīvinaḥc vāgyuddhaṃ tad idaṃ tīvraṃ mama vipra tvayā saha brāhmaṇa uvācaa saivādyāpi pratijñā me svaśaktyā kiṃ pradīyatāmc brūhi dāsyāmi rājendra vibhave sati māciram rājovācaa yat tad varṣaśataṃ pūrṇaṃ japyaṃ vai japatā tvayāc phalaṃ prāptaṃ tat prayaccha mama ditsur bhavān yadi brāhmaṇa uvācaa paramaṃ gṛhyatāṃ tasya phalaṃ yaj japitaṃ mayāc ardhaṃ tvam avicāreṇa phalaṃ tasya samāpnuhia atha vā sarvam eveha japyakaṃ māmakaṃ phalamc rājan prāpnuhi kāmaṃ tvaṃ yadi sarvam ihecchasi rājovācaa kṛtaṃ sarveṇa bhadraṃ te japyaṃ yad yācitaṃ mayāc svasti te stu gamiṣyāmi kiṃ ca tasya phalaṃ vada brāhmaṇa uvācaa phalaprāptiṃ na jānāmi dattaṃ yaj japitaṃ mayāc ayaṃ dharmaś ca kālaś ca yamo mṛtyuś ca sākṣiṇaḥ rājovācaa ajñātam asya dharmasya phalaṃ me kiṃ kariṣyatib phalaṃ bravīṣi dharmasya na cej japyakṛtasya māmc prāpnotu tat phalaṃ vipro nāham icche sasaṃśayam brāhmaṇa uvācaa nādade paravaktavyaṃ dattaṃ vācā phalaṃ mayāc vākyaṃ pramāṇaṃ rājarṣe mamāpi tava caiva hid sakṛd aṃśo nipatati sakṛt kanyā pradīyated sakṛd eva dadānīti trīṇy etāni sakṛt sakṛta nābhisaṃdhir mayā japye kṛtapūrvaḥ kathaṃ canac japyasya rājaśārdūla kathaṃ jñāsyāmy ahaṃ phalama dadasveti tvayā coktaṃ dadāmīti tathā mayāc na vācaṃ dūṣayiṣyāmi satyaṃ rakṣa sthiro bhavaa athaivaṃ vadato me dya vacanaṃ na kariṣyasic mahān adharmo bhavitā tava rājan mṛṣākṛtaḥa na yuktaṃ tu mṛṣā vāṇī tvayā vaktum ariṃdamac tathā mayāpy abhyadhikaṃ mṛṣā vaktuṃ na śakyatea saṃśrutaṃ ca mayā pūrvaṃ dadānīty avicāritamc tad gṛhṇīṣvāvicāreṇa yadi satye sthito bhavāna ihāgamya hi māṃ rājañ jāpyaṃ phalam ayācithāḥc tan mannisṛṣṭaṃ gṛhṇīṣva bhava satye sthiro pi caa nāyaṃ loko sti na paro na ca pūrvān sa tārayetc kuta satyān na viśiṣyatea satyam ekākṣaraṃ brahma satyam ekākṣaraṃ tapaḥc satyam ekākṣaro yajñaḥ satyam ekākṣaraṃ śrutama satyaṃ vedeṣu jāgarti phalaṃ satye paraṃ smṛtamc satyād dharmo damaś caiva sarvaṃ satye pratiṣṭhitama satyaṃ vedās tathāṅgāni satyaṃ yajñas tathā vidhiḥc vratacaryās tathā satyam oṃkāraḥ satyam eva caa prāṇināṃ jananaṃ satyaṃ satyaṃ saṃtatir eva cac satyena vāyur abhyeti satyena tapate raviḥa satyena cāgnir dahati svargaḥ satye pratiṣṭhitaḥc satyaṃ yajñas tapo vedāḥ stobhā mantrāḥ sarasvatīa tulām āropito dharmaḥ satyaṃ caiveti naḥ śrutamc samāṃ kakṣāṃ dhārayato yataḥ satyaṃ tato dhikama yato dharmas tataḥ satyaṃ sarvaṃ satyena vardhatec kimartham anṛtaṃ karma kartuṃ rājaṃs tvam icchasia satye kuru sthiraṃ bhāvaṃ mā rājann anṛtaṃ kṛthāḥc kasmāt tvam anṛtaṃ vākyaṃ dehīti kuruṣe śubhama yadi japyaphalaṃ dattaṃ mayā neṣiṣyase nṛpac svadharmebhyaḥ paribhraṣṭo lokān anucariṣyasia saṃśrutya yo na ditseta yācitvā yaś ca necchatic ubhāv ānṛtikāv etau na mṛṣā kartum arhasi rājovācaa yoddhavyaṃ rakṣitavyaṃ ca kṣatradharmaḥ kila dvijac dātāraḥ kṣatriyāḥ proktā gṛhṇīyāṃ bhavataḥ katham brāhmaṇa uvācaa na chandayāmi te rājan nāpi te gṛham āvrajamc ihāgamya tu yācitvā na prasāritaḥc nivṛttilakṣaṇaṃ dharmam upāse saṃhitāṃ japana nivṛttaṃ māṃ ciraṃ rājan vipraṃ lobhayase kathamc svena kāryaṃ kariṣyāmi tvatto necche phalaṃ nṛpae tapaḥsvādhyāyaśīlo haṃ nivṛttaś ca pratigrahāt rājovācaa yadi vipra nisṛṣṭaṃ te japyasya phalam uttamamc āvayor yat phalaṃ kiṃ cit sahitaṃ nau tad astv ihaa dvijāḥ pratigrahe yuktā dātāro rājavaṃśajāḥc yadi dharmaḥ śruto vipra sahaiva phalam astu naua mā vā bhūt sahabhojyaṃ nau madīyaṃ phalam āpnuhic pratīccha matkṛtaṃ dharmaṃ yadi te mayy anugrahaḥ bhīṣma uvācaa tato vikṛtaceṣṭau dvau puruṣau samupasthitauc gṛhītvānyonyam āveṣṭya kucelāv ūcatur vacaḥa na me dhārayasīty eko dhārayāmīti cāparaḥc ihāsti nau vivādo yam ayaṃ rājānuśāsakaḥa satyaṃ bravīmy aham idaṃ na me dhārayate bhavānc anṛtaṃ vadasīha tvam ṛṇaṃ te dhārayāmy ahama tāv ubhau bhṛśasaṃtaptau rājānam idam ūcatuḥc parīkṣyatāṃ yathā syāva nāvām iha vigarhitau virūpa uvācaa dhārayāmi naravyāghra vikṛtasyeha goḥ phalamc dadataś ca na gṛhṇāti vikṛto me mahīpate vikṛta uvācaa na me dhārayate kiṃ cid virūpo yaṃ narādhipac mithyā bravīty ayaṃ hi tvā mithyābhāsaṃ narādhipa rājovācaa virūpa kiṃ dhārayate bhavān asya vadasva mec śrutvā tathā kariṣyāmīty evaṃ me dhīyate matiḥ virūpa uvācaa śṛṇuṣvāvahito rājan yathaitad dhārayāmy ahamc vikṛtasyāsya rājarṣe nikhilena nararṣabhaa anena dharmaprāptyarthaṃ śubhā dattā purānaghac dhenur viprāya rājarṣe tapaḥsvādhyāyaśīlinea tasyāś cāyaṃ mayā rājan phalam abhyetya yācitaḥc vikṛtena ca me dattaṃ viśūddhenāntarātmanāa tato me sukṛtaṃ karma kṛtam ātmaviśuddhayec gāvau hi kapile krītvā vatsale rājovācaa dīyamānaṃ na gṛhṇāsi ṛṇaṃ kasmāt tvam adya vaic yathaiva te bhyanujñātaṃ tathā gṛhṇīṣva māciram vikṛta uvācaa dīyatām ity anenoktaṃ dadānīti tathā mayāc nāyaṃ me dhārayaty atra gamyatāṃ yatra vāñchati rājovācaa dadato sya na gṛhṇāsi viṣamaṃ pratibhāti mec daṇḍyo hi tvaṃ mama mato nāsty atra khalu saṃśayaḥ vikṛta uvācaa mayāsya dattaṃ rājarṣe gṛhṇīyāṃ tat kathaṃ punaḥc kāmam pṛthivyāstejomayaṃ rūpam atho vipākaḥc jalāśrayaḥ sveda ukto rasaś cavāyvātmakaḥ sparśakṛto guṇaś caa mahatsu bhūteṣu vasanti pañcapañcendriyārthāś ca tathendriyeṣuc sarvāṇi caitāni manonugānibuddhiṃ paramaḥ svabhāvaḥa yathendriyārthān yugapat samastānnāvekṣate kṛtsnam atulyakālamc yathābalaṃ saṃcarate sa vidvāṃstasmāt sa ekaḥ paramaḥ śarīrīa rajas tamaḥ sattvam atho tṛtīyaṃgacchaty asau indriyendriyamc na śrotraliṅgaṃ śravaṇe nidarśanaṃtathāgataṃ paśyati tad vinaśyatia śrotrādīni na paśyanti svaṃ svam ātmānam ātmanāc sarvajñaḥ sarvadarśī ca kṣetrajñas tāni paśyatia yathā himavataḥ pārśvaṃ pṛṣṭhaṃ candramaso yathāc na dṛṣṭapūrvaṃ manujair na ca tan nāsti tāvatāa tadvad bhūteṣu bhūtātmā sūkṣmo jñānātmavān asauc adṛṣṭapūrvaś cakṣurbhyāṃ na cāsau nāsti tāvatāa paśyann api yathā indriyāṇy apic tathaiveha parā buddhiḥ paraṃ buddhyā na paśyatia yathā candro hy amāvāsyām aliṅgatvān na dṛśyatec na ca nāśo sya bhavati tathā viddhi śarīriṇama kṣīṇakośo hy amāvāsyāṃ candramā na prakāśatec tadvan mūrtiviyuktaḥ sañ śarīrī nopalabhyatea yathā kośāntaraṃ prāpya candramā bhrājate punaḥc tadval liṅgāntaraṃ prāpya śarīrī bhrājate punaḥa janmavṛddhikṣayaś cāsya pratyakṣeṇopalabhyatec sā tu candramaso vyaktir na tu tasya śarīriṇaḥa utpattivṛddhivyayato yathā sa iti gṛhyatec candra eva tv amāvāsyāṃ tathā bhavati mūrtimāna nābhisarpad vimuñcad vā śaśinaṃ dṛśyate tamaḥc visṛjaṃś copasarpaṃś ca tadvat paśya śarīriṇama yathā candrārkasaṃyuktaṃ tamas tad upalabhyatec tadvac charīrasaṃyuktaḥ śarīrīty upalabhyatea yathā candrārkanirmuktaḥ sa rāhur nopalabhyatec tadvac charīranirmuktaḥ śarīrī nopalabhyatea yathā candro hy amāvāsyāṃ nakṣatrair yujyate gataḥc tadvac charīranirmuktaḥ phalair yujyati karmaṇaḥ manur uvācaa yathā vyaktam idaṃ śete svapne carati cetanamc jñānam indriyasaṃyuktaṃ tadvat pretya bhavābhavaua yathāmbhasi prasanne tu rūpaṃ paśyati cakṣuṣāc tadvat prasannendriyavāñ jñeyaṃ jñānena paśyatia sa eva lulite tasmin yathā rūpaṃ na paśyatic tathendriyākulībhāve jñeyaṃ jñāne na paśyatia abuddhir ajñānakṛtā abuddhyā duṣyate manaḥc duṣṭasya manasaḥ pañca saṃpraduṣyanti mānasāḥa ajñānatṛpto viṣayeṣv avagāḍho na dṛśyatec adṛṣṭvaiva tu pūtātmā viṣayebhyo nivartatea tarṣacchedo na bhavati puruṣasyeha kalmaṣātc nivartate tathā tarṣaḥ pāpam antaṃ gataṃ yathād antargatena pāpena dahyamānena cetasād śubhāśubhavikāreṇa na sa bhūyo bhijāyatea viṣayeṣu ca saṃsargāc chāśvatasya nasaṃśrayātc manasā cānyad ākāṅkṣan paraṃ na pratipadyatea jñānam utpadyate puṃsāṃ kṣayāt pāpasya karmaṇaḥc athādarśatalaprakhye paśyaty ātmānam ātmania prasṛtair indriyair duḥkhī tair eva niyataiḥ sukhīc tasmād indriyarūpebhyo yacched ātmānam ātmanāa indriyebhyo manaḥ pūrvaṃ buddhiḥ paratarā tataḥc buddheḥ parataraṃ jñānaṃ jñānāt parataraṃ kūrmavatc vimuñcaty ākṛtigrāmāṃs tān muktvāmṛtam aśnutea udyan hi savitā yadvat sṛjate raśmimaṇḍalamb dṛśyate maṇḍalaṃ tasya na ca dṛśyeta maṇḍalīb tadvad dehas tu saṃdṛśya ātmādṛśyaḥ paraḥ sadāb pralayaṃ gatama asparśanam aśṛṇvānam anāsvādam adarśanamc aghrāṇam avitarkaṃ ca sattvaṃ praviśate paramd avyaktāt prasṛtaṃ jñānaṃ tato buddhis tato manaḥd ātmanaḥ prasṛtā buddhir avyaktaṃ jñānam ucyated tasmād buddhiḥ smṛtā tajjñair manas tasmāt tataḥ smṛtamd tasmād ākṛtayaḥ pañca manaḥ paramam ucyated tasmāt paratarā buddhir jñānaṃ tasmāt paraṃ smṛtamd tataḥ sūkṣmas tato hy ātmā tasmāt parataraṃ na cad indriyāṇi nirīkṣante manasaitāni sarvaśaḥa manasy ākṛtayo magnā manas tv atigataṃ matimc matis tv atigatā jñānaṃ jñānaṃ tv abhigataṃ parama indriyair manasaḥ siddhir na buddhiṃ budhyate manaḥc na buddhir budhyate vyaktaṃ sūkṣmas tv etāni paśyati manur uvāca duḥkhopaghāte śārīre mānase cāpy upasthite yasmin na śakyate kartuṃ yatnas taṃ nānucintayet bhaiṣajyam etad duḥkhasya yad etan nānucintayet cintyamānaṃ hi cābhyeti bhūyaś cāpi pravartate prajñayā mānasaṃ duḥkhaṃ hanyāc chārīram auṣadhaiḥ etad vijñānasāmarthyaṃ na bālaiḥ samatām iyāt anityaṃ yauvanaṃ rūpaṃ jīvitaṃ dravyasaṃcayaḥ ārogyaṃ priyasaṃvāso gṛdhyet tatra na paṇḍitaḥ na jānapadikaṃ duḥkham ekaḥ śocitum arhati aśocan pratikurvīta yadi paśyed upakramam sukhād bahutaraṃ duḥkhaṃ jīvite nāsti saṃśayaḥ snigdhasya cendriyārtheṣu mohān maraṇam apriyam parityajati yo duḥkhaṃ sukhaṃ vāpy ubhayaṃ naraḥ abhyeti brahma so tyantaṃ na te śocanti paṇḍitāḥ duḥkham arthā hi yujyante pālane na ca te sukham duḥkhena cādhigamyante nāśam eṣāṃ na cintayeta jñānaṃ jñeyābhinirvṛttaṃ viddhi jñānaguṇaṃ manaḥc prajñākaraṇasaṃyuktaṃ tato buddhiḥ pravartatea yadā karmaguṇopetā buddhir manasi vartatec tadā prajñāyate brahma dhyānayogasamādhināa seyaṃ guṇavatī buddhir guṇeṣv evābhivartatec avatārābhiniḥsrotaṃ gireḥ śṛṅgād ivodakama yadā nirguṇam āpnoti dhyānaṃ manasi pūrvajamc tadā prajñāyate brahma nikaṣyaṃ nikaṣe yathāa manas tv apahṛtaṃ buddhim indriyārthanidarśanamc na samakṣaṃ guṇāvekṣi nirguṇasya nidarśanama sarvāṇy etāni saṃvārya dvārāṇi manasi sthitaḥc manasy ekāgratāṃ kṛtvā tat paraṃ pratipadyatea yathā mahānti bhūtāni nivartante guṇakṣayec tathendriyāṇy upādāya buddhir manasi vartatea yadā manasi sā buddhir vartate ntaracāriṇīc vyavasāyaguṇopetā tadā saṃpadyate manaḥa guṇavadbhir guṇopetaṃ yadā dhyānaguṇaṃ manaḥc tadā sarvaguṇān hitvā nirguṇaṃ pratipadyatea avyaktasyeha vijñāne nāsti tulyaṃ nidarśanamc yatra nāsti padanyāsaḥ kas taṃ viṣayam āpnuyāta tapasā cānumānena guṇair jātyā śrutena cac ninīṣet tat paraṃ brahma viśuddhenāntarātmanāa guṇahīno hi taṃ mārgaṃ bahiḥ samanuvartatec guṇābhāvāt prakṛtyā ca nistarkyaṃ jñeyasaṃmitama nairguṇyād brahma cāpnoti saguṇatvān nivartatec guṇaprasāriṇī buddhir hutāśana ivendhanea yathā pañca vimuktāni indriyāṇi svakarmabhiḥc tathā tat paramaṃ brahma vimuktaṃ prakṛteḥ parama evaṃ prakṛtitaḥ sarve prabhavanti śarīriṇaḥc nivartante nivṛttau ca sargaṃ naivopayānti caa puruṣaḥ prakṛtir buddhir viśeṣāś cendriyāṇi cac ahaṃkāro bhimānaś ca saṃbhūto bhūtasaṃjñakaḥa ekasyādyā pravṛttis tu pradhānāt saṃpravartatec dvitīyā mithunavyaktim aviśeṣān niyacchatia dharmād utkṛṣyate śreyas tathāśreyo py adharmataḥc rāgavān prakṛtiṃ hy eti virakto jñānavān bhavet manur uvāca tad eva satataṃ manye na śakyam anuvarṇitum yathānidarśanaṃ vastu na śakyam anubodhitum yathā hi sāraṃ jānāti na kathaṃ cana saṃsthitam parakāyacchavis tadvad dehe yaṃ cetanas tathā vinā kāyaṃ na sā chāyā tāṃ vinā kāyam asty uta tadvad eva vinā nāsti prakṛter iha vartanam idaṃ vinā paraṃ nāsti nedam asti paraṃ vinā jīvātmanā tv asau chinnas tv eṣa caiva parātmanā tat tatheti viduḥ ke cid atathyam iti cāpare ubhayaṃ me mataṃ vidvan muktihetau samāhitam vimuktaiś ca mṛgaḥ so pi dṛśyate saṃyatendriyaḥ sarveṣāṃ na hi dṛśyo hi taḍidvat sphurati hy asau brāhmaṇasya samādṛśyo vartate so pi kiṃ punaḥ vidyate paramaḥ śuddhaḥ sākṣibhūto vibhāvasuḥ śrutir eṣā tato nityā tasmād ekaḥ paro mataḥ na prayojanam uddiśya ceṣṭā tasya mahātmanaḥ tādṛśo stv iti mantavyas tathā satyaṃ mahātmanā nānāsaṃsthena bhedena sadā gativibhedavat tasya bhedaḥ samākhyāto bhedo hy asti tathāvidhaḥ evaṃ vidvan vijānīhi paramātmānam avyayam tattadguṇaviśeṣeṇa saṃjñānām anusaṃyutam sarveśvaraḥ sarvamayaḥ sa ca sarvapravartakaḥ sarvātmakaḥ sarvaśaktiḥ sarvakāraṇakāraṇam sarvasādhāraṇaḥ sarvair upāsyaś ca mahātmabhiḥ vāsudeveti vikhyātas taṃ viditvāśnute mṛtama yadā te pañcabhiḥ pañca vimuktā manasā sahac atha tad drakṣyase brahma maṇau sūtram ivārpitama tad eva ca yathā sūtraṃ suvarṇe vartate punaḥc muktāsv atha pravāleṣu mṛnmaye rājate tathāa tadvad goṣu manuṣyeṣu tadvad dhastimṛgādiṣuc tadvat kīṭapataṃgeṣu prasaktātmā svakarmabhiḥa yena lipsāpūrvābhisaṃdhitāc abhisaṃdhipūrvakaṃ karma karmamūlaṃ tataḥ phalama phalaṃ karmātmakaṃ vidyāt karma jñeyātmakaṃ tathāc jñeyaṃ jñānātmakaṃ vidyāj jñānaṃ sadasadātmakamd tad evam iṣyate brahma saṃkhyānād vinibhidyatea jñānānāṃ ca phalānāṃ ca jñeyānāṃ karmaṇāṃ tathāc kṣayānte tat phalaṃ divyaṃ jñānaṃ jñeyapratiṣṭhitama mahad dhi paramaṃ bhūtaṃ yuktāḥ paśyanti yoginaḥc abudhās taṃ na paśyanti hy ātmasthā guṇabuddhayaḥa pṛthivīrūpato rūpam apām iha mahattaramc adbhyo mahattaraṃ tejas tejasaḥ pavano mahāna pavanāc ca mahad vyoma tasmāt parataraṃ manaḥc manaso mahatī buddhir buddheḥ kālo mahān smṛtaḥa kālāt sa bhagavān viṣṇur yasya sarvam idaṃ jagatc nādir na madhyaṃ naivāntas tasya devasya vidyatea anāditvād amadhyatvād anantatvāc ca so vyayaḥc atyeti sarvaduḥkhāni duḥkhaṃ hy antavad ucyatea tad brahma paramaṃ proktaṃ tad dhāma paramaṃ smṛtamc tad gatvā kālaviṣayād vimuktā mokṣam āśritāḥa guṇais tv etaiḥ prakāśante nirguṇatvāt tataḥ paramc nivṛttilakṣaṇo dharmas tathānantyāya kalpatea ṛco yajūṃṣi sāmāni śarīrāṇi vyapāśritāḥc jihvāgreṣu pravartante yatnasādhyā vināśinaḥa na caivam iṣyate brahma śarīrāśrayasaṃbhavamc na yatnasādhyaṃ tad brahma nādimadhyaṃ na cāntavata ṛcām ādis tathā sāmnāṃ yajuṣām ādir ucyatec antaś cādimatāṃ dṛṣṭo na cādir brahmaṇaḥ smṛtaḥa anāditvād anantatvāt tad anantam athāvyayamc avyayatvāc ca nirdvaṃdvaṃ dvaṃdvābhāvāt tataḥ parama adṛṣṭato nupāyāc ca apy abhisaṃdheś ca karmaṇaḥc na tena martyāḥ paśyanti yena gacchanti tat parama viṣayeṣu ca saṃsargāc chāśvatasya ca darśanātc manasā cānyad ākāṅkṣan paraṃ na pratipadyatea guṇān yad iha paśyanti tad icchanty apare janāḥc paraṃ naivābhikāṅkṣanti nirguṇatvād guṇārthinaḥa guṇair yas tv avarair yuktaḥ kathaṃ vidyād guṇān imānc anumānād dhi gantavyaṃ guṇair avayavaiḥ sahaa sūkṣmeṇa manasā vidmo vācā vaktuṃ na śaknumaḥc mano hi manasā grāhyaṃ darśanena ca darśanama jñānena nirmalīkṛtya buddhiṃ buddhyā tathā manaḥc manasā cendriyagrāmam anantaṃ pratipadyatea buddhiprahīṇo manasāsamṛddhastathā nirāśīr guṇatām upaitic paraṃ tyajantīha vilobhyamānāhutāśanaṃ vāyur ivendhanasthama guṇādāne viprayoge ca teṣāṃmanaḥ sadā buddhiparāvarābhyāmc anenaiva vidhinā saṃpravṛttoguṇādāne brahmaśarīram etia avyaktātmā puruṣo vyaktakarmāso vyaktatvaṃ gacchati hy antakālec tair evāyaṃ cendriyair vardhamānairglāyadbhir vā vartate karmarūpaḥa sarvair ayaṃ cendriyaiḥ saṃprayuktodehaḥ prāptaḥ pañcabhūtāśrayaḥ syātc nāsāmarthyād gacchati karmaṇehahīnas tena parameṇāvyayenaa pṛthvyā naraḥ paśyati nāntam asyāhy antaś cāsyā bhavitā ceti viddhic paraṃ nayantīha vilobhyamānaṃyathā plavaṃ vāyur ivārṇavasthama divākaro guṇam upalabhya nirguṇoyathā bhaved vyapagataraśmimaṇḍalaḥc tathā hy asau munir iha nirviśeṣavānsa nirguṇaṃ praviśati brahma cāvyayama anāgatiṃ saṃsāracakre lokānāṃ nirvedo nāsti kiṃ nv idamd bhīṣma uvācad atrāpy udāharantīmam itihāsaṃ purātanamd nibandhanasya saṃvādaṃ bhogavatyā nṛpottamad muniṃ nibandhanaṃ śuṣkaṃ dhamanīyākṛtiṃ tathād nirārambhaṃ nirālambam asajjantaṃ ca karmaṇid putraṃ dṛṣṭvāpy uvācārtaṃ mātā bhogavatī tadād uttiṣṭha mūḍha kiṃ śeṣe nirapekṣaḥ suhṛjjanaiḥd nirālambo dhanopāye paitṛkaṃ tava kiṃ dhanamd nibandhana uvācad paitṛkaṃ me mahan mātaḥ sarvaduḥkhālayaṃ tv ihad asty etat tadvighātāya yatiṣye tatra mā śucaḥd idaṃ śarīram atyugraṃ pitrā dattam asaṃśayamd tam eva pitaraṃ gatvā dhanaṃ tiṣṭhati śāśvatamd kaś cin mahati saṃsāre vartamāno dhanecchayād vanadurgam abhiprāpto mahat kravyādasaṃkulamd siṃhavyāghragajākārair atighorair mahāśanaiḥd samantāt suparikṣiptaṃ sa dṛṣṭvā vyathate pumānd sa tad vanaṃ hy anucaran vipradhāvann itas tataḥd vīkṣamāṇo diśaḥ sarvāḥ śaraṇārthaṃ pradhāvatid athāpaśyad vanaṃ rūḍhaṃ samantād vāgurāvṛtamd vanamadhye ca tatrāsīd udapānaḥ samāvṛtaḥd vallibhis tṛṇasaṃchinnair gūḍhābhir abhisaṃvṛtaḥd sa papāta dvijas tatra vijane salilāśayed vilagnaś cābhavat tasmiṃl latāsaṃtānasaṃkuled bāhubhyāṃ saṃpariṣvaktas tayā paramasattvayād sa tathā lambate tatra ūrdhvapādo hy adhaḥśirāḥd adhas tatraiva jātaś ca jambūvṛkṣaḥ sudustaraḥd kūpasya tasya velāyā apaśyat sumahāphalamd vṛkṣaṃ bahuvidhaṃ vyomavallīpuṣpasamākulamd nānārūpā madhukarās tasmin vṛkṣe bhavan kilad teṣāṃ madhūnāṃ bahudhā dhārā pravavṛte tadād vilambamānaḥ sa pumān dhārāṃ pibati sarvadād na tasya tṛṣṇā viratā pīyamānasya saṃkaṭed parīpsati ca tāṃ nityam atṛptaḥ sa punaḥ punaḥd evaṃ sa vasate tatra duḥkhiduḥkhī punaḥ punaḥd mayā tu tad dhanaṃ deyaṃ tava dāsyāmi cecchasid tasya ca prārthitaḥ so tha dattvā muktim avāpa saḥd sā ca tyaktvārthasaṃkalpaṃ jagāma paramāṃ gatimd evaṃ saṃsāracakrasya svarūpajñā nṛpottamad yudhiṣṭhira uvācad paraṃ vairāgyam āgamya gacchanti paramaṃ padamd evaṃ saṃsāracakrasya svarūpaṃ viditaṃ na med paitṛkaṃ tu dhanaṃ proktaṃ kiṃ tad vidvan mahātmanād kāntāram iti kiṃ proktaṃ ko hastī sa tu kūpakaḥd kiṃsaṃjñiko mahāvṛkṣo madhu vāpi pitāmahad etaṃ me saṃśayaṃ viddhi dhanaśabdaṃ kim ucyated bhīṣma uvācad kathaṃ labdhaṃ dhanaṃ tena tathā ca kim idaṃ tv ihad upākhyānam idaṃ sarvaṃ mokṣavidbhir udāhṛtamd sumatiṃ vindate yena bandhanāśaś ca bhāratad etad uktaṃ hi kāntāraṃ mahān saṃsāra eva saḥd ye te pratiṣṭhitā vyālā vyādhayas te prakīrtitāḥd yā sā nārī mahāghorā varṇarūpavināśinīd tām āhuś ca jarāṃ prājñāḥ pariṣvaktaṃ yayā jagatd yas tatra kūpe vasate mahāhiḥ kāla eva saḥd yo vṛkṣaḥ sa ca mṛtyur hi svakṛtaṃ tasya tat phalamd ye tu kṛṣṇāḥ sitā rājan mūṣikā rātryahāni vaid dviṣaṭkapadasaṃyukto yo hastī ṣaṇmukhākṛtiḥd sa ca saṃvatsaraḥ proktaḥ pādamāsartavo mukhāḥd etat saṃsāracakrasya svarūpaṃ vyāhṛtaṃ mayād evaṃ labdhadhanaṃ rājaṃs tat svarūpaṃ vināśayad etaj jñātvā tu sā rājan paraṃ vairāgyam āsthitād yathoktavidhinā bhūyaḥ paraṃ padam avāpa saḥd dhatte dhārayate caiva etasmāt kāraṇād dhanamd tad gaccha cāmṛtaṃ śuddhaṃ hiraṇyam amṛtaṃ prajānāṃ bharatarṣabhac ke carṣayo mahābhāgā dikṣu pratyekaśaḥ smṛtāḥ bhīṣma uvācaa śrūyatāṃ bharataśreṣṭha yan mā tvaṃ paripṛcchasic prajānāṃ patayo ye sma dikṣu pratyekaśaḥ smṛtāḥa ekaḥ svayaṃbhūr vaṃśaḥ prajāpateḥa ete prajānāṃ patayaḥ samuddiṣṭā yaśasvinaḥb śaśabindus tu rājarṣir mahāyogī mahāmanāḥb adhyātmavit sahasrāṇāṃ bhāryāṇāṃ daśamadhyagaḥb sa yogī yogam āpannas tataḥ sāyujyatāṃ gataḥc ahirbudhnyo virūpākṣo tha raivataḥa haraś ca bahurūpaś ca tryambakaś ca sureśvaraḥc sāvitraś ca jayantaś ca pinākī cāparājitaḥd ekādaśaite kathitā rudrās tribhuvaneśvarāḥd dharo dhruvaś ca somaś ca sattvam amānuṣamc prasahya sahasā sarve saṃtasthuḥ kālamohitāḥa sarve ca samabhidrutya varāhaṃ jagṛhuḥ samamc saṃkruddhāś ca varāhaṃ taṃ vyakarṣanta samantataḥa dānavendrā mahākāyā mahāvīryā balocchritāḥc nāśaknuvaṃś ca kiṃ cit te tasya kartuṃ tadā vibhoa tato gaman vismayaṃ te dānavendrā bhayāt tadāc saṃśayaṃ gatam ātmānaṃ menire ca sahasraśaḥa tato devādidevaḥ sa yogātmā yogasārathiḥc yogam āsthāya bhagavāṃs tadā bharatasattamaa vinanāda mahānādaṃ kṣobhayan daityadānavānc saṃnāditā yena lokāḥ sarvāś caiva diśo daśaa tena saṃnādaśabdena lokāḥ saṃkṣobham āgamanc saṃbhrāntāś ca diśaḥ sarvā devāḥ śakrapurogamāḥa nirviceṣṭaṃ jagac cāpi babhūvātibhṛśaṃ tadāc sthāvaraṃ jaṅgamaṃ caiva tena nādena mohitama tatas te dānavāḥ sarve tena śabdena bhīṣitāḥc petur gatāsavaś caiva viṣṇutejovimohitāḥd trastāṃś ca devān ālokya brahmā prāha pitāmahaḥd yogeśvaro yaṃ bhagavān vārāhaṃ rūpam āsthitaḥd nardamāno tra saṃyāti mā bhaiṣṭa surasattamāḥd evam uktvā tato brahmā namaścakre pitāmahaḥd devatā munayaś caiva viṣṇuṃ vai muktihetaved tato harir mahātejā brahmāṇam abhinandya caa rasātalagatāṃś caiva varāhas tridaśadviṣaḥc khuraiḥ saṃdārayām āsa māṃsamedosthisaṃcayama nādena cakraṃ snigdhākṣaṃ vartate dhruvama snigdhatvāt tilavat sarvaṃ cakre smin pīḍyate jagatc tilapīḍair ivākramya bhogair ajñānasaṃbhavaiḥd prāṇenāyaṃ hi śānte tu virodhāt pratipālanamd dehasyeṣūn ya āste ādhiyantranipīḍited bahiś cādhiṣṭhite yadvaj jñānināṃ karmasaṃbhavama karma tat kurute tarṣād ahaṃkāraparigrahamc kāryakāraṇasaṃyoge sa hetur upapāditaḥd yathākarṇya ca tac chiṣyas tattvajñānam anuttamama nātyeti kāraṇaṃ kāryaṃ na kāryaṃ kāraṇaṃ tathāc kāryāṇāṃ tūpakaraṇe kālo bhavati hetumāna hetuyuktāḥ prakṛtayo vikārāś ca parasparamc anyonyam abhivartante puruṣādhiṣṭhitāḥ sadāa sarajas bhūtagrāmam udāhṛtamb avyaktasya guṇebhyas tu tadguṇāṃś ca nibodha tānc prītiduḥkhanibaddhāṃś ca samastāṃs trīn atho guṇāne sattvasya rajasaś caiva tamasaś ca nibodha tāna pramoho harṣajaḥ prītir
