brahma nirmalaṃ jagataḥ paramd svātmaprakāśam agrāhyam ahetukam acañcalamd vivekajñānavācistho hy āśurūpeṇa saṃsthitaḥd vaikārikāt pradṛśyete gairike madhudhāravata yaś cainaṃ paramaṃ dharmaṃ sarvabhūtasukhāvahamc duḥkhān niḥsaraṇaṃ veda sa tattvajñaḥ sukhī bhaveta tasmāt samāhitaṃ buddhyā mano bhūteṣu dhārayetc nāpadhyāyen na spṛhayen nābaddhaṃ cintayed asata avāgyogaprayogeṇa manojñaṃ saṃpravartatec vivakṣatā vā sadvākyaṃ dharmaṃ sūkṣmam avekṣatāe satyāṃ vācam ahiṃsrāṃ ca vaded anapavādinīma kalkāpetām aparuṣām anṛśaṃsām apaiśunāmc īdṛg alpaṃ ca vaktavyam avikṣiptena cetasāa vākprabuddho hi saṃrāgād virāgād vyāhared yadic buddhyā hy anigṛhītena manasā karma tāmasame rajobhūtair hi karaṇaiḥ karmaṇā pratipadyatea sa duḥkhaṃ prāpya loke smin narakāyopapadyatec tasmān manovākśarīrair ācared dhairyam ātmanaḥa prakīrṇameṣabhāro hi yadvad dhāryeta dasyubhiḥc pratilomāṃ diśaṃ buddhvā saṃsāram abudhās tathād saṃsāramārgam āpannaḥ pratilomaṃ vivarjayeta tān eva ca yathā dasyūn kṣiptvā gacchec chivāṃ diśamc tathā rajastamaḥkarmāṇy utsṛjya prāpnuyāt sukhama niḥsaṃdigdham anīho vai muktaḥ sarvaparigrahaiḥc viviktacārī laghvāśī tapasvī niyatendriyaḥa jñānadagdhaparikleśaḥ prayogaratir ātmavānc niṣpracāreṇa manasā paraṃ tad adhigacchatia dhṛtimān ātmavān buddhiṃ nigṛhṇīyād asaṃśayamc mano buddhyā nigṛhṇīyād viṣayān manasātmanaḥd yojayitvā manas tatra niścalaṃ paramātmanid yogābhisaṃdhiyuktasya brahma tat saṃprakāśated aikāntyaṃ tad idaṃ viddhi sarvavastvantarasthitiḥd viśeṣahīnaṃ gṛhṇanti viśeṣāṃ kāraṇātmikāmd atha vā na prabhus tatra paramātmani vartitumd āgāmitattvaṃ yogātmā yogatantram upakrameta nigṛhītendriyasyāsya kurvāṇasya mano vaśec devatās tāḥ prakāśante hṛṣṭā yānti tam īśvarama tābhiḥ saṃsaktamanaso brahmavat saṃprakāśatec etaiś cāpagataiḥ sarvair brahmabhūyāya kalpatea atha vā na pravarteta yogatantrair upakrametc yena tantramayaṃ tantraṃ vṛttiḥ syāt tat tad ācareta kaṇapiṇyākakulmāṣaśākayāvakasaktavaḥc tathā mūlaphalaṃ bhaikṣaṃ paryāyeṇopayojayeta āhāraṃ niyataṃ caiva deśe kāle ca sāttvikamc tat parīkṣyānuvarteta yat pravṛtty anuvartakama pravṛttaṃ noparundheta śanair agnim ivendhayetc jñānendhitaṃ tato jñānam arkavat saṃprakāśatea jñānādhiṣṭhānam ajñānaṃ trīṃl lokān adhitiṣṭhatic vijñānānugataṃ jñānam ajñānād apakṛṣyatea pṛthaktvāt saṃprayogāc ca nāsūyur veda śāśvatamc sa tayor apavargajño vītarāgo vimucyatea vayotīto jarāmṛtyū jitvā brahma sanātanamc amṛtaṃ tad avāpnoti yat tad akṣaram avyayam gurur uvācaa niṣkalmaṣaṃ brahmacaryam icchatā carituṃ sadāc nidrā sarvātmanā tyājyā svapnadoṣān avekṣatāa svapne hi rajasā dehī tamasā cābhibhūyatec dehāntaram ivāpannaś caraty apagatasmṛtiḥa jñānābhyāsāj jāgarato jijñāsārtham anantaramc vijñānābhiniveśāt tu jāgaraty aniśaṃ sadāa atrāha ko nv ayaṃ bhāvaḥ svapne viṣayavān ivac pralīnair indriyair dehī vartate dehavān ivaa atrocyate yathā hy etad veda yogeśvaro hariḥc tathaitad upapannārthaṃ varṇayanti maharṣayaḥa indriyāṇāṃ śramāt svapnam āhuḥ sarvagataṃ budhāḥb tanmayānīndriyāṇy āhus tāvad gacchanti tāni vaib atrāhus tritayaṃ nityam atathyam iti cec ca nab prathame vartamāno sau tritayaṃ vetti sarvadāb netarāv upasaṃgamya vijānāti kathaṃ canab svapnāvasthāgato hy eṣa svapna ity eva vetti cab tad apy asadṛśaṃ yuktyā tritayaṃ mohalakṣaṇamb yadātmatritayān muktas tadā jānāty asatkṛtaḥc manasas tu pralīnatvāt tat tad āhur nidarśanama kāryavyāsaktamanasaḥ saṃkalpo jāgrato hy apic yadvan manorathaiśvaryaṃ svapne tadvan manogatama saṃsārāṇām asaṃkhyānāṃ kāmātmā tad avāpnuyātc manasy antarhitaṃ sarvaṃ veda sottamapūruṣaḥa guṇānām api yad yat tat karma jānāty upasthitamc tat tac chaṃsanti bhūtāni mano yad bhāvitaṃ yathāa tatas tam upavartante guṇā rājasatāmasāḥc sāttviko vā yathāyogam ānantaryaphalodayaḥa tataḥ paśyaty asaṃbaddhān vātapittakaphottarānc rajastamobhavair bhāvais tad apy āhur duranvayama prasannair indriyair yad yat saṃkalpayati mānasamc tat tat svapne py uparate manodṛṣṭir nirīkṣatea vyāpakaṃ sarvabhūteṣu vartate pratighaṃ manaḥc manasy antarhitaṃ dvāraṃ deham āsthāya mānasama yat tat sadasad avyaktaṃ svapity asmin nidarśanamb vyaktabhedam atīto sau cinmātraṃ paridṛśyatec sarvabhūtātmabhūtasthaṃ tad adhyātmaguṇaṃ viduḥa lipseta manasā yaś ca saṃkalpād aiśvaraṃ guṇamc ātmaprabhāvāt taṃ vidyāt sarvā hy ātmani devatāḥa evaṃ hi tapasā yuktam arkavat tamasaḥ paramc trailokyaprakṛtir dehī tapasā taṃ maheśvarama tapo hy adhiṣṭhitaṃ devais tapoghnam asurais tamaḥc etad devāsurair guptaṃ tad āhur jñānalakṣaṇama sattvaṃ rajas tamaś ceti devāsuraguṇān viduḥc sattvaṃ devaguṇaṃ vidyād itarāv āsurau guṇaud sattvaṃ manas tathā buddhir devā ity abhiśabditāḥd tair eva hi vṛtas tasmāj jñātvaivaṃ paramaṃ  d nidrāvikalpena satāṃ   viśati lokavatd svastho bhavati gūḍhātmā kaluṣaiḥ parivarjitaḥd niśādikā ye kathitā lokānāṃ kaluṣā matāḥd tair hīnaṃ yat puraṃ śuddhaṃ bāhyābhyantaravartinamd sadānandamayaṃ nityaṃ bhūtvā tat param anviyātd evam ākhyātam atyarthaṃ brahmacaryam akalmaṣamd sarvasaṃyogahīnaṃ tad viṣṇvākhyaṃ paramaṃ padamd acintyam adbhutaṃ loke jñānena parivartatea brahma tat paramaṃ vedyam amṛtaṃ jyotir akṣaramc ye vidur bhāvitātmānas te yānti paramāṃ gatima hetumac chakyam ākhyātum etāvaj jñānacakṣuṣāc pratyāhāreṇa vā śakyam avyaktaṃ brahma veditum gurur uvācaa na sa veda paraṃ dharmaṃ yo na veda catuṣṭayamc vyaktāvyakte ca yat tattvaṃ saṃprāptaṃ paramarṣiṇāa vyaktaṃ mṛtyumukhaṃ vidyād avyaktam amṛtaṃ padamc pravṛttilakṣaṇaṃ dharmam ṛṣir nārāyaṇo bravīta atraivāvasthitaṃ sarvaṃ trailokyaṃ sacarācaramc nivṛttilakṣaṇaṃ dharmam avyaktaṃ brahma śāśvatama pravṛttilakṣaṇaṃ dharmaṃ prajāpatir athābravītc pravṛttiḥ punarāvṛttir nivṛttiḥ paramā gatiḥa tāṃ gatiṃ paramām eti nivṛttiparamo muniḥc jñānatattvaparo nityaṃ śubhāśubhanidarśakaḥa tad evam etau vijñeyāv avyaktapuruṣāv ubhauc avyaktapuruṣābhyāṃ tu yat syād anyan mahattarama taṃ viśeṣam avekṣeta viśeṣeṇa vicakṣaṇaḥc anādyantāv ubhāv etāv aliṅgau cāpy ubhāv apia ubhau nityau sūkṣmatarau mahadbhyaś ca mahattarauc sāmānyam etad ubhayor evaṃ hy anyad viśeṣaṇama prakṛtyā sargadharmiṇyā tathā trividhasattvayāc viparītam ato vidyāt kṣetrajñasya ca lakṣaṇama prakṛteś ca vikārāṇāṃ draṣṭāram aguṇānvitamb kṣetrajñam āhur jīvaṃ tu kartāraṃ guṇasaṃvṛtamb agrāhyaṃ yena jānanti taj jñanaṃ daṃśitaś ca tatb tenaiva daṃśito nityaṃ na guṇaḥ paribhūyatec agrāhyau puruṣāv etāv aliṅgatvād asaṃhitaua saṃyogalakṣaṇotpattiḥ karmajā gṛhyate yayāc karaṇaiḥ karmanirvṛttaiḥ kartā yad yad viceṣṭatee kīrtyate śabdasaṃjñābhiḥ ko ham eṣo py asāv itif mamāpi kāyam iti ca tad ajño nityasaṃvṛtaḥa uṣṇīṣavān yathā vastrais tribhir bhavati saṃvṛtaḥc saṃvṛto yaṃ tathā dehī sattvarājasatāmasaiḥd bhedavastu tv abhedena jānāti sa yadā pumānd tadā paraṃ parātmāsau bhavaty eva nirañjanaḥd kriyāyoge ca bhedākhye bahu saṃkṣipyate kva citd vasurudragaṇādyeṣu svānubhogena bhogataḥd evam eṣa paraḥ sattvo nānārūpeṇa saṃsthitaḥd saṃkṣipto dṛśyate paścād ekarūpeṇa viṣṭhitaḥa tasmāc catuṣṭayaṃ vedyam etair hetubhir ācitamc yathāsaṃjño hy ayaṃ samyag antakāle na muhyatid vāyur vidho yathā bhānur viprakāśaṃ gamiṣyatia śriyaṃ divyām abhiprepsur brahma vāṅmanasā śuciḥc śārīrair niyamair ugraiś caren niṣkalmaṣaṃ tapaḥa trailokyaṃ tapasā vyāptam antarbhūtena bhāsvatāc sūryaś ca candramāś caiva bhāsatas tapasā divid anyac ca dharmasāmyaṃ yat tapas tat kīrtyate punaḥa pratāpas tapaso jñānaṃ loke saṃśabditaṃ tapaḥc rajastamoghnaṃ yat karma tapasas tat svalakṣaṇamd tritayaṃ hy etad ākhyātaṃ yady asmād bhāsituṃ punaḥd svabhāsā bhāsayaṃś cāpi candramā hy atra vartated sūryayoge tu yaḥ saṃdhis tapaḥ sarvaṃ pradīpyatea brahmacaryam ahiṃsā ca śārīraṃ tapa ucyatec vāṅmanoniyamaḥ sāmyaṃ mānasaṃ tapa ucyatea vidhijñebhyo dvijātibhyo grāhyam annaṃ viśiṣyatec āhāraniyamenāsya pāpmā naśyati rājasaḥa vaimanasyaṃ ca viṣaye yānty asya karaṇāni cac tasmāt tanmātram ādadyād yāvad atra prayojanama antakāle vayotkarṣāc chanaiḥ kuryād anāturaḥc evaṃ yuktena manasā jñānaṃ tad upapadyatea rajasā cāpy ayaṃ dehī dehavāñ śabdavac caretc kāryair avyāhatamatir vairāgyāt prakṛtau sthitaḥe ā dehād apramādāc ca dehāntād vipramucyatea hetuyuktaḥ sadotsargo bhūtānāṃ pralayas tathāc parapratyayasarge tu niyataṃ nātivartatea bhavāntaprabhavaprajñā āsate ye viparyayamc dhṛtyā dehān dhārayanto buddhisaṃkṣiptamānasāḥe sthānebhyo dhvaṃsamānāś ca sūkṣmatvāt tān upāsatea yathāgamaṃ ca tat sarvaṃ buddhyā tan naiva budhyatec dehāntaṃ kaś cid anvāste bhāvitātmā nirāśrayaḥe yukto dhāraṇayā kaś cit sattāṃ ke cid upāsatea abhyasyanti paraṃ devaṃ vidyutsaṃśabditākṣaramc antakāle hy upāsannās tapasā dagdhakilbiṣāḥa sarva ete mahātmāno gacchanti paramāṃ gatimc sūkṣmaṃ viśeṣaṇaṃ teṣām avekṣec chāstracakṣuṣāa dehaṃ tu paramaṃ vidyād vimuktam aparigrahamc antarikṣād anyataraṃ dhāraṇāsaktamānasama martyalokād vimucyante vidyāsaṃyuktamānasāḥc brahmabhūtā virajasas tato yānti parāṃ gatimd evam ekāyanaṃ dharmam āhur vedavido janāḥd yathājñānam upāsantaḥ sarve yānti parāṃ gatima kaṣāyavarjitaṃ jñānaṃ yeṣām utpadyate calamc te yānti paramāṃl lokān viśudhyanto yathābalama bhagavantam ajaṃ divyaṃ viṣṇum avyaktasaṃjñitamc bhāvena yānti śuddhā ye jñānatṛptā nirāśiṣaḥa jñātvātmasthaṃ hariṃ caiva nivartante na te vyayāḥc prāpya tat paramaṃ sthānaṃ modante kṣaram avyayama etāvad etad vijñānam etad asti ca nāsti cac tṛṣṇābaddhaṃ jagat sarvaṃ cakravat parivartatea bisatantur yathaivāyam antaḥsthaḥ sarvato bisec tṛṣṇātantur anādyantas tathā dehagataḥ sadāa sūcyā sūtraṃ yathā vastre saṃsārayati vāyakaḥc tadvat saṃsārasūtraṃ hi tṛṣṇāsūcyā nibadhyated itas tataḥ samāhṛtya rūpaṃ nirvartayiṣyatia vikāraṃ prakṛtiṃ caiva puruṣaṃ ca sanātanamc yo yathāvad vijānāti sa vitṛṣṇo vimucyatea prakāśaṃ bhagavān etad ṛṣir nārāyaṇo mṛtamc bhūtānām anukampārthaṃ jagāda jagato hitam yudhiṣṭhira uvācaa kena vṛttena vṛttajño janako mithilādhipaḥc jagāma mokṣaṃ dharmajño bhogān utsṛjya mānuṣān bhīṣma uvācaa atrāpy udāharantīmam itihāsaṃ purātanamc yena vṛttena vṛttajñaḥ sa jagāma mahat sukhama janako janadevas tu mithilāyāṃ janādhipaḥc aurdhvadehikadharmāṇām āsīd yukto vicintanea tasya sma śatam ācāryā vasanti satataṃ gṛhec darśayantaḥ pṛthag dharmān nānāpāṣaṇḍavādinaḥa sa teṣāṃ pretyabhāve ca pretyajātau viniścayec āgamasthaḥ sa bhūyiṣṭham ātmatattve na tuṣyatia tatra pañcaśikho nāma kāpileyo mahāmuniḥc paridhāvan mahīṃ kṛtsnāṃ jagāma mithilām apia sarvasaṃnyāsadharmāṇāṃ tattvajñānaviniścayec suparyavasitārthaś ca nirdvaṃdvo naṣṭasaṃśayaḥa ṛṣīṇām āhur ekaṃ yaṃ kāmād avasitaṃ nṛṣuc śāśvataṃ sukham atyantam anvicchan sa sudurlabhama yam āhuḥ kapilaṃ sāṃkhyāḥ paramarṣiṃ prajāpatimc sa manye tena rūpeṇa vismāpayati hi svayama āsureḥ prathamaṃ śiṣyaṃ yam āhuś cirajīvinamc pañcasrotasi yaḥ satram āste varṣasahasrikama taṃ samāsīnam āgamya maṇḍalaṃ kāpilaṃ mahatb pañcasrotasi niṣṇātaḥ pañcarātraviśāradaḥb pañcajñaḥ pañcakṛt pañcaguṇaḥ pañcaśikhaḥ smṛtaḥc puruṣāvastham avyaktaṃ paramārthaṃ nibodhayata iṣṭisatreṇa saṃsiddho bhūyaś ca tapasā muniḥc kṣetrakṣetrajñayor vyaktiṃ bubudhe devadarśanaḥa yat tad ekākṣaraṃ brahma nānārūpaṃ pradṛśyateb tan me brūhi dvijaśreṣṭha tvaṃ hi vettāsya tattvataḥb evaṃ pṛṣṭaḥ pañcaśikhaḥ saṃprahṛṣṭatanūruhaḥb bodhāyanaparān viprān ṛṣibhāvam upāgataḥc āsurir maṇḍale tasmin pratipede tad avyayama tasya pañcaśikhaḥ śiṣyo mānuṣyā payasā bhṛtaḥc brāhmaṇī kapilā nāma kā cid āsīt kuṭumbinīa tasyāḥ putratvam āgamya striyāḥ sa pibati stanauc tataḥ sa kāpileyatvaṃ lebhe buddhiṃ ca naiṣṭhikīma etan me bhagavān āha kāpileyāya saṃbhavamc tasya tat kāpileyatvaṃ sarvavittvam anuttamama sāmānyaṃ kapilo jñātvā dharmajñānām anuttamamc upetya śatam ācāryān mohayām āsa hetubhiḥd nirākariṣṇus tān sarvāṃs teṣāṃ hetuguṇān bahūnd śrāvayām āsa matimān muniḥ pañcaśikho nṛpaa janakas tv abhisaṃraktaḥ kāpileyānudarśanātc utsṛjya śatam ācāryān pṛṣṭhato nujagāma tama tasmai paramakalpāya praṇatāya ca dharmataḥc abravīt paramaṃ mokṣaṃ yat tat sāṃkhyaṃ vidhīyatea jātinirvedam uktvā hi karmanirvedam abravītc karmanirvedam uktvā ca sarvanirvedam abravīta yadarthaṃ karmasaṃsargaḥ karmaṇāṃ ca phalodayaḥc tad anāśvāsikaṃ moghaṃ vināśi calam adhruvama dṛśyamāne vināśe ca pratyakṣe lokasākṣikec āgamāt param astīti bruvann api parājitaḥa anātmā hy ātmano mṛtyuḥ kleśo mṛtyur jarāmayaḥc ātmānaṃ manyate mohāt tad asamyak paraṃ matama atha ced evam apy asti yal loke nopapadyatec ajaro yam amṛtyuś ca rājāsau manyate tathāa asti nāstīti cāpy etat tasminn asati lakṣaṇec kim adhiṣṭhāya tad brūyāl lokayātrāviniścayama pratyakṣaṃ hy etayor mūlaṃ kṛtāntaitihyayor apic pratyakṣo hy āgamo bhinnaḥ kṛtānto vā na kiṃ canaa yatra tatrānumāne sti kṛtaṃ bhāvayate pi vāc anyo jīvaḥ śarīrasya nāstikānāṃ mate smṛtaḥa reto vaṭakaṇīkāyāṃ ghṛtapākādhivāsanamc jātismṛtir ayaskāntaḥ sūryakānto mbubhakṣaṇama pretya bhūtātyayaś caiva devatābhyupayācanamc mṛte karmanivṛttiś ca pramāṇam iti niścayaḥa na tv ete hetavaḥ santi ye ke cin mūrtisaṃsthitāḥc amartyasya hi martyena sāmānyaṃ nopapadyatea avidyākarmaceṣṭānāṃ ke cid āhuḥ punarbhavamc kāraṇaṃ lobhamohau tu doṣāṇāṃ ca niṣevaṇama avidyāṃ kṣetram āhur hi karma bījaṃ tathā kṛtamc tṛṣṇāsaṃjananaṃ sneha eṣa teṣāṃ punarbhavaḥa tasmin vyūḍhe ca dagdhe ca citte maraṇadharmiṇic anyo nyāj jāyate dehas tam āhuḥ sattvasaṃkṣayama yadā sa rūpataś cānyo jātitaḥ śrutito rthataḥc katham asmin sa ity eva saṃbandhaḥ syād asaṃhitaḥa evaṃ sati ca kā prītir dānavidyātapobalaiḥc yad anyācaritaṃ karma sarvam anyaḥ prapadyatea yadā hy ayam ihaivānyaiḥ prākṛtair duḥkhito bhavetc sukhitair duḥkhitair vāpi dṛśyo py asya vinirṇayaḥa tathā hi musalair hanyuḥ śarīraṃ tat punar bhavetc pṛthag jñānaṃ yad anyac ca yenaitan nopalabhyatea ṛtuḥ saṃvatsaras tithyaḥ śītoṣṇe ca priyāpriyec yathātītāni paśyanti tādṛśaḥ sattvasaṃkṣayaḥa jarayā hi parītasya mṛtyunā vā vināśināc durbalaṃ durbalaṃ pūrvaṃ gṛhasyeva vinaśyatia indriyāṇi mano vāyuḥ śoṇitaṃ māṃsam asthi cac ānupūrvyā vinaśyanti svaṃ dhātum upayānti caa lokayātrāvidhānaṃ ca dānadharmaphalāgamaḥc yadarthaṃ vedaśabdāś ca vyavahārāś ca laukikāḥa iti samyaṅ manasy ete bahavaḥ santi hetavaḥc etad astīdam astīti na kiṃ cit pratipadyatea teṣāṃ vimṛśatām evaṃ tat tat samabhidhāvatāmc kva cin niviśate buddhis tatra jīryati vṛkṣavata evam arthair anarthaiś ca duḥkhitāḥ sarvajantavaḥc āgamair apakṛṣyante hastipair hastino yathād na jātu kāmaḥ kāmānām upabhogena śāmyatid haviṣā kṛṣṇavartmeva bhūya evābhivardhatea arthāṃs tathātyantasukhāvahāṃś calipsanta ete bahavo viśulkāḥc mahattaraṃ duḥkham abhiprapannāhitvāmiṣaṃ mṛtyuvaśaṃ prayāntia vināśino hy adhruvajīvitasyakiṃ bandhubhir mitraparigrahaiś cac vihāya yo gacchati sarvam evakṣaṇena gatvā na nivartate caa bhūvyomatoyānalavāyavo hisadā śarīraṃ paripālayantic itīdam ālakṣya kuto ratir bhavedvināśino hy asya na śarma vidyatea idam anupadhi vākyam acchalaṃparamanirāmayam ātmasākṣikamc narapatir abhivīkṣya vismitaḥpunar anuyoktum idaṃ pracakramed bhīṣma uvācad janako naradevas tu jñāpitaḥ paramarṣiṇād punar evānupapraccha sāṃparāye bhavābhavaud bhagavan yad idaṃ pretya saṃjñā bhavati kasya citd evaṃ sati kim ajñānaṃ jñānaṃ vā kiṃ kariṣyatid vivādād eva siddho sau kāraṇasyeva vedanād pañcaśikha uvācad cetano vidyate hy atra haitukaṃ ca manogatamd āgamād eva siddho sau svataḥsiddha iti śrutiḥd vartate pṛthag anyonyaṃ na hy apāśritya karmasud cetano hy aṃśavas tatra svamūrtaṃ dhārayanty ataḥd svabhāvaṃ pauruṣaṃ karma hy ātmānaṃ tam upāśritāḥd tam āśritya pravartante dehino dehabandhanāḥd guṇajñānam abhijñānaṃ yasya liṅgā na śabdavatd pṛthivyādiṣu bhūteṣu tat tad āhur nidarśanamd ātmāsau vartate bhinnas tatra tatra samanvitaḥd paramātmā tathaivaiko dehe sminn iti vai śrutiḥd ākāśaṃ vāyur ūṣmā ca sneho yac cāpi pārthivamd yathā tridhā pravartante tathāsau puruṣaḥ smṛtaḥd payasy antarhitaṃ yadvat tadvad vyāptaṃ mahātmakamd pūrvaṃ naiśvaryayogena tasmād etan na śeṣavānd śabdaḥ kālaḥ kriyā deho mamaikasyaiva kalpanād svabhāvaṃ tanmayaṃ tv etan māyārūpaṃ tu bhedavatd nānākhyaṃ paramaṃ śuddhaṃ nirvikalpaṃ parātmakamd liṅgādi devamadhyās te jñānaṃ devasya tat tathād cinmayo yaṃ hi nādākhyaḥ śabdaś cāsau mano mahānd gatimān uta saṃdhatte varṇavat tat padānvitamd kāyo nāsti ca teṣāṃ vai avakāśas tathā paramd ete noḍhā iti cākhyātāḥ sarve te dharmadūṣakāḥd anubandhān na vijñānaṃ jñānato dhruvam avyayamd nānābhedavikalpena yeṣām ātmā smṛtaḥ sadād prakṛter aparas teṣāṃ bahavo hy ātmavādinaḥd virodho hy ātmasanmāyāṃ na teṣāṃ siddha eva hid anyadā ca gṛhītai vedabāhyās tataḥ smṛtāḥd ekānekātmakaṃ teṣāṃ pratiṣedho hi bhedanutd tasmād vedasya hṛdayam advaidhyam iti viddhi tatd vedādṛṣṭer ayaṃ lokaḥ sarvārtheṣu pravartated tasmāc ca smṛtayo jātāḥ setihāsāḥ pṛthagvidhāḥd na yan na sādhyaṃ tad brahma nādimadhyaṃ na cāntavatd indriyāṇi sabhūtāni parā ca prakṛtir manaḥd ātmā ca paramaḥ śuddhaḥ prokto sau paramaḥ pumānd utpattilakṣaṇaṃ cedaṃ viparītam athobhayoḥd yo vetti prakṛtiṃ nityaṃ tathā caivātmanas tu tāmd pradahaty eṣa karmākhyaṃ dāvodbhūta ivānalaḥd cinmātraparamaḥ śuddhaḥ sarvākṛtiṣu vartated ākāśakalpaṃ vimalaṃ nānāśaktisamanvitamd tāpanaṃ sarvabhūtānāṃ jyotiṣāṃ madhyamasthitimd duḥkham āste sa nirduḥkhas tad vidvān na ca lipyatid asāv aśnāti yadvat tad bhramaro śnāti yan madhud evam eṣa mahān ātmā nātmā tad avabudhyated evaṃbhūtas tvam ity atra svādhīto budhyate paramd budhasya bodhanaṃ tatra kriyate sadbhir ity utad na budhasyeti vai kaś cin na tathāvac chruṇuṣva med śokam asya na gatvā te śāstrāṇāṃ śāstradasyavaḥd lokaṃ nighnanti saṃbhinnā jñātino tra vadanty utad evaṃ tasya vibhoḥ kṛtyaṃ dhātur asya mahātmanaḥd kṣamanti te mahātmānaḥ sarvadvaṃdvavivarjitāḥd ato nyathā mahātmānam anyathā pratipadyated kiṃ tena na kṛtaṃ pāpaṃ coreṇātmāpahāriṇād tasya saṃyogayogena śucir apy aśucir bhavetd aśuciś ca śuciś cāpi jñānād dehādayo yathād dṛśyaṃ na caiva dṛṣṭaṃ syād dṛṣṭaṃ dṛśyaṃ tu naiva cad atītatritayaḥ siddho jñānarūpeṇa sarvadād evaṃ na pratipadyante rāgamohamadānvitāḥd vedabāhyā durātmānaḥ saṃsāre duḥkhabhāginaḥd āgamānugatajñānā buddhiyuktā bhavanti ted buddhyā bhavati buddhyāttaṃ yad buddhaṃ cātmarūpavatd tamasy andhe na saṃdehāt paraṃ yānti na saṃśayaḥd nityanaimittikān kṛtvā pāpahānim avāpya cad śuddhasattvā mahātmāno jñānanirdhūtakalmaṣāḥd asaktāḥ parivartante saṃsaranty atha vāyuvatd na yujyante tha vā kleśair ahaṃbhāvodbhavaiḥ sahad itas tataḥ samāhṛtya jñānaṃ nirvarṇayanty utad jñānānvitas tamo hanyād arkavat sa mahāmatiḥd evam ātmānam anvīkṣya nānāduḥkhasamanvitamd dehaṃ paṅkamale magnaṃ nirmalaṃ paramārthataḥd tam eva sarvaduḥkhāt tu mocayet paramātmavānd brahmacaryavratopetaḥ sarvasaṅgabahiṣkṛtaḥd laghvāhāro viśuddhātmā paraṃ nirvāṇam ṛcchatid indriyāṇi mano vāyuḥ śoṇitaṃ māṃsam asthi cad ānupūrvyād vinaśyanti svaṃ dhātum upayānti cad kāraṇānugataṃ kāryaṃ yadi tac ca vinaśyatid aliṅgasya kathaṃ liṅgaṃ yujyate tan mṛṣā dṛḍhamd na tv eva hetavaḥ santi ye ke cin mūrtisaṃsthitāḥd amartyasya ca martyena sāmānyaṃ nopapadyated lokadṛṣṭo yathā jāteḥ svedajaḥ puruṣaḥ striyāmd kṛtānusmaraṇāt siddho vedagamyaḥ paraḥ pumānd pratyakṣānugato vedo nāmahetubhir iṣyated yathā śākhā hi vai śākhā taroḥ saṃbadhyate tadād śrutyā tathā paro py ātmā dṛśyate so py aliṅgavānd aliṅgasādhyaṃ tad brahma bahavaḥ santi hetavaḥd lokayātrāvidhānaṃ ca dānadharmaphalāgamaḥd tadarthaṃ vedaśabdāś ca vyavahārāś ca laukikāḥd iti samyaṅ manasy ete bahavaḥ santi hetavaḥd etad astīdam astīti na kiṃ cit pratidṛśyated teṣāṃ vimṛśatām evaṃ tat tat samabhidhāvatāmd kva cin niviśate buddhis tatra jīryati vṛkṣavatd evam arthair anarthaiś ca duḥkhitāḥ sarvajantavaḥd āgamair apakṛṣyanti hastino hastipair yathād na jātu kāmaḥ kāmānām upabhogena śāmyatid haviṣā kṛṣṇavartmeva bhūya evābhivardhated arthāṃs tathātyantaduḥkhāvahāṃś cad lipsanta eke bahavo viśuṣkāḥd mahattaraṃ duḥkham abhiprapannād hitvā sukhaṃ mṛtyuvaśaṃ prayāntid vināśino hy adhruvajīvitasyad kiṃ bandhubhir mantraparigrahaiś cad vihāya yo gacchati sarvam evad kṣaṇena gatvā na nivartate cad khaṃ bhūmitoyānalavāyavo hid sadā śarīraṃ pratipālayantid itīdam ālakṣya kuto ratir bhavedd vināśino hy asya na karma vidyated bhīṣma uvācad idam anupadhivākyam acchalaṃd paramanirāmayam ātmasākṣikamd narapatir anuvīkṣya vismitaḥd punar anuyoktum idaṃ pracakrame bhīṣma uvācaa janako janadevas tu jñāpitaḥ paramarṣiṇāc punar evānupapraccha sāṃparāye bhavābhavaua bhagavan yad idaṃ pretya saṃjñā bhavati kasya citc evaṃ sati kim ajñānaṃ jñānaṃ vā kiṃ kariṣyatia sarvam ucchedaniṣṭhaṃ syāt paśya caitad dvijottamac apramattaḥ pramatto vā kiṃ viśeṣaṃ kariṣyatia asaṃsargo hi bhūteṣu saṃsargo vā vināśiṣuc kasmai kriyeta kalpena niścayaḥ ko tra tattvataḥa tamasā hi praticchannaṃ vibhrāntam iva cāturamc punaḥ praśamayan vākyaiḥ kaviḥ pañcaśikho bravīta ucchedaniṣṭhā nehāsti bhāvaniṣṭhā na vidyatec ayaṃ hy api samāhāraḥ śarīrendriyacetasāme vartate pṛthag anyonyam apy apāśritya karmasua dhātavaḥ pañcaśākho yaṃ khaṃ vāyur jyotir ambu bhūḥc te svabhāvena tiṣṭhanti viyujyante svabhāvataḥa ākāśaṃ vāyur ūṣmā ca sneho yac cāpi pārthivamc eṣa pañcasamāhāraḥ śarīram iti naikadhād ahaṃvācyaṃ dvijānāṃ yad viśiṣṭaṃ buddhirūpavatd vācām agocaraṃ nityaṃ jñeyam evaṃ bhaviṣyatid jñānaṃ jñeyaṃ tathājñānaṃ trividhaṃ jñānam ucyatee jñānam ūṣmā ca vāyuś ca trividhaḥ karmasaṃgrahaḥa indriyāṇīndriyārthāś ca svabhāvaś cetanā manaḥc prāṇāpānau vikāraś ca dhātavaś cātra niḥsṛtāḥd prāṇādayas tathā sparśā na saṃbādhagatās tathād putrādhīnaṃ bhaviṣyeta cinmātraḥ sa paraḥ pumāna śravaṇaṃ sparśanaṃ jihvā dṛṣṭir nāsā tathaiva cac indriyāṇīti pañcaite cittapūrvaṃgamā guṇāḥa tatra vijñānasaṃyuktā trividhā vedanā dhruvāc sukhaduḥkheti yām āhur aduḥkhety asukheti caa śabdaḥ sparśaś ca rūpaṃ ca raso gandhaś ca mūrty athac ete hy āmaraṇāt pañca ṣaḍguṇā jñānasiddhayea teṣu karmanisargaś ca sarvatattvārthaniścayaḥc tam āhuḥ paramaṃ śukraṃ buddhir ity avyayaṃ mahatc   pāre ca rajasaḥ prabhumc virāgād vartate tasmin mano rajasi nityagamc tasmin prasanne saṃpaśyeda imaṃ guṇasamāhāram ātmabhāvena paśyataḥc asamyag darśanair duḥkham anantaṃ nopaśāmyatid tasmād eteṣu medhāvī na prasajyeta buddhimāna anātmeti ca yad dṛṣṭaṃ tenāhaṃ na mamety apic vartate kim adhiṣṭhānā prasaktā duḥkhasaṃtatiḥa tatra samyaṅ mano nāma tyāgaśāstram anuttamamc śṛṇu yat tava mokṣāya bhāṣyamāṇaṃ bhaviṣyatia tyāga eva hi sarveṣām uktānām api karmaṇāmc nityaṃ mithyāvinītānāṃ kleśo duḥkhāvaho mataḥa dravyatyāge tu karmāṇi bhogatyāge vratāny apic sukhatyāge tapoyogaḥ sarvatyāge samāpanāa tasya mārgo yam advaidhaḥ sarvatyāgasya darśitaḥc viprahāṇāya duḥkhasya durgatir hy anyathā bhavetd śete jarāmṛtyubhayair vimuktaḥd kṣīṇe puṇye vigate ca pāped taponimitte vigate ca niṣṭhed phale yathākāśam aliṅga evaa pañca jñānendriyāṇy uktvā manaḥṣaṣṭhāni cetasic manaḥṣaṣṭhāni vakṣyāmi pañca karmendriyāṇi tua hastau karmendriyaṃ jñeyam atha pādau gatīndriyamc prajanānandayoḥ śepho visarge pāyur indriyama vāk tu śabdaviśeṣārthaṃ gatiṃ pañcānvitāṃ viduḥc evam ekādaśaitāni buddhyā tv avasṛjen manaḥa karṇau śabdaś ca cittaṃ ca trayaḥ śravaṇasaṃgrahec tathā sparśe tathā rūpe tathaiva rasagandhayoḥd cakṣū rūpaṃ tathā cittaṃ trayo darśanasaṃgrahed nāsā gandhas tathā cittaṃ trayo ghrāṇasya saṃgrahed tvacaḥ sparśaṃ tathā cittaṃ trayaḥ sparśanasaṃgrahed jihvā rasas tathā cittaṃ trayo rasanasaṃgrahea evaṃ pañcatrikā hy ete guṇās tad upalabdhayec yena yas trividho bhāvaḥ paryāyāt samupasthitaḥa sāttviko rājasaś caiva tāmasaś caiva te trayaḥc trividhā vedanā yeṣu prasūtā sarvasādhanāa praharṣaḥ prītir ānandaḥ sukhaṃ saṃśāntacittatāc akutaś cit kutaś cid vā cittataḥ sāttviko guṇaḥa atuṣṭiḥ paritāpaś ca śoko lobhas tathākṣamāc liṅgāni rajasas tāni dṛśyante hetvahetutaḥa avivekas tathā mohaḥ pramādaḥ svapnatandritāc kathaṃ cid api vartante vividhās tāmasā guṇāḥa tatra yat prītisaṃyuktaṃ kāye manasi vā bhavetc vartate sāttviko bhāva ity apekṣeta tat tathāa yat tu saṃtāpasaṃyuktam aprītikaram ātmanaḥc pravṛttaṃ raja ity eva tatas tad abhicintayeta atha yan mohasaṃyuktaṃ kāye manasi vā bhavetc apratarkyam avijñeyaṃ tamas tad upadhārayeta tad dhi śrotrāśrayaṃ bhūtaṃ śabdaḥ śrotraṃ samāśritaḥc nobhayaṃ śabdavijñāne vijñānasyetarasya vāa evaṃ tvak cakṣuṣī jihvā nāsikā caiva pañcamīc sparśe rūpe rase gandhe tāni ceto manaś ca tata svakarmayugapadbhāvo daśasv eteṣu tiṣṭhatic cittam ekādaśaṃ viddhi buddhir dvādaśamī bhaveta teṣām ayugapadbhāve ucchedo nāsti tāmasaḥc āsthito yugapadbhāve vyavahāraḥ sa laukikaḥa indriyāṇy avasṛjyāpi dṛṣṭvā pūrvaṃ śrutāgamamc cintayan nānuparyeti tribhir evānvito guṇaiḥa yat tamopahataṃ cittam āśu saṃcāram adhruvamc karoty uparamaṃ kāle tad āhus tāmasaṃ sukhama yad yad āgamasaṃyuktaṃ na kṛtsnam upaśāmyatic atha tatrāpy upādatte tamo vyaktam ivānṛtama evam eṣa prasaṃkhyātaḥ svakarmapratyayī guṇaḥc kathaṃ cid vartate samyak keṣāṃ cid vā na vartated aham ity eṣa vai bhāvo nānyatra pratitiṣṭhatid yasya bhāvo dṛḍho nityaṃ sa vai vidvāṃs tathetaraḥd dehadharmas tathā nityaṃ sarvabhūteṣu vai dṛḍhaḥd etenaivānumānena tyājyo dharmas tathā hy asaud jñānena mucyate jantur dharmātmā jñānavān bhavetd dharmeṇa dhāryate lokaḥ sarvaṃ dharme pratiṣṭhitamd sarvārthajanakaś caiva dharmaḥ sarvasya kāraṇamd sarvo hi dṛśyate loke na sarvārthaḥ kathaṃ canad sarvatyāge kṛte tasmāt paramātmā prasīdatid vyaktād avyaktam atulaṃ lokeṣu parivartatea evam āhuḥ samāhāraṃ kṣetram adhyātmacintakāḥc sthito manasi yo bhāvaḥ sa vai kṣetrajña ucyatea evaṃ sati ka ucchedaḥ śāśvato vā kathaṃ bhavetc svabhāvād vartamāneṣu sarvabhūteṣu hetutaḥa yathārṇavagatā nadyo vyaktīr jahati nāma cac na ca svatāṃ niyacchanti tādṛśaḥ sattvasaṃkṣayaḥa evaṃ sati kutaḥ saṃjñā pretyabhāve punar bhavetc pratisaṃmiśrite jīve gṛhyamāṇe ca madhyataḥa imāṃ tu yo veda vimokṣabuddhimātmānam anvicchati cāpramattaḥc na lipyate karmaphalair aniṣṭaiḥpatraṃ bisasyeva jalena siktama dṛḍhaiś ca pāśair bahubhir vimuktaḥprajānimittair api daivataiś cac yadā hy asau sukhaduḥkhe jahātimuktas tadāgryāṃ gatim ety aliṅgaḥe śrutipramāṇāgamamaṅgalaiś caśete jarāmṛtyubhayād atītaḥa kṣīṇe ca puṇye vigate ca pāpetatonimitte ca phale vinaṣṭec alepam ākāśam aliṅgam evamāsthāya paśyanti mahad dhy asaktāḥa yathorṇanābhiḥ parivartamānastantukṣaye tiṣṭhati pātyamānaḥc tathā vimuktaḥ prajahāti duḥkhaṃvidhvaṃsate loṣṭa ivādrim arcchana yathā ruruḥ śṛṅgam atho purāṇaṃhitvā tvacaṃ vāpy urago yathāvatc vihāya gacchaty anavekṣamāṇastathā vimukto vijahāti duḥkhama drumaṃ yathā vāpy udake patantamutsṛjya pakṣī prapataty asaktaḥc tathā hy asau sukhaduḥkhe vihāyamuktaḥ parārdhyāṃ gatim ety aliṅgaḥd imān svalokān anupaśya sarvānd vrajan yathākāśam ivāptakāmaḥd imāṃ hi gāthāṃ pralapan yathāstid samastasaṃkalpaviśeṣamuktaḥd ahaṃ hi sarvaṃ kila sarvabhāved hy ahaṃ tadantar hy aham eva bhoktāa api ca bhavati maithilena gītaṃnagaram upāhitam agninābhivīkṣyac na khalu mama tuṣo pi dahyate trasvayam idam āha kila sma bhūmipālaḥa idam amṛtapadaṃ videharājaḥsvayam iha pañcaśikhena bhāṣyamāṇaḥc nikhilam abhisamīkṣya niścitārthaṃparamasukhī vijahāra vītaśokaḥa imaṃ hi yaḥ paṭhati vimokṣaniścayaṃna hīyate satatam avekṣate tathāc upadravān nānubhavaty aduḥkhitaḥpramucyate kapilam ivaitya maithilaḥd yudhiṣṭhira uvācad kiṃkāraṇaṃ mahāprājña dahyamānaś ca maithilaḥd bhīṣma uvācad mithilāṃ neha dharmātmā prāha vīkṣya vidāhitāmd śrūyatāṃ nṛpaśārdūla yadarthaṃ dīpitā purād vahninā dīpitā sā tu tan me śṛṇu mahāmated janako janadevas tu karmāṇy ādhāya cātmanid sarvabhāvam anuprāpya bhāvena vicacāra saḥd yajan dadaṃs tathā juhvan pālayan pṛthivīm imāmd adhyātmavin mahāprājñas tanmayatvena niṣṭhitaḥd sa tasya hṛdi saṃkalpaṃ jñātum aicchat svayaṃ prabhuḥd sarvalokādhipas tatra dvijarūpeṇa saṃyutaḥd mithilāyāṃ mahābuddhir vyalīkaṃ kiṃ cid ācarand sa gṛhītvā dvijaśreṣṭhair nṛpāya prativeditaḥd aparādhaṃ samuddiśya taṃ rājā pratyabhāṣatad na tvāṃ brāhmaṇa daṇḍena niyokṣyāmi kathaṃ canad mama rājyād vinirgaccha yāvat sīmā bhuvo mamad tac chrutvā brāhmaṇo gatvā rājānaṃ pratyuvāca had kariṣye vacanaṃ rājan bravīhi mama jānataḥd kā sīmā tava bhūmes tu brūhi dharmaṃ mamādya vaid tac chrutvā maithilo rājā lajjayāvanatānanaḥd novāca vacanaṃ vipraṃ tattvabuddhyā samīkṣya tatd punaḥ punaś ca taṃ vipraś codayām āsa satvaramd brūhi rājendra gacchāmi tava rājyād vivāsitaḥd tato nṛpo vicāryaivam āha brāhmaṇapuṃgavamd āvāso vā na me sty atra sarvā vā pṛthivī mamad gaccha vā tiṣṭha vā brahmann iti me niścitā matiḥd ity uktaḥ sa tathā tena maithilena dvijottamaḥd abravīt taṃ mahātmānaṃ rājānaṃ mantribhir vṛtamd tam evaṃ padmanābhasya nityaṃ pakṣapadāhitamd aho siddhārtharūpo si gamiṣye svasti te stu vaid ity uktvā prayayau vipras taj jijñāsur dvijottamaḥd adahac cāgninā tasya mithilāṃ bhagavān svayamd pradīpyamānāṃ mithilāṃ dṛṣṭvā rājā na kampitaḥd janaiḥ sa paripṛṣṭas tu vākyam etad uvāca had anantaṃ bata me vittaṃ bhāvyaṃ me nāsti kiṃ canad mithilāyāṃ pradīptāyāṃ na me kiṃ cana dahyated tad asya bhāṣamāṇasya śrutvā śrutvā hṛdi sthitamd punaḥ saṃjīvayām āsa mithilāṃ tāṃ dvijottamaḥd ātmānaṃ darśayām āsa varaṃ cāsmai dadau punaḥd dharme tiṣṭhatu sadbhāvo buddhis te rthe narādhipad satye tiṣṭhasva nirviṇṇaḥ svasti te stu vrajāmy ahamd ity uktvā bhagavāṃś cainaṃ tatraivāntaradhīyatad etat te kathitaṃ rājan kiṃ bhūyaḥ śrotum icchasid yudhiṣṭhira uvācad asti kaś cid yadi vibho sadāro niyato gṛhed atītasarvasaṃsāraḥ sarvadvaṃdvavivarjitaḥd taṃ me brūhi mahāprājña durlabhaḥ puruṣo mahānd bhīṣma uvācad śṛṇu rājan yathāvṛttaṃ yan māṃ tvaṃ pṛṣṭavān asid itihāsam imaṃ śuddhaṃ saṃsārabhayabheṣajamd devalo nāma viprarṣiḥ sarvaśāstrārthakovidaḥd kriyāvān dhārmiko nityaṃ devabrāhmaṇapūjakaḥd sutā suvarcalā nāma tasya kalyāṇalakṣaṇād nātihrasvā nātikṛśā nātidīrghā yaśasvinīd pradānasamayaṃ prāptā pitā tasya hy acintayatd asyāḥ patiḥ kuto veti brāhmaṇaḥ śrotriyaḥ paraḥd vidvān vipro hy akuṭumbaḥ priyavādī mahātapāḥd ity evaṃ cintayānaṃ taṃ rahasy āha suvarcalād andhāya māṃ mahāprājña dehy anandhāya vai pitaḥd pitovācad evaṃ smara sadā vidvan mamedaṃ prārthitaṃ muned na śakyaṃ prārthitaṃ vatse tvayādya pratibhāti med andhatānandhatā ceti vikāro mama jāyated suvarcalovācad unmattevāśubhaṃ vākyaṃ bhāṣase śubhalocaned nāham unmattabhūtādya buddhipūrvaṃ bravīmi ted vidyate cet patis tādṛk sa māṃ bharati vedavitd yebhyas tvaṃ manyase dātuṃ mām ihānaya tān dvijānd bhīṣma uvācad tādṛśaṃ taṃ patiṃ teṣu varayiṣye yathātathamd tatheti coktvā tāṃ kanyām ṛṣiḥ śiṣyān uvāca had brāhmaṇān vedasaṃpannān yonigotraviśodhitānd mātṛtaḥ pitṛtaḥ śuddhāñ śuddhān ācārataḥ śubhānd arogān buddhisaṃpannāñ śīlasattvaguṇānvitānd asaṃkīrṇāṃś ca gotreṣu vedavratasamanvitānd brāhmaṇān snātakāñ śīghraṃ mātāpitṛsamanvitānd niveṣṭukāmān kanyāṃ me dṛṣṭvānayata śiṣyakāḥd tac chrutvā tvaritāḥ śiṣyā hy āśrameṣu tatas tataḥd grāmeṣu ca tato gatvā brāhmaṇebhyo nyavedayand ṛṣeḥ prabhāvaṃ matvā te kanyāyāś ca dvijottamāḥd anekamunayo rājan saṃprāptā devalāśramamd anumānya yathānyāyaṃ munīn munikumārakānd abhyarcya vidhivat tatra kanyāṃ prāha pitā mahānd ete pi munayo vatse svaputraikamatā ihad vedavedāṅgasaṃpannāḥ kulīnāḥ śīlasaṃmatāḥd ye mī teṣu varaṃ bhadre tvam icchasi mahāvratamd taṃ kumāraṃ vṛṇīṣvādya tasmai dāsyām ahaṃ śubhed tatheti coktvā kalyāṇī taptahemanibhā tadād sarvalakṣaṇasaṃpannā vākyam āha yaśasvinīd viprāṇāṃ samitīr dṛṣṭvā praṇipatya tapodhanānd yady asti samitau vipro hy andho nandhaḥ sa me varaḥd tac chrutvā munayas tatra vīkṣamāṇāḥ parasparamd nocur viprā mahābhāgāḥ kanyāṃ matvā hy avedikāmd kutsayitvā muniṃ tatra manasā munisattamāḥd yathāgataṃ yayuḥ kruddhā nānādeśanivāsinaḥd kanyā ca saṃsthitā tatra pitṛveśmani bhāminīd tataḥ kadā cid brahmaṇyo vidvān nyāyaviśāradaḥd ūhāpohavidhānajño brahmacaryasamanvitaḥd vedavid vedatattvajñaḥ kriyākalpaviśāradaḥd ātmatattvavibhāgajñaḥ pitṛmān guṇasāgaraḥd śvetaketur iti khyātaḥ śrutvā vṛttāntam ādarātd kanyārthaṃ devalaṃ cāpi śīghraṃ tatrāgato bhavatd uddālakasutaṃ dṛṣṭvā śvetaketuṃ mahāvratamd yathānyāyaṃ ca saṃpūjya devalaḥ pratyabhāṣatad kanye eṣa mahābhāge prāpto ṛṣikumārakaḥd varayainaṃ mahāprājñaṃ vedavedāṅgapāragamd tac chrutvā kupitā kanyā ṛṣiputram udaikṣatad tāṃ kanyām āha viprarṣiḥ so haṃ bhadre samāgataḥd andho ham atra tattvaṃ hi tathā manye ca sarvadād viśālanayanaṃ viddhi tathā māṃ hīnasaṃśayamd vṛṇīṣva māṃ varārohe bhaje ca tvām anindited yenedaṃ vīkṣate nityaṃ śṛṇoti spṛśate tha vād ghrāyate vakti satataṃ yenedaṃ rasayate punaḥd yenedaṃ manyate tattvaṃ yena budhyati vā punaḥd na cakṣur vidyate hy etat sa vai bhūtāndha ucyated yasmin pravartate cedaṃ paśyañ śṛṇvan spṛśann apid jighraṃś ca rasayaṃs tadvad vartate yena cakṣuṣād tan me nāsti tato hy andho vṛṇu bhadre dya mām ataḥd lokadṛṣṭyā karomīha nityanaimittikādikamd ātmadṛṣṭyā ca tat sarvaṃ vilipyāmi ca nityaśaḥd sthito haṃ nirbharaḥ śāntaḥ kāryakāraṇabhāvanaḥd avidyayā taran mṛtyuṃ vidyayā taṃ tathāmṛtamd yathāprāptaṃ tu saṃdṛśya vasāmīha vimatsaraḥd bhīṣma uvācad krīte vyavasitaṃ bhadre bhartāhaṃ te vṛṇīṣva māmd tataḥ suvarcalā dṛṣṭvā prāha taṃ dvijasattamamd manasāsi vṛto vidvañ śeṣakartā pitā mamad vṛṇīṣva pitaraṃ mahyam eṣa vedavidhikramaḥd tad vijñāya pitā tasyā devalo munisattamaḥd śvetaketuṃ ca saṃpūjya tathaivoddālakena tamd munīnām agrataḥ kanyāṃ pradadau jalapūrvakamd udāharanti vai tatra śvetaketuṃ nirīkṣya tamd hṛtpuṇḍarīkanilayaḥ sarvabhūtātmako hariḥd śvetaketusvarūpeṇa sthito sau madhusūdanaḥd prīyatāṃ mādhavo devaḥ patnī ceyaṃ sutā mamad pratipādayāmi te kanyāṃ sahadharmacarīṃ śubhāmd ity uktvā pradadau tasmai devalo munipuṃgavaḥd pratigṛhya ca tāṃ kanyāṃ śvetaketur mahāyaśāḥd upayamya yathānyāyam atra kṛtvā yathāvidhid samāpya tantraṃ munibhir vaivāhikam anuttamamd sa gārhasthye vasan dhīmān bhāryāṃ tām idam abravītd yāni coktāni vedeṣu tat sarvaṃ kuru śobhaned mayā saha yathānyāyaṃ sahadharmacarī mamad aham ity eva bhāvena sthito haṃ tvaṃ tathaiva cad tasmāt karmāṇi kurvīthāḥ kuryāṃ te ca tataḥ paramd na mameti ca bhāvena jñānāgninilayena cad anantaraṃ tathā kuryās tāni karmāṇi bhasmasātd evaṃ tvayā ca kartavyaṃ sarvadādurbhagā mayād yad yad ācarati śreṣṭhas tat tad evetaro janaḥd tasmāl lokasya siddhyarthaṃ kartavyaṃ cātmasiddhayed uktvaivaṃ sa mahāprājñaḥ sarvajñānaikabhājanaḥd putrān utpādya tasyāṃ ca yajñaiḥ saṃtarpya devatāḥd ātmayogaparo nityaṃ nirdvaṃdvo niṣparigrahaḥd bhāryāṃ tāṃ sadṛśīṃ prāpya buddhiṃ kṣetrajñayor ivad lokam anyam anuprāptau bhāryā bhartā tathaiva cad sākṣibhūtau jagaty asmiṃś caramāṇau mudānvitaud tataḥ kadā cid bhartāraṃ śvetaketuṃ suvarcalād papraccha ko bhavān atra brūhi me tad dvijottamad tām āha bhagavān vāgmī tvayā jñāto na saṃśayaḥd dvijottameti mām uktvā punaḥ kam anupṛcchasid sā tam āha mahātmānaṃ pṛcchāmi hṛdi śāyinamd tac chrutvā pratyuvācaināṃ sa na vakṣyati bhāminid nāmagotrasamāyuktam ātmānaṃ manyase yadid tan mithyāgotrasadbhāve vartate dehabandhanamd aham ity eṣa bhāvo tra tvayi cāpi samāhitaḥd tvam apy aham ahaṃ sarvam aham ity eva vartated nātra tat paramārthaṃ vai kimartham anupṛcchasid tataḥ prahasya sā hṛṣṭā bhartāraṃ dharmacāriṇīd uvāca vacanaṃ kāle smayamānā tadā nṛpad kim anekaprakāreṇa virodhena prayojanamd kriyākalāpair brahmarṣe jñānanaṣṭo si sarvadād śvetaketur uvācad tan me brūhi mahāprājña yathāhaṃ tvām anuvratād yad yad ācarati śreṣṭhas tat tad evetaro janaḥd vartate tena loko yaṃ saṃkīrṇaś ca bhaviṣyatid saṃkīrṇe ca tathā dharme varṇaḥ saṃkaram eti cad saṃkare ca pravṛtte tu mātsyo nyāyaḥ pravartated tad aniṣṭaṃ harer bhadre dhātur asya mahātmanaḥd parameśvarasaṃkrīḍā lokasṛṣṭir iyaṃ śubhed yāvatpāṃsava uddiṣṭās tāvatyo sya vibhūtayaḥd tāvatyaś caiva māyās tu tāvatyo syāś ca śaktayaḥd evaṃ sugahvare yukto yatra me tad bhavābhavamd chittvā jñānāsinā gacchet sa vidvān sa ca me priyaḥd so ham eva na saṃdehaḥ pratijñā iti tasya vaid ye mūḍhās te durātmāno dharmasaṃkarakārakāḥd maryādābhedakā nīcā narake yānti jantavaḥd āsurīṃ yonim āpannā iti devānuśāsanamd bhagavatyā tathā loke rakṣitavyaṃ na saṃśayaḥd suvarcalovācad maryādālokarakṣārtham evam asmi tathā sthitaḥd śabdaḥ ko tra iti khyātas tathārthaṃ ca mahāmuned śvetaketur uvācad ākṛtiṃ ca tayor brūhi lakṣaṇena pṛthak pṛthakd vyatyayena ca varṇānāṃ parivādikṛto hi yaḥd sa śabda iti vijñeyas tannipāto rtha ucyated suvarcalovācad śabdārthayor hi saṃbandhas tv anayor asti vā na vād śvetaketur uvācad tan me brūhi yathātattvaṃ śabdasthāne rtha eva cetd śabdārthayor na caivāsti saṃbandho tyanta eva hid suvarcalovācad puṣkare ca yathā toyaṃ tathāstīti ca vettha tatd arthe sthitir hi śabdasya nānyathā ca sthitir bhavetd śvetaketur uvācad vidyate cen mahāprājña vinārthaṃ brūhi sattamad sasaṃsargo timātras tu vācakatvena vartated asti ced vartate nityaṃ vikāroccāraṇena vaid suvarcalovācad śabdasthāno tra ity uktas tathārtha iti me kṛtamd śvetaketur uvācad arthāsthito na tiṣṭhec ca virūḍham iha bhāṣitamd na vikūlo tra kathito nākāśaṃ hi vinā jagatd suvarcalovācad saṃbandhas tatra nāsty eva tadvad ity eṣa manyatāmd sadāhaṃkāraśabdo yaṃ vyaktam ātmani saṃśritaḥd śvetaketur uvācad na vācas tatra vartante iti mithyā bhaviṣyatid ahaṃśabdo hy ahaṃbhāve nātmabhāve śubhavrated suvarcalovācad na vartate pare cintye vācaḥ saguṇalakṣaṇāḥd ahaṃ gātraikataḥ śyāmā bhavān api tathaiva cad tan me brūhi yathānyāyam evaṃ cen munisattamad śvetaketur uvācad mṛnmaye hi ghaṭe bhāvas tādṛg bhāva iheṣyated ayaṃ bhāvaḥ pare cintye hy ātmabhāvo yathā ca mṛtd ahaṃ tvam etad ity eva pare saṃkalpanāma tatd tasmād vāco na vartante iti naiva virudhyated tasmād vāmena vartante manasā bhīru sarvaśaḥd yathākāśagataṃ viśvaṃ saṃsaktam iva lakṣyated saṃsarge sati saṃbandhāt tadvikāraṃ bhaviṣyatid anākāśagataṃ sarvaṃ vikāre ca sadā gatamd tad brahma paramaṃ śuddham anaupamyaṃ na śakyated na dṛśyate tathā tac ca dṛśyate ca matir mamad suvarcalovācad nirvikāraṃ hy amūrtiṃ ca nirayaṃ sarvagaṃ tathād śvetaketur uvācad dṛśyate ca viyan nityaṃ dṛgātmā tena dṛśyated tvacā spṛśati vai vāyum ākāśasthaṃ punaḥ punaḥd tatsthaṃ gandhaṃ tathāghrāti jyotiḥ paśyati cakṣuṣād tamoraśmiguṇaś caiva meghajālaṃ tathaiva cad varṣaṃ tārāgaṇaṃ caiva nākāśaṃ dṛśyate punaḥd ākāśasyāpy athākāśaṃ sadrūpam iti niścitamd tadarthe kalpitā hy ete tatsatyo viṣṇur eva cad yāni nāmāni gauṇāni hy upacārāt parātmanid na cakṣuṣā na manasā na cānyena paro vibhuḥd cintyate sūkṣmayā buddhyā vācā vaktuṃ na śakyated etat prapannam akhilaṃ tasmin sarvaṃ pratiṣṭhitamd mahāghaṭo lpakaś caiva yathā mahyāṃ pratiṣṭhitaud na ca strī na pumāṃś caiva yathaiva na napuṃsakaḥd kevalajñānamātraṃ tat tasmin sarvaṃ pratiṣṭhitamd bhūmisaṃsthānayogena vastusaṃsthānayogataḥd rasabhedā yathā toye prakṛtyām ātmanas tathād tadvākyasmaraṇān nityaṃ tṛptiṃ vāri pibann ivad suvarcalovācad prāpnoti jñānam akhilaṃ tena tat sukham edhated anena sādhyaṃ kiṃ syād bai śabdeneti matir mamad vedagamyaḥ paro cintya iti paurāṇikā viduḥd nirarthako yathā loke tadvat syād iti me matiḥd śvetaketur uvācad nirīkṣyaivaṃ yathānyāyaṃ vaktum arhasi me naghad vedagamyaṃ paraṃ śuddham iti satyā parā śrutiḥd vyāvṛttyā naitad ity āha upaliṅge ca vartated nirarthako na caivāsti śabdo laukika uttamed ananvayāḥ smṛtāḥ śabdā nirarthā iti laukikaiḥd gṛhyante tadvad ity eva na vartante parātmanid agocaratvaṃ vacasāṃ yuktam evaṃ tathā śubhed sādhanasyopadeśāc ca hy upāyasya ca sūcanātd upalakṣaṇayogena vyāvṛttyā ca pradarśanātd vedagamyaḥ paraḥ śuddha iti me dhīyate matiḥd adhyātmadhyānasaṃbhūtam abhūtaṃ bhūtavat sphuṭamd jñānaṃ viddhi śubhācāre tena yānti parāṃ gatimd yadi me vyāhṛtaṃ guhyaṃ śrutaṃ na tu tvayā śubhed tathyam ity eva vā śuddhe jñānaṃ jñānavilocaned nānārūpavad asyaivam aiśvaryaṃ dṛśyate śubhed na vāyus tan na sūryas tan nāgnis tat tu paraṃ padamd anena pūrṇam etad dhi hṛdi bhūtam iheṣyated etāvad ātmavijñānam etāvad yad ahaṃ smṛtamd bhīṣma uvācad āvayor na ca sattve vai tasmād ajñānabandhanamd evaṃ suvarcalā hṛṣṭā proktā bhartrā yathārthavatd paricaryamāṇā hy aniśaṃ tattvabuddhisamanvitād bhartā ca tām anuprekṣya nityanaimittikānvitaḥd paramātmani govinde vāsudeve mahātmanid samādhāya ca karmāṇi tanmayatvena bhāvitaḥd kālena mahatā rājan prāpnoti paramāṃ gatimd etat te kathitaṃ rājan yasmāt tvaṃ paripṛcchasid gārhasthyaṃ ca samāsthāya gatau jāyāpatī param yudhiṣṭhira uvācaa kiṃ kurvan sukham āpnoti kiṃ kurvan duḥkham āpnutec kiṃ kurvan nirbhayo loke siddhaś carati bhārata bhīṣma uvācaa damam eva praśaṃsanti vṛddhāḥ śrutisamādhayaḥc sarveṣām eva varṇānāṃ brāhmaṇasya viśeṣataḥa nādāntasya kriyāsiddhir yathāvad upalabhyatec kriyā tapaś ca vedāś ca dame sarvaṃ pratiṣṭhitama damas tejo vardhayati pavitraṃ dama ucyatec vipāpmā nirbhayo dāntaḥ puruṣo vindate mahata sukhaṃ dāntaḥ prasvapiti sukhaṃ ca pratibudhyatec sukhaṃ loke viparyeti manaś cāsya prasīdatia tejo damena dhriyate na tat tīkṣṇo dhigacchatic amitrāṃś ca bahūn nityaṃ pṛthag ātmani paśyatia kravyādbhya iva bhūtānām adāntebhyaḥ sadā bhayamc teṣāṃ vipratiṣedhārthaṃ rājā sṛṣṭaḥ svayaṃbhuvāa āśrameṣu ca sarveṣu dama eva viśiṣyateb dharmaḥ saṃrakṣyate tais tu yatas te dharmasetavaḥc yac ca teṣu phalaṃ dharme bhūyo dānte tad ucyatea teṣāṃ liṅgāni vakṣyāmi yeṣāṃ samudayo damaḥc akārpaṇyam asaṃrambhaḥ saṃtoṣaḥ śraddadhānatāa akrodha ārjavaṃ nityaṃ nātivādo na mānitāc gurupūjānasūyā ca dayā bhūteṣv apaiśunama janavādamṛṣāvādastutinindāvivarjanamc sādhukāmaś cāspṛhayann āyāti pratyayaṃ nṛṣua avairakṛt sūpacāraḥ samo nindāpraśaṃsayoḥc suvṛttaḥ śīlasaṃpannaḥ prasannātmātmavān budhaḥe prāpya loke ca satkāraṃ svargaṃ vai pretya gacchatif durgamaṃ sarvabhūtānāṃ prāpya yan modate sukhīa sarvabhūtahite yukto na smayād dveṣṭi vai janamc mahāhrada ivākṣobhya prajñātṛptaḥ prasīdatia abhayaṃ sarvabhūtebhyaḥ sarveṣām abhayaṃ yataḥc namasyaḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ dānto bhavati jñānavāna na hṛṣyati mahaty arthe vyasane ca na śocatic sa vai parimitaprajñaḥ sa dānto dvija ucyatea karmabhiḥ śrutasaṃpannaḥ sadbhir ācaritaiḥ śubhaiḥc sadaiva damasaṃyuktas tasya bhuṅkte mahat phalama anasūyā kṣamā śāntiḥ saṃtoṣaḥ priyavāditāc satyaṃ dānam anāyāso naiṣa mārgo durātmanāmd kāmakrodhau ca lobhaś ca parasyerṣyā vikatthanād dambho darpaś ca mānaś ca naiṣa mārgo mahātmanāmd atuṣṭir anṛtaṃ moha eṣa mārgo durātmanāma kāmakrodhau vaśe kṛtvā brahmacārī jitendriyaḥc vikramya ghore tapasi brāhmaṇaḥ saṃśitavrataḥe upavāsaṃ pṛthagjanāḥc etat tapo mahārāja utāho kiṃ tapo bhavet bhīṣma uvācaa māsapakṣopavāsena manyante yat tapo janāḥc ātmatantropaghātaḥ sa na tapas tat satāṃ matame tyāgaś ca sannatiś caiva śiṣyate tapa uttamama sadopavāsī ca bhaved brahmacārī sadaiva cac muniś ca syāt sadā vipro daivataṃ ca sadā bhajeta kuṭumbiko dharmakāmaḥ sadāsvapnaś ca bhāratac amāṃsāśī sadā ca syāt pavitraṃ ca sadā japeta amṛtāśī sadā ca syān na ca syād viṣabhojanaḥc vighasāśī sadā ca syāt sadā caivātithipriyaḥd śraddadhānaḥ sadā ca syād daivatadvijapūjakaḥ yudhiṣṭhira uvācaa kathaṃ sadopavāsī syād brahmacārī kathaṃ bhavetc vighasāśī kathaṃ ca syāt sadā caivātithipriyaḥ bhīṣma uvācaa antarā prātarāśaṃ ca sāyamāśaṃ tathaiva cac sadopavāsī ca bhaved yo na bhuṅkte kathaṃ canaa bhāryāṃ gacchan brahmacārī ṛtau bhavati brāhmaṇaḥc ṛtavādī sadā ca syāj jñānanityaś ca yo naraḥa abhakṣayan vṛthāmāṃsam amāṃsāśī bhavaty utac dānanityaḥ pavitraś ca asvapnaś ca divāsvapana bhṛtyātithiṣu yo bhuṅkte bhuktavatsu sadā sa hac amṛtaṃ sakalaṃ bhuṅkta iti viddhi yudhiṣṭhiraa abhuktavatsu nāśnānaḥ satataṃ yas tu vai dvijaḥb adattvā yo tithibhyo nnaṃ na bhuṅkte so tithipriyaḥb adattvānnaṃ daivatebhyo yo na bhuṅkte sa daivatamc abhojanena tenāsya jitaḥ svargo bhavaty utaa devatābhyaḥ pitṛbhyaś ca bhṛtyebhyo tithibhiḥ sahac avaśiṣṭaṃ tu yo śnāti tam āhur vighasāśinama teṣāṃ lokā hy aparyantāḥ sadane brahmaṇā sahac upasthitāś cāpsarobhiḥ pariyānti divaukasaḥa devatābhiś ca ye sārdhaṃ pitṛbhiś copabhuñjatec ramante putrapautraiś ca teṣāṃ gatir anuttamād yudhiṣṭhira uvācad ke cid āhur dvidhā loke tridhā rājann anekadhād na viprāḥ svabhāvaṃ karma cāpared pauruṣaṃ karma daivaṃ ca yat svabhāvādir eva tamd nānāhetuśatair yuktā nānāśāstrapravartakāḥd svabhāvād brāhmaṇā rājañ jigīṣantaḥ parasparamd tatas tu mūlam udbhūtaṃ vādipratyarthisaṃyutamd pātradaṇḍavighātaṃ ca valkalājinavāsasāmd eke manyusamāpannās tataḥ śāntā dvijottamāḥd vasiṣṭham abruvan sarve tvaṃ no brūhi sanātanamd nāhaṃ jānāmi viprendrāḥ pratyuvāca sa ko vidvān iha loke sminn amoho mṛtam adbhutamd tac ca te śuśruvur vākyaṃ brāhmaṇā hy aśarīriṇaḥd sanaddhāma dvijā gatvā pṛcchadhvaṃ sa ca vakṣyatid tam āha kaś cid dvijavaryasattamod vibhāṇḍako jñānanirdhūtakalmaṣaḥd jñātaṃ mayā munigaṇā vākyaṃ tad aśarīriṇaḥd kāryam adya yathākāmaṃ pṛcchadhvaṃ munipuṃgavāḥd tam abruvan prāñjalayo mahāmuniṃd dvijottamaṃ jñānanidhiṃ sunirmalamd kathaṃ vayaṃ bhagavān mahātmād yo saṃgavān satyavit tac chṛṇuṣvad anekasāhasrakaleṣu caivad prasannadhātuṃ ca śubhājñayā satd yathāha pūrvaṃ yuṣmāsu hy aśarīrī dvijottamāḥd tathaiva vākyaṃ tat satyam ajānantaś ca kīrtitamd śṛṇudhvaṃ paramaṃ kāraṇam asti katham avagamyate ahany ahanid pākaviśeṣo dṛśyate tena miśraṃ sarvaṃ miśrayate  yathād maṇḍalī dṛśi sarveṣām asti nidarśanam asti cakṣuṣmatām astid jñāne coktvā tāṃ vipraḥ preṣayām āsa śiṣyakānd ṛṣeḥ prabhāvaṃ dṛṣṭvā te kanyāyāś ca dvijottamāḥd anekamunayo rājan saṃprāptā devalāśramamd tān āgatān athābhyarcya kanyām āha pitā mahānd yadīcchasi varaṃ bhadre taṃ vipraṃ varaya svayamd tatheti coktvā kalyāṇī taptahemanibhānanād karasaṃmitamadhyāṅgī vākyam āha tapodhanāḥd yady asti saṃmato vipro hy andho nandhaḥ sa me varaḥd nocur viprā mahābhāgāṃ prativākyaṃ yayuś ca ted kanyā ca tiṣṭhatām atra pitur veśmani bhāratad śvetaketuḥ kahālasya śyālaḥ paramadharmavitd śrutvā brahmā tadāgamya kanyām āha mahīpated so haṃ bhadre samāvṛttas tvayokto yaḥ purā dvijaḥd suvarcalovācad viśālanayanaṃ viddhi mām andho haṃ vṛṇīṣva māmd kathaṃ viśālanetro si kathaṃ vā tvam alocanaḥd dvija uvācad brūhi paścād ahaṃ vidvan parīkṣe tvāṃ dvijottamad pratiyogīni nāmāni channāny astamitāni cad śabde sparśe tathā rūpe rase gandhe sahetukamd na me pravartate ceto na pratyakṣaṃ hi teṣu med alocano haṃ tasmād dhi na gatir vidyate yataḥd yena paśyati suśroṇi bhāṣate spṛśate punaḥd bhujyate ghrāyate nityaṃ śṛṇoti manute tathād tac cakṣur vidyate mahyaṃ yena paśyati vai sphuṭamd sulocano haṃ bhadre vai pṛccha vā kiṃ vadāmi ted sarvam asmin na me vidyā vidvān hi paramārthataḥd sā viśuddhā tato bhūtvā śvetaketuṃ mahāmunimd praṇamya pūjayām āsa tāṃ bhāryāṃ sa ca labdhavānd vairāgyasaṃyutā kanyā tādṛśaṃ patim uttamamd prāptā rājan mahāprājña tasmād arthaḥ pṛthak pṛthakd etat te kathitaṃ rājan kiṃ bhūyaḥ śrotum icchasi yudhiṣṭhira uvācaa yad idaṃ karma loke smiñ śubhaṃ vā yadi vāśubhamc puruṣaṃ yojayaty eva phalayogena bhārataa kartā svit tasya kule jātaṃ bahuśrutamc astambham anahaṃkāraṃ sattvasthaṃ samaye ratama tulyanindāstutiṃ dāntaṃ śūnyāgāraniveśanamc carācarāṇāṃ bhūtānāṃ viditaprabhavāpyayama akrudhyantam ahṛṣyantam apriyeṣu priyeṣu cac kāñcane vātha loṣṭe vā ubhayoḥ samadarśanama ātmaniḥśreyasajñāne dhīraṃ niścitaniścayamc parāvarajñaṃ bhūtānāṃ sarvajñaṃ samadarśanamd avyaktātmani govinde vāsudeve mahātmanid hṛdayena samāviṣṭaṃ sarvabhāvapriyaṃkaramd bhaktaṃ bhāgavataṃ nityaṃ nārāyaṇaparāyaṇamd dhyāyantaṃ paramātmānaṃ hiraṇyakaśipoḥ sutama śakraḥ prahrādam āsīnam ekānte saṃyatendriyamc bubhutsamānas tat prajñām abhigamyedam abravīta yaiḥ kaiś cit saṃmato loke guṇaiḥ syāt puruṣo nṛṣuc bhavaty anapagān sarvāṃs tān guṇāṃl lakṣayāmahea atha te lakṣyate buddhiḥ samā bālajanair ihac ātmānaṃ manyamānaḥ sañ śreyaḥ kim iha manyasea baddhaḥ pāśaiś cyutaḥ sthānād dviṣatāṃ vaśam āgataḥc śriyā vihīnaḥ prahrāda śocitavye na śocasia prajñālābhāt tu daiteya utāho dhṛtimattayāc prahrāda svastharūpo si paśyan vyasanam ātmanaḥa iti saṃcoditas tena dhīro niścitaniścayaḥc uvāca ślakṣṇayā vācā svāṃ prajñām anuvarṇayana pravṛttiṃ ca nivṛttiṃ ca bhūtānāṃ yo na budhyatec tasya stambho bhaved bālyān nāsti stambho nupaśyataḥd gahanaṃ sarvabhūtānāṃ dhyeyaṃ nityaṃ sanātanamd anigraham anaupamyaṃ sarvākāraṃ parātparamd sarvāvaraṇasaṃbhūtaṃ tasmād etat pravartated tanmayā api saṃpaśya nānālakṣaṇalakṣitāḥd sa vai pāti jagatsraṣṭā viṣṇur ity abhiśabditaḥd punar darśati saṃprāpte  sureśvaraḥ sica svabhāvāt saṃpravartante nivartante tathaiva cac sarve bhāvās tathābhāvāḥ puruṣārtho na vidyatea puruṣārthasya cābhāve nāsti kaś cit svakārakaḥc svayaṃ tu kurvatas tasya jātu māno bhaved ihaa yas tu kartāram ātmānaṃ manyate sādhvasādhunoḥc tasya doṣavatī prajñā svamūrtyajñeti me matiḥa yadi syāt puruṣaḥ kartā śakrātmaśreyase dhruvamc ārambhās tasya sidhyeran na ca jātu parābhaveta aniṣṭasya hi nirvṛttir anivṛttiḥ priyasya cac lakṣyate yatamānānāṃ puruṣārthas tataḥ kutaḥa aniṣṭasyābhinirvṛttim iṣṭasaṃvṛttim eva cac aprayatnena paśyāmaḥ keṣāṃ cit tat svabhāvataḥa pratirūpadharāḥ ke cid dṛśyante buddhisattamāḥc virūpebhyo lpabuddhibhyo lipsamānā dhanāgamama svabhāvapreritāḥ sarve niviśante guṇā yadāc śubhāśubhās tadā tatra tasya kiṃ mānakāraṇama svabhāvād eva tat sarvam iti me niścitā matiḥc ātmapratiṣṭhitā prajñā mama nāsti tato nyathāa karmajaṃ tv iha manye haṃ phalayogaṃ śubhāśubhamc karmaṇāṃ vidyate śakra uvācaa yenaiṣā labhyate prajñā yena śāntir avāpyatec prabrūhi tam upāyaṃ me samyak prahrāda pṛcchate prahrāda uvācaa ārjavenāpramādena prasādenātmavattayāc vṛddhaśuśrūṣayā śakra puruṣo labhate mahata svabhāvāl labhate prajñāṃ śāntim eti svabhāvataḥc svabhāvād eva tat sarvaṃ yat kiṃ cid anupaśyasid naivāntaraṃ vijānāti śrutvā gurumukhāt tataḥd vākyaṃ vākyārthavijñānam ālokya manasā sakāśād ājñāya mārgaṃ lakṣaṇavattayād sarvasaṅgavinirmuktaḥ paramātmānam ṛcchatid viṣayecchākṛto dharmaṃrmaḥ sarajasko bhayāvahaḥd dharmahānim avāpnoti kramāt tena naraḥ punaḥd bhaktihīno bhavaty eva paramātmani cācyutad vācake vāpi ca sthānaṃ na hanty eva vimocitaḥd sārkṣye siccāsya ratir nityaṃ saṃsāre ca ratir bhavetd tasya nityam avijñānād ātmā caiva na sidhyatid unmattavṛttir bhavati kramād evaṃ pravartated āśaucaṃ vardhate nityaṃ na śāmyati kathaṃ canad viṣaye cānvitasyāsya mokṣavāñchā na jāyated hetvābhāseṣu saṃlīnaḥ stauti vaiṣayikān guṇānd na śāstrāṇi śṛṇoty eva mānadarpasamanvitaḥd svataḥsiddhaṃ na bhogas taṃ svataḥsiddhaṃ na vetti cad cidrūpadhāraṇaṃ caiva paraṃ vastu athāvyayamd nānāyonigatas tena bhrāmyamāṇaḥ svakarmabhiḥd tīrṇapāraṃ na jānāti mahāmohasamanvitaḥd ācāryasaṃśrayād vidyād vinayaṃ samupāgataḥd anukūleṣu dharmeṣu cinoty enaṃ tatas tataḥd ācārya iti ca khyātas tenāsau balavṛtrahand niyatenaiva sadbhāvas tena janmāntarādiṣud karmasaṃcayatūlaughaḥ parivarjayetd prathamaṃ tatkṛtenaiva karmaṇā parimṛgacchatid dvitīyaṃ svapnayogaṃ ca karmaṇā parigacchatid etair akṣaiḥ samāpannaḥ pratyakṣo sau samāsthitaḥd suṣuptyākhyas turīyo sau na ca hy ātmagataṃ sadād samastasaṃkalpaviśeṣamuktaṃd paraṃ parāṇāṃ paramaṃ mahātmād trayyantavidbhiḥ parigīyate saud viṣṇur vibhur vāsti guṇo na nityamd varṇeṣu lokeṣu viśeṣaṇeṣud sa vāsudevo vasanān mahātmād me bhagavān dadau sad sa eva śeṣaṃ maghavān mahātmād evaṃ mamopāyam avehi śakrad tasmāl loko nāsti mahyaṃ sadaiva bhīṣma uvācaa ity ukto daityapatinā śakro vismayam āgamatc prītimāṃś ca tadā rājaṃs kāladaṇḍaviniṣpiṣṭas tan me brūhi pitāmaha bhīṣma uvācaa atrāpy udāharantīmam itihāsaṃ purātanamc vāsavasya ca saṃvādaṃ baler vairocanasya caa pitāmaham upāgatya praṇipatya kṛtāñjaliḥc sarvān evāsurāñ jitvā baliṃ papraccha vāsavaḥa yasya sma dadato vittaṃ na kadā cana hīyatec taṃ baliṃ nādhigacchāmi brahmann ācakṣva me balima sa eva hy astam ayate sa sma vidyotate diśaḥc sa varṣati sma varṣāṇi yathākālam atandritaḥe taṃ baliṃ nādhigacchāmi brahmann ācakṣva me balima sa vāyur varuṇaś caiva sa raviḥ sa ca candramāḥc so gnis tapati bhūtāni pṛthivī ca bhavaty utae taṃ baliṃ nādhigacchāmi brahmann ācakṣva me balim brahmovācaa naitat te sādhu maghavan yad etad anupṛcchasic pṛṣṭas tu nānṛtaṃ brūyāt tasmād vakṣyāmi te balima uṣṭreṣu yadi vā goṣu khareṣv aśveṣu vā punaḥc variṣṭho bhavitā jantuḥ śūnyāgāre śacīpate śakra uvācaa yadi sma balinā brahmañ śūnyāgāre sameyivānc hanyām enaṃ na vā hanyāṃ tad brahmann anuśādhi mām brahmovācaa mā sma śakra baliṃ hiṃsīr na balir vadham arhatic nyāyāṃs tu śakra praṣṭavyas tvayā vāsava kāmyayā bhīṣma uvācaa evam ukto bhagavatā mahendraḥ pṛthivīṃ tadāc cacārairāvataskandham adhiruhya śriyā vṛtaḥa tato dadarśa sa baliṃ kharaveṣeṇa saṃvṛtamc yathākhyātaṃ bhagavatā śūnyāgārakṛtālayam śakra uvācaa kharayonim anuprāptas tuṣabhakṣo si dānavac iyaṃ te yonir adhamā śocasy āho na śocasia adṛṣṭaṃ bata paśyāmi dviṣatāṃ vaśam āgatamc śriyā vihīnaṃ mitraiś ca bhraṣṭavīryaparākramama yat tad yānasahasreṇa jñātibhiḥ parivāritaḥc lokān pratāpayan sarvān yāsy asmān avitarkayana tvanmukhāś caiva daiteyā vyatiṣṭhaṃs tava śāsanec akṛṣṭapacyā pṛthivī tavaiśvarye babhūva hae idaṃ ca te dya vyasanaṃ śocasy āho na śocasia yadātiṣṭhaḥ samudrasya pūrvakūle vilelihanc jñātibhyo vibhajan vittaṃ tadāsīt te manaḥ kathama yat te sahasrasamitā nanṛtur devayoṣitaḥc bahūni varṣapūgāni vihāre dīpyataḥ śriyāa sarvāḥ puṣkaramālinyaḥ sarvāḥ kāñcanasaprabhāḥc katham adya tadā caiva manas te dānaveśvaraa chatraṃ tavāsīt sumahat sauvarṇaṃ maṇibhūṣitamc nanṛtur yatra gandharvāḥ ṣaṭsahasrāṇi saptadhāa yūpas tavāsīt sumahān yajataḥ sarvakāñcanaḥc yatrādadaḥ sahasrāṇām ayutāni gavāṃ daśad anantaraṃ sahasreṇa tadāsīd daitya kā matiḥa yadā tu pṛthivīṃ sarvāṃ yajamāno nuparyayāḥc śamyākṣepeṇa vidhinā tadāsīt kiṃ nu te hṛdia na te paśyāmi bhṛṅgāraṃ na chatraṃ vyajanaṃ na cac brahmadattāṃ ca te mālāṃ na paśyāmy asurādhipad bhīṣma uvācad tataḥ prahasya sa balir vāsavena samīritamd niśamya mānagambhīraṃ surarājam athābravītd aho hi tava bāliśyam iha devagaṇādhipad ayuktaṃ devarājasya tava kaṣṭam idaṃ vacaḥ balir uvācaa na tvaṃ paśyasi bhṛṅgāraṃ na hīmām āsurīṃ vedmi na daivīṃ na ca mānuṣīmc tvam evaināṃ pṛccha mā vā yatheṣṭaṃ kuru vāsava śakra uvācaa kā tvaṃ baler apakrāntā rocamānā śikhaṇḍinīc ajānato mamācakṣva nāmadheyaṃ śucismitea kā tvaṃ tiṣṭhasi māyeva dīpyamānā svatejasāc hitvā daityeśvaraṃ subhru tan mamācakṣva tattvataḥ śrīr uvācaa na mā virocano veda na mā vairocano baliḥc āhur māṃ duḥsahety evaṃ vidhitseti ca māṃ viduḥa bhūtir lakṣmīti mām āhuḥ śrīr ity evaṃ ca vāsavac tvaṃ māṃ śakra na jānīṣe sarve devā na māṃ viduḥ śakra uvācaa kim idaṃ tvaṃ mama kṛte utāho balinaḥ kṛteb yad guṇeṣu ca lubdhāsi baler apanayas tu kaḥc duḥsahe vijahāsy enaṃ cirasaṃvāsinī satī śrīr uvācaa na dhātā na vidhātā māṃ vidadhāti kathaṃ canac kālas tu śakra paryāyān mainaṃ śakrāvamanyathāḥ śakra uvācaa kathaṃ tvayā balis tyaktaḥ kimarthaṃ vā śikhaṇḍinic kathaṃ ca māṃ na jahyās tvaṃ tan me brūhi śucismite śrīr uvācaa satye sthitāsmi dāne ca vrate tapasi caiva hic parākrame ca dharme ca parācīnas tato baliḥa brahmaṇyo yaṃ sadā bhūtvā satyavādī jitendriyaḥc abhyasūyad brāhmaṇān vai ucchiṣṭaś cāspṛśad ghṛtama yajñaśīlaḥ purā bhūtvā mām eva yajatety ayamc provāca lokān mūḍhātmā kālenopanipīḍitaḥa apākṛtā tataḥ śakra tvayi vatsyāmi vāsavac apramattena dhāryāsmi tapasā vikrameṇa ca śakra uvācaa asti devamanuṣyeṣu sarvabhūteṣu vā pumānc yas tvām eko viṣahituṃ śaknuyāt kamalālaye śrīr uvācaa naiva devo na gandharvo nāsuro na ca rākṣasaḥc yo mām eko viṣahituṃ śaktaḥ kaś cit puraṃdara śakra uvācaa tiṣṭhethā mayi nityaṃ tvaṃ yathā tad brūhi me śubhec tat kariṣyāmi te vākyam ṛtaṃ tvaṃ vaktum arhasi śrīr uvācaa sthāsyāmi nityaṃ devendra yathā tvayi nibodha tatc vidhinā vedadṛṣṭena caturdhā vibhajasva mām śakra uvācaa ahaṃ vai tvā nidhāsyāmi yathāśakti yathābalamc na tu me tikramaḥ syād vai sadā lakṣmi tavāntikea bhūmir eva manuṣyeṣu dhāraṇī bhūtabhāvinīc sā te pādaṃ titikṣeta samarthā hīti me matiḥ śrīr uvācaa eṣa me nihitaḥ pādo yo yaṃ bhūmau pratiṣṭhitaḥc dvitīyaṃ śakra pādaṃ me tasmāt sunihitaṃ kuru śakra uvācaa āpa eva manuṣyeṣu dravantyaḥ paricārikāḥc tās te pādaṃ titikṣantām alam āpas titikṣitum śrīr uvācaa eṣa me nihitaḥ pādo yo yam apsu pratiṣṭhitaḥc tṛtīyaṃ śakra pādaṃ me tasmāt sunihitaṃ kuru śakra uvācaa yasmin devāś ca yajñāś ca yasmin vedāḥ pratiṣṭhitāḥc tṛtīyaṃ pādam agnis te sudhṛtaṃ dhārayiṣyati śrīr uvācaa eṣa me nihitaḥ pādo yo yam agnau pratiṣṭhitaḥc caturthaṃ śakra pādaṃ me tasmāt sunihitaṃ kuru śakra uvācaa ye vai santo manuṣyeṣu brahmaṇyāḥ satyavādinaḥc te te pādaṃ titikṣantām alaṃ santas titikṣitum śrīr uvācaa eṣa me nihitaḥ pādo yo yaṃ satsu pratiṣṭhitaḥc evaṃ vinihitāṃ śakra bhūteṣu paridhatsva mām śakra uvāca bhūmiśuddhiṃ tataḥ kṛtvā adbhiḥ saṃtarpayanti ye bhūtāni ca yajanty agnau teṣāṃ tvam anapāyinī ye kriyābhiḥ suraktābhir hetuyuktāḥ samāhitāḥ jñānavanto vivatsāyāṃ labdhā mādyanti yoginaḥa bhūtānām iha vai yas tvā mayā vinihitāṃ satīmc upahanyāt sa me dviṣyāt tathā śṛṇvantu me vacaḥ bhīṣma uvāca tatheti coktvā sā bhraṣṭā sarvalokanamaskṛtā vāsavaṃ pālayām āsa sā devī kamalālayāa tatas tyaktaḥ śriyā rājā daityānāṃ balir abravītc yāvat purastāt pratapet tāvad vai dakṣiṇāṃ diśama paścimāṃ tāvad evāpi tathodīcīṃ divākaraḥc tathā madhyaṃdine sūryo astam eti yadā tadāe punar devāsuraṃ yuddhaṃ bhāvi jetāsmi vas tadāa sarvāṃl lokān yadāditya ekasthas tāpayiṣyatic tadā devāsure yuddhe jetāhaṃ tvāṃ śatakrato śakra uvācaa brahmaṇāsmi samādiṣṭo na hantavyo bhavān itic tena te haṃ bale vajraṃ na vimuñcāmi mūrdhania yatheṣṭaṃ gaccha daityendra svasti te stu mahāsurac ādityo nāvatapitā kadā cin madhyataḥ sthitaḥa sthāpito hy asya samayaḥ pūrvam eva svayaṃbhuvāc ajasraṃ pariyāty eṣa satyenāvatapan prajāḥa ayanaṃ tasya ṣaṇmāsā uttaraṃ dakṣiṇaṃ tathāc yena saṃyāti lokeṣu śītoṣṇe visṛjan raviḥ bhīṣma uvācaa evam uktas tu daityendro balir indreṇa bhāratac jagāma dakṣiṇām āśām udīcīṃ tu puraṃdaraḥa ity etad balinā gītam anahaṃkārasaṃjñitamc vākyaṃ śrutvā sahasrākṣaḥ kham evāruruhe tadā bhīṣma uvāca yudhiṣṭhira uvāca vyasaneṣu nimagnasya kiṃ śreyas tad bravīhi me bhūya eva mahābāho sthityarthaṃ taṃ bravīhi mea atraivodāharantīmam itihāsaṃ purātanamc śatakratoś ca saṃvādaṃ namuceś ca yudhiṣṭhiraa śriyā vihīnam āsīnam akṣobhyam iva sāgaramc bhavābhavajñaṃ bhūtānām ity uvāca puraṃdaraḥa baddhaḥ pāśaiś cyutaḥ sthānād dviṣatāṃ vaśam āgataḥc śriyā vihīno namuce śocasy āho na śocasi namucir uvācaa anavāpyaṃ ca śokena śarīraṃ copatapyatec amitrāś ca prahṛṣyanti nāsti śoke sahāyatāa tasmāc chakra na śocāmi sarvaṃ hy evedam antavatc saṃtāpād bhraśyate rūpaṃ dharmaś caiva sureśvarac   saṃtāpād bhraśyate śriyaḥc saṃtāpād bhraśyate cāyura vinīya khalu tad duḥkham āgataṃ vaimanasyajamc dhyātavyaṃ manasā hṛdyaṃ kalyāṇaṃ saṃvijānatāa yathā yathā hi puruṣaḥ kalyāṇe kurute manaḥc tadaivāsya prasīdanti sarvārthā nātra saṃśayaḥa ekaḥ śāstā na dvitīyo sti śāstāgarbhe śayānaṃ puruṣaṃ śāsti śāstāc tenānuśiṣṭaḥ pravaṇād ivodakaṃyathā niyukto smi tathā vahāmia bhāvābhāvāv abhijānan garīyojānāmi śreyo na tu tat karomic āśāḥ suśarmyāḥ suhṛdāṃ sukurvanyathā niyukto smi tathā vahāmia yathā yathāsya prāptavyaṃ prāpnoty eva tathā tathāc bhavitavyaṃ yathā yac ca bhavaty eva tathā tathāa yatra yatraiva saṃyuṅkte dhātā garbhaṃ punaḥ punaḥc tatra tatraiva vasati na yatra svayam icchatia bhāvo yo yam anuprāpto bhavitavyam idaṃ mamac iti yasya sadā bhāvo na sa muhyet kadā canaa paryāyair hanyamānānām abhiyoktā na vidyatec duḥkham etat tu yad dveṣṭā kartāham iti manyatea ṛṣīṃś ca devāṃś ca mahāsurāṃś catraividyavṛddhāṃś ca vane munīṃś cac kān nāpado nopanamanti lokeparāvarajñās tu na saṃbhramantia na paṇḍitaḥ krudhyati nāpi sajjatena cāpi anujātasya dhātāro vidadhuḥ purāc tad evānubhaviṣyāmi kiṃ me mṛtyuḥ kariṣyatia labdhavyāny eva labhate gantavyāny eva gacchatic prāptavyāny eva prāpnoti duḥkhāni ca sukhāni caa etad viditvā kārtsnyena yo na muhyati mānavaḥc kuśalaḥ sukhaduḥkheṣu sa vai sarvadhaneśvaraḥ yudhiṣṭhira uvācaa magnasya vyasane kṛcchre kiṃ śreyaḥ puruṣasya hic bandhunāśe mahīpāla rājyanāśe pi vā punaḥa tvaṃ hi naḥ paramo sahaa ete cānye ca bahavaḥ pūrve pūrvatarāś ca yec daityendrā dānavendrāś ca yāṃś cānyān anuśuśrumaa bahavaḥ pūrvadaityendrāḥ saṃtyajya pṛthivīṃ gatāḥc kālenābhyāhatāḥ sarve kālo hi balavattaraḥa hataujasaḥa aham aindrac cyutaḥ sthānāt tvam indraḥ prakṛto divic sucitre jīvaloke sminn upāsyaḥ kālaparyayāta kiṃ hi kṛtvā tvam indro dya kiṃ hi kṛtvā cyutā vayamc kālaḥ kartā vikartā ca sarvam anyad nirapatrapaa tvam eva hi purā vettha yat tadā pauruṣaṃ mamac samareṣu ca vikrāntaṃ paryāptaṃ tan nidarśanama ādityāś caiva rudrāś ca sādhyāś ca vasubhiḥ sahac mayā vinirjitāḥ sarve marutaś ca śacīpatea tvam eva śakra jānāsi devāsurasamāgamec sametā vibudhā bhagnās tarasā samare mayāa parvatāś cāsakṛt kṣiptāḥ savanāḥ savanaukasaḥc saṭaṅkaśikharā ghorāḥ samare mūrdhni te mayāa kiṃ nu śakyaṃ mayā kartuṃ yat kālo duratikramaḥc na hi tvāṃ notsahe hantuṃ savajram api muṣṭināa na tu vikramakālo yaṃ kṣamākālo yam āgataḥc tena tvā marṣaye śakra durmarṣaṇataras tvayāa tvaṃ mā pariṇate kāle parītaṃ kālavahnināc niyataṃ kālapāśena baddhaṃ śakra vikatthasea ayaṃ sa puruṣaḥ śyāmo lokasya duratikramaḥc baddhvā tiṣṭhati māṃ raudraḥ paśuṃ raśanayā yathāa lābhālābhau sukhaṃ duḥkhaṃ kāmakrodhau bhavābhavauc vadho bandhaḥ pramokṣaś ca sarvaṃ kālena labhyatea nāhaṃ kartā na kartā tvaṃ kartā yas tu sadā prabhuḥc so yaṃ pacati kālo māṃ vṛkṣe phalam ivāgatama yāny eva puruṣaḥ kurvan sukhaiḥ kālena yujyatec punas tāny eva kurvāṇo duḥkhaiḥ kālena yujyatea na ca kālena kālajñaḥ spṛṣṭaḥ śocitum arhatic tena śakra na śocāmi nāsti śoke sahāyatāa yadā hi śocatāṃ śoko vyasanaṃ nāpakarṣatic sāmarthyaṃ śocato nāsti nādya śocāmy ahaṃ tataḥa evam uktaḥ sahasrākṣo bhagavān pākaśāsanaḥc pratisaṃhṛtya saṃrambham ity uvāca śatakratuḥa savajram udyataṃ bāhuṃ dṛṣṭvā pāśāṃś ca vāruṇānc kasyeha na vyathed buddhir mṛtyor api jighāṃsataḥa sā te na vyathate buddhir acalā tattvadarśinīc bruvan na vyathase sa tvaṃ vākyaṃ satyaparākramaa ho hi viśvāsam artheṣu śarīre vā śarīrabhṛtc kartum utsahate loke dṛṣṭvā saṃprasthitaṃ jagata aham apy evam evainaṃ lokaṃ jānāmy aśāśvatamc kālāgnāv āhitaṃ ghore guhye satatage kṣarea na cātra parihāro sti kālaspṛṣṭasya kasya citc sūkṣmāṇāṃ mahatāṃ caiva bhūtānāṃ paripacyatāma anīśasyāpramattasya bhūtāni pacataḥ sadāc anivṛttasya kālasya kṣayaṃ prāpto na mucyatea apramattaḥ pramatteṣu kālo jāgarti dehiṣuc prayatnenāpy atikrānto dṛṣṭapūrvo na kena cita purāṇaḥ śāśvato dharmaḥ sarvaprāṇabhṛtāṃ samaḥc kālo na parihāryaś ca na cāsyāsti vyatikramaḥa ahorātrāṃś ca māsāṃś ca kṣaṇān kāṣṭhāḥ kalā lavānc saṃpiṇḍayati naḥ kālo vṛddhiṃ vārdhuṣiko yathāa idam adya kariṣyāmi śvaḥ kartāsmīti vādinamc kālo harati saṃprāpto nadīvega ivoḍupama idānīṃ tāvad evāsau mayā dṛṣṭaḥ kathaṃ mṛtaḥc iti kālena hriyatāṃ pralāpaḥ śrūyate nṛṇāma naśyanty arthās tathā bhogāḥ sthānam aiśvaryam eva cac anityam adhruvaṃ sarvaṃ vyavasāyo hi duṣkaraḥd jīvitaṃ jīvalokasya kālenāgamya nīyated ahaṃ sukhīti nityaṃ ca manasāpi na cintayete ucchrāyā vinipātāntā bhāvo bhāvastha eva caa sā te na vyathate buddhir acalā tattvadarśinīc aham āsaṃ purā ceti manasāpi na budhyasea kālenākramya loke smin pacyamāne balīyasāc ajyeṣṭham akaniṣṭhaṃ ca kṣipyamāṇo na budhyasea
