bahumānāvamānayoḥa hāvam ābharaṇaṃ veṣaṃ gatiṃ sthitim avekṣitumc asevanta bhujiṣyā vai durjanācaritaṃ vidhima striyaḥ puruṣaveṣeṇa puṃsaḥ strīveṣadhāriṇaḥc krīḍārativihāreṣu parāṃ mudam avāpnuvana prabhavadbhiḥ purā dāyān arhebhyaḥ pratipāditānc nābhyavartanta nāstikyād vartantaḥ saṃbhaveṣv apia mitreṇābhyarthitaṃ mitram arthe saṃśayite kva citc vālakoṭyagramātreṇa svārthenāghnata tad vasua parasvādānarucayo vipaṇyavyavahāriṇaḥc adṛśyantāryavarṇeṣu śūdrāś cāpi tapodhanāḥa adhīyante vratāḥ ke cid vṛthāvratam athāparec aśuśrūṣur guroḥ śiṣyaḥ kaś cic chiṣyasakho guruḥa pitā caiva janitrī ca śrāntau vṛttotsavāv ivac aprabhutve sthitau vṛddhāv annaṃ prārthayataḥ sutāna tatra vedavidaḥ prājñā gāmbhīrye sāgaropamāḥc kṛṣyādiṣv abhavan saktā mūrkhāḥ śrāddhāny abhuñjataa prātaḥ prātaś ca supraśnaṃ kalpanaṃ preṣaṇakriyāḥc śiṣyānuprahitās tasminn akurvan guravaś ca haa śvaśrūśvaśurayor agre vadhūḥ preṣyān aśāsatac anvaśāsac ca bhartāraṃ samāhūyābhijalpatīa prayatnenāpi cārakṣac cittaṃ putrasya vai pitāc vyabhajaṃś cāpi saṃrambhād duḥkhavāsaṃ tathāvasana agnidāhena corair vā rājabhir vā hṛtaṃ dhanamc dṛṣṭvā dveṣāt prāhasanta suhṛtsaṃbhāvitā hy apia kṛtaghnā nāstikāḥ pāpā gurudārābhimarśinaḥc abhakṣyabhakṣaṇaratā nirmaryādā hatatviṣaḥd śvaśurānugatāḥ sarve hy utsṛjya pitarau sutāḥd svakarmaṇā ca jāto ham ity evaṃvādinas tathāa teṣv evamādīn ācārān ācaratsu viparyayec nāhaṃ devendra vatsyāmi dānaveṣv iti me matiḥa tāṃ māṃ svayam anuprāptām abhinanda śacīpatec tvayārcitāṃ māṃ deveśa purodhāsyanti devatāḥa yatrāhaṃ tatra matkāntā madviśiṣṭā madarpaṇāḥc sapta devyo mayāṣṭamyo vāsaṃ ceṣyanti me ṣṭadhāa āśā śraddhā dhṛtiḥ kāntir vijitiḥ sannatiḥ kṣamāc aṣṭamī vṛttir etāsāṃ purogā pākaśāsanaa tāś cāhaṃ cāsurāṃs tyaktvā yuṣmadviṣayam āgatāc tridaśeṣu nivatsyāmo dharmaniṣṭhāntarātmasu bhīṣma uvācaa ity uktavacanāṃ devīm atyarthaṃ tau nanandatuḥc nāradaś ca trilokarṣir vṛtrahantā ca vāsavaḥa tato nalasakho vāyuḥ pravavau devaveśmasuc iṣṭagandhaḥ sukhasparśaḥ sarvendriyasukhāvahaḥa śucau cābhyarcite deśe tridaśāḥ prāyaśaḥ sthitāḥc lakṣmyā sahitam āsīnaṃ maghavantaṃ didṛkṣavaḥa tato divaṃ prāpya sahasralocanaḥśriyopapannaḥ suhṛdā surarṣiṇāc rathena haryaśvayujā surarṣabhaḥsadaḥ surāṇām abhisatkṛto yayaua atheṅgitaṃ vajradharasya nāradaḥśriyāś ca devyā manasā vicārayanc śriyai śaśaṃsāmaradṛṣṭapauruṣaḥśivena tatrāgamanaṃ maharddhimata tato mṛtaṃ dyauḥ pravavarṣa bhāsvatīpitāmahasyāyatane svayaṃbhuvaḥc anāhatā dundubhayaś ca nediretathā prasannāś ca diśaś cakāśirea yathartu sasyeṣu vavarṣa vāsavona dharmamārgād vicacāla kaś canac anekaratnākarabhūṣaṇā ca bhūḥsughoṣaghoṣā bhuvanaukasāṃ jayea kriyābhirāmā manujā yaśasvinobabhuḥ śubhe puṇyakṛtāṃ pathi sthitāḥc narāmarāḥ kiṃnarayakṣarākṣasāḥsamṛddhimantaḥ sukhino yaśasvinaḥa na jātv akāle kusumaṃ kutaḥ phalaṃpapāta vṛkṣāt pavaneritād apic rasapradāḥ kāmadughāś ca dhenavona dāruṇā vāg vicacāra kasya cita imāṃ saparyāṃ saha sarvakāmadaiḥśriyāś ca śakrapramukhaiś ca daivataiḥc paṭhanti ye viprasadaḥ samāgamesamṛddhakāmāḥ śriyam āpnuvanti tea tvayā kurūṇāṃ vara yat pracoditaṃbhavābhavasyeha paraṃ nidarśanamc tad adya sarvaṃ parikīrtitaṃ mayāparīkṣya tattvaṃ parigantum arhasid saṃsmṛtya buddhīndriyagocarātigaṃd svagocare sarvakṛtālayaṃ tamd hariṃ mahāpāpaharaṃ janās ted saṃsmṛtya saṃpūjya vidhūtapāpāḥd yamaiś ca nityaṃ niyamaiś ca saṃyatāsd tattvaṃ ca viṣṇoḥ paripaśyamānāḥd devānusāreṇa vimuktiyogaṃd te gāhamānāḥ param āpnuvantid evaṃ rājendra satataṃ japahomaparāyaṇaḥd vāsudevaparo nityaṃ jñānadhyānaparāyaṇaḥd dānadharmaratir nityaṃ prajās tvaṃ paripālayad vāsudevaparo nityaṃ jñānadhyānaparāyaṇānd viśeṣeṇārcayethās tvaṃ satataṃ paryupāssva ca yudhiṣṭhira uvācaa kiṃśīlaḥ kiṃsamācāraḥ kiṃvidyaḥ kiṃparāyaṇaḥc prāpnoti brahmaṇaḥ sthānaṃ yat paraṃ prakṛter dhruvam bhīṣma uvācaa mokṣadharmeṣu niyato laghvāhāro jitendriyaḥc prāpnoti brahmaṇaḥ sthānaṃ yat paraṃ prakṛter dhruvama atrāpy udāharantīmam itihāsaṃ purātanamc jaigīṣavyasya saṃvādam asitasya ca bhāratad mahādevāntare vṛttaṃ devyāś caivāntare tathād yathāvac chṛṇu rājendra jñānadaṃ pāpanāśanama jaigīṣavyaṃ mahāprājñaṃ dharmāṇām āgatāgamamc akrudhyantam ahṛṣyantam asito devalo bravīta na prīyase vandyamāno nindyamāno na kupyasic kā te prajñā kutaś caiṣā kiṃ caitasyāḥ parāyaṇama iti tenānuyuktaḥ sa tam uvāca mahātapāḥc mahad vākyam asaṃdigdhaṃ puṣkalārthapadaṃ śucia yā gatir yā parā niṣṭhā yā śāntiḥ puṇyakarmaṇāmc tāṃ te haṃ saṃpravakṣyāmi yan māṃ pṛcchasi vai dvijaa nindatsu ca samo nityaṃ praśaṃsatsu ca devalac nihnuvanti ca ye teṣāṃ samayaṃ sukṛtaṃ ca yea uktāś ca na vivakṣanti vaktāram ahite ratamc pratihantuṃ na cecchanti hantāraṃ vai manīṣiṇaḥa nāprāptam anuśocanti prāptakālāni kurvatec na cātītāni śocanti na cainān pratijānatea saṃprāptānāṃ ca pūjyānāṃ kāmād artheṣu devalac yathopapattiṃ kurvanti śaktimantaḥ kṛtavratāḥa pakvavidyā mahāprājñā jitakrodhā jitendriyāḥc manasā karmaṇā vācā nāparādhyanti kasya cita anīrṣavo na cānyonyaṃ vihiṃsanti kadā canac na ca jātūpatapyante dhīrāḥ parasamṛddhibhiḥa nindāpraśaṃse cātyarthaṃ na vadanti parasya yec na ca nindāpraśaṃsābhyāṃ vikriyante kadā canaa sarvataś ca praśāntā ye sarvabhūtahite ratāḥc na krudhyanti na hṛṣyanti nāparādhyanti kasya cite vimucya hṛdayagranthīṃś caṅkamyante yathāsukhama na yeṣāṃ bāndhavāḥ santi ye cānyeṣāṃ na bāndhavāḥc amitrāś ca na santy eṣāṃ ye cāmitrā na kasya cita ya evaṃ kurvate martyāḥ sukhaṃ jīvanti sarvadāc dharmam evānuvartante dharmajñā dvijasattamae ye hy ato vicyutā mārgāt te hṛṣyanty udvijanti caa āsthitas tam ahaṃ mārgam asūyiṣyāmi kaṃ kathamc nindyamānaḥ praśasto vā hṛṣyeyaṃ kena hetunāa yad yad icchanti tan mārgam abhigacchanti mānavāḥc na me nindāpraśaṃsābhyāṃ hrāsavṛddhī bhaviṣyataḥa amṛtasyeva saṃtṛpyed avamānasya tattvavitc viṣasyevodvijen nityaṃ saṃmānasya vicakṣaṇaḥa avajñātaḥ sukhaṃ śete iha cāmutra cobhayoḥc vimuktaḥ sarvapāpebhyo yo vamantā sa badhyatea parāṃ gatiṃ ca ye ke cit prārthayanti manīṣiṇaḥc etad vrataṃ samāśritya sukham edhanti te janāḥa sarvataś ca samāhṛtya kratūn sarvāñ jitendriyaḥc prāpnoti brahmaṇaḥ sthānaṃ yat paraṃ prakṛter dhruvama nāsya devā na gandharvā na piśācā na rākṣasāḥc padam anvavarohanti prāptasya paramāṃ gatimd etac chrutvā munes tasya vacanaṃ devalas tathād tadadhīno bhavac chiṣyaḥ sarvadvaṃdvaviniṣṭhitaḥd athānyat tu purā vṛttaṃ jaigīṣavyasya dhīmataḥd śṛṇu rājann avahitaḥ sarvajñānasamanvitaḥd yam āhuḥ sarvalokeśaṃ sarvalokanamaskṛtamd aṣṭamūrtiṃ jaganmūrtim iṣṭasaṃdhivibhūṣitamd yaṃ prāptā na viṣīdanti na śocanty udvijanti cad yasya svābhāvikī śaktir idaṃ viśvaṃ carācaramd yāti sajjati sarvātmā sa devaḥ parameśvaraḥd meror uttarapūrve tu sarvaratnavibhūṣited acintye vimale sthāne sarvartukusumānvited vṛkṣaiś ca śobhate nityaṃ divyavāyusamīrited nānābhūtagaṇair yuktaḥ sarvadevanamaskṛtaḥd tatra vidyādharagaṇā gandharvāpsarasāṃ gaṇāḥd lokapālāḥ samudrāś ca nadyaḥ śailāḥ sarāṃsi cad ṛṣayo vālakhilyāś ca yajñāḥ stobhāhvayās tathād upāsāṃ cakrire devaṃ prajānāṃ patayas tathād tatra rudro mahādevo devyā caiva sahomayād āste vṛṣadhvajaḥ śrīmān somasūryāgnilocanaḥd tatraivaṃ devam ālokya devī dhātrī vibhāvarīd umā devī pareśānam apṛcchad vinayānvitād arthaḥ ko thārthaśaktiḥ kā bhagavan brūhi me rthitaḥd tayaivaṃ paripṛṣṭo sau prāha devo maheśvaraḥd artho ham arthaśaktis tvaṃ bhoktāhaṃ bhojyam eva cad rūpaṃ viddhi mahābhāge prakṛtis tvaṃ paro hy ahamd ahaṃ viṣṇur ahaṃ brahmā hy ahaṃ yajñas tathaiva cad āvayor na ca bhedo sti paramārthas tato baled tathāpi vidmas te bhedaṃ kiṃ māṃ tvaṃ paripṛcchasid evam uktā tataḥ prāha hy adhikaṃ hy etayor vadad śreṣṭhaṃ veda mahādeva nama ity eva bhāminīd tadantare sthito vidvān vasurūpo mahāmuniḥd jaigīṣavyaḥ smayan prāha hy artha ity eva nādayand śreṣṭho nyo smān mahīpiṇḍā tallīnā śaktir āparād mudrikādiviśeṣeṇa vistṛtā saṃbhṛteti cad tac chrutvā vacanaṃ devī ko sāv ity abravīd ruṣād vākyam asyādya saṃbhaṅktvā proktavān iti śaṃkaramd tac chrutvā nirgato dhīmān āśramaṃ svaṃ mahāmuniḥd sthānāt svargagaṇe vidvān yogaiśvaryasamanvitaḥd tataḥ prahasya bhagavān sarvapāpaharo haraḥd prāha devīṃ praśāntātmā jaigīṣavyo mahāmuniḥd bhakto mama sakhā caiva śiṣyaś cātra mahāmuniḥd jaigīṣavya iti khyātaḥ proktvāsau nirgataḥ śubhed tac chrutvā sātha saṃkruddhā na nyāyyaṃ tena vai kṛtamd vikṛtāhaṃ tvayā deva muninā ca tathā kṛtād atajjñād atha deveśa madhye prāptaṃ na tac chrutamd tac chrutvā bhagavān āha mahādevaḥ pinākabhṛtd nirapekṣo munir yogī mām upāśritya saṃsthitaḥd nirdvaṃdvaḥ satataṃ dhīmān samarūpasvabhāvadhṛtd tasmāt kṣamasva taṃ devi rakṣitavyas tvayā ca saḥd ity uktā prāha sā devī munes tasya mahātmanaḥd nirāśatvam ahaṃ draṣṭum icchāmy antakanāśanad tatheti coktvā tāṃ devo vṛṣam āruhya satvaramd devagandharvasaṃghaiś ca stūyamāno jagatpatiḥd ajarāmaraśuddhātmā yatrāste sa mahāmuniḥd itas tataḥ samāhṛtya vīrasaṃghair mahāyaśāḥd dehaprāvaraṇārthaṃ vai saṃsaran sa tadā muniḥd pratyudgamya mahādevaṃ yathārhaṃ pratipūjya cad punaḥ sa pūrvavat kanthāṃ sūcyā sūtreṇa sūcayatd tam āha bhagavāñ śaṃbhuḥ kiṃ pradāsyāmi te muned vṛṇīṣva mattaḥ sarvaṃ tvaṃ jaigīṣavya yadīcchasid nāvalokayamānas tu devadevaṃ mahāmunimd anavāptaṃ na paśyāmi tvatto govṛṣabhadhvajad kṛtārthaḥ paripūrṇo haṃ yat te kāryaṃ tu gamyatāmd prahasaṃs tu punaḥ śarvo vṛṇīṣveti tam abravītd avaśyaṃ hi varo mattaḥ śrāvyaṃ varam anuttamamd jaigīṣavyas tam āhedaṃ śrotavyaṃ ca tvayā mamad sūcīm anu mahādeva sūtraṃ samanugacchataḥtud tataḥ prahasya bhagavān gaurīm ālokya śaṃkaraḥd svasthānaṃ prayayau hṛṣṭaḥ sarvadevanamaskṛtaḥd etat te kathitaṃ rājan yasmāt tvaṃ paripṛcchasid nirdvaṃdvā yogino nityāḥ sarvaśas te svayaṃbhuvaḥ yudhiṣṭhira uvācaa priyaḥ sarvasya lokasya sarvasattvābhinanditāc guṇaiḥ sarvair upetaś ca ko nv asti bhuvi mānavaḥ bhīṣma uvācaa atra te vartayiṣyāmi pṛcchato bharatarṣabhac ugrasenasya saṃvādaṃ nārade keśavasya ca ugrasena uvācaa paśya saṃkalpate loko nāradasya prakīrtanec manye sa guṇasaṃpanno brūhi tan mama pṛcchataḥ vāsudeva uvācaa kukurādhipa yān manye śṛṇu tān me vivakṣataḥb yac chrutvā pārameṣṭhyena bhavec cāpy amalā matiḥc nāradasya guṇān sādhūn saṃkṣepeṇa narādhipaa na cāritranimitto syāhaṃkāro dehapātanaḥc abhinnaśrutacāritras tasmāt sarvatra pūjitaḥd aratiḥ krodhacāpalye bhayaṃ naitāni nāraded adīrghasūtraḥ śūraś ca tasmāt sarvatra pūjitaḥa tapasvī nārado bāḍhaṃ vāci nāsya vyatikramaḥc kāmād vā yadi vā lobhāt tasmāt sarvatra pūjitaḥa adhyātmavidhitattvajñaḥ kṣāntaḥ śakto jitendriyaḥc ṛjuś ca satyavādī ca tasmāt sarvatra pūjitaḥa tejasā yaśasā buddhyā nayena vinayena cac janmanā tapasā vṛddhas tasmāt sarvatra pūjitaḥa sukhaśīlaḥ susaṃbhogaḥ subhojyaḥ svādaraḥ śuciḥc suvākyaś cāpy anīrṣyaś ca tasmāt sarvatra pūjitaḥa kalyānaṃ kurute bāḍhaṃ pāpam asmin na vidyatec na prīyate parān arthais tasmāt sarvatra pūjitaḥa vedaśrutibhir ākhyānair arthān abhijigīṣatec titikṣur anavajñaś ca tasmāt sarvatra pūjitaḥa samatvād dhi priyo nāsti nāpriyaś ca kathaṃ canac manonukūlavādī ca tasmāt sarvatra pūjitaḥa bahuśrutaś caitrakathaḥ paṇḍito nalaso śaṭhaḥc adīno krodhano lubdhas tasmāt sarvatra pūjitaḥa nārthe na dharme kāme vā bhūtapūrvo sya vigrahaḥc doṣāś cāsya samucchinnās tasmāt sarvatra pūjitaḥa dṛḍhabhaktir anindyātmā śrutavān anṛśaṃsavānc vītasaṃmohadoṣaś ca tasmāt sarvatra pūjitaḥa asaktaḥ sarvasaṅgeṣu saktātmeva ca lakṣyatec adīrghasaṃśayo vāgmī tasmāt sarvatra pūjitaḥa samādhir nāsya mānārthe nātmānaṃ stauti karhi citc anīrṣyur dṛḍhasaṃbhāṣas tasmāt sarvatra pūjitaḥa lokasya vividhaṃ vṛttaṃ prakṛteś cāpy akutsayanc saṃsargavidyākuśalas tasmāt sarvatra pūjitaḥa nāsūyaty āgamaṃ kaṃ cit svaṃ tapo nopajīvatic avandhyakālo vaśyātmā tasmāt sarvatra pūjitaḥa kṛtaśramaḥ kṛtaprajño na ca tṛptaḥ samādhitaḥc niyamastho pramattaś ca tasmāt sarvatra pūjitaḥa sāpatrapaś ca yuktaś ca suneyaḥ śreyase paraiḥc abhettā paraguhyānāṃ tasmāt sarvatra pūjitaḥa na hṛṣyaty arthalābheṣu nālābheṣu vyathaty apic sthirabuddhir asaktātmā tasmāt sarvatra pūjitaḥa taṃ sarvaguṇasaṃpannaṃ dakṣaṃ śucim akātaramc kālajñaṃ ca nayajñaṃ ca kaḥ priyaṃ na kariṣyatid ity uktaḥ saṃpraśasyainam ugraseno gato gṛhātd āste kṛṣṇas tathaikānte paryaṅke ratnabhūṣited kadā cit tatra bhagavān praviveśa mahāmuniḥd tam abhyarcya yathānyāyaṃ tūṣṇīm āste janārdanaḥd taṃ khinnam iva saṃlakṣya keśavaṃ vākyam abravītd kim idaṃ keśava tava vaimanasyaṃ janārdanad śrīvāsudeva uvācad abhūtapūrvaṃ govinda tan me vyākhyātum arhasid nāsuhṛt paramaṃ me dya nāpado rhati veditumd apaṇḍito vāpi suhṛt paṇḍito vāpy anātmavānd sa tvaṃ suhṛc ca vidvāṃś ca jitātmā śrotum arhasid apy etad dhṛdi yad duḥkhaṃ tad bhavāñ śrotum arhatid dāsyam aiśvaryavādena jñātīnāṃ ca karomy ahamd dviṣanti satataṃ kruddhā jñātisaṃbandhibāndhavāḥd divyā api tathā bhogā dattās teṣāṃ mayā pṛthakd nārada uvācad tathāpi ca dviṣanto māṃ vartante ca parasparamd anāyasena śastreṇa parimṛjyānumṛjya cad bhagavān uvācad jihvām uddhara caiteṣāṃ na vakṣyanti tataḥ paramd anāyasaṃ kathaṃ vindyāṃ śastraṃ munivarottamad nārada uvācad yenaiṣām uddhare jihvāṃ brūhi tan me yathātathamd gohiraṇyaṃ ca vāsāṃsi ratnādyaṃ yad dhanaṃ bahud āsye prakṣipa caiteṣāṃ śastram etad anāyasamd suhṛtsaṃbandhimitrāṇāṃ gurūṇāṃ svajanasya cad ākhyātaṃ śastram etad dhi tena chindhi punaḥ punaḥd tavaiśvaryapradānāni ślāghyam eṣāṃ vacāṃsi cad bhīṣma uvācad samarthaṃ tvām abhijñāya pravadanti ca te narāḥd tataḥ prahasya bhagavān saṃpūjya ca mahāmunimd tathākaron mahātejā munivākyena coditaḥd evaṃprabhāvo brahmarṣir nārado munisattamaḥd pṛṣṭavān asi yan māṃ tvaṃ tad uktaṃ rājasattamad sarvadharmahite yuktāḥ satyadharmaparāyaṇāḥd lokapriyatvaṃ gacchanti jñānavijñānakovidāḥ yudhiṣṭhira uvācaa ādyantaṃ sarvabhūtānāṃ śrotum icchāmi kauravac dhyānaṃ karma ca kālaṃ ca tathaivāyur yuge yugea lokatattvaṃ ca kārtsnyena bhūtānām āgatiṃ gatimc sargaś ca nidhanaṃ caiva kuta etat pravartated bhedakaṃ bhedatattvaṃ ca tathānyeṣāṃ mataṃ tathād avasthātritayaṃ caiva yādṛśaṃ ca pitāmahaa yadi te nugrahe buddhir asmāsv iha satāṃ varac etad bhavantaṃ pṛcchāmi tad bhavān prabravītu mea pūrvaṃ hi kathitaṃ śrutvā bhṛgubhāṣitam uttamamc bharadvājasya viprarṣes tato me buddhir uttamāa jātā paramadharmiṣṭhā divyasaṃsthānasaṃsthitāc tato bhūyas tu pṛcchāmi tad bhavān vaktum arhati bhīṣma uvācaa atra te vartayiṣye ham itihāsaṃ purātanamc jagau yad bhagavān vyāsaḥ putrāya paripṛcchatea adhītya vedān akhilān sāṅgopaniṣadas tathāc anvicchan naiṣṭhikaṃ karma dharmanaipuṇadarśanāta kṛṣṇadvaipāyanaṃ vyāsaṃ putro vaiyāsakiḥ śukaḥc papraccha saṃdeham imaṃ chinnadharmārthasaṃśayama bhūtagrāmasya kartāraṃ kālajñāne ca niścayamb jñānaṃ brahma ca yogaṃ ca gavātmakam idaṃ jagatb tritaye tv enam āyāti tathā hy eṣo pi vā punaḥb kenaiva ca vibhāgaḥ syāt turīyo lakṣaṇair vināb jñānajñeyāntare ko sau ko yaṃ bhāvas tu bhedavatb yaj jñānaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ caiva teṣāṃ kartāram eva cac brāhmaṇasya ca yat kṛtyaṃ tad bhavān vaktum arhatia tasmai provāca tat sarvaṃ pitā putrāya pṛcchatec atītānāgate vidvān sarvajñaḥ sarvadharmavitd pṛcchatas tava satputra yathāvat kīrtayāmy ahamd śṛṇuṣvāvahito bhūtvā yathāvṛtam idaṃ jagatd kāryādi kāraṇāntaṃ yat kāryāntaṃ kāraṇādikamd jñānaṃ tad ubhayaṃ vittvā satyaṃ ca paramaṃ śubhamd brahmeti cābhivikhyātaṃ tad vai paśyanti sūrayaḥd brahma tejomayaṃ bhūtaṃ bhūtakāraṇam adbhutamd āsīd ādau tatas tv āhuḥ prādhānyam iti tadvidaḥd triguṇāṃ tāṃ mahāmāyāṃ vaiṣṇavīṃ prakṛtiṃ viduḥd tad īdṛśam anādyantam avyaktam ajaraṃ dhruvamd apratarkyam avijñeyaṃ brahmāgre vikṛtaṃ ca tatd tad vai pradhānam uddiṣṭaṃ trisūkṣmaṃ triguṇātmakamd samyag yogaguṇaṃ svasthaṃ tad icchākṣobhitaṃ mahatd śaktitrayātmikā tasya prakṛtiḥ kāraṇātmikād asvatantrā ca satataṃ vidadhiṣṭhānasaṃyutād svabhāvākhyaṃ samāpannā mohavigrahadhāriṇīd vividhasyāsya jīvasya bhogārthaṃ samupāgatād yathā saṃnidhimātreṇa gandhaḥ kṣobhāya jāyated manas tadvad aśeṣasya parāt para iti smṛtaḥd sṛṣṭvā praviśya tat tasmin kṣobhayām āsa viṣṭhitaḥd sāttviko rājasaś caiva tāmasaś ca tridhā mahānd pradhānatattvād udbhūto mahattvāc ca mahān smṛtaḥd pradhānatattvam udbhūtaṃ mahattattvaṃ samāvṛṇotd kālātmanābhibhūtaṃ tat kālo ṃśaḥ paramātmanaḥd puruṣaś cāprameyātmā sa eva iti gīyated triguṇo sau mahājñātaḥ pradhāna iti vai śrutiḥd sāttviko rājasaś caiva tāmasaś ca tridhātmakaḥd trividho yam ahaṃkāro mahattattvād ajāyatad tāmaso sāv ahaṃkāro bhūtādir iti saṃjñitaḥd bhūtānām ādibhūtatvād raktāhis tāmasaḥ smṛtaḥd bhūtādiḥ sa vikurvāṇaḥ śiṣṭaṃ tanmātrakaṃ tataḥd sasarja śabdaṃ tanmātram ākāśaṃ śabdalakṣaṇamd śabdalakṣaṇam ākāśaṃ śabdatanmātram āvṛṇotd tena saṃpīḍyamānas tu sparśamātraṃ sasarja had śabdamātraṃ tadākāśaṃ sparśamātraṃ samāvṛṇotd sasarja vāyus tenāsau pīḍyamāna iti śrutiḥd sparśamātraṃ tadā vāyū rūpamātraṃ samāvṛṇotd tena saṃpīḍyamānas tu sasarjāgnim iti śrutiḥd rūpamātraṃ tato vahniṃ samutsṛjya samāvṛṇotd tena saṃpīḍyamānas tu rasamātraṃ sasarja had rūpamātragataṃ tejo rasamātraṃ samāvṛṇotd tena saṃpīḍyamānas tu sasarjāmbha iti śrutiḥd rasamātrātmakaṃ bhūyo rasaṃ tanmātram āvṛṇotd tena saṃpīḍyamānas tu gandhaṃ tanmātrakaṃ tataḥd sasarja gandhaṃ tanmātram āvṛṇot karakaṃ tathād tena saṃpīḍyamānas tu kāṭhinyaṃ ca sasarja had pṛthivī jāyate tasmād gandhatanmātrajāt tathād ammayaṃ sarvam evedam āpas tastambhire punaḥd bhūtānīmāni jātāni pṛthivyādīni vai śrutiḥd bhūtānāṃ mūrtir evaiṣām annaṃ caiṣāṃ matā budhaiḥd tasmiṃs tasmiṃs tu tanmātrā tanmātrā iti te smṛtāḥd taijasānīndriyāṇy āhur devā vaikārikā daśad ekādaśaṃ manaś cātra devā vaikārikāḥ smṛtāḥd eṣām uddhartakaḥ kālo nānābhedavad āsthitaḥd paramātmā ca bhūtātmā guṇabhedena saṃsthitaḥd eka eva tridhā bhinnaḥ karoti vividhāḥ kriyāḥd brahmā sṛjati bhūtāni pāti nārāyaṇo vyayaḥd rudro hanti jaganmūrtiḥ kāla eṣa kriyābudhaḥd kālo pi tanmayo cintyas triguṇātmā sanātanaḥd avyakto sāv acintyo sau vartate bhinnalakṣaṇaḥd kālātmanā tv idaṃ bhinnam abhinnaṃ śrūyate hi yata anādyantam ajaṃ divyam ajaraṃ dhruvam avyayamc apratarkyam avijñeyaṃ brahmāgre samavartataa kāṣṭhā nimeṣā daśa pañca caivatriṃśat tu kāṣṭhā gaṇayet kalāṃ tāmc triṃśat kalāś cāpi bhaven muhūrtobhāgaḥ kalāyā daśamaś ca yaḥ syāta triṃśan muhūrtaś ca bhaved ahaś carātriś ca saṃkhyā munibhiḥ praṇītāc māsaḥ smṛto rātryahanī ca triṃśatsaṃvatsaro dvādaśamāsa uktaḥe saṃvatsaraṃ dve ayane vadantisaṃkhyāvido dakṣiṇam uttaraṃ caa ahorātre vibhajate sūryo mānuṣalaukikec rātriḥ svapnāya bhūtānāṃ ceṣṭāyai karmaṇām ahaḥa pitrye rātryahanī māsaḥ pravibhāgas tayoḥ punaḥc kṛṣṇo haḥ karmaceṣṭāyāṃ śuklaḥ svapnāya śarvarīa daive rātryahanī varṣaṃ pravibhāgas tayoḥ punaḥc ahas tatrodagayanaṃ rātriḥ syād dakṣiṇāyanama ye te rātryahanī pūrve kīrtite daivalaukikec tayoḥ saṃkhyāya varṣāgraṃ brāhme vakṣyāmy ahaḥkṣapea teṣāṃ saṃvatsarāgrāṇi pravakṣyāmy anupūrvaśaḥc kṛte tretāyuge caiva dvāpare ca kalau tathāa catvāry āhuḥ sahasrāṇi varṣāṇāṃ tat kṛtaṃ yugamc tasya tāvac chatī saṃdhyā saṃdhyāṃśaś ca tathāvidhaḥa itareṣu sasaṃdhyeṣu sasaṃdhyāṃśeṣu ca triṣuc ekāpāyena saṃyānti sahasrāṇi śatāni caa etāni śāśvatāṃl lokān dhārayanti sanātanānc etad brahmavidāṃ tāta viditaṃ brahma śāśvatama catuṣpāt sakalo dharmaḥ satyaṃ caiva kṛte yugec nādharmeṇāgamaḥ kaś cit paras tasya pravartatea itareṣv āgamād dharmaḥ pādaśas tv avaropyateb satyaṃ śaucaṃ tathāyuś ca dharmaś cāpaiti pādaśaḥc caurikānṛtamāyābhir adharmaś copacīyatea arogāḥ sarvasiddhārthāś caturvarṣaśatāyuṣaḥc kṛte tretādiṣv eteṣāṃ pādaśo hrasate vayaḥa vedavādāś cānuyugaṃ hrasantīti ca naḥ śrutamc āyūṃṣi cāśiṣaś caiva vedasyaiva ca yat phalama anye kṛtayuge dharmās tretāyāṃ dvāpare parec anye kaliyuge dharmā yathāśaktikṛtā ivaa tapaḥ paraṃ kṛtayuge tretāyāṃ jñānam uttamamc dvāpare yajñam evāhur dānam eva kalau yugea etāṃ dvādaśasāhasrīṃ yugākhyāṃ kavayo viduḥc sahasraṃ parivṛttaṃ tad brāhmaṃ divasam ucyatea rātris tāvat tithī brāhmī tadādau viśvam īśvaraḥc pralaye dhyātmam āviśya suptvā so nte vibudhyatea sahasrayugaparyantam ahar yad brahmaṇo viduḥc rātriṃ yugasahasrāntāṃ te horātravido janāḥa pratibuddho vikurute brahmākṣayyaṃ kṣapākṣayec sṛjate ca mahad bhūtaṃ tasmād vyaktātmakaṃ manaḥa brahma tejomayaṃ śukraṃ yasya sarvam idaṃ jagatc ekasya bhūtaṃ bhūtasya dvayaṃ sthāvarajaṅgamama ahar mukhe vibuddhaḥ san sṛjate vidyayā jagatc agra eva mahābhūtam āśu vyaktātmakaṃ manaḥa abhibhūyeha cārciṣmad vyasṛjat sapta mānasānc dūragaṃ bahudhāgāmi prārthanāsaṃśayātmakama manaḥ sṛṣṭiṃ vikurute codyamānaṃ sisṛkṣayāc ākāśaṃ jāyate tasmāt tasya śabdo guṇo mataḥa ākāśāt tu vikurvāṇāt sarvagandhavahaḥ śuciḥc balavāñ jāyate vāyus tasya sparśo guṇo mataḥa vāyor api vikurvāṇāj jyotir bhūtaṃ tamonudamc rociṣṇu jāyate tatra tad rūpaguṇam ucyatea jyotiṣo pi vikurvāṇād bhavanty āpo rasātmikāḥc adbhyo gandhaguṇā bhūmiḥ pūrvaiṣā sṛṣṭir ucyatea guṇāḥ pūrvasya pūrvasya prāpnuvanty uttarottaramc teṣāṃ yāvat tithaṃ yad yat tat tat tāvad guṇaṃ smṛtama upalabhyāpsu ced gandhaṃ ke cid brūyur anaipuṇātc pṛthivyām eva taṃ vidyād āpo vāyuṃ ca saṃśritama ete tu sapta puruṣā nānāviryāḥ pṛthak pṛthakc nāśaknuvan prajāḥ sraṣṭum asamāgamya sarvataḥa te sametya mahātmānam anyonyam abhisaṃśritāḥc śarīrāśrayaṇaṃ prāptās tataḥ puruṣa ucyatea śrayaṇāc charīraṃ bhavati mūrtimat ṣoḍaśātmakamc tad āviśanti bhūtāni mahānti saha karmaṇāa sarvabhūtāni cādāya tapasaś caraṇāya cac ādikartā mahābhūtaṃ tam evāhuḥ prajāpatima sa vai sṛjati bhūtāni sa eva puruṣaḥ paraḥc ajo janayate brahmā devarṣipitṛmānavāna lokān nadīḥ samudrāṃś ca diśaḥ śailān vanaspatīnc narakiṃnararakṣāṃsi vayaḥpaśumṛgoragāne avyayaṃ ca vyayaṃ caiva dvayaṃ sthāvarajaṅgamama teṣāṃ ye yāni karmāṇi prāk sṛṣṭyāṃ pratipedirec tāny eva pratipadyante sṛjyamānāḥ punaḥ punaḥa hiṃsrāhiṃsre mṛdukrūre dharmādharme ṛtānṛtec ato yan manyate dhātā tasmāt tat tasya rocatea mahābhūteṣu nānātvam indriyārtheṣu mūrtiṣuc viniyogaṃ ca bhūtānāṃ dhātaiva vidadhāty utaa ke cit puruṣakāraṃ tu prāhuḥ karmavido janāḥc daivam brūyuḥ sattvasthāḥ samadarśinaḥa tapo niḥśreyasaṃ jantos tasya mūlaṃ damaḥ śamaḥc tena sarvān avāpnoti yān kāmān manasecchatia tapasā tad avāpnoti yad bhūtaṃ sṛjate jagatc sa tadbhūtaś ca sarveṣāṃ bhūtānāṃ bhavati prabhuḥa ṛṣayas tapasā vedān adhyaiṣanta divāniśamc anādinidhanā nityā vāg utsṛṣṭā svayaṃbhuvād ādau vedamayī divyā yataḥ sarvāḥ pravṛttayaḥa ṛṣīṇāṃ nāmadheyāni yāś ca vedeṣu sṛṣṭayaḥb nānārūpaṃ ca bhūtānāṃ karmaṇāṃ ca pravartanamb vedaśabdebhya evādau nirmimīte sa īśvaraḥb nāmadheyāni carṣīṇāṃ yāś ca vedeṣu sṛṣṭayaḥc śarvaryanteṣu jātānāṃ tāny evaibhyo dadāti saḥa nāmabhedas tapaḥkarmayajñākhyā lokasiddhayaḥc ātmasiddhis tu vedeṣu procyate daśabhiḥ kramaiḥa yad uktaṃ vedavādeṣu gahanaṃ vedadṛṣṭibhiḥc tadanteṣu yathāyuktaṃ kramayogena lakṣyatea karmajo yaṃ pṛthagbhāvo dvaṃdvayukto viyoginaḥc ātmasiddhis tu vijñātā jahāti prāyaśo balama dve brahmaṇī veditavye śabdabrahma paraṃ ca yatc śabdabrahmaṇi niṣṇātaḥ paraṃ brahmādhigacchatia ārambhayajñāḥ kṣatrasya haviryajñā viśas tathāc paricārayajñāḥ śūdrās tu tapoyajñā dvijātayaḥa tretāyuge vidhis tv eṣāṃ yajñānāṃ na kṛte yugec dvāpare viplavaṃ yānti yajñāḥ kaliyuge tathāa apṛthagdharmiṇo martyā ṛksāmāni yajūṃṣi cac kāmyāṃ puṣṭiṃ pṛthag dṛṣṭvā tapobhis tapa eva caa tretāyāṃ tu samastās te prādurāsan mahābalāḥc saṃyantāraḥ sthāvarāṇāṃ jaṅgamānāṃ ca sarvaśaḥa tretāyāṃ saṃhatā hy ete yajñā varṇās tathaiva cac saṃrodhād āyuṣas tv ete vyasyante dvāpare yugea dṛśyante nāpi dṛśyante vedāḥ kaliyuge khilāḥc utsīdante sayajñāś ca kevalā dharmasetavaḥa kṛte yuge yas tu dharmo brāhmaṇeṣu pradṛśyatec ātmavatsu tapovatsu śrutavatsu pratiṣṭhitaḥa adharmavratasaṃyogaṃ yathādharmaṃ yuge yugec vikriyante svadharmasthā vedavādā yathāyugama yathā viśvāni bhūtāni vṛṣṭyā bhūyāṃsi prāvṛṣic sṛjyante jaṅgamasthāni tathā dharmā yuge yugea yathartuṣv ṛtuliṅgāni nānārūpāṇi paryayec dṛśyante tāni tāny eva tathā brahmāharātriṣua vihitaṃ kālanānātvam anādinidhanaṃ tathāc kīrtitaṃ yat purastāt te tat sūte cātti ca prajāḥa dadhāti prabhave sthānaṃ bhūtānāṃ saṃyamo yamaḥc svabhāvenaiva vartante dvaṃdvayuktāni bhūriśaḥa sargaḥ kālaḥ kriyā vedāḥ kartā kāryaṃ kriyā phalamc proktaṃ te putra sarvaṃ vai yan māṃ tvaṃ paripṛcchasia pratyāhāraṃ tu vakṣyāmi śarvaryādau gate hanic yathedaṃ kurute dhyātmaṃ susūkṣmaṃ viśvam īśvaraḥa divi sūryās tathā sapta dahanti śikhino rciṣāc sarvam etat tadārcirbhiḥ pūrṇaṃ jājvalyate jagat vyāsa uvācaa pṛthivyāṃ yāni bhūtāni jaṅgamāni dhruvāṇi cac tāny evāgre pralīyante bhūmitvam upayānti caa tataḥ pralīne sarvasmin sthāvare jaṅgame tathāc akāṣṭhā nistṛṇā bhūmir dṛśyate kūrmapṛṣṭhavata bhūmer api guṇaṃ gandham āpa ādadate yadāc āttagandhā tadā bhūmiḥ pralayatvāya kalpatea āpas tataḥ pratiṣṭhanti ūrmimatyo mahāsvanāḥc sarvam evedam āpūrya tiṣṭhanti ca caranti caa apām api guṇāṃs tāta jyotir ādadate yadāc āpas tadā āttaguṇā jyotiṣy uparamanti caa yadādityaṃ sthitaṃ madhye gūhanti śikhino rciṣaḥc sarvam evedam arcirbhiḥ pūrṇaṃ jājvalyate nabhaḥa jyotiṣo pi guṇaṃ rūpaṃ vāyur ādadate yadāc praśāmyati tadā jyotir vāyur dodhūyate mahāna tatas tu mūlam āsādya vāyuḥ saṃbhavam ātmanaḥc adhaś cordhvaṃ ca tiryak ca dodhavīti diśo daśaa vāyor api guṇaṃ sparśam ākāśaṃ grasate yadāc praśāmyati tadā vāyuḥ khaṃ tu tiṣṭhati nānadatd arūpam arasasparśam agandhaṃ na ca mūrtimatd sarvalokapraṇaditaṃ svaṃ tu tiṣṭhati nānadata ākāśasya guṇaṃ śabdam abhivyaktātmakaṃ manaḥb grasate ca yadā so pi śāmyati pratisaṃcarec manaso vyaktam avyaktaṃ brāhmaḥ sa pratisaṃcaraḥa tad ātmaguṇam āviśya mano grasati candramāḥc manasy uparate dhyātmā candramasy avatiṣṭhatea taṃ tu kālena mahatā saṃkalpaḥ kurute vaśec cittaṃ grasati saṃkalpas tac ca jñānam anuttamama kālo girati vijñānaṃ kālo balam iti śrutiḥc balaṃ kālo grasati tu taṃ vidvān kurute vaśea ākāśasya tadā ghoṣaṃ taṃ vidvān kurute tmanic tad avyaktaṃ paraṃ brahma tac chāśvatam anuttamame evaṃ sarvāṇi bhūtāni brahmaiva pratisaṃcaraḥa yathāvat kīrtitaṃ samyag evam etad asaṃśayamc bodhyaṃ vidyāmayaṃ dṛṣṭvā yogibhiḥ paramātmabhiḥa evaṃ vistārasaṃkṣepau brahmāvyakte punaḥ punaḥc yugasāhasrayor ādāv ahno rātryās tathaiva ca vyāsa uvācaa bhūtagrāme niyuktaṃ yat tad etat kīrtitaṃ mayāc brāhmaṇasya tu yat kṛtyaṃ tat te vakṣyāmi pṛcchatea jātakarmaprabhṛty asya karmaṇāṃ dakṣiṇāvatāmc kriyā syād ā samāvṛtter ācārye vedapāragea adhītya vedān akhilān guruśuśrūṣaṇe rataḥc gurūṇām anṛṇo vyaktasaṃjñakaḥc tatrāvyaktamayīṃ vyākhyāṃ śṛṇu tvaṃ vistareṇa mee tathā vyaktamayīṃ caiva saṃkhyāṃ pūrvaṃ nibodha mea pañcaviṃśatitattvāni tulyāny ubhayataḥ samamc yoge sāṃkhye pi ca tathā viśeṣāṃs mānavāḥc daivam eke praśaṃsanti svabhāvaṃ cāpare janāḥa pauruṣaṃ karma daivaṃ ca phalavṛttisvabhāvataḥc trayam etat pṛthagbhūtam avivekaṃ tu ke canaa evam etan na cāpy evam ubhe cāpi na cāpy ubhec karmasthā viṣamaṃ brūyuḥ sattvasthāḥ samadarśinaḥa tretāyāṃ dvāpare caiva kalijāś ca sasaṃśayāḥb tretāyuge vidhis tv eṣa dharmāṇāṃ na kṛte yugec tapasvinaḥ praśāntāś ca sattvasthāś ca kṛte yugea apṛthagdarśinaḥ sarve ṛksāmasu yajuḥṣu cac kāmadveṣau pṛthag dṛṣṭvā tapaḥ kṛta upāsatea tapodharmeṇa saṃyuktas taponityaḥ susaṃśitaḥc tena sarvān avāpnoti kāmān yān manasecchatia tapasā tad avāpnoti yad bhūtvā sṛjate jagatc tadbhūtaś ca tataḥ sarvo bhūtānāṃ bhavati prabhuḥa tad uktaṃ vedavādeṣu gahanaṃ vedadarśibhiḥc vedānteṣu punar vyaktaṃ kramayogena lakṣyatea ārambhayajñāḥ kṣatrasya haviryajñā viśaḥ smṛtāḥc paricārayajñāḥ śūdrāś ca japayajñā dvijātayaḥa pariniṣṭhitakāryo hi svādhyāyena dvijo bhavetc kuryād anyan na vā kuryān maitro brāhmaṇa ucyatea tretādau sakalā vedā yajñā varṇāśramās tathāc saṃrodhād āyuṣas tv ete vyasyante dvāpare yugea dvāpare viplavaṃ yānti vedāḥ kaliyuge tathāc dṛśyante nāpi dṛśyante kaler ante punaḥ punaḥa utsīdanti svadharmāś ca tatrādharmeṇa pīḍitāḥc gavāṃ bhūmeś ca ye cāpām oṣadhīnāṃ ca ye rasāḥa adharmāntarhitā vedā vedadharmās tathāśramāḥc vikriyante svadharmasthāḥ sthāvarāṇi carāṇi caa yathā sarvāṇi bhūtāni vṛṣṭir bhaumāni varṣatic sṛjate sarvato ṅgāni tathā vedā yuge yugea visṛtaṃ kālanānātvam anādinidhanaṃ ca yatc kīrtitaṃ tat purastān me yataḥ saṃyānti yānti caa dhātedaṃ prabhavasthānaṃ bhūtānāṃ saṃyamo yamaḥc svabhāvena pravartante dvaṃdvasṛṣṭāni bhūriśaḥa sargaḥ kālo dhṛtir vedāḥ kartā kāryaṃ kriyā phalamc etat te kathitaṃ tāta yan māṃ tvaṃ paripṛcchasi bhīṣma uvācaa ity ukto bhipraśasyaitat paramarṣes tu śāsanamc mokṣadharmārthasaṃyuktam idaṃ praṣṭuṃ pracakrame śuka uvācaa prajāvāñ śrotriyo yajvā vṛddhaḥ prajño nasūyakaḥc anāgatam anaitihyaṃ kathaṃ brahmādhigacchatia tapasā brahmacaryeṇa sarvatyāgena medhayāc sāṃkhye vā yadi vā yoge etat pṛṣṭo bhidhatsva mea manasaś cendriyāṇāṃ cāpy aikāgryaṃ samavāpyatec yenopāyena puruṣais tac ca vyākhyātum arhasi vyāsa uvācaa nānyatra vidyātapasor nānyatrendriyanigrahātc nānyatra sarvasaṃtyāgāt siddhiṃ vindati kaś canaa mahābhūtāni sarvāṇi pūrvasṛṣṭiḥ svayaṃbhuvaḥc bhūyiṣṭhaṃ prāṇabhṛdgrāme niviṣṭāni śarīriṣua bhūmer deho jalāt sāro jyotiṣaś cakṣuṣī smṛtec prāṇāpānāśrayo vāyuḥ kheṣv ākāśaṃ śarīriṇāma krānte viṣṇur bale śakraḥ koṣṭhe gnir bhuktam archatic karṇayoḥ pradiśaḥ śrotre jihvāyāṃ vāk sarasvatīa karṇau tvak cakṣuṣī jihvā nāsikā caiva pañcamīc darśanānīndriyoktāni dvārāṇy āhārasiddhayea śabdaṃ sparśaṃ tathā rūpaṃ rasaṃ gandhaṃ ca pañcamamc indriyāṇi pṛthak tv arthān manaso darśayanty utaa indriyāṇi mano yuṅkte vaśyān yanteva vājinaḥc manaś cāpi sadā yuṅkte bhūtātmā hṛdayāśritaḥa indriyāṇāṃ tathaiveṣāṃ sarveṣām īśvaraṃ manaḥc niyame ca visarge ca bhūtātmā manasas tathāa indriyāṇīndriyārthāś ca svabhāvaś cetanā manaḥc prāṇāpānau ca jīvaś ca nityaṃ deheṣu dehināma āśrayo nāsti sattvasya guṇaśabdo na cetanāc sattvaṃ hi tejaḥ sṛjati na guṇān vai kadā canaa evaṃ saptadaśaṃ dehe vṛtaṃ ṣoḍaśabhir guṇaiḥc manīṣī manasā vipraḥ paśyaty ātmānam ātmania na hy ayaṃ cakṣuṣā dṛśyo na ca sarvair apīndriyaiḥc manasā saṃpradīptena mahān ātmā prakāśatea aśabdasparśarūpaṃ tad arasāgandham avyayamc aśarīraṃ śarīre sve nirīkṣeta nirindriyama avyaktaṃ vyaktadeheṣu martyeṣv amaram āśritamc yo nupaśyati sa pretya kalpate brahmabhūyasea vidyābhijanasaṃpanne brāhmaṇe gavi hastinic śuni caiva śvapāke ca paṇḍitāḥ samadarśinaḥa sa hi sarveṣu bhūteṣu jaṅgameṣu dhruveṣu cac vasaty eko mahān ātmā yena sarvam idaṃ tatama sarvabhūteṣu cātmānaṃ sarvabhūtāni cātmanic yadā paśyati bhūtātmā brahma saṃpadyate tadāa yāvān ātmani vedātmā tāvān ātmā parātmanic ya evaṃ satataṃ veda so mṛtatvāya kalpatea sarvabhūtātmabhūtasya sarvabhūtahitasya cac devāpi mārge muhyanti apadasya padaiṣiṇaḥa śakunīnām ivākāśe jale vāricarasya vāc yathā gatir na dṛśyeta tathaiva sumahātmanaḥa kālaḥ pacati bhūtāni sarvāṇy evātmanātmanic yasmiṃs tu pacyate kālas taṃ na vedeha kaś canaa na tad ūrdhvaṃ na tiryak ca nādho na ca tiraḥ punaḥb indriyair api buddhyā vā gṛhyate na kadā canac na madhye pratigṛhṇīte naiva kaś cit kutaś canaa sarve ntaḥsthā ime lokā bāhyam eṣāṃ na kiṃ canac yaḥ sahasraṃ samāgacched yathā bāṇo guṇacyutaḥa naivāntaṃ kāraṇasyeyād yady api syān manojavaḥc tasmāt sūkṣmāt sūkṣmataraṃ nāsti sthūlataraṃ tataḥa sarvataḥpāṇipādāntaṃ sarvatokṣiśiromukhamc sarvataḥśrutimal loke sarvam āvṛtya tiṣṭhatia tad evāṇor aṇutaraṃ tan mahadbhyo mahattaramc tad antaḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ dhruvaṃ tiṣṭhan na dṛśyatea akṣaraṃ ca kṣaraṃ caiva dvaidhībhāvo yam ātmanaḥc kṣaraḥ sarveṣu bhūteṣu divyaṃ hy amṛtam akṣarama navadvāraṃ puraṃ gatvā haṃso hi niyato vaśīc īśaḥ sarvasya bhūtasya sthāvarasya carasya caa hānibhaṅgavikalpānāṃ navānāṃ saṃśrayeṇa cac śarīrāṇām ajasyāhur haṃsatvaṃ pāradarśinaḥa haṃsoktaṃ cākṣaraṃ caiva kūṭasthaṃ yat tad akṣaramc tad vidvān akṣaraṃ prāpya jahāti prāṇajanmanī vyāsa uvācaa pṛcchatas tava satputra yathāvad iha tattvataḥc sāṃkhyanyāyena saṃyuktaṃ yad etat kīrtitaṃ mayāa yogakṛtyaṃ tu te kṛtsnaṃ vartayiṣyāmi tac chṛṇuc ekatvaṃ buddhimanasor indriyāṇāṃ ca sarvaśaḥe ātmano dhyāyinas tāta jñānam etad anuttamama tad etad upaśāntena dāntenādhyātmaśīlināc ātmārāmeṇa buddhena boddhavyaṃ śucikarmaṇāa yogadoṣān samucchidya pañca yān kavayo viduḥc kāmaṃ krodhaṃ ca lobhaṃ ca bhayaṃ svapnaṃ ca pañcamama krodhaṃ śamena jayati kāmaṃ saṃkalpavarjanātc sattvasaṃsevanād dhīro nidrām ucchettum arhatia dhṛtyā śiśnodaraṃ rakṣet pāṇipādaṃ ca cakṣuṣāc cakṣuḥ śrotre ca manasā mano vācaṃ ca karmaṇāa apramādād bhayaṃ jahyāl lobhaṃ prājñopasevanātc evam etān yogadoṣāñ jayen nityam atandritaḥa agnīṃś ca brāhmaṇāṃś cārced devatāḥ praṇameta cac varjayed ruṣitāṃ vācaṃ hiṃsāyuktāṃ manonugāma brahma tejomayaṃ śukraṃ yasya sarvam idaṃ rasaḥc ekasya bhūtaṃ bhūtasya dvayaṃ sthāvarajaṅgamama dhyānam adhyayanaṃ dānaṃ satyaṃ hrīr ārjavaṃ kṣamāc śaucam āhārasaṃśuddhir indriyāṇāṃ ca nigrahaḥa etair vivardhate tejaḥ pāpmānaṃ cāpakarṣatic sidhyanti cāsya sarvārthā vijñānaṃ ca pravartatea samaḥ sarveṣu bhūteṣu labdhālabdhena vartayanc dhutapāpmā tu tejasvī laghvāhāro jitendriyaḥe kāmakrodhau vaśe kṛtvā ninīṣed brahmaṇaḥ padama manasaś cendriyāṇāṃ ca kṛtvaikāgryaṃ samāhitaḥc prāg rātrāpararātreṣu dhārayen mana ātmanāa jantoḥ pañcendriyasyāsya yad ekaṃ chidram indriyamc tato sya sravati prajñā dṛteḥ pādād ivodakama manas tu pūrvam ādadyāt kumīnān iva matsyahāc tataḥ śrotraṃ tataś cakṣur jihvāṃ ghrāṇaṃ ca yogavita tata etāni saṃyamya manasi sthāpayed yatiḥc tathaivāpohya saṃkalpān mano hy ātmani dhārayeta pañca jñānena saṃdhāya manasi sthāpayed yatiḥc yadaitāny avatiṣṭhante manaḥṣaṣṭhāni cātmanie prasīdanti ca saṃsthāya tadā brahma prakāśatea vidhūma iva dīptārcir āditya iva dīptimānc vaidyuto gnir ivākāśe paśyaty ātmānam ātmanāe sarvaṃ ca tatra sarvatra vyāpakatvāc ca dṛśyatea taṃ paśyanti mahātmāno brāhmaṇā ye manīṣiṇaḥc dhṛtimanto mahāprājñāḥ sarvabhūtahite ratāḥa evaṃ parimitaṃ kālam ācaran saṃśitavrataḥc āsīno hi rahasy eko gacched akṣarasātmyatāma pramoho bhrama āvarto ghrāṇaśravaṇadarśanec adbhutāni rasasparśe śītoṣṇe mārutākṛtiḥa pratibhām upasargāṃś cāpy upasaṃgṛhya yogataḥc tāṃs tattvavid anādṛtya svātmanaiva nivartayeta kuryāt paricayaṃ yoge traikālyaṃ niyato muniḥc giriśṛṅge tathā caitye vṛkṣāgreṣu ca yojajeta saṃniyamyendriyagrāmaṃ goṣṭhe bhāṇḍamanā ivac ekāgraś cintayen nityaṃ yogān nodvejayen manaḥa yenopāyena śakyeta saṃniyantuṃ calaṃ manaḥc taṃ taṃ yukto niṣeveta na caiva vicalet tataḥa śūnyā giriguhāś caiva devatāyatanāni cac śūnyāgārāṇi caikāgro nivāsārtham upakrameta nābhiṣvajet paraṃ vācā karmaṇā manasāpi vāc upekṣako yatāhāro labdhālabdhe samo bhaveta yaś cainam abhinandeta yaś cainam apavādayetc samas tayoś cāpy ubhayor nābhidhyāyec chubhāśubhama na prahṛṣyeta lābheṣu nālābheṣu ca cintayetc samaḥ sarveṣu bhūteṣu sadharmā mātariśvanaḥa evaṃ sarvātmanaḥ sādhoḥ sarvatra samadarśinaḥc ṣaṇmāsān nityayuktasya śabdabrahmātivartatea vedanārtāḥ prajā dṛṣṭvā samaloṣṭāśmakāñcanaḥc etasmin nirato mārge viramen na vimohitaḥa api varṇāv akṛṣṭas tu nārī vā dharmakāṅkṣiṇīc tāv apy etena mārgeṇa gacchetāṃ paramāṃ gatima ajaṃ purāṇam ajaraṃ sanātanaṃyad indriyair upalabhate naro calaḥc aṇor aṇīyo mahato mahattaraṃtadātmanā paśyati yukta ātmavāna idaṃ maharṣer vacanaṃ mahātmanoyathāvad uktaṃ manasānudṛśya cac avekṣya ceyāt parameṣṭhisātmyatāṃprayānti yāṃ bhūtagatiṃ manīṣiṇaḥ śuka uvācaa yad idaṃ vedavacanaṃ kuru karma tyajeti cac kāṃ diśaṃ vidyayā yānti kāṃ ca gacchanti karmaṇāa etad vai śrotum icchāmi tad bhavān prabravītu mec etat tv anyonyavairūpye vartate pratikūlataḥ bhīṣma uvācaa ity uktaḥ pratyuvācedaṃ parāśarasutaḥ sutamc karmavidyāmayāv etau vyākhyāsyāmi kṣarākṣaraua yāṃ diśaṃ vidyayā yānti yāṃ ca gacchanti karmaṇāc śṛṇuṣvaikamanāḥ putra gahvaraṃ hy etad antarama asti dharma iti proktaṃ nāstīty atraiva yo vadetc tasya pakṣasya sadṛśam idaṃ mama bhaved athaa dvāv imāv atha panthānau yatra vedāḥ pratiṣṭhitāḥc pravṛttilakṣaṇo dharmo nivṛttau ca subhāṣitaḥa karmaṇā badhyate jantur vidyayā tu pramucyatec tasmāt karma na kurvanti yatayaḥ pāradarśinaḥa karmaṇā jāyate pretya mūrtimān ṣoḍaśātmakaḥc vidyayā jāyate nityam avyayo hy avyayātmakaḥa karma tv eke praśaṃsanti svalpabuddhitarā narāḥc tena te dehajālāni ramayanta upāsatea ye tu buddhiṃ parāṃ prāptā dharmanaipuṇyadarśinaḥc na te karma praśaṃsanti kūpaṃ nadyāṃ pibann ivaa karmaṇaḥ phalam āpnoti sukhaduḥkhe bhavābhavauc vidyayā tad avāpnoti yatra gatvā na śocatia yatra gatvā na mriyate yatra gatvā na jāyatec na jīryate yatra gatvā yatra gatvā na vardhatea yatra tad brahma paramam avyaktam ajaraṃ dhruvamc avyāhatam anāyāsam amṛtaṃ cāviyogi caa dvaṃdvair yatra na bādhyante mānasena ca karmaṇāc samāḥ sarvatra maitrāś ca sarvabhūtahite ratāḥa vidyāmayo nyaḥ puruṣas tāta karmamayo paraḥc viddhi candramasaṃ darśe sūkṣmayā kalayā sthitamd vidyāmayaṃ taṃ puruṣaṃ nityaṃ jñānaguṇātmakama tad etad ṛṣiṇā proktaṃ vistareṇānumīyatec navajaṃ śaśinaṃ dṛṣṭvā vakraṃ tantum ivāmbarea ekādaśavikārātmā kalāsaṃbhārasaṃbhṛtaḥc mūrtimān iti taṃ viddhi tāta karmaguṇātmakamd tasmin yaḥ saṃsthito hy agnir nityaṃ sthālyām ivāhitaḥd ātmānaṃ taṃ vijānīhi nityaṃ tyāgajitātmakama devo yaḥ saṃśritas tasminn abbindur iva puṣkarec kṣetrajñaṃ taṃ vijānīyān nityaṃ tyāgajitātmakama tamo rajaś ca sattvaṃ ca viddhi jīvaguṇān imānc jīvam ātmaguṇaṃ vidyād ātmānaṃ paramātmanaḥa sacetanaṃ jīvaguṇaṃ vadantisa ceṣṭate ceṣṭayate ca sarvamc tataḥ paraṃ kṣetravido vadantiprāvartayad yo bhuvanāni sapta śuka uvācaa kṣarāt prabhṛti yaḥ sargaḥ saguṇānīndriyāṇi cac buddhyaiśvaryābhisargārthaṃ yad dhyānaṃ cātmanaḥ śubhama bhūya eva tu loke smin sadvṛttiṃ vṛttihaitukīmc yayā santaḥ pravartante tad icchāmy anuvarṇitama vede vacanam uktaṃ tu kuru karma tyajeti cac katham etad vijānīyāṃ tac ca vyākhyātum arhasia lokavṛttāntatattvajñaḥ pūto haṃ guruśāsanātc kṛtvā buddhiṃ viyuktātmā tyakṣyāmy ātmānam avyathaḥ vyāsa uvācaa yaiṣā vai vihitā vṛttiḥ purastād brahmaṇā svayamc eṣā pūrvataraiḥ sadbhir ācīrṇā paramarṣibhiḥa brahmacaryeṇa vai lokāñ jayanti paramarṣayaḥc ātmanaś ca hṛdi śreyas tv anviccha manasātmania vane mūlaphalāśī ca tapyan suvipulaṃ tapaḥc puṇyāyatanacārī ca bhūtānām avihiṃsakaḥa vidhūme sannamusale vānaprasthapratiśrayec kāle prāpte caran bhaikṣaṃ kalpate brahmabhūyasea niḥstutir nirnamaskāraḥ parityajya śubhāśubhec araṇye vicaraikākī yena kena cid āśitaḥ śuka uvācaa yad idaṃ vedavacanaṃ lokavāde virudhyatec pramāṇe cāpramāṇe ca viruddhe śāstratā kutaḥa ity etac chrotum icchāmi bhagavān prabravītu mec karmaṇām avirodhena katham etat pravartate bhīṣma uvācaa ity uktaḥ pratyuvācedaṃ gandhavatyāḥ sutaḥ sutamc ṛṣis tat pūjayan vākyaṃ putrasyāmitatejasaḥa gṛhastho brahmacārī ca vānaprastho tha bhikṣukaḥc yathoktakāriṇaḥ sarve gacchanti paramāṃ gatima eko ya āśramān etān anutiṣṭhed yathāvidhic akāmadveṣasaṃyuktaḥ sa paratra mahīyatea catuṣpadī hi niḥśreṇī brahmaṇy eṣā pratiṣṭhitāc etām āśritya niḥśreṇīṃ brahmaloke mahīyatea āyuṣas tu caturbhāgaṃ brahmacāryanasūyakaḥc gurau vā guruputre vā vased dharmārthakovidaḥa karmātirekeṇa guror adhyetavyaṃ bubhūṣatāc dakṣiṇo nāpavādī syād āhūto gurum āśrayeta jaghanyaśāyī pūrvaṃ syād utthāyī guruveśmanic yac ca śiṣyeṇa kartavyaṃ kāryaṃ dāsena vā punaḥa kṛtam ity eva tat sarvaṃ kṛtvā tiṣṭheta pārśvataḥc kiṃkaraḥ sarvakārī ca sarvakarmasu kovidaḥa śucir dakṣo guṇopeto brūyād iṣur ivātvaraḥc cakṣuṣā gurum avyagro nirīkṣeta jitendriyaḥa nābhuktavati cāśnīyād apītavati no pibetc na tiṣṭhati tathāsīta nāsupte prasvapeta caa uttānābhyāṃ ca pāṇibhyāṃ pādāv asya mṛdu spṛśetc dakṣiṇaṃ dakṣiṇenaiva savyaṃ savyena pīḍayeta abhivādya guruṃ brūyād adhīṣva bhagavann itic idaṃ kariṣye bhagavann idaṃ cāpi kṛtaṃ mayād brahmaṃs tad api kartāsmi yad bhavān vakṣyate punaḥa iti sarvam anujñāpya nivedya gurave dhanamc kuryāt kṛtvā ca tat sarvam ākhyeyaṃ gurave punaḥa yāṃs tu gandhān rasān vāpi brahmacārī na sevatec seveta tān samāvṛtta iti dharmeṣu niścayaḥa ye ke cid vistareṇoktā niyamā brahmacāriṇaḥc tān sarvān anugṛhṇīyād bhavec cānapago guroḥa sa evaṃ gurave prītim upahṛtya yathābalamc āśrameṣv āśrameṣv evaṃ śiṣyo varteta karmaṇāa vedavratopavāsena caturthe cāyuṣo gatec gurave dakṣiṇāṃ dattvā samāvarted yathāvidhia dharmalabdhair yuto dārair agnīn utpādya dharmataḥc dvitīyam āyuṣo bhāgaṃ gṛhamedhivratī bhavet vyāsa uvācaa dvitīyam āyuṣo bhāgaṃ gṛhamedhī gṛhe vasetc dharmalabdhair yuto dārair agnīn utpādya suvrataḥa gṛhasthavṛttayaś caiva catasraḥ kavibhiḥ smṛtāḥc kusūladhānyaḥ prathamaḥ kumbhīdhānyas tv anantarama aśvastano tha kāpotīm āśrito vṛttim āharetc teṣāṃ paraḥ paro jyāyān dharmato lokajittamaḥa ṣaṭkarmā vartayaty ekas tribhir anyaḥ pravartatec dvābhyām ekaś caturthas tu brahmasatre vyavasthitaḥe gṛhamedhivratāny atra mahāntīha pracakṣatea nātmārthaṃ pācayed annaṃ na vṛthā ghātayet paśūnc prāṇī vā yadi vāprāṇī saṃskāraṃ yajuṣārhatia na divā prasvapej jātu na pūrvāpararātrayoḥc na bhuñjītāntarākāle nānṛtāv āhvayet striyama nāsyānaśnan vased vipro gṛhe kaś cid apūjitaḥc tathāsyātithayaḥ pūjyā havyakavyavahāḥ sadāa vedavidyāvratasnātāḥ śrotriyā vedapāragāḥc svadharmajīvino dāntāḥ kriyāvantas tapasvinaḥe teṣāṃ havyaṃ ca kavyaṃ cāpy arhaṇārthaṃ vidhīyatea na kharaiḥ saṃprayātasya svadharmājñānakasya cac apaviddhāgnihotrasya guror vālīkakāriṇaḥa saṃvibhāgo tra bhūtānāṃ sarveṣām eva śiṣyatec tathaivāpacamānebhyaḥ pradeyaṃ gṛhamedhināa vighasāśī bhaven nityaṃ nityaṃ cāmṛtabhojanaḥc amṛtaṃ yajñaśeṣaṃ syād bhojanaṃ haviṣā samame bhṛtyaśeṣaṃ tu yo śnāti tam āhur vighasāśinamf vighasaṃ bhṛtyaśeṣaṃ tu yajñaśeṣam athāmṛtama svadāranirato dānto hy anasūyur jitendriyaḥc ṛtvikpurohitācāryair mātulātithisaṃśritaiḥa vṛddhabālāturair vaidyair jñātisaṃbandhibāndhavaiḥc mātāpitṛbhyāṃ jāmībhir bhrātrā putreṇa bhāryayāa duhitrā dāsavargeṇa vivādaṃ na samācaretc etān vimucya saṃvādān sarvapāpaiḥ pramucyatea etair jitais tu jayati sarvāṃl lokān na saṃśayaḥc ācāryo brahmalokeśaḥ prājāpatye pitā prabhuḥa atithis tv indralokeśo devalokasya cartvijaḥc jāmayo psarasāṃ loke vaiśvadeve tu jñātayaḥa saṃbandhibāndhavā dikṣu pṛthivyāṃ mātṛmātulauc vṛddhabālāturakṛśās tv ākāśe prabhaviṣṇavaḥa bhrātā jyeṣṭhaḥ samaḥ pitrā bhāryā putraḥ svakā tanuḥc chāyā svā dāśavargas tu duhitā kṛpaṇaṃ parama tasmād etair adhikṣiptaḥ sahen nityam asaṃjvaraḥc gṛhadharmarato vidvān dharmanityo jitaklamaḥa na cārthabaddhaḥ karmāṇi dharmaṃ vā kaṃ cid ācaretc gṛhasthavṛttayas tisras tāsāṃ niḥśreyasaṃ parama parasparaṃ tathaivāhuś cāturāśramyam eva tatc ye coktā niyamās teṣāṃ sarvaṃ kāryaṃ bubhūṣatāa kumbhīdhānyair uñchaśilaiḥ kāpotīṃ cāsthitais tathāc yasmiṃś caite vasanty arhās tad rāṣṭram abhivardhatea daśa pūrvān daśa parān punāti ca pitāmahānc gṛhasthavṛttayas tv etā vartayed yo gatavyathaḥa sa cakracaralokānāṃ sadṛśīṃ prāpnuyād gatimc yatendriyāṇām atha vā gatir eṣā vidhīyatea svargaloko gṛhasthānām udāramanasāṃ hitaḥc svargo vimānasaṃyukto vedadṛṣṭaḥ supuṣpitaḥa svargaloke gṛhasthānāṃ pratiṣṭhā niyatātmanāmc brahmaṇā vihitā śreṇir eṣā yasmāt pramucyatee dvitīyaṃ kramaśaḥ prāpya svargaloke mahīyatea ataḥ paraṃ paramam udāram āśramaṃtṛtīyam āhus tyajatāṃ kalevaramc vanaukasāṃ gṛhapatinām anuttamaṃśṛṇuṣvaitat kliṣṭaśarīrakāriṇām bhīṣma uvācaa proktā gṛhasthavṛttis te vihitā yā manīṣiṇāmc tadanantaram uktaṃ yat tan nibodha yudhiṣṭhirad vyāsena kathitaṃ pūrvaṃ putrāya sumahātmanea kramaśas tv avadhūyaināṃ tṛtīyāṃ vṛttim uttamāmc saṃyogavratakhinnānāṃ vānaprasthāśramaukasāma śrūyatāṃ pārtha bhadraṃ te sarvalokāśrayātmanāmc prekṣāpūrvaṃ pravṛttānāṃ puṇyadeśanivāsinām vyāsa uvācaa gṛhasthas tu yadā paśyed valīpalitam ātmanaḥc apatyasyaiva cāpatyaṃ vanam eva tadāśrayeta tṛtīyam āyuṣo bhāgaṃ vānaprasthāśrame vasetc tān evāgnīn paricared yajamāno divaukasaḥa niyato niyatāhāraḥ ṣaṣṭhabhakto pramādavānc tad agnihotraṃ tā gāvo yajñāṅgāni ca sarvaśaḥa akṛṣṭaṃ vai vrīhiyavaṃ nīvāraṃ vighasāni cac havīṃṣi saṃprayaccheta makheṣv atrāpi pañcasua vānaprasthāśrame py etāś catasro vṛttayaḥ smṛtāḥc sadyaḥprakṣālakāḥ ke cit ke cin māsikasaṃcayāḥa vārṣikaṃ saṃcayaṃ ke cit ke cid dvādaśavārṣikamc kurvanty atithipūjārthaṃ yajñatantrārthasiddhayea abhrāvakāśā varṣāsu hemante jalasaṃśrayāḥc grīṣme ca pañcatapasaḥ śaśvac ca mitabhojanāḥa bhūmau viparivartante tiṣṭhed vā prapadair apic sthānāsanair vartayanti savaneṣv abhiṣiñcatea dantolūkhalinaḥ ke cid aśmakuṭṭās tathāparec śuklapakṣe pibanty eke yavāgūṃ kvathitāṃ sakṛta kṛṣṇapakṣe pibanty eke bhuñjate ca yathākramamc mūlair eke phalair eke puṣpair eke dṛḍhavratāḥa vartayanti yathānyāyaṃ vaikhānasamataṃ śritāḥc etāś cānyāś ca vividhā dīkṣās teṣāṃ manīṣiṇāma caturthaś caupaniṣado dharmaḥ sādhāraṇaḥ smṛtaḥc vānaprastho gṛhasthaś ca tato nyaḥ saṃpravartatea asminn eva yuge tāta vipraiḥ sarvārthadarśibhiḥc agastyaḥ sapta ṛṣayo madhucchando ghamarṣaṇaḥa sāṃkṛtiḥ sudivā taṇḍir yavānno tha kṛtaśramaḥc ahovīryas tathā kāvyas tāṇḍyo medhātithir budhaḥa śalo vākaś ca nirvākaḥ śūnyapālaḥ kṛtaśramaḥc evaṃdharmasu vidvāṃsas tataḥ svargam upāgamana tāta pratyakṣadharmāṇas tathā yāyāvarā gaṇāḥc ṛṣīṇām ugratapasāṃ dharmanaipuṇadarśināma avācyāparimeyāś ca brāhmaṇā vanam āśritāḥc vaikhānasā vālakhilyāḥ sikatāś ca tathāparea karmabhis te nirānandā dharmanityā jitendriyāḥc gatāḥ pratyakṣadharmāṇas te sarve vanam āśritāḥe anakṣatrā anādhṛṣyā dṛśyante jyotiṣāṃ gaṇāḥa jarayā ca paridyūno vyādhinā ca prapīḍitaḥc caturthe cāyuṣaḥ śeṣe vānaprasthāśramaṃ tyajete sadyaskārāṃ nirūpyeṣṭiṃ sarvavedasadakṣiṇāma ātmayājī so tmaratir ātmakrīḍātmasaṃśrayaḥc ātmany agnīn samāropya tyaktvā sarvaparigrahāna sadyaskrāṃś ca yajed yajñān iṣṭīś caiveha sarvadāc sadaiva yājināṃ yajñād ātmanījyā nivartatea trīṃś caivāgnīn yajet samyag ātmany evātmamokṣaṇātc prāṇebhyo yajuṣā pañca ṣaṭ prāśnīyād akutsayana keśalomanakhān vāpya vānaprastho munis tataḥc āśramād āśramaṃ sadyaḥ pūto gacchati karmabhiḥa abhayaṃ sarvabhūtebhyo yo dattvā pravrajed dvijaḥc lokās tejomayās tasya pretya cānantyam aśnutea suśīlavṛtto vyapanītakalmaṣona ceha nāmutra ca kartum īhatec aroṣamoho gatasaṃdhivigrahobhaved udāsīnavad ātmavin naraḥa yameṣu caivātmagateṣu na vyathetsvaśāstrasūtrāhutimantravikramaḥc bhaved yatheṣṭā gatir ātmayājinona saṃśayo dharmapare jītendriyea tataḥ paraṃ śreṣṭham atīva sadguṇairadhiṣṭhitaṃ trīn adhivṛttam uttamamc caturtham uktaṃ paramāśramaṃ śṛṇuprakīrtyamānaṃ paramaṃ parāyaṇam śuka uvācaa vartamānas tathaivātra vānaprasthāśrame yathāc yoktavyo tmā yathā śaktyā paraṃ vai kāṅkṣatā padam vyāsa uvācaa prāpya saṃskāram etābhyām āśramābhyāṃ tataḥ paramc yat kāryaṃ paramārthārthaṃ tad ihaikamanāḥ śṛṇua kaṣāyaṃ pācayitvā tu śreṇisthāneṣu ca triṣuc pravrajec ca paraṃ sthānaṃ parivrajyām anuttamāma tad bhavān evam abhyasya vartatāṃ śrūyatāṃ tathāc eka eva caren nityaṃ siddhyartham asahāyavāna ekaś carati yaḥ paśyan na jahāti na hīyatec anagnir aniketaḥ syād grāmam annārtham āśrayeta aśvastanavidhānaḥ syān munir bhāvasamanvitaḥc laghvāśī niyatāhāraḥ sakṛd annaniṣevitāa kapālaṃ vṛkṣamūlāni kucelam asahāyatāc upekṣā sarvabhūtānām etāvad bhikṣulakṣaṇama yasmin vācaḥ praviśanti kūpe prāptāḥ śilā ivac na vaktāraṃ punar yānti sa kaivalyāśrame vaseta naiva paśyen na śṛṇuyād avācyaṃ jātu kasya citc brāhmaṇānāṃ viśeṣeṇa naiva brūyāt kathaṃ canaa yad brāhmaṇasya kuśalaṃ tad eva satataṃ vadetc tūṣṇīm āsīta nindāyāṃ kurvan bheṣajam ātmanaḥa yena pūrṇam ivākāśaṃ bhavaty ekena sarvadāc śūnyaṃ yena janākīrṇaṃ taṃ devā brāhmaṇaṃ viduḥa yena kena cid ācchanno yena kena cid āśitaḥc yatrakvacanaśāyī ca taṃ devā brāhmaṇaṃ viduḥa aher iva gaṇād bhītaḥ sauhityān narakād ivac kuṇapād iva ca strībhyas taṃ devā brāhmaṇaṃ viduḥa na krudhyen na prahṛṣyec ca mānito mānitaś ca yaḥc sarvabhūteṣv abhayadas taṃ devā brāhmaṇaṃ viduḥa nābhinandeta maraṇaṃ nābhinandeta jīvitamc kālam eva pratīkṣeta nideśaṃ bhṛtako yathāa anabhyāhatacittaḥ syād anabhyāhatavāk tathāc nirmuktaḥ sarvapāpebhyo niramitrasya kiṃ bhayama abhayaṃ sarvabhūtebhyo bhūtānām abhayaṃ yataḥc tasya dehād vimuktasya bhayaṃ nāsti kutaś canaa yathā nāgapade nyāni padāni padagāmināmc sarvāṇy evāpidhīyante padajātāni kauñjarea evaṃ sarvam ahiṃsāyāṃ dharmārtham apidhīyatec amṛtaḥ sa nityaṃ vasati yo hiṃsāṃ pratipadyatea ahiṃsakaḥ samaḥ satyo dhṛtimān niyatendriyaḥc śaraṇyaḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ gatim āpnoty anuttamāma evaṃ prajñānatṛptasya nirbhayasya manīṣiṇaḥc na mṛtyur atigo bhāvaḥ sa mṛtyum adhigacchatia vimuktaṃ sarvasaṅgebhyo munim ākāśavat sthitamc asvam ekacaraṃ śāntaṃ taṃ devā brāhmaṇaṃ viduḥa jīvitaṃ yasya dharmārthaṃ dharmo ratyartham eva cac ahorātrāś ca puṇyārthaṃ taṃ devā brāhmaṇaṃ viduḥa nirāśiṣam anārambhaṃ nirnamaskāram astutimc akṣīṇaṃ kṣīṇakarmāṇaṃ taṃ devā brāhmaṇaṃ viduḥa sarvāṇi bhūtāni sukhe ramantesarvāṇi duḥkhasya śarīraṃsarvān sa lokān adhigacchatīhac tasmin hutaṃ tarpayatīha devāṃste vai tṛptās tarpayanty āsyam asyaa tejomayo nityatanuḥ purāṇolokān anantān abhayān upaitic bhūtāni yasmān na trasante kadā citsa gatasaṃdhivigrahaḥc apetanindāstutir apriyāpriyaścarann udāsīnavad eṣa bhikṣukaḥ vyāsa uvācaa prakṛtes tu vikārā ye kṣetrajñas taiḥ pariśritaḥc te cainaṃ na prajānanti sa tu jānāti tān apia taiś caiṣa kurute kāryaṃ manaḥṣaṣṭhair ihendriyaiḥc sudāntair iva saṃyantā dṛḍhaiḥ paramavājibhiḥa indriyebhyaḥ parā hy arthā arthebhyaḥ paramaṃ manaḥc manasas tu parā buddhir buddher ātmā mahān paraḥa mahataḥ param avyaktam avyaktāt parato mṛtamc amṛtān na paraṃ kiṃ cit sā kāṣṭhā sā parā gatiḥa evaṃ sarveṣu bhūteṣu gūḍho tmā na prakāśatec dṛśyate tvagryayā buddhyā sūkṣmayā tattvadarśibhiḥa antarātmani saṃlīya manaḥṣaṣṭhāni medhayāc indriyāṇīndriyārthāṃś ca bahu cintyam acintayana dhyānoparamaṇaṃ kṛtvā vidyāsaṃpāditaṃ manaḥc anīśvaraḥ praśāntātma tato rchaty amṛtaṃ padama indriyāṇāṃ tu sarveṣāṃ sattvāhāraviśuddhātmā paśyaty ātmānam ātmania rahasyaṃ sarvavedānām anaitihyam anāgamamc ātmapratyayikaṃ śāstram idaṃ putrānuśāsanama dharmākhyāneṣu sarveṣu satyākhyāneṣu yad vasuc daśedam ṛk sahasrāṇi nirmathyāmṛtam uddhṛtama navanītaṃ yathā dadhnaḥ kāṣṭhād agnir yathaiva cac tathaiva viduṣāṃ jñānaṃ putrahetoḥ samuddhṛtame snātakānām idaṃ śāstraṃ vācyaṃ putrānuśāsanama tad idaṃ nāpraśāntāya nādāntāyātapasvinec nāvedaviduṣe vācyaṃ tathā nānugatāya caa nāsūyakāyānṛjave na cānirdiṣṭakāriṇec na tarkaśāstradagdhāya tathaiva piśunāya caa ślāghate ślāghanīyāya praśāntāya tapasvinec idaṃ priyāya putrāya śiṣyāyānugatāya cae rahasyadharmaṃ vaktavyaṃ nānyasmai tu kathaṃ canaa yady apy asya mahīṃ dadyād ratnapūrṇām imāṃ naraḥc idam eva tataḥ śreya iti manyeta tattvavita ato guhyatarārthaṃ tad adhyātmam atimānuṣamc yat tan maharṣibhir dṛṣṭaṃ vedānteṣu ca gīyatee tat te haṃ saṃpravakṣyāmi yan māṃ tvaṃ paripṛcchasif yac ca te manasi vartate paraṃf yatra cāsti tava saṃśayaḥ kva citf śrūyatām ayam ahaṃ tavāgrataḥf putra kiṃ hi kathayāmi te punaḥ śuka uvācaa adhyātmaṃ vistareṇeha punar eva vadasva mec yad adhyātmaṃ yathā cedaṃ bhagavann ṛṣisattama vyāsa uvācaa adhyātmaṃ yad idaṃ tāta puruṣasyeha vidyatec tat te haṃ saṃpravakṣyāmi tasya vyākhyām imāṃ śṛṇua bhūmir āpas tathā jyotir vāyur ākāśam eva cac mahābhūtāni bhūtānāṃ sāgarasyormayo yathāa prasāryeha yathāṅgāni kūrmaḥ saṃharate punaḥc tadvan mahānti bhūtāni yavīyaḥsu vikurvatea iti tanmayam evedaṃ sarvaṃ sthāvarajaṅgamamc sarge ca pralaye caiva tasmān nirdiśyate tathāa mahābhūtāni pañcaiva sarvabhūteṣu bhūtakṛtc akarot tāta vaiṣamyaṃ yasmin yad anupaśyati śuka uvācaa akarod yac charīreṣu kathaṃ tad upalakṣayetc indriyāṇi guṇāḥ ke cit kathaṃ tān upalakṣayet vyāsa uvācaa etat te vartayiṣyāmi yathāvad iha darśanamc śṛṇu tattvam ihaikāgro yathātattvaṃ yathā ca tata śabdaḥ śrotraṃ tathā khāni trayam ākāśasaṃbhavamc prāṇaś ceṣṭā tathā sparśa ete vāyuguṇās trayaḥa rūpaṃ cakṣur vipākaś ca tridhā jyotir vidhīyatec raso tha rasanaṃ sneho guṇās tv ete trayo mbhasāma ghreyaṃ ghrāṇaṃ śarīraṃ ca bhūmer ete guṇās trayaḥb śrotraṃ tvakcakṣuṣī jihvā nāsikā caiva pañcamīc etāvān indriyagrāmo vyākhyātaḥ pāñcabhautikaḥa vāyoḥ sparśo raso dbhyaś ca jyotiṣo rūpam ucyatec ākāśaprabhavaḥ śabdo gandho bhūmiguṇaḥ smṛtaḥa mano buddhiś ca bhāvaś ca traya ete tmayonijāḥc na guṇān ativartante guṇebhyaḥ paramā matāḥa indriyāṇi nare pañca ṣaṣṭhaṃ tu mana ucyatec saptamīṃ buddhim evāhuḥ kṣetrajñaṃ punar aṣṭamama cakṣur ālocanāyaiva saṃśayaṃ kurute manaḥc buddhir adhyavasānāya sākṣī kṣetrajña ucyatea rajas tamaś ca sattvaṃ ca traya ete svayonijāḥc samāḥ sarveṣu bhūteṣu tadguṇeṣūpalakṣayeta yathā kūrma ihāṅgāni prasārya viniyacchatic evam evendriyagrāmaṃ buddhiḥ sṛṣṭvā niyacchatia yad ūrdhvaṃ pādatalayor avāṅmūrdhnaś ca paśyatic etasminn eva kṛtye vai vartate buddhir uttamāa guṇān nenīyate buddhir buddhir evendriyāṇy apic manaḥṣaṣṭhāni sarvāṇi buddhyabhāve kuto guṇāḥa tatra yat prītisaṃyuktaṃ kiṃ cid ātmani lakṣayetc praśāntam iva saṃśuddhaṃ sattvaṃ tad upadhārayeta yat tu saṃtāpasaṃyuktaṃ kāye manasi vā bhavetc rajaḥ pravartakaṃ tat syāt satataṃ hāri dehināmd pravṛttaṃ raja ity evaṃ tatra cāpy upalakṣayeta yat tu saṃmohasaṃyuktam avyaktaviṣayaṃ bhavetc apratarkyam avijñeyaṃ tamas tad upadhāryatāma praharṣaḥ prītir ānandaḥ sāmyaṃ svasthātmacittatāc akasmād yadi vā kasmād vartate sāttviko guṇaḥa abhimāno mṛṣāvādo lobho mohas tathākṣamāc liṅgāni rajasas tāni vartante hetvahetutaḥa tathā mohaḥ pramādaś ca tandrī nidrāprabodhitāc kathaṃ cid abhivartante vijñeyās tāmasā guṇāḥ vyāsa uvācaa manaḥ prasṛjate bhāvaṃ buddhir adhyavasāyinīc hṛdayaṃ priyāpriye veda trividhā karmacodanāa indriyebhyaḥ parā hy arthā arthebhyaḥ paramaṃ manaḥc manasas tu parā buddhir buddher ātmā paro mataḥa buddhir ātmā manuṣyasya buddhir evātmano tmikāc yadā vikurute bhāvaṃ tadā bhavati sā manaḥa indriyāṇāṃ pṛthagbhāvād buddhir vikriyate hy aṇuc śṛṇvatī bhavati śrotraṃ spṛśatī sparśa ucyatea paśyantī bhavate dṛṣṭī rasatī rasanaṃ bhavetc jighratī bhavati ghrāṇaṃ buddhir vikriyate pṛthaka indriyāṇīti tāny āhus teṣv adṛśyādhitiṣṭhatic tiṣṭhatī puruṣe buddhis triṣu bhāveṣu vartatea kadā cil labhate prītiṃ kadā cid api śocatec na sukhena na duḥkhena kadā cid iha yujyatea seyaṃ bhāvātmikā bhāvāṃs trīn etān ativartatec saritāṃ sāgaro bhartā mahāvelām ivormimāna yadā prārthayate kiṃ cit tadā bhavati sā manaḥc adhiṣṭhānāni vai buddhyā pṛthag etāni saṃsmarete indriyāṇy eva medhyāni vijetavyāni kṛtsnaśaḥa sarvāṇy evānupūrvyeṇa yad yan nānuvidhīyatec avibhāgagatā buddhir bhāve manasi vartatee pravartamānaṃ tu rajaḥ sattvam apy anuvartatea ye caiva bhāvā vartante sarva eṣv eva te triṣuc anvarthāḥ saṃpravartante rathanemim arā ivaa pradīpārthaṃ naraḥ kuryād indriyair buddhisattamaiḥc niścaradbhir yathāyogam udāsīnair yadṛcchayāa evaṃsvabhāvam evedam iti vidvān na muhyatic aśocann aprahṛṣyaṃś ca nityaṃ vigatamatsaraḥa na hy ātmā śakyate draṣṭum indriyaiḥ kāmagocaraiḥc pravartamānair anaye durdharair akṛtātmabhiḥa teṣāṃ tu manasā raśmīn yadā samyaṅ niyacchatic tadā prakāśate hy ātmā ghaṭe dīpa iva jvalane sarveṣām eva bhūtānāṃ tamasy apagate yathāf prakāśaṃ bhavate sarvaṃ tathedam upadhāryatāma yathā vāricaraḥ pakṣī na lipyati jale caranb vimuktātmā tathā yogī guṇadoṣair na lipyatec evam eva kṛtaprajño na doṣair viṣayāṃś carane asajjamānaḥ sarveṣu na kathaṃ cana lipyatea tyaktvā pūrvakṛtaṃ karma ratir yasya sadātmanic sarvabhūtātmabhūtasya guṇamārgeṣv asajjataḥa sattvam ātmā prasavati guṇān vāpi kadā ca nac na guṇā vidur ātmānaṃ guṇān veda sa sarvadāa paridraṣṭā guṇānāṃ sa sraṣṭā caiva yathātathamc sattvakṣetrajñayor etad antaraṃ viddhi sūkṣmayoḥa sṛjate tu guṇān eka eko na sṛjate guṇānc pṛthagbhūtau prakṛtyā tau saṃprayuktau ca sarvadāa yathā matsyo dbhir anyaḥ san saṃprayuktau tathaiva tauc maśakodumbarau cāpi saṃprayuktau yathā sahaa iṣīkā vā yathā muñje pṛthak ca saha caiva cac tathaiva sahitāv etāv anyonyasmin pratiṣṭhitau vyāsa uvācaa sṛjate tu guṇān sattvaṃ kṣetrajñas tv anutiṣṭhatic guṇān vikriyataḥ sarvān udāsīnavad īśvaraḥa svabhāvayuktaṃ tat sarvaṃ yad imān sṛjate guṇānc ūrṇanābhir yathā sūtraṃ sṛjate tantuvad guṇāna pradhvastā na nivartante pravṛttir nopalabhyateb pratyakṣeṇa parokṣaṃ tad anumānena sidhyatic evam eke vyavasyanti nivṛttir iti cāparea ubhayaṃ saṃpradhāryaitad adhyavasyed yathāmatic anenaiva vidhānena bhaved garbhaśayo mahāna anādinidhanaṃ nityam āsādya vicaren naraḥb jayayukto ratho divyo brahmaloke mahīyateb atha satvaram āsādya ratham evaṃ yuyuṅkṣataḥb akṣaraṃ gantumanaso vidhiṃ vakṣyāmi śīghragamb saptayodhāyanaṃ kṛtsnā vānyataḥ pratipadyateb pṛṣṭhataḥ pārśvataś cānyā yāvantyāsyāḥ prasāraṇātb kramaśaḥ pārthivaṃ yac ca vāyavyaṃ khaṃ tathā payaḥb jyotiṣo yat tad aiśvaryam ahaṃkārasya buddhitaḥb avyaktasya yad aiśvaryaṃ kramaśaḥ pratipadyateb vyaktamāś cāpi sicyasyaite tathā yuktena yogataḥb tathāsyaṃ bhavayuktasya vidhim ātmani paśyataḥb nirmathyamānaṃ sūkṣmātmā rūpāṇīmāni darśayetb śaiśiras tu yathā dhūmaḥ sūkṣmaṃ saṃśrayate nabhaḥb tathā dehād vimuktasya pūrvarūpaṃ tad apy utab atha dhūmasya virame dvitīyaṃ rūpadarśanamb jalarūpam ivākāśaṃ tatraivātmani paśyatib aparaṃ vyatikramec cāpi vahnirūpaṃ prakāśateb tasminn uparate vāsya vāyavyaṃ sūkṣmam apy athab rūpaṃ prakāśate tatra pītavarṇavad apy ajaḥb tasminn uparate rūpam ākāśasya prakāśateb ūhyā savarṇarūpaṃ tat tasya rūpaṃ prakāśateb tasminn uparate vāsya buddhirūpaṃ prakāśateb suśuklaṃ cetasaḥ samyag avyakte brāhmaṇasya vaib eteṣv apīha jāteṣu phalajātāni me śṛṇub jātasya pārthivaiśvaryaiḥ sṛṣṭir eṣā vidhīyateb prajāpatir ivākṣobhyaḥ śarīrāt sṛjati prajāḥb varṇato gṛhyate vāpsu nāyaṃ pibati cāśayāḥb snācāsya sictejasā rūpaṃ dahyate śāmyate tathāb aṅgulyāṅguṣṭhamātreṇa vastapāṭenavat tathā sicb pṛthivīṃ kampayanty ete guṇāpāyād iti smṛtaḥb ākāśabhūtaś cākāśe svarṇastvān na ca dṛśyateb ahaṃkārasya vijaye pañca te syur vaśānugāḥb ṣaṇṇām ātmani buddhau tu nitāyaṃ sicprabhavaty utab nirdoṣaprabhavā hy eṣā kṛtsnā samabhivartateb tathaiva vyaktam ātmānam avyaktaṃ pratipadyateb yato niḥsarate loko bhavati vyaktasaṃjñakaḥb tatrāsannamayīṃ vyākhyāṃ śṛṇu tvaṃ vistareṇa vaib tathā vyaktamayīṃ caiva vyākhyāṃ pūrvaṃ nibodha meb pañcaviṃśatitattvāni tulyāny ubhayataḥ samamb yoge sāṃkhye pi ca tathā viśeṣāṃs tatra me śṛṇub proktaṃ tad vyartham ity eva jāyate vartate ca yatb jīvate mriyate caiva caturbhir lakṣaṇair yutamb viparītam ato yat tad avyaktaṃ samudāhṛtamb pāpātmānau ca deveṣu siddhānteṣv apy udāhṛtaub caturlakṣaṇajantur yaś caturvargaḥ pracakṣateb vyaktam avyaktajaṃ caiva tathā buddhir athetaratb sattvaṃ kṣetrajña ity etad dvayam avyaktadarśanamb dvāv ātmānau ca deveṣu viṣayeṣu ca rājataḥb viṣayān pratisaṃhāraḥ sālokaṃ siddhilakṣaṇamb nirmamaś cānahaṃkāro nirdvaṃdvaś chinnasaṃśayaḥb naiva krudhyati na dveṣṭi nātmatā bhavato giraḥb ākruṣṭas tāḍitaś cāpi maitraṃ dhyāyati nāśubhamb vāṅmanaḥkāyadaṇḍānāṃ trayāṇāṃ ca nivartakamb samaḥ sarveṣu bhūteṣu brahmāṇam ativartateb naivecchati na cānicchan yātrāmātravyavasthitaḥb alolupo py atho dānto nākṛtir na nirākṛtiḥb nāsyendriyamanaḥprāṇabuddhayaḥ sarvasākṣiṇaḥc akrudhyann aprahṛṣyaṃś ca nityaṃ vigatamatsaraḥa ity evaṃ hṛdayagranthiṃ buddhicintāmayaṃ dṛḍhamc atītya sukham āsīta aśocaṃś chinnasaṃśayaḥa tapyeyuḥ pracyutāḥ pṛthvyā yathā pūrṇāṃ nadīṃ narāḥc avagāḍhā hy avidvāṃso viddhi lokam imaṃ tathāa na tu tāmyati vai vidvān sthale carati tattvavitc evaṃ yo vindate tmānaṃ kevalaṃ jñānam ātmanaḥa evaṃ buddhvā naraḥ sarvāṃ bhūtānām āgatiṃ gatimc samavekṣya śanaiḥ samyag labhate śamam uttamama etad vai janmasāmarthyaṃ brāhmaṇasya viśeṣataḥc ātmajñānaṃ śamaś caiva paryāptaṃ tatparāyaṇama etad buddhvā bhaved buddhaḥ kim anyad buddhalakṣaṇamc vijñāyaitad vimucyante kṛtakṛtyā manīṣiṇaḥa na bhavati viduṣāṃ mahad bhayaṃyad aviduṣāṃ sumahad bhayaṃ bhavetc na hi gatir adhikāsti kasya cidbhavati hi yā viduṣaḥ sanātanīa lokamāturam asūyate janastat tad eva ca nirīkṣya śocatec tatra paśya kuśalān aśocatoye vidus tad ubhayaṃ kṛtākṛtama yat karoty anabhisaṃdhipūrvakaṃtac ca nirṇudati yat purā kṛtamc na priyaṃ tad ubhayaṃ na cāpriyaṃtasya taj janayatīha kurvataḥ śuka uvācaa yasmād dharmāt paro dharmo vidyate neha kaś canac yo viśiṣṭaś ca dharmebhyas taṃ bhavān prabravītu me vyāsa uvācaa dharmaṃ te saṃpravakṣyāmi purāṇam ṛṣisaṃstutamc viśiṣṭaṃ sarvadharmebhyas tam ihaikamanāḥ śṛṇua indriyāṇi pramāthīni buddhyā saṃyamya yatnataḥc sarvato niṣpatiṣṇūni pitā bālān ivātmajāna manasaś cendriyāṇāṃ ca hy aikāgryaṃ paramaṃ tapaḥc taj jyāyaḥ sarvadharmebhyaḥ sa dharmaḥ para ucyatea tāni sarvāṇi saṃdhāya manaḥṣaṣṭhāni medhayāc ātmatṛpta ivāsīta bahu cintyam acintayana gocarebhyo nivṛttāni yadā sthāsyanti veśmanic tadā tvam ātmanātmānaṃ paraṃ drakṣyasi śāśvatama sarvātmānaṃ mahātmānaṃ vidhūmam iva pāvakamc taṃ paśyanti mahātmāno brāhmaṇā ye manīṣiṇaḥa yathā puṣpaphalopeto bahuśākho mahādrumaḥc ātmano nābhijānīte kva me puṣpaṃ kva me phalama evam ātmā na prasannātmā vikalmaṣaḥa bhūmiṣṭhānīva bhūtāni parvatastho niśāmayac akrudhyann aprahṛṣyaṃś ca nanṛśaṃsamatis tathāe tato drakṣyasi bhūtānāṃ sarveṣāṃ prabhavāpyayaua evaṃ vai sarvadharmebhyo viśiṣṭaṃ menire budhāḥc dharmaṃ dharmabhṛtāṃ śreṣṭha munayas tattvadarśinaḥa ātmano vyayino jñātvā idaṃ putrānuśāsanamc prayatāya pravaktavyaṃ hitāyānugatāya caa ātmajñānam idaṃ guhyaṃ sarvaguhyatamaṃ mahatc abruvaṃ yad ahaṃ tāta ātmasākṣikam añjasāa naiva strī na pumān etan naiva cedaṃ napuṃsakamc aduḥkham asukhaṃ brahma bhūtabhavyabhavātmakama naitaj jñātvā pumān strī vā punarbhavam avāpnuyātc abhavapratipattyartham etad vartma vidhīyatea yathā matāni sarvāṇi na caitāni yathā tathāc kathitāni mayā putra bhavanti na bhavanti caa tat prītiyuktena guṇānvitenaputreṇa satputraguṇānvitenac pṛṣṭo brāhmaṇasyaa sarvān vedān adhīyīta śuśrūṣur brahmacaryavānc ṛco yajūṃṣi sāmāni na tena na sa brāhmaṇaḥa jñātivat sarvabhūtānāṃ sarvavit sarvavedavitc nākāmo mriyate jātu na tena na ca brāhmaṇaḥa iṣṭīś sukṛtaprajñaḥ sukham avyayam aśnutea niṣpracāraṃ manaḥ kṛtvā pratiṣṭhāpya ca sarvataḥc yām ayaṃ labhate tuṣṭiṃ sā na śakyam ato nyathāa yena tṛpyaty abhuñjāno yena tuṣyaty avittavānc yenāsneho balaṃ vapuś cāndramasaṃ yathāa saviśeṣāṇi bhūtāni guṇāṃś cābhajato muneḥc sukhenāpohyate duḥkhaṃ bhāskareṇa tamo yathāa tam atikrāntakarmāṇam atikrāntaguṇakṣayamc brāhmaṇaṃ viṣayāśliṣṭaṃ jarāmṛtyū na uvācaa dvaṃdvāni mokṣajijñāsur arthadharmāv anuṣṭhitaḥc vaktrā guṇavatā śiṣyaḥ śrāvyaḥ pūrvam idaṃ mahata ākāśaṃ māruto jyotir āpaḥ pṛthvī ca pañcamīc bhāvābhāvau ca kālaś ca sarvabhūteṣu pañcasua antarātmakam ākāśaṃ tanmayaṃ śrotram indriyamc tasya śabdaṃ guṇaṃ vidyān mūrtiśāstravidhānavita caraṇaṃ mārutātmeti prāṇāpānau ca tanmayauc sparśanaṃ cendriyaṃ vidyāt tathā sparśaṃ ca tanmayama tataḥ pākaḥ prakāśaś ca jyotiś cakṣuś ca tanmayamc tasya rūpaṃ guṇaṃ vidyāt tamo nvavasitātmakama prakledaḥ kṣudratā sneha ity āpo hy upadiśyateb asṛṅ majjā ca yac cānyat snigdhaṃ vidyāt tadātmakamc rasanaṃ caivendriyārtho yaṃ vijñeyaḥ pṛthivīmayaḥa uttareṣu guṇāḥ santi sarve sarveṣu cottarāḥc pañcānāṃ bhūtasaṃghānāṃ saṃtatiṃ munayo viduḥa mano navamam eṣāṃ tu buddhis tu daśamī smṛtāc ekādaśo ntarātmā ca sarvataḥ para ucyatea vyavasāyātmikā buddhir mano vyākaraṇātmakamc karmānumānād vijñeyaḥ sa jīvaḥ kṣetrasaṃjñakaḥa ebhiḥ kālāṣṭamair bhāvair yaḥ sarvaiḥ sarvam anvitamc paśyaty akaluṣaṃ prājñaḥ sa mohaṃ nānuvartate vyāsa uvācaa śarīrād vipramuktaṃ hi sūkṣmabhūtaṃ śarīriṇamc karmabhiḥ paripaśyanti śāstroktaiḥ śāstracetasaḥa yathā marīcyaḥ sahitāś carantigacchanti tiṣṭhanti ca dṛśyamānāḥc dehair vimuktā vicaranti lokāṃstathaiva sattvāny atimānuṣāṇia pratirūpaṃ yathaivāpsu tāpaḥ sūryasya lakṣyatec sattvavāṃs tu tathā sattvaṃ pratirūpaṃ prapaśyatia tāni sūkṣmāṇi sattvasthā vimuktāni śarīrataḥc svena tattvena tattvajñāḥ paśyanti niyatendriyāḥa svapatāṃ jāgratāṃ caiva sarveṣām ātmacintitamc pradhānadvaidhayuktānāṃ jahatāṃ karmajaṃ rajaḥa yathāhani tathā rātrau yathā rātrau tathāhanic vaśe eṣa vijñātā sukhaduḥkhayoḥa tatrāpi labhate duḥkhaṃ tatrāpi labhate sukhamc krodhalobhau tu tatrāpi kṛtvā vyasanam archatia prīṇitaś cāpi bhavati mahato rthān avāpya cac karoti puṇyaṃ tatrāpi jāgrann iva ca paśyatid mahoṣmāntargataś cāpi garbhatvaṃ samupeyivānd daśa māsān vasan kukṣau naiṣo nnam iva jīryatea tam evam atitejoṃśaṃ bhūtātmānaṃ hṛdi sthitamc tamorajobhyām āviṣṭā nānupaśyanti mūrtiṣua śāstrayogaparā bhūtvā svam ātmānaṃ parīpsavaḥc anucchvāsāny amūrtīni yāni vajropamāny apia pṛthagbhūteṣu sṛṣṭeṣu caturṣv āśramakarmasuc samādhau yogam evaitac chāṇḍilyaḥ śamam abravīta viditvā sapta sūkṣmāṇi ṣaḍaṅgaṃ ca maheśvaramc pradhānaviniyogasthaḥ paraṃ brahmādhigacchati vyāsa uvācaa hṛdi kāmadrumaś citro mohasaṃcayasaṃbhavaḥc krodhamānamahāskandho vivitsāparimocanaḥa tasya cājñānam ādhāraḥ pramādaḥ pariṣecanamc so bhyasūyāpalāśo hi purāduṣkṛtasāravāna saṃmohacintāviṭapaḥ śokaśākho bhayaṃkaraḥc mohanībhiḥ pipāsābhir latābhiḥ pariveṣṭitaḥa upāsate mahāvṛkṣaṃ sulubdhās taṃ phalepsavaḥc āyāsaiḥ saṃyataḥ pāśaiḥ phalāni pariveṣṭayana yas tān pāśān vaśe kṛtvā taṃ vṛkṣam apakarṣatic gataḥ sa duḥkhayor antaṃ yatamānas tayor dvayoḥa saṃrohaty akṛtaprajñaḥ saṃtāpena hi pādapamc sa tam eva tato hanti viṣaṃ grastam ivāturama tasyānuśayamūlasya mūlam uddhriyate balātc tyāgāpramādākṛtinā sāmyena paramāsināa evaṃ yo veda kāmasya kevalaṃ parikarṣaṇamc vadhaṃ vai kāmaśāstrasya sa duḥkhāny ativartatea śarīraṃ puram ity āhuḥ svāminī buddhir iṣyatec tatra buddheḥ śarīrasthaṃ mano nāmārthacintakama indriyāṇi janāḥ paurās tadarthaṃ tu parā kṛtiḥc tatra dvau dāruṇau doṣau tamo nāma rajas tathāa yadartham upajīvanti paurāḥ sahapureśvarāḥc advāreṇa tam evārthaṃ dvau doṣāv upajīvataḥa tatra buddhir hi durdharṣā manaḥ sādharmyam ucyatec paurāś cāpi manas trastās teṣām api calā sthitiḥa yadarthaṃ buddhir adhyāste na so rthaḥ pariṣīdatib pauramantraviyuktāyāḥ so rthaḥ saṃsīdati kramātc yadarthaṃ pṛthag adhyāste manas tat pariṣīdatia pṛthagbhūtaṃ yadā buddhyā mano bhavati kevalamc tatrainaṃ vivṛtaṃ śūnyaṃ rajaḥ paryavatiṣṭhatea tan manaḥ kurute sakhyaṃ rajasā saha saṃgatamc taṃ cādāya janaṃ pauraṃ rajase saṃprayacchati bhīṣma uvācaa bhūtānāṃ guṇasaṃkhyānaṃ bhūyaḥ putra niśāmayac dvaipāyanamukhād bhraṣṭaṃ ślāghayā parayānaghaa dīptānalanibhaḥ prāha bhagavān dhūmravarcasec tato ham api vakṣyāmi bhūyaḥ putra nidarśanama bhūmeḥ sthairyaṃ pṛthutvaṃ ca kāṭhinyaṃ prasavātmatāc gandho gurutvaṃ śaktiś ca saṃghātaḥ sthāpanā dhṛtiḥa apāṃ śaityaṃ rasaḥ kledo dravatvaṃ snehasaumyatāc jihvā viṣyandinī caiva bhaumāpyāsravaṇaṃ tathāa agner durdharṣatā tejas tāpaḥ pākaḥ prakāśanamc śaucaṃ rāgo laghus taikṣṇyaṃ daśamaṃ cordhvabhāgitāa vāyor aniyamaḥ sparśo vādasthānaṃ svatantratāc balaṃ śaighryaṃ ca mohaś ca ceṣṭā karmakṛtā bhavaḥa ākāśasya guṇaḥ śabdo vyāpitvaṃ chidratāpi cac anāśrayam anālambam avyaktam avikāritāa apratīghātatā caiva bhūtatvaṃ vikṛtāni cac guṇāḥ pañcāśataṃ proktāḥ pañcabhūtātmabhāvitāḥa calopapattir vyaktiś ca visargaḥ kalpanā kṣamāc sad asac cāśutā caiva manaso nava vai guṇāḥa iṣṭāniṣṭavikalpaś ca vyavasāyaḥ samādhitāc saṃśayaḥ pratipattiś ca buddhau pañceha ye guṇāḥ yudhiṣṭhira uvācaa kathaṃ pañcaguṇā buddhiḥ kathaṃ pañcendriyā guṇāḥb etebhya ete nirvṛttāḥ svaguṇāyātmanopi vāc etan me sarvam ācakṣva sūkṣmajñānaṃ pitāmaha bhīṣma uvācaa āhuḥ ṣaṣṭiṃ bhūtaguṇān vaibhūtaviśiṣṭā nityaviṣaktāḥc bhūtaviṣaktāś cākṣarasṛṣṭāḥputra na nityaṃ tad iha vadantia tat putra cintākalitaṃ yad uktamanāgataṃ vai tava saṃpratīhac bhūtārthatattvaṃ tad avāpya sarvaṃbhūtaprabhāvād bhava śāntabuddhiḥ yudhiṣṭhira uvācaa ya ime pṛthivīpālāḥ śerate pṛthivītalec pṛtanāmadhya ete hi gatasattvā mahābalāḥa ekaikaśo bhīmabalā nāgāyutabalās tathāc ete hi nihatāḥ saṃkhye tulyatejobalair naraiḥa naiṣāṃ paśyāmi hantāraṃ prāṇināṃ saṃyuge purāc vikrameṇopasaṃpannās tejobalasamanvitāḥa atha ceme mahāprājña śerate hi gatāsavaḥc mṛtā iti ca śabdo yaṃ vartaty eṣu gatāsuṣua ime mṛtā nṛpatayaḥ prāyaśo bhīmavikramāḥc tatra me saṃśayo jātaḥ kutaḥ saṃjñā mṛtā itia kasya mṛtyuḥ kuto mṛtyuḥ kena mṛtyur iha prajāḥc haraty amarasaṃkāśa tan me brūhi pitāmaha bhīṣma uvācaa purā kṛtayuge tāta rājāsīd avikampakaḥc sa śatruvaśam āpannaḥ saṃgrāme kṣīṇavāhanaḥa tatra putro harir nāma nārāyaṇasamo balec sa śatrubhir hataḥ saṃkhye sabalaḥ sapadānugaḥa sa rājā śatruvaśagaḥ putraśokasamanvitaḥc yadṛcchayāśāntiparo dadarśa bhuvi nāradama sa tasmai sarvam ācaṣṭa yathā vṛttaṃ janeśvaraḥc śatrubhir grahaṇaṃ saṃkhye putrasya maraṇaṃ tathāa tasya tad vacanaṃ śrutvā nārado tha tapodhanaḥc ākhyānam idam ācaṣṭa putraśokāpahaṃ tadāa rājañ śṛṇu dharaṇyās tu tataḥ saṃhāra iṣyatea iyaṃ hi māṃ sadā devī bhārārtā samacodayatc saṃhārārthaṃ mahādeva bhāreṇāpsu nimajjatia yadāhaṃ nādhigacchāmi buddhyā bahu vicārayanc saṃhāram āsāṃ vṛddhānāṃ tato pradadhyau duḥkhitā bālā sāśrupātam atīva hia pāṇibhyāṃ caiva jagrāha tāny aśrūṇi janeśvaraḥc mānavānāṃ hitārthāya yayāce punar eva ca nārada uvācaa vinīya duḥkham abalā sā tv atīvāyatekṣaṇāc uvāca prāñjalir bhūtvā latevāvarjitā tadāa tvayā sṛṣṭā kathaṃ nārī mādṛśī vadatāṃ varac raudrakarmābhijāyeta sarvaprāṇibhayaṃkarīa bibhemy aham adharmasya dharmyam ādiśa karma mec tvaṃ māṃ bhītām avekṣasva prabhoa etam icchāmy ahaṃ kāmaṃ tvatto lokapitāmahac iccheyaṃ tvatprasādāc ca tapas taptuṃ sureśvara pitāmaha uvācaa mṛtyo saṃkalpitā me tvaṃ prajāsaṃhārahetunāb tvaṃ hi saṃhārabuddhyā me cintitā ruṣitena cac gaccha saṃhara sarvās tvaṃ prajā mā ca vicārayaa etad evam avaśyaṃ hi bhavitā naitad anyathāc kriyatām anavadyāṅgi yathoktaṃ madvaco naghe nārada uvācaa evam uktā mahābāho mṛtyuḥ parapuraṃjayac na vyājahāra tasthau ca prahvā bhagavadunmukhīa punaḥ punar athoktā sā gatasattveva bhāminīc tūṣṇīm āsīt tato devo devānām īśvareśvaraḥa prasasāda kila brahmā svayam evātmanātmavānc smayamānaś ca lokeśo lokān sarvān avaikṣataa nivṛttaroṣe tasmiṃs tu bhagavaty aparājitec sā kanyāpajagāmāsya samīpād iti naḥ śrutama apasṛtyāpratiśrutya prajāsaṃharaṇaṃ tadāc tvaramāṇeva rājendra mṛtyur dhenukam abhyayāta sā tatra paramaṃ devī tapo carata duścaramc samā hy ekapade tasthau daśa padmāni pañca caa tāṃ tathā kurvatīṃ tatra tapaḥ paramaduścaramc punar eva mahātejā brahmā vacanam abravīta kuruṣva me vaco mṛtyo tad anādṛtya satvarāc tathaivaikapade tāta punar anyāni sapta sāa tasthau padmāni ṣaṭ caiva pañca dve caiva mānadac bhūyaḥ padmāyutaṃ tāta mṛgaiḥ saha cacāra sād dve cacāra niyamaṃ punaḥa tato yayau mahābhāgā gaṅgāṃ meruṃ ca kevalamc tasthau dārv iva niśceṣṭā bhūtānāṃ hitakāmyayāa tato himavato mūrdhni yatra devāḥ samījirec tatrāṅguṣṭhena rājendra nikharvam aparaṃ tataḥe tasthau pitāmahaṃ caiva toṣayām āsa yatnataḥa tatas tām abravīt tatra lokānāṃ prabhavāpyayaḥc kim idaṃ vartate putri kriyatāṃ tad vaco mamaa tato bravīt punar mṛtyur bhagavantaṃ pitāmahamc na
