mṛṣā bhadre bhavitā neha kiṃ canaa dharmaḥ sanātanaś ca tvām ihaivānupravekṣyatec ahaṃ ca vibudhāś caiva tvaddhite niratāḥ sadāa imam anyaṃ ca te kāmaṃ dadāmi manasepsitamc na tvā doṣeṇa yāsyanti vyādhisaṃpīḍitāḥ prajāḥa puruṣeṣu ca rūpeṇa puruṣas tvaṃ bhaviṣyasic strīṣu strīrūpiṇī caiva tṛtīyeṣu napuṃsakama saivam uktā mahārāja kṛtāñjalir uvāca hac punar eva mahātmānaṃ neti deveśam avyayama tām abravīt tadā devo mṛtyo saṃhara mānavānc adharmas te na bhavitā tathā dhyāsyāmy ahaṃ śubhed tvaṃ hi yattā ca yuktā ca pūrvotpannā ca bhāminīd anuśiṣṭā ca nirdoṣā tasmāt tvaṃ kuru me matama yān aśrubindūn patitān apaśyaṃye pāṇibhyāṃ dhāritās te purastātc te vyādhayo mānavān ghorarūpāḥprāpte kāle pīḍayiṣyanti mṛtyoa sarveṣāṃ tvaṃ prāṇinām antakālekāmakrodhau sahitau yojayethāḥc evaṃ dharmas tvām upaiṣyaty ameyona cādharmaṃ lapsyase tulyavṛttiḥa evaṃ dharmaṃ pālayiṣyasy athoktaṃna cātmānaṃ majjayiṣyasy adharmec tasmāt kāmaṃ rocayābhyāgataṃ tvaṃsaṃyojyātho saṃharasveha jantūna sā vai tadā mṛtyusaṃjñāpadeśācchāpād bhītā bāḍham ity abravīt tamc atho prāṇān prāṇinām antakālekāmakrodhau prāpya nirmohya hantia mṛtyor ye te vyādhayaś cāśrupātāmanuṣyāṇāṃ rujyate yaiḥ śarīramc sarveṣāṃ vai prāṇināṃ prāṇanāntetasmāc chokaṃ mā kṛthā budhya buddhyāa sarve devāḥ prāṇināṃ prāṇanāntegatvā vṛttāḥ saṃnivṛttās tathaivac evaṃ sarve mānavāḥ prāṇanāntegatvāvṛttā devavad rājasiṃhaa vāyur bhīmo bhīmanādo mahaujāḥsarveṣāṃ ca prāṇināṃ prāṇabhūtaḥc nānāvṛttir dehināṃ dehabhedetasmād vāyur devadevo viśiṣṭaḥa sarve devā martyasaṃjñāviśiṣṭāḥsarve martyā devasaṃjñāviśiṣṭāḥc tasmāt putraṃ mā śuco rājasiṃhaputraḥ svargaṃ prāpya te modate haa evaṃ mṛtyur devasṛṣṭā prajānāṃprāpte kāle saṃharantī yathāvatc tasyāś caiva vyādhayas te śrupātāḥprāpte kāle saṃharantīha jantūn yudhiṣṭhira uvācaa ime vai mānavāḥ sarve dharmaṃ prati viśaṅkitāḥc ko yaṃ dharmaḥ kuto dharmas tan me brūhi pitāmahaa dharmo nv ayam ihārthaḥ kim amutrārtho pi vā bhavetc ubhayārtho pi vā dharmas tan me brūhi pitāmaha bhīṣma uvācaa sadācāraḥ smṛtir vedās trividhaṃ dharmalakṣaṇamc caturtham artham ity āhuḥ kavayo dharmalakṣaṇama api hy uktāni karmāṇi vyavasyanty uttarāvarec lokayātrārtham eveha dharmasya niyamaḥ kṛtaḥe ubhayatra sukhodarka iha caiva paratra caa alabdhvā nipuṇaṃ dharmaṃ pāpaḥ pāpe prasajjatic na ca pāpakṛtaḥ pāpān mucyante ke cid āpadia apāpavādī bhavati yadā bhavati dharmavitc dharmasya niṣṭhā svācāras tam evāśritya bhotsyasea yadādharmasamāviṣṭo dhanaṃ gṛhṇāti taskaraḥc ramate nirharan stenaḥ paravittam arājakea yadāsya tad dharanty anye tadā rājānam icchatic tadā teṣāṃ spṛhayate ye vai tuṣṭāḥ svakair dhanaiḥa abhītaḥ śucir abhyeti rājadvāram aśaṅkitaḥc na hi duścaritaṃ kiṃ cid antarātmani paśyatia satyasya vacanaṃ sādhu na satyād vidyate paramc satyena vidhṛtaṃ sarvaṃ sarvaṃ satye pratiṣṭhitama api pāpakṛto raudrāḥ satyaṃ kṛtvā pṛthak pṛthakc adroham avisaṃvādaṃ pravartante tadāśrayāḥe te cen mitho dhṛtiṃ kuryur vinaśyeyur asaṃśayama na hartavyaṃ paradhanam iti dharmaḥ sanātanaḥc manyante balavantas taṃ durbalaiḥ saṃpravartitame yadā niyatidaurbalyam athaiṣām eva rocatea na hy atyantaṃ balayutā bhavanti sukhino pi vāc tasmād anārjave buddhir na kāryā te kathaṃ canaa asādhubhyo sya na bhayaṃ na corebhyo na rājataḥc na kiṃ cit kasya cit kurvan nirbhayaḥ śucir āvaseta sarvataḥ śaṅkate steno mṛgo grāmam iveyivānc bahudhācaritaṃ pāpam anyatraivānupaśyatia muditaḥ śucir abhyeti sarvato nirbhayaḥ sadāc na hi duścaritaṃ kiṃ cid ātmano nyeṣu paśyatia dātavyam ity ayaṃ dharma ukto bhūtahite rataiḥc taṃ manyante dhanayutāḥ kṛpaṇaiḥ saṃpravartitama yadā niyatikārpaṇyam athaiṣām eva rocatec na hy atyantaṃ dhanavanto bhavanti sukhino pi vāa yad anyair vihitaṃ necched ātmanaḥ karma pūruṣaḥc na tat pareṣu kurvīta jānann apriyam ātmanaḥa yo nyasya syād upapatiḥ sa kaṃ kiṃ vaktum arhatic yad anyas tasya tat kuryān na mṛṣyed iti me matiḥa jīvituṃ yaḥ svayaṃ cecchet kathaṃ so nyaṃ praghātayetc yad yad ātmana iccheta tat parasyāpi cintayeta atiriktaiḥ saṃvibhajed bhogair anyān akiṃcanānc etasmāt kāraṇād dhātrā kusīdaṃ saṃpravartitama yasmiṃs tu devāḥ samaye saṃtiṣṭheraṃs tathā bhavetc atha cel lābhasamaye sthitir dharme pi śobhanāa sarvaṃ priyābhyupagataṃ dharmam āhur manīṣiṇaḥc paśyaitaṃ lakṣaṇoddeśaṃ dharmādharme yudhiṣṭhiraa lokasaṃgrahasaṃyuktaṃ vidhātrā vihitaṃ purāc sūkṣmadharmārthaniyataṃ satāṃ caritam uttamama dharmalakṣaṇam ākhyātam etat te kurusattamac tasmād anārjave buddhir na kāryā te kathaṃ cana yudhiṣṭhira uvācaa sūkṣmaṃ sādhu samādiṣṭaṃ bhavatā dharmalakṣaṇamc pratibhā tv asti me kā cit tāṃ brūyām anumānataḥa bhūyāṃso hṛdaye ye me praśnās te vyāhṛtās tvayāc imam anyaṃ pravakṣyāmi na rājan vigrahād ivaa imāni hi prāpayanti sṛjanty uttārayanti cac na dharmaḥ paripāṭhena śakyo bhārata vedituma anyo dharmaḥ samasthasya viṣamasthasya cāparaḥc āpadas tu kathaṃ śakyāḥ paripāṭhena vedituma sadācāro mato dharmaḥ santas tv ācāralakṣaṇāḥc sādhyāsādhyaṃ kathaṃ śakyaṃ sadācāro hy alakṣaṇama dṛśyate dharmarūpeṇa adharmaṃ prākṛtaś caranc dharmaṃ cādharmarūpeṇa kaś cid aprākṛtaś carana punar asya pramāṇaṃ hi nirdiṣṭaṃ śāstrakovidaiḥc vedavādāś cānuyugaṃ hrasantīti ha naḥ śrutama anye kṛtayuge dharmās tretāyāṃ dvāpare parec anye kaliyuge dharmā yathāśaktikṛtā ivaa āmnāyavacanaṃ satyam ity ayaṃ lokasaṃgrahaḥc āmnāyebhyaḥ paraṃ vedāḥ prasṛtā viśvatomukhāḥa te cet sarve pramāṇaṃ vai pramāṇaṃ tan na vidyatec pramāṇe cāpramāṇe ca viruddhe śāstratā kutaḥa dharmasya hriyamāṇasya balavadbhir durātmabhiḥc yā yā vikriyate saṃsthā tataḥ sāpi praṇaśyatia vidma caivaṃ na vā vidma śakyaṃ vā vedituṃ na vāc aṇīyān kṣuradhārāyā garīyān parvatād apia gandharvanagarākāraḥ prathamaṃ saṃpradṛśyatec anvīkṣyamāṇaḥ kavibhiḥ punar gacchaty adarśanama nipānānīva gobhyāśe kṣetre kulyeva bhāratac smṛto pi śāśvato dharmo viprahīṇo na dṛśyatea kāmād anye kṣayād anye kāraṇair aparais tathāc asanto hi vṛthācāraṃ bhajante bahavo parea dharmo bhavati sa kṣipraṃ vilīnas tv eva sādhuṣuc anye tān āhur unmattān api cāvahasanty utaa mahājanā hy upāvṛttā rājadharmaṃ samāśritāḥc na hi sarvahitaḥ kaś cid ācāraḥ saṃpradṛśyatea tenaivānyaḥ prabhavati so paraṃ bādhate punaḥc dṛśyate caiva sa punas tulyarūpo yadṛcchayāa yenaivānyaḥ prabhavati so parān api bādhatec ācārāṇām anaikāgryaṃ sarveṣām eva lakṣayeta cirābhipannaḥ kavibhiḥ pūrvaṃ dharma udāhṛtaḥc tenācāreṇa pūrveṇa saṃsthā bhavati śāśvatī bhīṣma uvācaa atrāpy udāharantīmam itihāsaṃ purātanamc tulādhārasya vākyāni dharme jājalinā sahaa vane vanacaraḥ kaś cij jājalir nāma vai dvijaḥc sāgaroddeśam āgamya tapas tepe mahātapāḥa niyato niyatāhāraś cīrājinajaṭādharaḥc malapaṅkadharo dhīmān bahūn varṣagaṇān muniḥa sa kadā cin mahātejā jalavāso mahīpatec cacāra lokān viprarṣiḥ prekṣamāṇo manojavaḥa sa cintayām āsa munir jalamadhye kadā canac viprekṣya sāgarāntāṃ vai mahīṃ savanakānanāma na mayā sadṛśo stīha loke sthāvarajaṅgamec apsu vaihāyasaṃ gacchen mayā yo nyaḥ saheti vaia sa dṛśyamāno rakṣobhir jalamadhye vadat tataḥc abruvaṃś ca piśācās taṃ naivaṃ tvaṃ vaktum arhasia tulādhāro vaṇigdharmā vārāṇasyāṃ mahāyaśāḥc so py evaṃ nārhate vaktuṃ yathā tvaṃ dvijasattamaa ity ukto jājalir bhūtaiḥ pratyuvāca mahātapāḥc paśyeyaṃ tam ahaṃ prājñaṃ tulādhāraṃ yaśasvinama iti bruvāṇaṃ tam ṛṣiṃ rakṣāṃsy uddhṛtya sāgarātc abruvan gaccha panthānam āsthāyemaṃ dvijottamaa ity ukto jājalir bhūtair jagāma vimanās tadāc vārāṇasyāṃ tulādhāraṃ samāsādyābravīd vacaḥ yudhiṣṭhira uvācaa kiṃ kṛtaṃ sukṛtaṃ karma tāta jājalinā purāc yena siddhiṃ parāṃ prāptas tan no vyākhyātum arhasi bhīṣma uvācaa atīva tapasā yukto ghoreṇa sa babhūva hac nadyupasparśanarataḥ sāyaṃ prātar mahātapāḥa agnīn paricaran samyak svādhyāyaparamo dvijaḥc vānaprasthavidhānajño jājalir jvalitaḥ śriyāa satye tapasi tiṣṭhan sa na ca dharmam avaikṣatac varṣāsv ākāśaśāyī sa hemante jalasaṃśrayaḥa vatātapasaho grīṣme na ca dharmam avindatac duḥkhaśayyāś ca vividhā bhūmau ca parivartanama tataḥ kadā cit sa munir varṣāsv ākāśam āsthitaḥc antarikṣāj jalaṃ mūrdhnā pratyagṛhṇān muhur muhuḥa atha tasya jaṭāḥ klinnā babhūvur grathitāḥ prabhob klinnā babhūvur grathitā āplutasya jaṭāḥ prabhoc araṇyagamanān nityaṃ malino malasaṃyutāḥa sa kadā cin nirāhāro vāyubhakṣo mahātapāḥc tasthau kāṣṭhavad avyagro na cacāla ca karhi cita tasya sma sthāṇubhūtasya nirviceṣṭasya bhāratac kuliṅgaśakunau rājan nīḍaṃ śirasi cakratuḥa sa tau dayāvān viprarṣir upapraikṣata dampatīc kurvāṇaṃ nīḍakaṃ tatra jaṭāsu tṛṇatantubhiḥa yadā sa na calaty eva sthāṇubhūto mahātapāḥc tatas tau pariviśvastau sukhaṃ tatroṣatus tadāa atītāsv atha varṣāsu śaratkāla upasthitec prājāpatyena vidhinā viśvāsāt kāmamohitaua tatrāpātayatāṃ rājañ śirasy aṇḍāni khecarauc tāny abudhyata tejasvī sa vipraḥ saṃśitavrataḥa buddhvā ca sa mahātejā na cacālaiva jājaliḥc dharme dhṛtamanā nityaṃ nādharmaṃ sa tv arocayata ahany ahani cāgamya tatas tau tasya mūrdhanic āśvāsitau vai vasataḥ saṃprahṛṣṭau tadā vibhoa aṇḍebhyas tv atha puṣṭebhyaḥ prajāyanta śakuntakāḥc vyavardhanta ca tatraiva na cākampata jājaliḥa sa rakṣamāṇas tv aṇḍāni kuliṅgānāṃ yatavrataḥc tathaiva tasthau dharmātmā nirviceṣṭaḥ samāhitaḥa tatas tu kālasamaye babhūvus te tha pakṣiṇaḥc bubudhe tāṃś ca sa munir jātapakṣāñ śakuntakāna tataḥ kadā cit tāṃs tatra paśyan pakṣīn yatavrataḥc babhūva paramaprītas tadā matimatāṃ varaḥa tathā tān abhisaṃvṛddhān dṛṣṭvā cāpnuvatāṃ mudamc śakunau nirbhayau tatra ūṣatuś cātmajaiḥ sahaa jātapakṣāṃś ca so paśyad uḍḍīnān punarāgatānc sāyaṃ sāyaṃ dvijān vipro na cākampata jājaliḥa kadā cit punar abhyetya punar gacchanti saṃtatamc tyaktā mātṛpitṛbhyāṃ te na cākampata jājaliḥa atha te divasaṃ cārīṃ gatvā sāyaṃ punar nṛpac upāvartanta tatraiva nivāsārthaṃ śakuntakāḥa kadā cid divasān pañca samutpatya vihaṃgamāḥc ṣaṣṭhe hani samājagmur na cākampata jājaliḥa krameṇa ca punaḥ sarve divasāni bahūny apic nopāvartanta śakunā jātaprāṇāḥ sma te yadāa kadā cin māsamātreṇa samutpatya vihaṃgamāḥc naivāgacchaṃs tato rājan prātiṣṭhata sa jājaliḥa tatas teṣu pralīneṣu jājalir jātavismayaḥc siddho smīti matiṃ cakre tatas taṃ māna āviśata sa tathā nirgatān dṛṣṭvā śakuntān niyatavrataḥc saṃbhāvitātmā saṃbhāvya bhṛśaṃ prītas tadābhavana sa nadyāṃ samupaspṛśya tarpayitvā hutāśanamc udayantam athādityam abhyagacchan mahātapāḥa saṃbhāvya caṭakān mūrdhni jājalir japatāṃ varaḥc āsphoṭayat tadākāśe dharmaḥ prāpto mayeti vaia athāntarikṣe vāg āsīt tāṃ sa śuśrāva jājaliḥc dharmeṇa na samas tvaṃ vai tulādhārasya jājalea vārāṇasyāṃ mahāprājñas tulādhāraḥ pratiṣṭhitaḥc so py evaṃ nārhate vaktuṃ yathā tvaṃ bhāṣase dvijaa so marṣavaśam āpannas tulādhāradidṛkṣayāc pṛthivīm acarad rājan yatrasāyaṃgṛho muniḥa kālena mahatāgacchat sa tu vārāṇasīṃ purīmc vikrīṇantaṃ ca paṇyāni tulādhāraṃ dadarśa saḥa so pi dṛṣṭvaiva taṃ vipram āyāntaṃ bhāṇḍajīvanaḥc samutthāya susaṃhṛṣṭaḥ svāgatenābhyapūjayat tulādhāra uvācaa āyān evāsi vidito mama brahman na saṃśayaḥc bravīmi yat tu vacanaṃ tac chṛṇuṣva dvijottamaa sāgarānūpam āśritya tapas taptaṃ tvayā mahatc na ca dharmasya saṃjñāṃ tvaṃ purā vettha kathaṃ canaa tataḥ siddhasya tapasā tava vipra śakuntakāḥc kṣipraṃ śirasy ajāyanta te ca saṃbhāvitās tvayāa jātapakṣā yadā te ca gatāś cārīm itas tataḥc manyamānas tato dharmaṃ caṭakaprabhavaṃ dvijae khe vācaṃ tvam athāśrauṣīr māṃ prati dvijasattamaa amarṣavaśam āpannas tataḥ prāpto bhavān ihac karavāṇi priyaṃ kiṃ te tad brūhi dvijasattama bhīṣma uvācaa ity uktaḥ sa tadā tena tulādhāreṇa dhīmatāc provāca vacanaṃ dhīmāñ jājalir japatāṃ varaḥa vikrīṇānaḥ sarvarasān sarvagandhāṃś ca vāṇijac vanaspatīn oṣadhīś ca teṣāṃ mūlaphalāni caa adhyagā naiṣṭhikīṃ buddhiṃ kutas tvām idam āgatamc etad ācakṣva me sarvaṃ nikhilena mahāmatea evam uktas tulādhāro brāhmaṇena yaśasvināc uvāca dharmasūkṣmāṇi vaiśyo dharmārthatattvavite jājaliṃ kaṣṭatapasaṃ jñānatṛptas tadā nṛpaa vedāhaṃ jājale dharmaṃ sarahasyaṃ sanātanamc sarvabhūtahitaṃ maitraṃ purāṇaṃ yaṃ janā viduḥa adroheṇaiva bhūtānām alpadroheṇa vā punaḥc yā vṛttiḥ sa paro dharmas tena jīvāmi jājalea paricchinnaiḥ kāṣṭhatṛṇair mayedaṃ śaraṇaṃ kṛtamc alaktaṃ padmakaṃ tuṅgaṃ gandhāṃś coccāvacāṃs tathāa rasāṃś ca tāṃs tān viprarṣe madyavarjān ahaṃ bahūnc krītvā vai prativikrīṇe parahastād amāyayāa sarveṣāṃ yaḥ suhṛn nityaṃ sarveṣāṃ ca hite rataḥc karmaṇā manasā vācā sa dharmaṃ veda jājalea nāhaṃ pareṣāṃ karmāṇi praśaṃsāmi śapāmi vāc ākāśasyeva viprarṣe paśyaṃl lokasya citratāma nānurudhye virudhye vā na dveṣmi na ca kāmayec samo smi sarvabhūteṣu paśya me jājale vratama iṣṭāniṣṭavimuktasya prītirāgabahiṣkṛtaḥc tulā me sarvabhūteṣu samā tiṣṭhati jājalea iti māṃ tvaṃ vijānīhi sarvalokasya jājalec samaṃ matimatāṃ śreṣṭha samaloṣṭāśmakāñcanama yathāndhabadhironmattā ucchvāsaparamāḥ sadāc devair apihitadvārāḥ sopamā paśyato mamaa yathā vṛddhāturakṛśā niḥspṛhā viṣayān pratic tathārthakāmabhogeṣu mamāpi vigatā spṛhāa yadā cāyaṃ na bibheti yadā cāsmān na bibhyatic yadā necchati na dveṣṭi tadā sidhyati vai dvijaḥa yadā na kurute bhāvaṃ sarvabhūteṣu pāpakamc karmaṇā manasā vācā brahma saṃpadyate tadāa na bhūto na bhaviṣyaś ca na ca dharmo sti kaś canac yo bhayaḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ sa prāpnoty abhayaṃ padama yasmād udvijate lokaḥ sarvo mṛtyumukhād ivac vākkrūrād daṇḍapāruṣyāt sa prāpnoti mahad bhayama yathāvad vartamānānāṃ vṛddhānāṃ putrapautriṇāmc anuvartāmahe vṛttam ahiṃsrāṇāṃ mahātmanāma pranaṣṭaḥ śāśvato dharmaḥ sadācāreṇa mohitaḥc tena vaidyas tapasvī vā balavān vā vimohyatea ācārāj jājale prājñaḥ kṣipraṃ dharmam avāpnuyātc evaṃ yaḥ sādhubhir dāntaś cared adrohacetasāa nadyāṃ yathā ceha kāṣṭham uhyamānaṃ yadṛcchayāc yadṛcchayaiva kāṣṭhena saṃdhiṃ gaccheta kena cita tatrāparāṇi dārūṇi saṃsṛjyante tatas tataḥc tṛṇakāṣṭhakarīṣāṇi kadā cinn asamīkṣayāe evam evāyam ācāraḥ prādurbhūto yatas tataḥa yasmān nodvijate bhūtaṃ jātu kiṃ cit kathaṃ canac abhayaṃ sarvabhūtebhyaḥ sa prāpnoti sadā munea yasmād udvijate vidvan sarvaloko vṛkād ivac krośatas tīram āsādya yathā sarve jalecarāḥa sahāyavān dravyavān yaḥ subhago nyo paras tathāc tatas tān eva kavayaḥ śāstreṣu pravadanty utae kīrtyartham alpahṛllekhāḥ paṭavaḥ kṛtsnanirṇayāḥa tapobhir yajñadānaiś ca vākyaiḥ prajñāśritais tathāc prāpnoty abhayadānasya yad yat phalam ihāśnutea loke yaḥ sarvabhūtebhyo dadāty abhayadakṣiṇāmc sa sarvayajñair ījānaḥ prāpnoty abhayadakṣiṇāme na bhūtānām ahiṃsāyā jyāyān dharmo sti kaś canaa yasmān nodvijate bhūtaṃ jātu kiṃ cit kathaṃ canac so bhayaṃ sarvabhūtebhyaḥ saṃprāpnoti mahāmunea yasmād udvijate lokaḥ sarpād veśmagatād ivac na sa dharmam avāpnoti iha loke paratra caa sarvabhūtātmabhūtasya samyag bhūtāni paśyataḥc devāpi mārge muhyanti apadasya padaiṣiṇaḥa dānaṃ bhūtābhayasyāhuḥ sarvadānebhya uttamamc bravīmi te satyam idaṃ śraddadhasva ca jājalea sa eva subhago bhūtvā punar bhavati durbhagaḥc vyāpattiṃ karmaṇāṃ dṛṣṭvā jugupsanti janāḥ sadāa akāraṇo hi nehāsti dharmaḥ sūkṣmo pi jājalec bhūtabhavyārtham eveha dharmapravacanaṃ kṛtama sūkṣmatvān na sa vijñātuṃ śakyate bahunihnavaḥc upalabhyāntarā cānyān ācārān avabudhyatea ye ca chindanti vṛṣaṇān ye ca bhindanti nastakānc vahanti mahato bhārān badhnanti damayanti caa hatvā sattvāni khādanti tān kathaṃ na vigarhasec mānuṣā mānuṣān eva dāsabhogena buñjatea vadhabandhavirodhena kārayanti divāniśamc ātmanā cāpi jānāsi yad duḥkhaṃ vadhatāḍanea pañcendriyeṣu bhūteṣu sarvaṃ vasati daivatamc ādityaś candramā vāyur brahmā prāṇaḥ kratur yamaḥa tāni jīvāni vikrīya kā mṛteṣu vicāraṇāb ajo gnir varuṇo meṣaḥ sūryo śvaḥ pṛthivī virāṭb dhenur vatsaś ca somo vai vikrīyaitan na sidhyatic kā taile kā ghṛte brahman madhuny apsv auṣadheṣu vāa adaṃśamaśake deśe sukhaṃ saṃvardhitān paśūnc tāṃś ca mātuḥ priyāñ jānann ākramya bahudhā narāḥe bahudaṃśakuśān deśān nayanti bahukardamāna vāhasaṃpīḍitā dhuryāḥ sīdanty avidhināparec na manye bhrūṇahatyāpi viśiṣṭā tena karmaṇāa kṛṣiṃ sādhv iti manyante sā ca vṛttiḥ sudāruṇāc bhūmiṃ bhūmiśayāṃś caiva hanti kāṣṭham ayomukhame tathaivānaḍuho yuktān samavekṣasva jājalea aghnyā iti gavāṃ nāma ka enān hantum arhatic mahac cakārākuśalaṃ pṛṣadhro gālabhann ivaa ṛṣayo yatayo hy etan nahuṣe pratyavedayanc gāṃ mātaraṃ cāpy avadhīr vṛṣabhaṃ ca prajāpatime akāryaṃ nahuṣākārṣīr lapsyāmas tvatkṛte bhayama śataṃ caikaṃ ca rogāṇāṃ sarvabhūteṣv apātayanc ṛṣayas te mahābhāgāḥ prajāsv eva hi jājalee bhrūṇahaṃ nahuṣaṃ tv āhur na te hoṣyāmahe haviḥa ity uktvā te mahātmānaḥ sarve tattvārthadarśinaḥc ṛṣayo yatayaḥ śāntās tarasā pratyavedayana īdṛśān aśivān ghorān ācārān iha jājalec kevalācaritatvāt tu nipuṇān nāvabudhyasea kāraṇād dharmam anvicchen na lokacaritaṃ caretc yo hanyād yaś ca māṃ stauti tatrāpi śṛṇu jājalea samau tāv api me syātāṃ na hi me staḥ priyāpriyec etad īdṛśakaṃ dharmaṃ praśaṃsanti manīṣiṇaḥa upapattyā hi saṃpanno yatibhiś caiva sevyatec satataṃ dharmaśīlaiś ca naipuṇyenopalakṣitaḥ jājalir uvācaa yathā pravartito dharmas tulāṃ dhārayatā tvayāc svargadvāraṃ ca vṛttiṃ ca bhūtānām avarotsyatea kṛṣyā hy annaṃ prabhavati tatas tvam api jīvasic paśubhiś cauṣadhībhiś ca martyā jīvanti vāṇijaa yato yajñaḥ prabhavati nāstikyam api jalpasic na hi varted ayaṃ loko vārtām utsṛjya kevalam tulādhāra uvācaa vakṣyāmi jājale vṛttiṃ nāsmi brāhmaṇa nāstikaḥc na ca yajñaṃ vinindāmi yajñavit tu sudurlabhaḥa namo brāhmaṇayajñāya ye ca yajñavido janāḥc svayajñaṃ brāhmaṇā hitvā kṣātraṃ yajñam ihāsthitāḥa lubdhair vittaparair brahman nāstikaiḥ saṃpravartitamc vedavādān avijñāya satyābhāsam ivānṛtama idaṃ deyam idaṃ deyam iti nāntaṃ cikīrṣatib devaiḥ pravartitaṃ hy etaṃ viddhi dharmaṃ ca jājaleb aparā hy anavasthaiṣā nāsmākaṃ buddhir īdṛśīc ataḥ stainyaṃ prabhavati vikarmāṇi ca jājalee tad eva sukṛtaṃ havyaṃ yena tuṣyanti devatāḥa namaskāreṇa haviṣā svādhyāyair auṣadhais tathāc pūjā syād devatānāṃ hi yathā śāstranidarśanama iṣṭāpūrtād asādhūnāṃ viṣamā jāyate prajāc lubdhebhyo jāyate lubdhaḥ samebhyo jāyate samaḥa yajamāno yathātmānam ṛtvijaś ca tathā prajāḥc yajñāt prajā prabhavati nabhaso mbha ivāmalama agnau prāstāhutir brahmann ādityam upatiṣṭhatic ādityāj jāyate vṛṣṭir vṛṣṭer annaṃ tataḥ prajāḥa tasmāt svanuṣṭhitāt pūrve sarvān kāmāṃś ca lebhirec akṛṣṭapacyā pṛthivī āśīrbhir vīrudho bhavane na te yajñeṣv ātmasu vā phalaṃ paśyanti kiṃ canaa śaṅkamānāḥ phalaṃ yajñe ye yajeran kathaṃ canac jāyante sādhavo dhūrtā lubdhā vittaprayojanāḥa sa sma pāpakṛtāṃ lokān gacched aśubhakarmaṇāc pramāṇam apramāṇena yaḥ kuryād aśubhaṃ naraḥe pāpātmā so kṛtaprajñaḥ sadaiveha dvijottamaa kartavyam iti kartavyaṃ vetti yo brāhmaṇobhayamc brahmaiva vartate loke naiti kartavyatāṃ punaḥa viguṇaṃ ca punaḥ karma jyāya ity anuśuśrumac sarvabhūtopaghātaś ca phalabhāve ca saṃyamaḥa satyayajñā damayajñā alubdhāś cātmatṛptayaḥc utpannatyāginaḥ sarve janā āsannamatsarāḥa kṣetrakṣetrajñatattvajñāḥ svayajñapariniṣṭhitāḥc brāhmaṃ vedam adhīyantas toṣayanty amarān apia akhilaṃ daivataṃ sarvaṃ brahma brāhmaṇasaṃśritamc tṛpyanti tṛpyato devās tṛptās tṛptasya jājalea yathā sarvarasais tṛpto nābhinandati kiṃ canac tathā prajñānatṛptasya nityaṃ tṛptiḥ sukhodayāa dharmārāmā dharmasukhāḥ kṛtsnavyavasitās tathāc asti nas tattvato bhūya iti prajñāgaveṣiṇaḥa jñānavijñāninaḥ ke cit paraṃ pāraṃ titīrṣavaḥc atīva tat sadā puṇyaṃ puṇyābhijanasaṃhitama yatra gatvā na śocanti na cyavanti vyathanti cac te tu tad brahmaṇaḥ sthānaṃ prāpnuvantīha sāttvikāḥa naiva te svargam icchanti na yajanti yaśodhanaiḥc satāṃ vartmānuvartante yathābalam ahiṃsayāa vanaspatīn oṣadhīś ca phalamūlaṃ ca te viduḥc na caitān ṛtvijo lubdhā yājayanti dhanārthinaḥa svam eva cārthaṃ kurvāṇā yajñaṃ cakruḥ punar dvijāḥc pariniṣṭhitakarmāṇaḥ prajānugrahakāmyayād tasmāt tān ṛtvijo lubdhā yājayanty aśubhān narāna prāpayeyuḥ prajāḥ svargaṃ svadharmacaraṇena vaic iti me vartate buddhiḥ samā sarvatra jājalea prayuñjate yāni yajñe sadā prājñā dvijarṣabhac tena te devayānena pathā yānti mahāmunea āvṛttis tatra caikasya nāsty āvṛttir manīṣiṇāmc ubhau tau devayānena gacchato jājale pathāa svayaṃ caiṣām anaḍuho yujyanti ca vahanti cac svayam usrāś ca duhyante manaḥsaṃkalpasiddhibhiḥa svayaṃ yūpān upādāya yajante svāptadakṣiṇaiḥc yas tathābhāvitātmā syāt sa gām ālabdhum arhatia oṣadhībhis tathā brahman yajeraṃs te natādṛśāḥc buddhityāgaṃ puraskṛtya tādṛśaṃ prabravīmi tea nirāśiṣam anārambhaṃ nirnamaskāram astutimc akṣīṇaṃ kṣīṇakarmāṇaṃ taṃ devā brāhmaṇaṃ viduḥa nāśrāvayan na ca yajan na dadad brāhmaṇeṣu cac grāmyāṃ vṛttiṃ lipsamānaḥ kāṃ gatiṃ yāti jājalee idaṃ tu daivataṃ kṛtvā yathā yajñam avāpnuyāt jājalir uvācaa na vai munīnāṃ śṛṇumaḥ sma tattvaṃpṛcchāmi tvā vāṇija kaṣṭam etatc pūrve pūrve cāsya nāvekṣamāṇānātaḥ paraṃ tam ṛṣayaḥ sthāpayantia asminn evātmatīrthe na paśavaḥ prāpnuyuḥ sukhamc atha svakarmaṇā kena vāṇija prāpnuyāt sukhame śaṃsa me tan mahāprājña bhṛśaṃ vai śraddadhāmi te tulādhāra uvācaa uta yajñā utāyajñā makhaṃ nārhanti te kva citc ājyena payasā dadhnā pūrṇāhutyā viśeṣataḥe vālaiḥ śṛṅgeṇa pādena saṃbhavaty eva gaurmakhama patnīṃ cānena vidhinā prakaroti niyojayanc puroḍāśo hi sarveṣāṃ paśūnāṃ medhya ucyatea sarvā nadyaḥ sarasvatyaḥ sarve puṇyāḥ śiloccayāḥc jājale tīrtham ātmaiva mā sma deśātithir bhavaa etān īdṛśakān dharmān ācarann iha jājalec kāraṇair dharmam anvicchan na lokān āpnute śubhān bhīṣma uvācaa etān īdṛśakān dharmāṃs tulādhāraḥ praśaṃsatic upapattyā hi saṃpannān nityaṃ sadbhir niṣevitān tulādhāra uvācaa sadbhir vā yadi vāsadbhir ayaṃ panthāḥ samāśritaḥc pratyakṣaṃ kriyatāṃ sādhu tato jñāsyasi tad yathāa ete śakuntā bahavaḥ samantād vicaranti hic tavottamāṅge saṃbhūtāḥ śyenāś cānyāś ca jātayaḥa āhvayainān mahābrahman viśamānāṃs tatas tataḥc paśyemān hastapādeṣu śliṣṭān dehe ca sarvaśaḥa saṃbhāvayanti pitaraṃ tvayā saṃbhāvitāḥ khagāḥc asaṃśayaṃ pitā ca tvaṃ putrān āhvaya jājale bhīṣma uvācaa tato jājalinā tena samāhūtāḥ patatriṇaḥc vācam uccārayan divyāṃ dharmasya vacanāt kilaa ahiṃsādikṛtaṃ karma iha caiva paratra cac spardhā nihanti vai brahman sāhatā hanti taṃ narama śraddhāvṛddhaṃ vāṅmanasī na yajñas trātum arhatic atra gāthā brahmagītāḥ kīrtayanti purāvidaḥa śucer aśraddadhānasya śraddadhānasya cāśuceḥc devāś cittam amanyanta sadṛśaṃ yajñakarmaṇia śrotriyasya kadaryasya vadānyasya ca vārdhuṣeḥc mīmāṃsitvobhayaṃ devāḥ samam annam akalpayana prajāpatis tān uvāca viṣamaṃ kṛtam ity utac śraddhāpūtaṃ vadānyasya hatam aśraddhayetarate bhojyam annaṃ vadānyasya kadaryasya na vārdhuṣeḥa aśraddadhāna evaiko devānāṃ nārhate haviḥc tasyaivānnaṃ na bhoktavyam iti dharmavido viduḥa aśraddhā paramaṃ pāpaṃ śraddhā pāpapramocanīc jahāti pāpaṃ śraddhāvān sarpo jīrṇām iva tvacama jyāyasī yā pavitrāṇāṃ nivṛttiḥ śraddhayā sahac nivṛttaśīladoṣo yaḥ śraddhāvān pūta eva saḥa kiṃ tasya tapasā kāryaṃ kiṃ vṛttena kim ātmanāc śraddhāmayo yaṃ puruṣo yo yacchraddhaḥ sa eva saḥa iti dharmaḥ samākhyātaḥ sadbhir dharmārthadarśibhiḥc vayaṃ jijñāsamānās tvā saṃprāptā dharmadarśanāta spardhāṃ jahi mahāprājña tataḥ prāpsyasi yat paramc śraddhāvāñ śraddadhānaś ca dharmāṃś caiveha vāṇijaḥe svavartmani sthitaś caiva garīyān eṣa jājalea evaṃ bahumatārthaṃ ca tulādhāreṇa bhāṣitamc samyak caivam vyatikramaḥa evaṃ na strī na caivāhaṃ nādhvagas tridaśeśvaraḥc aparādhyati dharmasya pramādas tv aparādhyatia īrṣyājaṃ vyasanaṃ prāhus tena caivordhvaretasaḥc īrṣyayā tv aham ākṣipto magno duṣkṛtasāgarea hatvā sādhvīṃ ca nārīṃ ca vyasanitvāc ca śāsitāmc bhartavyatvena bhāryāṃ ca ko nu māṃ tārayiṣyatia antareṇa mayājñaptaś cirakārī hy udāradhīḥc yady adya cirakārī syāt sa māṃ trāyeta pātakāta cirakārika bhadraṃ te bhadraṃ te cirakārikac yady adya cirakārī tvaṃ tato si cirakārikaḥa trāhi māṃ mātaraṃ caiva tapo yac cārjitaṃ mayāc ātmānaṃ pātakebhyaś ca bhavādya cirakārikaḥa sahajaṃ cirakāritvaṃ ciraprājñatayā tavab āvayoś cittasaṃtāpaḥ na hy asatphalatas tathāc saphalaṃ tat tavādyāstu bhavādya cirakārikaḥa ciram āśaṃsito mātrā ciraṃ garbheṇa dhāritaḥc saphalaṃ cirakāritvaṃ kuru tvaṃ cirakārikaa cirāyate ca saṃtāpāc ciraṃ svapiti vāritaḥc āvayoś cirasaṃtāpād avekṣya cirakārikaa evaṃ sa duḥkhito rājan maharṣir gautamas tadāc cirakāriṃ dadarśātha putraṃ sthitam athāntikea cirakārī tu pitaraṃ dṛṣṭvā paramaduḥkhitaḥc śastraṃ tyaktvā tato mūrdhnā prasādāyopacakramea gautamas tu sutaṃ dṛṣṭvā śirasā patitaṃ bhuvic patnīṃ caiva nirākārāṃ parām abhyagaman mudama na hi sā tena saṃbhedaṃ patnī nītā mahātmanāc vijane cāśramasthena putraś cāpi samāhitaḥa hanyāt tv anapavādena śastrapāṇau sute sthitec vinītaṃ praśnayitvā ca vyavasyed ātmakarmasua buddhiś cāsīt sutaṃ dṛṣṭvā pituś caraṇayor natamc śastragrahaṇacāpalyaṃ saṃvṛṇoti bhayād itia tataḥ pitrā ciraṃ stutvā ciraṃ cāghrāya mūrdhanic ciraṃ dorbhyāṃ pariṣvajya ciraṃ jīvety udāhṛtaḥa evaṃ sa gautamaḥ putraṃ prītiharṣasamanvitaḥc abhinandya mahāprājña idaṃ vacanam abravīta cirakārika bhadraṃ te cirakārī ciraṃ bhavac cirāyamāṇe tvayi ca ciram asmi suduḥkhitaḥa gāthāś cāpy abravīd vidvān gautamo munisattamaḥc cirakāriṣu dhīreṣu guṇoddeśasamāśrayāta cireṇa mitraṃ badhnīyāc cireṇa ca kṛtaṃ tyajetc cireṇa hi kṛtaṃ mitraṃ ciraṃ dhāraṇam arhatia rāge darpe ca māne ca drohe pāpe ca karmaṇic apriye caiva kartavye cirakārī praśasyatea bandhūnāṃ suhṛdāṃ caiva bhṛtyānāṃ strījanasya cac avyakteṣv aparādheṣu cirakārī praśasyatea evaṃ sa gautamas tasya prītaḥ putrasya bhāratac karmaṇā tena kauravya cirakāritayā tayāa evaṃ sarveṣu kāryeṣu vimṛśya puruṣas tataḥc cireṇa niścayaṃ kṛtvā ciraṃ na paritapyatea ciraṃ dhārayate roṣaṃ ciraṃ karma niyacchatic paścāttāpakaraṃ karma na kiṃ cid upapadyatea ciraṃ vṛddhān upāsīta ciram anvāsya pūjayetc ciraṃ dharmān niṣeveta kuryāc cānveṣaṇaṃ cirama ciram anvāsya viduṣaś ciraṃ śiṣṭān niṣevya cac ciraṃ vinīya cātmānaṃ ciraṃ yāty anavajñatāma bruvataś ca parasyāpi vākyaṃ dharmopasaṃhitamc ciraṃ pṛcchec ciraṃ brūyāc ciraṃ na paribhūyatea upāsya bahulās tasminn āśrame sumahātapāḥc samāḥ svargaṃ gato vipraḥ putreṇa sahitas tadā yudhiṣṭhira uvācaa kathaṃ rājā prajā rakṣen na ca kiṃ cit pratāpayetc pṛcchāmi tvāṃ satāṃ śreṣṭha tan me brūhi pitāmaha bhīṣma uvācaa atrāpy udāharantīmam itihāsaṃ purātanamc dyumatsenasya saṃvādaṃ rājñā satyavatā sahaa avyāhṛtaṃ vyājahāra satyavān iti naḥ śrutamc vadhāya nīyamāneṣu pitur evānuśāsanāta adharmatāṃ yāti dharmo yāty adharmaś ca dharmatāmc vadho nāma bhaved dharmo naitad bhavitum arhati dyumatsena uvācaa atha ced avadho dharmo dharmaḥ ko jātu cid bhavetc dasyavaś cen na hanyeran satyavan saṃkaro bhaveta mamedam iti nāsyaitat pravarteta kalau yugec lokayātrā na caiva syād atha ced vettha śaṃsa naḥ satyavān uvācaa sarva eva trayo varṇāḥ kāryā brāhmaṇabandhanāḥc dharmapāśanibaddhānām alpo vyapacariṣyatia yo yas teṣām apacaret tam ācakṣīta vai dvijaḥc ayaṃ me na śṛṇotīti tasmin rājā pradhārayeta tattvābhedena yac chāstraṃ tat kāryaṃ nānyathā vadhaḥc asamīkṣyaiva karmāṇi nītiśāstraṃ yathāvidhia dasyūn hinasti vai rājā bhūyaso vāpy anāgasaḥc bhāryā mātā pitā putro hanyate puruṣe hatee pareṇāpakṛte rājā tasmāt samyak pradhārayeta asādhuś caiva puruṣo labhate śīlam ekadāc sādhoś cāpi hy asādhubhyo jāyate śobhanā prajāa na mūlaghātaḥ kartavyo naiṣa dharmaḥ sanātanaḥc api khalv avadhenaiva prāyaścittaṃ vidhīyatea udvejanena bandhena virūpakaraṇena cac vadhadaṇḍena te kleśyā na puro hitasaṃpadāa yadā purohitaṃ vā te paryeyuḥ śaraṇaiṣiṇaḥc kariṣyāmaḥ punar brahman na pāpam iti vādinaḥa tadā visargam arhāḥ syur itīdaṃ nṛpaśāsanamc bibhrad daṇḍājinaṃ muṇḍo brāhmaṇo rhati vāsasama garīyāṃso garīyāṃsam aparādhe punaḥ punaḥc tathā visargam arhanti na yathā prathame tathā dyumatsena uvācaa yatra yatraiva śakyeran saṃyantuṃ samaye prajāḥc sa tāvat procyate dharmo yāvan na pratilaṅghyatea ahanyamāneṣu punaḥ sarvam eva parābhavetc pūrve pūrvatare caiva suśāsyā abhavañ janāḥa mṛdavaḥ satyabhūyiṣṭhā alpadrohālpamanyavaḥc purā dhigdaṇḍa evāsīd vāgdaṇḍas tadanantarama āsīd ādānadaṇḍo pi vadhadaṇḍo dya vartatec vadhenāpi na śakyante niyantum apare janāḥa naiva dasyur manuṣyāṇāṃ na devānām iti śrutiḥc na gandharvapitṝṇāṃ ca kaḥ kasyeha na kaś canaa padmaṃ śmaśānād ādatte piśācāc cāpi daivatamc teṣu yaḥ samayaṃ kuryād ajñeṣu hatabuddhiṣu satyavān uvācaa tān na śaknoṣi cet sādhūn paritrātum ahiṃsayāc kasya cid bhūtabhavyasya lābhenāntaṃ tathā kuru dyumatsena uvācaa rājāno lokayātrārthaṃ tapyante paramaṃ tapaḥc apatrapanti tādṛgbhyas tathāvṛttā bhavanti caa vitrāsyamānāḥ sukṛto na kāmād ghnanti duṣkṛtīnc sukṛtenaiva rājāno bhūyiṣṭhaṃ śāsate prajāḥa śreyasaḥ śreyasīm evaṃ vṛttiṃ loko nuvartatec sadaiva hi guror vṛttam anuvartanti mānavāḥa ātmānam asamādhāya samādhitsati yaḥ parānc viṣayeṣv indriyavaśaṃ mānavāḥ prahasanti tama yo rājño dambhamohena kiṃ cit kuryād asāṃpratamc sarvopāyair niyamyaḥ sa tathā pāpān nivartatea ātmaivādau niyantavyo duṣkṛtaṃ saṃniyacchatāc daṇḍayec ca mahādaṇḍair api bandhūn anantarāna yatra vai pāpakṛt kleśyo na mahad duḥkham archatic vardhante tatra pāpāni dharmo hrasati ca dhruvame iti kāruṇyaśīlas tu vidvān vai brāhmaṇo nvaśāta iti caivānuśiṣṭo smi pūrvais tāta pitāmahaiḥc āśvāsayadbhiḥ subhṛśam anukrośāt tathaiva caa etat prathamakalpena rājā kṛtayuge bhajatc pādonenāpi dharmeṇa gacchet tretāyuge tathāe dvāpare tu dvipādena pādena tv apare yugea tathā kaliyuge prāpte rājñāṃ duścaritena hac bhavet kālaviśeṣeṇa kalā dharmasya ṣoḍaśīa atha prathamakalpena satyavan saṃkaro bhavetc āyuḥ śaktiṃ ca kālaṃ ca nirdiśya tapa ādiśeta satyāya hi yathā neha jahyād dharmaphalaṃ mahatc bhūtānām anukampārthaṃ manuḥ svāyaṃbhuvo bravīt yudhiṣṭhira uvācaa avirodhena bhūtānāṃ tyāgaḥ ṣāḍguṇyakārakaḥc yaḥ syād ubhayabhāg dharmas tan me brūhi pitāmahaa gārhasthyasya ca dharmasya tyāgadharmasya cobhayoḥc adūrasaṃprasthitayoḥ kiṃ svic chreyaḥ pitāmaha bhīṣma uvācaa ubhau dharmau mahābhāgāv ubhau paramaduścarauc ubhau mahāphalau tāta sadbhir ācaritāv ubhaua atra te vartayiṣyāmi prāmāṇyam ubhayos tayoḥc śṛṇuṣvaikamanāḥ pārtha chinnadharmārthasaṃśayama atrāpy udāharantīmam itihāsaṃ purātanamc kapilasya goś ca saṃvādaṃ tan nibodha yudhiṣṭhiraa āmnāyam anupaśyan hi purāṇaṃ śāśvataṃ dhruvamc nahuṣaḥ pūrvam ālebhe tvaṣṭur gām iti naḥ śrutama tāṃ niyuktām adīnātmā sattvasthaḥ samaye rataḥc jñānavān niyatāhāro dadarśa kapilas tadāa sa buddhim uttamāṃ prāpto naiṣṭhikīm akutobhayāmc smarāmi śithilaṃ satyaṃ vedā ity abravīt sakṛta tāṃ gām ṛṣiḥ syūmaraśmiḥ praviśya yatim abravītc haṃho vedā yadi matā dharmāḥ kenāpare matāḥa tapasvino dhṛtimataḥ śrutivijñānacakṣuṣaḥc sarvam ārṣaṃ hi manyante vyāhṛtaṃ viditātmanaḥa tasyaivaṃ gatatṛṣṇasya vijvarasya nirāśiṣaḥc kā vivakṣāsti vedeṣu nirārambhasya sarvaśaḥ kapila uvācaa nāhaṃ vedān vinindāmi na vivakṣāmi karhi citc pṛthag āśramiṇāṃ karmāṇy ekārthānīti naḥ śrutama gacchaty eva parityāgī vānaprasthaś ca gacchatic gṛhastho brahmacārī ca ubhau tāv api gacchataḥa devayānā hi panthānaś catvāraḥ śāśvatā matāḥc teṣāṃ jyāyaḥkanīyastvaṃ phaleṣūktaṃ balābalama evaṃ viditvā sarvārthān ārabhed iti vaidikamc nārabhed iti cānyatra naiṣṭhikī śrūyate śrutiḥa anārambhe hy adoṣaḥ syād ārambhe doṣa uttamaḥc evaṃ sthitasya śāstrasya durvijñeyaṃ balābalama yady atra kiṃ cit pratyakṣam ahiṃsāyāḥ paraṃ matamc ṛte tv āgamaśāstrebhyo brūhi tad yadi paśyasi syūmaraśmir uvācaa svargakāmo yajeteti satataṃ śrūyate śrutiḥc phalaṃ prakalpya pūrvaṃ hi tato yajñaḥ pratāyatea ajaś cāśvaś ca meṣaś ca gauś ca pakṣigaṇāś ca yec grāmyāraṇyā oṣadhayaḥ prāṇasyānnam iti śrutiḥa tathaivānnaṃ hy aharahaḥ sāyaṃ prātar nirupyatec paśavaś cātha dhānyaṃ ca yajñasyāṅgam iti śrutiḥa etāni saha yajñena prajāpatir akalpayatc tena prajāpatir devān yajñenāyajata prabhuḥa te smānyonyaṃcarāḥ sarve prāṇinaḥ sapta sapta cab gaurajo manujo meṣaḥ aśvāśvataragardabhāḥb ete grāmyāḥ samākhyātāḥ paśavaḥ sapta sādhubhiḥb siṃhā vyāghrā varāhāś ca mahiṣā vāraṇās tathāb mahiṣī vānarāś caiva saptāraṇyās tathā smṛtāḥc yajñeṣūpākṛtaṃ viśvaṃ prāhur uttamasaṃjñitama etac caivābhyanujñātaṃ pūrvaiḥ pūrvatarais tathāc ko jātu na vicinvīta vidvān svāṃ śaktim ātmanaḥa paśavaś ca manuṣyāś ca drumāś cauṣadhibhiḥ sahac svargam evābhikāṅkṣante na ca svargas tv ṛte makhama oṣadhyaḥ paśavo vṛkṣā vīrud ājyaṃ payo dadhic havir bhūmir diśaḥ śraddhā kālaś caitāni dvādaśaa ṛco yajūṃṣi sāmāni yajamānaś ca ṣoḍaśaḥc agnir jñeyo gṛhapatiḥ sa saptadaśa ucyatee aṅgāny etāni yajñasya yajño mūlam iti śrutiḥa ājyena payasā dadhnā śakṛtāmikṣayā tvacāc vālaiḥ śṛṅgeṇa pādena saṃbhavaty eva gaur makhame evaṃ pratyekaśaḥ sarvaṃ yad yad asya vidhīyatea yajñaṃ vahanti saṃbhūya sahartvigbhiḥ sadakṣiṇaiḥc saṃhatyaitāni sarvāṇi yajñaṃ nirvartayanty utaa yajñārthāni hi sṛṣṭāni yathā vai śrūyate śrutiḥc evaṃ pūrve pūrvatarāḥ pravṛttāś caiva mānavāḥa na hinasti hy ārabhate nābhidruhyati kiṃ canac yajño yaṣṭavya ity eva yo yajaty aphalepsayāa yajñāṅgāny api caitāni yathoktāni nasaṃśayaḥc vidhinā vidhiyuktāni tārayanti parasparama āmnāyam ārṣaṃ paśyāmi yasmin vedāḥ pratiṣṭhitāḥc taṃ vidvāṃso nupaśyanti brāhmaṇasyānudarśanāta brāhmaṇaprabhavo yajño brāhmaṇārpaṇa eva cac anu yajñaṃ jagat sarvaṃ yajñaś cānu jagat sadāa om iti brahmaṇo yonir namaḥ svāhā svadhā vaṣaṭc yasyaitāni prayujyante yathāśakti kṛtāny apia na tasya triṣu lokeṣu paralokabhayaṃ viduḥc iti vedā vadantīha siddhāś ca paramarṣayaḥa ṛco yajūṃṣi sāmāni stobhāś ca vidhicoditāḥc yasminn etāni sarvāṇi bahir eva sa vai dvijaḥa agnyādheye yad bhavati yac ca some sute dvijac yac cetarair mahāyajñair veda tad bhagavān svataḥa tasmād brahman yajetaiva yājayec cāvicārayanc yajataḥ svargavidhinā pretya svargaphalaṃ mahata nāyaṃ loko sty ayajñānāṃ paraś ceti viniścayaḥc vedavādavidaś caiva pramāṇam ubhayaṃ tadā kapila uvācaa etāvad anupaśyanto yatayo yānti mārgagāḥc naiṣāṃ sarveṣu lokeṣu kaś cid asti vyatikramaḥa nirdvaṃdvā nirnamaskārā nirāśīrbandhanā budhāḥc vimuktāḥ sarvapāpebhyaś caranti śucayo malāḥa apavarge tha saṃtyāge buddhau ca kṛtaniścayāḥc brahmiṣṭhā brahmabhūtāś ca brahmaṇy eva kṛtālayāḥa viśokā naṣṭarajasas teṣāṃ lokāḥ sanātanāḥc teṣāṃ gatiṃ parāṃ prāpya gārhasthye kiṃ prayojanam syūmaraśmir uvācaa yady eṣā paramā niṣṭhā yady eṣā paramā gatiḥc gṛhasthān avyapāśritya nāśramo nyaḥ pravartatea yathā mātaram āśritya sarve jīvanti jantavaḥc evaṃ gṛhastham āśritya vartanta itare śramāḥa gṛhastha eva yajate gṛhasthas tapyate tapaḥc gārhasthyam asya dharmasya mūlaṃ yat kiṃ cid ejatea prajanād dhy abhinirvṛttāḥ sarve prāṇabhṛto munec prajanaṃ cāpy utānyatra na kathaṃ cana vidyatea yās tāḥ syur bahir oṣadhyo bahv araṇyās tathā dvijac oṣadhibhyo bahir yasmāt prāṇī kaś cin na vidyatee kasyaiṣā vāg bhavet satyā mokṣo nāsti gṛhād itia aśraddadhānair aprājñaiḥ sūkṣmadarśanavarjitaiḥc nirāśair alasaiḥ śrāntais tapyamānaiḥ svakarmabhiḥe śramasyoparamo dṛṣṭaḥ pravrajyā nāma paṇḍitaiḥa trailokyasyaiva hetur hi maryādā śāśvatī dhruvāc brāhmaṇo nāma bhagavāñ janmaprabhṛti pūjyatea prāg garbhādhānān mantrā hi pravartante dvijātiṣuc aviśrambheṣu vartante viśrambheṣv apy asaṃśayama dāhaḥ punaḥ saṃśrayaṇe saṃsthite pātrabhojanamc dānaṃ gavāṃ paśūnāṃ vā piṇḍānāṃ cāpsu majjanama arciṣmanto barhiṣadaḥ kravyādāḥ pitaraḥ smṛtāḥc mṛtasyāpy anumanyante mantrā mantrāś ca kāraṇama evaṃ krośatsu vedeṣu kuto mokṣo sti kasya citc ṛṇavanto yadā martyāḥ pitṛdevadvijātiṣua śriyā vihīnair alasaiḥ paṇḍitair apalāpitamc vedavādāparijñānaṃ satyābhāsam ivānṛtama na vai pāpair hriyate kṛṣyate vāyo brāhmaṇo yajate vedaśāstraiḥc ūrdhvaṃ yajñaḥ paśubhiḥ sārdham etisaṃtarpitas tarpayate ca kāmaiḥa na vedānāṃ paribhavān na śāṭhyena na māyayāc mahat prāpnoti puruṣo brahma brahmaṇi vindati kapila uvācaa darśaṃ ca paurṇamāsaṃ ca agnihotraṃ ca dhīmatāmc cāturmāsyāni caivāsaṃs teṣu yajñaḥ sanātanaḥa anārambhāḥ sudhṛtayaḥ śucayo brahmasaṃśritāḥc brahmaṇaiva sma te devāṃs tarpayanty amṛtaiṣiṇaḥa sarvabhūtātmabhūtasya sarvabhūtāni paśyataḥc devāpi mārge muhyanti apadasya padaiṣiṇaḥa caturdvāraṃ puruṣaṃ caturmukhaṃcaturdhā cainam upayāti nindāc bāhubhyāṃ vāca udarād upasthātteṣāṃ dvāraṃ dvārapālo bubhūṣeta nākṣair dīvyen nādadītānyavittaṃna vāyonīyasya śṛtaṃ pragṛhṇetc kruddho na caiva prahareta dhīmāṃstathāsya tat pāṇipādaṃ suguptama nākrośam archen na mṛṣā vadec cana paiśunaṃ janavādaṃ ca kuryātc satyavrato mitabhāṣo pramattastathāsya vāgdvāram atho suguptama nānāśanaḥ syān na mahāśanaḥ syādalolupaḥ sādhubhir āgataḥ syātc yātrārtham āhāram ihādadītatathāsya syāj jāṭharī dvāraguptiḥa na vīrapatnīṃ vihareta nārīṃna cāpi nārīm anṛtāv āhvayītac bhāryāvrataṃ hy ātmani dhārayītatathāsyopasthadvāraguptir bhavetaa dvārāṇi yasya sarvāṇi suguptāni manīṣiṇaḥc upastham udaraṃ bāhū vāk caturthī sa vai dvijaḥa moghāny aguptadvārasya sarvāṇy eva bhavanty utac kiṃ tasya tapasā kāryaṃ kiṃ yajñena kim ātmanāa anuttarīyavasanam anupastīrṇaśāyinamc bāhūpadhānaṃ śāmyantaṃ taṃ devā brāhmaṇaṃ viduḥa dvaṃdvārāmeṣu sarveṣu ya eko ramate muniḥc pareṣām ananudhyāyaṃs taṃ devā brāhmaṇaṃ viduḥa yena sarvam idaṃ buddhaṃ prakṛtir vikṛtiś ca yāc gatijñaḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ taṃ devā brāhmaṇaṃ viduḥa abhayaṃ sarvabhūtebhyaḥ sarveṣām abhayaṃ yataḥc sarvabhūtātmabhūto yas taṃ devā brāhmaṇaṃ viduḥa nāntareṇānujānanti vedānāṃ yat kriyāphalamc anujñāya ca tat sarvam anyad rocayate phalama phalavanti ca karmāṇi vyuṣṭimanti dhruvāṇi cac viguṇāni ca paśyanti tathānaikāntikāni caa guṇāś cātra sudurjñeyā jñātāś cāpi suduṣkarāḥc anuṣṭhitāś cāntavanta iti tvam anupaśyasi syūmaraśmir uvācaa yathā ca vedaprāmāṇyaṃ tyāgaś ca saphalo yathāc tau panthānāv ubhau vyaktau bhagavaṃs tad bravīhi me kapila uvācaa pratyakṣam iha paśyanti bhavantaḥ satpathe sthitāḥc pratyakṣaṃ tu kim atrāsti yad bhavanta upāsate syūmaraśmir uvācaa syūmaraśmir ahaṃ brahmañ bhavanto yad upāsatee anyatra tarkaśāstrebhya āgamāc ca yathāgamama āgamo vedavādas tu tarkaśāstrāṇi cāgamaḥc yathāgamam upāsīta āgamas tatra sidhyatie siddhiḥ pratyakṣarūpā ca dṛśyaty āgamaniścayāta nāvṛtto nāpavṛtto sti kaś canaa bhavanto pi ca hṛṣyanti śocanti ca yathā vayamc indriyārthāś ca bhavatāṃ samānāḥ sarvajantuṣua evaṃ caturṇāṃ varṇānām āśramāṇāṃ pravṛttiṣuc ekam ālambamānānāṃ nirṇaye kiṃ nirāmayam kapila uvācaa yad yad ācarate śāstram atha sarvapravṛttiṣuc yasya yatra hy anuṣṭhānaṃ tatra tatra nirāmayama sarvaṃ pāvayate jñānaṃ yo jñānaṃ hy anuvartatec jñānād apetya yā vṛttiḥ sā vināśayati prajāḥa bhavanto jñānino nityaṃ sarvataś ca nirāgamāḥc aikātmyaṃ nāma kaś cid dhi kadā cid abhipadyatea śāstraṃ hy abuddhvā tattvena ke cid vādabalā janāḥc kāmadveṣābhibhūtatvād ahaṃkāravaśaṃ gatāḥa yāthātathyam avijñāya śāstrāṇāṃ śāstradasyavaḥc brahmastenā nirārambhā apakvamatayo śivāḥa vaiguṇyam eva paśyanti na guṇān anuyuñjatec teṣāṃ tamaḥśarīrāṇāṃ tama eva parāyaṇama yo yathāprakṛtir jantuḥ prakṛteḥ syād vaśānugaḥc tasya dveṣaś ca kāmaś ca krodho dambho nṛtaṃ madaḥe nityam evābhivartante guṇāḥ prakṛtisaṃbhavāḥa etad buddhyānupaśyantaḥ saṃtyajeyuḥ śubhāśubhamc parāṃ gatim abhīpsanto yatayaḥ saṃyame ratāḥd yataḥ svarūpataś cānyo jātitaḥ śrutito rthataḥd katham asmin sa ity eva saṃbandhaḥ syād asaṃhitaḥ syūmaraśmir uvācaa sarvam etan mayā brahmañ śāstrataḥ parikīrtitamc na hy avijñāya śātrārthaṃ pravartante pravṛttayaḥa yaḥ kaś cin nyāyya ācāraḥ sarvaṃ śāstram iti śrutiḥc yad anyāyyam aśāstraṃ tad ity eṣā śrūyate śrutiḥa na pravṛttir ṛte śāstrāt kā cid astīti niścayaḥc yad anyad vedavādebhyas tad aśāstram iti śrutiḥa śāstrād apetaṃ paśyanti bahavo vyaktamāninaḥc śāstradoṣān na paśyanti iha cāmutra cāpared indriyārthāś ca bhavatāṃ samānāḥ sarvajantuṣud evaṃ caturṇāṃ varṇānām āśramāṇāṃ pravṛttiṣud evam ālambamānānāṃ nirṇaye sarvatodiśame avijñānahataprajñā hīnaprajñās tamovṛtāḥa śakyaṃ tv ekena muktena kṛtakṛtyena sarvaśaḥc piṇḍamātraṃ vyapāśritya carituṃ sarvatodiśamd ānantyaṃ vadamānena śaktena vijitātmanāe vedavādaṃ vyapāśritya mokṣo stīti prabhāṣitumf apetanyāyaśāstreṇa sarvalokavigarhiṇāa idaṃ tu duṣkaraṃ karma kuṭumbam śucayaḥ śraddadhānāḥ parāvarea purastād bhāvitātmāno yathāvac caritavratāḥc caranti dharmaṃ kṛcchre pi durge caivādhisaṃhatāḥa saṃhatya dharmaṃ caratāṃ purāsīt sukham eva tatc teṣāṃ nāsīd vidhātavyaṃ uktvā kuṇḍadhāro dvijarṣabhamc saṃpariṣvajya bāhubhyāṃ tatraivāntaradhīyataa tataḥ sarvān imāṃl lokān brāhmaṇo nucacāra hac kuṇḍadhāraprasādena tapasā yojitaḥ purāa vihāyasā ca gamanaṃ tathā saṃkalpitārthatāc dharmāc chaktyā tathā yogād yā caiva paramā gatiḥa devatā brāhmaṇāḥ santo yakṣā mānuṣacāraṇāḥc dhārmikān pūjayantīha na dhanāḍhyān na kāminaḥa suprasannā hi te devā yat te dharme ratā matiḥc dhane sukhakalā kā cid dharme tu paramaṃ sukham yudhiṣṭhira uvācaa bahūnāṃ yajñatapasām ekārthānāṃ pitāmahac dharmārthaṃ na sukhārthārthaṃ kathaṃ yajñaḥ samāhitaḥ bhīṣma uvācaa atra te vartayiṣyāmi nāradenānukīrtitamc uñchavṛtteḥ purāvṛttaṃ yajñārthe brāhmaṇasya haa rāṣṭre dharmottare śreṣṭhe vidarbheṣv abhavad dvijaḥc uñchavṛttir ṛṣiḥ kaś cid yajñe yajñaṃ samādadhea śyāmākam aśanaṃ tatra sūryapatnī suvarcalāc tiktaṃ ca virasaṃ śākaṃ tapasā svādutāṃ gatama upagamya vane pṛthvīṃ sarvabhūtavihiṃsayāc api mūlaphalair ijyo yajñaḥ svargyaḥ paraṃtapaa tasya bhāryā vratakṛśā śuciḥ puṣkaracāriṇīc yajñapatnītvam ānītā satyenānuvidhīyatee sā tu śāpaparitrastā na svabhāvānuvartinīa mayūrajīrṇaparṇānāṃ vastraṃ tasyāś ca parṇināmc akāmāyāḥ kṛtaṃ tatra yajñe hotrānumārgataḥa śukrasya punar ājātir apadhyānād adharmavitc tasmin vane samīpastho mṛgo bhūt sahacārikaḥe vacobhir abravīt satyaṃ tvayā duṣkṛtakaṃ kṛtama yadi mantrāṅgahīno yaṃ yajño bhavati vaikṛtaḥc māṃ bhoḥ prakṣipa hotre tvaṃ gaccha svargam atandritaḥa tatas tu yajñe sāvitrī sākṣāt taṃ saṃnyamantrayatc nimantrayantī pratyuktā na hanyāṃ sahavāsinama evam uktā nivṛttā sā praviṣṭā yajñapāvakamc kiṃ nu duścaritaṃ yajñe didṛkṣuḥ sā rasātalama sā tu baddhāñjaliṃ satyam ayācad dhariṇaṃ punaḥc satyena saṃpariṣvajya saṃdiṣṭo gamyatām itia tataḥ sa hariṇo gatvā padāny aṣṭau nyavartatac sādhu hiṃsaya māṃ satya hato yāsyāmi sadgatima paśya hy apsaraso divyā mayā dattena cakṣuṣāc vimānāni vicitrāṇi gandharvāṇāṃ mahātmanāma tataḥ suruciraṃ dṛṣṭvā spṛhālagnena cakṣuṣāc mṛgam ālokya hiṃsāyāṃ svargavāsaṃ samarthayata sa tu dharmo mṛgo bhūtvā bahuvarṣoṣito vanec tasya niṣkṛtim ādhatta na hy asau yajñasaṃvidhiḥa tasya tena tu bhāvena mṛgahiṃsātmanas tadāc tapo mahat samucchinnaṃ tasmād dhiṃsā na yajñiyāa tatas taṃ bhagavān dharmo yajñaṃ yājayata svayamc samādhānaṃ ca bhāryāyā lebhe sa tapasā parama ahiṃsā sakalo dharmo hiṃsā yajñe samāhitāc satyaṃ te haṃ pravakṣyāmi yo dharmaḥ satyavādinām yudhiṣṭhira uvācaa kathaṃ bhavati pāpātmā kathaṃ dharmaṃ karoti vāc kena nirvedam ādatte mokṣaṃ vā kena gacchati bhīṣma uvācaa viditāḥ sarvadharmās te sthityartham anupṛcchasic śṛṇu mokṣaṃ sanirvedaṃ pāpaṃ dharmaṃ ca mūlataḥa vijñānārthaṃ hi pañcānām icchā pūrvaṃ pravartatec prāpya tāñ jāyate kāmo dveṣo vā bharatarṣabhaa tatas tadarthaṃ yatate karma cārabhate punaḥc iṣṭānāṃ rūpagandhānām abhyāsaṃ ca cikīrṣatia tato rāgaḥ prabhavati dveṣaś ca tadanantaramc tato lobhaḥ prabhavati mohaś ca tadanantarama lobhamohābhibhūtasya rāgadveṣānvitasya cac na dharme jāyate buddhir vyājād dharmaṃ karoti caa vyājena carato dharmam arthavyājo pi rocatec vyājena sidhyamāneṣu dhaneṣu kurunandanaa tatraiva kurute buddhiṃ tataḥ pāpaṃ cikīrṣatic suhṛdbhir vāryamāṇo pi paṇḍitaiś cāpi bhārataa uttaraṃ nyāyasaṃbaddhaṃ bravīti vidhiyojitamc adharmas trividhas tasya vardhate rāgamohajaḥa pāpaṃ cintayate caiva prabravīti karoti cac tasyādharmapravṛttasya doṣān paśyanti sādhavaḥa ekaśīlāś ca mitratvaṃ bhajante pāpakarmiṇaḥc sa neha sukham āpnoti kuta eva paratra vaia evaṃ bhavati pāpātmā dharmātmānaṃ tu me śṛṇuc yathā kuśaladharmā sa kuśalaṃ pratipadyated kuśalenaiva dharmeṇa gatim iṣṭāṃ prapadyatea ya etān prajñayā doṣān pūrvam evānupaśyatic kuśalaḥ sukhaduḥkhānāṃ sādhūṃś cāpy upasevatea tasya sādhusamācārād abhyāsāc caiva vardhatec prajñā dharme ca ramate dharmaṃ caivopajīvatia so tha dharmād avāpteṣu dhaneṣu kurute manaḥc tasyaiva siñcate mūlaṃ guṇān paśyati yatra vaia dharmātmā bhavati hy evaṃ mitraṃ ca labhate śubhamc sa mitradhanalābhāt tu pretya ceha ca nandatia śabde sparśe tathā rūpe rase gandhe ca bhāratac prabhutvaṃ labhate jantur dharmasyaitat phalaṃ viduḥa sa dharmasya phalaṃ labdhvā na tṛpyati yudhiṣṭhirab dharme sthitānāṃ kaunteya sarvabhogakriyāsu cac atṛpyamāṇo nirvedam ādatte jñānacakṣuṣāa prajñācakṣur yadā kāme doṣam evānupaśyatic virajyate tadā kāmān na ca dharmaṃ vimuñcatia sarvatyāge ca yatate dṛṣṭvā lokaṃ kṣayātmakamc tato mokṣāya yatate nānupāyād upāyataḥa śanair nirvedam ādatte pāpaṃ karma jahāti cac dharmātmā caiva bhavati mokṣaṃ ca labhate parama etat te kathitaṃ tāta yan māṃ tvaṃ paripṛcchasic pāpaṃ dharmaṃ tathā mokṣaṃ nirvedaṃ caiva bhārataa tasmād dharme pravartethāḥ sarvāvasthaṃ yudhiṣṭhirac dharme sthitānāṃ kaunteya siddhir bhavati śāśvatī yudhiṣṭhira uvācaa mokṣaḥ pitāmahenokta upāyān nānupāyataḥc tam upāyaṃ yathānyāyaṃ śrotum icchāmi bhārata bhīṣma uvācaa tvayy evaitan mahāprājña yuktaṃ nipuṇadarśanamc yad upāyena sarvārthān nityaṃ mṛgayase naghaa karaṇe ghaṭasya yā buddhir ghaṭotpattau na sānaghac evaṃ dharmābhyupāyeṣu nānyad dharmeṣu kāraṇama pūrve samudre yaḥ panthā na sa gacchati paścimamc ekaḥ panthā hi mokṣasya tan me vistarataḥ śṛṇua kṣamayā krodham ucchindyāt kāmaṃ saṃkalpavarjanātc sattvasaṃsevanād dhīro nidrām ucchetum arhatia apramādād bhayaṃ rakṣec chvāsaṃ kṣetrajñaśīlanātc icchāṃ dveṣaṃ ca kāmaṃ ca dhairyeṇa vinivartayeta bhramaṃ pramoham āvartam abhyāsād vinivartayetc nidrāṃ ca pratibhāṃ caiva jñānābhyāsena tattvavita upadravāṃs tathā rogān hitajīrṇamitāśanātc lobhaṃ mohaṃ ca saṃtoṣād viṣayāṃs tattvadarśanāta anukrośād adharmaṃ ca jayed dharmam upekṣayāc āyatyā ca jayed āśām arthaṃ saṅgavivarjanāta anityatvena ca snehaṃ kṣudhaṃ yogena paṇḍitaḥc kāruṇyenātmano mānaṃ tṛṣṇāṃ ca paritoṣataḥa utthānena jayet tandrīṃ vitarkaṃ niścayāj jayetc maunena bahubhāṣyaṃ ca śauryeṇa ca bhayaṃ jayeta yacched vāṅmanasī buddhyā tāṃ yacchej jñānacakṣuṣāc jñānam ātmā mahān yacchet taṃ yacchec chāntir ātmanaḥd jñānam ātmāvabodhena yacched ātmānam ātmanāa tad etad upaśāntena boddhavyaṃ śucikarmaṇāc yogadoṣān samucchidya pañca yān kavayo viduḥa kāmaṃ krodhaṃ ca lobhaṃ ca bhayaṃ svapnaṃ ca pañcamamc parityajya niṣeveta tathemān yogasādhanāna dhyānam adhyayanaṃ dānaṃ satyaṃ hrīr ārjavaṃ kṣamāc śaucam āhārataḥ śuddhir indriyāṇāṃ ca saṃyamaḥa etair vivardhate tejaḥ pāpmānam apahanti cac sidhyanti cāsya saṃkalpā vijñānaṃ ca pravartatea dhūtapāpaḥ sa tejasvī laghvāhāro jitendriyaḥc kāmakrodhau vaśe kṛtvā ninīṣed brahmaṇaḥ padama amūḍhatvam asaṅgitvaṃ kāmakrodhavivarjanamc adainyam anudīrṇatvam anudvego vyavasthitiḥa eṣa mārgo hi mokṣasya prasanno vimalaḥ śuciḥc tathā vākkāyamanasāṃ niyamaḥ kāmato nyathā bhīṣma uvācaa atraivodāharantīmam itihāsaṃ purātanamc nāradasya ca saṃvādaṃ devalasyāsitasya caa āsīnaṃ devalaṃ vṛddhaṃ buddhvā buddhimatāṃ varaḥc nāradaḥ paripapraccha bhūtānāṃ prabhavāpyayama kutaḥ sṛṣṭam idaṃ viśvaṃ brahman sthāvarajaṅgamamc pralaye ca kam abhyeti tad bhavān prabravītu me asita uvācaa yebhyaḥ sṛjati bhūtāni kālo bhāvapracoditaḥc mahābhūtāni pañceti tāny āhur bhūtacintakāḥa tebhyaḥ sṛjati bhūtāni kāla ātmapracoditaḥc etebhyo yaḥ paraṃ brūyād asad brūyād asaṃśayama viddhi nārada pañcaitāñ śāśvatān acalān dhruvānc mahatas tejaso rāśīn kālaṣaṣṭhān svabhāvataḥa āpaś caivāntarikṣaṃ ca pṛthivī vāyupāvakauc asiddhiḥ param etebhyo bhūtebhyo muktasaṃśayama nopapattyā na vā yuktyā tv asad brūyād asaṃśayamc vettha tān abhinirvṛttān ṣaḍ ete yasya rāśayaḥa pañcaiva tāni kālaś ca bhāvābhāvau ca kevalauc aṣṭau bhūtāni bhūtānāṃ śāśvatāni bhavāpyayaua abhāvād bhāviteṣv eva tebhyaś ca prabhavanty apic vinaṣṭo pi ca tāny eva jantur bhavati pañcadhāa tasya bhūmimayo dehaḥ śrotram ākāśasaṃbhavamc sūryaś cakṣur asur vāyur adbhyas tu khalu śoṇitama cakṣuṣī nāsikākarṇau tvag jihveti ca pañcamīc indriyāṇīndriyārthānāṃ jñānāni kavayo viduḥa darśanaṃ śravaṇaṃ ghrāṇaṃ sparśanaṃ rasanaṃ tathāc upapattyā guṇān viddhi pañca pañcasu pañcadhāa rūpaṃ gandho rasaḥ sparśaḥ śabdaś caivātha tadguṇāḥc indriyair upalabhyante pañcadhā pañca pañcabhiḥa rūpaṃ gandhaṃ rasaṃ sparśaṃ śabdaṃ caitāṃs tu tadguṇānc indriyāṇi na budhyante kṣetrajñas tais tu budhyatea cittam indriyasaṃghātāt paraṃ tasmāt paraṃ manaḥc manasas tu parā buddhiḥ kṣetrajño buddhitaḥ paraḥa pūrvaṃ cetayate jantur indriyair viṣayān pṛthakc vicārya manasā paścād atha buddhyā vyavasyatie indriyair upalabdhārthān sarvān yas tv adhyavasyatia cittam indriyasaṃghātaṃ mano buddhiṃ tathāṣṭamīmc aṣṭau jñānendriyāṇy āhur etāny adhyātmacintakāḥa pāṇipādaṃ ca pāyuś ca mehanaṃ pañcamaṃ mukhamc iti saṃśabdyamānāni śṛṇu karmendriyāṇy apia jalpanābhyavahārārthaṃ mukham indriyam ucyatec gamanendriyaṃ tathā pādau karmaṇaḥ karaṇe karaua pāyūpasthau visargārtham indriye tulyakarmaṇīc visarge ca purīṣasya visarge cābhikāmikea balaṃ ṣaṣṭhaṃ ṣaḍ etāni vācā samyag yathāgamamc jñānaceṣṭendriyaguṇāḥ sarve saṃśabditā mayāa indriyāṇāṃ svakarmabhyaḥ śramād uparamo yadāc bhavatīndriyasaṃnyāsād atha svapiti vai naraḥa indriyāṇāṃ vyuparame mano nuparataṃ yadic sevate viṣayān eva tad vidyāt svapnadarśanama sāttvikāś caiva ye bhāvās tathā rājasatāmasāḥc karmayuktān praśaṃsanti sāttvikān itarāṃs tathāa ānandaḥ karmaṇāṃ siddhiḥ pratipattiḥ parā gatiḥc sāttvikasya nimittāni bhāvān saṃśrayate smṛtiḥa jantuṣv ekatameṣv evaṃ bhāvā ye vidhim āsthitāḥc bhāvayor īpsitaṃ nityaṃ pratyakṣagamanaṃ dvayoḥa indriyāṇi ca bhāvāś ca guṇāḥ saptadaśa smṛtāḥc teṣām aṣṭādaśo dehī yaḥ śarīre sa śāśvataḥa atha vā saśarīrās te guṇāḥ sarve śarīriṇāmc saṃśritās tadviyoge hi saśarīrā na santi tea atha vā saṃnipāto yaṃ śarīraṃ pāñcabhautikamc ekaś ca daśa cāṣṭau ca guṇāḥ saha śarīriṇāme ūṣmaṇā saha viṃśo vā saṃghātaḥ pāñcabhautikaḥa mahān saṃdhārayaty etac charīraṃ vāyunā sahac tasyāsya bhāvayuktasya nimittaṃ dehabhedanea yathaivotpadyate kiṃ cit pañcatvaṃ gacchate tathāc puṇyapāpavināśānte puṇyapāpasamīritame dehaṃ viśati kālena tato yaṃ karmasaṃbhavama hitvā hitvā hy ayaṃ praiti dehād dehaṃ kṛtāśrayaḥc kālasaṃcoditaḥ kṣetrī viśīrṇād vā gṛhād gṛhama tatra naivānutapyante prājñā niścitaniścayāḥc kṛpaṇās tv anutapyante janāḥ saṃbandhimāninaḥa na hy ayaṃ kasya cit kaś cin nāsya kaś cana vidyatec bhavaty eko hy ayaṃ nityaṃ śarīre sukhaduḥkhabhāka naiva saṃjāyate jantur na ca jātu vipadyatec yāti deham ayaṃ bhuktvā kadā cit paramāṃ gatima puṇyapāpamayaṃ dehaṃ kṣapayan karmasaṃcayātc kṣīṇadehaḥ punar dehī brahmatvam upagacchatia puṇyapāpakṣayārthaṃ ca sāṃkhyaṃ jñānaṃ vidhīyatec tatkṣaye hy asya paśyanti brahmabhāve parāṃ gatim yudhiṣṭhira uvācaa bhrātaraḥ pitaraḥ putrā jñātayaḥ suhṛdas tathāc arthahetor hatāḥ krūrair asmābhiḥ pāpabuddhibhiḥa yeyam arthodbhavā tṛṣṇā katham etāṃ pitāmahac nivartayema pāpaṃ hi tṛṣṇayā kāritā vayam bhīṣma uvācaa atrāpy udāharantīmam itihāsaṃ purātanamc gītaṃ videharājena māṇḍavyāyānupṛcchatea susukhaṃ bata jīvāmi yasya me nāsti kiṃ canac mithilāyāṃ pradīptāyāṃ na me dahyati kiṃ canaa arthāḥ khalu samṛddhā hi bāḍhaṃ duḥkhaṃ vijānatāmc asamṛddhās tv api sadā mohayanty avicakṣaṇāna yac ca kāmasukhaṃ loke yac ca divyaṃ mahat sukhamc tṛṣṇākṣayasukhasyaite nārhataḥ ṣoḍaśīṃ kalāma yathaiva śṛṅgaṃ goḥ kāle vardhamānasya vardhatec tathaiva tṛṣṇā vittena vardhamānena vardhatea kiṃ cid eva mamatvena yadā bhavati kalpitamc tad eva paritāpāya nāśe saṃpadyate punaḥa na kāmān anurudhyeta duḥkhaṃ kāmeṣu vai ratiḥc prāpyārtham upayuñjīta dharme kāmaṃ vivarjayeta vidvān sarveṣu bhūteṣu vyāghramāṃsopamo bhavetc kṛtakṛtyo viśuddhātmā sarvaṃ tyajati vai sahaa ubhe satyānṛte tyaktvā śokānandau priyāpriyec bhayābhaye ca saṃtyajya saṃpraśānto nirāmayaḥa yā dustyajā durmatibhir yā na jīryati jīryataḥc yo sau prāṇāntiko rogas tāṃ tṛṣṇāṃ tyajataḥ sukhama cāritram ātmanaḥ paśyaṃś candraśuddham anāmayamc dharmātmā labhate kīrtiṃ pretya ceha yathāsukhama rājñas tad vacanaṃ śrutvā prītimān abhavad dvijaḥc pūjayitvā ca tad vākyaṃ māṇḍavyo mokṣam āśritaḥ yudhiṣṭhira uvācaa kiṃśīlaḥ kiṃsamācāraḥ kiṃvidyaḥ kiṃparāyaṇaḥc prāpnoti brahmaṇaḥ sthānaṃ yat paraṃ prakṛter dhruvam bhīṣma uvācaa mokṣadharmeṣu nirato laghvāhāro jitendriyaḥc prāpnoti paramaṃ sthānaṃ yat paraṃ prakṛter dhruvamd atrāpy udāharantīmam itihāsaṃ purātanamd hārītena purā gītaṃ tan nibodha yudhiṣṭhiraa svagṛhād abhiniḥsṛtya lābhālābhe samo muniḥc samupoḍheṣu kāmeṣu nirapekṣaḥ parivrajeta na cakṣuṣā na manasā na vācā dūṣayed apic na pratyakṣaṃ parokṣaṃ vā dūṣaṇaṃ vyāharet kva cita na hiṃsyāt sarvabhūtāni maitrāyaṇagatiś caretc nedaṃ jīvitam āsādya vairaṃ kurvīta kena cita ativādāṃs titikṣeta nābhimanyet kathaṃ canac krodhyamānaḥ priyaṃ brūyād ākruṣṭaḥ kuśalaṃ vadeta pradakṣiṇaṃ prasavyaṃ ca grāmamadhye na cācaretc bhaikṣacaryām anāpanno na gacchet pūrvaketitaḥa avakīrṇaḥ suguptaś ca na vācā hy apriyaṃ vadetc mṛduḥ syād apratikrūro visrabdhaḥ syād aroṣaṇaḥa vidhūme nyastamusale vyaṅgāre bhuktavaj janec atīte pātrasaṃcāre bhikṣāṃ lipseta vai muniḥa anuyātrikam arthasya mātrālābheṣv anādṛtaḥc alābhe na vihanyeta lābhaś cainaṃ na harṣayeta lābhaṃ sādhāraṇaṃ necchen na bhuñjītābhipūjitaḥc abhipūjitalābhaṃ hi jugupsetaiva tādṛśaḥa na cānnadoṣān nindeta na guṇān abhipūjayetc śayyāsane vivikte ca nityam evābhipūjayeta śūnyāgāraṃ vṛkṣamūlam araṇyam atha vā guhāmc ajñātacaryāṃ gatvānyāṃ tato nyatraiva saṃviśeta anurodhavirodhābhyāṃ samaḥ syād acalo dhruvaḥc sukṛtaṃ duṣkṛtaṃ cobhe nānurudhyeta karmaṇid nityatṛptaḥ susaṃtuṣṭaḥ prasannavadanendriyaḥd dhyānajapyaparo maunī vairāgyaṃ samupāśritaḥd asvantaṃ bhautikaṃ sargaṃ paśyan bhūtātmikāṃ gatimd niḥspṛhaḥ samadarśī ca pakvāpakvena vartayand ātmārāmaḥ praśāntātmā laghvāhāro nirāmayaḥa vāco vegaṃ manasaḥ krodhavegaṃvivitsāvegam udaropasthavegamc etān vegān vinayed vai tapasvīnindā cāsya hṛdayaṃ nopahanyāta madhyastha eva tiṣṭheta praśaṃsānindayoḥ samaḥc etat pavitraṃ paramaṃ parivrājaka āśramea mahātmā suvrato dāntaḥ sarvatraivānapāśritaḥc apūrvacārakaḥ saumyo aniketaḥ samāhitaḥa vānaprasthagṛhasthābhyāṃ na saṃsṛjyeta karhi citc ajñātalipsāṃ lipseta na cainaṃ harṣa āviśeta vijānatāṃ mokṣa eṣa śramaḥ syād avijānatāmc mokṣayānam idaṃ kṛtsnaṃ viduṣāṃ hārito bravīta abhayaṃ sarvabhūtebhyo dattvā yaḥ pravrajed gṛhātc lokās tejomayās tasya tathānantyāya kalpate yudhiṣṭhira uvācaa dhanyā dhanyā iti janāḥ sarve smān pravadanty utac na duḥkhitataraḥ kaś cit pumān asmābhir asti haa lokasaṃbhāvitair duḥkhaṃ yat prāptaṃ kurusattamac prāpya jātiṃ manuṣyeṣu devair api pitāmahaa kadā vayaṃ kariṣyāmaḥ saṃnyāsaṃ duḥkhasaṃjñakamc duḥkham etac charīrāṇāṃ dhāraṇaṃ kurusattamaa vimuktāḥ saptadaśabhir hetubhūtaiś ca pañcabhiḥc indriyārthair guṇaiś caiva aṣṭābhiḥ prapitāmahaa na gacchanti punarbhāvaṃ munayaḥ saṃśitavratāḥc kadā vayaṃ bhaviṣyāmo rājyaṃ hitvā paraṃtapa bhīṣma uvācaa nāsty anantaṃ mahārāja sarvaṃ saṃkhyānagocaramc punarbhāvo pi saṃkhyāto nāsti kiṃ cid ihācalama na cāpi gamyate rājan naiṣa doṣaḥ prasaṅgataḥc udyogād eva dharmajña kālenaiva gamiṣyathaa īśo yaṃ satataṃ dehī nṛpate puṇyapāpayoḥc tata eva samutthena tamasā rudhyate pi caa yathāñjanamayo vāyuḥ punar mānaḥśilaṃ rajaḥc anupraviśya tadvarṇo dṛśyate rañjayan diśaḥa tathā karmaphalair dehī rañjitas tamasāvṛtaḥc vivarṇo varṇam āśritya deheṣu parivartatea jñānena hi yadā jantur ajñānaprabhavaṃ tamaḥc vyapohati tadā brahma prakāśeta sanātanama ayatnasādhyaṃ munayo vadantiye cāpi muktās ta upāsitavyāḥc tvayā ca lokena ca sāmareṇatasmān na śāmyanti maharṣisaṃghāḥa asminn arthe purā gītaṃ śṛṇuṣvaikamanā nṛpac yathā daityena vṛtreṇa bhraṣṭaiśvaryeṇa ceṣṭitama nirjitenāsahāyena hṛtarājyena bhāratac aśocatā śatrumadhye buddhim āsthāya kevalāma bhraṣṭaiśvaryaṃ purā vṛtram uśanā vākyam abravītc kaccit parājitasyādya na vyathā te sti dānava vṛtra uvācaa satyena tapasā caiva viditvā saṃkṣayaṃ hy ahamc na śocāmi na hṛṣyāmi bhūtānām āgatiṃ gatima kālasaṃcoditā jīvā majjanti narake vaśāḥc paridṛṣṭāni sarvāṇi divyāny āhur manīṣiṇaḥa kṣapayitvā tu taṃ kālaṃ gaṇitaṃ kālacoditāḥc sāvaśeṣeṇa kālena saṃbhavanti punaḥ punaḥa tiryagyonisahasrāṇi gatvā narakam eva cac nirgacchanty avaśā jīvāḥ kālabandhanabandhanāḥa evaṃ saṃsaramāṇāni jīvāny aham adṛṣṭavānc yathā karma tathā lābha iti śāstranidarśanama tiryag gacchanti narakaṃ mānuṣyaṃ daivam eva cac sukhaduḥkhe priyadveṣye caritvā pūrvam eva caa kṛtāntavidhisaṃyuktaṃ sarvalokaḥ prapadyatec gataṃ gacchanti cādhvānaṃ sarvabhūtāni sarvadā bhīṣma uvācaa kālasaṃkhyānasaṃkhyātaṃ sṛṣṭisthitiparāyaṇamc taṃ bhāṣamāṇaṃ bhagavān uśanā pratyabhāṣatae bhīmān duṣṭapralāpāṃs tvaṃ tāta kasmāt prabhāṣase vṛtra uvācaa pratyakṣam etad bhavatas tathānyeṣāṃ manīṣiṇāmc mayā yaj jayalubdhena purā taptaṃ mahat tapaḥa gandhān ādāya bhūtānāṃ rasāṃś ca vividhān apic avardhaṃ trīn samākramya lokān vai svena tejasāa jvālāmālāparikṣipto vaihāyasacaras tathāc ajeyaḥ sarvabhūtānām āsaṃ nityam apetabhīḥa aiśvaryaṃ tapasā prāptaṃ bhraṣṭaṃ tac ca svakarmabhiḥc dhṛtim āsthāya bhagavan na śocāmi tatas tv ahama yuyutsatā mahendreṇa purā sārdhaṃ mahātmanāc tato me bhagavān dṛṣṭo harir nārāyaṇaḥ prabhuḥa vaikuṇṭhaḥ puruṣo viṣṇuḥ śuklo nantaḥ sanātanaḥc muñjakeśo hariśmaśruḥ sarvabhūtapitāmahaḥa nūnaṃ tu tasya tapasaḥ sāvaśeṣaṃ mamāsti vaic yad ahaṃ praṣṭum icchāmi bhavantaṃ karmaṇaḥ phalama aiśvaryaṃ vai mahad brahman kasmin varṇe pratiṣṭhitamc nivartate cāpi punaḥ katham aiśvaryam uttamama kasmād bhūtāni jīvanti pravartante tha vā punaḥc kiṃ vā phalaṃ paraṃ prāpya jīvas tiṣṭhati śāśvataḥa kena vā karmaṇā śakyam atha jñānena kena vāc brahmarṣe tat phalaṃ prāptuṃ tan me vyākhyātum arhasia itīdam uktaḥ sa munis tadānīṃpratyāha yat tac chṛṇu rājasiṃhac mayocyamānaṃ puruṣarṣabha tvamananyacittaḥ saha sodarīyaiḥ uśanovācaa namas tasmai bhagavate devāya prabhaviṣṇavec yasya pṛthvītalaṃ tāta sākāśaṃ bāhugocarama mūrdhā yasya tv anantaṃ ca sthānaṃ dānavasattamac tasyāhaṃ te pravakṣyāmi viṣṇor māhātmyam uttamam bhīṣma uvācaa tayoḥ saṃvadator evam ājagāma mahāmuniḥc sanatkumāro dharmātmā saṃśayacchedanāya vaia sa pūjito surendreṇa muninośanasā tathāc niṣasādāsane rājan mahārhe munipuṃgavaḥa tam āsīnaṃ mahāprājñam uśanā vākyam abravītc brūhy asmai dānavendrāya viṣṇor māhātmyam uttamama sanatkumāras tu tataḥ śrutvā prāha vaco rthavatc viṣṇor māhātmyasaṃyuktaṃ dānavendrāya dhīmatea śṛṇu sarvam idaṃ daitya viṣṇor māhātmyam uttamamc viṣṇau jagat sthitaṃ sarvam iti viddhi paraṃtapaa sṛjaty eṣa mahābāho bhūtagrāmaṃ carācaramc eṣa cākṣipate kāle kāle visṛjate punaḥe asmin gacchanti vilayam asmāc ca prabhavanty utaa naiṣa dānavatā śakyas tapasā naiva cejyayāc saṃprāptum indriyāṇāṃ tu saṃyamenaiva śakyatea bāhye cābhyantare caiva karmaṇā manasi sthitaḥc nirmalīkurute buddhyā so mutrānantyam aśnutea yathā hiraṇyakartā vai rūpyam agnau viśodhayetc bahuśo tiprayatnena mahatātmakṛtena haa tadvaj jātiśatair jīvaḥ śudhyate lpena karmaṇāc yatnena mahatā caivāpy ekajātau viśudhyatea līlayālpaṃ yathā gātrāt pramṛjyād ātmano rajaḥc bahu yatnena mahatā doṣanirharaṇaṃ tathāa yathā cālpena mālyena vāsitaṃ tilasarṣapamc na muñcati svakaṃ gandhaṃ tadvat sūkṣmasya darśanama tad eva bahubhir mālyair vāsyamānaṃ punaḥ punaḥc vimuñcati svakaṃ gandhaṃ mālyagandhe vatiṣṭhatia evaṃ jātiśatair yukto guṇair eva prasaṅgiṣuc buddhyā nivartate doṣo yatnenābhyāsajena vaia karmaṇā svena raktāni viraktāni ca dānavac yathā karmaviśeṣāṃś ca prāpnuvanti tathā śṛṇua yathā ca saṃpravartante yasmiṃs tiṣṭhanti vā vibhoc tat te nupūrvyā vyākhyāsye tad ihaikamanāḥ śṛṇua anādinidhanaḥ śrīmān harir nārāyaṇaḥ prabhuḥc sa vai sṛjati bhūtāni sthāvarāṇi carāṇi caa eṣa sarveṣu bhūteṣu kṣaraś cākṣara eva cac ekādaśavikārātmā jagat pibati raśmibhiḥa pādau tasya mahīṃ viddhi mūrdhānaṃ divam eva cac bāhavas tu diśo daitya śrotram ākāśam eva caa tasya tejomayaḥ sūryo manaś candramasi sthitamc buddhir jñānagatā nityaṃ rasas tv apsu pravartatea bhruvor anantarās tasya grahā dānavasattamac nakṣatracakraṃ netrābhyāṃ pādayor bhūś ca dānavad taṃ viśvabhūtaṃ viśvādiṃ paramaṃ viddhi ceśvaramd pādayor bhūḥ sapātāḷā hṛtasūryasyaiva maṇḍalama rajas tamaś ca sattvaṃ ca viddhi nārāyaṇātmakamc so śramāṇāṃ mukhaṃ tāta karmaṇas tat phalaṃ viduḥa akarmaṇaḥ phalaṃ caiva sa eva param avyayaḥc chandāṃsi tasya romāṇi akṣaraṃ ca sarasvatīa bahvāśrayo bahumukho dharmo hṛdi samāśritaḥc sa brahmaparamo dharmas tapaś ca sad asac ca saḥa śrutiśāstragrahopetaḥ ṣoḍaśartvikkratuś ca saḥc pitāmahaś ca viṣṇuś ca so śvinau sa puraṃdaraḥa mitraś ca varuṇaś caiva yamo tha dhanadas tathāc te pṛthagdarśanās tasya saṃvidanti tathaikatāme ekasya viddhi devasya sarvaṃ jagad idaṃ vaśea nānābhūtasya daityendra tasyaikatvaṃ vadaty ayamc jantuḥ paśyati jñānena tataḥ sattvaṃ prakāśatea saṃhāravikṣepasahasrakoṭīstiṣṭhanti jīvāḥ pracaranti cānyec prajāvisargasya ca pārimāṇyaṃvāpīsahasrāṇi bahūni daityaa vāpyaḥ punar yojanavistṛtās tāḥkrośaṃ ca gambhīratayāvagāḍhāḥc āyāmataḥ pañcaśatāś ca sarvāḥpratyekaśo yojanataḥ pravṛddhāḥa vāpyā jalaṃ kṣipyati vālakoṭyātv ahnā sakṛc cāpy atha na dvitīyamc tāsāṃ kṣaye viddhi kṛtaṃ visargaṃsaṃhāram ekaṃ ca tathā prajānāma ṣaḍ jīvavarṇāḥ paramaṃ pramāṇaṃkṛṣṇo dhūmro nīlam athāsya madhyamc raktaṃ punaḥ sahyataraṃ sukhaṃ tuhāridravarṇaṃ susukhaṃ ca śuklama paraṃ tu śuklaṃ vimalaṃ viśokaṃgataklamaṃ sidhyati dānavendrac gatvā tu yoniprabhavāni daityasahasraśaḥ siddhim upaiti jīvaḥa gatiṃ ca yāṃ darśanam āha devogatvā śubhaṃ darśanam eva cāhac gatiḥ punar varṇakṛtā prajānāṃvarṇas tathā kālakṛto surendraa śataṃ sahasrāṇi caturdaśehaparā gatir jīvaguṇasya daityab atiprasakto nirayāc ca daityab tatas tataḥ saṃparivartate cac ārohaṇaṃ tat kṛtam eva viddhisthānaṃ tathā niḥsaraṇaṃ ca teṣāma kṛṣṇasya varṇasya gatir nikṛṣṭāsa majjate narake pacyamānaḥc sthānaṃ tathā durgatibhis tu tasyaprajāvisargān subahūn vadantia śataṃ sahasrāṇi tataś caritvāprāpnoti varṇaṃ haritaṃ tu paścātc sa caiva tasmin nivasaty anīśoyugakṣaye tamasā saṃvṛtātmāa sa vai yadā sattvaguṇena yuktastamo vyapohan ghaṭate svabuddhyāc sa lohitaṃ varṇam upaiti nīlomanuṣyaloke parivartate caa sa tatra saṃhāravisargam evasvakarmajair bandhanaiḥ kliśyamānaḥc tataḥ sa hāridram upaiti varṇaṃsaṃhāravikṣepaśate vyatītea hāridravarṇas tu prajāvisargānsahasraśas tiṣṭhati saṃcaran vaic avipramukto niraye ca daityatataḥ sahasrāṇi daśāparāṇia gatīḥ sahasrāṇi ca pañca tasyacatvāri saṃvartakṛtāni caivac vimuktam enaṃ nirayāc ca viddhisarveṣu cānyeṣu ca saṃbhaveṣua sa devaloke viharaty abhīkṣṇaṃtataś cyuto mānuṣatām upaitic saṃhāravikṣepaśatāni cāṣṭaumartyeṣu tiṣṭhann amṛtatvam etia so smād atha bhraśyati kālayogātkṛṣṇe tale tiṣṭhati sarvakaṣṭec yathā tv ayaṃ sidhyati jīvalokastat te bhidhāsyāmy asurapravīraa daivāni sa vyūhaśatāni saptarakto haridro tha tathaiva śuklaḥc saṃśritya saṃdhāvati śuklam etamaṣṭāparān arcyatamān sa lokāna aṣṭau ca ṣaṣṭiṃ ca śatāni yānimanoviruddhāni mahādyutīnāmc śuklasya varṇasya parā gatir yātrīṇy eva ruddhāni mahānubhāvaa saṃhāravikṣepam aniṣṭam ekaṃcatvāri cānyāni vasaty anīśaḥc ṣaṣṭhasya varṇasya parā gatir yāsiddhā viśiṣṭasya gataklamasyaa saptottaraṃ teṣu vasaty anīśaḥsaṃhāravikṣepaśataṃ saśeṣamc tasmād upāvṛtya manuṣyaloketato mahān mānuṣatām upaitia tasmād upāvṛtya tataḥ krameṇaso gre sma saṃtiṣṭhati bhūtasargamc sa saptakṛtvaś ca paraiti lokānsaṃhāravikṣepakṛtapravāsaḥa saptaiva saṃhāram upaplavānisaṃbhāvya saṃtiṣṭhati siddhalokec tato vyayaṃ sthānam anantam etidevasya viṣṇor atha brahmaṇaś cae śeṣasya caivātha narasya caivadevasya viṣṇoḥ paramasya caivaa saṃhārakāle paridagdhakāyābrahmāṇam āyānti sadā prajā hic ceṣṭātmano devagaṇāś ca sarveye brahmalokād amarāḥ sma te pia prajāvisargaṃ tu saśeṣakālaṃsthānāni svāny eva saranti jīvāḥc niḥśeṣāṇāṃ tat padaṃ yānti cāntesarvāpadā ye sadṛśā manuṣyāḥa ye tu cyutāḥ siddhalokāt krameṇateṣāṃ gatiṃ yānti tathānupūrvyāc jīvāḥ pare tadbalaveṣarūpāvidhiṃ svakaṃ yānti viparyayeṇaa sa yāvad evāsti saśeṣabhukteprajāś ca devyau ca tathaiva śuklec tāvat tadā teṣu viśuddhabhāvaḥsaṃyamya pañcendriyarūpam etata śuddhāṃ gatiṃ tāṃ paramāṃ paraitiśuddhena nityaṃ manasā vicinvanc tato vyayaṃ sthānam upaiti brahmaduṣprāpam abhyeti sa śāśvataṃ vaie ity etad ākhyātam ahīnasattvanārāyaṇasyeha balaṃ mayā te vṛtra uvāca evaṃ sa devo bhagavān uvāca sanatkumāro madhurābhibhāṣīa evaṃ gate me na viṣādo sti kaś citsamyak ca paśyāmi vacas tavaitatc śrutvā ca te vācam adīnasattvavikalmaṣo smy adya tathā vipāpmāa pravṛttam etad bhagavan maharṣemahādyuteś cakram anantavīryamc viṣṇor anantasya sanātanaṃ tatsthānaṃ sargā yatra sarve pravṛttāḥe sa vai mahātmā puruṣottamo vaitasmiñ jagat sarvam idaṃ pratiṣṭhitam bhīṣma uvācaa evam uktvā sa kaunteya vṛtraḥ prāṇān avāsṛjatc yojayitvā tathātmānaṃ paraṃ sthānam avāptavān yudhiṣṭhira uvācaa ayaṃ sa bhagavān devaḥ pitāmaha janārdanaḥc sanatkumāro vṛtrāya yat tad ākhyātavān purā bhīṣma uvācaa mūlasthāyī sa bhagavān svenānantena tejasāc tatsthaḥ sṛjati tān bhāvān nānārūpān mahātapāḥa turīyārdhena tasyemaṃ viddhi keśavam acyutamb turīyārdhena brahmāṇaṃ tasya viddhi mahātmanaḥc turīyārdhena lokāṃs trīn bhāvayaty eṣa buddhimāna arvāk sthitas tu yaḥ sthāyī kalpānte parivartatec sa śete bhagavān apsu yo sāv atibalaḥ prabhuḥe tān vidhātā prasannātmā lokāṃś carati śāśvatāna sarvāṇy aśūnyāni karoty anantaḥsanatkumāraḥ saṃcarate ca lokānc sa cāniruddhaḥ sṛjate mahātmātatsthaṃ jagat sarvam idaṃ vicitram yudhiṣṭhira uvācaa vṛtreṇa paramārthajña dṛṣṭā manye tmano gatiḥc śubhā tasmāt sa sukhito na śocati pitāmahaa śuklaḥ śuklābhijātīyaḥ sādhyo nāvartate naghac tiryaggateś ca nirmukto nirayāc ca pitāmahaa hāridravarṇe rakte vā vartamānas tu pārthivac tiryag evānupaśyeta karmabhis tāmasair vṛtaḥa vayaṃ tu bhṛśam āpannā raktāḥ kaṣṭamukhe sukhec kāṃ gatiṃ pratipatsyāmo nīlāṃ kṛṣṇādhamām atha bhīṣma uvācaa śuddhābhijanasaṃpannāḥ pāṇḍavāḥ saṃśitavratāḥc vihṛtya devalokeṣu punar mānuṣyam eṣyathaa prajāvisargaṃ ca sukhena kālepratyetya deveṣu sukhāni bhuktvāc sukhena saṃyāsyatha siddhasaṃkhyāṃmā vo bhayaṃ bhūd vimalāḥ stha sarve yudhiṣṭhira uvācaa aho dharmiṣṭhatā tāta vṛtrasyāmitatejasaḥc yasya vijñānam atulaṃ viṣṇor bhaktiś ca tādṛśīa durvijñeyam idaṃ tāta viṣṇor amitatejasaḥc kathaṃ vā rājaśārdūla padaṃ taj jñātavān asaua bhavatā kathitaṃ hy etac chraddadhe cāham acyutac bhūyas tu me samutpannā buddhir avyaktadarśanāta kathaṃ vinihato vṛtraḥ śakreṇa bharatarṣabhac dharmiṣṭho viṣṇubhaktaś ca tattvajñaś ca padānvayea etan me saṃśayaṃ brūhi pṛcchato bharatarṣabhac vṛtras tu rājaśārdūla yathā śakreṇa nirjitaḥa yathā caivābhavad yuddhaṃ tac cācakṣva pitāmahac vistareṇa mahābāho paraṃ kautūhalaṃ hi me bhīṣma uvācaa rathenendraḥ prayāto vai sārdhaṃ suragaṇaiḥ purāc dadarśāthāgrato vṛtraṃ viṣṭhitaṃ parvatopamama yojanānāṃ śatāny ūrdhvaṃ pañcocchritam ariṃdamac śatāni vistareṇātha trīṇy evābhyadhikāni tua tat prekṣya tādṛśaṃ rūpaṃ trailokyenāpi durjayamc vṛtrasya devāḥ saṃtrastā na śāntim upalebhirea śakrasya tu tadā rājann ūrustambho vyajāyatac bhayād vṛtrasya sahasā dṛṣṭvā tad rūpam uttamama tato nādaḥ samabhavad vāditrāṇāṃ ca nisvanaḥc devāsurāṇāṃ sarveṣāṃ tasmin yuddha upasthitea atha vṛtrasya kauravya dṛṣṭvā śakram upasthitamc na saṃbhramo na bhīḥ kā cid āsthā vā samajāyataa tataḥ samabhavad yuddhaṃ trailokyasya bhayaṃkaramc śakrasya ca surendrasya vṛtrasya ca mahātmanaḥa asibhiḥ paṭṭiśaiḥ śūlaiḥ śaktitomaramudgaraiḥc śilābhir vividhābhiś ca kārmukaiś ca mahāsvanaiḥa astraiś ca vividhair divyaiḥ pāvakolkābhir eva cac devāsurais tataḥ sainyaiḥ sarvam āsīt samākulama pitāmahapurogāś ca sarve devagaṇās tathāc ṛṣayaś ca mahābhāgās tad yuddhaṃ draṣṭum āgamana vimānāgryair mahārāja siddhāś ca bharatarṣabhac gandharvāś ca vimānāgryair apsarobhiḥ samāgamana tato ntarikṣam āvṛtya vṛtro dharmabhṛtāṃ varaḥc aśmavarṣeṇa devendraṃ parvatāt samavākirata tato devagaṇāḥ kruddhāḥ sarvataḥ śastravṛṣṭibhiḥc aśmavarṣam apohanta vṛtrapreritam āhavea vṛtraś ca kuruśārdūla mahāmāyo mahābalaḥc mohayām āsa devendraṃ māyāyuddhena sarvataḥa tasya vṛtrārditasyātha moha āsīc chatakratoḥc rathaṃtareṇa taṃ tatra vasiṣṭhaḥ samabodhayat vasiṣṭha uvācaa devaśreṣṭho si devendra surārivinibarhaṇac trailokyabalasaṃyuktaḥ kasmāc chakra viṣīdasia eṣa brahmā ca viṣṇuś ca śivaś caiva jagatprabhuḥc somaś ca bhagavān devaḥ sarve ca paramarṣayaḥd samudvignaṃ samīkṣya tvāṃ svastīty ūcur jayāya tea mā kārṣīḥ kaśmalaṃ śakra kaś cid evetaro yathāc āryāṃ yuddhe matiṃ kṛtvā jahi śatruṃ sureśvaraa eṣa lokagurus tryakṣaḥ sarvalokanamaskṛtaḥc nirīkṣate tvāṃ bhagavāṃs tyaja mohaṃ sureśvaraa ete brahmarṣayaś caiva bṛhaspatipurogamāḥc stavena śakra divyena stuvanti tvāṃ jayāya vai bhīṣma uvācaa evaṃ saṃbodhyamānasya vasiṣṭhena mahātmanāc atīva vāsavasyāsīd balam uttamatejasaḥa tato buddhim upāgamya bhagavān pākaśāsanaḥc yogena mahatā yuktas tāṃ māyāṃ vyapakarṣataa tato ṅgiraḥsutaḥ śrīmāṃs te caiva paramarṣayaḥc dṛṣṭvā vṛtrasya vikrāntam upagamya maheśvarame ūcur vṛtravināśārthaṃ lokānāṃ hitakāmyayāa tato bhagavatas tejo jvaro bhūtvā jagatpateḥc samāviśan mahāraudraṃ vṛtraṃ daityavaraṃ tadāa viṣṇuś ca bhagavān devaḥ sarvalokābhipūjitaḥc aindraṃ samāviśad vajraṃ lokasaṃrakṣaṇe rataḥa tato bṛhaspatir dhīmān upāgamya śatakratumc vasiṣṭhaś ca mahātejāḥ sarve ca paramarṣayaḥa te samāsādya varadaṃ vāsavaṃ lokapūjitamc ūcur ekāgramanaso jahi vṛtram iti prabho maheśvara uvācaa eṣa vṛtro mahāñ śakra balena mahatā vṛtaḥc viśvātmā sarvagaś caiva bahumāyaś ca viśrutaḥa tad enam asuraśreṣṭhaṃ trailokyenāpi durjayamc jahi tvaṃ yogam āsthāya māvamaṃsthāḥ sureśvaraa anena hi tapas taptaṃ balārtham amarādhipac ṣaṣṭiṃ varṣasahasrāṇi brahmā cāsmai varaṃ dadaua mahattvaṃ yogināṃ caiva mahāmāyatvam eva cac mahābalatvaṃ ca tathā tejaś cāgryaṃ sureśvaraa etad vai māmakaṃ tejaḥ samāviśati vāsavac vṛtram enaṃ tvam apy evaṃ jahi vajreṇa dānavam śakra uvācaa bhagavaṃs tvatprasādena ditijaṃ sudurāsadamc vajreṇa nihaniṣyāmi paśyatas te surarṣabha bhīṣma uvācaa āviśyamāne daitye tu jvareṇātha mahāsurec devatānām ṛṣīṇāṃ ca harṣān nādo mahān abhūta tato dundubhayaś caiva śaṅkhāś ca sumahāsvanāḥc murajā ḍiṇḍimāś caiva prāvādyanta sahasraśaḥa asurāṇāṃ tu sarveṣāṃ smṛtilopo bhavan mahānc prajñānāśaś ca balavān kṣaṇena samapadyataa tam āviṣṭam atho jñātvā ṛṣayo devatās tathāc stuvantaḥ śakram īśānaṃ tathā prācodayann apia rathasthasya hi śakrasya yuddhakāle mahātmanaḥc ṛṣibhiḥ stūyamānasya rūpam āsīt sudurdṛśam bhīṣma uvācaa vṛtrasya tu mahārāja jvarāviṣṭasya sarvaśaḥc abhavan yāni liṅgāni śarīre tāni me śṛṇua jvalitāsyo bhavad ghoro vaivarṇyaṃ cāgamat paramc gātrakampaś ca sumahāñ śvāsaś cāpy abhavan mahāne romaharṣaś ca tīvro bhūn niḥśvāsaś ca mahān nṛpaa śivā cāśivasaṃkāśā tasya vaktrāt sudāruṇāc niṣpapāta mahāghorā smṛtiḥ sā tasya bhāratae ulkāś ca jvalitās tasya dīptāḥ pārśve prapedirea gṛdhrakaṅkavaḍāś caiva vāco muñcan sudāruṇāḥc vṛtrasyopari saṃhṛṣṭāś cakravat paribabhramuḥa tatas taṃ ratham āsthāya devāpyāyitam āhavec vajrodyatakaraḥ śakras taṃ daityaṃ pratyavaikṣataa amānuṣam atho nādaṃ sa mumoca mahāsuraḥc vyajṛmbhata ca rājendra tīvrajvarasamanvitaḥe athāsya jṛmbhataḥ śakras tato vajram avāsṛjata sa vajraḥ sumahātejāḥ kālāgnisadṛśopamaḥc kṣipram eva mahākāyaṃ vṛtraṃ daityam apātayata tato nādaḥ samabhavat punar eva samantataḥc vṛtraṃ vinihataṃ dṛṣṭvā devānāṃ bharatarṣabhaa vṛtraṃ tu hatvā bhagavān dānavārir mahāyaśāḥc vajreṇa viṣṇuyuktena divam eva samāviśata atha vṛtrasya kauravya śarīrād abhiniḥsṛtāc brahmahatyā mahāghorā raudrā lokabhayāvahāa karāladaśanā bhīmā vikṛtā kṛṣṇapiṅgalāc prakīrṇamūrdhajā caiva ghoranetrā ca bhārataa kapālamālinī caiva kṛśā ca bharatarṣabhac rudhirārdrā ca dharmajña cīravastranivāsinīa sābhiniṣkramya rājendra tādṛgrūpā bhayāvahāc vajriṇaṃ mṛgayām āsa tadā bharatasattamaa kasya cit tv atha kālasya vṛtrahā kurunandanac svargāyābhimukhaḥ prāyāl lokānāṃ hitakāmyayāa bisān niḥsaramāṇaṃ tu dṛṣṭvā śakraṃ mahaujasamc kaṇṭhe jagrāha devendraṃ sulagnā cābhavat tadāa sa hi tasmin samutpanne brahmahatyākṛte bhayec nalinyāṃ bisamadhyastho babhūvābdagaṇān bahūna anusṛtya tu yatnāt sa tayā vai brahmahatyayāc tadā gṛhītaḥ kauravya niśceṣṭaḥ samapadyataa tasyā vyapohane śakraḥ paraṃ yatnaṃ cakāra hac na cāśakat tāṃ devendro brahmahatyāṃ vyapohituma gṛhīta eva tu tayā devendro bharatarṣabhac pitāmaham upāgamya śirasā pratyapūjayata jñātvā gṛhītaṃ śakraṃ tu dvijapravarahatyayāc brahmā saṃcintayām āsa tadā bharatasattamaa tām uvāca mahābāho brahmahatyāṃ pitāmahaḥc svareṇa madhureṇātha sāntvayann iva bhārataa mucyatāṃ tridaśendro yaṃ matpriyaṃ kuru bhāminic brūhi kiṃ te karomy adya kāmaṃ kaṃ tvam ihecchasi brahmahatyovācaa trilokapūjite deve prīte trailokyakartaric kṛtam eveha manye haṃ nivāsaṃ tu vidhatsva mea tvayā kṛteyaṃ maryādā lokasaṃrakṣaṇārthināc sthāpanā vai sumahatī tvayā deva pravartitāa prīte tu tvayi dharmajña sarvalokeśvare prabhoc śakrād apagamiṣyāmi nivāsaṃ tu vidhatsva me bhīṣma uvācaa tatheti tāṃ prāha tadā brahmahatyāṃ pitāmahaḥc upāyataḥ sa śakrasya brahmahatyāṃ vyapohataa tataḥ svayaṃbhuvā dhyātas tatra vahnir mahātmanāc brahmāṇam upasaṃgamya tato vacanam abravīta prāpto smi bhagavan deva tvatsakāśam ariṃdamac yat kartavyaṃ mayā deva tad bhavān vaktum arhati brahmovācaa bahudhā vibhajiṣyāmi brahmahatyām imām ahamc śakrasyādya vimokṣārthaṃ caturbhāgaṃ pratīccha me agnir uvācaa mama mokṣasya ko nto vai brahman dhyāyasva vai prabhoc etad icchāmi vijñātuṃ tattvato lokapūjita brahmovācaa yas tvāṃ jvalantam āsādya svayaṃ vai mānavaḥ kva citc bījauṣadhirasair vahne na yakṣyati tamovṛtaḥa tam eṣā yāsyati kṣipraṃ tatraiva ca nivatsyatic brahmahatyā havyavāha vyetu te mānaso jvaraḥ bhīṣma uvācaa ity uktaḥ pratijagrāha tad vaco havyakavyabhukc pitāmahasya bhagavāṃs tathā ca tad abhūt prabhoa tato vṛkṣauṣadhitṛṇaṃ samāhūya pitāmahaḥc imam arthaṃ mahārāja vaktuṃ samupacakramed iyaṃ vṛtrād anuprāptā brahmahatyā mahābhayād puruhūtaṃ caturthāṃśam asyā yūyaṃ pratīcchataa tato vṛkṣauṣadhitṛṇaṃ tathaivoktaṃ yathātathamc vyathitaṃ vahnivad rājan brahmāṇam idam abravīta asmākaṃ brahmahatyāto ko nto lokapitāmahac svabhāvanihatān asmān na punar hantum arhasia vayam agniṃ tathā śītaṃ varṣaṃ ca pavaneritamc sahāmaḥ satataṃ deva tathā chedanabhedanama brahmahatyām imām adya bhavataḥ śāsanād vayamc grahīṣyāmas trilokeśa mokṣaṃ cintayatāṃ bhavān brahmovācaa parvakāle tu saṃprāpte yo vai chedanabhedanamc kariṣyati naro mohāt tam eṣānugamiṣyati bhīṣma uvācaa tato vṛkṣauṣadhitṛṇam evam uktaṃ bhāgaṃ hi mayoktāḥ saṃpratīcchata apsarasa ūcuḥa grahaṇe kṛtabuddhīnāṃ deveśa tava śāsanātc mokṣaṃ samayato smākaṃ cintayasva pitāmaha brahmovācaa rajasvalāsu nārīṣu yo vai maithunam ācaretc tam eṣā yāsyati kṣipraṃ vyetu vo mānaso jvaraḥ bhīṣma uvācaa tatheti hṛṣṭamanasa uktvāthāpsarasāṃ gaṇāḥc svāni sthānāni saṃprāpya remire bharatarṣabhaa tatas trilokakṛd devaḥ punar eva mahātapāḥc apaḥ saṃcintayām āsa dhyātās tāś cāpy athāgamana tās tu sarvāḥ samāgamya brahmāṇam amitaujasamc idam ūcur vaco rājan praṇipatya pitāmahama imāḥ sma deva saṃprāptās tvatsakāśam ariṃdamac śāsanāt tava deveśa samājñāpaya no vibho brahmovācaa iyaṃ vṛtrād anuprāptā puruhūtaṃ mahābhayāc brahmahatyā caturthāṃśam asyā yūyaṃ pratīcchata āpa ūcuḥa evaṃ bhavatu lokeśa yathā vadasi naḥ prabhoc mokṣaṃ samayato smākaṃ saṃcintayitum arhasia tvaṃ hi deveśa sarvasya jagataḥ paramo guruḥc ko nyaḥ prasādo hi bhaved yaḥ kṛcchrān naḥ samuddharet brahmovācaa alpā iti matiṃ kṛtvā yo naro buddhimohitaḥc yathānisṛṣṭaṃ taṃ deśam agacchad devaśāsanāta evaṃ śakreṇa saṃprāptā brahmahatyā janādhipac pitāmaham anujñāpya so śvamedham akalpayata śrūyate hi mahārāja saṃprāptā vāsavena vaic brahmahatyā tataḥ devasyānumate gacchan gaṅgādvāram iti śrutiḥa prasthitā devatā dṛṣṭvā śailarājasutā tadāc uvāca vacanaṃ sādhvī devaṃ paśupatiṃ patima bhagavan kva nu yānty ete devāḥ śakrapurogamāḥc brūhi tattvena tattvajña saṃśayo me mahān ayam maheśvara uvācaa dakṣo nāma mahābhāge prajānāṃ patir uttamaḥc hayamedhena yajate tatra yānti divaukasaḥ umā uvācaa yajñam etaṃ mahābhāga kimarthaṃ nābhigacchasic kena tvaṃ śarī cāpī khaṭvāṅgī jharjharī tathād chettā bhettā prahartā tvaṃ netā mantā pitā mataḥd daśalakṣaṇasaṃyukto dharmo rthaḥ kāma eva cad gaṅgā samudrāḥ saritaḥ palvalāni sarāṃsi cad latā vallyas tṛṇauṣadhyaḥ paśavo mṛgapakṣiṇaḥd dravyakarmaguṇārambhaḥ kālapuṣpaphalapradaḥd ādiś cāntaś ca devānāṃ gāyatry oṃkāra eva cad harito lohito nīlaḥ kṛṣṇo raktas tathāruṇaḥd kadruś ca kapilaś caiva kapoto mecakas tathād avarṇaś ca suvarṇaś ca varṇakāro hy anaupamaḥd suvarṇanāmā ca tathā suvarṇapriya eva cad tvam indraś ca yamaś caiva varuṇo dhanado nalaḥd upaplavaś citrabhānuḥ svarbhānur bhānur eva cad hotraṃ hotā ca homyaṃ ca hutaṃ caiva tathā prabhuḥd trisauparṇaṃ tathā brahma yajuṣāṃ śatarudriyamd pavitraṃ ca pavitrāṇāṃ maṅgalānāṃ ca maṅgalamd giriko hiṇḍuko vṛkṣo jīvaḥ pudgala eva cad prāṇaḥ sattvaṃ rajaś caiva tamaś cāpramadas tathād prāṇo pānaḥ samānaś ca udāno vyāna eva cad unmeṣaś ca nimeṣaś ca kṣutaṃ jṛmbhitam eva cad lohitāntargatā dṛṣṭir mahāvaktro mahodaraḥd śuciromā hariśmaśrur ūrdhvakeśaś calācalaḥd gītavāditratattvajño gītavādanakapriyaḥd matsyo jalacaro jālyo kalaḥ kelikalaḥ kaliḥd akālaś cātikālaś ca duṣkālaḥ kāla eva cad mṛtyuḥ kṣuraś ca kṛtyaś ca pakṣo pakṣakṣayaṃkaraḥd meghakālo mahādaṃṣṭraḥ saṃvartakabalāhakaḥd ghaṇṭo ghaṇṭo ghaṭī ghaṇṭī carucelī milīmilīd brahmakāyikam agnīnāṃ daṇḍī muṇḍas tridaṇḍadhṛkd caturyugaś caturvedaś cāturhotrapravartakaḥd cāturāśramyanetā ca cāturvarṇyakaraś ca yaḥd sadā cākṣapriyo dhūrto gaṇādhyakṣo gaṇādhipaḥd raktamālyāmbaradharo giriśo girikapriyaḥd śilpikaḥ śilpināṃ śreṣṭhaḥ sarvaśilpapravartakaḥd bhaganetrāṅkuśaś caṇḍaḥ pūṣṇo dantavināśanaḥd svāhā svadhā vaṣaṭkāro namaskāro namo namaḥd gūḍhavrato guhyatapās tārakas tārakāmayaḥd dhātā vidhātā saṃdhātā vidhātā dhāraṇo dharaḥd brahmā tapaś ca satyaṃ ca brahmacaryam athārjavamd bhūtātmā bhūtakṛd bhūto bhūtabhavyabhavodbhavaḥd bhūr bhuvaḥ svaritaś caiva dhruvo dānto maheśvaraḥd dīkṣito dīkṣitaḥ kṣānto durdānto dāntanāśanaḥd candrāvarto yugāvartaḥ saṃvartaḥ saṃpravartakaḥd kāmo bindur aṇuḥ sthūlaḥ karṇikārasrajapriyaḥd nandīmukho bhīmamukhaḥ sumukho durmukho mukhaḥd caturmukho bahumukho raṇeṣv agnimukhas tathād hiraṇyagarbhaḥ śakunir mahoragapatir virāṭd adharmahā mahāpārśvo daṇḍadhāro raṇapriyaḥd gonardo gopratāraś ca govṛṣeśvaravāhanaḥd trailokyagoptā govindo gomārgo mārga eva cad śreṣṭhaḥ sthiraś ca sthāṇuś ca niṣkampaḥ kampa eva cad durvāraṇo durviṣaho duḥsaho duratikramaḥd durdharṣo duṣprakampaś ca durviṣo durjayo jayaḥd śaśaḥ śaśāṅkaḥ śamanaḥ śītoṣṇakṣujjarādhidhṛkd ādhayo vyādhayaś caiva vyādhihā vyādhir eva cad mama yajñamṛgavyādho vyādhīnām āgamo gamaḥd śikhaṇḍī puṇḍarīkākṣaḥ puṇḍarīkavanālayaḥd daṇḍadhāras tryambakaś ca ugradaṇḍo ṇḍanāśanaḥd viṣāgnipāḥ suraśreṣṭhaḥ somapās tvaṃ marutpatiḥd amṛtapās tvaṃ jagannātha devadeva gaṇeśvaraḥd viṣāgnipā mṛtyupāś ca kṣīrapāḥ somapās tathād madhuścyutānām agrapās tvam eva tuṣitājyapāḥd hiraṇyaretāḥ puruṣas tvam evad tvaṃ strī pumāṃs tvaṃ ca napuṃsakaṃ cad bālo yuvā sthaviro jīrṇadaṃṣṭrod nāgendraśatrur viśvakartā vareṇyaḥd tvaṃ viśvabāhus tejasvī viśvatomukhaśd candrādityau hṛdayaṃ ca pitāmahaḥd sarasvatī vāgbalam uttamo nilaḥd ahorātro nimeṣonmeṣakartād na brahmā na ca govindaḥ paurāṇā ṛṣayo na ted māhātmyaṃ vedituṃ śaktā yāthātathyena te śivad yā mūrtayaḥ susūkṣmās te na mahyaṃ yānti darśanamd trāhi māṃ satataṃ rakṣa pitā putram ivaurasamd rakṣa māṃ rakṣaṇīyo haṃ tavānagha namo stu ted bhaktānukampī bhagavān bhaktaś cāhaṃ sadā tvayid yaḥ sahasrāṇy anekāni puṃsām āvṛtya durdṛśaḥd tiṣṭhaty ekaḥ samudrānte sa me goptās tu nityaśaḥd yaṃ vinidrā jitaśvāsāḥ sattvasthāḥ samadarśinaḥd jyotiḥ paśyanti yuñjānās tasmai yogātmane namaḥd jaṭile daṇḍine nityaṃ lambodaraśarīriṇed kamaṇḍaluniṣaṅgāya tasmai rudrātmane namaḥd yasya keśeṣu jīmūtā nadyaḥ sarvāṅgasaṃdhiṣud kukṣau samudrāś catvāras tasmai toyātmane namaḥd saṃbhakṣya sarvabhūtāni yugānte paryupasthited yaḥ śete jalamadhyasthas taṃ prapadye mbuśāyinamd praviśya vadanaṃ rāhor yaḥ somaṃ pibate niśid grasaty arkaṃ ca svarbhānur bhūtvā māṃ so bhirakṣatud ye cānupatitā garbhā yathābhāgānupāsated namas tebhyaḥ svadhā svāhā prāpnuvantu mudantu ted ye ṅguṣṭhamātrāḥ puruṣā dehasthāḥ sarvadehināmd rakṣantu te hi māṃ nityaṃ nityaṃ cāpyāyayantu cad ye na rodanti dehasthā dehino rodayanti cad harṣayanti na hṛṣyanti namas tebhyo stu nityaśaḥd ye nadīṣu samudreṣu parvateṣu guhāsu cad vṛkṣamūleṣu goṣṭheṣu kāntāragahaneṣu cad catuṣpatheṣu rathyāsu catvareṣu taṭeṣu cad hastyaśvarathaśālāsu jīrṇodyānālayeṣu cad ye ca pañcasu bhūteṣu diśāsu vidiśāsu cad candrārkayor madhyagatā ye ca candrārkaraśmiṣud rasātalagatā ye ca ye ca tasmai paraṃ gatāḥd namas tebhyo namas tebhyo namas tebhyo stu nityaśaḥd yeṣāṃ na vidyate saṃkhyā pramāṇaṃ rūpam eva cad asaṃkhyeyaguṇā rudrā namas tebhyo stu nityaśaḥd sarvabhūtakaro yasmāt sarvabhūtapatir haraḥd sarvabhūtāntarātmā ca tena tvaṃ na nimantritaḥd tvam eva hījyase yasmād yajñair vividhadakṣiṇaiḥd tvam eva kartā sarvasya tena tvaṃ na nimantritaḥd atha vā māyayā deva sūkṣmayā tava mohitaḥd etasmāt kāraṇād vāpi tena tvaṃ na nimantritaḥd prasīda mama bhadraṃ te tava bhāvagatasya med tvayi me hṛdayaṃ deva tvayi buddhir manas tvayid stutvaivaṃ sa mahādevaṃ virarāma prajāpatiḥd bhagavān api suprītaḥ punar dakṣam abhāṣatad parituṣṭo smi te dakṣa stavenānena suvratad bahunātra kim uktena matsamīpe bhaviṣyasid aśvamedhasahasrasya vājapeyaśatasya cad prajāpate matprasādāt phalabhāgī bhaviṣyasid athainam abravīd vākyaṃ trailokyādhipatir bhavaḥd āśvāsanakaraṃ vākyaṃ vākyavid vākyasaṃmitamd dakṣa dakṣa na kartavyo manyur vighnam imaṃ pratid ahaṃ yajñaharas tubhyaṃ dṛṣṭam etat purātanamd bhūyaś ca te varaṃ dadmi taṃ tvaṃ gṛhṇīṣva suvratad prasannavadano bhūtvā tad ihaikamanāḥ śṛṇud vedāt
