tyajyatāṃ mānaso jvaraḥd evam uktvā mahādevaḥ sapatnīko vṛṣadhvajaḥd adarśanam anuprāpto dakṣasyāmitavikramaḥd dakṣaproktaṃ stavam imaṃ kīrtayed yaḥ śṛṇoti vād nāśubhaṃ prāpnuyāt kiṃ cid dīrgham āyur avāpnuyātd yathā sarveṣu deveṣu variṣṭho bhagavāñ śivaḥd tathā stavo variṣṭho yaṃ stavānāṃ brahmasaṃmitaḥd yaśorājyasukhaiśvaryakāmārthadhanakāṅkṣibhiḥd śrotavyo bhaktim āsthāya vidyākāmaiś ca piśācā vā na bhūtā na vināyakāḥd vighnaṃ kuryur gṛhe tasya yatrāyaṃ paṭhyate stavaḥd śṛṇuyāc caiva yā nārī tadbhaktā brahmacāriṇīd pitṛpakṣe mātṛpakṣe pūjyā bhavati devavatd śṛṇuyād yaḥ stavaṃ kṛtsnaṃ kīrtayed vā samāhitaḥd tasya sarvāṇi karmāṇi siddhiṃ gacchanty abhīkṣṇaśaḥd manasā cintitaṃ yac ca yac ca vācānukīrtitamd sarvaṃ saṃpadyate tasya stavasyāsyānukīrtanātd devasya ca saguhasya devyā nandīśvarasya cad baliṃ suvihitaṃ kṛtvā damena niyamena cad tatas tu yukto gṛhṇīyān nāmāny āśu yathākramamd īpsitāṃl labhate so rthān kāmān bhogāṃś ca mānavaḥd mṛtaś ca svargam āpnoti tiryakṣu ca na bhavantisukhasya vā nityaśo lābha evaa bhāvātmakaṃ saṃparivartamānaṃna mādṛśaḥ saṃjvaraṃ jātu kuryātc iṣṭān bhogān nānurudhyet sukhaṃ vāna cintayed duḥkham abhyāgataṃ vāa samāhito na spṛhayet pareṣāṃnānāgataṃ nābhinandeta lābhamc na cāpi hṛṣyed vipule rthalābhetathārthanāśe ca na vai viṣīdeta na bāndhavā na ca vittaṃ na kaulīna ca śrutaṃ na ca mantrā na vīryamc duḥkhāt trātuṃ sarva narakāyaiva tasmāt taṃ saṃtyajāmy ahama etāñ śokabhayotsekān mohanān sukhaduḥkhayoḥc paśyāmi sākṣival loke dehasyāsya viceṣṭanāta arthakāmau parityajya viśoko vigatajvaraḥc tṛṣṇāmohau tu saṃtyajya prabādhate yudhiṣṭhira uvācaa atattvajñasya śāstrāṇāṃ satataṃ saṃśayātmanaḥc akṛtavyavasāyasya śreyo brūhi pitāmaha bhīṣma uvācaa gurupūjā ca satataṃ vṛddhānāṃ paryupāsanamc śravaṇaṃ caiva vidyānāṃ pṛthagācāradarśinaḥc idaṃ śreya idaṃ śreya iti nānāpradhāvitāḥa tāṃs tu viprasthitān dṛṣṭvā śāstraiḥ śāstrābhinandinaḥc svaśāstraiḥ parituṣṭāṃś ca śreyo nopalabhāmahea śāstraṃ yadi bhaved ekaṃ vyaktaṃ śreyo bhavet tadāc śāstraiś ca bahubhir bhūyaḥ śreyo guhyaṃ praveśitama etasmāt kāraṇāc chreyaḥ kalilaṃ pratibhāti māmc bravītu bhagavāṃs tan me upasanno smy adhīhi bhoḥ nārada uvācaa āśramās tāta abhipretam asaṃśayama ṛju paśyaṃs tathā samyag āśramāṇāṃ parāṃ gatimc yat tu niḥśreyasaṃ samyak tac caivāsaṃśayātmakama anugrahaṃ ca mitrāṇām amitrāṇāṃ ca nigrahamc saṃgrahaṃ ca trivargasya śreya āhur manīṣiṇaḥa nivṛttiḥ karmaṇaḥ pāpāt satataṃ puṇyaśīlatāc sadbhiś ca samudācāraḥ śreya etad asaṃśayama mārdavaṃ sarvabhūteṣu vyavahāreṣu cārjavamc vāk caiva madhurā proktā śreya etad asaṃśayama devatābhyaḥ pitṛbhyaś ca saṃvibhāgo tithiṣv apic asaṃtyāgaś ca bhṛtyānāṃ śreya etad asaṃśayama satyasya vacanaṃ śreyaḥ satyajñānaṃ tu duṣkaramc yad bhūtahitam atyantam etat satyaṃ bravīmy ahama ahaṃkārasya ca tyāgaḥ praṇayasya ca nigrahaḥc saṃtoṣaś caikacaryā ca kūṭasthaṃ śreya ucyatea dharmeṇa vedādhyayanaṃ vedāṅgānāṃ tathaiva cac vidyārthānāṃ ca jijñāsā śreya etad asaṃśayama karmaṇāa varṇebhyo pi paribhraṣṭaḥ sa vai saṃmānam arhatic na tu yaḥ satkriyāṃ prāpya rājasaṃ karma sevatea varṇotkarṣam avāpnoti naraḥ puṇyena karmaṇāc durlabhaṃ tam alabdhā hi hanyāt pāpena karmaṇāa ajñānād dhi kṛtaṃ pāpaṃ tapasaivābhinirṇudetc pāpaṃ hi karma phalati pāpam eva svayaṃ kṛtame tasmāt pāpaṃ na seveta karma duḥkhaphalodayama pāpānubandhaṃ yat karma yady api syān mahāphalamc na tat seveta medhāvī śuciḥ kusalilaṃ yathāa kiṃkaṣṭam anupaśyāmi phalaṃ pāpasya karmaṇaḥc pratyāpannasya hi sato nātmā tāvad virocatea pratyāpattiś ca yasyeha bāliśasya na jāyatec tasyāpi sumahāṃs tāpaḥ prasthitasyopajāyatea viraktaṃ śodhyate vastraṃ na tu kṛṣṇopasaṃhitamc prayatnena manuṣyendra pāpam evaṃ nibodha mea svayaṃ kṛtvā tu yaḥ pāpaṃ śubham evānutiṣṭhatic prāyaścittaṃ naraḥ kartum ubhayaṃ so śnute pṛthaka ajñānāt tu kṛtāṃ hiṃsām ahiṃsā vyapakarṣatic brāhmaṇāḥ śāstranirdeśād ity āhur brahmavādinaḥa tathā kāmakṛtaṃ cāsya vihiṃsaivāpakarṣatic ity āhur dharmaśāstrajñā brāhmaṇā vedapāragāḥa ahaṃ tu tāvat paśyāmi karma yad vartate kṛtamc guṇayuktaṃ prakāśaṃ ca pāpenānupasaṃhitama yathā sūkṣmāṇi karmāṇi phalantīha yathātathamc buddhiyuktāni tānīha kṛtāni manasā sahaa bhavaty alpaphalaṃ karma sevitaṃ nityam ulbaṇamc abuddhipūrvaṃ dharmajña kṛtam ugreṇa karmaṇāa kṛtāni yāni karmāṇi daivatair munibhis tathāc nācaret tāni dharmātmā śrutvā cāpi na kutsayeta saṃcintya manasā rājan viditvā śaktim ātmanaḥc karoti yaḥ śubhaṃ karma sa vai bhadrāṇi paśyatia nave kapāle salilaṃ saṃnyastaṃ hīyate yathāc navetare tathābhāvaṃ prāpnoti sukhabhāvitama satoye nyat tu yat toyaṃ tasminn eva prasicyatec vṛddhe vṛddhim avāpnoti salile salilaṃ yathāa evaṃ karmāṇi yānīha buddhiyuktāni bhūpatec nasamānīha hīnāni tāni puṇyatamāny apia rājñā jetavyāḥ sāyudhāś connatāś casamyak kartavyaṃ pālanaṃ ca prajānāmc agniś ceyo bahubhiś cāpi yajñairante madhye vā vanam āśritya stheyama damānvitaḥ puruṣo dharmaśīlobhūtāni cātmānam ivānupaśyetc garīyasaḥ pūjayed ātmaśaktyāsatyena śīlena sukhaṃ narendra parāśara uvācaa kaḥ kasya copakurute kaś ca kasmai prayacchatic prāṇī karoty ayaṃ karma sarvam ātmārtham ātmanāa gauraveṇa parityaktaṃ niḥsnehaṃ parivarjayetc sodaryaṃ bhrātaram api kim utānyaṃ pṛthagjanama viśiṣṭasya viśiṣṭāc ca tulyau dānapratigrahauc tayoḥ puṇyataraṃ dānaṃ tad dvijasya prayacchataḥa nyāyāgataṃ dhanaṃ varṇair nyāyenaiva vivardhitamc saṃrakṣyaṃ yatnam āsthāya dharmārtham iti niścayaḥa na dharmārthī nṛśaṃsena karmaṇā dhanam arjayetc śaktitaḥ sarvakāryāṇi kuryān narddhim anusmareta apo hi prayataḥ śītās tāpitā jvalanena vāc śaktito tithaye dattvā kṣudhārtāyāśnute phalama rantidevena lokeṣṭā siddhiḥ prāptā mahātmanāc phalapatrair atho mūlair munīn arcitavān asaua tair eva phalapatraiś ca sa māṭharam atoṣayatc tasmāl lebhe paraṃ sthānaṃ śaibyo pi pṛthivīpatiḥa devatātithibhṛtyebhyaḥ pitṛbhyo thātmanas tathāc ṛṇavāñ jāyate martyas tasmād anṛṇatāṃ vrajeta svādhyāyena maharṣibhyo devebhyo yajñakarmaṇāc pitṛbhyaḥ śrāddhadānena nṛṇām abhyarcanena caa vācaḥ śeṣāvahāryeṇa pālanenātmano pi cac yathāvad bhṛtyavargasya cikīrṣed dharmam āditaḥa prayatnena ca saṃsiddhā dhanair api vivarjitāḥc samyag ghutvā hutavahaṃ munayaḥ siddhim āgatāḥa viśvāmitrasya putratvam ṛcīkatanayo gamatc ṛgbhiḥ stutvā mahābhāgo devān vai yajñabhāginaḥa gataḥ śukratvam uśanā devadevaprasādanātc devīṃ stutvā tu gagane modate tejasā vṛtaḥa asito devalaś caiva tathā nāradaparvatauc kakṣīvāñ jāmadagnyaś ca rāmas tāṇḍyas tathāṃśumāna vasiṣṭho jamadagniś ca viśvāmitro trir eva cac bharadvājo hariśmaśruḥ kuṇḍadhāraḥ śrutaśravāḥa ete maharṣayaḥ stutvā viṣṇum ṛgbhiḥ samāhitāḥc lebhire tapasā siddhiṃ prasādāt tasya dhīmataḥa anarhāś cārhatāṃ prāptāḥ santaḥ stutvā tam eva hac na tu vṛddhim ihānvicchet karma kṛtvā jugupsitama ye rthā dharmeṇa te satyā ye dharmeṇa dhig astu tānc dharmaṃ vai śāśvataṃ loke na jahyād dhanakāṅkṣayāa āhitāgnir hi dharmātmā yaḥ sa puṇyakṛd uttamaḥc vedā hi sarve rājendra sthitās triṣv agniṣu prabhoa sa cāpy agnyāhito vipraḥ kriyā yasya na hīyatec śreyo hy anāhitāgnitvam agnihotraṃ na niṣkriyama agnir ātmā ca mātā ca pitā janayitā tathāc guruś ca naraśārdūla paricaryā yathātathama mānaṃ tyaktvā yo naro vṛddhasevīvidvān klībaḥ paśyati prītiyogātc dākṣyeṇāhīno dharmayukto nadāntoloke smin vai pūjyate sadbhir āryaḥ parāśara uvācaa vṛttiḥ sakāśād varṇebhyas tribhyo hīnasya śobhanāc prītyopanītā nirdiṣṭā dharmiṣṭhān kurute sadāa vṛttiś cen nāsti śūdrasya pitṛpaitāmahī dhruvāc na vṛttiṃ parato mārgec chuśrūṣāṃ tu prayojayeta sadbhis tu saha saṃsargaḥ śobhate dharmadarśibhiḥc nityaṃ sarvāsv avasthāsu nāsadbhir iti me matiḥa yathodayagirau dravyaṃ saṃnikarṣeṇa dīpyatec tathā satsaṃnikarṣeṇa hīnavarṇo pi dīpyatea yādṛśena hi varṇena bhāvyate śuklam ambaramc tādṛśaṃ kurute rūpam etad evam avaihi mea tasmād guṇeṣu rajyethā mā doṣeṣu kadā canac anityam iha martyānāṃ jīvitaṃ hi calācalama sukhe vā yadi vā duḥkhe vartamāno vicakṣaṇaḥc yaś cinoti śubhāny eva sa bhadrāṇīha paśyatia dharmād apetaṃ yat karma yady api syān mahāphalamc na tat seveta medhāvī na tad dhitam ihocyated dharmeṇa sahitaṃ yat tu bhaved alpaphalodayamd tat kāryam aviśaṅkena karmātyantasukhāvahama yo hṛtvā gosahasrāṇi nṛpo dadyād arakṣitāc sa śabdamātraphalabhāg rājā bhavati taskaraḥa svayaṃbhūr asṛjac cāgre dhātāraṃ lokapūjitamc dhātāsṛjat putram ekaṃ prajānāṃ dhāraṇe ratama tam arcayitvā vaiśyas tu kuryād atyartham ṛddhimatc rakṣitavyaṃ tu rājanyair upayojyaṃ dvijātibhiḥa ajihmair aśaṭhakrodhair havyakavyaprayoktṛbhiḥc śūdrair nirmārjanaṃ kāryam evaṃ dharmo na naśyatia apranaṣṭe tato dharme bhavanti sukhitāḥ prajāḥc sukhena tāsāṃ rājendra modante divi devatāḥa tasmād yo rakṣati nṛpaḥ sa dharmeṇābhipūjyatec adhīte cāpi yo vipro vaiśyo yaś cārjane rataḥa yaś ca śuśrūṣate śūdraḥ satataṃ niyatendriyaḥc ato nyathā manuṣyendra svadharmāt parihīyatea prāṇasaṃtāpanirdiṣṭāḥ kākiṇyo pi mahāphalāḥc nyāyenopārjitā dattāḥ kim utānyāḥ sahasraśaḥa satkṛtya tu dvijātibhyo yo dadāti narādhipac yādṛśaṃ tādṛśaṃ nityam aśnāti phalam ūrjitama abhigamya dattaṃ tuṣṭyā yad dhanyam āhur abhiṣṭutamc yācitena tu yad dattaṃ tad āhur madhyamaṃ budhāḥa avajñayā dīyate yat tathaivāśraddhayāpi cac tad āhur adhamaṃ dānaṃ munayaḥ satyavādinaḥa atikrame majjamāno vividhena naraḥ sadāc tathā prayatnaṃ kurvīta yathā mucyeta saṃśayāta damena śobhate vipraḥ kṣatriyo vijayena tuc dhanena vaiśyaḥ śūdras tu nityaṃ dākṣyeṇa śobhate parāśara uvācaa pratigrahāgatā vipre kṣatriye śastranirjitāḥc vaiśye nyāyārjitāś caiva śūdre śuśrūṣayārjitāḥe svalpāpy arthāḥ praśasyante dharmasyārthe mahāphalāḥa nityaṃ trayāṇāṃ varṇānāṃ śūdraḥ śuśrūṣur ucyatec kṣatradharmā vaiśyadharmā nāvṛttiḥ patati dvijaḥe śūdrakarmā yadā tu syāt tadā patati vai dvijaḥa vāṇijyaṃ pāśupālyaṃ ca tathā śilpopajīvanamc śūdrasyāpi vidhīyante yadā vṛttir na jāyatea raṅgāvataraṇaṃ caiva tathā rūpopajīvanamc madyamāṃsopajīvyaṃ ca vikrayo lohacarmaṇoḥa apūrviṇā na kartavyaṃ karma loke vigarhitamc kṛtapūrviṇas tu tyajato mahān dharma iti śrutiḥa saṃsiddhaḥ puruṣo loke yad ācarati pāpakamc madenābhiplutamanās tac ca nagrāhyam ucyatea śrūyante hi purāṇe vai prajā dhigdaṇḍaśāsanāḥc dāntā dharmapradhānāś ca nyāyadharmānuvartakāḥa dharma eva sadā nṝṇām iha rājan praśasyatec dharmavṛddhā guṇān eva sevante hi narā bhuvia taṃ dharmam asurās tāta nāmṛṣyanta janādhipac vivardhamānāḥ kramaśas tatra te nvāviśan prajāḥa teṣāṃ darpaḥ samabhavat prajānāṃ dharmanāśanaḥc darpātmanāṃ tataḥ krodhaḥ punas teṣām ajāyataa tataḥ krodhābhibhūtānāṃ vṛttaṃ lajjāsamanvitamc hrīś caivāpy anaśad rājaṃs tato moho vyajāyataa tato mohaparītās te nāpaśyanta yathā purāc parasparāv amardena vartayanti yathāsukhama tān prāpya tu sa dhig daṇḍo nakāraṇam ato bhavatc tato bhyagacchan devāṃś ca brāhmaṇāṃś cāvamanya haa etasminn eva kāle tu devā devavaraṃ śivamc agacchañ śaraṇaṃ vīraṃ bahurūpaṃ gaṇādhipama tena sma te gaganagāḥ sapurāḥ pātitāḥ kṣitauc tisro py ekena bāṇena devāpyāyitatejasāa teṣām adhipatis tv āsīd bhīmo bhīmaparākramaḥc devatānāṃ bhayakaraḥ sa hataḥ śūlapāṇināa tasmin hate tha svaṃ bhāvaṃ pratyapadyanta mānavāḥc prāvartanta ca vedā vai śāstrāṇi ca yathā purāa tato bhyaṣiñcan rājyena devānāṃ divi vāsavamc saptarṣayaś cānvayuñjan narāṇāṃ daṇḍadhāraṇea saptarṣīṇām athordhvaṃ ca vipṛthur nāma pārthivaḥc rājānaḥ kṣatriyāś caiva maṇḍaleṣu pṛthak pṛthaka mahākuleṣu ye jātā vṛttāḥ pūrvatarāś ca yec teṣām athāsuro bhāvo hṛdayān nāpasarpatia tasmāt tenaiva bhāvena sānuṣaṅgena pārthivāḥc āsurāṇy eva karmāṇi nyaṣevan bhīmavikramāḥa pratyatiṣṭhaṃś ca teṣv eva tāny eva sthāpayanti cac bhajante tāni cādyāpi ye bāliśatamā narāḥa tasmād ahaṃ bravīmi tvāṃ rājan saṃcintya śāstrataḥc saṃsiddhādhigamaṃ kuryāt karma hiṃsātmakaṃ tyajeta na saṃkareṇa draviṇaṃ vicinvīta vicakṣaṇaḥc dharmārthaṃ nyāyam utsṛjya na tat kalyāṇam ucyatea sa tvam evaṃvidho dāntaḥ kṣatriyaḥ priyabāndhavaḥc prajā bhṛtyāṃś ca putrāṃś ca svadharmeṇānupālayaa iṣṭāniṣṭasamāyogo vairaṃ sauhārdam eva cac atha jātisahasrāṇi bahūni parivartatea tasmād guṇeṣu rajyethā mā doṣeṣu kadā canac nirguṇo yo hi durbuddhir ātmanaḥ so rir ucyatea mānuṣeṣu mahārāja dharmādharmau pravartataḥc na tathānyeṣu bhūteṣu manuṣyarahiteṣv ihaa dharmaśīlo naro vidvān īhako nīhako pi vāc ātmabhūtaḥ sadā loke cared bhūtāny ahiṃsayana yadā vyapetahṛllekhaṃ mano bhavati tasya vaic nānṛtaṃ caiva bhavati tadā kalyāṇam ṛcchati parāśara uvācaa eṣa dharmavidhis tāta gṛhasthasya prakīrtitaḥc tapovidhiṃ tu vakṣyāmi tan me nigadataḥ śṛṇua prāyeṇa hi gṛhasthasya mamatvaṃ nāma jāyatec saṅgāgataṃ naraśreṣṭha bhāvais tāmasarājasaiḥa gṛhāṇy āśritya gāvaś ca kṣetrāṇi ca dhanāni cac dārāḥ putrāś ca bhṛtyāś ca bhavantīha narasya vaia evaṃ tasya pravṛttasya nityam evānupaśyataḥc rāgadveṣau vivardhete hy anityatvam apaśyataḥa rāgadveṣābhibhūtaṃ ca naraṃ dravyavaśānugamc mohajātā ratir nāma samupaiti narādhipaa kṛtārtho bhogato bhūtvā sa vai ratiparāyaṇaḥc lābhaṃ grāmyasukhād anyaṃ ratito nānupaśyatia tato lobhābhibhūtātmā saṅgād vardhayate janamc puṣṭyarthaṃ caiva tasyeha janasyārthaṃ cikīrṣatia sa jānann api cākāryam arthārthaṃ sevate naraḥc bālasnehaparītātmā tatkṣayāc cānutapyatea tato mānena saṃpanno rakṣann ātmaparājayamc karoti yena bhogī syām iti tasmād vinaśyatia tapo hi buddhiyuktānāṃ śāśvataṃ brahmadarśanamc anvicchatāṃ śubhaṃ karma narāṇāṃ tyajatāṃ sukhama snehāyatananāśāc ca dhananāśāc ca pārthivac ādhivyādhipratāpāc ca nirvedam upagacchatia nirvedād ātmasaṃbodhaḥ saṃbodhāc chāstradarśanamc śāstrārthadarśanād rājaṃs tapa evānupaśyatia durlabho hi manuṣyendra naraḥ pratyavamarśavānc yo vai priyasukhe kṣīṇe tapaḥ kartuṃ vyavasyatia tapaḥ sarvagataṃ tāta hīnasyāpi vidhīyatec jitendriyasya dāntasya svargamārgapradeśakama prajāpatiḥ prajāḥ pūrvam asṛjat tapasā vibhuḥc kva cit kva cid vrataparo vratāny āsthāya pārthivaa ādityā vasavo rudrās tathaivāgny aśvimārutāḥc viśvedevās tathā sādhyāḥ pitaro tha marudgaṇāḥa yakṣarākṣasagandharvāḥ siddhāś cānye divaukasaḥc saṃsiddhās tapasā tāta ye cānye svargavāsinaḥa ye cādau brahmaṇā sṛṣṭā brāhmaṇās tapasā purāc te bhāvayantaḥ pṛthivīṃ vicaranti divaṃ tathāa martyaloke ca rājāno ye cānye gṛhamedhinaḥc mahākuleṣu dṛśyante tat sarvaṃ tapasaḥ phalama kauśikāni ca vastrāṇi śubhāny ābharaṇāni cac vāhanāsanayānāni sarvaṃ tat tapasaḥ phalama manonukūlāḥ pramadā rūpavatyaḥ sahasraśaḥc vāsaḥ prāsādapṛṣṭhe ca tat sarvaṃ tapasaḥ phalama śayanāni ca mukhyāni bhojyāni vividhāni cac abhipretāni sarvāṇi bhavanti kṛtakarmaṇāma nāprāpyaṃ tapasā kiṃ cit trailokye smin paraṃtapac upabhogaparityāgaḥ phalāny akṛtakarmaṇāma sukhito duḥkhito vāpi naro lobhaṃ parityajetc avekṣya manasā śāstraṃ buddhyā ca nṛpasattamaa asaṃtoṣo sukhāyaiva lobhād indriyavibhramaḥc tato sya naśyati prajñā vidyevābhyāsavarjitāa naṣṭaprajño yadā bhavati tadā nyāyaṃ na paśyatic tasmāt sukhakṣaye prāpte pumān ugraṃ tapaś careta yad iṣṭaṃ tat sukhaṃ prāhur dveṣyaṃ duḥkham ihocyatec kṛtākṛtasya tapasaḥ phalaṃ paśyasva yādṛśama nityaṃ bhadrāṇi paśyanti viṣayāṃś copabhuñjatec prākāśyaṃ caiva gacchanti kṛtvā niṣkalmaṣaṃ tapaḥa apriyāṇy avamānāṃś ca duḥkhaṃ bahuvidhātmakamc phalārthī satpathatyaktaḥ prāpnoti viṣayātmakama dharme tapasi dāne ca vicikitsāsya jāyatec sa kṛtvā pāpakāny eva nirayaṃ pratipadyatea sukhe tu vartamāno vai duḥkhe vāpi narottamac svavṛttād yo na calati śāstracakṣuḥ sa mānavaḥa iṣuprapātamātraṃ hi sparśayoge ratiḥ smṛtāc rasane darśane ghrāṇe śravaṇe ca viśāṃ patea tato sya jāyate tīvrā vedanā tatkṣayāt punaḥc budhā yena praśaṃsanti mokṣaṃ sukham anuttamama tataḥ phalārthaṃ carati bhavanti jyāyaso guṇāḥc dharmavṛttyā ca satataṃ kāmārthābhyāṃ na hīyatea aprayatnāgatāḥ sevyā gṛhasthair viṣayāḥ sadāc prayatnenopagamyaś ca svadharma iti me matiḥa mānināṃ kulajātānāṃ nityaṃ śāstrārthacakṣuṣāmc dharmakriyāviyuktānām aśaktyā saṃvṛtātmanāma kriyamāṇaṃ yadā karma nāśaṃ gacchati mānuṣamc teṣāṃ nānyad ṛte loke tapasaḥ karma vidyatea sarvātmanā tu kurvīta gṛhasthaḥ karmaniścayamc dākṣyeṇa havyakavyārthaṃ svadharmaṃ vicaren nṛpaa yathā nadīnadāḥ sarve sāgare yānti saṃsthitimc evam āśramiṇaḥ sarve gṛhasthe yānti saṃsthitim janaka uvācaa varṇo viśeṣavarṇānāṃ maharṣe kena jāyatec etad icchāmy ahaṃ śrotuṃ tad brūhi vadatāṃ varaa yad etaj jāyate patyaṃ sa evāyam iti śrutiḥc kathaṃ brāhmaṇato jāto viśeṣagrahaṇaṃ gataḥ parāśara uvācaa evam etan mahārāja yena jātaḥ sa eva saḥc tapasas tv apakarṣeṇa jātigrahaṇatāṃ gataḥa sukṣetrāc ca subījāc ca puṇyo bhavati saṃbhavaḥc ato nyatarato hīnād avaro nāma jāyatea vaktrād bhujābhyām ūrubhyāṃ padbhyāṃ caivātha jajñirec sṛjataḥ prajāpater lokān iti dharmavido viduḥa mukhajā brāhmaṇās tāta bāhujāḥ kṣatrabandhavaḥc ūrujā dhanino rājan pādajāḥ paricārakāḥa caturṇām eva varṇānām āgamaḥ puruṣarṣabhac ato nye tv atiriktā ye te vai saṃkarajāḥ smṛtāḥa kṣatrajātir athāmbaṣṭhā ugrā vaidehakās tathāc śvapākāḥ pulkasāḥ stenā niṣādāḥ sūtamāgadhāḥa āyogāḥ karaṇā vrātyāś caṇḍālāś ca narādhipac ete caturbhyo varṇebhyo jāyante vai parasparam janaka uvācaa brahmaṇaikena jātānāṃ nānātvaṃ gotrataḥ kathamc bahūnīha hi loke vai gotrāṇi munisattamaa yatra tatra kathaṃ jātāḥ svayoniṃ munayo gatāḥc śūdrayonau samutpannā viyonau ca tathāpare parāśara uvācaa rājan naitad bhaved grāhyam apakṛṣṭena janmanāc mahātmanāṃ samutpattis tapasā bhāvitātmanāma utpādya putrān munayo nṛpate yatra tatra hac svenaiva tapasā teṣām ṛṣitvaṃ vidadhuḥ punaḥa pitāmahaś ca me pūrvam ṛśyaśṛṅgaś ca kāśyapaḥc vaṭas tāṇḍyaḥ kṛpaś caiva kakṣīvān trayo varṇā dvijātayaḥc atra teṣām adhīkāro dharmeṣu dvipadāṃ varaa vikarmāvasthitā varṇāḥ patanti nṛpate trayaḥc unnamanti yathāsantam āśrityeha svakarmasua na cāpi śūdraḥ patatīti niścayona cāpi saṃskāram ihārhatīti vāc śrutipravṛttaṃ na ca dharmam āpnutena cāsya dharme pratiṣedhanaṃ kṛtama vaidehakaṃ śūdram udāharantidvijā mahārāja śrutopapannāḥc ahaṃ hi paśyāmi narendra devaṃviśvasya viṣṇuṃ ca śerate janaka uvācaa kiṃ karma dūṣayaty enam atha jātir mahāmunec saṃdeho me samutpannas tan me vyākhyātum arhasi parāśara uvācaa asaṃśayaṃ mahārāja ubhayaṃ doṣakārakamc karma caiva hi jātiś ca vāyuruccāvacaṃ viṣayaṃ yaḥ sa vedaa aduṣṭaṃ vartamāne tu hṛdayāntarapūruṣec tenaiva devāḥ prīyante satāṃ mārgasthitena vaia śiśnodare ye bhiratāḥ sadaivastenā narā vākparuṣāś ca nityamc apetadoṣān iti āhuḥsatyaṃ vaded vyāhṛtaṃ tad dvitīyamc dharmaṃ vaded vyāhṛtaṃ tat tṛtīyaṃpriyaṃ vaded vyāhṛtaṃ tac caturtham sādhyā ūcuḥa kenāyam āvṛto lokaḥ kena vā na prakāśatec kena tyajati mitrāṇi kena svargaṃ caa saṃvāda ity ayaṃ śreṣṭhaḥ sādhyānāṃ parikīrtitaḥc kṣetraṃ vai karmaṇāṃ yoniḥ sadbhāvaḥ satyam ucyate yudhiṣṭhira uvācaa sāṃkhye yoge ca me tāta viśeṣaṃ vaktum arhasic tava sarvajña sarvaṃ hi viditaṃ kurusattama bhīṣma uvācaa sāṃkhyāḥ sāṃkhyaṃ praśaṃsanti yogā yogaṃ dvijātayaḥc vadanti kāraṇaiḥ śraiṣṭhyaṃ svapakṣodbhāvanāya vaia anīśvaraḥ kathaṃ mucyed ity evaṃ śatrukarśanac vadanti mahāprājñāḥ sāṃkhyaṃ vai mokṣadarśanama svapakṣe kāraṇaṃ grāhyaṃ samarthaṃ vacanaṃ hitamc śiṣṭānāṃ hi mataṃ grāhyaṃ tvadvidhaiḥ śiṣṭasaṃmataiḥa pratyakṣahetavo yogāḥ sāṃkhyāḥ śāstraviniścayāḥc ubhe caite mate tattve mama tāta yudhiṣṭhiraa ubhe caite mate jñāne nṛpate śiṣṭasaṃmatec anuṣṭhite yathāśāstraṃ nayetāṃ paramāṃ gatima tulyaṃ śaucaṃ tayor yuktaṃ dayā bhūteṣu cānaghac vratānāṃ dhāraṇaṃ bhīṣma uvācaa rāgaṃ mohaṃ tathā snehaṃ kāmaṃ krodhaṃ ca kevalamc yogāc chittvādito doṣān pañcaitān prāpnuvanti tata yathā cānimiṣāḥ sthūlā jālaṃ chittvā punar jalamc prāpnuvanti tathā yogās tat padaṃ vītakalmaṣāḥa tathaiva vāgurāṃ chittvā balavanto yathā mṛgāḥc prāpnuyur vimalaṃ mārgaṃ vimuktāḥ sarvabandhanaiḥa lobhajāni tathā rājan bandhanāni balānvitāḥc chittvā yogāḥ paraṃ mārgaṃ gacchanti vimalāḥ śivama abalāś ca mṛgā rājan vāgurāsu tathāparec vinaśyanti na saṃdehas tadvad yogabalād ṛtea balahīnāś ca kaunteya yathā jālagatā jhaṣāḥc antaṃ gacchanti rājendra tathā yogāḥ sudurbalāḥa yathā yathā rājan vahniḥ śāmyati durbalaḥc ākrānta indhanaiḥ sthūlais tadvad yogo balaḥ prabhoa sa eva ca yadā rājan vahnir jātabalaḥ punaḥc samīraṇayutaḥ kṛtsnāṃ dahet kṣipraṃ mahīm apia tadvaj jātabalo yogī dīptatejā mahābalaḥc antakāla ivādityaḥ kṛtsnaṃ saṃśoṣayej jagata durbalaś ca yathā rājan srotasā hriyate naraḥc balahīnas tathā yogo viṣayair hriyate vaśaḥa tad eva ca yathā sroto viṣṭambhayati vāraṇaḥc tadvad yogabalaṃ labdhvā vyūhate viṣayān bahūna viśanti cāvaśāḥ pārtha yogā yogabalānvitāḥc prajāpatīn ṛṣīn devān mahābhūtāni ceśvarāḥa na yamo nāntakaḥ kruddho na mṛtyur bhīmavikramaḥc īśate nṛpate sarve yogasyāmitatejasaḥa ātmanāṃ ca sahasrāṇi bahūni bharatarṣabhac yogaḥ kuryād balaṃ prāpya taiś ca sarvair mahīṃ careta prāpnuyād viṣayāṃś caiva punaś cograṃ tapaś caretc saṃkṣipec ca punaḥ pārtha sūryas tejoguṇān ivaa balasthasya hi yogasya bandhaneśasya pārthivac vimokṣaprabhaviṣṇutvam upapannam asaṃśayama balāni yoge proktāni mayaitāni viśāṃ patec nidarśanārthaṃ sūkṣmāṇi vakṣyāmi ca yuktvā sadaśvān susamāhitaḥc deśam iṣṭaṃ nayaty āśu dhanvinaṃ puruṣarṣabhaa tathaiva nṛpate yogī dhāraṇāsu samāhitaḥc prāpnoty āśu paraṃ sthānaṃ lakṣaṃ mukta ivāśugaḥa āveśyātmani cātmānaṃ yogī vijñāya tattvena pralaye prekṣaṇaṃ tathāa jñānavijñānasaṃpannāḥ kāraṇair bhāvitāḥ śubhaiḥc prāpnuvanti śubhaṃ mokṣaṃ sūkṣmā iha nabhaḥ parama rūpeṇa dṛṣṭiṃ saṃyuktāṃ ghrāṇaṃ gandhaguṇena cac śabde devīṃ tathā saktām apas tejasi cāśritāḥa tejo vāyau tu saṃsaktaṃ vāyuṃ nabhasi cāśritamc nabho mahati saṃyuktaṃ mahad buddhau ca saṃśritama buddhiṃ tamasi saṃsaktāṃ tamo rajasi cāśritamc rajaḥ sattve tathā saktaṃ sattvaṃ saktaṃ tathātmania saktam ātmānam īśe ca deve nārāyaṇe tathāc devaṃ mokṣe ca saṃsaktaṃ mokṣaṃ saktaṃ tu na kva cita jñātvā sattvayutaṃ dehaṃ vṛtaṃ ṣoḍaśabhir guṇaiḥc svabhāvaṃ cetanāṃ caiva jñātvā vai deham āśritea madhyastham ekam ātmānaṃ pāpaṃ yasmin na vidyatec dvitīyaṃ karma vijñāya nṛpate viṣayaiṣiṇāma indriyāṇīndriyārthāṃś ca sarvān ātmani saṃśritānb durlabhatvaṃ ca niṣkaivalyena pāpena tiryagyonim avāpnuyātc puṇyapāpena mānuṣyaṃ puṇyenaikena devatāḥa evam avyaktaviṣayaṃ kṣaram āhur manīṣiṇaḥc pañcaviṃśatimo yo yaṃ jñānād eva pravartate vasiṣṭha uvācaa evam apratibuddhatvād abuddham anuvartatec dehād dehasahasrāṇi tathā samabhipadyatea tiryagyonisahasreṣu kadā cid devatāsv apic upapadyati saṃyogād guṇaiḥ saha guṇakṣayāta mānuṣatvād divaṃ yāti divo mānuṣyam eva cac mānuṣyān nirayasthānam ānantyaṃ pratipadyatea kośakāro yathātmānaṃ kīṭaḥ samanurundhatic sūtratantuguṇair nityaṃ tathāyam aguṇo guṇaiḥa dvaṃdvam eti ca nirdvaṃdvas tāsu tāsv iha yoniṣuc śīrṣaroge kṣiroge ca dantaśūle galagrahea jalodare rśasāṃ roge jvaragaṇḍaviṣūcikec śvitre kuṣṭhe gnidāhe ca sidhmāpasmārayor apia yāni cānyāni dvaṃdvāni prākṛtāni śarīriṣuc utpadyante vicitrāṇi tāny eṣo py abhimanyated tiryagyonisahasreṣu kadā cid devatāsv apie abhimanyaty abhīmānāt tathaiva sukṛtāny apia ekavāsāś ca durvāsāḥ śāyī nityam adhas tathāc maṇḍūkaśāyī ca tathā vīrāsanagatas tathāa cīradhāraṇam ākāśe śayanaṃ sthānam eva cac iṣṭakāprastare caiva kaṇṭakaprastare tathāa bhasmaprastaraśāyī ca bhūmiśayyānulepanaḥc vīrasthānāmbupaṅke ca śayanaṃ phalakeṣu caa vividhāsu ca śayyāsu phalagṛddhyānvito phalaḥc muñjamekhalanagnatvaṃ kṣaumakṛṣṇājināni caa śāṇīvālaparīdhāno vyāghracarmaparicchadaḥc siṃhacarmaparīdhānaḥ paṭṭavāsās tathaiva cad phalakaṃ paridhānaś ca tathā kaṇṭakavastradhṛka kīṭakāvasanaś caiva cīravāsās tathaiva cac vastrāṇi cānyāni bahūny abhimanyaty abuddhimāna bhojanāni vicitrāṇi ratnāni vividhāni cac ekavastrāntarāśitvam ekakālikabhojanama caturthāṣṭamakālaś ca ṣaṣṭhakālika eva cac ṣaḍrātrabhojanaś caiva tathaivāṣṭāhabhojanaḥa saptarātradaśāhāro dvādaśāhāra eva cac māsopavāsī mūlāśī phalāhāras tathaiva caa vāyubhakṣo mbupiṇyākagomayādana eva cac gomūtrabhojanaś caiva śākapuṣpāda eva caa śaivālabhojanaś caiva tathācāmena vartayanc vartayañ śīrṇaparṇaiś ca prakīrṇaphalabhojanaḥa vividhāni ca kṛcchrāṇi sevate sukhakāṅkṣayāc cāndrāyaṇāni vidhival liṅgāni vividhāni caa cāturāśramyapanthānam āśrayaty āśramān apic upāsīnaś ca pāṣaṇḍān guhāḥ śailāṃs tathaiva caa viviktāś ca śilāchāyās tathā prasravaṇāni cab pulināni viviktāni viviktāni vanāni cab devasthānāni puṇyāni viviktāni sarāṃsi cab viviktāś cāpi śailānāṃ guhā gṛhanibhopamāḥc vividhāni ca japyāni vividhāni vratāni caa niyamān suvicitrāṃś ca vividhāni tapāṃsi cac yajñāṃś ca vividhākārān vidhīṃś ca vividhāṃs tathāa vaṇikpathaṃ dvijakṣatraṃ vaiśyaśūdraṃ tathaiva cac dānaṃ ca vividhākāraṃ dīnāndhakṛpaṇeṣv apia abhimanyaty asaṃbodhāt tathaiva trividhān guṇānc sattvaṃ rajas tamaś caiva dharmārthau kāma eva cae prakṛtyātmānam evātmā evaṃ pravibhajaty utaa svadhākāravaṣaṭkārau svāhākāranamaskriyāḥc yājanādhyāpanaṃ dānaṃ tathaivāhuḥ pratigrahame yajanādhyayane caiva yac cānyad api kiṃ canaa janmamṛtyuvivāde ca tathā viśasane pi cac śubhāśubhamayaṃ sarvam etad āhuḥ kriyāpathama prakṛtiḥ kurute devī mahāpralayam eva cac divasānte guṇān etān abhyetyaiko vatiṣṭhatia raśmijālam ivādityas tatkālena niyacchatic evam eṣo sakṛt sarvaṃ krīḍārtham abhimanyatea ātmarūpaguṇān etān vividhān hṛdayapriyānc evam eva vikurvāṇaḥ sargapralayakarmaṇīa kriyākriyā pathe raktas triguṇas triguṇātigaḥc kriyākriyāpathopetas tathā tad iti manyated prakṛtyā sarvam evedaṃ jagad andhīkṛtaṃ vibhod rajasā tamasā caiva vyāptaṃ sarvam anekadhāa evaṃ dvaṃdvāny athaitāni vartante mama nityaśaḥc mamaivaitāni jāyante bādhante tāni mām itia nistartavyāny athaitāni sarvāṇīti narādhipac manyate yaṃ hy abuddhitvāt tathaiva sukṛtāny apia bhoktavyāni mayaitāni devalokagatena vaic ihaiva cainaṃ bhokṣyāmi śubhāśubhaphalodayama sukham eva ca kartavyaṃ sakṛt kṛtvā sukhaṃ mamab sukhārthī ca tyajed duḥkhaṃ sukhaduḥkhaviparyayamc yāvadantaṃ ca me saukhyaṃ jātyāṃ jātyāṃ bhaviṣyatia bhaviṣyati ca me duḥkhaṃ kṛtenehāpy anantakamc mahad duḥkhaṃ hi mānuṣyaṃ niraye cāpi majjanama nirayāc cāpi mānuṣyaṃ kālenaiṣyāmy ahaṃ punaḥc manuṣyatvāc ca devatvaṃ devatvāt pauruṣaṃ punaḥe manuṣyatvāc ca nirayaṃ paryāyeṇopagacchatif evaṃ paryāyaśo duḥkhaṃ punar eṣyāmy ahaṃ sukhama ya evaṃ vetti vai nityaṃ nirātmātmaguṇair vṛtaḥc tena devamanuṣyeṣu niraye copapadyatea mamatvenāvṛto nityaṃ tatraiva parivartatec sargakoṭisahasrāṇi maraṇāntāsu mūrtiṣua ya evaṃ kurute karma śubhāśubhaphalātmakamc sa eva phalam aśnāti triṣu lokeṣu mūrtimāna prakṛtiḥ kurute karma śubhāśubhaphalātmakamc prakṛtiś ca tad aśnāti triṣu lokeṣu kāmagāa tiryagyonau manuṣyatve devaloke tathaiva cac trīṇi sthānāni caitāni jānīyāt prākṛtāni haa aliṅgāṃ prakṛtiṃ tv āhur liṅgair anumimīmahec tathaiva pauruṣaṃ liṅgam anumānād dhi paśyatia sa liṅgāntaram āsādya prākṛtaṃ liṅgam avraṇamc vraṇadvārāṇy adhiṣṭhāya karmāṇy ātmani manyatea śrotrādīni tu sarvāṇi pañca karmendriyāṇi cac vāg ādīni pravartante guṇeṣv eva guṇaiḥ sahae aham etāni vai kurvan mamaitānīndriyāṇi caa nirindriyo bhimanyeta vraṇavān asmi nirvraṇaḥc aliṅgo liṅgam ātmānam akālaḥ kālam ātmanaḥa asattvaṃ sattvam ātmānam atattvaṃ tattvam ātmanaḥc amṛtyur mṛtyum ātmānam acaraś caram ātmanaḥa akṣetraḥ kṣetram ātmānam asargaḥ sargam ātmanaḥc atapās tapa ātmānam agatir gatim ātmanaḥa abhavo bhavam ātmānam abhayo bhayam ātmanaḥb akartā kartṛ cātmānam abījo bījam ātmanaḥc akṣaraḥ kṣaram ātmānam abuddhis tv abhimanyate vasiṣṭha uvācaa evam apratibuddhatvād abuddhajanasevanātc sargakoṭisahasrāṇi patanāntāni gacchatia dhāmnā dhāmasahasrāṇi maraṇāntāni gacchatic tiryagyonau manuṣyatve devaloke tathaiva caa candramā iva kośānāṃ punas tatra sahasraśaḥc līyate pratibuddhatvād evam eṣa hy abuddhimāna kalāḥ pañcadaśā yonis tad dhāma iti paṭhyatec nityam etad vijānīhi somaḥ ṣoḍaśamī kalāa kalāyāṃ jāyate jasraṃ punaḥ punar abuddhimānc dhāma tasyopayuñjanti bhūya eva tu jāyatea ṣoḍaśī tu kalā sūkṣmā sa soma upadhāryatāmc na tūpayujyate devair devān upayunakti sāa evaṃ tāṃ kṣapayitvā hi jāyate nṛpasattamac sā hy asya prakṛtir dṛṣṭā tatkṣayān mokṣa ucyatea tad evaṃ ṣoḍaśakalaṃ deham avyaktasaṃjñakamc mamāyam iti manvānas tatraiva parivartatea pañcaviṃśas tathaivātmā tasyaivā pratibodhanātc vimalasya viśuddhasya śuddhānilaniṣevaṇāta aśuddha eva śuddhātmā tādṛg bhavati pārthivac abuddhasevanāc cāpi buddho py abudhatāṃ vrajeta tathaivāpratibuddho pi jñeyo nṛpatisattamac prakṛtes triguṇāyās tu sevanāt prākṛto bhavet karālajanaka uvācaa akṣarakṣarayor eṣa dvayoḥ saṃbandha iṣyatec strīpuṃsor vāpi bhagavan saṃbandhas tadvad ucyatea ṛte na puruṣeṇeha strī garbhaṃ dhārayaty utac ṛte striyaṃ na puruṣo rūpaṃ nirvartayet tathāa anyonyasyābhisaṃbandhād anyonyaguṇasaṃśrayātc rūpaṃ nirvartayaty etad evaṃ sarvāsu yoniṣua ratyartham abhisaṃrodhād anyonyaguṇasaṃśrayātc ṛtau nirvartate rūpaṃ tad vakṣyāmi nidarśanama ye guṇāḥ puruṣasyeha ye ca mātṛguṇās tathāc asthi snāyu ca majjā ca jānīmaḥ pitṛto dvijaa tvaṅ māṃsaṃ śoṇitaṃ caiva mātṛjāny api śuśrumac evam etad dvijaśreṣṭha vedaśāstreṣu paṭhyatea pramāṇaṃ yac ca vedoktaṃ śāstroktaṃ yac ca paṭhyatec vedaśāstrapramāṇaṃ ca pramāṇaṃ tat sanātanama evam evābhisaṃbaddhau nityaṃ prakṛtipūruṣauc paśyāmi bhagavaṃs tasmān mokṣadharmo na vidyatea atha vānantarakṛtaṃ kiṃ cid eva nidarśanamc tan mamācakṣva tattvena pratyakṣo hy asi sarvathāa mokṣakāmā vayaṃ cāpi kāṅkṣāmo yad anāmayamc adeham ajaraṃ divyam atīndriyam anīśvaram vasiṣṭha uvācaa yad etad uktaṃ bhavatā vedaśāstranidarśanamc evam etad yathā caitan na gṛhṇāti tathā bhavāna dhāryate hi tvayā grantha ubhayor vedaśāstrayoḥc na tu granthasya tattvajño yathāvat tvaṃ nareśvaraa yo hi vede ca śāstre ca granthadhāraṇatatparaḥc na ca granthārthatattvajñas tasya tad dhāraṇaṃ vṛthāa bhāraṃ sa vahate tasya granthasyārthaṃ na vetti yaḥc yas tu granthārthatattvajño nāsya granthāgamo vṛthāa granthasyārthaṃ ca pṛṣṭaḥ saṃs tādṛśo vaktum arhatic yathā tattvābhigamanād arthaṃ tasya sa vindatia yas tu saṃsatsu kathayed granthārthaṃ sthūlabuddhimānc sa kathaṃ mandavijñāno granthaṃ vakṣyati nirṇayāta nirṇayaṃ cāpi chidrātmā na taṃ vakṣyati tattvataḥc sopahāsātmatām eti yasmāc caivātmavān apia tasmāt tvaṃ śṛṇu rājendra yathaitad anudṛśyatec yāthātathyena sāṃkhyeṣu yogeṣu ca mahātmasua yad eva yogāḥ paśyanti sāṃkhyais tad anugamyatec ekaṃ sāṃkhyaṃ ca yogaṃ ca yaḥ paśyati sa buddhimāna tvaṅ māṃsaṃ rudhiraṃ medaḥ pittaṃ majjāsthi snāyu cac etad aindriyakaṃ tāta yad bhavān idam āha vaia dravyād dravyasya niṣpattir indriyād indriyaṃ tathāc dehād deham avāpnoti bījād bījaṃ tathaiva cad sūkṣmadehagatā mātrā bījāpyāyitavṛddhikāḥa nirindriyasyābījasya nirdravyasyāsya dehinaḥc kathaṃ guṇā bhaviṣyanti nirguṇatvān mahātmanaḥa guṇā guṇeṣu jāyante tatraiva niviśanti cac evaṃ guṇāḥ prakṛtito jāyante ca na santi caa tvaṅ māṃsaṃ rudhiraṃ medaḥ pittaṃ majjāsthi snāyu cac aṣṭau tāny atha śukreṇa jānīhi prākṛtāni vaia pumāṃś caivāpumāṃś caiva trailiṅgyaṃ prākṛtaṃ smṛtamc naiva pumān pumāṃś caiva sa liṅgīty abhidhīyatea aliṅgā prakṛtir liṅgair upalabhyati sātmajaiḥc yathā puṣpaphalair nityam ṛtavo mūrtayas tathāa evam apy anumānena hy aliṅgam upalabhyatec pañcaviṃśatimas tāta liṅgeṣv aniyatātmakaḥa anādinidhano nantaḥ sarvadarśī nirāmayaḥc kevalaṃ tv abhimānitvād guṇeṣv aguṇa ucyatea guṇā guṇavataḥ santi nirguṇasya kuto guṇāḥc tasmād evaṃ vijānanti ye janā guṇadarśinaḥa yadā tv eṣa guṇān sarvān prākṛtān abhimanyatec tadā sa guṇavān eva parameṇānupaśyatia yat tad buddheḥ paraṃ prāhuḥ sāṃkhyā yogāś ca sarvaśaḥc budhyamānaṃ mahāprājñam abuddhaparivarjanāta aprabuddham athāvyaktaṃ saguṇaṃ prāhur īśvaramc nirguṇaṃ ceśvaraṃ nityam adhiṣṭhātāram eva caa prakṛteś ca guṇānāṃ ca pañcaviṃśatikaṃ budhāḥc sāṃkhyayoge ca kuśalā budhyante paramaiṣiṇaḥa yadā prabuddhās tv avyaktam avasthājanmabhīravaḥc budhyamānaṃ prabudhyanti gamayanti samaṃ tadāa etan nidarśanaṃ samyag asamyag anudarśanamc budhyamānāprabuddhābhyāṃ pṛthak pṛthag ariṃdamaa paraspareṇaitad uktaṃ kṣarākṣaranidarśanamc ekatvam akṣaraṃ prāhur nānātvaṃ kṣaram ucyatea pañcaviṃśatiniṣṭho yaṃ yadāsamyak pravartatec ekatvaṃ darśanaṃ cāsya nānātvaṃ cāpy adarśanama tattvanistattvayor etat pṛthag eva nidarśanamc pañcaviṃśatisargaṃ tu tattvam āhur manīṣiṇaḥa nistattvaṃ pañcaviṃśasya param āhur nidarśanamc vargasya vargam ācāraṃ tattvaṃ tattvāt sanātanam karālajanaka uvācaa nānātvaikatvam ity uktaṃ tvayaitad ṛṣisattamac paśyāmi cābhisaṃdigdham etayor vai nidarśanama tathāprabuddhabuddhābhyāṃ budhyamānasya cānaghac sthūlabuddhyā na paśyāmi tattvam etan na saṃśayaḥa akṣarakṣarayor uktaṃ tvayā yad api kāraṇamc tad apy asthirabuddhitvāt pranaṣṭam iva me naghaa tad etac chrotum icchāmi nānātvaikatvadarśanamc buddham apratibuddhaṃ ca budhyamānaṃ ca tattvataḥa vidyāvidye ca bhagavann akṣaraṃ kṣaram eva cac sāṃkhyaṃ yogaṃ ca kārtsnyena pṛthak caivāpṛthak ca ha vasiṣṭha uvācaa hanta te saṃpravakṣyāmi yad etad anupṛcchasic yogakṛtyaṃ mahārāja pṛthag eva śṛṇuṣva mea yogakṛtyaṃ tu yogānāṃ dhyānam eva paraṃ balamc tac cāpi dvividhaṃ dhyānam āhur vedavido janāḥa ekāgratā ca manasaḥ prāṇāyāmas tathaiva cac prāṇāyāmas tu saguṇo nirguṇo manasas tathāa mūtrotsarge purīṣe ca bhojane ca narādhipac trikālaṃ nābhiyuñjīta śeṣaṃ yuñjīta tatparaḥa indriyāṇīndriyārthebhyo nivartya manasā muniḥc daśadvādaśabhir vāpi caturviṃśāt paraṃ tataḥa taṃ codanābhir matimān ātmānaṃ codayed athac tiṣṭhantam ajaraṃ taṃ tu yat tad uktaṃ manīṣibhiḥa taiś cātmā satataṃ jñeya ity evam anuśuśrumac dravyaṃ hy ahīnamanaso nānyatheti viniścayaḥa vimuktaḥ sarvasaṅgebhyo laghvāhāro jitendriyaḥc pūrvarātre pare caiva dhārayeta mano tmania sthirīkṛtyendriyagrāmaṃ manasā mithileśvarac mano buddhyā sthiraṃ kṛtvā pāṣāṇa iva niścalaḥa sthāṇuvac cāpy akampaḥ syād girivac cāpi niścalaḥc budhā vidhividhānajñās tadā yuktaṃ pracakṣatea na śṛṇoti na cāghrāti na rasyati na paśyatic na ca sparśaṃ vijānāti na saṃkalpayate manaḥa na cābhimanyate kiṃ cin na ca budhyati kāṣṭhavatc tadā prakṛtim āpannaṃ yuktam āhur manīṣiṇaḥa nivāte ca yathā dīpyan dīpas tadvat sa dṛśyatec niriṅgaś cācalaś cordhvaṃ na tiryaggatim āpnuyāta tadā tam anupaśyeta yasmin dṛṣṭe tu kathyatec hṛdayastho ntarātmeti jñeyo jñas tāta madvidhaiḥa vidhūma iva saptārcir āditya iva raśmimānc vaidyuto gnir ivākāśe dṛśyate tmā tathātmania yaṃ paśyanti mahātmāno dhṛtimanto manīṣiṇaḥc brāhmaṇā brahmayoniṣṭhā hy ayonim amṛtātmakama tad evāhur aṇubhyo ṇu tan mahadbhyo mahattaramc tadantaḥ sarvabhūteṣu dhruvaṃ tiṣṭhan na dṛśyatea buddhidravyeṇa dṛśyeta manodīpena lokakṛtc mahatas tamasas tāta pāre tiṣṭhann atāmasaḥa sa tamonuda ity uktas tattvajñair vedapāragaiḥc vimalo vitamaskaś ca nirliṅgo liṅgasaṃjñitaḥa yogam etad dhi yogānāṃ manye yogasya lakṣaṇamc evaṃ paśyaṃ prapaśyanti ātmānam ajaraṃ parama yogadarśanam etāvad uktaṃ te tattvato mayāc sāṃkhyajñānaṃ pravakṣyāmi parisaṃkhyānidarśanama avyaktam āhuḥ prakṛtiṃ parāṃ prakṛtivādinaḥc tasmān mahat samutpannaṃ dvitīyaṃ rājasattamaa ahaṃkāras tu mahatas tṛtīyam iti naḥ śrutamc pañca bhūtāny ahaṃkārād āhuḥ sāṃkhyānudarśinaḥa etāḥ prakṛtayas tv aṣṭau vikārāś cāpi ṣoḍaśac pañca caiva viśeṣā vai tathā pañcendriyāṇi caa etāvad eva tattvānāṃ sāṃkhyam āhur manīṣiṇaḥc sāṃkhye vidhividhānajñā nityaṃ sāṃkhyapathe ratāḥa yasmād yad abhijāyeta tat tatraiva pralīyatec līyante pratilomāni sṛjyante cāntarātmanāa anulomena jāyante līyante pratilomataḥc guṇā guṇeṣu satataṃ sāgarasyormayo yathāa sargapralaya etāvān prakṛter nṛpasattamac ekatvaṃ pralaye cāsya bahutvaṃ ca yadāsṛjate evam eva ca rājendra vijñeyaṃ jñeyacintakaiḥa adhiṣṭhātāram avyaktam asyāpy etan nidarśanamc ekatvaṃ ca bahutvaṃ ca prakṛter anu tattvavāne ekatvaṃ pralaye cāsya bahutvaṃ ca pravartanāta bahudhātmā prakurvīta prakṛtiṃ prasavātmikāmc tac ca kṣetraṃ mahān ātmā pañcaviṃśo dhitiṣṭhatia adhiṣṭhāteti rājendra procyate yatisattamaiḥc adhiṣṭhānād adhiṣṭhātā kṣetrāṇām iti naḥ śrutama kṣetraṃ jānāti cāvyaktaṃ kṣetrajña iti cocyatec avyaktike pure śete puruṣaś ceti kathyatea anyad eva ca kṣetraṃ syād anyaḥ kṣetrajña ucyatec kṣetram avyaktam ity uktaṃ jñātā vai pañcaviṃśakaḥa anyad eva ca jñānaṃ syād anyaj jñeyaṃ tad ucyatec jñānam avyaktam ity uktaṃ jñeyo vai pañcaviṃśakaḥa avyaktaṃ kṣetram ity uktaṃ tathā sattvaṃ tatheśvaramc anīśvaram atattvaṃ ca tattvaṃ tat pañcaviṃśakama sāṃkhyadarśanam etāvat parisaṃkhyānadarśanamc sāṃkhyaṃ prakurute caiva prakṛtiṃ ca pracakṣatea tattvāni ca caturviṃśat parisaṃkhyāya tattvataḥc sāṃkhyāḥ saha prakṛtyā tu nistattvaḥ pañcaviṃśakaḥa pañcaviṃśo prabuddhātmā budhyamāna iti smṛtaḥc yadā tu budhyate tmānaṃ tadā bhavati kevalaḥa samyag darśanam etāvad bhāṣitaṃ tava tattvataḥc evam etad vijānantaḥ sāmyatāṃ pratiyānty utaa samyaṅ nidarśanaṃ nāma pratyakṣaṃ prakṛtes tathāc guṇatattvāny athaitāni nirguṇo nyas tathā bhaveta na tv evaṃ vartamānānām āvṛttir vidyate punaḥc vidyate kṣarabhāvatvād aparasparam avyayama paśyerann ekamatayo na samyak teṣu darśanamc te vyaktaṃ pratipadyante punaḥ punar ariṃdamaa sarvam etad vijānanto na sarvasya prabodhanātc vyaktībhūtā bhaviṣyanti vyaktasya vaśavartinaḥa sarvam avyaktam ity uktam asarvaḥ pañcaviṃśakaḥc ya enam abhijānanti na bhayaṃ teṣu vidyate vasiṣṭha uvācaa sāṃkhyadarśanam etāvad uktaṃ te nṛpasattamac vidyāvidye tv idānīṃ me tvaṃ nibodhānupūrvaśaḥa avidyām āhur avyaktaṃ sargapralayadharmi vaic sargapralayanirmuktaṃ vidyāṃ vai pañcaviṃśakama parasparam avidyāṃ vai tan nibodhānupūrvaśaḥc yathoktam ṛṣibhis tāta sāṃkhyasyāsya nidarśanama karmendriyāṇāṃ sarveṣāṃ vidyā buddhīndriyaṃ smṛtamc buddhīndriyāṇāṃ ca tathā viśeṣā iti naḥ śrutama viśeṣāṇāṃ manas teṣāṃ vidyām āhur manīṣiṇaḥc manasaḥ pañcabhūtāni vidyā ity abhicakṣatea ahaṃkāras tu bhūtānāṃ pañcānāṃ nātra saṃśayaḥc ahaṃkārasya ca tathā buddhir vidyā nareśvaraa buddheḥ prakṛtir avyaktaṃ tattvānāṃ parameśvaramc vidyā jñeyā naraśreṣṭha vidhiś ca paramaḥ smṛtaḥa avyaktasya paraṃ prāhur vidyāṃ vai pañcaviṃśakamc sarvasya sarvam ity uktaṃ jñeyaṃ jñānasya pārthivaa jñānam avyaktam ity uktaṃ jñeyaṃ vai pañcaviṃśakamc tathaiva jñānam avyaktaṃ vijñātā pañcaviṃśakaḥa vidyāvidyārthatattvena mayoktaṃ te viśeṣataḥc akṣaraṃ ca kṣaraṃ caiva yad uktaṃ tan nibodha mea ubhāv etau kṣarāv uktāv ubhāv etau ca nakṣarauc kāraṇaṃ tu pravakṣyāmi yathā khyātau tu tattvataḥa anādinidhanāv etāv ubhāv eveśvarau matauc tattvasaṃjñāv ubhāv etau procyete jñānacintakaiḥa sargapralayadharmitvād avyaktaṃ prāhur akṣaramc tad etad guṇasargāya vikurvāṇaṃ punaḥ punaḥa guṇānāṃ mahadādīnām utpadyati parasparamc adhiṣṭhānāt kṣetram āhur etat tat pañcaviṃśakama yadā tu guṇajālaṃ tad avyaktātmani saṃkṣipetc tadā saha guṇais tais tu pañcaviṃśo vilīyatea guṇā guṇeṣu līyante tadaikā prakṛtir bhavetc kṣetrajño pi yadā tāta tatkṣetre saṃpralīyatea tadākṣaratvaṃ prakṛtir gacchate guṇasaṃjñitāc nirguṇatvaṃ ca vaideha guṇeṣu prativartanāta evam eva ca kṣetrajñaḥ kṣetrajñānaparikṣayec prakṛtyā nirguṇas tv eṣa ity evam anuśuśrumaa kṣaro bhavaty eṣa yadā tadā guṇavatīm athac prakṛtiṃ tv abhijānāti nirguṇatvaṃ tathātmanaḥa tadā viśuddho bhavati prakṛteḥ parivarjanātc anyo ham anyeyam iti yadā budhyati buddhimāna tadaiṣo nyatvatām eti na ca miśratvam āvrajetc prakṛtyā caiva rājendra namiśro nyaś ca dṛśyatea yadā tu guṇajālaṃ tat prākṛtaṃ vijugupsatec paśyate cāparaṃ paśyaṃ tadā paśyan na saṃjvareta kiṃ mayā kṛtam etāvad yo haṃ kālam imaṃ janamc matsyo jālaṃ hy avijñānād anuvartitavāṃs tathāa aham eva hi saṃmohād anyam anyaṃ janāj janamc matsyo yathodakajñānād anuvartitavān ihaa matsyo nyatvaṃ yathājñānād udakān nābhimanyatec ātmānaṃ tadvad ajñānād anyatvaṃ caiva vedmy ahama mamāstu dhig abuddhasya yo haṃ magnam imaṃ punaḥc anuvartitavān mohād anyam anyaṃ janāj janama ayam atra bhaved bandhur anena saha mokṣaṇamc sāmyam ekatvam āyāto yādṛśas tādṛśas tv ahama tulyatām iha paśyāmi sadṛśo ham anena vaic ayaṃ hi vimalo vyaktam aham īdṛśakas tathāa yo ham ajñānasaṃmohād ajñayā saṃpravṛttavānc sasaṅgayāhaṃ niḥsaṅgaḥ sthitaḥ kālam imaṃ tv ahama anayāhaṃ vaśībhūtaḥ kālam etaṃ na buddhavānc uccamadhyamanīcānāṃ tām ahaṃ katham āvasea samānayānayā ceha sahavāsam ahaṃ kathamc gacchāmy abuddhabhāvatvād eṣedānīṃ sthiro bhavea sahavāsaṃ na yāsyāmi kālam etad dhi vañcanātc vañcito smy anayā yad dhi nirvikāro vikārayāa na cāyam aparādho syā aparādho hy ayaṃ mamac yo ham atrābhavaṃ saktaḥ parāṅmukham upasthitaḥa tato smi bahurūpāsu sthito mūrtiṣv amūrtimānc amūrtaś cāpi mūrtātmā mamatvena pradharṣitaḥa prakṛter anayatvena tāsu tāsv iha yoniṣuc nirmamasya mamatvena kiṃ kṛtaṃ tāsu tāsu cae yonīṣu vartamānena naṣṭasaṃjñena cetasāa na mamātrānayā kāryam ahaṃkārakṛtātmayāc ātmānaṃ bahudhā kṛtvā yeyaṃ bhūyo yunakti māme idānīm eṣa buddho smi nirmamo nirahaṃkṛtaḥa mamatvam anayā nityam ahaṃkārakṛtātmakamc apetyāham imāṃ hitvā saṃśrayiṣye nirāmayama anena sāmyaṃ yāsyāmi nānayāham acetasāc kṣamaṃ mama sahānena naikatvam anayā sahae evaṃ paramasaṃbodhāt pañcaviṃśo nubuddhavāna akṣaratvaṃ niyaccheta tyaktvā kṣaram anāmayamc avyaktaṃ vyaktadharmāṇaṃ saguṇaṃ nirguṇaṃ tathāe nirguṇaṃ prathamaṃ dṛṣṭvā tādṛg bhavati maithilaa akṣarakṣarayor etad uktaṃ tava nidarśanamc mayeha jñānasaṃpannaṃ yathāśrutinidarśanāta niḥsaṃdigdhaṃ ca sūkṣmaṃ ca vibuddhaṃ vimalaṃ tathāc pravakṣyāmi tu te bhūyas tan nibodha yathāśrutama sāṃkhyayogau mayā proktau śāstradvayanidarśanātc yad eva śāstraṃ sāṃkhyoktaṃ yogadarśanam eva tata prabodhanakaraṃ jñānaṃ sāṃkhyānām avanīpatec vispaṣṭaṃ procyate tatra śiṣyāṇāṃ hitakāmyayāa bṛhac caiva hi tac chāstram ity āhuḥ kuśalā janāḥc asmiṃś ca śāstre yogānāṃ punar dadhi punaḥ śaraḥa pañcaviṃśāt paraṃ tattvaṃ na paśyati narādhipac sāṃkhyānāṃ tu paraṃ tatra yathāvad anuvarṇitama buddham apratibuddhaṃ ca budhyamānaṃ ca tattvataḥc budhyamānaṃ ca buddhaṃ ca prāhur yoganidarśanam vasiṣṭha uvācaa aprabuddham athāvyaktam imaṃ guṇavidhiṃ śṛṇuc guṇān dhārayate hy eṣā sṛjaty ākṣipate tathāa ajasraṃ tv iha krīḍārthaṃ vikurvantī narādhipac ātmānaṃ bahudhā kṛtvā tāny eva ca vicakṣatea etad evaṃ vikurvāṇāṃ budhyamāno na budhyatec avyaktabodhanāc caiva budhyamānaṃ vadanty apia na tv eva budhyate vyaktaṃ saguṇaṃ vātha nirguṇamc kadā cit tv eva khalv etad āhur apratibuddhakama budhyate yadi vāvyaktam etad vai pañcaviṃśakamc budhyamāno bhavaty eṣa saṅgātmaka iti śrutiḥa anenāpratibuddheti vadanty avyaktam acyutamc avyaktabodhanāc caiva budhyamānaṃ vadanty utaa pañcaviṃśaṃ mahātmānaṃ na cāsāv api budhyatec ṣaḍviṃśaṃ vimalaṃ buddham aprameyaṃ sanātanama satataṃ pañcaviṃśaṃ ca caturviṃśaṃ ca budhyatec dṛśyādṛśye hy anugatam ubhāv eva mahādyutīa avyaktaṃ na tu tad brahma budhyate tāta kevalamc kevalaṃ pañcaviṃśaṃ ca caturviṃśaṃ na paśyatia budhyamāno yadātmānam anyo ham iti manyatec tadā prakṛtimān eṣa bhavaty avyaktalocanaḥa budhyate ca parāṃ buddhiṃ viśuddhām amalāṃ yadāc ṣaḍviṃśo rājaśārdūla tadā buddhatvam āvrajeta tatas tyajati so vyaktaṃ sargapralayadharmiṇamc nirguṇaḥ prakṛtiṃ veda guṇayuktām acetanāma tataḥ kevaladharmāsau bhavaty avyaktadarśanātc kevalena samāgamya vimukto tmānam āpnuyāta etat tat tattvam ity āhur nistattvam ajarāmaramc tattvasaṃśrayaṇād etat tattvavan na ca mānadae pañcaviṃśatitattvāni pravadanti manīṣiṇaḥa na caiṣa tattvavāṃs tāta nistattvas tv eṣa buddhimānc eṣa muñcati tattvaṃ hi kṣipraṃ buddhasya lakṣaṇama ṣaḍviṃśo ham iti prājño gṛhyamāṇo jarāmaraḥc kevalena balenaiva samatāṃ yāty asaṃśayama ṣaḍviṃśena prabuddhena budhyamāno py abuddhimānc etan nānātvam ity uktaṃ sāṃkhyaśrutinidarśanāta cetanena sametasya pañcaviṃśatikasya cac ekatvaṃ vai bhavaty asya yadā buddhyā na budhyatea budhyamāno prabuddhena samatāṃ yāti maithilac saṅgadharmā bhavaty eṣa niḥsaṅgātmā narādhipaa niḥsaṅgātmānam āsādya ṣaḍviṃśakam ajaṃ viduḥc vibhus tyajati cāvyaktaṃ yadā tv etad vibudhyatee caturviṃśam agādhaṃ ca ṣaḍviṃśasya prabodhanāta eṣa hy apratibuddhaś ca budhyamānaś ca te naghac prokto buddhaś ca tattvena yathāśrutinidarśanāte nānātvaikatvam etāvad draṣṭavyaṃ śāstradṛṣṭibhiḥa maśakodumbare yadvad anyatvaṃ tadvad etayoḥc matsyo mbhasi yathā tadvad anyatvam upalabhyatea evam evāvagantavyaṃ nānātvaikatvam etayoḥc etad vimokṣa ity uktam avyaktajñānasaṃhitama pañcaviṃśatikasyāsya yo yaṃ deheṣu vartatec eṣa mokṣayitavyeti prāhur avyaktagocarāta so yam evaṃ vimucyeta nānyatheti viniścayaḥc pareṇa paradharmā ca bhavaty eṣa sametya vaia viśuddhadharmā śuddhena buddhena ca sa buddhimānc vimuktadharmā muktena sametya puruṣarṣabhaa niyogadharmiṇā caiva niyogātmā bhavaty apic vimokṣiṇā vimokṣaś ca sametyeha tathā bhaveta śucikarmā śuciś caiva bhavaty amitadīptimānc vimalātmā ca bhavati sametya vimalātmanāa kevalātmā tathā caiva kevalena sametya vaic svatantraś ca svatantreṇa svatantratvam avāpnutea etāvad etat kathitaṃ mayā tetathyaṃ mahārāja yathārthatattvamc amatsaratvaṃ pratigṛhya cārthaṃsanātanaṃ brahma viśuddham ādyama na vedaniṣṭhasya janasya rājanpradeyam etat paramaṃ tvayā bhavetc vivitsamānāya vibodhakārakaṃprabodhahetoḥ praṇatasya śāsanama na deyam etac ca tathānṛtātmaneśaṭhāya klībāya na jihmabuddhayec na paṇḍitajñānaparopatāpinedeyaṃ tvayedaṃ vinibodha yādṛśea śraddhānvitāyātha guṇānvitāyaparāpavādād viratāya nityamc viśuddhayogāya budhāya caivakriyāvate tha kṣamiṇe hitāyaa viviktaśīlāya vidhipriyāyavivādahīnāya bahuśrutāyac vijānate caiva na cāhitakṣamedame ca śaktāya śame ca dehināma etair guṇair hīnatame na deyametat paraṃ brahma viśuddham āhuḥc na śreyasā yokṣyati tādṛśe kṛtaṃdharmapravaktāram apātradānāta pṛthvīm imāṃ yady api ratnapūrṇāṃdadyān nadeyaṃ tv idam avratāyac jitendriyāyaitad asaṃśayaṃ tebhavet pradeyaṃ paramaṃ narendraa karāla mā te bhayam astu kiṃ cidetac chrutaṃ brahma paraṃ tvayādyac yathāvad uktaṃ paramaṃ pavitraṃniḥśokam atyantam anādimadhyama agādhajanmāmaraṇaṃ ca rājannirāmayaṃ vītabhayaṃ śivaṃ cac samīkṣya mohaṃ tyaja cādya sarvaṃjñānasya tattvārtham idaṃ viditvāa avāptam etad dhi purā sanātanāddhiraṇyagarbhād gadato narādhipac prasādya yatnena tam ugratejasaṃsanātanaṃ brahma yathādya vai tvayāa pṛṣṭas tvayā cāsmi yathā narendratathā mayedaṃ tvayi coktam adyac tathāvāptaṃ brahmaṇo me narendramahaj jñānaṃ mokṣavidāṃ purāṇam bhīṣma uvācaa etad uktaṃ paraṃ brahma yasmān nāvartate punaḥc pañcaviṃśo mahārāja paramarṣinidarśanāta punarāvṛttim āpnoti paraṃ jñānam avāpya cac nāvabudhyati tattvena budhyamāno jarāmaraḥa etan niḥśreyasakaraṃ jñānānāṃ te paraṃ mayāc kathitaṃ tattvatas tāta śrutvā devarṣito nṛpaa hiraṇyagarbhād ṛṣiṇā vasiṣṭhena mahātmanāc vasiṣṭhād ṛṣiśārdūlān nārado vāptavān idama nāradād viditaṃ mahyam etad brahma sanātanamc mā śucaḥ kauravendra tvaṃ śrutvaitat paramaṃ padama yena kṣarākṣare vitte na bhayaṃ tasya vidyatec vidyate tu bhayaṃ tasya yo naitad vetti pārthivaa avijñānāc ca mūḍhātmā punaḥ punar upadravanc pretya jātisahasrāṇi maraṇāntāny upāśnutea devalokaṃ tathā tiryaṅ mānuṣyam api cāśnutec yadi śudhyati kālena tasmād ajñānasāgarātd uttīrṇo smād agādhāt sa param āpnoti śobhanama ajñānasāgaro ghoro hy avyakto gādha ucyatec ahany ahani majjanti yatra bhūtāni bhārataa yasmād agādhād avyaktād uttīrṇas tvaṃ sanātanātc tasmāt tvaṃ virajāś caiva vitamaskaś ca pārthiva bhīṣma uvācaa mṛgayāṃ vicaran kaś cid vijane janakātmajaḥc vane dadarśa viprendram ṛṣiṃ vaṃśadharaṃ bhṛgoḥa tam āsīnam upāsīnaḥ praṇamya śirasā munimc paścād anumatas tena papraccha vasumān idama bhagavan kim idaṃ śreyaḥ pretya vāpīha vā bhavetc puruṣasyādhruve dehe kāmasya vaśavartinaḥa satkṛtya paripṛṣṭaḥ san sumahātmā mahātapāḥc nijagāda tatas tasmai śreyaskaram idaṃ vacaḥa manaso pratikūlāni pretya ceha ca vāñchasic bhūtānāṃ pratikūlebhyo nivartasva yatendriyaḥa dharmaḥ satāṃ hitaḥ puṃsāṃ dharmaś caivāśrayaḥ satāmc dharmāl lokās trayas tāta pravṛttāḥ sacarācarāḥa svādukāmuka kāmānāṃ vaitṛṣṇyaṃ kiṃ na gacchasic madhu paśyasi durbuddhe prapātaṃ nānupaśyasia yathā jñāne paricayaḥ kartavyas tatphalārthināc tathā dharme paricayaḥ kartavyas tatphalārthināa asatā dharmakāmena viśuddhaṃ karma duṣkaramc satā tu dharmakāmena sukaraṃ karma duṣkarama vane grāmyasukhācāro yathā grāmyas tathaiva saḥc grāme vanasukhācāro yathā vanacaras tathāa manovākkarmake dharme kuru śraddhāṃ samāhitaḥc nivṛttau vā pravṛttau vā saṃpradhārya guṇāguṇāna nityaṃ ca bahu dātavyaṃ sādhubhyaś cānasūyatāc prārthitaṃ vrataśaucābhyāṃ satkṛtaṃ deśakālayoḥa śubhena vidhinā labdham arhāya pratipādayetc krodham utsṛjya dattvā ca nānutapyen na kīrtayeta anṛśaṃsaḥ śucir dāntaḥ satyavāg ārjave sthitaḥc yonikarmaviśuddhaś ca pātraṃ syād vedavid dvijaḥa satkṛtā caikapatnī ca jātyā yonir iheṣyatec ṛgyajuḥsāmago vidvān ṣaṭkarmā pātram ucyatea sa eva dharmaḥ so dharmas taṃ taṃ pratinaraṃ bhavetc pātrakarmaviśeṣeṇa deśakālāv avekṣya caa līlayālpaṃ yathā gātrāt pramṛjyād rajasaḥ pumānc bahuyatnena mahatā pāpanirharaṇaṃ tathāa viriktasya yathā samyag ghṛtaṃ bhavati bheṣajamc tathā nirhṛtadoṣasya pretyadharmaḥ sukhāvahaḥa mānasaṃ sarvabhūteṣu vartate vai śubhāśubhec aśubhebhyaḥ samākṣipya śubheṣv evāvatārayetd mānasaṃ vṛddhasevābhir duḥkhaṃ śārīram auṣadhaiḥd vācikaṃ mantrajāpyena vidvān yatnād vināśayeta sarvaṃ sarveṇa sarvatra kriyamāṇaṃ ca pūjayac svadharme yatra rāgas te kāmaṃ dharmo vidhīyatāma adhṛtātman dhṛtau tiṣṭha durbuddhe buddhimān bhavac apraśānta praśāmya tvam aprājña prājñavac caraa tejasā śakyate prāptum upāyasahacāriṇāc iha ca pretya ca śreyas tasya mūlaṃ dhṛtiḥ parāa rājarṣir adhṛtiḥ svargāt patito hi mahābhiṣaḥc yayātiḥ kṣīṇapuṇyaś ca dhṛtyā lokān avāptavāna tapasvināṃ dharmavatāṃ viduṣāṃ copasevanātc prāpsyase vipulāṃ buddhiṃ tathā śreyo bhipatsyased sa tu vipras tathā pṛṣṭo rājñā jānakinā vaned proktavān akhilaṃ dharmaṃ mokṣāśramam anuttamama sa tu svabhāvasaṃpannas tac chrutvā munibhāṣitamc vinivartya manaḥ kāmād dharme buddhiṃ cakāra ha yudhiṣṭhira uvācaa dharmādharmavimuktaṃ yad vimuktaṃ sarvasaṃśrayātc janmamṛtyuvimuktaṃ ca vimuktaṃ puṇyapāpayoḥa yac chivaṃ nityam abhayaṃ nityaṃ cākṣaram avyayamc śuci nityam anāyāsaṃ tad bhavān vaktum arhati bhīṣma uvācaa atra te vartayiṣye ham itihāsaṃ purātanamc yājñavalkyasya saṃvādaṃ janakasya ca bhārataa yājñavalkyam ṛṣiśreṣṭhaṃ daivarātir mahāyaśāḥc papraccha janako rājā praśnaṃ praśnavidāṃ varaḥa katīndriyāṇi viprarṣe kati prakṛtayaḥ smṛtāḥc kim avyaktaṃ paraṃ brahma tasmāc ca paratas tu kima prabhavaṃ cāpyayaṃ caiva kālasaṃkhyāṃ tathaiva cac vaktum arhasi viprendra tvadanugrahakāṅkṣiṇaḥa ajñānāt paripṛcchāmi tvaṃ hi jñānamayo nidhiḥc tad ahaṃ śrotum icchāmi sarvam etad asaṃśayam yājñavalkya uvācaa śrūyatām avanīpāla yad etad anupṛcchasic yogānāṃ paramaṃ jñānaṃ sāṃkhyānāṃ ca viśeṣataḥa na tavāviditaṃ kiṃ cin māṃ tu jijñāsate bhavānc pṛṣṭena cāpi vaktavyam eṣa dharmaḥ sanātanaḥa aṣṭau prakṛtayaḥ proktā vikārāś cāpi ṣoḍaśac atha sapta tu vyaktāni prāhur adhyātmacintakāḥa avyaktaṃ ca mahāṃś caiva tathāhaṃkāra eva cac pṛthivī vāyur ākāśam āpo jyotiś ca pañcamama etāḥ prakṛtayas tv aṣṭau vikārān api me śṛṇuc śrotraṃ tvak caiva cakṣuś ca jihvā ghrāṇaṃ ca pañcamama śabdasparśau ca rūpaṃ ca raso gandhas tathaiva cac vāk ca hastau ca pādau ca pāyur meḍhraṃ tathaiva caa ete viśeṣā rājendra mahābhūteṣu pañcasuc buddhīndriyāṇy athaitāni saviśeṣāṇi maithilaa manaḥ ṣoḍaśakaṃ prāhur adhyātmagaticintakāḥc tvaṃ caivānye ca vidvāṃsas tattvabuddhiviśāradāḥa avyaktāc ca mahān ātmā samutpadyati pārthivac prathamaṃ sargam ity etad āhuḥ prādhānikaṃ budhāḥa mahataś cāpy ahaṃkāra utpadyati narādhipac dvitīyaṃ sargam ity āhur etad buddhyātmakaṃ smṛtama ahaṃkārāc ca saṃbhūtaṃ mano bhūtaguṇātmakamc tṛtīyaḥ sarga ity eṣa āhaṃkārika ucyatea manasas tu samudbhūtā mahābhūtā narādhipab samudbhūtāni manaso mahābhūtāni pārthivac caturthaṃ sargam ity etan mānasaṃ paricakṣatea śabdaḥ sparśaś ca rūpaṃ ca raso gandhas tathaiva cac pañcamaṃ sargam ity āhur bhautikaṃ bhūtacintakāḥa śrotraṃ tvak caiva cakṣuś ca jihvā ghrāṇaṃ ca pañcamamc sargaṃ tu ṣaṣṭham ity āhur bahucintātmakaṃ smṛtama adhaḥ śrotrendriyagrāma utpadyati narādhipac saptamaṃ sargam ity āhur etad aindriyakaṃ smṛtama ūrdhvasrotas tathā tiryag utpadyati narādhipac aṣṭamaṃ sargam ity āhur etad ārjavakaṃ budhāḥa tiryak srotas tv adhaḥsrota utpadyati narādhipac navamaṃ sargam ity āhur etad ārjavakaṃ budhāḥa etāni nava sargāṇi tattvāni ca narādhipac caturviṃśatir uktāni yathāśruti nidarśanāta ata ūrdhvaṃ mahārāja guṇasyaitasya tattvataḥc mahātmabhir anuproktāṃ kālasaṃkhyāṃ nibodha me yājñavalkya uvācaa avyaktasya naraśreṣṭha kālasaṃkhyāṃ nibodha mec pañca kalpasahasrāṇi dviguṇāny ahar ucyatea rātrir etāvatī cāsya pratibuddho narādhipac sṛjaty oṣadhim evāgre jīvanaṃ sarvadehināma tato brahmāṇam asṛjad dhairaṇyāṇḍasamudbhavamc sā mūrtiḥ sarvabhūtānām ity evam anuśuśrumaa saṃvatsaram uṣitvāṇḍe niṣkramya ca mahāmuniḥc saṃdadhe rdhaṃ mahīṃ kṛtsnāṃ divam ardhaṃ prajāpatiḥa dyāvāpṛthivyor ity eṣa rājan vedeṣu paṭhyatec tayoḥ śakalayor madhyam ākāśam akarot prabhuḥa etasyāpi ca saṃkhyānaṃ vedavedāṅgapāragaiḥc daśa kalpasahasrāṇi pādonāny ahar ucyatee rātrim etāvatīṃ cāsya prāhur adhyātmacintakāḥa sṛjaty ahaṃkāram ṛṣir bhūtaṃ divyātmakaṃ tathāc caturaś cāparān putrān dehāt pūrvaṃ mahān ṛṣiḥd maharṣayaḥ sapta pūrve catvāro manavas tathāe te vai pitṛbhyaḥ pitaraḥ śrūyante rājasattamaa devāḥ pitṝṇāṃ ca sutā devair lokāḥ samāvṛtāḥc carācarā naraśreṣṭha ity evam anuśuśrumaa parameṣṭhī tv ahaṃkāro sṛjad bhūtāni pañcadhāc pṛthivī vāyur ākāśam āpo jyotiś ca pañcamama etasyāpi niśām āhus tṛtīyam iha kurvataḥc pañca kalpasahasrāṇi tāvad evāhar ucyatea śabdaḥ sparśaś ca rūpaṃ ca raso gandhaś ca pañcamaḥc ete viśeṣā rājendra mahābhūteṣu pañcasue yair āviṣṭāni bhūtāni ahany ahani pārthivaa anyonyaṃ spṛhayanty ete anyonyasya hite ratāḥc anyonyam abhimanyante anyonyaspardhinas tathāa te vadhyamānā anyonyaṃ guṇair hāribhir avyayāḥc ihaiva parivartante tiryagyonipraveśinaḥa trīṇi kalpasahasrāṇi eteṣām ahar ucyatec ratrir etāvatī caiva manasaś ca narādhipaa manaś carati rājendra caritaṃ sarvam indriyaiḥc na cendriyāṇi paśyanti mana evātra paśyatia cakṣuḥ paśyati rūpāṇi manasā tu na cakṣuṣāc manasi vyākule cakṣuḥ paśyann api na paśyatie tathendriyāṇi sarvāṇi paśyantīty abhicakṣatea manasy uparate rājann indriyoparamo bhavetc na cendriyavyuparame manasy uparamo bhavete evaṃ manaḥpradhānāni indriyāṇi vibhāvayeta indriyāṇāṃ hi sarveṣām īśvaraṃ mana ucyatec etad viśanti bhūtāni sarvāṇīha mahāyaśāḥ yājñavalkya uvācaa tattvānāṃ sargasaṃkhyā ca kālasaṃkhyā tathaiva cac mayā proktānupūrvyeṇa saṃhāram api me śṛṇua yathā saṃharate jantūn sasarja ca punaḥ punaḥc anādinidhano brahmā nityaś cākṣara eva caa ahaḥkṣayam atho buddhvā niśi svapnamanās tathāc codayām āsa bhagavān avyakto haṃkṛtaṃ narama tataḥ śatasahasrāṃśur avyaktenābhicoditaḥc kṛtvā dvādaśadhātmānam ādityo jvaladagnivata caturvidhaṃ prajājālaṃ nirdahaty āśu tejasāc jarāyvaṇḍasvedajātam udbhijjaṃ ca narādhipaa etad unmeṣamātreṇa viniṣṭaṃ sthāṇujaṅgamamc kūrmapṛṣṭhasamā bhūmir bhavaty atha samantataḥa jagad dagdhvāmitabalaḥ kevalaṃ jagatīṃ tataḥc ambhasā balinā kṣipram āpūryata samantataḥa tataḥ kālāgnim āsādya tad ambho yāti saṃkṣayamc vinaṣṭe mbhasi rājendra jājvalīty analo mahāna tam aprameyo tibalaṃ jvalamānaṃ vibhāvasumc ūṣmāṇaṃ sarvabhūtānāṃ saptārciṣam athāñjasāa bhakṣayām āsa balavān vāyur aṣṭātmako balīc vicarann amitaprāṇas tiryag ūrdhvam adhas tathāa tam apratibalaṃ bhīmam ākāśaṃ grasate tmanāc ākāśam apy atinadan mano grasati cārikama mano grasati sarvātmā so haṃkāraḥ prajāpatiḥc ahaṃkāraṃ mahān ātmā bhūtabhavyabhaviṣyavita tam apy anupamātmānaṃ viśvaṃ śaṃbhuḥ prajāpatiḥc aṇimā laghimā prāptir īśāno jyotir avyayaḥa sarvataḥpāṇipādāntaḥ sarvatokṣiśiromukhaḥc sarvataḥśrutimāṃl loke sarvam āvṛtya tiṣṭhatia hṛdayaṃ sarvabhūtānāṃ parvaṇo ṅguṣṭhamātrakaḥc anugrasaty anantaṃ hi mahātmā viśvam īśvaraḥa tataḥ samabhavat sarvam akṣayāvyayam avraṇamc bhūtabhavyamanuṣyāṇāṃ sraṣṭāram anaghaṃ tathāa eṣo pyayas te rājendra yathāvat paribhāṣitaḥc adhyātmam adhibhūtaṃ ca adhidaivaṃ ca śrūyatām yājñavalkya uvācaa pādāv adhyātmam ity āhur brāhmaṇās tattvadarśinaḥc gantavyam adhibhūtaṃ ca viṣṇus tatrādhidaivatama pāyur adhyātmam ity āhur yathātattvārthadarśinaḥc visargam adhibhūtaṃ ca mitras tatrādhidaivatama upastho dhyātmam ity āhur yathāyoganidarśanamc adhibhūtaṃ tathānando daivataṃ ca prajāpatiḥa hastāv adhyātmam ity āhur yathāsāṃkhyanidarśanamc kartavyam adhibhūtaṃ tu indras tatrādhidaivatama vāg adhyātmam iti prāhur yathāśrutinidarśanamc vaktavyam adhibhūtaṃ tu vahnis tatrādhidaivatama cakṣur adhyātmam ity āhur yathāśrutinidarśanamc rūpam atrādhibhūtaṃ tu sūryas tatrādhidaivatama śrotram adhyātmam ity āhur yathāśrutinidarśanamb karṇāv adhyātmakaṃ jñeyaṃ prāhuḥ sāṃkhyanidarśanāḥc śabdas tatrādhibhūtaṃ tu diśas tatrādhidaivatama jihvām adhyātmam ity āhur yathātattvanidarśanamc rasa evādhibhūtaṃ tu āpas tatrādhidaivatama ghrāṇam adhyātmam ity āhur yathāśrutinidarśanamc gandha evādhibhūtaṃ tu pṛthivī cādhidaivatama tvag adhyātmam iti prāhus tattvabuddhiviśāradāḥc sparśa evādhibhūtaṃ tu pavanaś cādhidaivatama mano dhyātmam iti prāhur yathāśrutinidarśanamc mantavyam adhibhūtaṃ tu candramāś cādhidaivatama ahaṃkārikam adhyātmam āhus tattvanidarśanamc abhimāno dhibhūtaṃ tu bhavas tatrādhidaivatama buddhir adhyātmam ity āhur yathāvedanidarśanamc boddhavyam adhibhūtaṃ tu kṣetrajño trādhidaivatamd cittam adhyātmam ity āhur yoginaḥ sūkṣmadṛṣṭayaḥd adhibhūtaṃ caityam āhū rudras tatrādhidaivatama eṣā te vyaktato rājan vibhūtir anuvarṇitāc ādau madhye tathā cānte yathātattvena tattvavita prakṛtir guṇān vikurute svacchandenātmakāmyayāc krīḍārthaṃ tu mahārāja śataśo tha sahasraśaḥa yathā dīpasahasrāṇi dīpān martyāḥ prakurvatec prakṛtis tathā vikurute puruṣasya guṇān bahūna sattvam ānanda udrekaḥ prītiḥ prākāśyam eva cac sukhaṃ śuddhitvam ārogyaṃ saṃtoṣaḥ śraddadhānatāa akārpaṇyam asaṃrambhaḥ kṣamā dhṛtir ahiṃsatāc samatā satyam ānṛṇyaṃ mārdavaṃ hrīr acāpalama śaucam ārjavam ācāram alaulyaṃ hṛdyasaṃbhramaḥc iṣṭāniṣṭaviyogānāṃ kṛtānām avikatthanama dānena cānugrahaṇam aspṛhārthe parārthatāc sarvabhūtadayā caiva sattvasyaite guṇāḥ smṛtāḥa rajoguṇānāṃ saṃghāto rūpam aiśvaryavigrahec atyāśitvam akāruṇyaṃ sukhaduḥkhopasevanama parāpavādeṣu ratir vivādānāṃ ca sevanamc ahaṃkāras tv asatkāraś cintā vairopasevanama paritāpo paharaṇaṃ hrīnāśo nārjavaṃ tathāc bhedaḥ paruṣatā caiva kāmakrodhau madas tathāe darpo dveṣo tivādaś ca ete proktā rajoguṇāḥa tāmasānāṃ tu saṃghātaṃ pravakṣyāmy upadhāryatāmc moho prakāśas tāmisram andhatāmisrasaṃjñitama maraṇaṃ cāndhatāmisraṃ tāmisraṃ krodha ucyatec tamaso lakṣaṇānīha bhakṣāṇām abhirocanama bhojanānām aparyāptis tathā peyeṣv atṛptatāc gandhavāso vihāreṣu śayaneṣv āsaneṣu caa divāsvapne vivāde ca pramādeṣu ca vai ratiḥc nṛtyavāditragītānām ajñānāc chraddadhānatāe dveṣo dharmaviśeṣāṇām ete vai tāmasā guṇāḥf ity evaṃ saptadaśako rāśir avyaktasaṃjñakaḥf sarvair ihendriyārthaiś ca vyaktāvyaktaiś ca saṃhatāḥf pañcaviṃśaka ity eṣa vyaktāvyaktamayo gaṇaḥf etaiḥ sarvaiḥ samāyuktāḥ pumān ity abhidhīyate yājñavalkya uvācaa ete pradhānasya guṇās trayaḥ puruṣasattamac kṛtsnasya caiva jagatas tiṣṭhanty anapagāḥ sadād avyaktarūpo bhagavāñ śatadhā ca sahasraśaḥa śatadhā sahasradhā caiva tathā śatasahasradhāc koṭiśaś ca karoty eṣa pratyagātmānam ātmanāa sāttvikasyottamaṃ sthānaṃ rājasasyeha madhyamamc tāmasasyādhamaṃ sthānaṃ prāhur adhyātmacintakāḥa kevaleneha puṇyena gatim ūrdhvām avāpnuyātc puṇyapāpena mānuṣyam adharmeṇāpy adhogatima dvaṃdvam eṣāṃ trayāṇāṃ tu saṃnipātaṃ ca tattvataḥc sattvasya rajasaś caiva tamasaś ca śṛṇuṣva mea sattvasya tu rajo dṛṣṭaṃ rajasaś ca tamas tathāc tamasaś ca tathā sattvaṃ sattvasyāvyaktam eva cad sattvaṃ prapadyate sattvād avyaktād vyaktam eva caa avyaktasattvasaṃyukto devalokam avāpnuyātc rajaḥsattvasamāyukto manuṣyeṣūpapadyatea rajastamobhyāṃ saṃyuktas tiryagyoniṣu jāyatec rajastāmasasattvaiś ca yukto mānuṣyam āpnuyāta puṇyapāpaviyuktānāṃ sthānam āhur manīṣiṇāmc śāsvataṃ cāvyayaṃ caiva akṣaraṃ cābhayaṃ ca yata jñānināṃ saṃbhavaṃ śreṣṭhaṃ sthānam avraṇam acyutamc atīndriyam abījaṃ ca janmamṛtyutamonudama avyaktasthaṃ paraṃ yat tat pṛṣṭas te haṃ narādhipac sa eṣa prakṛtiṣṭho hi tasthur ity abhidhīyatea acetanaś caiṣa mataḥ prakṛtisthaś ca pārthivac etenādhiṣṭhitaś caiva sṛjate saṃharaty api janaka uvācaa anādinidhanāv etāv ubhāv eva mahāmunec amūrtimantāv acalāv aprakampyau ca nirvraṇaua agrāhyāv ṛṣiśārdūla katham eko hy acetanaḥc cetanāvāṃs tathā caikaḥ kṣetrajña iti bhāṣitaḥa tvaṃ hi viprendra kārtsnyena mokṣadharmam upāsasec sākalyaṃ mokṣadharmasya śrotum icchāmi tattvataḥa astitvaṃ kevalatvaṃ ca vinābhāvaṃ tathaiva cab daivatāni ca me brūhi dehaṃ yāny āśritāni vaic tathaivotkramaṇasthānaṃ dehino pi viyujyataḥa kālena yad dhi prāpnoti sthānaṃ tad brūhi me dvijac sāṃkhyajñānaṃ ca tattvena pṛthag yogaṃ tathaiva caa ariṣṭāni ca tattvena vaktum arhasi sattamac viditaṃ sarvam etat te pāṇāv āmalakaṃ yathā yājñavalkya uvācaa na śakyo nirguṇas tāta guṇīkartuṃ viśāṃ patec guṇavāṃś cāpy aguṇavān yathātattvaṃ nibodha mea guṇair hi guṇavān eva nirguṇaś cāguṇas tathāc prāhur evaṃ mahātmāno munayas tattvadarśinaḥa guṇasvabhāvas tv avyakto guṇān evābhivartatec upayuṅkte ca tān eva sa caivājñaḥ svabhāvataḥa avyaktas tu na jānīte puruṣo jñaḥ svabhāvataḥc na mattaḥ param astīti nityam evābhimanyatea anena kāraṇenaitad avyaktaṃ syād acetanamc nityatvād akṣaratvāc ca kṣarāṇāṃ tattvato nyathāa yadājñānena kurvīta guṇasargaṃ punaḥ punaḥc yadātmānaṃ na jānīte tadāvyaktam ihocyatea kartṛtvāc cāpi tattvānāṃ tattvadharmī tathocyatec kartṛtvāc caiva yonīnāṃ yonidharmā tathocyatea kartṛtvāt prakṛtīnāṃ tu tathā prakṛtidharmitāc kartṛtvāc cāpi bījānāṃ bījadharmī tathocyatea guṇānāṃ prasavatvāc ca tathā prasavadharmavānc kartṛtvāt pralayānāṃ ca tathā pralayadharmitād kartṛtvāt prasavānāṃ ca tathā prabhavadharmitāa bījatvāt prakṛtitvāc ca pralayatvāt tathaiva cac upekṣakatvād anyatvād abhimānāc ca kevalama manyante yatayaḥ śuddhā adhyātmavigatajvarāḥc anityaṃ nityam avyaktam evam etad dhi śuśrumaa avyaktaikatvam ity āhur nānātvaṃ puruṣas tathāc sarvabhūtadayāvantaḥ kevalaṃ jñānam āsthitāḥa anyaḥ sa puruṣo vyaktas tv adhruvo dhruvasaṃjñakaḥc yathā muñja iṣīkāyās tathaivaitad dhi jāyated na caiva muñjasaṃyogād iṣīkā kartṛ budhyatea anyaṃ ca maśakaṃ vidyād anyac codumbaraṃ tathāc na codumbarasaṃyogair maśakas tatra lipyatea anya eva tathā matsyas tathānyad udakaṃ smṛtamc na codakasya sparśena matsyo lipyati sarvaśaḥa anyo hy agnir ukhāpy anyā nityam evam avaihi bhoḥc na copalipyate so gnir ukhāsaṃsparśanena vaia puṣkaraṃ tv anyad evātra tathānyad udakaṃ smṛtamc na codakasya sparśena lipyate tatra puṣkarama eteṣāṃ saha saṃvāsaṃ vivāsaṃ caiva nityaśaḥc yathā tathainaṃ paśyanti na nityaṃ prākṛtā janāḥa ye tv anyathaiva paśyanti na samyak teṣu darśanamc te vyaktaṃ nirayaṃ ghoraṃ praviśanti punaḥ punaḥa sāṃkhyadarśanam etat te parisaṃkhyātam uttamamc evaṃ hi parisaṃkhyāya sāṃkhyāḥ kevalatāṃ gatāḥa ye tv anye tattvakuśalās teṣām etan nidarśanamc ataḥ paraṃ pravakṣyāmi yogānām api darśanam yājñavalkya uvācaa sāṃkhyajñānaṃ mayā proktaṃ yogajñānaṃ nibodha mec yathāśrutaṃ yathādṛṣṭaṃ tattvena nṛpasattamaa nāsti sāṃkhyasamaṃ jñānaṃ nāsti yogasamaṃ balamc tāv ubhāv ekacaryau tu ubhāv anidhanau smṛtaua pṛthak pṛthak tu paśyanti ye lpabuddhiratā narāḥc vayaṃ tu rājan paśyāma ekam eva tu niścayāta yad eva yogāḥ paśyanti tat sāṃkhyair api dṛśyatec ekaṃ sāṃkhyaṃ ca yogaṃ ca yaḥ paśyati sa tattvavita rudrapradhānān aparān viddhi yogān paraṃtapac tenaiva cātha copadiṣṭaṃyāthātathyaṃ tad viśoko bhavasvac rājan gacchasvaitadarthasya pāraṃsamyak proktaṃ svasti te stv atra nityam bhīṣma uvācaa sa evam anuśāstas tu yājñavalkyena dhīmatāc prītimān abhavad rājā mithilādhipatis tadāa gate munivare tasmin kṛte cāpi pradakṣiṇec daivarātir narapatir āsīnas tatra mokṣavita gokoṭiṃ sparśayām āsa hiraṇyasya tathaiva cac ratnāñjalim athaikaṃ ca brāhmaṇebhyo dadau tadāa videharājyaṃ ca tathā pratiṣṭhāpya sutasya vaic yatidharmam upāsaṃś cāpy avasan mithilādhipaḥa sāṃkhyajñānam adhīyāno yogaśāstraṃ ca kṛtsnaśaḥc dharmādharmau ca rājendra prākṛtaṃ parigarhayana anantam iti kṛtvā sa nityaṃ kevalam eva cac dharmādharmau puṇyapāpe satyāsatye tathaiva caa janmamṛtyū ca rājendra prākṛtaṃ tad acintayatc brahmāvyaktasya karmedam iti nityaṃ narādhipaa paśyanti yogāḥ sāṃkhyāś ca svaśāstrakṛtalakṣaṇāḥc iṣṭāniṣṭaviyuktaṃ hi tasthau brahma parātparame nityaṃ tam āhur vidvāṃsaḥ śucis tasmāc chucir bhavaa dīyate yac ca labhate dattaṃ yac cānumanyateb avyakteneti tac cintyam anyathā mā vicintayac dadāti ca naraśreṣṭha pratigṛhṇāti yac ca hae dadāty avyaktam evaitat pratigṛhṇāti tac ca vaia ātmā hy evātmano hy ekaḥ ko nyas tvatto dhiko bhavetc evaṃ manyasva satatam anyathā mā vicintayaa yasyāvyaktaṃ na viditaṃ saguṇaṃ nirguṇaṃ punaḥc tena tīrthāni yajñāś ca sevitavyāvipaścitāa na svādhyāyais tapobhir vā yajñair vā kurunandanac labhate vyaktasaṃsthānaṃ jñātvāvyaktaṃ mahīpatea tathaiva mahataḥ sthānam āhaṃkārikam eva cac ahaṃkārāt paraṃ cāpi sthānāni samavāpnuyāta ye tv avyaktāt paraṃ nityaṃ jānate śāstratatparāḥc janmamṛtyuviyuktaṃ ca viyuktaṃ sad asac ca yata etan mayāptaṃ janakāt purastāttenāpi cāptaṃ nṛpa yājñavalkyātc jñānaṃ viśiṣṭaṃ na tathā hi yajñājñānena durgaṃ tarate na yajñaiḥa durgaṃ janma nidhanaṃ cāpi rājanna bhūtikaṃ jñānavido vadantic yajñais tapobhir niyamair vrataiś cadivaṃ samāsādya patanti bhūmaua tasmād upāsasva paraṃ mahac chuciśivaṃ vimokṣaṃ vimalaṃ pavitramc kṣetrajñavit pārthiva jñānayajñamupāsya vai tattvam ṛṣir bhaviṣyasia upaniṣadam upākarot tadā vaijanakanṛpasya purā hi yājñavalkyaḥc yad upagaṇitaśāśvatāvyayaṃ tacchubham amṛtatvam aśokam ṛcchatīti yudhiṣṭhira uvācaa aiśvaryaṃ vā mahat prāpya dhanaṃ vā bharatarṣabhac dīrgham āyur avāpyātha kathaṃ mṛtyum atikrameta tapasā vā sumahatā karmaṇā vā śrutena vāc rasāyanaprayogair vā kair nopaiti jarāntakau bhīṣma uvācaa atrāpy udāharantīmam itihāsaṃ purātanamc bhikṣoḥ pañcaśikhasyeha saṃvādaṃ janakasya caa vaideho janako rājā maharṣiṃ vedavittamamc paryapṛcchat pañcaśikhaṃ chinnadharmārthasaṃśayama kena vṛttena bhagavann atikrāmej jarāntakauc tapasā vātha buddhyā vā karmaṇā vā śrutena vāa evam uktaḥ sa vaidehaṃ pratyuvāca parokṣavitc nivṛttir naitayor asti nānivṛttiḥ kathaṃ canaa na hy ahāni nivartante na māsā na punaḥ kṣapāḥc so yaṃ prapadyate dhvānaṃ cirāya dhruvam adhruvaḥa sarvabhūtasamucchedaḥ srotasevohyate sadāc uhyamānaṃ nimajjantam aplave kālasāgaree jarāmṛtyumahāgrāhe na kaś cid abhipadyatea naivāsya bhavitā kaś cin nāsau bhavati kasya citc pathi saṃgatam evedaṃ dārair anyaiś ca bandhubhiḥe nāyam atyantasaṃvāso labdhapūrvo hi kena cita kṣipyante tena tenaiva niṣṭanantaḥ punaḥ punaḥc kālena jātā jātā hi vāyunevābhrasaṃcayāḥa jarāmṛtyū hi bhūtānāṃ khāditārau vṛkāv ivac balināṃ durbalānāṃ ca hrasvānāṃ mahatām apia evaṃbhūteṣu bhūteṣu nityabhūtādhruveṣu cac kathaṃ hṛṣyeta jāteṣu mṛteṣu ca kathaṃ jvareta kuto ham āgataḥ ko smi kva gamiṣyāmi kasya vāc kasmin sthitaḥ kva bhavitā kasmāt kim anuśocasid satyaś ca te yathātmā ca tyaktaḥ syāt kim anena caa draṣṭā svargasya na hy asti tathaiva narakasya cac āgamāṃs tv anatikramya dadyāc caiva yajeta ca yudhiṣṭhira uvācaa aparityajya gārhasthyaṃ kururājarṣisattamac kaḥ prāpto vinayaṃ buddhyā mokṣatattvaṃ vadasva mea saṃnyasyate yathātmāyaṃ saṃnyastātmā yathā ca yaḥc paraṃ mokṣasya yac cāpi tan me brūhi pitāmaha bhīṣma uvācaa atrāpy udāharantīmam itihāsaṃ purātanamc janakasya ca saṃvādaṃ sulabhāyāś ca bhārataa saṃnyāsaphalikaḥ kaś cid babhūva nṛpatiḥ purāc maithilo janako nāma dharmadhvaja iti śrutaḥa sa vede mokṣaśāstre ca sve ca śāstre kṛtāgamaḥc indriyāṇi samādhāya śaśāsa vasudhām imāma tasya vedavidaḥ prājñāḥ śrutvā tāṃ sādhuvṛttatāmc lokeṣu spṛhayanty anye puruṣāḥ puruṣeśvaraa atha dharmayuge tasmin yogadharmam anuṣṭhitāc mahīm anucacāraikā sulabhā nāma bhikṣukīa tayā jagad idaṃ sarvam aṭantyā mithileśvaraḥc tatra tatra śruto mokṣe kathyamānas tridaṇḍibhiḥa sā susūkṣmāṃ kathāṃ śrutvā tathyaṃ neti sasaṃśayāc darśane jātasaṃkalpā janakasya babhūva haa tataḥ sā viprahāyātha pūrvarūpaṃ hi yogataḥc abibhrad anavadyāṅgī rūpam anyad anuttamama cakṣur nimeṣamātreṇa laghvastragatigāminīc videhānāṃ purīṃ subhrūr jagāma kamalekṣaṇāa sā prāpya mithilāṃ ramyāṃ samṛddhajanasaṃkulāmc bhaikṣacaryāpadeśena dadarśa mithileśvarama rājā tasyāḥ paraṃ dṛṣṭvā saukumāryaṃ vapus tathāc keyaṃ kasya kuto veti babhūvāgatavismayaḥa tato syāḥ svāgataṃ kṛtvā vyādiśya ca varāsanamc pūjitāṃ pādaśaucena varānnenāpy atarpayata atha bhuktavatī prītā rājānaṃ mantribhir vṛtamc sarvabhāṣyavidāṃ madhye codayām āsa bhikṣukīa sulabhā tv asya dharmeṣu mukto neti sasaṃśayāc sattvaṃ sattvena yogajñā praviveśa mahīpatea netrābhyāṃ netrayor asya raśmīn saṃyojya raśmibhiḥc sā sma saṃcodayiṣyantaṃ yogabandhair babandha haa janako py utsmayan rājā bhāvam asyā viśeṣayanc pratijagrāha bhāvena bhāvam asyā nṛpottamaḥa tad ekasminn adhiṣṭhāne saṃvādaḥ śrūyatām ayamc chatrādiṣu vimuktasya muktāyāś ca tridaṇḍakea bhagavatyāḥ kva caryeyaṃ kṛtā kva ca gamiṣyasic kasya ca tvaṃ kuto veti papracchaināṃ mahīpatiḥa śrute vayasi jātau ca sadbhāvo nādhigamyatec eṣv artheṣūttaraṃ tasmāt pravedyaṃ satsamāgamea chatrādiṣu viśeṣeṣu muktaṃ māṃ viddhi sarvaśaḥc sa tvāṃ saṃmantum icchāmi mānārhāsi matā hi mea yasmāc caitan mayā prāptaṃ jñānaṃ vaiśeṣikaṃ purāc yasya nānyaḥ pravaktāsti mokṣe tam api me śṛṇua pārāśaryasagotrasya vṛddhasya sumahātmanaḥc bhikṣoḥ pañcaśikhasyāhaṃ śiṣyaḥ paramasaṃmataḥa sāṃkhyajñāne tathā yoge mahīpālavidhau tathāc trividhe mokṣadharme smin gatādhvā chinnasaṃśayaḥa sa yathāśāstradṛṣṭena mārgeṇeha parivrajanc vārṣikāṃś caturo māsān purā mayi sukhoṣitaḥa tenāhaṃ sāṃkhyamukhyena sudṛṣṭārthena tattvataḥc śrāvitas trividhaṃ mokṣaṃ na ca rājyād vicālitaḥa so haṃ tām akhilāṃ vṛttiṃ trividhāṃ mokṣasaṃhitāmc muktarāgaś carāmy ekaḥ pade paramake sthitaḥa vairāgyaṃ punar etasya mokṣasya paramo vidhiḥc jñānād eva ca vairāgyaṃ jāyate yena mucyatea jñānena kurute yatnaṃ yatnena prāpyate mahatc mahad dvaṃdvapramokṣāya sā siddhir yā vayotigāa seyaṃ paramikā buddhiḥ prāptā nirdvaṃdvatā mayāc ihaiva gatamohena caratā muktasaṅgināa yathā kṣetraṃ mṛdūbhūtam adbhir āplāvitaṃ tathāc janayaty aṅkuraṃ karma nṛṇāṃ tadvat punarbhavama yathā cottāpitaṃ bījaṃ kapāle yatra tatra vāc prāpyāpy aṅkurahetutvam abījatvān na jāyatec kṣīṇavāsanayā buddhyā karma yat kriyate naghac tad dagdhabījavad bhūyo nāṅkuraṃ pravimuñcatia tadvad bhagavatā tena śikhāproktena bhikṣuṇāc jñānaṃ kṛtam abījaṃ me viṣayeṣu na jāyatea nābhiṣajjati kasmiṃś cin nānarthe na parigrahec nābhirajyati caiteṣu vyarthatvād rāgadoṣayoḥa yaś ca me dakṣiṇaṃ bāhuṃ candanena samukṣayetc savyaṃ vāsyā ca yas takṣet samāv etāv ubhau mamaa sukhī so ham avāptārthaḥ samaloṣṭāśmakāñcanaḥc muktasaṅgaḥ sthito rājye viśiṣṭo nyais tridaṇḍibhiḥa mokṣe hi trividhā niṣṭhā dṛṣṭā pūrvair maharṣibhiḥc jñānaṃ lokottaraṃ yac ca sarvatyāgaś ca karmaṇāma jñānaniṣṭhāṃ vadanty eke mokṣaśāstravido janāḥc karmaniṣṭhāṃ tathaivānye yatayaḥ sūkṣmadarśinaḥa prahāyobhayam apy etaj jñānaṃ karma ca kevalamc tṛtīyeyaṃ samākhyātā niṣṭhā tena mahātmanāa yame ca niyame caiva dveṣe kāme parigrahec māne dambhe tathā snehe sadṛśās te kuṭumbibhiḥa tridaṇḍādiṣu yady asti mokṣo jñānena kena citc chatrādiṣu kathaṃ na syāt tulyahetau parigrahea yena yena hi yasyārthaḥ kāraṇeneha kasya citc tat tad ālambate dravyaṃ sarvaḥ sve sve parigrahea doṣadarśī tu gārhasthye yo vrajaty āśramāntaramc utsṛjan parigṛhṇaṃś ca so pi saṅgān na mucyatea ādhipatye tathā tulye nigrahānugrahātmanic rājarṣibhikṣukācāryā mucyante kena hetunāa atha satyādhipatye pi jñānenaiveha kevalamc mucyante kiṃ na mucyante pade paramake sthitāḥa kāṣāyadhāraṇaṃ mauṇḍyaṃ triviṣṭabdhaḥ kamaṇḍaluḥc liṅgāny atyartham etāni na mokṣāyeti me matiḥa yadi saty api liṅge smiñ jñānam evātra kāraṇamc nirmokṣāyeha duḥkhasya liṅgamātraṃ nirarthakama atha vā duḥkhaśaithilyaṃ vīkṣya liṅge kṛtā matiḥc kiṃ tad evārthasāmānyaṃ chatrādiṣu na lakṣyatea ākiṃcanye na mokṣo sti kaiṃcanye nāsti bandhanamc kaiṃcanye cetare caiva jantur jñānena mucyatea tasmād dharmārthakāmeṣu tathā rājyaparigrahec bandhanāyataneṣv eṣu viddhy abandhe pade sthitama rājyaiśvaryamayaḥ pāśaḥ snehāyatanabandhanaḥc mokṣāśmaniśiteneha chinnas tyāgāsinā mayāa so ham evaṃgato mukto jātāsthas tvayi bhikṣukic ayathārtho hi te varṇo vakṣyāmi śṛṇu tan mamaa saukumāryaṃ tathā rūpaṃ vapur agryaṃ tathā vayaḥc tavaitāni samastāni niyamaś ceti saṃśayaḥa yac cāpy ananurūpaṃ te liṅgasyāsya viceṣṭitamc mukto yaṃ syān na vety asmād dharṣito matparigrahaḥa na ca kāmasamāyukte mukte py asti tridaṇḍakamc na rakṣyate tvayā cedaṃ na muktasyāsti gopanāa matpakṣasaṃśrayāc cāyaṃ śṛṇu yas te vyatikramaḥc āśrayantyāḥ svabhāvena mama pūrvaparigrahama praveśas te kṛtaḥ kena mama rāṣṭre pure tathāc kasya vā saṃnisargāt tvaṃ praviṣṭā hṛdayaṃ mamaa varṇapravaramukhyāsi brāhmaṇī kṣatriyo hy ahamc nāvayor ekayogo sti mā kṛthā varṇasaṃkarama vartase mokṣadharmeṣu gārhasthye tv aham āśramec ayaṃ cāpi sukaṣṭas te dvitīyo śramasaṃkaraḥa sagotrāṃ vāsagotrāṃ vā na veda tvāṃ na vettha māmc sagotram āviśantyās te tṛtīyo gotrasaṃkaraḥa atha jīvati te bhartā proṣito py atha vā kva citc agamyā parabhāryeti caturtho dharmasaṃkaraḥa sā tvam etāny akāryāṇi kāryāpekṣā vyavasyasic avijñānena vā yuktā mithyājñānena vā punaḥa atha vāpi svatantrāsi svadoṣeṇeha kena citc yadi kiṃ cic chrutaṃ te sti sarvaṃ kṛtam anarthakama idam anyat tṛtīyaṃ te bhāvasparśavighātakamc duṣṭāyā lakṣyate liṅgaṃ pravaktavyaṃ prakāśitama na mayy evābhisaṃdhis te jayaiṣiṇyā jaye kṛtaḥc yeyaṃ matpariṣat kṛtsnā jetum icchasi tām apia tathā hy evaṃ punaś ca tvaṃ dṛṣṭiṃ svāṃ pratimuñcasic matpakṣapratighātāya svapakṣodbhāvanāya caa sā svenāmarṣajena tvam ṛddhimohena mohitāc bhūyaḥ sṛjasi yogāstraṃ viṣāmṛtam ivaikadhāa icchator hi dvayor lābhaḥ strīpuṃsor amṛtopamaḥc alābhaś cāpy araktasya so tra doṣo viṣopamaḥa mā sprākṣīḥ sadhu jānīṣva svaśāstram anupālayac kṛteyaṃ hi vijijñāsā mukto neti tvayā mamae etat sarvaṃ praticchannaṃ mayi nārhasi gūhituma sā yadi tvaṃ svakāryeṇa yady anyasya mahīpateḥc tattvaṃ satrapraticchannā mayi nārhasi gūhituma na rājānaṃ mṛṣā gacchen na dvijātiṃ kathaṃ canac na striyaṃ strīguṇopetāṃ hanyur hy ete mṛṣāgatāḥa rājñāṃ hi balam aiśvaryaṃ brahma brahmavidāṃ balamc rūpayauvanasaubhāgyaṃ strīṇāṃ balam anuttamama ata etair balair ete balinaḥ svārtham icchatāc ārjavenābhigantavyā vināśāya hy anārjavama sā tvaṃ jātiṃ śrutaṃ vṛttaṃ bhāvaṃ prakṛtim ātmanaḥc kṛtyam āgamane caiva vaktum arhasi tattvataḥa ity etair asukhair vākyair ayuktair asamañjasaiḥc pratyādiṣṭā narendreṇa sulabhā na vyakampataa uktavākye tu nṛpatau sulabhā cārudarśanāc tataś cārutaraṃ vākyaṃ pracakrāmātha bhāṣituma navabhir navabhiś caiva doṣair vāgbuddhidūṣaṇaiḥc apetam upapannārtham aṣṭādaśaguṇānvitama saukṣmyaṃ saṃkhyākramau cobhau nirṇayaḥ saprayojanaḥc pañcaitāny arthajātāni vākyam ity ucyate nṛpaa eṣām ekaikaśo rthānāṃ saukṣmyādīnāṃ sulakṣaṇamc śṛṇu saṃsāryamāṇānāṃ padārthaiḥ padavākyataḥa jñānaṃ jñeyeṣu bhinneṣu yathābhedena vartatec tatrātiśayinī buddhis tat saukṣmyam iti vartatea doṣāṇāṃ ca guṇānāṃ ca pramāṇaṃ pravibhāgaśaḥc kaṃ cid artham abhipretya sā saṃkhyety upadhāryatāma idaṃ pūrvam idaṃ paścād vaktavyaṃ yad vivakṣitamc kramayogaṃ tam apy āhur vākyaṃ vākyavido janāḥa dharmārthakāmamokṣeṣu pratijñāya viśeṣataḥc idaṃ tad iti vākyānte procyate sa vinirṇayaḥa icchādveṣabhavair duḥkhaiḥ prakarṣo yatra jāyatec tatra yā nṛpate vṛttis tat prayojanam iṣyatea tāny etāni yathoktāni saukṣmyādīni janādhipac ekārthasamavetāni vākyaṃ mama niśāmayaa upetārtham abhinnārthaṃ nāpavṛttaṃ na cādhikamc nāślakṣṇaṃ na ca saṃdigdhaṃ vakṣyāmi paramaṃ tavaa na gurvakṣarasaṃbaddhaṃ parāṅmukhamukhaṃ na cac nānṛtaṃ na trivargeṇa viruddhaṃ nāpy asaṃskṛtama na nyūnaṃ kaṣṭaśabdaṃ vā vyutkramābhihitaṃ na cac na śeṣaṃ nānukalpena niṣkāraṇam ahetukama kāmāt krodhād bhayāl lobhād dainyād ānāryakāt tathāc hrīto nukrośato mānān na vakṣyāmi kathaṃ canaa vaktā śrotā ca vākyaṃ ca yadā tv avikalaṃ nṛpac samam eti vivakṣāyāṃ tadā so rthaḥ prakāśatea vaktavye tu yadā vaktā śrotāram avamanyatec svārtham āha parārthaṃ vā tadā vākyaṃ na rohatia atha yaḥ svārtham utsṛjya parārthaṃ prāha mānavaḥc viśaṅkā jāyate tasmin vākyaṃ tad api doṣavata yas tu vaktā dvayor artham aviruddhaṃ prabhāṣatec śrotuś caivātmanaś caiva sa vaktā netaro nṛpaa tad arthavad idaṃ vākyam upetaṃ vākyasaṃpadāc avikṣiptamanā rājann ekāgraḥ śrotum arhasia kāsi kasya kuto veti tvayāham abhicoditāc tatrottaram idaṃ vākyaṃ rājann ekamanāḥ śṛṇua yathā jatu ca kāṣṭhaṃ ca pāṃsavaś codabindubhiḥc suśliṣṭāni tathā rājan prāṇinām iha saṃbhavaḥa śabdaḥ sparśo raso rūpaṃ gandhaḥ pañcendriyāṇi cac pṛthag ātmā daśātmānaḥ saṃśliṣṭā jatukāṣṭhavata na caiṣāṃ codanā kā cid astīty eṣa viniścayaḥc ekaikasyeha vijñānaṃ nāsty ātmani tathā parea na veda cakṣuś cakṣuṣṭvaṃ śrotraṃ nātmani vartatec tathaiva vyabhicāreṇa na vartante parasparame saṃśliṣṭā nābhijāyante yathāpa iha pāṃsavaḥa bāhyān anyān apekṣante guṇāṃs tān api me śṛṇuc rūpaṃ cakṣuḥ prakāśaś ca darśane hetavas trayaḥe yathaivātra tathānyeṣu jñānajñeyeṣu hetavaḥa jñānajñeyāntare tasmin mano nāmāparo guṇaḥc vicārayati yenāyaṃ niścaye sādhvasādhunīa dvādaśas tv aparas tatra buddhir nāma guṇaḥ smṛtaḥc yena saṃśayapūrveṣu boddhavyeṣu aduḥkhavitc taveha jīvitaṃ yamo na cāsti tasya vārakaḥa purā vivāti māruto yamasya yaḥ puraḥsaraḥc puraika eva nīyase kuruṣva sāṃparāyikama purā sahikka eva te pravāti māruto ntakaḥc purā ca
