bhayaṃkarā manuṣyadehagocarāḥc abhidravanti sarvato yatasva puṇyaśīlanea purāndhakāram ekako nupaśyasi tvarasva vaic purā hiraṇmayān nagān nirīkṣase drimūrdhania purā kusaṃgatāni te suhṛnmukhāś ca śatravaḥc vicālayanti darśanād ghaṭasva putra yat parama dhanasya yasya rājato bhayaṃ na cāsti caurataḥc mṛtaṃ ca yan na muñcati samarjayasva tad dhanama na tatra saṃvibhajyate svakarmabhiḥ parasparamc yad eva yasya yautakaṃ tad eva tatra so śnutea paratra yena jīvyate tad eva putra dīyatāmc dhanaṃ yad akṣayaṃ dhruvaṃ samarjayasva tat svayama na yāvad eva pacyate mahājanasya yāvakamc apakva eva yāvake purā praṇīyase tvaraa na mātṛpitṛbāndhavā na saṃstutaḥ priyo janaḥc anuvrajanti saṃkaṭe vrajantam ekapātinama yad eva karma kevalaṃ svayaṃ kṛtaṃ śubhāśubhamc tad eva tasya yautakaṃ bhavaty amutra gacchataḥa hiraṇyaratnasaṃcayāḥ śubhāśubhena saṃcitāḥc na tasya dehasaṃkṣaye bhavanti kāryasādhakāḥa paratragāmikasya te kṛtākṛtasya karmaṇaḥc na sākṣir ātmanā samo nṛṇām ihāsti kaś canaa manuṣyadehaśūnyakaṃ bhavaty amutra gacchataḥc prapaśya buddhicakṣuṣā pradṛśyate hi sarvataḥa ihāgnisūryavāyavaḥ śarīram āśritās trayaḥc ta eva tasya sākṣiṇo bhavanti dharmadarśinaḥa yathāniśeṣu sarvataḥspṛśatsu sarvadāriṣuc prakāśagūḍhavṛttiṣu svadharmam eva pālayaa anekapāripanthike virūparaudrarakṣitec svam eva karma rakṣyatāṃ svakarma tatra gacchatia na tatra saṃvibhajyate svakarmaṇā parasparamc yathākṛtaṃ svakarmajaṃ tad eva bhujyate phalama yathāpsarogaṇāḥ phalaṃ sukhaṃ maharṣibhiḥ sahac tathāpnuvanti karmato vimānakāmagāminaḥa yatheha yat kṛtaṃ śubhaṃ vipāpmabhiḥ kṛtātmabhiḥc tad āpnuvanti mānavās tathā viśuddhayonayaḥa prajāpateḥ salokatāṃ bṛhaspateḥ śatakratoḥc vrajanti te parāṃ gatiṃ gṛhasthadharmasetubhiḥa sahasraśo py anekaśaḥ pravaktum utsahāmahec abuddhimohanaṃ punaḥ prabhur vinā na yāvakama gatā dviraṣṭavarṣatā dhruvo si pañcaviṃśakaḥc kuruṣva dharmasaṃcayaṃ vayo hi te tivartatea purā karoti so ntakaḥ pramādagomukhaṃ damamc yathāgṛhītam utthitaṃ tvarasva dharmapālanea yadā tvam eva pṛṣṭhatas tvam agrato gamiṣyasic tathā gatiṃ gamiṣyataḥ kim ātmanā pareṇa vāa yad ekapātināṃ satāṃ bhavaty amutra gacchatāmc bhayeṣu sāṃparāyikaṃ nidhatsva taṃ mahānidhima sakūlamūlabāndhavaṃ prabhur haraty asaṅgavānc na santi yasya vārakāḥ kuruṣva dharmasaṃnidhima idaṃ nidarśanaṃ mayā taveha putra saṃmatamc svadarśanānumānataḥ pravarṇitaṃ kuruṣva tata dadhāti yaḥ svakarmaṇā dhanāni yasya kasya citc abuddhimohajair guṇaiḥ śataika eva yujyatea śrutaṃ samartham astu te prakurvataḥ śubhāḥ kriyāḥc tad eva tatra darśanaṃ kṛtajñam arthasaṃhitama nibandhanī rajjur eṣā yā grāme vasato ratiḥc chittvaināṃ sukṛto yānti naināṃ chindanti duṣkṛtaḥa kiṃ te dhanena kiṃ bandhubhis tekiṃ te putraiḥ putraka yo mariṣyasic ātmānam anviccha guhāṃ praviṣṭaṃpitāmahās te kva gatāś ca sarvea śvaḥkāryam adya kurvīta pūrvāhṇe cāparāhṇikamb na hi pratīkṣate mṛtyuḥ kṛtaṃ vāsya na vā kṛtamc ko hi tad veda kasyādya mṛtyusenā nivekṣyatea anugamya śmaśānāntaṃ nivartantīha bāndhavāḥc agnau prakṣipya puruṣaṃ jñātayaḥ suhṛdas tathāa nāstikān niranukrośān narān pāpamatau sthitānc vāmataḥ kuru viśrabdhaṃ paraṃ prepsur atandritaḥa evam abhyāhate loke kālenopanipīḍitec sumahad dhairyam ālambya dharmaṃ sarvātmanā kurua athemaṃ darśanopāyaṃ samyag yo vetti mānavaḥc samyak sa dharmaṃ kṛtveha paratra sukham edhatea na dehabhede maraṇaṃ vijānatāṃna ca praṇāśaḥ svanupālite pathic dharmaṃ hi yo vardhayate sa paṇḍitoya eva dharmāc cyavate sa muhyatia prayuktayoḥ karmapathi svakarmaṇoḥphalaṃ prayoktā labhate yathāvidhic nihīnakarmā nirayaṃ prapadyatetriviṣṭapaṃ gacchati dharmapāragaḥa sopānabhūtaṃ svargasya mānuṣyaṃ prāpya durlabhamc tathātmānaṃ samādadhyād bhraśyeta na punar yathāa yasya notkrāmati matiḥ svargamārgānusāriṇīc tam āhuḥ puṇyakarmāṇam aśocyaṃ mitrabāndhavaiḥa yasya nopahatā buddhir niścayeṣv avalambatec svarge kṛtāvakāśasya tasya nāsti mahad bhayama tapovaneṣu ye jātās tatraiva nidhanaṃ gatāḥc teṣām alpataro dharmaḥ kāmabhogam ajānatāma yas tu bhogān parityajya śarīreṇa tapaś caretc na tena kiṃ cin na prāptaṃ tan me bahumataṃ phalama mātāpitṛsahasrāṇi putradāraśatāni cac anāgatāny atītāni kasya te kasya vā vayamd aham eko na me kaś cid ahaṃ vāpi na kasya citd taṃ na paśyāmi yasyāhaṃ taṃ na paśyāmi yo mamaa na teṣāṃ bhavatā kāryaṃ na kāryaṃ tava tair apic svakṛtais tāni yātāni bhavāṃś caiva gamiṣyatia iha loke hi dhaninaḥ paro pi svajanāyatec svajanas tu daridrāṇāṃ jīvatām eva naśyatia saṃcinoty aśubhaṃ karma kalatrāpekṣayā naraḥc tataḥ kleśam avāpnoti paratreha tathaiva caa paśya tvaṃ chidrabhūtaṃ hi jīvalokaṃ svakarmaṇāc tat kuruṣva tathā putra kṛtsnaṃ yat samudāhṛtama tad etat saṃpradṛśyaiva karmabhūmiṃ praviśya tāmc śubhāny ācaritavyāni paralokam abhīpsatāa māsartusaṃjñāparivartakenasūryāgninā rātridivendhanenac svakarmaniṣṭhāphalasākṣikeṇabhūtāni kālaḥ pacati prasahyaa dhanena kiṃ yan na dadāti nāśnutebalena kiṃ yena ripūn na bādhatec śrutena kiṃ yena na dharmam ācaretkim ātmanā yo na jitendriyo vaśīa idaṃ dvaipāyanavaco hitam uktaṃ niśamya tuc śuko gataḥ parityajya pitaraṃ mokṣadeśikam yudhiṣṭhira uvācaa kathaṃ vyāsasya dharmātmā śuko jajñe mahātapāḥc siddhiṃ ca paramāṃ prāptas tan me brūhi pitāmahaa kasyāṃ cotpādayām āsa śukaṃ vyāsas tapodhanaḥc na hy asya jananīṃ vidma janma cāgryaṃ mahātmanaḥa kathaṃ ca bālasya sataḥ sūkṣmajñāne gatā matiḥc yathā nānyasya loke smin dvitīyasyeha kasya cita etad icchāmy ahaṃ śrotuṃ vistareṇa mahādyutec na hi me tṛptir astīha śṛṇvato mṛtam uttamama māhātmyam ātmayogaṃ ca vijñānaṃ ca śukasya hac yathāvad ānupūrvyeṇa tan me brūhi pitāmaha bhīṣma uvācaa na hāyanair na palitair na vittena na bandhubhiḥc ṛṣayaś cakrire dharmaṃ yo nūcānaḥ sa no mahāna tapomūlam idaṃ sarvaṃ yan māṃ pṛcchasi pāṇḍavac tad indriyāṇi saṃyamya tapo bhavati nānyathāa indriyāṇāṃ prasaṅgena doṣam ṛcchaty asaṃśayamc saṃniyamya tu tāny eva siddhiṃ prāpnoti mānavaḥa aśvamedhasahasrasya vājapeyaśatasya cac yogasya kalayā tāta na tulyaṃ vidyate phalama atra te vartayiṣyāmi janmayogaphalaṃ yathāc śukasyāgryāṃ gatiṃ caiva durvidām akṛtātmabhiḥa meruśṛṅge kila purā karṇikāravanāyutec vijahāra mahādevo bhīmair bhūtagaṇair vṛtaḥa śailarājasutā caiva devī tatrābhavat purāc tatra divyaṃ tapas tepe kṛṣṇadvaipāyanaḥ prabhuḥa yogenātmānam āviśya yogadharmaparāyaṇaḥc dhārayan sa tapas tepe putrārthaṃ kurusattamaa agner bhūmer apāṃ vāyor antarikṣasya cābhibhoc vīryeṇa saṃmitaḥ putro mama bhūyād iti sma haa saṃkalpenātha so nena duṣprāpeṇākṛtātmabhiḥc varayām āsa deveśam āsthitas tapa uttamama atiṣṭhan mārutāhāraḥ śataṃ kila samāḥ prabhuḥc ārādhayan mahādevaṃ bahurūpam umāpatima tatra brahmarṣayaś caiva sarve devarṣayas tathāc lokapālāś ca lokeśaṃ sādhyāś ca vasubhiḥ sahaa ādityāś caiva rudrāś ca divākaraniśākarauc maruto mārutaś caiva sāgarāḥ saritas tathāa aśvinau devagandharvās tathā nāradaparvatauc viśvāvasuś ca gandharvaḥ siddhāś cāpsarasāṃ gaṇāḥa tatra rudro mahādevaḥ karṇikāramayīṃ śubhāmc dhārayāṇaḥ srajaṃ bhāti jyotsnām iva niśākaraḥa tasmin divye vane ramye devadevarṣisaṃkulec āsthitaḥ paramaṃ yogam ṛṣiḥ putrārtham udyataḥa na cāsya hīyate varṇo na glānir upajāyatec trayāṇām api lokānāṃ tad adbhutam ivābhavata jaṭāś ca tejasā tasya vaiśvānaraśikhopamāḥc prajvalantyaḥ sma dṛśyante yuktasyāmitatejasaḥa mārkaṇḍeyo hi bhagavān etad ākhyātavān mamac sa devacaritānīha kathayām āsa me sadāa tā etādyāpi kṛṣṇasya tapasā tena dīpitāḥc agnivarṇā jaṭās tāta prakāśante mahātmanaḥa evaṃvidhena tapasā tasya bhaktyā ca bhāratac maheśvaraḥ prasannātmā cakāra manasā matimd tatas tasya mahādevo darśayām āsa sāmbikaḥa uvāca cainaṃ bhagavāṃs tryambakaḥ prahasann ivac evaṃvidhas te tanayo dvaipāyana bhaviṣyatia yathā hy agnir yathā vāyur yathā bhūmir yathā jalamc yathā ca khaṃ tathā śuddho bhaviṣyati suto mahāna tadbhāvabhāvī tadbuddhis tadātmā tadapāśrayaḥc tejasāvṛtya lokāṃs trīn yaśaḥ prāpsyati kevalam bhīṣma uvācaa sa labdhvā paramaṃ devād varaṃ satyavatīsutaḥc araṇīṃ tv atha saṃgṛhya mamanthāgnicikīrṣayāa atha rūpaṃ paraṃ rājan bibhratīṃ svena tejasāc ghṛtācīṃ nāmāpsarasam apaśyad bhagavān ṛṣiḥa ṛṣir apsarasaṃ dṛṣṭvā sahasā kāmamohitaḥc abhavad bhagavān vyāso vane tasmin yudhiṣṭhiraa sā ca kṛtvā tadā vyāsaṃ kāmasaṃvignamānasamc śukī bhūtvā mahārāja ghṛtācī samupāgamata sa tām apsarasaṃ dṛṣṭvā rūpeṇānyena saṃvṛtāmc śarīrajenānugataḥ sarvagātrātigena haa sa tu dhairyeṇa mahatā nigṛhṇan hṛcchayaṃ muniḥc na śaśāka niyantuṃ tad vyāsaḥ pravisṛtaṃ manaḥe bhāvitvāc caiva bhāvasya ghṛtācyā vapuṣā hṛtaḥa yatnān niyacchatas tasya muner agnicikīrṣayāc araṇyām eva sahasā tasya śukram avāpatata so viśaṅkena manasā tathaiva dvijasattamaḥc araṇīṃ mamantha brahmarṣis tasyāṃ jajñe śuko nṛpaa śukre nirmathyamāne tu śuko jajñe mahātapāḥc paramarṣir mahāyogī araṇīgarbhasaṃbhavaḥa yathādhvare samiddho gnir bhāti havyam upāttavānc tathārūpaḥ śuko jajñe prajvalann iva tejasāa bibhrat pituś ca kauravya rūpavarṇam anuttamamc babhau tadā bhāvitātmā vidhūmo gnir iva jvalana taṃ gaṅgā saritāṃ śreṣṭhā merupṛṣṭhe janeśvarac svarūpiṇī tadābhyetya snāpayām āsa vāriṇāa antarikṣāc ca kauravya daṇḍaḥ kṛṣṇājinaṃ ca hac papāta bhuvi rājendra śukasyārthe mahātmanaḥa jegīyante sma gandharvā nanṛtuś cāpsarogaṇāḥc devadundubhayaś caiva prāvādyanta mahāsvanāḥa viśvāvasuś ca gandharvas tathā tumburunāradauc hāhāhūhū ca gandharvau tuṣṭuvuḥ śukasaṃbhavama tatra śakrapurogāś ca lokapālāḥ samāgatāḥc devā devarṣayaś caiva tathā brahmarṣayo pi caa divyāni sarvapuṣpāṇi pravavarṣātra mārutaḥc jaṅgamaṃ sthāvaraṃ caiva prahṛṣṭam abhavaj jagata taṃ mahātmā svayaṃ prītyā devyā saha mahādyutiḥc jātamātraṃ muneḥ putraṃ vidhinopānayat tadāa tasya deveśvaraḥ śakro divyam adbhutadarśanamc dadau kamaṇḍaluṃ prītyā devavāsāṃsi cābhibhoa haṃsāś ca śatapatrāś ca sārasāś ca sahasraśaḥc pradakṣiṇam avartanta śukāś cāṣāś ca bhārataa āraṇeyas tathā divyaṃ prāpya janma mahādyutiḥc tatraivovāsa medhāvī vratacārī samāhitaḥa utpannamātraṃ taṃ vedāḥ sarahasyāḥ sasaṃgrahāḥc upatasthur mahārāja yathāsya pitaraṃ tathāa bṛhaspatiṃ tu vavre sa vedavedāṅgabhāṣyavitc upādhyāyaṃ mahārāja dharmam evānucintayana so dhītya vedān akhilān sarahasyān sasaṃgrahānc itihāsaṃ ca kārtsnyena rājaśāstrāṇi cābhibhoa gurave dakṣiṇāṃ dattvā samāvṛtto mahāmuniḥc ugraṃ tapaḥ samārebhe brahmacārī samāhitaḥa devatānām ṛṣīṇāṃ ca bālye pi sa mahātapāḥc saṃmantraṇīyo mānyaś ca jñānena tapasā tathāa na tv asya ramate buddhir āśrameṣu narādhipac triṣu gārhasthyamūleṣu mokṣadharmānudarśinaḥ bhīṣma uvācaa sa mokṣam anucintyaiva śukaḥ pitaram abhyagātc prāhābhivādya ca guruṃ śreyorthī vinayānvitaḥa mokṣadharmeṣu kuśalo bhagavān prabravītu mec yathā me manasaḥ śāntiḥ paramā saṃbhavet prabhoa śrutvā putrasya vacanaṃ paramarṣir uvāca tamc adhīṣva putra mokṣaṃ vai dharmāṃś ca vividhān apia pitur niyogāj jagrāha śuko brahmavidāṃ varaḥc yogaśāstraṃ ca nikhilaṃ kāpilaṃ caiva bhārataa sa taṃ brāhmyā śriyā yuktaṃ brahmatulyaparākramamc mene putraṃ yadā vyāso mokṣavidyāviśāradama uvāca gaccheti tadā janakaṃ mithileśvaramc sa te vakṣyati mokṣārthaṃ nikhilena viśeṣataḥa pitur niyogād agaman maithilaṃ janakaṃ nṛpamc praṣṭuṃ dharmasya niṣṭhāṃ vai mokṣasya ca parāyaṇama uktaś ca mānuṣeṇa tvaṃ pathā gacchety avismitaḥc na prabhāveṇa gantavyam antarikṣacareṇa vaia ārjaveṇaiva gantavyaṃ na sukhānveṣiṇā pathāc nānveṣṭavyā viśeṣās tu viśeṣā hi prasaṅginaḥa ahaṃkāro na kartavyo yājye tasmin narādhipec sthātavyaṃ ca vaśe tasya sa te chetsyati saṃśayama sa dharmakuśalo rājā mokṣaśāstraviśāradaḥc yājyo mama sa yad brūyāt tat kāryam aviśaṅkayāa evam uktaḥ sa dharmātmā jagāma mithilāṃ muniḥc padbhyāṃ śakto ntarikṣeṇa krāntuṃ bhūmiṃ sasāgarāma sa girīṃś cāpy atikramya nadīs tīrtvā sarāṃsi cac bahuvyālamṛgākīrṇā vividhāś cāṭavīs tathāa meror hareś ca dve varṣe varṣaṃ haimavataṃ tathāc krameṇaiva vyatikramya bhārataṃ varṣam āsadata sa deśān vividhān paśyaṃś cīnahūṇaniṣevitānc āryāvartam imaṃ deśam ājagāma mahāmuniḥa pitur vacanam ājñāya tam evārthaṃ vicintayanc adhvānaṃ so ticakrāma khe caraḥ khe carann ivaa pattanāni ca ramyāṇi sphītāni nagarāṇi cac ratnāni ca vicitrāṇi śukaḥ paśyan na paśyatia udyānāni ca ramyāṇi tathaivāyatanāni cac puṇyāni caiva tīrthāni so tikramya tathādhvanaḥa so cireṇaiva kālena videhān āsasāda hac rakṣitān dharmarājena janakena mahātmanāa tatra grāmān bahūn paśyan bahvannarasabhojanānc pallīghoṣān samṛddhāṃś ca bahugokulasaṃkulāna sphītāṃś ca śāliyavasair haṃsasārasasevitānc padminībhiś ca śataśaḥ śrīmatībhir alaṃkṛtāna sa videhān atikramya samṛddhajanasevitānc mithilopavanaṃ ramyam āsasāda maharddhimata hastyaśvarathasaṃkīrṇaṃ naranārīsamākulamc paśyann apaśyann iva tat samatikrāmad acyutaḥa manasā taṃ vahan bhāraṃ tam evārthaṃ vicintayanc ātmārāmaḥ prasannātmā mithilām āsasāda haa tasyā dvāraṃ samāsādya dvārapālair nivāritaḥc sthito dhyānaparo mukto viditaḥ praviveśa haa sa rājamārgam āsādya samṛddhajanasaṃkulamc pārthivakṣayam āsādya niḥśaṅkaḥ praviveśa haa tatrāpi dvārapālās tam ugravāco nyaṣedhayanc tathaiva ca śukas tatra nirmanyuḥ samatiṣṭhataa na cātapādhvasaṃtaptaḥ kṣutpipāsāśramānvitaḥc pratāmyati glāyati vā nāpaiti ca tathātapāta teṣāṃ tu dvārapālānām ekaḥ śokasamanvitaḥc madhyaṃgatam ivādityaṃ dṛṣṭvā śukam avasthitama pūjayitvā yathānyāyam abhivādya kṛtāñjaliḥc prāveśayat tataḥ kakṣyāṃ dvitīyāṃ rājaveśmanaḥa tatrāsīnaḥ śukas tāta mokṣam evānucintayanc chāyāyām ātape caiva samadarśī mahādyutiḥa taṃ muhūrtād ivāgamya rājño mantrī kṛtāñjaliḥc prāveśayat tataḥ kakṣyāṃ tṛtīyāṃ rājaveśmanaḥa tatrāntaḥpurasaṃbaddhaṃ mahac caitrarathopamamc suvibhaktajalākrīḍaṃ ramyaṃ puṣpitapādapama tad darśayitvā sa śukaṃ mantrī kānanam uttamamb śukaṃ prāveśayan mantrī pramadāvanam uttamamc arham āsanam ādiśya niścakrāma tataḥ punaḥa taṃ cāruveṣāḥ suśroṇyas taruṇyaḥ priyadarśanāḥc sūkṣmaraktāmbaradharās taptakāñcanabhūṣaṇāḥa saṃlāpollāpakuśalā nṛttagītaviśāradāḥc smitapūrvābhibhāṣiṇyo rūpeṇāpsarasāṃ samāḥa kāmopacārakuśalā bhāvajñāḥ sarvakovidāḥc paraṃ pañcāśato nāryo vāramukhyāḥ samādravana pādyādīni pratigrāhya pūjayā parayārcya cac deśakālopapannena sādhvannenāpy atarpayana tasya bhuktavatas tāta tad antaḥpurakānanamc suramyaṃ darśayām āsur ekaikaśyena bhārataa krīḍantyaś ca hasantyaś ca gāyantyaś caiva tāḥ śukamc udārasattvaṃ sattvajñāḥ sarvāḥ paryacaraṃs tadāa āraṇeyas tu śuddhātmā trisaṃdehas trikarmakṛtc vaśyendriyo jitakrodho na hṛṣyati na kupyatia tasmai śayyāsanaṃ divyaṃ varārhaṃ ratnabhūṣitamc spardhyāstaraṇasaṃstīrṇaṃ dadus tāḥ paramastriyaḥa pādaśaucaṃ tu kṛtvaiva śukaḥ saṃdhyām upāsya cac niṣasādāsane puṇye tam evārthaṃ vicintayana pūrvarātre tu tatrāsau bhūtvā dhyānaparāyaṇaḥc madhyarātre yathānyāyaṃ nidrām āhārayat prabhuḥa tato muhūrtād utthāya kṛtvā śaucam anantaramc strībhiḥ parivṛto dhīmān dhyānam evānvapadyataa anena vidhinā kārṣṇis tad ahaḥśeṣam acyutaḥc tāṃ ca rātriṃ nṛpakule vartayām āsa bhārata bhīṣma uvācaa tataḥ sa rājā janako mantribhiḥ saha bhāratac puraḥ purohitaṃ kṛtvā sarvāṇy antaḥpurāṇi caa āsanaṃ ca puraskṛtya ratnāni vividhāni cac śirasā cārghyam ādāya guruputraṃ samabhyagāta sa tad āsanam ādāya bahuratnavibhūṣitamc spardhyāstaraṇasaṃstīrṇaṃ sarvatobhadram ṛddhimata purodhasā saṃgṛhītaṃ hastenālabhya pārthivaḥc pradadau guruputrāya śukāya paramārcitama tatropaviṣṭaṃ taṃ kārṣṇiṃ śāstrataḥ pratyapūjayatc pādyaṃ nivedya prathamam arghyaṃ gāṃ ca nyavedayate sa ca tāṃ mantravat pūjāṃ pratyagṛhṇād yathāvidhia pratigṛhya ca tāṃ pūjāṃ janakād dvijasattamaḥc gāṃ caiva samanujñāya rājānam anumānya caa paryapṛcchan mahātejā rājñaḥ kuśalam avyayamc anāmayaṃ ca rājendra śukaḥ sānucarasya haa anujñātaḥ sa tenātha niṣasāda sahānugaḥc udārasattvābhijano bhūmau rājā kṛtāñjaliḥa kuśalaṃ cāvyayaṃ caiva pṛṣṭvā vaiyāsakiṃ nṛpaḥc kim āgamanam ity eva paryapṛcchata pārthivaḥ śuka uvācaa pitrāham ukto bhadraṃ te mokṣadharmārthakovidaḥc videharājo yājyo me janako nāma viśrutaḥa tatra gacchasva vai tūrṇaṃ yadi te hṛdi saṃśayaḥc pravṛttau vā nivṛttau vā sa te chetsyati saṃśayama so haṃ pitur niyogāt tvām upapraṣṭum ihāgataḥc tan me dharmabhṛtāṃ śreṣṭha yathāvad vaktum arhasia kiṃ kāryaṃ brāhmaṇeneha mokṣārthaś ca kim ātmakaḥc kathaṃ ca mokṣaḥ kartavyo jñānena tapasāpi vā janaka uvācaa yat kāryaṃ brāhmaṇeneha janmaprabhṛti tac chṛṇuc kṛtopanayanas tāta bhaved vedaparāyaṇaḥa tapasā guruvṛttyā ca brahmacaryeṇa cābhibhoc devatānāṃ pitṝṇāṃ cāpy anṛṇaś cānasūyakaḥa vedān adhītya niyato dakṣiṇām apavarjya cac abhyanujñām atha prāpya samāvarteta vai dvijaḥa samāvṛttas tu gārhasthye sadāro niyato vasetc anasūyur yathānyāyam āhitāgnis tathaiva caa utpādya putrapautraṃ tu vanyāśramapade vasetc tān evāgnīn yathāśāstram arcayann atithipriyaḥa sa vane gnīn yathānyāyam ātmany āropya dharmavitc nirdvaṃdvo vītarāgātmā brahmāśramapade vaset śuka uvācaa utpanne jñānavijñāne pratyakṣe hṛdi śāśvatec kim avaśyaṃ nivastavyam āśrameṣu jñānasyādhigamaḥ smṛtaḥa ācāryaḥ plāvitā tasya jñānaṃ plava ihocyatec vijñāya kṛtakṛtyas tu tīrṇas tad ubhayaṃ tyajeta anucchedāya lokānām anucchedāya karmaṇāmc pūrvair ācarito dharmaś cāturāśramyasaṃkathaḥa anena kramayogena bahujātiṣu karmaṇāc kṛtvā śubhāśubhaṃ karma mokṣo nāmeha labhyatea bhavitaiḥ kāraṇaiś cāyaṃ bahusaṃsārayoniṣuc āsādayati śuddhātmā mokṣaṃ vai prathamāśramea tam āsādya tu muktasya dṛṣṭārthasya vipaścitaḥc triṣv āśrameṣu ko nv artho bhavet param abhīpsataḥa rājasāṃs tāmasāṃś caiva nityaṃ doṣān vivarjayetc sāttvikaṃ mārgam āsthāya paśyed ātmānam ātmanāa sarvabhūteṣu cātmānaṃ sarvabhūtāni cātmanic saṃpaśyan nopalipyeta jale vāricaro yathāa pakṣīva plavanād ūrdhvam amutrānantyam aśnutec vihāya dehaṃ nirmukto nirdvaṃdvaḥ praśamaṃ gataḥa atra gāthāḥ purā gītāḥ śṛṇu rājñā yayātināc dhāryante yā dvijais tāta mokṣaśāstraviśāradaiḥa jyotir ātmani nānyatra rataṃ tatraiva caiva tatc svayaṃ ca śakyaṃ tad draṣṭuṃ susamāhitacetasāa na bibheti paro yasmān na bibheti parāc ca yaḥc yaś ca necchati na dveṣṭi brahma saṃpadyate tadāa yadā bhāvaṃ na kurute sarvabhūteṣu pāpakamc karmaṇā manasā vācā brahma saṃpadyate tadāa saṃyojya tapasātmānam īrṣyām utsṛjya mohinīmc tyaktvā kāmaṃ ca lobhaṃ ca tato brahmatvam aśnutea yadā śravye ca dṛśye ca sarvabhūteṣu cāpyayamc samo bhavati nirdvaṃdvo brahma saṃpadyate tadāa yadā stutiṃ ca nindāṃ ca samatvenaiva paśyatic kāñcanaṃ cāyasaṃ caiva sukhaduḥkhe tathaiva caa śītam uṣṇaṃ tathaivārtham anarthaṃ priyam apriyamc jīvitaṃ maraṇaṃ caiva brahma saṃpadyate tadāa prasāryeha yathāṅgāni kūrmaḥ saṃharate punaḥc tathendriyāṇi manasā saṃyantavyāni bhikṣuṇāa tamaḥparigataṃ veśma yathā dīpena dṛśyatec tathā buddhipradīpena śakya ātmā nirīkṣituma etat sarvaṃ prapaśyāmi tvayi buddhimatāṃ varac yac cānyad api vettavyaṃ tattvato veda tad bhavāna brahmarṣe viditaś cāsi viṣayāntam upāgataḥc guros tava prasādena tava caivopaśikṣayāa tasyaiva ca prasādena prādurbhūtaṃ mahāmunec jñānaṃ divyaṃ mamāpīdaṃ tenāsi vidito mamaa adhikaṃ tava vijñānam adhikā ca gatis tavac adhikaṃ ca tavaiśvaryaṃ tac ca tvaṃ nāvabudhyasea bālyād vā saṃśayād vāpi bhayād vāpy avimokṣajātc utpanne cāpi vijñāne nādhigacchati tāṃ gatima vyavasāyena śuddhena madvidhaiś chinnasaṃśayaḥc vimucya hṛdayagranthīn āsādayati tāṃ gatima bhavāṃś cotpannavijñānaḥ sthirabuddhir alolupaḥc vyavasāyād ṛte brahmann āsādayati tatparama nāsti te sukhaduḥkheṣu viśeṣo nāsti lolupāc nautsukyaṃ nṛttagīteṣu na rāga upajāyatea na bandhuṣu nibandhas te na bhayeṣv asti te bhayamc paśyāmi tvāṃ mahābhāga tulyaloṣṭāśmakāñcanama ahaṃ ca tvānupaśyāmi ye cāpy anye manīṣiṇaḥc āsthitaṃ paramaṃ mārgam akṣayaṃ tam anāmayama yat phalaṃ brāhmaṇasyeha mokṣārthaś ca yad ātmakaḥc tasmin vai vartase vipra kim anyat paripṛcchasi bhīṣma uvācaa etac chrutvā tu vacanaṃ kṛtātmā kṛtaniścayaḥc ātmanātmānam āsthāya dṛṣṭvā cātmānam ātmanāa kṛtakāryaḥ sukhī śāntas tūṣṇīṃ prāyād udaṅmukhaḥb prayayau yogam āsthāya tuṣṭo diśam athottarāmc śaiśiraṃ girim uddiśya sadharmā mātariśvanaḥa etasminn eva kāle tu devarṣir nāradas tadāc himavantam iyād draṣṭuṃ siddhacāraṇasevitama tam apsarogaṇākīrṇaṃ gītasvananināditamc kiṃnarāṇāṃ samūhaiś ca bhṛṅgarājais tathaiva caa madgubhiḥ khañjarīṭaiś ca vicitrair jīvajīvakaiḥc citravarṇair mayūraiś ca kekāśatavirājitaiḥe rājahaṃsasamūhaiś ca hṛṣṭaiḥ parabhṛtais tathāa pakṣirājo garutmāṃś ca yaṃ nityam adhigacchatic catvāro lokapālāś ca devāḥ sarṣigaṇās tathāe yatra nityaṃ samāyānti lokasya hitakāmyayāa viṣṇunā yatra putrārthe tapas taptaṃ mahātmanāc yatraiva ca kumāreṇa bālye kṣiptā divaukasaḥa śaktir nyastā kṣititale trailokyam avamanya vaic yatrovāca jagatskandaḥ kṣipan vākyam idaṃ tadāa yo nyo sti matto bhyadhiko viprā yasyādhikaṃ priyāḥc yo brahmaṇyo dvitīyo sti triṣu lokeṣu vīryavāna so bhyuddharatv imāṃ śaktim atha vā kampayatv itic tac chrutvā vyathitā lokāḥ ka imām uddhared itia atha devagaṇaṃ sarvaṃ saṃbhrāntendriyamānasamc apaśyad bhagavān viṣṇuḥ kṣiptaṃ sāsurarākṣasame kiṃ nv atra sukṛtaṃ kāryaṃ bhaved iti vicintayana sa nāmṛṣyata taṃ kṣepam avaikṣata ca pāvakimc sa prahasya viśuddhātmā śaktiṃ prajvalitāṃ tadāe kampayām āsa savyena pāṇinā puruṣottamaḥa śaktyāṃ tu kampamānāyāṃ viṣṇunā balinā tadāc medinī kampitā sarvā saśailavanakānanāa śaktenāpi samuddhartuṃ kampitā sā na tūddhṛtāc rakṣatā skandarājasya dharṣaṇāṃ prabhaviṣṇunāa tāṃ kampayitvā bhagavān prahrādam idam abravītc paśya vīryaṃ kumārasya naitad anyaḥ kariṣyatia so mṛṣyamāṇas tad vākyaṃ samuddharaṇaniścitaḥc jagrāha tāṃ tasya śaktiṃ na cainām apy akampayata nādaṃ mahāntaṃ muktvā sa mūrchito girimūrdhanic vihvalaḥ prāpatad bhūmau hiraṇyakaśipoḥ sutaḥa yatrottarāṃ diśaṃ gatvā śailarājasya pārśvataḥc tapo tapyata durdharṣas tāta nityaṃ vṛṣadhvajaḥa pāvakena parikṣipto dīpyatā tasya cāśramaḥc ādityabandhanaṃ nāma durdharṣam akṛtātmabhiḥa na tatra śakyate gantuṃ yakṣarākṣasadānavaiḥc daśayojanavistāram agnijvālāsamāvṛtama bhagavān pāvakas tatra svayaṃ tiṣṭhati vīryavānc sarvavighnān praśamayan mahādevasya dhīmataḥa divyaṃ varṣasahasraṃ hi pādenaikena tiṣṭhataḥc devān saṃtāpayaṃs tatra mahādevo dhṛtavrataḥa aindrīṃ tu diśam āsthāya śailarājasya dhīmataḥc vivikte parvatataṭe pārāśaryo mahātapāḥe vedān adhyāpayām āsa vyāsaḥ śiṣyān mahātapāḥa sumantuṃ ca mahābhāgaṃ vaiśaṃpāyanam eva cac jaiminiṃ ca mahāprājñaṃ pailaṃ cāpi tapasvinama ebhiḥ śiṣyaiḥ parivṛto vyāsa āste mahātapāḥc tatrāśramapadaṃ puṇyaṃ dadarśa pitur uttamame āraṇeyo viśuddhātmā nabhasīva divākaraḥa atha vyāsaḥ parikṣiptaṃ jvalantam iva pāvakamc dadarśa sutam āyāntaṃ divākarasamaprabhama asajjamānaṃ vṛkṣeṣu śaileṣu viṣameṣu cac yogayuktaṃ mahātmānaṃ yathā bāṇaṃ guṇacyutama so bhigamya pituḥ pādāv agṛhṇād araṇīsutaḥc yathopajoṣaṃ taiś cāpi samāgacchan mahāmuniḥa tato nivedayām āsa pitre sarvam aśeṣataḥc śuko janakarājena saṃvādaṃ prītamānasaḥa evam adhyāpayañ śiṣyān vyāsaḥ putraṃ ca vīryavānc uvāsa himavatpṛṣṭhe pārāśaryo mahāmuniḥa tataḥ kadā cic chiṣyās taṃ parivāryāvatasthirec vedādhyayanasaṃpannāḥ śāntātmāno jitendriyāḥa vedeṣu niṣṭhāṃ saṃprāpya sāṅgeṣv atitapasvinaḥc athocus te tadā vyāsaṃ śiṣyāḥ prāñjalayo guruma mahatā śreyasā yuktā yaśasā ca sma vardhitāḥc ekaṃ tv idānīm icchāmo guruṇānugrahaṃ kṛtama iti teṣāṃ vacaḥ śrutvā brahmarṣis tān uvāca hac ucyatām iti tad vatsā yad vaḥ kāryaṃ priyaṃ mayāa etad vākyaṃ guroḥ śrutvā śiṣyās te hṛṣṭamānasāḥc punaḥ prāñjalayo bhūtvā praṇamya śirasā guruma ūcus te sahitā rājann idaṃ vacanam uttamamc yadi prīta upādhyāyo dhanyāḥ smo munisattamaa kāṅkṣāmas tu vayaṃ sarve varaṃ dattaṃ maharṣiṇāc ṣaṣṭhaḥ śiṣyo na te khyātiṃ gacched atra prasīda naḥa catvāras te vayaṃ śiṣyā guruputraś ca pañcamaḥc iha vedāḥ pratiṣṭherann eṣa naḥ kāṅkṣito varaḥa śiṣyāṇāṃ vacanaṃ śrutvā vyāso vedārthatattvavitc parāśarātmajo dhīmān paralokārthacintakaḥe uvāca śiṣyān dharmātmā guror vākyaṃ vyāsaśiṣyā mahaujasaḥc anyonyaṃ hṛṣṭamanasaḥ pariṣasvajire tadāa uktāḥ smo yad bhagavatā tadātvāyatisaṃhitamc tan no manasi saṃrūḍhaṃ kariṣyāmas tathā ca tata anyonyaṃ ca sabhājyaivaṃ suprītamanasaḥ punaḥc vijñāpayanti sma guruṃ punar vākyaviśāradāḥa śailād asmān mahīṃ gantuṃ kāṅkṣitaṃ no mahāmunec vedān anekadhā kartuṃ yadi te rucitaṃ vibhoa śiṣyāṇāṃ vacanaṃ śrutvā parāśarasutaḥ prabhuḥc pratyuvāca tato vākyaṃ dharmārthasahitaṃ hitama kṣitiṃ vā devalokaṃ vā gamyatāṃ yadi rocatec apramādaś ca vaḥ kāryo brahma hi pracuracchalama te nujñātās tataḥ sarve guruṇā satyavādināc brāhmaṇasyāvrataṃ malamc malaṃ pṛthivyā vāhīkāḥ strīṇāṃ kautūhalaṃ malama adhīyatāṃ bhavān vedān sārdhaṃ putreṇa dhīmatāc vidhunvan brahmaghoṣeṇa rakṣobhayakṛtaṃ tamaḥ bhīṣma uvācaa nāradasya vacaḥ bāhlīkā brūhi me vadatāṃ varad asyāṃ pṛthivyāṃ catvāro deśāḥ pāpajanair vṛtāḥd yugaṃdharas tu prathamas tathā bhūtilakaḥ smṛtaḥd acyutacchala ity uktas tṛtīyaḥ pāpakṛttamaḥd caturthas tu mahāpāpo abhavac chuddhā piśācī divyarūpiṇīd apsarā hy abhavad divyā gatā svarlokam uttamamd brāhmaṇī caiva kālena vāsudevaparāyaṇād saputrā cāgatā sthānam acyutasya paraṃ śubhamd etat te kathitaṃ vidvan mune kautūhalasamanvitaḥa apṛcchat pitaraṃ brahman kuto vāyur abhūd ayamc ākhyātum arhati bhavān vāyoḥ sarvaṃ viceṣṭitama śukasyaitad vacaḥ śrutvā vyāsaḥ paramavismitaḥc anadhyāyanimitte sminn idaṃ vacanam samanucintayaa devayānacaro viṣṇoḥ pitṛyānaś ca tāmasaḥc dvāv etau pretya panthānau divaṃ cādhaś ca gacchataḥa pṛthivyām antarikṣe ca yatra saṃvānti vāyavaḥc saptaite vāyumārgā vai tān nibodhānupūrvaśaḥa tatra devagaṇāḥ sādhyāḥ samabhūvan mahābalāḥc teṣām apy abhavat putraḥ samāno nāma durjayaḥa udānas tasya putro bhūd vyānas tasyābhavat sutaḥc apānaś ca tato jñeyaḥ prāṇaś cāpi tataḥ parama anapatyo bhavat prāṇo durdharṣaḥ śatrutāpanaḥc pṛthak karmāṇi teṣāṃ tu pravakṣyāmi yathātathama prāṇināṃ sarvato vāyuś ceṣṭā vartayate pṛthakc prāṇanāc caiva bhūtānāṃ prāṇa ity abhidhīyatea prerayaty abhrasaṃghātān dhūmajāṃś coṣmajāṃś ca yaḥc prathamaḥ prathame mārge pravaho nāma so nilaḥa ambare sneham abhrebhyas taḍidbhyaś cottamadyutiḥc āvaho nāma saṃvāti dvitīyaḥ śvasano nadana udayaṃ jyotiṣāṃ śaśvat somādīnāṃ karoti yaḥc antardeheṣu codānaṃ yaṃ vadanti maharṣayaḥa yaś caturbhyaḥ samudrebhyo vāyur dhārayate jalamc uddhṛtyādadate cāpo jīmūtebhyo mbare nilaḥa yo dbhiḥ saṃyojya jīmūtān parjanyāya prayacchatic udvaho nāma varṣiṣṭhas tritīyaḥ sa sadāgatiḥa samuhyamānā bahudhā yena nīlāḥ pṛthag ghanāḥc varṣamokṣakṛtārambhās te bhavanti ghanāghanāḥa saṃhatā yena cāviddhā bhavanti nadatāṃ nadāḥc rakṣaṇārthāya saṃbhūtā meghatvam upayānti caa yo sau vahati devānāṃ vimānāni vihāyasāc caturthaḥ saṃvaho nāma vāyuḥ sa girimardanaḥa yena vegavatā rugṇā rūkṣeṇārujatā rasānc vāyunā vihatā meghā na bhavanti balāhakāḥa dāruṇotpātasaṃcāro nabhasaḥ stanayitnumānc pañcamaḥ sa mahāvego vivaho nāma mārutaḥa yasmin pāriplave divyā vahanty āpo vihāyasāc puṇyaṃ cākāśagaṅgāyās toyaṃ viṣṭabhya tiṣṭhatia dūrāt pratihato yasminn ekaraśmir divākaraḥc yonir aṃśusahasrasya yena bhāti vasuṃdharāa yasmād āpyāyate somo nidhir divyo mṛtasya cac ṣaṣṭhaḥ parivaho nāma sa vāyur javatāṃ varaḥa sarvaprāṇabhṛtāṃ prāṇān yo ntakāle nirasyatic yasya vartmānuvartete mṛtyuvaivasvatāv ubhaua samyag anvīkṣatāṃ buddhyā śāntayādhyātmanityayāc dhyānābhyāsābhirāmāṇāṃ yo mṛtatvāya kalpatea yaṃ samāsādya vegena diśām antaṃ prapedirec dakṣasya daśa putrāṇāṃ sahasrāṇi prajāpateḥa yena sṛṣṭaḥ parābhūto yāty eva na nivartatec parāvaho nāma paro vāyuḥ sa duratikramaḥa evam ete diteḥ putrā mārutāḥ paramādbhutāḥc anāramantaḥ saṃvānti sarvagāḥ sarvadhāriṇaḥa etat tu mahad āścaryaṃ yad ayaṃ parvatottamaḥc kampitaḥ sahasā tena vāyunābhipravāyatāa viṣṇor niḥśvāsavāto yaṃ yadā vegasamīritaḥc sahasodīryate tāta jagat pravyathate tadāa tasmād brahmavido brahma nādhīyante tivāyatic vāyor vāyubhayaṃ hy uktaṃ brahma tat pīḍitaṃ bhaveta etāvad uktvā vacanaṃ parāśarasutaḥ prabhuḥc uktvā putram adhīṣveti vyomagaṅgām ayāt tadā bhīṣma uvācaa etasminn antare śūnye nāradaḥ samupāgamatc śukaṃ svādhyāyanirataṃ vedārthān vaktum īpsitānd mokṣopāyān bahuvidhāñ śukasyādeṣṭum īpsitāna devarṣiṃ tu śuko dṛṣṭvā nāradaṃ samupasthitamc arghyapūrveṇa vidhinā vedoktenābhyapūjayata nārado thābravīt prīto brūhi brahmavidāṃ varac kena tvāṃ śreyasā tāta yojayāmīti hṛṣṭavata nāradasya vacaḥ śrutvā śukaḥ provāca bhāratac asmiṃl loke hitaṃ yat syāt tena māṃ yoktum arhasi nārada uvācaa tattvaṃ jijñāsatāṃ pūrvam ṛṣīṇāṃ bhāvitātmanāmc sanatkumāro bhagavān idaṃ vacanam abravīta nāsti vidyāsamaṃ cakṣur nāsti vidyāsamaṃ tapaḥc nāsti rāgasamaṃ duḥkhaṃ nāsti tyāgasamaṃ sukhama nivṛttiḥ karmaṇaḥ pāpāt satataṃ puṇyaśīlatāc sadvṛttiḥ samudācāraḥ śreya etad anuttamama mānuṣyam asukhaṃ prāpya yaḥ sajjati sa muhyatic nālaṃ sa duḥkhamokṣāya saṅgo vai duḥkhalakṣaṇama saktasya buddhiś calati mohajālavivardhinīc mohajālāvṛto duḥkham iha cāmutra cāśnutea sarvopāyena kāmasya krodhasya ca vinigrahaḥc kāryaḥ śreyorthinā tau hi śreyoghātārtham udyataua nityaṃ krodhāt tapo rakṣec chriyaṃ rakṣeta matsarātc vidyāṃ mānāvamānābhyām ātmānaṃ tu pramādataḥa ānṛśaṃsyaṃ paro dharmaḥ kṣamā ca paramaṃ balamc ātmajñānaṃ paraṃ jñānaṃ na satyād vidyate parama satyasya vacanaṃ śreyaḥ satyād api hitaṃ bhavetc yad bhūtahitam atyantam etat satyaṃ mataṃ mamaa sarvārambhaphalatyāgī nirāśīr niṣparigrahaḥc yena sarvaṃ parityaktaṃ sa vidvān sa ca paṇḍitaḥa indriyair indriyārthebhyaś caraty ātmavaśair ihac asajjamānaḥ śāntātmā nirvikāraḥ samāhitaḥa ātmabhūtair atadbhūtaḥ saha caiva vinaiva cac sa vimuktaḥ paraṃ śreyo nacireṇādhigacchatia adarśanam asaṃsparśas tathāsaṃbhāṣaṇaṃ sadāc yasya bhūtaiḥ saha mune sa śreyo vindate parama na hiṃsyāt sarvabhūtāni maitrāyaṇagataś caretc nedaṃ janma samāsādya vairaṃ kurvīta kena cita ākiṃcanyaṃ susaṃtoṣo nirāśīṣṭvam acāpalamc etad āhuḥ paraṃ śreya ātmajñasya jitātmanaḥa parigrahaṃ parityajya bhava tāta jitendriyaḥc aśokaṃ sthānam ātiṣṭha iha cāmutra cābhayama nirāmiṣā na śocanti tyajehāmiṣam ātmanaḥc parityajyāmiṣaṃ saumya duḥkhatāpād vimokṣyasea taponityena dāntena muninā saṃyatātmanāc ajitaṃ jetukāmena bhāvyaṃ saṅgeṣv asaṅgināa guṇasaṅgeṣv anāsakta ekacaryārataḥ sadāc brāhmaṇe nacirād eva sukham āyāty anuttamama dvaṃdvārāmeṣu bhūteṣu ya eko ramate muniḥc viddhi prajñānatṛptaṃ taṃ jñānatṛpto na śocatia śubhair labhati devatvaṃ vyāmiśrair janma mānuṣamc aśubhaiś cāpy adhojanma karmabhir labhate vaśaḥa tatra mṛtyujarāduḥkhaiḥ satataṃ samabhidrutaḥc saṃsāre pacyate jantus tat kathaṃ nāvabudhyasea ahite hitasaṃjñas tvam adhruve dhruvasaṃjñakaḥc anarthe cārthasaṃjñas tvaṃ kimarthaṃ nāvabudhyasea saṃveṣṭyamānaṃ bahubhir mohatantubhir ātmajaiḥc kośakāravad ātmānaṃ veṣṭayan nāvabudhyasea alaṃ parigraheṇeha doṣavān hi parigrahaḥc kṛmir hi kośakāras tu badhyate svaparigrahāta putradārakuṭumbeṣu saktāḥ sīdanti jantavaḥc saraḥpaṅkārṇave magnā jīrṇā vanagajā ivaa mahājālasamākṛṣṭān sthale matsyān ivoddhṛtānc snehajālasamākṛṣṭān paśya jantūn suduḥkhitāna kuṭumbaṃ putradāraṃ ca śarīraṃ dravyasaṃcayāḥc pārakyam adhruvaṃ sarvaṃ kiṃ svaṃ sukṛtaduṣkṛtama yadā sarvaṃ parityajya gantavyam avaśena tec anarthe kiṃ prasaktas tvaṃ svam arthaṃ nānutiṣṭhasia aviśrāntam anālambam apātheyam adaiśikamc tamaḥkāntāram adhvānaṃ katham eko gamiṣyasia na hi tvā prasthitaṃ kaś cit pṛṣṭhato nugamiṣyatic sukṛtaṃ duṣkṛtaṃ ca tvā yāsyantam anuyāsyatia vidyā karma ca śauryaṃ ca jñānaṃ ca bahuvistaramc arthārtham anusāryante siddhārthas tu vimucyatea nibandhanī rajjur eṣā yā grāme vasato ratiḥc chittvaināṃ sukṛto yānti naināṃ chindanti duṣkṛtaḥd tulyajātivayorūpān hutān paśyasi mṛtyunād na ca nāmāsti nirvedo lauhaṃ hi hṛdayaṃ tavaa rūpakūlāṃ manaḥsrotāṃ sparśadvīpāṃ rasāvahāmc gandhapaṅkāṃ śabdajalāṃ svargamārgadurāvahāma kṣamāritrāṃ satyamayīṃ dharmasthairyavaṭākarāmc tyāgavātādhvagāṃ śīghrāṃ buddhināvā nadīṃ tareta tyaja dharmam adharmaṃ ca ubhe satyānṛte tyajac ubhe satyānṛte tyaktvā yena tyajasi taṃ tyajaa tyaja dharmam asaṃkalpād adharmaṃ cāpy ahiṃsayāc ubhe satyānṛte buddhyā buddhiṃ paramaniścayāta asthisthūṇaṃ snāyuyutaṃ māṃsaśoṇitalepanamc carmāvanaddhaṃ durgandhi pūrṇaṃ mūtrapurīṣayoḥa jarāśokasamāviṣṭaṃ rogāyatanam āturamc rajasvalam anityaṃ ca bhūtāvāsaṃ samutsṛjaa idaṃ viśvaṃ jagat sarvam ajagac cāpi yad bhavetc mahābhūtātmakaṃ sarvaṃ mahad yat paramāṇu yatd mahābhūtāni khaṃ vāyur agnir āpas tathā mahīd ṣaṣṭhas tu cetanā yā tu ātmā saptama ucyated aṣṭamaṃ tu mano jñeyaṃ buddhis tu navamī smṛtāa indriyāṇi ca pañcaiva tamaḥ sattvaṃ rajas tathāc ity eṣa saptadaśako rāśir avyaktasaṃjñakaḥa sarvair ihendriyārthaiś ca vyaktāvyaktair hi saṃhitaḥc pañcaviṃśaka ity eṣa vyaktāvyaktamayo guṇaḥa etaiḥ sarvaiḥ samāyuktaḥ pumān ity abhidhīyatec trivargo tra sukhaṃ duḥkhaṃ jīvitaṃ maraṇaṃ tathāa ya idaṃ veda tattvena sa veda prabhavāpyayauc pārāśaryeha boddhavyaṃ jñānānāṃ yac ca kiṃ canaa indriyair gṛhyate yad yat tat tad vyaktam iti sthitiḥc avyaktam iti vijñeyaṃ liṅgagrāhyam atīndriyama indriyair niyatair dehī dhārābhir iva tarpyatec loke vitatam ātmānaṃ lokaṃ cātmani paśyatia parāvaradṛśaḥ śaktir jñānavelāṃ na paśyatic paśyataḥ sarvabhūtāni sarvāvasthāsu sarvadāa brahmabhūtasya saṃyogo nāśubhenopapadyatec jñānena vividhān kleśān ativṛttasya mohajāne loke buddhiprakāśena lokamārgo na riṣyatea anādinidhanaṃ jantum ātmani sthitam avyayamc akartāram amūrtaṃ ca bhagavān āha tīrthavita yo jantuḥ svakṛtais tais taiḥ karmabhir nityaduḥkhitaḥc sa duḥkhapratighātārthaṃ hanti jantūn anekadhāa tataḥ karma samādatte punar anyan navaṃ bahuc tapyate tha punas tena bhuktvāpathyam ivāturaḥa ajasram eva mohārto duḥkheṣu sukhasaṃjñitaḥc badhyate mathyate caiva karmabhir manthavat sadāa tato nivṛtto bandhāt svāt karmaṇām udayād ihac paribhramati saṃsāraṃ cakravad bahuvedanaḥa sa tvaṃ nivṛttabandhas tu nivṛttaś cāpi karmataḥc sarvavit sarvajit siddho bhava bhāvavivarjitaḥa saṃyamena navaṃ bandhaṃ nivartya tapaso balātc saṃprāptā bahavaḥ siddhim apy abādhāṃ sukhodayām nārada uvācaa aśokaṃ śokanāśārthaṃ śāstraṃ śāntikaraṃ śivamc niśamya labhate buddhiṃ tāṃ labdhvā sukham edhatea śokasthānasahasrāṇi bhayasthānaśatāni cac divase divase mūḍham āviśanti na paṇḍitama tasmād aniṣṭanāśārtham itihāsaṃ nibodha mec tiṣṭhate ced vaśe buddhir labhate śokanāśanama aniṣṭasaṃprayogāc ca viprayogāt priyasya cac manuṣyā mānasair duḥkhair yujyante alpabuddhayaḥa dravyeṣu samatīteṣu ye guṇās tān na cintayetc tān anādriyamāṇasya snehabandhaḥ pramucyatea doṣadarśī bhavet tatra yatra rāgaḥ pravartatec aniṣṭavad dhitaṃ paśyet tathā kṣipraṃ virajyatea nārtho na dharmo na yaśo yo tītam anuśocatic apy abhāvena yujyeta tac cāsya na nivartatea guṇair bhūtāni yujyante viyujyante tathaiva cac sarvāṇi naitad ekasya śokasthānaṃ hi vidyatea mṛtaṃ vā yadi vā naṣṭaṃ yo tītam anuśocatic duḥkhena labhate duḥkhaṃ dvāv anarthau prapadyatea nāśru kurvanti ye buddhyā dṛṣṭvā lokeṣu saṃtatimc samyak prapaśyataḥ sarvaṃ nāśrukarmopapadyatea duḥkhopaghāte śārīre mānase vāpy upasthitec yasmin na śakyate kartuṃ yatnas tan nānucintayeta bhaiṣajyam etad duḥkhasya yad etan nānucintayetc cintyamānaṃ hi na vyeti bhūyaś cāpi pravardhatea prajñayā mānasaṃ duḥkhaṃ hanyāc chārīram auṣadhaiḥc etad vijñānasāmarthyaṃ na bālaiḥ samatām iyāta anityaṃ yauvanaṃ rūpaṃ jīvitaṃ dravyasaṃcayaḥc ārogyaṃ priyasaṃvāso gṛdhyet tatra na paṇḍitaḥa na jānapadikaṃ duḥkham ekaḥ śocitum arhatic aśocan pratikurvīta yadi paśyed upakramama sukhād bahutaraṃ duḥkhaṃ jīvite nātra saṃśayaḥc snigdhatvaṃ cendriyārtheṣu mohān maraṇam apriyama parityajati yo duḥkhaṃ sukhaṃ vāpy ubhayaṃ naraḥc abhyeti brahma so tyantaṃ na taṃ śocanti paṇḍitāḥa duḥkham arthā hi tyajyante pālane na ca te sukhāḥc duḥkhena cādhigamyante nāśam eṣāṃ na cintayeta anyām anyāṃ dhanāvasthāṃ prāpya vaiśeṣikīṃ narāḥc atṛptā yānti vidhvaṃsaṃ saṃtoṣaṃ yānti paṇḍitāḥa sarve kṣayāntā nicayāḥ patanāntāḥ samucchrayāḥc saṃyogā viprayogāntā maraṇāntaṃ hi jīvitama anto nāsti pipāsāyās tuṣṭis tu paramaṃ sukhamc tasmāt saṃtoṣam eveha dhanaṃ paśyanti paṇḍitāḥa nimeṣamātram api hi vayo gacchan na tiṣṭhatic svaśarīreṣv anityeṣu nityaṃ kim anucintayeta bhūteṣv abhāvaṃ saṃcintya ye buddhvā tamasaḥ paramc na śocanti gatādhvānaḥ paśyantaḥ paramāṃ gatima saṃcinvānakam evainaṃ kāmānām avitṛptakamc vyāghraḥ paśum ivāsādya mṛtyur ādāya gacchatia athāpy upāyaṃ saṃpaśyed duḥkhasya parimokṣaṇec aśocann ārabhetaiva yuktaś cāvyasanī bhaveta śabde sparśe ca rūpe ca gandheṣu ca raseṣu cac nopabhogāt paraṃ kiṃ cid dhanino vādhanasya vāa prāk saṃprayogād bhūtānāṃ nāsti duḥkham anāmayamc viprayogāt tu sarvasya na śocet prakṛtisthitaḥa dhṛtyā śiśnodaraṃ rakṣet pāṇipādaṃ ca cakṣuṣāc cakṣuḥśrotre ca manasā mano vācaṃ ca vidyayāa praṇayaṃ pratisaṃhṛtya saṃstuteṣv itareṣu cac vicared asamunnaddhaḥ sa sukhī sa ca paṇḍitaḥa adhyātmaratir āsīno nirapekṣo nirāmiṣaḥc ātmanaiva sahāyena yaś caret sa sukhī bhavet nārada uvācaa sukhaduḥkhaviparyāso yadā samupapadyatec nainaṃ prajñā sunītaṃ vā trāyate nāpi pauruṣama svabhāvād yatnam ātiṣṭhed yatnavān nāvasīdatic jarāmaraṇarogebhyaḥ priyam ātmānam uddhareta rujanti hi śarīrāṇi rogāḥ śārīramānasāḥc sāyakā iva tīkṣṇāgrāḥ prayuktā dṛḍhadhanvibhiḥa vyādhitasya vivitsābhis trasyato jīvitaiṣiṇaḥc avaśasya vināśāya śarīram apakṛṣyatea sravanti na nivartante srotāṃsi saritām ivac āyur ādāya martyānāṃ rātryahāni punaḥ punaḥa vyatyayo hy ayam atyantaṃ pakṣayoḥ śuklakṛṣṇayoḥc jātaṃ martyaṃ jarayati nimeṣaṃ nāvatiṣṭhatea sukhaduḥkhāni bhūtānām ajaro jarayann asauc ādityo hy astam abhyeti punaḥ punar udeti caa adṛṣṭapūrvān ādāya bhāvān apariśaṅkitānc iṣṭāniṣṭān manuṣyāṇām astaṃ gacchanti rātrayaḥa yo yam icched yathākāmaṃ kāmānāṃ tat tad āpnuyātc yadi syān na parādhīnaṃ puruṣasya kriyāphalama saṃyatāś ca hi dakṣāś ca matimantaś ca mānavāḥc dṛśyante niṣphalāḥ santaḥ prahīṇāś ca svakarmabhiḥa apare bāliśāḥ santo nirguṇāḥ puruṣādhamāḥc āśīrbhir apy asaṃyuktā dṛśyante sarvakāminaḥa bhūtānām aparaḥ kaś cid dhiṃsāyāṃ satatotthitaḥc vañcanāyāṃ ca lokasya sa sukheṣv eva jīryatea aceṣṭamānam āsīnaṃ śrīḥ kaṃ cid upatiṣṭhatic kaś cit karmānusṛtyānyo na prāpyam adhigacchatia aparādhaṃ samācakṣva puruṣasya svabhāvataḥc śukram anyatra saṃbhūtaṃ punar anyatra gacchatia tasya yonau prasaktasya garbho bhavati vā na vāc āmrapuṣpopamā yasya nivṛttir upalabhyatea keṣāṃ cit putrakāmānām anusaṃtānam icchatāmc siddhau prayatamānānāṃ naivāṇḍam upajāyatea garbhāc codvijamānānāṃ kruddhād āśīviṣād ivac āyuṣmāñ jāyate putraḥ kathaṃ pretaḥ pitaiva saḥa devān iṣṭvā tapas taptvā kṛpaṇaiḥ putragṛddhibhiḥc daśa māsān paridhṛtā jāyante kulapāṃsanāḥa apare dhanadhānyāni bhogāṃś ca pitṛsaṃcitānc vipulān abhijāyante labdhās tair eva maṅgalaiḥa anyonyaṃ samabhipretya maithunasya samāgamec upadrava ivāviṣṭo yoniṃ garbhaḥ prapadyatea śīrṇaṃ paraśarīreṇa nicchavīkaṃ śarīriṇamc prāṇināṃ prāṇasaṃrodhe māṃsaśleṣmaviceṣṭitama nirdagdhaṃ paradehena paradehaṃ calācalamc vinaśyantaṃ vināśānte nāvi nāvam ivāhitama saṃgatyā jaṭhare nyastaṃ retobindum acetanamc kena yatnena jīvantaṃ garbhaṃ tvam iha paśyasia annapānāni jīryante yatra bhakṣāś ca bhakṣitāḥc tasminn evodare garbhaḥ kiṃ nānnam iva jīryatea garbhamūtrapurīṣāṇāṃ svabhāvaniyatā paramabuddhimānc saṃcintya manasā dhīro niścayaṃ nādhyagacchataa putradārair mahān kleśo vidyāmnāye mahāñ śramaḥc kiṃ nu syāc chāśvataṃ sthānam alpakleśaṃ mahodayama tato muhūrtaṃ saṃcintya niścitāṃ gatim ātmanaḥc parāvarajño dharmasya parāṃ naiḥśreyasīṃ gatima kathaṃ tv aham asaṃkliṣṭo gaccheyaṃ paramāṃ gatimc nāvarteyaṃ yathā bhūyo yonisaṃsārasāgarea paraṃ bhāvaṃ hi kāṅkṣāmi yatra nāvartate punaḥc sarvasaṅgān parityajya niścitāṃ manaso gatima tatra yāsyāmi yatrātmā śamaṃ me dhigamiṣyatic akṣayaś cāvyayaś caiva yatra sthāsyāmi śāśvataḥa na tu yogam ṛte śakyā prāptuṃ sā paramā gatiḥc avabandho hi muktasya karmabhir nopapadyatea tasmād yogaṃ samāsthāya tyaktvā gṛhakalevaramc vāyubhūtaḥ pravekṣyāmi tejorāśiṃ divākarama na hy eṣa kṣayam āpnoti somaḥ suragaṇair yathāc kampitaḥ patate bhūmiṃ punaś caivādhirohatie kṣīyate hi sadā somaḥ punaś caivābhipūryatef necchāmy evaṃ viditvaite hrāsavṛddhī punaḥ punaḥa ravis tu saṃtāpayati lokān raśmibhir ulbaṇaiḥc sarvatas teja ādatte nityam sarve devāḥ saharṣibhiḥa athānujñāpya tam ṛṣiṃ nāradaṃ lokaviśrutamc tasmād anujñāṃ saṃprāpya jagāma pitaraṃ pratia so bhivādya mahātmānam ṛṣiṃ dvaipāyanaṃ munimc śukaḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya kṛṣṇam vipulaṃ siddhasaṃghair niṣevitam bhīṣma uvācaa giripṛṣṭhaṃ samāruhya suto vyāsasya bhāratac same deśe vivikte ca niḥśalāka upāviśata dhārayām āsa cātmānaṃ yathāśāstraṃ mahāmuniḥc pādāt prabhṛtigātreṣu krameṇa kramayogavita tataḥ sa prāṅmukho vidvān āditye naciroditec pāṇipādaṃ samādhāya vinītavad upāviśata na tatra pakṣisaṃghāto na śabdo nāpi darśanamc yatra vaiyāsakir dhīmān yoktuṃ samupacakramea sa dadarśa tadātmānaṃ sarvasaṅgaviniḥsṛtamc prajahāsa tato hāsaṃ śukaḥ saṃprekṣya bhāskarama sa punar yogam āsthāya mokṣamārgopalabdhayec mahāyogīśvaro bhūtvā so tyakrāmad vihāyasama tataḥ pradakṣiṇaṃ kṛtvā devarṣiṃ nāradaṃ tadāc nivedayām āsa tadā svaṃ yogaṃ paramarṣayea dṛṣṭo mārgaḥ pravṛtto smi svasti te stu tapodhanac tvatprasādād gamiṣyāmi gatim iṣṭāṃ mahādyutea nāradenābhyanujñātas tato dvaipāyanātmajaḥc abhivādya punar yogam āsthāyākāśam āviśata kailāsapṛṣṭhād utpatya sa papāta divaṃ tadāc antarikṣacaraḥ śrīmān vyāsaputraḥ suniścitaḥa tam udyantaṃ dvijaśreṣṭhaṃ vainateyasamadyutimc dadṛśuḥ sarvabhūtāni manomārutaraṃhasama vyavasāyena lokāṃs trīn sarvān so tha vicintayanc āsthito divyam adhvānaṃ pāvakārkasamaprabhaḥa tam ekamanasaṃ yāntam avyagram akutobhayamc dadṛśuḥ sarvabhūtāni jaṅgamānītarāṇi caa yathāśakti yathānyāyaṃ pūjayāṃ cakrire tadāc puṣpavarṣaiś ca divyais tam avacakrur divaukasaḥa taṃ dṛṣṭvā vismitāḥ sarve gandharvāpsarasāṃ gaṇāḥc ṛṣayaś caiva pituḥ sudayitaḥ sutaḥb kṛtāñjalipuṭāḥ sarve tuṣṭuvur hṛṣṭamānasāḥc ananyamanasā tena kathaṃ pitrā vivarjitaḥa urvaśyā vacanaṃ śrutvā śukaḥ paramadharmavitc udaikṣata diśaḥ sarvā vacane gatamānasaḥa so ntarikṣaṃ mahīṃ caiva saśailavanakānanāmc ālokayām āsa tadā sarāṃsi saritas tathāa tato dvaipāyanasutaṃ bahumānapuraḥsaramc kṛtāñjalipuṭāḥ sarvā nirīkṣante sma devatāḥa abravīt tās tadā vākyaṃ śukaḥ paramadharmavitc pitā yady anugacchen māṃ krośamānaḥ śuketi vaia tataḥ prativaco deyaṃ sarvair eva samāhitaiḥc etan me snehataḥ sarve vacanaṃ kartum arhathaa śukasya vacanaṃ śrutvā diśaḥ savanakānanāḥc samudrāḥ saritaḥ śailāḥ pratyūcus taṃ samantataḥa yathājñāpayase vipra bāḍham evaṃ bhaviṣyatic ṛṣer vyāharato vākyaṃ prativakṣyāmahe vayam bhīṣma uvācaa ity evam uktvā vacanaṃ brahmarṣiḥ sumahātapāḥc prātiṣṭhata śukaḥ siddhiṃ hitvā lokāṃś caturvidhāna tamo hy aṣṭavidhaṃ hitvā jahau pañcavidhaṃ rajaḥc tataḥ sattvaṃ jahau dhīmāṃs tad adbhutam ivābhavata tatas tasmin pade sarvabhūto bhavat tadāa mahāyogagatiṃ tv agryāṃ vyāsotthāya mahātapāḥc nimeṣāntaramātreṇa śukābhipatanaṃ yayaua sa dadarśa dvidhā kṛtvā parvatāgraṃ śukaṃ gatamc śaśaṃsur ṛṣayas tasmai karma putrasya prabhāvaṃ tu darśayitvā śukas tadāc guṇān saṃtyajya śabdādīn padam adhyagamat parama mahimānaṃ tu taṃ dṛṣṭvā putrasyāmitatejasaḥc niṣasāda giriprasthe putram evānucintayana tato mandākinītīre krīḍanto nānāmūrtisamāsthitama pitā mātā ca sarvasya jagataḥ śāśvato guruḥc kaṃ tv adya yajase devaṃ pitaraṃ kaṃ na vidmahed kam arcasi mahābhāga tan me brūhīha pṛcchataḥ śrībhagavān uvācaa avācyam etad vaktavyam ātmaguhyaṃ sanātanamc tava bhaktimato brahman vakṣyāmi tu yathātathama yat tat sūkṣmam avijñeyam avyaktam acalaṃ dhruvamc indriyair indriyārthaiś ca sarvabhūtaiś ca varjitama sa hy antarātmā bhūtānāṃ kṣetrajñaś ceti kathyatec triguṇavyatirikto sau puruṣaś ceti kalpitaḥe tasmād avyaktam utpannaṃ triguṇaṃ dvijasattamaa avyaktā vyaktabhāvasthā yā sā prakṛtir avyayāc tāṃ yonim āvayor viddhi yo sau sadasadātmakaḥe āvābhyāṃ pūjyate sau hi daive pitrye ca kalpitea nāsti tasmāt paro nyo hi pitā devo tha vā dvijaḥc ātmā hi nau sa vijñeyas tatas taṃ pūjayāvahea tenaiṣā prathitā brahman maryādā lokabhāvinīc daivaṃ pitryaṃ ca kartavyam iti tasyānuśāsanama brahmā sthāṇur manur dakṣo bhṛgur dharmas tapo damaḥc marīcir aṅgirātriś ca pulastyaḥ pulahaḥ kratuḥa vasiṣṭhaḥ parameṣṭhī ca vivasvān soma eva cac kardamaś cāpi yaḥ proktaḥ krodho vikrīta eva caa ekaviṃśatir utpannās te prajāpatayaḥ smṛtāḥc tasya devasya maryādāṃ pūjayanti sanātanīma daivaṃ pitryaṃ ca satataṃ tasya vijñāya tattvataḥc ātmaprāptāni ca tato jānanti dvijasattamāḥa svargasthā api ye ke cit taṃ namasyanti dehinaḥc te tatprasādād gacchanti tenādiṣṭaphalāṃ gatima ye hīnāḥ saptadaśabhir guṇaiḥ karmabhir eva cac kalāḥ pañcadaśa tyaktvā te muktā iti niścayaḥa muktānāṃ tu gatir brahman kṣetrajña iti kalpitaḥc sa hi sarvagataś caiva nirguṇaś caiva kathyatea dṛśyate jñānayogena āvāṃ ca prasṛtau tataḥc evaṃ jñātvā tam ātmānaṃ pūjayāvaḥ sanātanama taṃ vedāś cāśramāś caiva nānātanusamāsthitāḥc bhaktyā saṃpūjayanty ādyaṃ gatiṃ caiṣāṃ dadāti saḥa ye tu tadbhāvitā loke ekāntitvaṃ samāsthitāḥc etad abhyadhikaṃ teṣāṃ yat te taṃ praviśanty utaa iti guhyasamuddeśas tava nārada kīrtitaḥc bhaktyā premṇā ca viprarṣe asmadbhaktyā ca te śrutaḥ bhīṣma uvācaa sa evam ukto dvipadāṃ variṣṭhonārāyaṇenottamapūruṣeṇac jagāda vākyaṃ dvipadāṃ variṣṭhaṃnārāyaṇaṃ lokahitādhivāsama yadartham ātmaprabhaveha janmatavottamaṃ dharmagṛhe caturdhāc tat sādhyatāṃ lokahitārtham adyagacchāmi draṣṭuṃ prakṛtiṃ tavādyāma vedāḥ svadhītā mama lokanāthataptaṃ tapo nānṛtam uktapūrvamc pūjāṃ gurūṇāṃ satataṃ karomiparasya guhyaṃ na ca bhinnapūrvama guptāni catvāri yathāgamaṃ meśatrau ca mitre ca samo smi nityamc taṃ cādidevaṃ satataṃ prapannaekāntabhāvena vṛṇomy ajasrame ebhir viśeṣaiḥ pariśuddhasattvaḥkasmān na paśyeyam anantam īśama tat pārameṣṭhyasya vaco niśamyanārāyaṇaḥ sātvatadharmagoptāb tasmād anujñāṃ mama dehi devab taṃ vai dṛṣṭvā kṛtakṛtyo bhavāmic gaccheti taṃ nāradam uktavān sasaṃpūjayitvātmavidhikriyābhiḥa tato visṛṣṭaḥ parameṣṭhiputraḥso bhyarcayitvā tam ṛṣiṃ purāṇamc kham utpapātottamavegayuktastato dhimerau sahasā nililyea tatrāvatasthe ca munir muhūrtamekāntam āsādya gireḥ sa śṛṅgec ālokayann uttarapaścimenadadarśa cātyadbhutarūpayuktama kṣīrodadher uttarato hi dvīpaḥśvetaḥ sa nāmnā prathito viśālaḥc meroḥ sahasraiḥ sa hi yojanānāṃdvātriṃśatordhvaṃ kavibhir niruktaḥa atīndriyāś cānaśanāś ca tatraniṣpandahīnāḥ susugandhinaś cac śvetāḥ pumāṃso gatasarvapāpāścakṣurmuṣaḥ pāpakṛtāṃ narāṇāma vajrāsthikāyāḥ samamānonmānādivyānvayarūpāḥ śubhasāropetāḥc chatrākṛtiśīrṣā meghaughaninādāḥsatpuṣkaracatuṣkā rājīvaśatapādāḥa ṣaṣṭyā dantair yuktāḥ śuklairaṣṭābhir daṃṣṭrābhir yec jihvābhir ye viṣvagvaktraṃlelihyante sūryaprakhyama bhaktyā devaṃ viśvotpannaṃyasmāt sarve lokāḥ sūtāḥc vedā dharmā munayaḥ śāntādevāḥ sarve tasya visargāḥ yudhiṣṭhira uvācaa atīndriyā nirāhārā aniṣpandāḥ sugandhinaḥc kathaṃ te puruṣā jātāḥ kā teṣāṃ gatir uttamāa ye vimuktā bhavantīha narā bharatasattamac teṣāṃ lakṣaṇam etad dhi yac chvetadvīpavāsināma tasmān me saṃśayaṃ chindhi paraṃ kautūhalaṃ hi mec tvaṃ hi sarvakathārāmas tvāṃ caivopāśritā vayam bhīṣma uvācaa vistīrṇaiṣā kathā rājañ śrutā me pitṛsaṃnidhauc saiṣā tava hi vaktavyā kathāsāro hi sa smṛtaḥd śaṃtanoḥ kathayām āsa nārado munisattamaḥd rājñā pṛṣṭaḥ purā prāha tatrāhaṃ śrutavān purāa rājoparicaro nāma babhūvādhipatir bhuvaḥc ākhaṇḍalasakhaḥ khyāto bhakto nārāyaṇaṃ harima dhārmiko nityabhaktaś ca pitṝn nityam atandritaḥc sāmrājyaṃ tena saṃprāptaṃ nārāyaṇavarāt purāa sātvataṃ vidhim āsthāya prāk sūryamukhaniḥsṛtamc pūjayām āsa deveśaṃ taccheṣeṇa pitāmahāna pitṛśeṣeṇa viprāṃś ca saṃvibhajyāśritāṃś ca saḥc śeṣānnabhuk satyaparaḥ sarvabhūteṣv ahiṃsakaḥe sarvabhāvena bhaktaḥ sa devadevaṃ janārdanamf anādimadhyanidhanaṃ lokakartāram avyayama tasya nārāyaṇe bhaktiṃ vahato mitrakarśanac ekaśayyāsanaṃ śakro dattavān devarāṭ svayama ātmā rājyaṃ dhanaṃ caiva kalatraṃ vāhanāni cac etad bhagavate sarvam iti tat prekṣitaṃ sadāa kāmyanaimittikājasraṃ yajñiyāḥ paramakriyāḥc sarvāḥ sātvatam āsthāya vidhiṃ cakre samāhitaḥa pañcarātravido mukhyās tasya gehe mahātmanaḥc prāyaṇaṃ bhagavatproktaṃ bhuñjate cāgrabhojanama tasya praśāsato rājyaṃ dharmeṇāmitraghātinaḥc nānṛtā vāk samabhavan mano duṣṭaṃ na cābhavate na ca kāyena kṛtavān sa pāpaṃ param aṇv apia ye hi te munayaḥ khyātāḥ sapta citraśikhaṇḍinaḥc tair ekamatibhir bhūtvā yat proktaṃ śāstram uttamamd vedaiś caturbhiḥ samitaṃ kṛtaṃ merau mahāgiraud āsyaiḥ saptabhir udgīrṇaṃ lokadharmam anuttamama marīcir atryaṅgirasau pulastyaḥ pulahaḥ kratuḥc vasiṣṭhaś ca mahātejā ete citraśikhaṇḍinaḥa sapta prakṛtayo hy etās tathā svāyaṃbhuvo ṣṭamaḥc etābhir dhāryate lokas tābhyaḥ śāstraṃ viniḥsṛtama ekāgramanaso dāntā munayaḥ saṃyame ratāḥb bhūtabhavyabhaviṣyajñāḥ satyadharmaparāyaṇāḥc idaṃ śreya idaṃ brahma idaṃ hitam anuttamame lokān saṃcintya manasā tataḥ śāstraṃ pracakrirea tatra dharmārthakāmā hi mokṣaḥ paścāc ca kīrtitaḥc maryādā vividhāś caiva divi bhūmau ca saṃsthitāḥa ārādhya tapasā devaṃ hariṃ nārāyaṇaṃ prabhumc divyaṃ varṣasahasraṃ vai sarve te ṛṣibhiḥ sahaa nārāyaṇānuśāstā hi tadā devī sarasvatīc viveśa tān ṛṣīn sarvāṃl lokānāṃ hitakāmyayāa tataḥ pravartitā samyak tapovidbhir dvijātibhiḥc śabde cārthe ca hetau ca eṣā prathamasargajāa ādāv eva hi tac chāstram oṃkārasvarabhūṣitamc ṛṣibhir bhāvitaṃ tatra yatra kāruṇiko hy asaua tataḥ prasanno bhagavān anirdiṣṭaśarīragaḥc ṛṣīn uvāca tān sarvān adṛśyaḥ puruṣottamaḥa kṛtaṃ śatasahasraṃ hi ślokānām idam uttamamc lokatantrasya kṛtsnasya yasmād dharmaḥ pravartatea pravṛttau ca nivṛttau ca yonir etad bhaviṣyatic ṛgyajuḥsāmabhir juṣṭam atharvāṅgirasais tathāa tathā pramāṇaṃ hi mayā kṛto brahmā prasādajaḥc rudraś ca krodhajo viprā yūyaṃ prakṛtayas tathāa sūryācandramasau vāyur bhūmir āpo gnir eva cac sarve ca nakṣatragaṇā yac ca bhūtābhiśabditama adhikāreṣu vartante yathāsvaṃ brahmavādinaḥc sarve pramāṇaṃ hi yathā tathaitac chāstram uttamama bhaviṣyati pramāṇaṃ vai etan madanuśāsanamc asmāt pravakṣyate dharmān manuḥ svāyaṃbhuvaḥ svayama uśanā bṛhaspatiś caiva yadotpannau bhaviṣyataḥc tadā pravakṣyataḥ śāstraṃ yuṣmanmatibhir uddhṛtama svāyaṃbhuveṣu dharmeṣu śāstre cośanasā kṛtec bṛhaspatimate caiva lokeṣu pravicāritea yuṣmatkṛtam idaṃ śāstraṃ prajāpālo vasus tataḥc bṛhaspatisakāśād vai prāpsyate dvijasattamāḥa sa hi madbhāvito rājā madbhaktaś ca bhaviṣyatic tena śāstreṇa lokeṣu kriyāḥ sarvāḥ kariṣyatia etad dhi sarvaśāstrāṇāṃ śāstram uttamasaṃjñitamc etad arthyaṃ ca dharmyaṃ ca yaśasyaṃ caitad uttamama asya pravartanāc caiva prajāvanto bhaviṣyathac sa ca rājā śriyā yukto bhaviṣyati mahān vasuḥa saṃsthite tu nṛpe tasmiñ śāstram etat sanātanamc antardhāsyati tat satyam etad vaḥ kathitaṃ mayāa etāvad uktvā vacanam adṛśyaḥ puruṣottamaḥc visṛjya tān ṛṣīn sarvān kām api prasthito diśama tatas te lokapitaraḥ sarvalokārthacintakāḥc prāvartayanta tac chāstraṃ dharmayoniṃ sanātanama utpanne ṅgirase caiva yuge prathamakalpitec sāṅgopaniṣadaṃ śāstraṃ sthāpayitvā bṛhaspataua jagmur yathepsitaṃ deśaṃ tapase kṛtaniścayāḥc dhāraṇāt sarvalokānāṃ sarvadharmapravartakāḥ bhīṣma uvācaa tato tīte mahākalpe utpanne ṅgirasaḥ sutec babhūvur nirvṛtā devā jāte devapurohitea bṛhad brahma mahac ceti śabdāḥ paryāyavācakāḥc ebhiḥ samanvito rājan guṇair vidvān bṛhaspatiḥa tasya śiṣyo babhūvāgryo rājoparicaro vasuḥc adhītavāṃs tadā śāstraṃ samyak citraśikhaṇḍijama sa rājā bhāvitaḥ pūrvaṃ daivena vidhinā vasuḥc pālayām āsa pṛthivīṃ divam ākhaṇḍalo yathāa tasya yajño mahān āsīd aśvamedho mahātmanaḥc bṛhaspatir upādhyāyas tatra hotā babhūva haa prajāpatisutāś cātra sadasyās tv abhavaṃs trayaḥc ekataś ca dvitaś caiva tritaś caiva maharṣayaḥa dhanuṣākṣo tha raibhyaś ca arvāvasuparāvasūc ṛṣir medhātithiś caiva tāṇḍyaś caiva mahān ṛṣiḥa ṛṣiḥ śaktir mahābhāgas tathā vedaśirāś ca yaḥc kapilaś ca ṛṣiśreṣṭhaḥ śālihotrapitāmahaḥa ādyaḥ kaṭhas taittiriś ca vaiśaṃpāyanapūrvajaḥc kaṇvo tha devahotraś ca ete ṣoḍaśa kīrtitāḥe saṃbhṛtāḥ sarvasaṃbhārās tasmin rājan mahākrataua na tatra paśughāto bhūt sa rājaivaṃ sthito bhavatc ahiṃsraḥ śucir akṣudro nirāśīḥ karmasaṃstutaḥe āraṇyakapadodgītā bhāgās tatropakalpitāḥa prītas tato sya bhagavān devadevaḥ purātanaḥc sākṣāt taṃ darśayām āsa so dṛśyo nyena kena cita svayaṃ bhāgam upāghrāya puroḍāśaṃ gṛhītavānc adṛśyena hṛto bhāgo devena harimedhasāa bṛhaspatis tataḥ kruddhaḥ sruvam udyamya vegitaḥc ākāśaṃ ghnan sruvaḥ pātai roṣād aśrūṇy avartayata uvāca coparicaraṃ mayā bhāgo yam udyataḥc grāhyaḥ svayaṃ hi devena matpratyakṣaṃ na saṃśayaḥa udyatā yajñabhāgā hi sākṣāt prāptāḥ surair ihac kimartham iha na prāpto darśanaṃ sa harir vibhuḥa tataḥ sa taṃ samuddhūtaṃ bhūmipālo mahān vasuḥc prasādayām āsa muniṃ sadasyās te ca sarvaśaḥd uparicaravasur uvācad hutaṃ tvayāvadānīha puroḍāśasya yāvatīd gṛhītā devadevena matpratyakṣaṃ na saṃśayaḥd ity evam ukto vasunā saroṣaś cābravīd guruḥd na yajeyam ahaṃ cātra paribhūtas tvayānaghad tvayā paśur vāritaś ca kṛtaḥ piṣṭamayaḥ paśuḥd vasur uvācad tvaṃ devaṃ paśyase nityaṃ na paśyeyam ahaṃ kathamd paśuhiṃsā vāritā ca yajurvedādimantrataḥd ahaṃ na vāraye hiṃsāṃ drakṣyāmy ekāntiko harimd bhīṣma uvācad tasmāt kopo na kartavyo bhavatā guruṇā mayid vasum evaṃ bruvāṇaṃ tu kruddha eva bṛhaspatiḥd uvāca ṛtvijaś caiva kiṃ naḥ karmeti vārayand athaikato dvitaś caiva tritaś caiva maharṣayaḥa ūcuś cainam asaṃbhrāntā na roṣaṃ kartum arhasib śṛṇu tvaṃ vacanaṃ putra asmābhiḥ samudāhṛtamc naiṣa dharmaḥ kṛtayuge yas tvaṃ roṣam acīkṛthāḥa aroṣaṇo hy asau devo yasya bhāgo yam udyataḥc na sa śakyas tvayā draṣṭum asmābhir vā bṛhaspatee yasya prasādaṃ kurute sa vai taṃ draṣṭum arhati ekatadvitatritā ūcuḥ ekatadvitatritaś cocus tataś citraśikhaṇḍinaḥa vayaṃ hi brahmaṇaḥ putrā mānasāḥ parikīrtitāḥc gatā niḥśreyasārthaṃ hi kadā cid diśam uttarāma taptvā varṣasahasrāṇi catvāri tapa uttamamc ekapādasthitāḥ samyak kāṣṭhabhūtāḥ samāhitāḥa meror uttarabhāge tu kṣīrodasyānukūlataḥc sa deśo yatra nas taptaṃ tapaḥ paramadāruṇame kathaṃ paśyemahi vayaṃ devaṃ nārāyaṇaṃ tv itif vareṇyaṃ varadaṃ taṃ vai devadevaṃ sanātanama tato vratasyāvabhṛthe vāg uvācāśarīriṇīb snigdhagambhīrayā vācā praharṣaṇakarī vibhoc sutaptaṃ vas tapo viprāḥ prasannenāntarātmanāa yūyaṃ jijñāsavo bhaktāḥ kathaṃ drakṣyatha taṃ prabhumc kṣīrodadher uttarataḥ śvetadvīpo mahāprabhaḥa tatra nārāyaṇaparā mānavāś candravarcasaḥc ekāntabhāvopagatās te bhaktāḥ puruṣottamama te sahasrārciṣaṃ devaṃ praviśanti sanātanamc atīndriyā nirāhārā aniṣpandāḥ sugandhinaḥa ekāntinas te puruṣāḥ śvetadvīpanivāsinaḥc gacchadhvaṃ tatra munayas tatrātmā me prakāśitaḥa atha śrutvā vayaṃ sarve vācaṃ tām aśarīriṇīmc yathākhyātena mārgeṇa taṃ deśaṃ pratipedirea prāpya śvetaṃ mahādvīpaṃ taccittās taddidṛkṣavaḥb sahasābhihatāḥ sarve tejasā tasya mohitāḥc tato no dṛṣṭiviṣayas tadā pratihato bhavata na ca paśyāma puruṣaṃ tattejohṛtadarśanāḥc tato naḥ prādurabhavad vijñānaṃ devayogajama na kilātaptatapasā śakyate draṣṭum añjasāc tataḥ punar varṣaśataṃ taptvā tātkālikaṃ mahata vratāvasāne suśubhān narān dadṛśire vayamc śvetāṃś candrapratīkāśān sarvalakṣaṇalakṣitāna nityāñjalikṛtān brahma japataḥ prāgudaṅmukhānc mānaso nāma sa japo japyate tair mahātmabhiḥe tenaikāgramanastvena prīto bhavati vai hariḥa yā bhaven muniśārdūla bhāḥ sūryasya yugakṣayec ekaikasya prabhā tādṛk sābhavan mānavasya haa tejonivāsaḥ sa dvīpa iti vai menire vayamc na tatrābhyadhikaḥ kaś cit sarve te samatejasaḥa atha sūryasahasrasya prabhāṃ yugapad utthitāmc sahasā dṛṣṭavantaḥ sma punar eva bṛhaspatea sahitāś cābhyadhāvanta tatas te mānavā drutamc kṛtāñjalipuṭā hṛṣṭā nama ity eva vādinaḥa tato bhivadatāṃ teṣām aśrauṣma vipulaṃ dhvanimc baliḥ kilopahriyate tasya devasya tair naraiḥa vayaṃ tu tejasā tasya sahasā hṛtacetasaḥc na kiṃ cid api paśyāmo hṛtadṛṣṭibalendriyāḥa ekas tu śabdo virataḥ śruto smābhir udīritaḥb ākāśaṃ pūrayan sarvaṃ śikṣākṣarasamanvitaḥc jitaṃ te puṇḍarīkākṣa namas te viśvabhāvanaa namas te stu hṛṣīkeśa mahāpuruṣapūrvajac iti śabdaḥ śruto smābhiḥ śikṣākṣarasamīritaḥa etasminn antare vāyuḥ sarvagandhavahaḥ śuciḥc divyāny uvāha puṣpāṇi karmaṇyāś cauṣadhīs tathāa tair iṣṭaḥ pañcakālajñair harir ekāntibhir naraiḥb bhaktyā paramayā yuktair manovākkarmabhis tadāc nūnaṃ tatrāgato devo yathā tair vāg udīritāe vayaṃ tv enaṃ na paśyāmo mohitās tasya māyayāa mārute saṃnivṛtte ca balau ca pratipāditec cintāvyākulitātmāno jātāḥ smo ṅgirasāṃ varaa mānavānāṃ sahasreṣu teṣu vai śuddhayoniṣuc asmān na kaś cin manasā cakṣuṣā vāpy apūjayata te pi svasthā munigaṇā ekabhāvam anuvratāḥc nāsmāsu dadhire bhāvaṃ brahmabhāvam anuṣṭhitāḥa tato smān supariśrāntāṃs tapasā cāpi karśitānc uvāca khasthaṃ kim api bhūtaṃ tatrāśarīrakama dṛṣṭā vaḥ puruṣāḥ śvetāḥ sarvendriyavivarjitāḥc dṛṣṭo bhavati deveśa ebhir dṛṣṭair dvijottamāḥa gacchadhvaṃ munayaḥ sarve yathāgatam ito cirātc na sa śakyo abhaktena draṣṭuṃ devaḥ kathaṃ canaa kāmaṃ kālena mahatā ekāntitvaṃ samāgataiḥc śakyo draṣṭuṃ sa bhagavān prabhāmaṇḍaladurdṛśaḥa mahat kāryaṃ tu kartavyaṃ yuṣmābhir dvijasattamāḥc itaḥ kṛtayuge tīte viparyāsaṃ gate pi caa vaivasvate ntare viprāḥ prāpte tretāyuge tataḥc surāṇāṃ kāryasiddhyarthaṃ sahāyā vai bhaviṣyathaa tatas tad adbhutaṃ vākyaṃ niśamyaivaṃ sma somapac tasya prasādāt prāptāḥ smo deśam īpsitam añjasāa evaṃ sutapasā caiva havyakavyais tathaiva īśo haṃ jagato guruḥa māyā hy eṣā mayā sṛṣṭā yan māṃ paśyasi nāradac sarvabhūtaguṇair yuktaṃ naivaṃ tvaṃ jñātum arhasie mayaitat kathitaṃ samyak tava mūrticatuṣṭayama siddhā hy ete mahābhāgā narā hy ekāntino bhavanc tamorajobhyāṃ nirmuktāḥ pravekṣyanti ca māṃ munea ahaṃ kartā ca kāryaṃ ca kāraṇaṃ cāpi nāradac ahaṃ hi jīvasaṃjño vai mayi jīvaḥ samāhitaḥe maivaṃ te buddhir atrābhūd dṛṣṭo jīvo mayeti caa ahaṃ sarvatrago brahman bhūtagrāmāntarātmakaḥc bhūtagrāmaśarīreṣu naśyatsu na naśāmy ahama hiraṇyagarbho lokādiś caturvaktro niruktagaḥc brahmā sanātano devo mama bahvarthacintakaḥd lalāṭāc caiva me rudro devaḥ krodhād viniḥsṛtaḥa paśyaikādaśa me rudrān dakṣiṇaṃ pārśvam āsthitānc dvādaśaiva tathādityān vāmaṃ pārśvaṃ samāsthitāna agrataś caiva me paśya vasūn aṣṭau surottamānc nāsatyaṃ caiva dasraṃ ca bhiṣajau paśya pṛṣṭhataḥa sarvān prajāpatīn paśya paśya sapta ṛṣīn apic vedān yajñāṃś ca śataśaḥ paśyāmṛtam athauṣadhīḥa tapāṃsi niyamāṃś caiva yamān api pṛthagvidhānc tathāṣṭaguṇam aiśvaryam ekasthaṃ paśya mūrtimata śriyaṃ lakṣmīṃ ca kīrtiṃ ca pṛthivīṃ ca kakudminīmc vedānāṃ mātaraṃ paśya matsthāṃ devīṃ sarasvatīma dhruvaṃ ca jyotiṣāṃ śreṣṭhaṃ paśya nārada khecaramc ambhodharān samudrāṃś ca sarāṃsi saritas tathāa mūrtimantaḥ pitṛgaṇāṃś caturaḥ paśya sattamac trīṃś caivemān guṇān paśya matsthān mūrtivivarjitāna devakāryād api mune pitṛkāryaṃ viśiṣyatec devānāṃ ca pitṝṇāṃ ca pitā hy eko ham āditaḥa ahaṃ hayaśiro bhūtvā samudre paścimottarec pibāmi suhutaṃ havyaṃ kavyaṃ ca śraddhayānvitama mayā sṛṣṭaḥ purā brahmā madyajñam ayajat svayamc tatas tasmai varān prīto dadāv aham anuttamāna matputratvaṃ ca kalpādau lokādhyakṣatvam eva cac ahaṃkārakṛtaṃ caiva nāma paryāyavācakama tvayā kṛtāṃ ca maryādāṃ nātikrāmyati kaś canac tvaṃ caiva varado brahman varepsūnāṃ bhaviṣyasia surāsuragaṇānāṃ ca ṛṣīṇāṃ ca tapodhanac pitṝṇāṃ ca mahābhāga satataṃ saṃśitavratae vividhānāṃ ca bhūtānāṃ tvam upāsyo bhaviṣyasia prādurbhāvagataś cāhaṃ surakāryeṣu nityadāc anuśāsyas tvayā brahman niyojyaś ca suto yathāa etāṃś cānyāṃś ca rucirān brahmaṇe mitatejaseb evaṃ rudrāya manave indrāyāmitatejasec ahaṃ dattvā varān prīto nivṛttiparamo bhavama nirvāṇaṃ sarvadharmāṇāṃ nivṛttiḥ paramā smṛtāc tasmān nivṛttim āpannaś caret sarvāṅganirvṛtaḥa vidyāsahāyavantaṃ mām ādityasthaṃ sanātanamc kapilaṃ prāhur ācāryāḥ sāṃkhyaniścitaniścayāḥa hiraṇyagarbho bhagavān eṣa chandasi suṣṭutaḥc so haṃ yogagatir brahman yogaśāstreṣu śabditaḥa eṣo haṃ vyaktim āgamya tiṣṭhāmi divi śāśvataḥc tato yugasahasrānte saṃhariṣye jagat punaḥe kṛtvātmasthāni bhūtāni sthāvarāṇi carāṇi caa ekākī vidyayā sārdhaṃ vihariṣye dvijottamac tato bhūyo jagat sarvaṃ kariṣyāmīha vidyayāa asmanmūrtiś caturthī yā sāsṛjac cheṣam avyayamc sa hi saṃkarṣaṇaḥ proktaḥ pradyumnaṃ so py ajījanata pradyumnād aniruddho haṃ sargo mama punaḥ punaḥc aniruddhāt tathā brahmā tatrādikamalodbhavaḥa brahmaṇaḥ sarvabhūtāni carāṇi sthāvarāṇi cac etāṃ sṛṣṭiṃ vijānīhi kalpādiṣu punaḥ punaḥa yathā sūryasya gaganād udayāstamayāv ihac naṣṭau punar balāt kāla ānayaty amitadyutiḥe tathā balād ahaṃ pṛthvīṃ sarvabhūtahitāya vaif bhīṣmaḥf nāradas tv atha papraccha bhagavantaṃ janārdanamf śrībhagavān uvācaf keṣu keṣu ca bhāveṣu draṣṭavyo si mayā prabhof śṛṇu nārada tattvena prādurbhāvān mahāmunef matsyaḥ kūrmo varāhaś ca nārasiṃho tha vāmanaḥf rāmo rāmaś ca rāmaś ca kṛṣṇaḥ kalkī ca te daśaf pūrvaṃ mīno bhaviṣyāmi sthāpayiṣyāmy ahaṃ prajāḥf lokān vedān dhariṣyāmi majjamānān mahārṇavef dvitīyaṃ kūrmarūpaṃ me hemakūṭanibhaṃ smṛtamf mandaraṃ dhārayiṣyāmi amṛtārthaṃ dvijottamaf magnāṃ mahārṇave ghore bhārākrāntām imāṃ punaḥa sattvair ākrāntasarvāṅgāṃ naṣṭāṃ sāgaramekhalāmc ānayiṣyāmi svaṃ sthānaṃ vārāhaṃ rūpam āsthitaḥa hiraṇyākṣaṃ haniṣyāmi daiteyaṃ balagarvitamc nārasiṃhaṃ vapuḥ kṛtvā hiraṇyakaśipuṃ punaḥe surakārye haniṣyāmi yajñaghnaṃ ditinandanama virocanasya balavān baliḥ putro mahāsuraḥb avadhyaḥ sarvalokānāṃ sadevāsurarakṣasāmc bhaviṣyati sa śakraṃ ca svarājyāc cyāvayiṣyatia trailokye pahṛte tena vimukhe ca śacīpatauc adityāṃ dvādaśaḥ putraḥ saṃbhaviṣyāmi kaśyapātd jaṭī gatvā yajñasadaḥ stūyamāno dvijottamaiḥd yajñastavaṃ kariṣyāmi śrutvā prīto bhaved baliḥd kim icchasi baṭo brūhīty ukto yāce mahad varamd dīyatāṃ tripadīmātram iti yāce mahāsuramd sa dadyān mayi saṃprītaḥ pratiṣiddhaś ca mantribhiḥd yāvaj jalaṃ hastagataṃ tribhir vikramaṇair vṛtama tato rājyaṃ pradāsyāmi śakrāyāmitatejasec devatāḥ sthāpayiṣyāmi sveṣu sthāneṣu nāradae baliṃ caiva kariṣyāmi pātālatalavāsinamf dānavaṃ balināṃ śreṣṭham avadhyaṃ sarvadaivataiḥa tretāyuge bhaviṣyāmi rāmo bhṛgukulodvahaḥa   dvāviṃśad yugaparyayea bhaviṣyāmi ṛṣis tatra jamadagnisuto balīa bāhuvīryayuto rāmoc kṣatraṃ cotsādayiṣyāmi samṛddhabalavāhanama saṃdhau tu samanuprāpte tretāyāṃ dvāparasya cac rāmo dāśarathir bhūtvā bhaviṣyāmi jagatpatiḥa tritopaghātād vairūpyam ekato tha dvitas tathāc prāpsyato vānaratvaṃ hi prajāpatisutāv ṛṣīa tayor ye tv anvaye jātā bhaviṣyanti vanaukasaḥb mahābalā mahāvīryāḥ śakratulyaparākramāḥc te sahāyā bhaviṣyanti surakārye mama dvijaa tato rakṣaḥpatiṃ ghoraṃ pulastyakulapāṃsanamc haniṣye rāvaṇaṃ saṃkhye sagaṇaṃ lokakaṇṭakamd tadrājye sthāpayiṣyāmi vibhīṣaṇam akalmaṣamd ayodhyāvāsinaḥ sarvān neṣye haṃ lokam avyayamd vibhīṣaṇāya dāsyāmi rājyaṃ tasya yathākramama dvāparasya kaleś caiva saṃdhau paryavasānikec prādurbhāvaḥ kaṃsahetor mathurāyāṃ bhaviṣyatid kalidvāparayoḥ saṃdhāv aṣṭāviṃśe caturyuged prādurbhāvaṃ kariṣyāmi bhūyo vṛṣṇikulodvahaḥd madhurāyāṃ kaṃsahetor vāsudeveti nāmataḥd tṛtīyo rāma ity eva vasudevasuto balīa tatrāhaṃ dānavān hatvā subahūn devakaṇṭakānc kuśasthalīṃ kariṣyāmi nivāsaṃ dvārakāṃ purīma vasānas tatra vai puryām aditer vipriyaṃkaramc haniṣye narakaṃ bhaumaṃ muraṃ pīṭhaṃ ca dānavama prāgjyotiṣapuraṃ ramyaṃ nānādhanasamanvitamc kuśasthalīṃ nayiṣyāmi hatvā vai dānavottamānd kṛkalāsabhūtaṃ ca nṛgaṃ mocayiṣye ca vai punaḥd tataḥ pautranimittena gatvā vai śoṇitaṃ puramd bāṇasya ca puraṃ gatvā kariṣye kadanaṃ mahata śaṃkaraṃ ca mahāsenaṃ bāṇapriyahitaiṣiṇamc parājeṣyāmy athodyuktau devalokanamaskṛtaua tataḥ sutaṃ baler jitvā bāṇaṃ bāhusahasriṇamc vināśayiṣyāmi tataḥ sarvān saubhanivāsinaḥd kaṃsaṃ keśiṃ tathā krūram ariṣṭaṃ ca mahāsuramd cāṇūraṃ ca mahāvīryaṃ muṣṭikaṃ ca mahābalamd pralambaṃ dhenukaṃ caiva ariṣṭaṃ vṛṣarūpiṇamd kālīyaṃ ca vaśe kṛtvā yamunāyā mahāhraded gokuleṣu tataḥ paścād gavārthe tu mahāgirimd saptarātraṃ dhariṣyāmi varṣamāṇe tu vāsaved apakrānte tato varṣe girimūrdhany avasthitaḥd indreṇa saha saṃvādaṃ kariṣyāmi tadā dvijaa yaḥ kālayavanaḥ khyāto gargatejobhisaṃvṛtaḥc bhaviṣyati vadhas tasya matta eva aśuddho varṇasaṃkaraḥd teṣāṃ sakāśād dharmajñā devabrahmadviṣo narāḥd bhaviṣyanti hy aśuddhāś ca nyāyacchalavibhāṣiṇaḥd ye nagnadharmaśrotāras te samāḥ pāpaniścayaiḥd tasmād ete na saṃbhāṣyā na
