punaḥd mlecchān utsādayiṣyāmi pāṣaṇḍāṃś caiva sarvaśaḥd pāṣaṇḍiṣaṭkān hatvā vai tatrāntaḥpralaye tataḥd ahaṃ paścād bhaviṣyāmi yajñeṣu nirataḥ sadāa haṃso hayaśirāś caiva prādurbhāvā dvijottamab vārāho nārasiṃhaś ca vāmano rāma eva cab rāmo dāśarathiś caiva sātvataḥ kalkir eva cac yadā vedaśrutir naṣṭā mayā pratyāhṛtā tadāe savedāḥ saśrutīkāś ca kṛtāḥ pūrvaṃ kṛte yugea atikrāntāḥ purāṇeṣu śrutās te yadi vā kva citc atikrāntāś ca bahavaḥ prādurbhāvā mamottamāḥd puruṣaḥ sarvam evedam akṣayaś cāvyayaś ca hae lokakāryāṇi kṛtvā ca punaḥ svāṃ prakṛtiṃ gatāḥa na hy etad brahmaṇā prāptam īdṛśaṃ mama darśanamc yat tvayā prāptam adyeha ekāntagatabuddhināa etat te sarvam ākhyātaṃ brahman bhaktimato mayāc purāṇaṃ ca bhaviṣyaṃ ca sarahasyaṃ ca sattamaa evaṃ sa bhagavān devo viśvamūrtidharo vyayaḥc etāvad uktvā vacanaṃ tatraivāntaradhīyataa nārado pi mahātejāḥ prāpyānugraham īpsitamc naranārāyaṇau draṣṭuṃ prādravad badarāśramama idaṃ mahopaniṣadaṃ caturvedasamanvitamc sāṃkhyayogakṛtaṃ tena pañcarātrānuśabditama nārāyaṇamukhodgītaṃ nārado śrāvayat punaḥc brahmaṇaḥ sadane tāta yathā dṛṣṭaṃ yathā śrutamd śrutvā brahmamukhād rudraḥ sa devyai kathayat punaḥd evaṃ paraṃparākhyātam idaṃ śaṃtanunā śrutam yudhiṣṭhira uvācaa etad āścaryabhūtaṃ hi māhātmyaṃ tasya dhīmataḥc kiṃ brahmā na vijānīte yataḥ śuśrāva nāradāta pitāmaho hi bhagavāṃs tasmād devād anantaraḥc kathaṃ sa na vijānīyāt prabhāvam amitaujasaḥ bhīṣma uvācaa mahākalpasahasrāṇi mahākalpaśatāni cac samatītāni rājendra sargāś ca pralayāś ca haa sargasyādau smṛto brahmā prajāsargakaraḥ prabhuḥc jānāti devapravaraṃ bhūyaś cāto dhikaṃ nṛpae paramātmānam īśānam ātmanaḥ prabhavaṃ tathāa ye tv anye brahmasadane siddhasaṃghāḥ samāgatāḥc tebhyas tac chrāvayām āsa purāṇaṃ vedasaṃmitama teṣāṃ sakāśāt sūryaś ca śrutvā vai bhāvitātmanāmc ātmānugāmināṃ brahma śrāvayām āsa bhārataa ṣaṭṣaṣṭir hi sahasrāṇi ṛṣīṇāṃ bhāvitātmanāmc sūryasya tapato lokān nirmitā ye puraḥsarāḥe teṣām akathayat sūryaḥ sarveṣāṃ bhāvitātmanāma sūryānugāmibhis tāta ṛṣibhis tair mahātmabhiḥc merau samāgatā devāḥ śrāvitāś cedam uttamama devānāṃ tu sakāśād vai tataḥ śrutvāsito dvijaḥc śrāvayām āsa rājendra pitṝṇāṃ munisattamaḥa mama cāpi pitā tāta kathayām āsa śaṃtanuḥc tato mayaitac chrutvā ca kīrtitaṃ tava bhāratad nāradāc caiva devarṣeḥ purāṇam aham āptavāna surair vā munibhir vāpi purāṇaṃ yair idaṃ śrutamc sarve te paramātmānaṃ pūjayanti punaḥ punaḥa idam ākhyānam ārṣeyaṃ pāraṃparyāgataṃ nṛpac nāvāsudevabhaktāya tvayā deyaṃ kathaṃ canad ākhyānam uttamaṃ cedaṃ śrāvayed yaḥ sadā nṛpad sadaiva manujo bhaktaḥ śucir bhūtvā samāhitaḥd prāpnuyād acirād rājan viṣṇulokaṃ sanātanama matto nyāni ca te rājann upākhyānaśatāni vaic yāni śrutāni dharmyāṇi teṣāṃ sāro yam uddhṛtaḥa surāsurair yathā rājan nirmathyāmṛtam uddhṛtamc evam etat purā vipraiḥ kathāmṛtam ihoddhṛtama yaś cedaṃ paṭhate nityaṃ yaś cedaṃ śṛṇuyān naraḥc ekāntabhāvopagata ekānte susamāhitaḥa prāpya śvetaṃ mahādvīpaṃ bhūtvā candraprabho naraḥc sa sahasrārciṣaṃ devaṃ praviśen nātra saṃśayaḥa mucyed ārtas tathā rogāc chrutvemām āditaḥ kathāmc jijñāsur labhate kāmān bhakto bhaktagatiṃ vrajeta tvayāpi satataṃ rājann abhyarcyaḥ puruṣottamaḥb vāsudevaṃ mahātmānaṃ śrotavyaṃ vidhipūrvakamc sa hi mātā pitā caiva kṛtsnasya jagato guruḥa brahmaṇyadevo bhagavān prīyatāṃ te sanātanaḥc yudhiṣṭhira mahābāho mahābāhur janārdanaḥd pūjanīyo sadāvyagro munibhir vedapāragaiḥ vaiśaṃpāyana uvācaa śrutvaitad ākhyānavaraṃ dharmarāḍ janamejayac bhrātaraś cāsya te sarve nārāyaṇaparābhavana jitaṃ bhagavatā tena puruṣeṇeti bhāratac nityaṃ japyaparā bhūtvā sarasvatīm udīrayana yo hy asmākaṃ guruḥ śreṣṭhaḥ kṛṣṇadvaipāyano muniḥc sa jagau paramaṃ japyaṃ nārāyaṇam udīrayana gatvāntarikṣāt satataṃ kṣīrodam amṛtāśayamc pūjayitvā ca deveśaṃ punar āyāt svam āśramamd bhīṣma uvācad etat te sarvam ākhyātaṃ nāradoktaṃ mayeritamd pāraṃparyāgataṃ hy etat pitrā me kathitaṃ purād sūta uvācad etat te sarvam ākhyātaṃ vaiśaṃpāyanakīrtitamd janamejayena yac chrutvā kṛtaṃ samyag yathāvidhid yūyaṃ hi taptatapasaḥ sarve ca caritavratāḥd sarve vedavido mukhyā naimiṣāraṇyavāsinaḥd śaunakasya mahāsatraṃ prāptāḥ sarve dvijottamāḥd yajadhvaṃ suhutair yajñair ātmānaṃ parameśvaram janamejaya uvācaa kathaṃ sa bhagavān devo yajñeṣv agraharaḥ prabhuḥc yajñadhārī ca satataṃ vedavedāṅgavit tathāa nivṛttaṃ cāsthito dharmaṃ kṣemī bhāgavatapriyaḥc pravṛttidharmān vidadhe sa eva bhagavān prabhuḥa kathaṃ pravṛttidharmeṣu bhāgārhā devatāḥ kṛtāḥc kathaṃ nivṛttidharmāś ca kṛtā vyāvṛttabuddhayaḥa etaṃ naḥ saṃśayaṃ vipra chindhi guhyaṃ sanātanamc tvayā nārāyaṇakathā śrutā vai dharmasaṃhitād sūta uvācad janamejayena yat pṛṣṭaḥ śiṣyo vyāsasya dhīmataḥd tat te haṃ kīrtayiṣyāmi paurāṇaṃ śaunakottamad śrutvā māhātmyam etasya dehināṃ paramātmanaḥd janamejayo mahāprājño vaiśaṃpāyanam abravīta ime sabrahmakā lokāḥ sasurāsuramānavāḥc kriyāsv abhyudayoktāsu saktā dṛśyanti sarvaśaḥe mokṣaś coktas tvayā brahman nirvāṇaṃ paramaṃ sukhama ye ca muktā bhavantīha puṇyapāpavivarjitāḥc te sahasrārciṣaṃ devaṃ praviśantīti śuśrumaḥa aho hi duranuṣṭheyo mokṣadharmaḥ sanātanaḥc yaṃ hitvā devatāḥ sarvā havyakavyabhujo bhavana kiṃ nu brahmā ca rudraś ca śakraś ca balabhit prabhuḥc sūryas tārādhipo vāyur agnir varuṇa eva cae ākāśaṃ jagatī caiva ye ca śeṣā divaukasaḥa pralayaṃ na vijānanti ātmanaḥ parinirmitamc tatas te nāsthitā mārgaṃ dhruvam akṣayam avyayama smṛtvā kālaparīmāṇaṃ pravṛttiṃ ye samāsthitāḥc doṣaḥ kālaparīmāṇe mahān eṣa kriyāvatāma etan me saṃśayaṃ vipra hṛdi śalyam ivārpitamc chindhītihāsakathanāt paraṃ kautūhalaṃ hi mea kathaṃ bhāgaharāḥ proktā devatāḥ kratuṣu dvijac kimarthaṃ cādhvare brahmann ijyante tridivaukasaḥa ye ca bhāgaṃ pragṛhṇanti yajñeṣu dvijasattamac te yajanto mahāyajñaiḥ kasya bhāgaṃ dadanti vai vaiśaṃpāyana uvācaa aho gūḍhatamaḥ praśnas tvayā pṛṣṭo janeśvarac nātaptatapasā hy eṣa nāvedaviduṣā tathāe nāpurāṇavidā cāpi śakyo vyāhartum añjasāa hanta te kathayiṣyāmi yan me pṛṣṭaḥ purā guruḥc kṛṣṇadvaipāyano vyāso vedavyāso mahān ṛṣiḥa sumantur jaiminiś caiva pailaś ca sudṛḍhavrataḥc ahaṃ caturthaḥ śiṣyo vai pañcamaś ca śukaḥ smṛtaḥa etān samāgatān sarvān pañca śiṣyān damānvitānc śaucācārasamāyuktāñ jitakrodhāñ jitendriyāna vedān adhyāpayām āsa mahābhāratapañcamānc merau girivare ramye siddhacāraṇasevitea teṣām abhyasyatāṃ vedān kadā cit saṃśayo bhavatb kiṃ tu brahmātha rudro vā devatā ṛṣayas tathāb prāyaḥ pravṛttimārgasthāḥ kasya devasya śāsanātb ke vai nivṛttimārgasthāḥ kasya devasya śāsanātb ke vai yajante sarve pi ka eṣām īśvaraḥ paraḥc eṣa vai yas tvayā pṛṣṭas tena teṣāṃ prakīrtitaḥe tataḥ śruto mayā cāpi tavākhyeyo dya bhārataa śiṣyāṇāṃ vacanaṃ śrutvā sarvājñānatamonudaḥc parāśarasutaḥ śrīmān vyāso vākyam uvāca haa mayā hi sumahat taptaṃ tapaḥ paramadāruṇamc bhūtaṃ bhavyaṃ bhaviṣyac ca jānīyām iti sattamāḥa tasya me taptatapaso nigṛhītendriyasya cac nārāyaṇaprasādena kṣīrodasyānukūlataḥa traikālikam idaṃ jñānaṃ prādurbhūtaṃ yathepsitamc tac chṛṇudhvaṃ yathājñānaṃ vakṣye saṃśayam uttamame yathā vṛttaṃ hi kalpādau dṛṣṭaṃ me jñānacakṣuṣāa paramātmeti yaṃ prāhuḥ sāṃkhyayogavido janāḥc mahāpuruṣasaṃjñāṃ sa labhate svena karmaṇāa tasmāt prasūtam avyaktaṃ pradhānaṃ tad vidur budhāḥc avyaktād vyaktam utpannaṃ lokasṛṣṭyartham īśvarāta aniruddho hi lokeṣu mahān ātmeti kathyatec yo sau vyaktatvam āpanno nirmame ca pitāmahame so haṃkāra iti proktaḥ sarvatejomayo hi saḥa pṛthivī vāyur ākāśam āpo jyotiś ca pañcamamc ahaṃkāraprasūtāni mahābhūtāni bhārataa mahābhūtāni sṛṣṭvātha tadguṇān nirmame punaḥc bhūtebhyaś caiva niṣpannā mūrtimanto ṣṭa tāñ śṛṇua marīcir aṅgirāś cātriḥ pulastyaḥ pulahaḥ kratuḥc vasiṣṭhaś ca mahātmā vai manuḥ svāyaṃbhuvas tathāe jñeyāḥ prakṛtayo ṣṭau tā yāsu lokāḥ pratiṣṭhitāḥa vedān vedāṅgasaṃyuktān yajñān yajñāṅgasaṃyutānb etān vai sumahābhāgān ṛṣīṃl lokapitāmahānc nirmame lokasiddhyarthaṃ brahmā lokapitāmahaḥe aṣṭābhyaḥ prakṛtibhyaś ca jātaṃ viśvam idaṃ jagata rudro roṣātmako jāto daśānyān so sṛjat svayamc ekādaśaite rudrās tu vikārāḥ puruṣāḥ smṛtāḥa te rudrāḥ prakṛtiś caiva sarve caiva surarṣayaḥc utpannā lokasiddhyarthaṃ brahmāṇaṃ samupasthitāḥa vayaṃ hi sṛṣṭā bhagavaṃs tvayā vai prabhaviṣṇunāc yena yasminn adhīkāre vartitavyaṃ pitāmahaa yo sau tvayā vinirdiṣṭo adhikāro rthacintakaḥc paripālyaḥ kathaṃ tena so dhikāro dhikāriṇāa pradiśasva balaṃ tasya yo dhikārārthacintakaḥc evam ukto mahādevo devāṃs tān idam abravīta sādhv ahaṃ jñāpito devā yuṣmābhir bhadram astu vaḥc mamāpy eṣā samutpannā cintā yā bhavatāṃ matāa lokatantrasya kṛtsnasya kathaṃ kāryaḥ parigrahaḥc kathaṃ balakṣayo na syād yuṣmākaṃ hy ātmanaś ca mea itaḥ sarve pi gacchāmaḥ śaraṇaṃ lokasākṣiṇamc mahāpuruṣam avyaktaṃ sa no vakṣyati yad dhitama tatas te brahmaṇā sārdham ṛṣayo vibudhās tathāc kṣīrodasyottaraṃ kūlaṃ jagmur lokahitārthinaḥa te tapaḥ samupātiṣṭhan brahmoktaṃ vedakalpitamc sa mahāniyamo nāma tapaścaryā sudāruṇāa ūrdhvaṃ dṛṣṭir bāhavaś ca ekāgraṃ ca mano bhavatc ekapādasthitāḥ samyak kāṣṭhabhūtāḥ samāhitāḥa divyaṃ varṣasahasraṃ te tapas taptvā tad uttamamc śuśruvur madhurāṃ vāṇīṃ vedavedāṅgabhūṣitāma bho bhoḥ sabrahmakā devā ṛṣayaś ca tapodhanāḥc svāgatenārcya vaḥ sarvāñ śrāvaye vākyam uttamama vijñātaṃ vo mayā kāryaṃ tac ca lokahitaṃ mahatc pravṛttiyuktaṃ kartavyaṃ yuṣmatprāṇopabṛṃhaṇama sutaptaṃ vas tapo devā mamārādhanakāmyayāc bhokṣyathāsya mahāsattvās tapasaḥ phalam uttamama eṣa brahmā lokaguruḥ sarvalokapitāmahaḥc yūyaṃ ca vibudhaśreṣṭhā māṃ yajadhvaṃ samāhitāḥa sarve bhāgān kalpayadhvaṃ yajñeṣu mama nityaśaḥc tathā śreyo vidhāsyāmi yathādhīkāram īśvarāḥa śrutvaitad devadevasya vākyaṃ hṛṣṭatanūruhāḥc tatas te vibudhāḥ sarve brahmā te ca maharṣayaḥa vedadṛṣṭena vidhinā vaiṣṇavaṃ kratum āharanc tasmin satre tadā brahmā svayaṃ bhāgam akalpayate devā devarṣayaś caiva sarve bhāgān akalpayana te kārtayugadharmāṇo bhāgāḥ paramasatkṛtāḥc prāpur ādityavarṇaṃ taṃ puruṣaṃ tamasaḥ parame bṛhantaṃ sarvagaṃ devam īśānaṃ varadaṃ prabhuma tato tha varado devas tān sarvān amarān sthitānc aśarīro babhāṣedaṃ vākyaṃ khastho maheśvaraḥa yena yaḥ kalpito bhāgaḥ sa tathā samupāgataḥc prīto haṃ pradiśāmy adya phalam āvṛttilakṣaṇama etad vo lakṣaṇaṃ devā matprasādasamudbhavamc yūyaṃ yajñair ijyamānāḥ samāptavaradakṣiṇaiḥe yuge yuge bhaviṣyadhvaṃ pravṛttiphalabhoginaḥa yajñair ye cāpi yakṣyanti sarvalokeṣu vai surāḥc kalpayiṣyanti vo bhāgāṃs te narā vedakalpitāna yo me yathā kalpitavān bhāgam asmin mahākratauc sa tathā yajñabhāgārho vedasūtre mayā kṛtaḥa yūyaṃ lokān dhārayadhvaṃ yajñabhāgaphaloditāḥc sarvārthacintakā loke yathādhīkāranirmitāḥa yāḥ kriyāḥ pracariṣyanti pravṛttiphalasatkṛtāḥc tābhir āpyāyitabalā lokān vai dhārayiṣyathaa yūyaṃ hi bhāvitā loke sarvayajñeṣu mānavaiḥc māṃ tato bhāvayiṣyadhvam eṣā vo bhāvanā mamaa ityarthaṃ nirmitā vedā yajñāś cauṣadhibhiḥ sahac ebhiḥ samyak prayuktair hi prīyante devatāḥ kṣitaua nirmāṇam etad yuṣmākaṃ pravṛttiguṇakalpitamc mayā kṛtaṃ suraśreṣṭhā yāvat kalpakṣayād itie cintayadhvaṃ lokahitaṃ yathādhīkāram īśvarāḥa marīcir aṅgirāś cātriḥ pulastyaḥ pulahaḥ kratuḥc vasiṣṭha iti saptaite mānasā nirmitā hi vaia ete vedavido mukhyā vedācāryāś ca kalpitāḥc pravṛttidharmiṇaś caiva prājāpatyena kalpitāḥa ayaṃ kriyāvatāṃ panthā vyaktībhūtaḥ sanātanaḥc aniruddha iti prokto lokasargakaraḥ prabhuḥa sanaḥ sanatsujātaś ca sanakaḥ sasanandanaḥc sanatkumāraḥ kapilaḥ saptamaś ca sanātanaḥa saptaite mānasāḥ proktā ṛṣayo brahmaṇaḥ sutāḥc svayamāgatavijñānā nivṛttaṃ dharmam āsthitāḥa ete yogavido mukhyāḥ sāṃkhyadharmavidas tathāc ācāryā mokṣaśāstre ca mokṣadharmapravartakāḥa yato haṃ prasṛtaḥ pūrvam avyaktāt triguṇo mahānc tasmāt parataro yo sau kṣetrajña iti kalpitaḥe so haṃ kriyāvatāṃ panthāḥ punarāvṛttidurlabhaḥa yo yathā nirmito jantur yasmin yasmiṃś ca karmaṇic pravṛttau vā nivṛttau vā tatphalaṃ so śnute vaśaḥa eṣa lokagurur brahmā jagadādikaraḥ prabhuḥc eṣa mātā pitā caiva yuṣmākaṃ ca pitāmahaḥe mayānuśiṣṭo bhavitā sarvabhūtavarapradaḥa asya caivānujo rudro lalāṭād yaḥ samutthitaḥc brahmānuśiṣṭo bhavitā sarvatrasavarapradaḥa gacchadhvaṃ svān adhīkārāṃś cintayadhvaṃ yathāvidhic pravartantāṃ kriyāḥ sarvāḥ sarvalokeṣu mācirama pradṛśyantāṃ ca karmāṇi prāṇināṃ gatayas tathāc parinirmitakālāni āyūṃṣi ca surottamāḥa idaṃ kṛtayugaṃ nāma kālaḥ śreṣṭhaḥ pravartateb tripādahīno dharmaś ca yuge tasmin bhaviṣyatic ahiṃsyā yajñapaśavo yuge smin naitad anyathāe catuṣpāt sakalo dharmo bhaviṣyaty atra vai surāḥa tatas tretāyugaṃ nāma trayī yatra bhaviṣyatic prokṣitā yatra paśavo vadhaṃ prāpsyanti vai makhee tatra pādacaturtho vai dharmasya na bhaviṣyatia tato vai dvāparaṃ nāma miśraḥ kālo bhaviṣyatic dvipādahīno dharmaś ca yuge tasmin bhaviṣyatid tatra vadhyanti paśavo yūpeṣv atra nibadhyatea tatas tiṣye tha saṃprāpte yuge kalipuraskṛtec ekapādasthito dharmo yatra tatra bhaviṣyatid devā devarṣayaś cocus tam evaṃvādinaṃ gurum devā ūcuḥa ekapādasthite dharme yatrakvacanagāminic kathaṃ kartavyam asmābhir bhagavaṃs tad vadasva naḥ śrībhagavān uvāca guravo yatra pūjyante sādhuvṛttāḥ śamānvitāḥ vastavyaṃ tatra yuṣmābhir yatra dharmo na hīyatea yatra vedāś ca yajñāś ca tapaḥ satyaṃ damas tathāc ahiṃsādharmasaṃyuktāḥ pracareyuḥ surottamāḥe sa vai deśaḥ sevitavyo mā vo dharmaḥ padā spṛśet vyāsa uvācaa te nuśiṣṭā bhagavatā devāḥ sarṣigaṇās tathāc namaskṛtvā bhagavate jagmur deśān yathepsitāna gateṣu tridivaukaḥsu brahmaikaḥ paryavasthitaḥc didṛkṣur bhagavantaṃ tam aniruddhatanau sthitama taṃ devo darśayām āsa kṛtvā hayaśiro mahatc sāṅgān āvartayan vedān kamaṇḍalugaṇitradhṛka tato śvaśirasaṃ dṛṣṭvā taṃ devam amitaujasamc lokakartā prabhur brahmā lokānāṃ hitakāmyayāa mūrdhnā praṇamya varadaṃ tasthau prāñjalir agrataḥc sa pariṣvajya devena vacanaṃ śrāvitas tadāa lokakāryagatīḥ sarvās tvaṃ cintaya yathāvidhic dhātā tvaṃ sarvabhūtānāṃ tvaṃ prabhur jagato guruḥe tvayy āveśitabhāro haṃ dhṛtiṃ prāpsyāmy athāñjasāa yadā ca surakāryaṃ te aviṣahyaṃ bhaviṣyatic prādurbhāvaṃ gamiṣyāmi tadātmajñānadeśikaḥa evam uktvā hayaśirās tatraivāntaradhīyatac tenānuśiṣṭo brahmāpi svaṃ lokam acirād gataḥa evam eṣa mahābhāgaḥ padmanābhaḥ sanātanaḥc yajñeṣv agraharaḥ prokto yajñadhārī ca nityadāa nivṛttiṃ cāsthito dharmaṃ gatim akṣayadharmiṇāmc pravṛttidharmān vidadhe kṛtvā lokasya citratāma sa ādiḥ sa madhyaḥ sa cāntaḥ prajānāṃsa dhātā sa dheyaḥ sa kartā sa kāryamc yugānte sa suptaḥ susaṃkṣipya lokānyugādau prabuddho jagad dhy utsasarjad sa ādiḥ sa ca madhyaṃ vai buddhaḥ sṛjati vai jagata tasmai namadhvaṃ devāya nirguṇāya guṇātmanec ajāya viśvarūpāya dhāmne sarvadivaukasāma mahābhūtādhipataye rudrāṇāṃ pataye tathāc ādityapataye caiva vasūnāṃ pataye tathāa aśvibhyāṃ pataye caiva marutāṃ pataye tathāc vedayajñādhipataye vedāṅgapataye pi caa samudravāsine nityaṃ haraye muñjakeśinec śāntaye sarvabhūtānāṃ mokṣadharmānubhāṣiṇea tapasāṃ tejasāṃ caiva pataye yaśaso pi cac vācaś ca pataye nityaṃ saritāṃ pataye tathāa kapardine varāhāya ekaśṛṅgāya dhīmatec vivasvate śvaśirase caturmūrtidhṛte sadāa guhyāya jñānadṛśyāya akṣarāya kṣarāya cac eṣa devaḥ saṃcarati sarvatragatir avyayaḥa evam etat purā dṛṣṭaṃ mayā vai jñānacakṣuṣāc kathitaṃ tac ca vaḥ sarvaṃ mayā pṛṣṭena tattvataḥa kriyatāṃ madvacaḥ śiṣyāḥ sevyatāṃ harir īśvaraḥc gīyatāṃ vedaśabdaiś ca pūjyatāṃ ca yathāvidhi vaiśaṃpāyana uvācaa ity uktās tu vayaṃ tena vedavyāsena dhīmatāc sarve śiṣyāḥ sutaś cāsya śukaḥ paramadharmavita sa cāsmākam upādhyāyaḥ sahāsmābhir viśāṃ patec caturvedodgatābhiś ca ṛgbhis tam abhituṣṭuvea etat te sarvam ākhyātaṃ yan māṃ tvaṃ paripṛcchasic evaṃ me kathayad rājan purā dvaipāyano guruḥa yaś cedaṃ śṛṇuyān nityaṃ yaś cedaṃ parikīrtayetc namo bhagavate kṛtvā samāhitamanā naraḥa bhavaty arogo dyutimān balarūpasamanvitaḥc āturo mucyate rogād baddho mucyeta bandhanāta kāmakāmī labhet kāmaṃ dīrgham āyur avāpnuyātc brāhmaṇaḥ sarvavedī syāt kṣatriyo vijayī bhavete vaiśyo vipulalābhaḥ syāc chūdraḥ sukham avāpnuyāta aputro labhate putraṃ kanyā caivepsitaṃ patimc lagnagarbhā vimucyeta garbhiṇī janayet sutame vandhyā prasavam āpnoti putrapautrasamṛddhimata kṣemeṇa gacched adhvānam idaṃ yaḥ paṭhate pathic yo yaṃ kāmaṃ kāmayate sa tam āpnoti ca dhruvamd ity āha bhagavān vyāsaḥ parāśarasutaḥ prabhuḥa idaṃ maharṣer vacanaṃ viniścitaṃmahātmanaḥ puruṣavarasya kīrtanamc samāgamaṃ carṣidivaukasām imaṃniśamya bhaktāḥ susukhaṃ labhante janamejaya uvācaa astauṣīd yair imaṃ vyāsaḥ saśiṣyo madhusūdanamc nāmabhir vividhair eṣāṃ niruktaṃ bhagavan mamaa vaktum arhasi śuśrūṣoḥ prajāpatipater hareḥc śrutvā bhaveyaṃ yat pūtaḥ śaraccandra ivāmalaḥ vaiśaṃpāyana uvācaa śṛṇu rājan yathācaṣṭa phalgunasya harir vibhuḥc prasannātmātmano nāmnāṃ niruktaṃ guṇakarmajama nāmabhiḥ kīrtitais tasya keśavasya mahātmanaḥc pṛṣṭavān keśavaṃ rājan phalgunaḥ paravīrahā arjuna uvācaa bhagavan bhūtabhavyeśa sarvabhūtasṛg avyayac lokadhāma jagannātha lokānām abhayapradaa yāni nāmāni te deva kīrtitāni maharṣibhiḥc vedeṣu sapurāṇeṣu yāni guhyāni karmabhiḥa teṣāṃ niruktaṃ tvatto haṃ śrotum icchāmi keśavac na hy anyo vartayen nāmnāṃ niruktaṃ tvām ṛte prabho śrībhagavān uvācaa ṛgvede sayajurvede tathaivātharvasāmasuc purāṇe sopaniṣade tathaiva jyotiṣe rjunaa sāṃkhye ca yogaśāstre ca āyurvede tathaiva cac bahūni mama nāmāni kīrtitāni maharṣibhiḥa gauṇāni tatra nāmāni karmajāni ca kāni citc niruktaṃ karmajānāṃ ca śṛṇuṣva prayato naghae kathyamānaṃ mayā tāta tvaṃ hi me rdhaṃ smṛtaḥ purāa namo tiyaśase tasmai dehināṃ paramātmanec nārāyaṇāya viśvāya nirguṇāya guṇātmanea yasya prasādajo brahmā rudraś ca krodhasaṃbhavaḥc yo sau yonir hi sarvasya sthāvarasya carasya caa aṣṭādaśaguṇaṃ yat tat sattvaṃ sattvavatāṃ varac prakṛtiḥ sā parā mahyaṃ rodasī yogadhāriṇīe ṛtā satyāmarājayyā lokānām ātmasaṃjñitāa tasmāt sarvāḥ pravartante sargapralayavikriyāḥc tato yajñaś ca yaṣṭā ca purāṇaḥ puruṣo virāṭe aniruddha iti prokto lokānāṃ prabhavāpyayaḥa brāhme rātrikṣaye prāpte tasya hy amitatejasaḥc prasādāt prādurabhavat padmaṃ padmanibhekṣaṇae tatra brahmā samabhavat sa tasyaiva prasādajaḥa ahnaḥ kṣaye lalāṭāc ca suto devasya vai tathāc krodhāviṣṭasya saṃjajñe rudraḥ saṃhārakārakaḥa etau dvau vibudhaśreṣṭhau prasādakrodhajau smṛtauc tadādeśitapanthānau sṛṣṭisaṃhārakārakaue nimittamātraṃ tāv atra sarvaprāṇivarapradaua kapardī jaṭilo muṇḍaḥ śmaśānagṛhasevakaḥc ugravratadharo rudro yogī tripuradāruṇaḥa dakṣakratuharaś caiva bhaganetraharas tathāc nārāyaṇātmako jñeyaḥ pāṇḍaveya yuge yuged yo sau rudraḥ so ham asmi yo ham asmi śivaḥ paraḥd yathā rudras tathāhaṃ ca nāvayor antaraṃ tathāa tasmin hi pūjyamāne vai devadeve maheśvarec saṃpūjito bhavet pārtha devo nārāyaṇaḥ prabhuḥa aham ātmā hi lokānāṃ viśvānāṃ pāṇḍunandanac tasmād ātmānam evāgre rudraṃ saṃpūjayāmy ahama yady ahaṃ nārcayeyaṃ vai īśānaṃ varadaṃ śivamc ātmānaṃ nārcayet kaś cid iti me bhāvitaṃ manaḥe mayā pramāṇaṃ hi kṛtaṃ lokaḥ samanuvartatea pramāṇāni hi pūjyāni tatas taṃ pūjayāmy ahamc yas taṃ vetti sa māṃ vetti yo nu taṃ sa hi mām anua rudro nārāyaṇaś caiva sattvam ekaṃ dvidhākṛtamc loke carati kaunteya vyaktisthaṃ sarvakarmasua na hi me kena cid deyo varaḥ pāṇḍavanandanac iti saṃcintya manasā purāṇaṃ viśvam īśvarame putrārtham ārādhitavān ātmānam aham ātmanāa na hi viṣṇuḥ praṇamati kasmai cid vibudhāya tuc ṛta ātmānam eveti tato rudraṃ bhajāmy ahama sabrahmakāḥ sarudrāś ca sendrā devāḥ saharṣibhiḥc arcayanti suraśreṣṭhaṃ devaṃ nārāyaṇaṃ harima bhaviṣyatāṃ vartatāṃ ca bhūtānāṃ caiva bhāratac sarveṣām agraṇīr viṣṇuḥ sevyaḥ pūjyaś ca nityaśaḥa namasva havyadaṃ viṣṇuṃ tathā śaraṇadaṃ namac varadaṃ namasva kaunteya havyakavyabhujaṃ namaa caturvidhā mama janā bhaktā evaṃ hi te śrutamc teṣām ekāntinaḥ śreṣṭhās te caivānanyadevatāḥe aham eva gatis teṣāṃ nirāśīḥkarmakāriṇāma ye ca śiṣṭās trayo bhaktāḥ phalakāmā hi te matāḥc sarve cyavanadharmāṇaḥ pratibuddhas tu śreṣṭhabhāka brahmāṇaṃ śitikaṇṭhaṃ ca yāś cānyā devatāḥ smṛtāḥc prabuddhavaryāḥ sevante mām evaiṣyanti yat parame bhaktaṃ prati viśeṣas te eṣa pārthānukīrtitaḥa tvaṃ caivāhaṃ ca kaunteya naranārāyaṇau smṛtauc bhārāvataraṇārthaṃ hi praviṣṭau mānuṣīṃ tanuma jānāmy adhyātmayogāṃś ca yo haṃ yasmāc ca bhāratac nivṛttilakṣaṇo dharmas sarvabhūtādhivāsaś ca vāsudevas tato hy ahama gatiś ca sarvabhūtānāṃ prajānāṃ cāpi bhāratac vyāptā me rodasī pārtha kāntiś cābhyadhikā mamaa adhibhūtāni cānte haṃ tad icchaṃś cāsmi bhāratac kramaṇāc sāhyakṛt sakhāa dhanyāś ca sarva evāsan brahmaṃs te mama pūrvakāḥc hitāya śreyase caiva yeṣām āsīj janārdanaḥa tapasāpi na dṛśyo hi bhagavāṃl lokapūjitaḥc yaṃ dṛṣṭavantas te sākṣāc chrīvatsāṅkavibhūṣaṇama tebhyo dhanyataraś caiva nāradaḥ parameṣṭhijaḥc na cālpatejasam ṛṣiṃ vedmi nāradam avyayamd dṛṣṭavān yo hariṃ devaṃ nārāyaṇam ajaṃ vibhume śvetadvīpaṃ samāsādya yena dṛṣṭaḥ svayaṃ hariḥa devaprasādānugataṃ vyaktaṃ tat tasya darśanamc yad dṛṣṭavāṃs tadā devam aniruddhatanau sthitama badarīm āśramaṃ yat tu nāradaḥ prādravat punaḥc naranārāyaṇau draṣṭuṃ kiṃ nu tatkāraṇaṃ munea śvetadvīpān nivṛttaś ca nāradaḥ parameṣṭhijaḥc badarīm āśramaṃ prāpya samāgamya ca tāv ṛṣīa kiyantaṃ kālam avasat kāḥ kathāḥ pṛṣṭavāṃś ca saḥc śvetadvīpād upāvṛtte tasmin vā sumahātmania kim abrūtāṃ mahātmānau naranārāyaṇāv ṛṣīc tad etan me yathātattvaṃ sarvam ākhyātum arhasid sūta uvācad evaṃ pṛṣṭas tadā rājñā parāśaryo mahāmuniḥd samīpasthaṃ tataḥ śiṣyaṃ vaiśaṃpāyanam abravītd brūhy asmai sarvam akhilaṃ yad vṛttaṃ nāradasya had tayoḥ sakāśaṃ gatvā ca yathā sa kṛtavān punaḥd sūta uvācad tasya tad vacanaṃ śrutvā kṛṣṇadvaipāyanas tadād śaśāsa śiṣyam āsīnaṃ vaiśaṃpāyanam antiked tad asmai sarvam ācakṣva yan mattaḥ śrutavān asid guror vacanam ājñāya sa tu viprarṣabhas tadād ācacakṣe tataḥ sarvam itihāsaṃ purātanam vaiśaṃpāyana uvācaa namo bhagavate tasmai vyāsāyāmitatejasec yasya prasādād vakṣyāmi nārāyaṇakathām imāmd nāsti nārāyaṇasamaṃ na bhūtaṃ na bhaviṣyatid etena satyavākyena sarvārthān sādhayāmy ahamd nāradena purā yā me gurave viniveditād ṛṣīṇāṃ pāṇḍavānāṃ ca śṛṇvatoḥ kṛṣṇabhīṣmayoḥa prāpya śvetaṃ mahādvīpaṃ dṛṣṭvā ca harim avyayamc nivṛtto nārado rājaṃs tarasā merum āgamate hṛdayenodvahan bhāraṃ yad uktaṃ paramātmanāa paścād asyābhavad rājann ātmanaḥ sādhvasaṃ mahatc yad gatvā dūram adhvānaṃ kṣemī punar ihāgataḥa tato meroḥ pracakrāma parvataṃ gandhamādanamc nipapāta ca khāt tūrṇaṃ viśālāṃ badarīm anua tataḥ sa dadṛśe devau purāṇāv ṛṣisattamauc tapaś carantau sumahad ātmaniṣṭhau mahāvrataua tejasābhyadhikau sūryāt sarvalokavirocanātc śrīvatsalakṣaṇau pūjyau jaṭāmaṇḍaladhāriṇaua jālapādabhujau tau tu pādayoś cakralakṣaṇauc vyūḍhoraskau dīrghabhujau tathā muṣkacatuṣkiṇaua ṣaṣṭidantāv aṣṭadaṃṣṭrau meghaughasadṛśasvanauc svāsyau pṛthulalāṭau ca suhanū subhrunāsikaua ātapatreṇa sadṛśe śirasī devayos tayoḥc evaṃ lakṣaṇasaṃpannau mahāpuruṣasaṃjñitaua tau dṛṣṭvā nārado hṛṣṭas tābhyāṃ ca pratipūjitaḥc svāgatenābhibhāṣyātha pṛṣṭaś cānāmayaṃ tadāa babhūvāntargatamatir nirīkṣya puruṣottamauc sadogatās tatra ye vai sarvabhūtanamaskṛtāḥa śvetadvīpe mayā dṛṣṭās tādṛśāv ṛṣisattamauc iti saṃcintya manasā kṛtvā cābhipradakṣiṇame upopaviviśe tatra pīṭhe kuśamaye śubhea tatas tau tapasāṃ vāsau yaśasāṃ tejasām apic ṛṣī śamadamopetau kṛtvā pūrvāhṇikaṃ vidhima paścān nāradam avyagrau pādyārghyābhyāṃ prapūjya cac pīṭhayoś copaviṣṭau tau kṛtātithyāhnikau nṛpaa teṣu tatropaviṣṭeṣu sa deśo bhivyarājatac ājyāhutimahājvālair yajñavāṭo gnibhir yathāa atha nārāyaṇas tatra nāradaṃ vākyam abravītc sukhopaviṣṭaṃ viśrāntaṃ kṛtātithyaṃ sukhasthitama apīdānīṃ sa bhagavān paramātmā sanātanaḥc śvetadvīpe tvayā dṛṣṭa āvayoḥ prakṛtiḥ parā nārada uvācaa dṛṣṭo me puruṣaḥ śrīmān viśvarūpadharo vyayaḥc sarve hi lokās tatrasthās tathā devāḥ saharṣibhiḥe adyāpi cainaṃ paśyāmi yuvāṃ paśyan sanātanaua yair lakṣaṇair upetaḥ sa harir avyaktarūpadhṛkc tair lakṣaṇair upetau hi vyaktarūpadharau yuvāma dṛṣṭau mayā yuvāṃ tatra tasya devasya pārśvataḥc iha caivāgato smy adya visṛṣṭaḥ paramātmanāa ko hi nāma bhavet tasya tejasā yaśasā śriyāc sadṛśas triṣu lokeṣu ṛte dharmātmajau yuvāma tena me kathitaṃ pūrvaṃ nāma kṣetrajñasaṃjñitamc prādurbhāvāś ca kathitā bhaviṣyanti hi ye yathāa tatra ye puruṣāḥ śvetāḥ pañcendriyavivarjitāḥc pratibuddhāś ca te sarve bhaktāś ca puruṣottamama te rcayanti sadā devaṃ taiḥ sārdhaṃ ramate ca saḥc priyabhakto hi bhagavān paramātmā dvijapriyaḥa ramate so rcyamāno hi sadā bhāgavatapriyaḥc viśvabhuk sarvago devo bāndhavo bhaktavatsalaḥe sa kartā kāraṇaṃ caiva kāryaṃ cātibaladyutiḥf hetuś cājñāvidhānaṃ ca tattvaṃ caiva mahāyaśāḥa tapasā yojya so tmānaṃ śvetadvīpāt paraṃ hi yatc teja ity abhivikhyātaṃ svayaṃbhāsāvabhāsitama śāntiḥ sā triṣu lokeṣu siddhānāṃ bhāvitātmanāmc etayā śubhayā buddhyā naiṣṭhikaṃ vratam āsthitaḥa na tatra sūryas tapati na somo bhivirājatec na vāyur vāti deveśe tapaś carati duścarama vedīm aṣṭatalotsedhāṃ bhūmāv āsthāya viśvabhukc ekapādasthito deva ūrdhvabāhur udaṅmukhaḥe sāṅgān āvartayan vedāṃs tapas tepe suduścarama yad brahmā ṛṣayaś caiva svayaṃ paśupatiś ca yatc śeṣāś ca vibudhaśreṣṭhā daityadānavarākṣasāḥa nāgāḥ suparṇā gandharvāḥ siddhā rājarṣayaś ca yec havyaṃ kavyaṃ ca satataṃ vidhipūrvaṃ prayuñjatee kṛtsnaṃ tat tasya devasya caraṇāv upatiṣṭhatia yāḥ kriyāḥ saṃprayuktās tu ekāntagatabuddhibhiḥc tāḥ sarvāḥ śirasā devaḥ pratigṛhṇāti vai svayama na tasyānyaḥ priyataraḥ pratibuddhair mahātmabhiḥc vidyate triṣu lokeṣu tato smy aikāntikaṃ gataḥe iha caivāgatas tena visṛṣṭaḥ paramātmanāf ananyadevatābhaktir ananyamanutā hareḥf ananyasevyatā viṣṇor ananyārcyatvam eva caf brahmarudrādisāmyatvaṃ buddhirāhityam eva caf ananyadevālayagatir ananyabhaktādyavīkṣaṇamf tathā karmaphalāsaṅgo hy ekāntitvam idaṃ matama evaṃ me bhagavān devaḥ svayam ākhyātavān hariḥc āsiṣye tatparo bhūtvā yuvābhyāṃ saha nityaśaḥ naranārāyaṇāv ūcatuḥa dhanyo sy anugṛhīto si yat te dṛṣṭaḥ svayaṃ prabhuḥc na hi taṃ dṛṣṭavān kaś cit padmayonir api svayama avyaktayonir bhagavān durdarśaḥ puruṣottamaḥc nāradaitad dhi te satyaṃ vacanaṃ samudāhṛtama nāsya bhaktaiḥ priyataro loke kaś cana vidyatec tataḥ svayaṃ darśitavān svam ātmānaṃ dvijottamaa tapo hi tapyatas tasya yat sthānaṃ paramātmanaḥc na tat saṃprāpnute kaś cid ṛte hy āvāṃ dvijottamaa yā hi sūryasahasrasya samastasya bhaved dyutiḥc sthānasya sā bhavet tasya svayaṃ tena virājatāa tasmād uttiṣṭhate vipra devād viśvabhuvaḥ pateḥc kṣamā kṣamāvatāṃ śreṣṭha yayā bhūmis tu yujyatea tasmāc cottiṣṭhate devāt sarvabhūtahito rasaḥc āpo yena hi yujyante dravatvaṃ prāpnuvanti caa tasmād eva samudbhūtaṃ tejo rūpaguṇātmakamc yena sma yujyate sūryas tato lokān virājatea tasmād devāt samudbhūtaḥ sparśas tu puruṣottamātc yena sma yujyate vāyus tato lokān vivāty asaua tasmāc cottiṣṭhate śabdaḥ sarvalokeśvarāt prabhoḥc ākāśaṃ yujyate yena tatas tiṣṭhaty asaṃvṛtama tasmāc cottiṣṭhate devāt sarvabhūtagataṃ manaḥc candramā yena saṃyuktaḥ prakāśaguṇadhāraṇaḥa ṣaḍbhūtotpādakaṃ nāma tat sthānaṃ vedasaṃjñitamc vidyāsahāyo yatrāste bhagavān havyakavyabhuka ye hi niṣkalmaṣā loke puṇyapāpavivarjitāḥc teṣāṃ vai kṣemam adhvānaṃ gacchatāṃ dvijasattamae sarvalokatamohantā ādityo dvāram ucyatef jvālāmālī mahātejā yenedaṃ dhāryate jagata ādityadagdhasarvāṅgā adṛśyāḥ kena cit kva citc paramāṇubhūtā bhūtvā tu taṃ devaṃ praviśanty utaa tasmād api vinirmuktā aniruddhatanau sthitāḥc manobhūtās tato bhūyaḥ pradyumnaṃ praviśanty utaa pradyumnāc cāpi nirmuktā jīvaṃ saṃkarṣaṇaṃ tathāc viśanti viprapravarāḥ sāṃkhyā bhāgavataiḥ sahaa tatas traiguṇyahīnās te paramātmānam añjasāc praviśanti dvijaśreṣṭha kṣetrajñaṃ nirguṇātmakame sarvāvāsaṃ vāsudevaṃ kṣetrajñaṃ viddhi tattvataḥa samāhitamanaskāś ca niyatāḥ saṃyatendriyāḥc ekāntabhāvopagatā vāsudevaṃ viśanti tea āvām api ca dharmasya gṛhe jātau dvijottamac ramyāṃ viśālām āśritya tapa ugraṃ samāsthitaua ye tu tasyaiva devasya prādurbhāvāḥ surapriyāḥc bhaviṣyanti trilokasthās teṣāṃ svastīty ato dvijaa vidhinā svena yuktābhyāṃ yathāpūrvaṃ dvijottamac āsthitābhyāṃ sarvakṛcchraṃ vrataṃ samyak tad uttamamd svārthena vidhinā yuktaḥ sarvakṛcchravrate sthitaḥa āvābhyām api dṛṣṭas tvaṃ śvetadvīpe tapodhanac samāgato bhagavatā saṃjalpaṃ kṛtavān yathāa sarvaṃ hi nau saṃviditaṃ trailokye sacarācarec yad bhaviṣyati vṛttaṃ vā vartate vā śubhāśubhamd sarvaṃ sa te kathitavān devadevo mahāmune vaiśaṃpāyana uvācaa etac chrutvā tayor vākyaṃ tapasy ugre bhyavartatac nāradaḥ prāñjalir bhūtvā nārāyaṇaparāyaṇaḥa jajāpa vidhivan mantrān nārāyaṇagatān bahūnc divyaṃ varṣasahasraṃ hi naranārāyaṇāśramea avasat sa mahātejā nārado bhagavān ṛṣiḥc tam evābhyarcayan devaṃ naranārāyaṇau ca tau vaiśaṃpāyana uvācaa kasya cit tv atha kālasya nāradaḥ parameṣṭhijaḥc daivaṃ kṛtvā yathānyāyaṃ pitryaṃ cakre tataḥ parama tatas taṃ vacanaṃ prāha jyeṣṭho dharmātmajaḥ prabhuḥc ka ijyate dvijaśreṣṭha daive pitrye ca kalpitea tvayā matimatāṃ śreṣṭha tan me śaṃsa yathāgamamc kim etat kriyate karma phalaṃ cāsya kim iṣyate nārada uvācaa tvayaitat kathitaṃ pūrvaṃ daivaṃ kartavyam ity apic daivataṃ ca paro yajñaḥ paramātmā sanātanaḥa tatas tadbhāvito nityaṃ yaje vaikuṇṭham avyayamc tasmāc ca prasṛtaḥ pūrvaṃ brahmā lokapitāmahaḥa mama vai pitaraṃ prītaḥ parameṣṭhy apy ajījanatc ahaṃ saṃkalpajas tasya putraḥ prathamakalpitaḥa yajāmy ahaṃ pitṝn sādho nārāyaṇavidhau kṛtec evaṃ sa eva bhagavān pitā mātā pitāmahaḥe ijyate pitṛyajñeṣu mayā nityaṃ jagatpatiḥa śrutiś cāpy aparā deva putrān hi pitaro yajanc vedaśrutiḥ praṇaṣṭā ca punar adhyāpitā sutaiḥe tatas te mantradāḥ putrāḥ pitṛtvam upapedirea nūnaṃ puraitad viditaṃ yuvayor bhāvitātmanoḥc putrāś ca pitaraś caiva parasparam apūjayana trīn piṇḍān nyasya vai pṛthvyāṃ pūrvaṃ dattvā kuśān itic kathaṃ tu piṇḍasaṃjñāṃ te pitaro lebhire purā naranārāyaṇāv ūcatuḥa imāṃ hi dharaṇīṃ pūrvaṃ naṣṭāṃ sāgaramekhalāmc govinda ujjahārāśu vārāhaṃ rūpam āśritaḥa sthāpayitvā tu dharaṇīṃ sve sthāne puruṣottamaḥc jalakardamaliptāṅgo lokakāryārtham udyataḥa prāpte cāhnikakāle sa madhyaṃdinagate ravauc daṃṣṭrāvilagnān mṛtpiṇḍān vidhūya sahasā prabhuḥe sthāpayām āsa vai pṛthvyāṃ kuśān āstīrya nāradaa sa teṣv ātmānam uddiśya pitryaṃ cakre yathāvidhic saṃkalpayitvā trīn piṇḍān svenaiva vidhinā prabhuḥa ātmagātroṣmasaṃbhūtaiḥ snehagarbhais tilair apic prokṣyāpavargaṃ deveśaḥ prāṅmukhaḥ kṛtavān svayama maryādāsthāpanārthaṃ ca tato vacanam uktavānc ahaṃ hi pitaraḥ sraṣṭum udyato lokakṛt svayama tasya cintayataḥ sadyaḥ pitṛkāryavidhiṃ paramc daṃṣṭrābhyāṃ pravinirdhūtā mamaite dakṣiṇāṃ diśame āśritā dharaṇīṃ piṇḍās tasmāt pitara eva tea trayo mūrtivihīnā vai piṇḍamūrtidharās tv imec bhavantu pitaro loke mayā sṛṣṭāḥ sanātanāḥa pitā pitāmahaś caiva tathaiva prapitāmahaḥc aham evātra vijñeyas triṣu piṇḍeṣu saṃsthitaḥa nāsti matto dhikaḥ kaś cit ko vābhyarcyo mayā svayamc ko vā mama pitā loke aham eva pitāmahaḥa pitāmahapitā caiva aham evātra kāraṇamc ity evam uktvā vacanaṃ devadevo vṛṣākapiḥa varāhaparvate vipra dattvā piṇḍān savistarānc ātmānaṃ pūjayitvaiva tatraivādarśanaṃ gataḥa etadarthaṃ śubhamate pitaraḥ piṇḍasaṃjñitāḥc labhante satataṃ pūjāṃ vṛṣākapivaco yathāa ye yajanti pitṝn devān gurūṃś caivātithīṃs tathāc gāś caiva dvijamukhyāṃś ca pṛthivīṃ mātaraṃ tathāe karmaṇā manasā vācā viṣṇum eva yajanti tea antargataḥ sa bhagavān sarvasattvaśarīragaḥc samaḥ sarveṣu bhūteṣu īśvaraḥ sukhaduḥkhayoḥe mahān mahātmā sarvātmā nārāyaṇa iti śrutaḥ vaiśaṃpāyana uvācaa śrutvaitan nārado vākyaṃ naranārāyaṇeritamc atyantabhaktimān deve ekāntitvam upeyivāna proṣya varṣasahasraṃ tu naranārāyaṇāśramec śrutvā bhagavadākhyānaṃ dṛṣṭvā ca harim avyayame himavantaṃ jagāmāśu yatrāsya svaka āśramaḥa tāv api khyātatapasau naranārāyaṇāv ṛṣīc tasminn evāśrame ramye tepatus tapa uttamama tvam apy amitavikrāntaḥ pāṇḍavānāṃ kulodvahaḥc pāvitātmādya saṃvṛttaḥ śrutvemām āditaḥ kathāma naiva tasya paro loko nāyaṃ pārthivasattamac karmaṇā manasā vācā yo dviṣyād viṣṇum avyayama majjanti pitaras tasya narake śāśvatīḥ samāḥc yo dviṣyād vibudhaśreṣṭhaṃ devaṃ nārāyaṇaṃ harima kathaṃ nāma bhaved dveṣya ātmā lokasya kasya citc ātmā hi puruṣavyāghra jñeyo viṣṇur iti sthitiḥa ya eṣa gurur asmākam ṛṣir gandhavatīsutaḥc tenaitat kathitaṃ tāta māhātmyaṃ paramātmanaḥe tasmāc chrutaṃ mayā cedaṃ kathitaṃ ca tavānaghaa kṛṣṇadvaipāyanaṃ vyāsaṃ viddhi nārāyaṇaṃ prabhumc ko hy anyaḥ puruṣavyāghra mahābhāratakṛd bhavete dharmān nānāvidhāṃś caiva ko brūyāt tam ṛte prabhuma vartatāṃ te mahāyajño yathā saṃkalpitas tvayāc saṃkalpitāśvamedhas tvaṃ śrutadharmaś ca tattvataḥa etat tu mahad ākhyānaṃ śrutvā pārikṣito nṛpaḥc tato yajñasamāptyarthaṃ kriyāḥ sarvāḥ samārabhata nārāyaṇīyam ākhyānam etat te kathitaṃ mayāb pṛṣṭena śaunakādyeha naimiṣāraṇyavāsiṣuc nāradena purā rājan gurave me niveditame ṛṣīṇāṃ pāṇḍavānāṃ ca śṛṇvatoḥ kṛṣṇabhīṣmayoḥa sa hi paramagurur bhuvanapatirdharaṇidharaḥ śamaniyamanidhiḥc śrutivinayanidhir dvijaparamahitastava bhavatu gatir harir amarahitaḥa tapasāṃ nidhiḥ sumahatāṃ mahatoyaśasaś ca bhājanam ariṣṭakahāc ekāntināṃ śaraṇado bhayadogatido stu vaḥ sa makhabhāgaharaḥa triguṇātigaś catuṣpañcadharaḥpūrteṣṭayoś ca phalabhāgaharaḥc vidadhāti nityam ajito tibalogatim ātmagāṃ sukṛtinām ṛṣiṇāma taṃ lokasākṣiṇam ajaṃ puruṣaṃravivarṇam īśvaragatiṃ bahuśaḥc praṇamadhvam ekamatayo yatayaḥsalilodbhavo pi tam ṛṣiṃ praṇataḥa sa hi lokayonir amṛtasya padaṃsūkṣmaṃ purāṇam acalaṃ paramamc tat sāṃkhyayogibhir udāradhṛtaṃbuddhyā yatātmabhir viditaṃ satatam janamejaya uvācaa śrutaṃ bhagavatas tasya māhātmyaṃ paramātmanaḥc janma dharmagṛhe caiva naranārāyaṇātmakame mahāvarāhasṛṣṭā ca piṇḍotpattiḥ purātanīa pravṛttau ca nivṛttau ca yo yathā parikalpitaḥc sa tathā naḥ śruto brahman kathyamānas tvayānaghaa yac ca tat kathitaṃ pūrvaṃ tvayā prājñāyata kiṃ canaa tamaso brahma saṃbhūtaṃ tamomūlam ṛtātmakamc tad viśvabhāvasaṃjñāntaṃ pauruṣīṃ tanum āsthitama so niruddha iti proktas tat pradhānaṃ pracakṣatec tad avyaktam iti jñeyaṃ triguṇaṃ nṛpasattamaa vidyāsahāyavān devo viṣvakseno hariḥ prabhuḥb ādikarmā sa bhūtānām aprameyo hariḥ prabhuḥc apsv eva śayanaṃ cakre nidrāyogam upāgataḥe jagataś cintayan sṛṣṭiṃ citrāṃ bahuguṇodbhavāma tasya cintayataḥ sṛṣṭiṃ mahān ātmaguṇaḥ smṛtaḥc ahaṃkāras tato jāto brahmā śubhacaturmukhaḥe hiraṇyagarbho bhagavān sarvalokapitāmahaḥa padme niruddhāt saṃbhūtas tadā padmanibhekṣaṇaḥc sahasrapatre dyutimān upaviṣṭaḥ sanātanaḥa dadṛśe dbhutasaṃkāśe lokān āpomayān prabhuḥc sattvasthaḥ parameṣṭhī sa tato bhūtagaṇān sṛjata pūrvam eva ca padmasya patre sūryāṃśusaprabhec nārāyaṇakṛtau bindū apām āstāṃ guṇottaraua tāv apaśyat sa bhagavān anādinidhano cyutaḥc ekas tatrābhavad bindur madhvābho ruciraprabhaḥa sa tāmaso madhur jātas tadā nārāyaṇājñayāc kaṭhinas tv aparo binduḥ kaiṭabho rājasas tu saḥa tāv abhyadhāvatāṃ śreṣṭhau tamorajaguṇānvitauc balavantau gadāhastau padmanālānusāriṇaua dadṛśāte ravindasthaṃ brahmāṇam amitaprabhamc sṛjantaṃ prathamaṃ vedāṃś caturaś cāruvigrahāna tato brahmā kaśmalam āviśatc tato vacanam īśānaṃ prāha vedair vinākṛtaḥa vedā me paramaṃ cakṣur vedā me paramaṃ balamc vedā me paramaṃ dhāma vedā me brahma cottamama mama vedā hṛtāḥ sarve dānavābhyāṃ balād itaḥc andhakārā hi me lokā jātā vedair vinākṛtāḥe vedān ṛte hi kiṃ kuryāṃ lokān vai sraṣṭum udyataḥa aho bata mahad duḥkhaṃ vedanāśanajaṃ mamac prāptaṃ dunoti hṛdayaṃ tīvraśokāya randhayana ko hi śokārṇave magnaṃ mām ito dya samuddharetc vedāṃs tān ānayen naṣṭān kasya cāhaṃ priyo bhavea ity evaṃ bhāṣamāṇasya brahmaṇo nṛpasattamac hareḥ stotrārtham udbhūtā buddhir buddhimatāṃ varae tato jagau paraṃ japyaṃ sāñjalipragrahaḥ prabhuḥa namas te brahmahṛdaya namas te mama pūrvajac lokādya bhuvanaśreṣṭha sāṃkhyayoganidhe vibhoa vyaktāvyaktakarācintya kṣemaṃ panthānam āsthitac viśvabhuk sarvabhūtānām antarātmann ayonijaa ahaṃ prasādajas tubhyaṃ lokadhāmne svayaṃbhuvec tvatto me mānasaṃ janma prathamaṃ dvijapūjitama cākṣuṣaṃ vai dvitīyaṃ me janma cāsīt purātanamc tvatprasādāc ca me janma tṛtīyaṃ vācikaṃ mahata tvattaḥ śravaṇajaṃ cāpi caturthaṃ janma me vibhoc nāsikyaṃ cāpi me janma tvattaḥ pañcamam ucyatea aṇḍajaṃ cāpi me janma tvattaḥ ṣaṣṭhaṃ vinirmitamc idaṃ ca saptamaṃ janma padmajaṃ me mitaprabhaa sarge sarge hy ahaṃ putras tava triguṇavarjitaḥc prathitaḥ puṇḍarīkākṣa pradhānaguṇakalpitaḥa tvam īśvarasvabhāvaś ca svayaṃbhūḥ puruṣottamaḥc tvayā vinirmito haṃ vai vedacakṣur vayotigaḥa te me vedā hṛtāś cakṣur andho jāto smi jāgṛhic dadasva cakṣuṣī mahyaṃ priyo haṃ te priyo si mea evaṃ stutaḥ sa bhagavān puruṣaḥ sarvatomukhaḥc jahau nidrām atha tadā vedakāryārtham udyataḥe aiśvareṇa prayogeṇa dvitīyāṃ tanum āsthitaḥa sunāsikena kāyena bhūtvā candraprabhas tadāc kṛtvā hayaśiraḥ śubhraṃ vedānām ālayaṃ prabhuḥa tasya mūrdhā samabhavad dyauḥ sanakṣatratārakāc keśāś cāsyābhavan dīrghā raver aṃśusamaprabhāḥa karṇāv ākāśapātāle lalāṭaṃ bhūtadhāriṇīc gaṅgā sarasvatī puṇyā bhruvāv āstāṃ mahānadīa cakṣuṣī somasūryau te nāsā saṃdhyā punaḥ smṛtāc oṃkāras tv atha saṃskāro vidyuj jihvā ca nirmitāa dantāś ca pitaro rājan somapā iti viśrutāḥc goloko brahmalokaś ca oṣṭhāv āstāṃ mahātmanaḥe grīvā cāsyābhavad rājan kālarātrir guṇottarāa etad dhayaśiraḥ kṛtvā nānāmūrtibhir āvṛtamc antardadhe sa viśveśo viveśa ca rasāṃ prabhuḥa rasāṃ punaḥ praviṣṭaś ca yogaṃ paramam āsthitaḥc śaikṣaṃ svaraṃ samāsthāya om iti prāsṛjat svarama sa svaraḥ sānunādī ca sarvagaḥ snigdha eva cac babhūvāntarmahībhūtaḥ sarvabhūtaguṇoditaḥa tatas tāv asurau kṛtvā vedān samayabandhanānc rasātale vinikṣipya yataḥ śabdas tato drutaua etasminn antare rājan devo hayaśirodharaḥc jagrāha vedān akhilān rasātalagatān hariḥe prādāc ca brahmaṇe bhūyas tataḥ svāṃ prakṛtiṃ gataḥa sthāpayitvā hayaśira udakpūrve mahodadhauc vedānām ālayaś cāpi babhūvāśvaśirās tataḥa atha kiṃ cid apaśyantau dānavau madhukaiṭabhauc punar ājagmatus tatra vegitau paśyatāṃ ca taue yatra vedā vinikṣiptās tat sthānaṃ śūnyam eva caa tata uttamam āsthāya vegaṃ balavatāṃ varauc punar uttasthatuḥ śīghraṃ rasānām ālayāt tadāe dadṛśāte ca puruṣaṃ tam evādikaraṃ prabhuma śvetaṃ candraviśuddhābham aniruddhatanau sthitamc bhūyo py amitavikrāntaṃ nidrāyogam upāgatama ātmapramāṇaracite apām upari kalpitec śayane nāgabhogāḍhye jvālāmālāsamāvṛtea niṣkalmaṣeṇa sattvena saṃpannaṃ ruciraprabhamc taṃ dṛṣṭvā dānavendrau tau mahāhāsam amuñcatāma ūcatuś ca samāviṣṭau rajasā tamasā ca tauc tadā lokān kṛtsnān sthāvarajaṅgamāna dattvā pitāmahāyāgryāṃ buddhiṃ lokavisargikīmc tatraivāntardadhe devo yata evāgato hariḥa tau dānavau harir hatvā kṛtvā hayaśiras tanumc punaḥ pravṛttidharmārthaṃ ātmanāa eṣa vedanidhiḥ śrīmān eṣa vai tapaso nidhiḥc eṣa yogaś ca sāṃkhyaṃ ca brahma cāgryaṃ harir vibhuḥa nārāyaṇaparā vedā yajñā nārāyaṇātmakāḥc tapo nārāyaṇaparaṃ nārāyaṇaparā gatiḥa nārāyaṇaparaṃ satyam ṛtaṃ nārāyaṇātmakamc nārāyaṇaparo dharmaḥ punarāvṛttidurlabhaḥa pravṛttilakṣaṇaś caiva dharmo nārāyaṇātmakaḥc nārāyaṇātmako gandho bhūmau śreṣṭhatamaḥ smṛtaḥa apāṃ caiva guṇo rājan raso nārāyaṇātmakaḥc jyotiṣāṃ ca guṇo rūpaṃ smṛtaṃ nārāyaṇātmakama nārāyaṇātmakaś cāpi sparśo vāyuguṇaḥ smṛtaḥc nārāyaṇātmakaś cāpi śabda ākāśasaṃbhavaḥa manaś cāpi tato bhūtam avyaktaguṇalakṣaṇamc nārāyaṇaparaḥ kālo jyotiṣām ayanaṃ ca yata nārāyaṇaparā kīrtiḥ śrīś ca lakṣmīś ca devatāḥc nārāyaṇaparaṃ sāṃkhyaṃ yogo nārāyaṇātmakaḥa kāraṇaṃ puruṣo yeṣāṃ pradhānaṃ cāpi kāraṇamc svabhāvaś caiva karmāṇi daivaṃ yeṣāṃ ca kāraṇamd adhiṣṭhānaṃ tathā kartā karaṇaṃ ca pṛthagvidhamd vividhā ca tathā ceṣṭā daivaṃ caivātra pañcamama pañcakāraṇasaṃkhyāto niṣṭhā sarvatra vai hariḥc tattvaṃ jijñāsamānānāṃ hetubhiḥ sarvatomukhaiḥa tattvam eko mahāyogī harir nārāyaṇaḥ prabhuḥc sabrahmakānāṃ lokānām ṛṣīṇāṃ ca mahātmanāma sāṃkhyānāṃ yogināṃ cāpi yatīnām ātmavedināmc manīṣitaṃ vijānāti keśavo na tu tasya tea ye ke cit sarvalokeṣu daivaṃ pitryaṃ ca kurvatec dānāni ca prayacchanti tapyanti ca tapo mahata sarveṣām āśrayo viṣṇur aiśvaraṃ vidhim āsthitaḥc sarvabhūtakṛtāvāso vāsudeveti cocyatea jñānātmakāḥ saṃyamino maharṣayaḥpaśyanti nityaṃ puruṣaṃ guṇādhikam janamejaya uvācaa aho hy ekāntinaḥ sarvān prīṇāti bhagavān hariḥc vidhiprayuktāṃ pūjāṃ ca gṛhṇāti bhagavān svayama ye tu dagdhendhanā loke puṇyapāpavivarjitāḥc teṣāṃ tvayābhinirdiṣṭā pāraṃparyāgatā gatiḥa caturthyāṃ caiva te gatyāṃ gacchanti puruṣottamamc ekāntinas tu puruṣā gacchanti paramaṃ padama nūnam ekāntadharmo yaṃ śreṣṭho nārāyaṇapriyaḥc agatvā gatayas tisro yad gacchanty avyayaṃ harima sahopaniṣadān vedān ye viprāḥ samyag āsthitāḥc paṭhanti vidhim āsthāya ye cāpi yatidharmiṇaḥa tebhyo viśiṣṭāṃ jānāmi gatim ekāntināṃ nṛṇāmc kenaiṣa dharmaḥ kathito devena ṛṣiṇāpi vāa ekāntināṃ ca kā caryā kadā cotpāditā vibhoc etan me saṃśayaṃ chindhi paraṃ kautūhalaṃ hi me vaiśaṃpāyana uvācaa samupoḍheṣv anīkeṣu kurupāṇḍavayor mṛdhec arjune vimanaske ca gītā bhagavatā svayama āgatiś ca gatiś caiva pūrvaṃ te kathitā mayāc gahano hy eṣa dharmo vai durvijñeyo kṛtātmabhiḥa saṃmitaḥ sāmavedena puraivādiyuge kṛtaḥc dhāryate svayam īśena rājan nārāyaṇena haa etam arthaṃ mahārāja pṛṣṭaḥ pārthena nāradaḥc ṛṣimadhye mahābhāgaḥ śṛṇvatoḥ kṛṣṇabhīṣmayoḥa guruṇā ca mamāpy eṣa kathito nṛpasattamac yathā tu kathitas tatra nāradena tathā śṛṇua yadāsīn mānasaṃ janma nārāyaṇamukhodgatamc brahmaṇaḥ pṛthivīpāla tadā nārāyaṇaḥ svayame tena dharmeṇa kṛtavān daivaṃ pitryaṃ ca bhārataa phenapā ṛṣayaś caiva taṃ dharmaṃ pratipedirec vaikhānasāḥ phenapebhyo dharmam etaṃ prapediree vaikhānasebhyaḥ somas tu tataḥ so ntardadhe punaḥa yadāsīc cākṣuṣaṃ janma dvitīyaṃ brahmaṇo nṛpac tadā pitāmahāt somād etaṃ dharmam ajānatae nārāyaṇātmakaṃ rājan rudrāya pradadau ca saḥa tato yogasthito rudraḥ purā kṛtayuge nṛpac vālakhilyān ṛṣīn sarvān dharmam etam apāṭhayate antardadhe tato bhūyas tasya devasya māyayāf vālakhilyā mahātmāno dharmāya pradaduś ca tama tṛtīyaṃ brahmaṇo janma yadāsīd vācikaṃ mahatc tatraiṣa dharmaḥ saṃbhūtaḥ svayaṃ nārāyaṇān nṛpaa suparṇo nāma tam ṛṣiḥ prāptavān puruṣottamātc tapasā vai sutaptena damena niyamena caa triḥ parikrāntavān etat suparṇo dharmam uttamamc yasmāt tasmād vrataṃ hy etat trisauparṇam ihocyatea ṛgvedapāṭhapaṭhitaṃ vratam etad dhi duścaramc suparṇāc cāpy adhigato dharma eṣa sanātanaḥa vāyunā dvipadāṃ śreṣṭha prathito jagadāyuṣāc vāyoḥ sakāśāt prāptaś ca ṛṣibhir vighasāśibhiḥa tebhyo mahodadhiś cainaṃ prāptavān dharmam uttamamc tataḥ so ntardadhe bhūyo nārāyaṇasamāhitaḥa yadā bhūyaḥ śravaṇajā sṛṣṭir āsīn mahātmanaḥc brahmaṇaḥ puruṣavyāghra tatra kīrtayataḥ śṛṇua jagat sraṣṭumanā devo harir nārāyaṇaḥ svayamc cintayām āsa puruṣaṃ jagatsargakaraṃ prabhuḥa atha cintayatas tasya karṇābhyāṃ puruṣaḥ sṛtaḥc prajāsargakaro brahmā tam uvāca jagatpatiḥa sṛja prajāḥ putra sarvā mukhataḥ pādatas tathāc śreyas tava vidhāsyāmi balaṃ tejaś ca suvrataa dharmaṃ ca matto gṛhṇīṣva sātvataṃ nāma nāmataḥc tena sarvaṃ kṛtayugaṃ sthāpayasva yathāvidhia tato brahmā namaścakre devāya harimedhasec dharmaṃ cāgryaṃ sa jagrāha sarahasyaṃ sasaṃgrahame āraṇyakena sahitaṃ nārāyaṇamukhodgatama upadiśya tato dharmaṃ brahmaṇe mitatejasec taṃ kārtayugadharmāṇaṃ nirāśīḥkarmasaṃjñitame jagāma tamasaḥ pāraṃ yatrāvyaktaṃ vyavasthitama tato tha varado devo brahmalokapitāmahaḥc asṛjat sa tadā lokān kṛtsnān sthāvarajaṅgamāna tataḥ prāvartata tadā ādau kṛtayugaṃ śubhamc tato hi sātvato dharmo vyāpya lokān avasthitaḥa tenaivādyena dharmeṇa brahmā lokavisargakṛtc pūjayām āsa deveśaṃ hariṃ nārāyaṇaṃ prabhuma dharmapratiṣṭhāhetoś ca manuṃ svārociṣaṃ tataḥc adhyāpayām āsa tadā lokānāṃ hitakāmyayāa tataḥ svārociṣaḥ putraṃ svayaṃ śaṅkhapadaṃ nṛpac adhyāpayat purāvyagraḥ sarvalokapatir vibhuḥa tataḥ śaṅkhapadaś cāpi putram ātmajam aurasamc diśāpālaṃ sudharmāṇam adhyāpayata bhāratae tataḥ so ntardadhe bhūyaḥ prāpte tretāyuge punaḥa nāsikyajanmani purā brahmaṇaḥ pārthivottamac dharmam etaṃ svayaṃ devo harir nārāyaṇaḥ prabhuḥe ujjagārāravindākṣo brahmaṇaḥ paśyatas tadāa sanatkumāro bhagavāṃs tataḥ prādhītavān nṛpac sanatkumārād api ca vīraṇo vai prajāpatiḥe kṛtādau kuruśārdūla dharmam etam adhītavāna vīraṇaś cāpy adhītyainaṃ raucyāya manave dadauc raucyaḥ putrāya śuddhāya suvratāya sumedhasea kukṣināmne tha pradadau diśāṃ pālāya dharmiṇec tataḥ so ntardadhe bhūyo nārāyaṇamukhodgataḥa aṇḍaje janmani punar brahmaṇe hariyonayec eṣa dharmaḥ samudbhūto nārāyaṇamukhāt punaḥa gṛhīto brahmaṇā rājan prayuktaś ca yathāvidhic adhyāpitāś ca munayo nāmnā barhiṣado nṛpaa barhiṣadbhyaś ca saṃkrāntaḥ sāmavedāntagaṃ dvijamc jyeṣṭhaṃ nāmnābhivikhyātaṃ jyeṣṭhasāmavrato hariḥa jyeṣṭhāc cāpy anusaṃkrānto rājānam avikampanamc antardadhe tato rājann eṣa dharmaḥ prabhor hareḥa yad idaṃ saptamaṃ janma padmajaṃ brahmaṇo nṛpac tatraiṣa dharmaḥ kathitaḥ svayaṃ nārāyaṇena hia pitāmahāya śuddhāya yugādau lokadhāriṇec pitāmahaś ca dakṣāya dharmam etaṃ purā dadaua tato jyeṣṭhe tu dauhitre prādād dakṣo nṛpottamac āditye savitur jyeṣṭhe vivasvāñ jagṛhe tataḥa tretāyugādau ca punar vivasvān manave dadauc manuś ca lokabhūtyarthaṃ sutāyekṣvākave dadaua ikṣvākuṇā ca kathito vyāpya lokān avasthitaḥc gamiṣyati kṣayānte ca punar nārāyaṇaṃ nṛpaa vratināṃ cāpi yo dharmaḥ sa te pūrvaṃ nṛpottamac kathito harigītāsu samāsavidhikalpitaḥa nāradena tu saṃprāptaḥ sarahasyaḥ sasaṃgrahaḥc eṣa dharmo jagannāthāt sākṣān nārāyaṇān nṛpaa evam eṣa mahān dharma ādyo rājan sanātanaḥc durvijñeyo duṣkaraś ca sātvatair dhāryate sadāa dharmajñānena caitena suprayuktena karmaṇāc ahiṃsādharmayuktena prīyate harir īśvaraḥa ekavyūhavibhāgo vā kva cid dvivyūhasaṃjñitaḥc trivyūhaś cāpi saṃkhyātaś caturvyūhaś ca dṛśyatea harir eva hi kṣetrajño nirmamo niṣkalas tathāc jīvaś ca sarvabhūteṣu pañcabhūtaguṇātigaḥa manaś ca prathitaṃ rājan pañcendriyasamīraṇamc eṣa lokanidhir dhīmān eṣa lokavisargakṛta akartā caiva kartā ca kāryaṃ kāraṇam eva cac yathecchati tathā rājan krīḍate puruṣo vyayaḥa eṣa ekāntidharmas te kīrtito nṛpasattamac mayā guruprasādena durvijñeyo kṛtātmabhiḥe ekāntino hi puruṣā durlabhā bahavo nṛpaa yady ekāntibhir ākīrṇaṃ jagat syāt kurunandanac ahiṃsakair ātmavidbhiḥ sarvabhūtahite rataiḥe bhavet kṛtayugaprāptir āśīḥkarmavivarjitaiḥa evaṃ sa bhagavān vyāso gurur mama viśāṃ patec kathayām āsa dharmajño dharmarājñe dvijottamaḥa ṛṣīṇāṃ saṃnidhau rājañ śṛṇvatoḥ kṛṣṇabhīṣmayoḥc tasyāpy akathayat pūrvaṃ nāradaḥ sumahātapāḥa devaṃ paramakaṃ brahma śvetaṃ candrābham acyutamc yatra caikāntino yānti nārāyaṇaparāyaṇāḥd tad eva kevalaṃ sthānaṃ muktānāṃ paramaṃ bhavet janamejaya uvācaa evaṃ bahuvidhaṃ dharmaṃ pratibuddhair niṣevitamc na kurvanti kathaṃ viprā anye nānāvrate sthitāḥ vaiśaṃpāyana uvācaa tisraḥ prakṛtayo rājan dehabandheṣu nirmitāḥc sāttvikī rājasī caiva tāmasī ceti bhārataa dehabandheṣu puruṣaḥ śreṣṭhaḥ kurukulodvahac sāttvikaḥ puruṣavyāghra bhaven mokṣārthaniścitaḥa atrāpi sa vijānāti puruṣaṃ brahmavartinamc nārāyaṇaparo mokṣas tato vai sāttvikaḥ smṛtaḥa manīṣitaṃ ca prāpnoti cintayan puruṣottamamc ekāntabhaktiḥ satataṃ nārāyaṇaparāyaṇaḥa manīṣiṇo hi ye ke cid yatayo mokṣakāṅkṣiṇaḥc teṣāṃ vai chinnatṛṣṇānāṃ yogakṣemavaho hariḥa jāyamānaṃ hi puruṣaṃ yaṃ paśyen madhusūdanaḥc sāttvikas tu sa vijñeyo bhaven mokṣe ca niścitaḥa sāṃkhyayogena tulyo hi dharma ekāntasevitaḥc nārāyaṇātmake mokṣe tato yānti parāṃ gatima nārāyaṇena dṛṣṭaś ca pratibuddho bhavet pumānc evam ātmecchayā rājan pratibuddho na jāyatea rājasī tāmasī caiva vyāmiśre prakṛtī smṛtec tadātmakaṃ hi puruṣaṃ jāyamānaṃ viśāṃ patee pravṛttilakṣaṇair yuktaṃ nāvekṣati hariḥ svayama paśyaty enaṃ jāyamānaṃ brahmā lokapitāmahaḥc rajasā tamasā caiva mānuṣaṃ samabhiplutama kāmaṃ devāś ca ṛṣayaḥ sattvasthā nṛpasattamac hīnāḥ sattvena sūkṣmeṇa tato vaikārikāḥ smṛtāḥ janamejaya uvācaa kathaṃ vaikāriko gacchet puruṣaḥ puruṣottamamb vada sarvaṃ yathādṛṣṭaṃ pravṛttiṃ ca yathākramam vaiśaṃpāyana uvācaa susūkṣmasattvasaṃyuktaṃ saṃyuktaṃ tribhir akṣaraiḥc puruṣaḥ puruṣaṃ gacchen niṣkriyaḥ pañcaviṃśakama evam ekaṃ sāṃkhyayogaṃ vedāraṇyakam eva cac parasparāṅgāny etāni pañcarātraṃ ca kathyatee eṣa ekāntināṃ dharmo nārāyaṇaparātmakaḥa yathā samudrāt prasṛtā jalaughāstam eva rājan punar āviśantic ime tathā jñānamahājalaughānārāyaṇaṃ vai punar āviśantia eṣa te kathito dharmaḥ sātvato yadubāndhavac kuruṣvainaṃ yathānyāyaṃ yadi śaknoṣi bhārataa evaṃ hi sumahābhāgo nārado gurave mamac śvetānāṃ yatinām āha ekāntagatim avyayāma vyāsaś cākathayat prītyā dharmaputrāya dhīmatec sa evāyaṃ mayā tubhyam ākhyātaḥ prasṛto guroḥa itthaṃ hi duścaro dharma eṣa pārthivasattamac yathaiva tvaṃ tathaivānye na bhajanti vimohitāḥa kṛṣṇa eva hi lokānāṃ bhāvano mohanas tathāc saṃhārakārakaś caiva kāraṇaṃ ca viśāṃ pate janamejaya uvācaa sāṃkhyaṃ yogaṃ pañcarātraṃ vedāraṇyakam eva cac jñānāny etāni brahmarṣe lokeṣu pracaranti haa kim etāny ekaniṣṭhāni pṛthaṅniṣṭhāni vā munec prabrūhi vai mayā pṛṣṭaḥ pravṛttiṃ ca yathākramam vaiśaṃpāyana uvācaa jajñe bahujñaṃ param atyudāraṃyaṃ dvīpamadhye sutam ātmavantamc parāśarād gandhavatī maharṣiṃtasmai namo jñānatamonudāyaa pitāmahādyaṃ pravadanti ṣaṣṭhaṃmaharṣim ārṣeyavibhūtiyuktamc nārāyaṇasyāṃśajam ekaputraṃdvaipāyanaṃ vedamahānidhānama tam ādikāleṣu mahāvibhūtirnārāyaṇo brahmamahānidhānamc sasarja putrārtham udāratejāvyāsaṃ mahātmānam ajaḥ purāṇaḥ janamejaya uvācaa tvayaiva kathitaḥ pūrvaṃ saṃbhavo dvijasattamac vasiṣṭhasya sutaḥ śaktiḥ śakteḥ putraḥ parāśaraḥa parāśarasya dāyādaḥ kṛṣṇadvaipāyano muniḥc bhūyo nārāyaṇasutaṃ tvam evainaṃ prabhāṣasea kim ataḥ pūrvajaṃ janma vyāsasyāmitatejasaḥc kathayasvottamamate janma nārāyaṇodbhavam vaiśaṃpāyana uvācaa vedārthān vettukāmasya dharmiṣṭhasya taponidheḥc guror me jñānaniṣṭhasya himavatpāda āsataḥa kṛtvā bhāratam ākhyānaṃ tapaḥśrāntasya dhīmataḥc śuśrūṣāṃ tatparā rājan kṛtavanto vayaṃ tadāa sumantur jaiminiś caiva pailaś ca sudṛḍhavrataḥc ahaṃ caturthaḥ śiṣyo vai śuko vyāsātmajas tathāa ebhiḥ parivṛto vyāsaḥ śiṣyaiḥ pañcabhir uttamaiḥc śuśubhe himavatpāde bhūtair bhūtapatir yathāa vedān āvartayan sāṅgān bhāratārthāṃś ca sarvaśaḥc tam ekamanasaṃ dāntaṃ yuktā vayam upāsmahea kathāntare tha kasmiṃś cit pṛṣṭo smābhir dvijottamaḥc vedārthān bhāratārthāṃś ca janma nārāyaṇāt tathāa sa pūrvam uktvā vedārthān bhāratārthāṃś ca tattvavitc nārāyaṇād idaṃ janma vyāhartum upacakramea śṛṇudhvam ākhyānavaram etad ārṣeyam uttamamc ādikālodbhavaṃ viprās tapasādhigataṃ mayāa prāpte prajāvisarge vai saptame padmasaṃbhavec nārāyaṇo mahāyogī śubhāśubhavivarjitaḥa sasṛje nābhitaḥ putraṃ brahmāṇam amitaprabhamc tataḥ sa prādurabhavad athainaṃ vākyam abravīta mama tvaṃ nābhito jātaḥ prajāsargakaraḥ prabhuḥc sṛja prajās tvaṃ vividhā brahman sajaḍapaṇḍitāḥa sa evam ukto vimukhaś cintāvyākulamānasaḥc praṇamya varadaṃ devam uvāca harim īśvarama kā śaktir mama deveśa prajāḥ sraṣṭuṃ namo stu tec aprajñāvān ahaṃ deva vidhatsva yad anantarama sa evam ukto bhagavān bhūtvāthāntarhitas tataḥc cintayām āsa deveśo buddhiṃ buddhimatāṃ varaḥa svarūpiṇī tato buddhir upatasthe hariṃ prabhumc yogena caināṃ niryogaḥ svayaṃ niyuyuje tadāa sa tām aiśvaryayogasthāṃ buddhiṃ śaktimatīṃ satīmc uvāca vacanaṃ devo buddhiṃ vai prabhur avyayaḥa brahmāṇaṃ praviśasveti lokasṛṣṭyarthasiddhayec tatas tam īśvarādiṣṭā buddhiḥ kṣipraṃ viveśa sāa athainaṃ buddhisaṃyuktaṃ punaḥ sa dadṛśe hariḥc bhūyaś cainaṃ vacaḥ prāha sṛjemā vividhāḥ prajāḥd bāḍham ity eva kṛtvā sa yathājñāṃ śirasā hareḥd tathākaroc ca dharmātmā brahmā lokapitāmahaḥa evam uktvā sa bhagavāṃs tatraivāntaradhīyatac prāpa caiva muhūrtena svasthānaṃ devasaṃjñitama tāṃ caiva prakṛtiṃ prāpya ekībhāvagato bhavatc athāsya buddhir abhavat punar anyā tadā kilaa sṛṣṭā imāḥ prajāḥ sarvā brahmaṇā parameṣṭhināc daityadānavagandharvarakṣogaṇasamākulāḥe jātā hīyaṃ vasumatī bhārākrāntā tapasvinīa bahavo balinaḥ pṛthvyāṃ daityadānavarākṣasāḥc bhaviṣyanti tapoyuktā varān prāpsyanti cottamāna avaśyam eva taiḥ sarvair varadānena darpitaiḥc bādhitavyāḥ suragaṇā ṛṣayaś ca tapodhanāḥe tatra nyāyyam idaṃ kartuṃ bhārāvataraṇaṃ mayāa atha nānāsamudbhūtair vasudhāyāṃ yathākramamc nigraheṇa ca pāpānāṃ sādhūnāṃ pragraheṇa caa imāṃ tapasvinīṃ satyāṃ dhārayiṣyāmi medinīmc mayā hy eṣā hi dhriyate pātālasthena bhogināa mayā dhṛtā dhārayati jagad dhi sacarācaramc tasmāt pṛthvyāḥ paritrāṇaṃ kariṣye saṃbhavaṃ gataḥa evaṃ sa cintayitvā tu bhagavān madhusūdanaḥc rūpāṇy anekāny asṛjat prādurbhāvabhavāya saḥa vārāhaṃ nārasiṃhaṃ ca vāmanaṃ mānuṣaṃ tathāc ebhir mayā nihantavyā durvinītāḥ surārayaḥa atha bhūyo jagatsraṣṭā bhoḥśabdenānunādayanc sarasvatīm uccacāra tatra sārasvato bhavata apāntaratamā nāma suto vāksaṃbhavo vibhoḥc bhūtabhavyabhaviṣyajñaḥ satyavādī dṛḍhavrataḥa tam uvāca nataṃ mūrdhnā devānām ādir avyayaḥc vedākhyāne śrutiḥ kāryā tvayā matimatāṃ varae tasmāt kuru yathājñaptaṃ mayaitad vacanaṃ munea tena bhinnās tadā vedā manoḥ svāyaṃbhuve ntarec tatas tutoṣa bhagavān haris tenāsya karmaṇāe tapasā ca sutaptena yamena niyamena ca śrībhagavān uvācaa manvantareṣu putra tvam evaṃ lokapravartakaḥc bhaviṣyasy acalo brahmann apradhṛṣyaś ca nityaśaḥa punas tiṣye ca saṃprāpte kuravo nāma bhāratāḥc bhaviṣyanti mahātmāno rājānaḥ prathitā bhuvia teṣāṃ tvattaḥ prasūtānāṃ kulabhedo bhaviṣyatic parasparavināśārthaṃ tvām ṛte dvijasattamaa tatrāpy anekadhā vedān bhetsyase tapasānvitaḥc kṛṣṇe yuge ca saṃprāpte kṛṣṇavarṇo bhaviṣyasia dharmāṇāṃ vividhānāṃ ca kartā jñānakaras tathāc bhaviṣyasi tapoyukto na ca rāgād vimokṣyasea vītarāgaś ca putras te paramātmā bhaviṣyatic maheśvaraprasādena naitad vacanam anyathāa yaṃ mānasaṃ vai pravadanti putraṃpitāmahasyottamabuddhiyuktamc vasiṣṭham agryaṃ tapaso nidhānaṃyaś cāpi sūryaṃ vyatiricya bhātia tasyānvaye cāpi tato maharṣiḥparāśaro nāma mahāprabhāvaḥc pitā sa te vedanidhir variṣṭhomahātapā vai tapaso nivāsaḥe kānīnagarbhaḥ pitṛkanyakāyāṃtasmād ṛṣes tvaṃ bhavitā ca putraḥa bhūtabhavyabhaviṣyāṇāṃ chinnasarvārthasaṃśayaḥc ye hy atikrāntakāḥ pūrvaṃ sahasrayugaparyayāḥa tāṃś ca sarvān mayoddiṣṭān drakṣyase tapasānvitaḥc punar drakṣyasi cānekasahasrayugaparyayāna anādinidhanaṃ loke cakrahastaṃ ca māṃ munec anudhyānān mama mune naitad vacanam anyathād bhaviṣyati mahāsattva khyātiś cāpy atulā tavaa śanaiścaraḥ sūryaputro bhaviṣyati manur mahānc tasmin manvantare caiva saptarṣigaṇapūrvakaḥe tvam eva bhavitā vatsa matprasādān na saṃśayaḥf yat kiṃ cid vidyate loke sarvaṃ tan madviceṣṭitamf anyo hy anyaṃ cintayati svacchandaṃ vidadhāmy aham vyāsa uvācaa evaṃ sārasvatam ṛṣim apāntaratamaṃ tadāc uktvā vacanam īśānaḥ sādhayasvety athābravīta so haṃ tasya prasādena devasya harimedhasaḥc apāntaratamā nāma tato jāto jñayā hareḥe punaś ca jāto vikhyāto vasiṣṭhakulanandanaḥa tad etat kathitaṃ janma mayā pūrvakam ātmanaḥc nārāyaṇaprasādena tathā nārāyaṇāṃśajama mayā hi sumahat taptaṃ tapaḥ paramadāruṇamc purā matimatāṃ śreṣṭhāḥ parameṇa samādhināa etad vaḥ kathitaṃ sarvaṃ yan māṃ pṛcchatha putrakāḥc pūrvajanma bhaviṣyaṃ ca bhaktānāṃ snehato mayā vaiśaṃpāyana uvācaa eṣa te kathitaḥ pūrvaṃ saṃbhavo smadguror nṛpac vyāsasyākliṣṭamanaso yathā pṛṣṭaḥ punaḥ śṛṇua sāṃkhyaṃ yogaṃ pañcarātraṃ vedāḥ pāśupataṃ tathāc jñānāny etāni rājarṣe viddhi nānāmatāni vaia sāṃkhyasya vaktā kapilaḥ paramarṣiḥ sa ucyatec hiraṇyagarbho yogasya vettā nānyaḥ purātanaḥa apāntaratamāś caiva vedācāryaḥ sa ucyatec prācīnagarbhaṃ tam ṛṣiṃ pravadantīha ke canaa umāpatir bhūtapatiḥ śrīkaṇṭho brahmaṇaḥ sutaḥc uktavān idam avyagro jñānaṃ pāśupataṃ śivaḥa pañcarātrasya kṛtsnasya vettā tu bhagavān svayamc sarveṣu ca nṛpaśreṣṭha jñāneṣv eteṣu dṛśyatea yathāgamaṃ yathājñānaṃ niṣṭhā nārāyaṇaḥ prabhuḥc na cainam evaṃ jānanti tamobhūtā viśāṃ patea tam eva śāstrakartāraṃ pravadanti manīṣiṇaḥc niṣṭhāṃ nārāyaṇam ṛṣiṃ nānyo stīti ca vādinaḥa niḥsaṃśayeṣu sarveṣu nityaṃ vasati vai hariḥc sasaṃśayān hetubalān nādhyāvasati mādhavaḥa pañcarātravido ye tu yathākramaparā nṛpac ekāntabhāvopagatās te hariṃ praviśanti vaia sāṃkhyaṃ ca yogaṃ ca sanātane dvevedāś ca sarve nikhilena rājanc sarvaiḥ samastair ṛṣibhir niruktonārāyaṇo viśvam idaṃ purāṇama śubhāśubhaṃ karma samīritaṃ yatpravartate sarvalokeṣu kiṃ citc tasmād ṛṣes tad bhavatīti vidyāddivy antarikṣe bhuvi cāpsu cāpi janamejaya uvācaa bahavaḥ puruṣā brahmann utāho eka eva tuc ko hy atra puruṣaḥ śreṣṭhaḥ ko vā yonir ihocyate vaiśaṃpāyana uvācaa bahavaḥ puruṣā loke sāṃkhyayogavicāriṇāmc naitad icchanti puruṣam ekaṃ kurukulodvahaa bahūnāṃ puruṣāṇāṃ ca yathaikā yonir ucyatec tathā taṃ puruṣaṃ viśvaṃ vyākhyāsyāmi guṇādhikama namaskṛtvā tu gurave vyāsāyāmitatejasec tapoyuktāya dāntāya vandyāya paramarṣayea idaṃ puruṣasūktaṃ hi sarvavedeṣu pārthivac ṛtaṃ satyaṃ ca vikhyātam ṛṣisiṃhena cintitama utsargeṇāpavādena ṛṣibhiḥ kapilādibhiḥc adhyātmacintām āśritya śāstrāṇy uktāni bhārataa samāsatas tu yad vyāsaḥ puruṣaikatvam uktavānc tat te haṃ saṃpravakṣyāmi prasādād amitaujasaḥa atrāpy udāharantīmam itihāsaṃ purātanamc brahmaṇā saha saṃvādaṃ tryambakasya viśāṃ patea kṣīrodasya samudrasya madhye hāṭakasaprabhaḥc vaijayanta iti khyātaḥ parvatapravaro nṛpaa tatrādhyātmagatiṃ deva ekākī pravicintayanc vairājasadane nityaṃ vaijayantaṃ niṣevatea atha tatrāsatas tasya caturvaktrasya dhīmataḥc lalāṭaprabhavaḥ putraḥ śiva āgād yadṛcchayāe ākāśenaiva yogīśaḥ purā trinayanaḥ prabhuḥa tataḥ khān nipapātāśu dharaṇīdharamūrdhanic agrataś cābhavat prīto vavande cāpi pādayoḥa taṃ pādayor nipatitaṃ dṛṣṭvā savyena pāṇināc utthāpayām āsa tadā prabhur ekaḥ prajāpatiḥa uvāca cainaṃ bhagavāṃś cirasyāgatam ātmajamc svāgataṃ te mahābāho diṣṭyā prāpto si me ntikama kaccit te kuśalaṃ putra svādhyāyatapasoḥ sadāc nityam ugratapās tvaṃ hi tataḥ pṛcchāmi te punaḥ rudra uvācaa tvatprasādena bhagavan svādhyāyatapasor mamac kuśalaṃ cāvyayaṃ caiva sarvasya jagatas tathāa ciradṛṣṭo hi bhagavān vairājasadane mayāc tato haṃ parvataṃ prāptas tv imaṃ tvatpādasevitama kautūhalaṃ cāpi hi me ekāntagamanena tec naitat kāraṇam alpaṃ hi bhaviṣyati pitāmahaa kiṃ nu tat sadanaṃ śreṣṭhaṃ vandanīyāś ca varadā vayam apy anuyāyinaḥc manuṣyāṇāṃ viśeṣeṇa dhanādhyakṣā iti śrutiḥ nāgabhāryovācaa ārjavenābhijānāmi nāsau devo nilāśanac ekaṃ tv asya vijānāmi bhaktimān atiroṣaṇaḥd dvijānām iha bhaktaḥ sa kālavit kaliroṣaṇaḥd saṃkalpavihitaṃ tv arthaṃ pūrayitvānilāśanad arthināṃ paramaṃ lokaṃ yaśaś cāgryaṃ samaśnuted prārthitārthābhihantā te mā bhūt kaś cit kule naghad sāmarthye sati nāgendra narake sa hi majjatia sa hi kāryāntarākāṅkṣī jalepsuḥ stokako yathāc varṣaṃ varṣapriyaḥ pakṣī darśanaṃ tava kāṅkṣatia na hi tvā daivataṃ kiṃ cid vivignaṃ pratipālayetc tulye hy abhijane jāto na kaś cit paryupāsatea tad roṣaṃ sahajaṃ tyaktvā tvam enaṃ draṣṭum arhasic āśāchedena tasyādya nātmānaṃ dagdhum arhasia āśayā tv abhipannānām akṛtvāśrupramārjanamc rājā vā rājaputro vā bhrūṇahatyaiva yujyatea maunāj jñānaphalāvāptir dānena ca yaśo mahatc vāgmitvaṃ satyavākyena paratra ca mahīyatea bhūmipradānena gatiṃ labhaty āśramasaṃmitāmc naṣṭasyārthasya saṃprāptiṃ kṛtvā phalam upāśnutea abhipretām asaṃkliṣṭāṃ kṛtvākāmavatīṃ kriyāmc na yāti nirayaṃ kaś cid iti dharmavido viduḥ nāga uvācaa abhimānena māno me jātidoṣeṇa vai mahānc roṣaḥ saṃkalpajaḥ sādhvi dagdho vācāgninā tvayāa na ca roṣād ahaṃ sādhvi paśyeyam adhikaṃ tamaḥc yasya vaktavyatāṃ yānti viśeṣeṇa bhujaṃgamāḥa doṣasya hi vaśaṃ gatvā daśagrīvaḥ pratāpavānc tathā śakrapratispardhī hato rāmeṇa saṃyugea antaḥpuragataṃ vatsaṃ śrutvā rāmeṇa nirhṛtamc dharṣaṇād roṣasaṃvignāḥ kārtavīryasutā hatāḥa jāmadagnyena rāmeṇa sahasranayanopamaḥc saṃyuge nihato roṣāt kārtavīryo mahābalaḥd tathā śakrapratispardhī roṣasya vaśam āgataḥd māndhātā nihato yuddhe lavaṇeneha rakṣasāa tad eṣa tapasāṃ śatruḥ śreyasaś ca nipātanaḥc nigṛhīto mayā roṣaḥ śrutvaiva vacanaṃ tavaa ātmānaṃ ca viśeṣeṇa praśaṃsāmy anapāyinic yasya me tvaṃ viśālākṣi bhāryā sarvaguṇānvitāa eṣa tatraiva gacchāmi yatra tiṣṭhaty asau dvijaḥc sarvathā coktavān vākyaṃ nākṛtārthaḥ prayāsyati bhīṣma uvācaa sa pannagapatis tatra prayayau brāhmaṇaṃ pratic tam eva manasā dhyāyan kāryavattāṃ vicārayana tam abhikramya nāgendro matimān sa nareśvarac provāca madhuraṃ vākyaṃ prakṛtyā dharmavatsalaḥa bho bho kṣāmyābhibhāṣe tvāṃ na roṣaṃ kartum arhasic iha tvam abhisaṃprāptaḥ kasyārthe kiṃ prayojanama ābhimukhyād abhikramya snehāt pṛcchāmi te dvijac vivikte gomatītīre kiṃ vā tvaṃ paryupāsase brāhmaṇa uvācaa dharmāraṇyaṃ hi māṃ viddhi nāgaṃ draṣṭum ihāgatamc padmanābhaṃ dvijaśreṣṭhaṃ tatra me kāryam āhitama tasya cāham asāṃnidhyaṃ śrutavān asmi taṃ gatamc svajanaṃ taṃ pratīkṣāmi parjanyam iva karṣakaḥa tasya cākleśakaraṇaṃ svastikārasamāhitamc vartayāmy ayutaṃ brahma yogayukto nirāmayaḥ nāga uvācaa aho kalyāṇavṛttas tvaṃ sādhu sajjanavatsalaḥc śravāḍhyas tvaṃ mahābhāga paraṃ snehena paśyasia ahaṃ sa nāgo viprarṣe yathā māṃ vindate bhavānc ājñāpaya yathā svairaṃ kiṃ karomi priyaṃ tavaa bhavantaṃ svajanād asmi saṃprāptaṃ śrutavān ihac atas tvāṃ svayam evāhaṃ draṣṭum abhyāgato dvijaa saṃprāptaś ca bhavān adya kṛtārthaḥ pratiyāsyatic visrabdho māṃ dvijaśreṣṭha viṣaye yoktum arhasia vayaṃ hi bhavatā sarve guṇakrītā viśeṣataḥc yas tvam ātmahitaṃ tyaktvā mām evehānurudhyase brāhmaṇa uvācaa āgato haṃ mahābhāga tava darśanalālasaḥc kaṃ cid artham anarthajñaḥ praṣṭukāmo bhujaṃgamaa aham ātmānam ātmastho mārgamāṇo tmano hitamc vāsārthinaṃ mahāprājña balavantam upāsmi haa prakāśitas tvaṃ svaguṇair yaśogarbhagabhastibhiḥc śaśāṅkakarasaṃsparśair hṛdyair ātmaprakāśitaiḥa tasya me praśnam utpannaṃ chindhi tvam anilāśanac paścāt kāryaṃ vadiṣyāmi śrotum arhati me bhavān brāhmaṇa uvācaa vivasvato gacchati paryayeṇavoḍhuṃ bhavāṃs taṃ ratham ekacakramc āścaryabhūtaṃ yadi tatra kiṃ ciddṛṣṭaṃ tvayā śaṃsitum arhasi tvam nāga uvāca āścaryāṇām anekānāṃ pratiṣṭhā bhagavān raviḥ yato bhūtāḥ pravartante sarve trailokyasaṃmatāḥa yasya raśmisahasreṣu śākhāsv iva vihaṃgamāḥc vasanty āśritya munayaḥ saṃsiddhā daivataiḥ sahaa yato vāyur viniḥsṛtya sūryaraśmyāśrito mahānc vijṛmbhaty ambare vipra kim āścaryataraṃ tataḥd vibhajyatāṃ tu viprarṣe prajānāṃ hitakāmyayād toyaṃ sṛjati varṣāsu kim āścaryam ataḥ paramd yasya maṇḍalamadhyastho mahātmā paramatviṣād dīptaḥ samīkṣate lokān kim āścaryam ataḥ paramd śakracāpāṅkitaghaṭaiḥ yaḥ sa vārighaṭodaraiḥa śukro nāmāsitaḥ pādo yasya vāridharo mbarec toyaṃ sṛjati varṣāsu kim āścaryam ataḥ parama yo ṣṭamāsāṃs tu śucinā kiraṇenojjhitaṃ payaḥc paryādatte punaḥ kāle kim āścaryam ataḥ parama yasya tejoviśeṣeṣu nityam ātmā pratiṣṭhitaḥc yato bījaṃ mahī ceyaṃ dhāryate sacarācarama yatra devo mahābāhuḥ śāśvataḥ paramo kṣaraḥc anādinidhano vipra kim āścaryam ataḥ paramd devo mantramayo nādiḥ kālātmā tejasāṃ nidhiḥd jaganmayasya kṣetrajñaḥ kim āścaryataraṃ tataḥa āścaryāṇām ivāścaryam idam ekaṃ tu me śṛṇuc vimale yan mayā dṛṣṭam ambare sūryasaṃśrayāta purā madhyāhnasamaye lokāṃs tapati bhāskarec pratyādityapratīkāśaḥ sarvataḥ pratyadṛśyataa sa lokāṃs tejasā sarvān svabhāsā nirvibhāsayanc ādityābhimukho bhyeti gaganaṃ pāṭayann ivaa hutāhutir iva jyotir vyāpya tejomarīcibhiḥc anirdeśyena rūpeṇa dvitīya iva bhāskaraḥa tasyābhigamanaprāptau hasto datto vivasvatāc tenāpi dakṣiṇo hasto dattaḥ pratyarcanārthināa tato bhittvaiva gaganaṃ praviṣṭo ravimaṇḍalamc ekībhūtaṃ ca tat tejaḥ kṣaṇenādityatāṃ gatama tatra naḥ saṃśayo jātas tayos tejaḥsamāgamec anayoḥ ko bhavet sūryo rathastho yo yam āgataḥa te vayaṃ jātasaṃdehāḥ paryapṛcchāmahe ravimc ka eṣa divam ākramya gataḥ sūrya ivāparaḥ sūrya uvācaa naiṣa devo nilasakho nāsuro na ca pannagaḥc uñchavṛttivrate siddho munir eṣa divaṃ gataḥa eṣa mūlaphalāhāraḥ śīrṇaparṇāśanas tathāc abbhakṣo vāyubhakṣaś ca āsīd vipraḥ samāhitaḥa ṛcaś cānena vipreṇa saṃhitāntarabhiṣṭutāḥc svargadvārakṛtodyogo yenāsau tridivaṃ gataḥa asannadhīranākāṅkṣī nityam uñchaśilāśanaḥc sarvabhūtahite yukta eṣa vipro bhujaṃgamad eṣa svena prabhāvena saṃprāpto nirmalāṃ gatimd sukṛtenāsya yatnena spṛhayante bhavadvidhāḥa na hi devā na gandharvā nāsurā na ca pannagāḥc prabhavantīha bhūtānāṃ prāptānāṃ paramāṃ gatim nāga uvācaa etad evaṃvidhaṃ dṛṣṭam āścaryaṃ tatra me dvijac saṃsiddho mānuṣaḥ kāyo yo sau siddhagatiṃ gataḥe sūryeṇa sahito brahman pṛthivīṃ parivartate brāhmaṇa uvācaa āścaryaṃ nātra saṃdehaḥ suprīto smi bhujaṃgamac anvarthopagatair vākyaiḥ panthānaṃ cāsmi darśitaḥa svasti te stu gamiṣyāmi sādho bhujagasattamac smaraṇīyo smi bhavatā saṃpreṣaṇaniyojanaiḥ nāga uvācaa anuktvā madgataṃ kāryaṃ kvedānīṃ prasthito bhavānc ucyatāṃ dvija yat kāryaṃ yadarthaṃ tvam ihāgataḥa uktānukte kṛte kārye mām āmantrya dvijarṣabhac mayā pratyabhyanujñātas tato yāsyasi brāhmaṇaa na hi māṃ kevalaṃ dṛṣṭvā tyaktvā praṇayavān ihac gantum arhasi viprarṣe vṛkṣamūlagato yathāa tvayi cāhaṃ dvijaśreṣṭha bhavān mayi na saṃśayaḥc loko yaṃ bhavataḥ sarvaḥ kā cintā mayi te nagha brāhmaṇa uvācaa evam etan mahāprājña vijñātārtha bhujaṃgamac nātiriktās tvayā devāḥ sarvathaiva yathātathama ya evāhaṃ sa eva tvam evam etad bhujaṃgamac ahaṃ bhavāṃś ca bhūtāni sarve sarvatragāḥ sadāa āsīt tu me bhogapate saṃśayaḥ puṇyasaṃcayec so ham uñchavrataṃ sādho cariṣyāmy arthadarśanama eṣa me niścayaḥ sādho kṛtaḥ kāraṇavattaraḥc āmantrayāmi bhadraṃ te kṛtārtho smi bhujaṃgama bhīṣma uvācaa sa cāmantryoragaśreṣṭhaṃ brāhmaṇaḥ kṛtaniścayaḥc dīkṣākāṅkṣī tadā rājaṃś cyavanaṃ bhārgavaṃ śritaḥa sa tena kṛtasaṃskāro dharmam evopatasthivānc tathaiva ca kathām etāṃ rājan kathitavāṃs tadāa bhārgaveṇāpi rājendra janakasya niveśanec kathaiṣā kathitā puṇyā nāradāya mahātmanea nāradenāpi rājendra devendrasya niveśanec kathitā bharataśreṣṭha pṛṣṭenākliṣṭakarmaṇāa devarājena ca purā kathaiṣā kathitā śubhāc samastebhyaḥ praśastebhyo vasubhyo vasudhādhipaa yadā ca mama rāmeṇa yuddham āsīt sudāruṇamc vasubhiś ca tadā rājan katheyaṃ kathitā mamaa pṛcchamānāya tattvena mayā tubhyaṃ viśāṃ patec katheyaṃ kathitā puṇyā dharmyā dharmabhṛtāṃ varaa tad eṣa paramo dharmo yan māṃ pṛcchasi bhāratac asannadhīr anākāṅkṣī dharmārthakaraṇe nṛpaa sa ca kila kṛtaniścayo dvijāgryobhujagapatipratideśitārthakṛtyaḥc yamaniyamasamāhito vanāntaṃparigaṇitoñchaśilāśanaḥ praviṣṭaḥ
